1b1(rnying rgyud): rgyu ga skad du/ many+dzu AHtrA Adz+wa la/ rgyunAn+tu/ bod spyadang/ bdud rtsi chen po 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rgyud ces b+hab/ bcom ldan 'das dpal
1b2(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po chen po/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnga'
1b3(rnying rgyud): bdag chen po de ni/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i klong chen po 'og min gyi gnas la bkod par spyad pa zhes bya bar/ 'di ltar sa bcu pa'i dus gsum gyi rnal 'byor kyi dbang phyug chen po
1b4(rnying rgyud): rnams dang / lus kyi khams dgu 'dus pa'i dngas ma bdud rtsi chen po ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i don la so so ma yin tha mi dad cing dbyer med par bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje snying po rang gi gdan las
1b5(rnying rgyud): bzhings nas/ seng ge'i 'gro sangs kyis bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu babang po'i spyan sngang mchis nas/ glang po che'i lha sbyangs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgri mes chen po'i zhal du bltas te/
2a1(rnying rgyud): #/ tshong thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin can las dran pa sna tshogs nam mkha'i sbyin bzhin du spang bar yang mkhyen nas chos nyid rje ba med cing 'gag pa med par shar ba'i phyir// bdud rtsi chen po rnam par
2a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i zlo bas rab tu 'das pa'i don 'di zhu bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ 'di skad ces gsol ba 'debs so// kye maho chos skun ma mkha'i rang bzhin la// 'khor ba sprin gyis rab bsgribs pas// rlung sems dran pa'i rnam rtog langs//
2a3(rnying rgyud): bla ma'i thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// man ngag sgron me dran med shar// chos nyid skye ba med pa'i don// bdud rtsi chen po chos kyi sku// rnam rtog blo las rab 'das pa// skal ngan sems can 'dul ba'i phyir// 'o/
2a4(rnying rgyud): min rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang // rnam dgas thob drang srong dang // rjes su 'jug 'gyur ma 'ongs pa'i// don du bdud rtsi sgrub pa yi// dam chos 'khor lo bskor du gsol// zhes gsol ba rab tu btab po//
2a5(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po chen po chos kyi sku dri ma med pa'i dgongs pa las skabs phye nas/ glu yid bzhin du 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po che 'bar ba lta bus/ 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la rab tu gzigs nas/
2b1(rnying rgyud): gsugaso// khams sasas napa ldan papa 'dug canapa// myangang das pa ra ldanas das// na sun pa nga kyang ma kun su // gas thamams ca dran la dang sman papa// ma thus sa da du
2b2(rnying rgyud): mchog gi chos// gsang ba pas kyang ches gsung rab tu gsang // yang gsang rmad byung chos kyi sgrub pa 'di// dran pa rnam rtog sems nyid tshogs brgyad la// dran med lus khams bdud rtsi stan gyur nas// yid ma lha sgra'i 'du phyi pa med//
2b3(rnying rgyud): snang 'khor ba'i blo las rab 'das nas// mchog dang thun mong sgrub pa kun gyi gzhi// rmad byung bdud rtsi chos kyi 'khor lo 'di// khyed rnams tshogs la rab tu bskor ba yi// dad pa'i theg pas rdo rje bra mazung // brtson 'grus lo gor smon pas sman rnams ba/
2b4(rnying rgyud): shes rab mig rnon man ngag mthong bar bya// las dang skal bar ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dpa' ba dpa' mo mched dang lham dral la// phyi rabs don du bshad kyis legs par nyon// ces gsungs so// bdud rtsi chen po 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rgyud las/
2b5(rnying rgyud): gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsgrub pa'i gzhi phun sum tshogs pa 'di gsungs so// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // gsang chen ra' gsang de kho na// sgrub pa kun gyi gzhi yin pas/
2b6(rnying rgyud): skyon 'khor gnas dus sgrub pa'i rjes// ston pa chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa// hud lung man dag ba shes b+ha// gru 'bras thug pa kun la mkhas// mngon du byung dang rna bar brgyud// tranas la brnag sa khong drug pa// zab dang rgya che'i dgongs pa
2b7(rnying rgyud): rnams// ma lu si lus pa med pa'i chos// theg pa rab rgyas yongs shes bya// thun mong khyad par 'khor ldan pa'i// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// 'dod yin lnga spang ma yin dang // kri ya ya ba yog dang // bdud rtsi dka' thub spang ba yin//
3a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal theb gang dang las mkhan dang // pad+ma tsan+dan lta bu yi// bung ba dug sbrul lhar gnas pa// rab tu dad pas bsrub pa nyid// ma ltar byams shing sring ltar gdung // joms skyong la bran sbyang gas// ga
3a2(rnying rgyud): marab tu ldan pa yang // 'khor gyi dam par rab gsungs pas// rdo rje 'chang gi gral du 'khod// dang por bsgrub pa'i gnas btsal ba// bdud ci dam pa bsgrub pa'i gnas// gtsang zhing gzhol ba drang srong gnas// dur khrod ma ma mkha'
3a3(rnying rgyud): gnas// ci sman nags tshal sman gyis bsrungs// khro bo srin po rab gnas yul// chu bo'i ngogs sam brag phug gam// rab tu dben par gnas pa yang // brtag dang bslang dang gzung ba dang // rin bcal ba dang bskrad pa dang //
3a4(rnying rgyud): dang bskor zhing byin gyis brlab// dgon par brtsigs sam dkyil 'khor bya// ston nam dpyid sos sman btsal bya// yang na dus ni bzhi po la// rtsa ba lo ma me tog gsum// 'bras bu bzhi yang btsal bar bya// bsgrub pa bya ba'i
3a5(rnying rgyud): shes pa// tshes brgyad dag la 'du bar bya// nang du dkyil 'khor bri ba yang // gang yin snga dro'i dus ni shis// bsgrub pa gdon par bya ba yang // bco lnga dag la rab tu tshar// dngos grub blang bar bya ba yang // tho rangs sam na
3a6(rnying rgyud): dus 'di rab tu shes 'gyur nas// de las 'gal bar mi bya'o// 'tsho ba zas kyi yo byad kyang // nyis lnga pa gsum lnga po dag tu bya// cha gsum dag tu rab gnas pa// dang po dkon mchog 'phags pa mchod// bar du tshogs kyi
3a7(rnying rgyud): mo bya// pha ma gtang rig sbyin par dkyi// bar chad rkyen yang rab bzlog byir// go mtshan mda' gzhu ba bsags te// yungs kar dang ni gu gul gyis// bgegs rnams 'phros par byed pa dang // nad khams gang la yod
3b1(rnying rgyud): sman dang dpyad kyang rab ldan pa// mchod rdzas mchod pa rnam lnga dang // rdzas brgyad rin chen sna bdun nyid// gtar ma rak+ta bdud rtsi dang // ral mornga gling dung drang bcas// ma long mdang dang rgyan srung dang // rgyal mtshan d+ha d+he gdug pa dang
3b2(rnying rgyud): bcas// a 'bras chun 'brub na sa// na li ker a ga ru// ga pung cu gang a ru // dzA hi tsadz+nyAn dmang po dang // gur gum la stsogs tshang bar byed// yid kyis rnam par shes pa ni// chos dang sems su 'dral 'gyur zh-i \u0f7f/
3b3(rnying rgyud): bzang yab yum rang bzhin pas// ston pa'i dam par rab togs bya// nyon mongs lnga ni rig+sa sa nyid// che bas rab tu khengs pasten// nga rgyal chen po bdun dang ldan// rten 'brel bcu gnyis snang ba yang // thabs ma kha
3b4(rnying rgyud): sems dpar bshad// 'byung ba lnga nyid gzungs ma yum// rang lus dag pa'i zhing khams na// kun gzhi'i gnas chen chos kyi dbyings// lta bas chos rnam rtogs pa'i dus// ting 'dzin bsgom bsgrub rdzas la spyod// rig
3b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas 'grub pa'i dus// dus chen 'di dang rab ldan bya// shes rab dang ni ting 'dzin nam// rnal dbyor pa yi sgrub rdzas yin// thabs kyi rdo rje chen po ni// gsang ba'i ston par rab tu shar// shes rab pad+ma yum gyi 'khor//
3b6(rnying rgyud): yum brda sprod thun mong 'khor// rdo rje pad+ma bzhugs pa'i gnas// gsang ba chen por rab gnas pa// sgron ma rab tu 'byongs pa'i dus// mtshan ldan gzungs ma rnyed dus nyid// kun rdzob byang sems dkar dmar rdzas// don dam
3b7(rnying rgyud): ba bzhi dang ldan// gsang chen bstan pas lci brtogs// rang gnas ting nge 'dzin gyis 'joms// spol ging dag gis sgrol bar nus// sngo re gang dag gis spong bar nus// g.yeng ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru// drag po bru
4a1(rnying rgyud): gsum 'bar ba'o// nang du gnas sbyang 'gyongs pa dang // zhing bcu ga nas su khugs pa'i dus// mi dang glang po rta dang ni// bya khyi 'byor pa'i rdzas lnga ldan// rab gsang ston pa zhes bya ba// blta bas rang /
4a2(rnying rgyud): tu rtogs par byas// ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor dang ldan// bying rgod gnyis las rab tu grol// spyod pa'i gnas la 'dug byas nas// mnyam gzhag rjes spyod 'brel par shog/ mchog dang thun mong 'bras bu ni// thob pa dus zhes bya ba
4a3(rnying rgyud): yin// bla ma'i gdams ngag rdzas la spyod// rdzas 'di gzhan las khyad par 'phags// de kho na nyid rab bshad bya// kun bzang bla ma tha dad med// yum dang kun tu bzang mo mnyam// rigs lnga bla ma'i 'khor du gcig/ chos kyi dpying
4a4(rnying rgyud): dang 'og min gnas// bsgrub pa'i yul khams dbye ba med// 'di ltar gang shes dus kyi mchog/ dus rnams nang nas khyad par che// 'khor ba 'das par grub pa'i rdzas// kun bzang 'khor bar snang ba kun// don dam mya nga
4a5(rnying rgyud): 'das par bsrub// ces gsungs so// bdud rtsi chen po 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rgyud las bsgrub pa'i gzhi phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon du bya ba'i rim pa 'di dag
4a6(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// phyi nang bshags bskang mtshams bcad nas// dkyil 'khor byas la byin gyis brlab// chos kyi sbyin pa gtad pa'i phyir// shar du shes rab pha rol phyin// lho ru rgyas pa bkra shis byed// 'phags pa snang brgyad gdon
4a7(rnying rgyud): par bya// bdud kyi bar chad zhi ba'i phyir// nub tu tog kyang bklag par bya// 'gyod tshangs par gcod spa bkod zhing // byang gi phyogs su gdon par bya// shes rab pha rol phyin ma'i sku// zhal gcig gser mdog seng ge'i khri// dang po
4b1(rnying rgyud): chos 'chad mnyam par gzhag/ tha ma rdo rje glegs bam 'dzin// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas sras dang bcas// nang du yang dag mchod par bya// rnam par snang mdzad snang mtha' yas// rdo rje sems dpa' gtso bo gsum// sangs rgyas stan
4b2(rnying rgyud): dang mA ma kI// gos dkar mo ni yum du gnas// 'jam dbyangs spyan gzigs rdo rje can// bdag po gsum ni sras su 'khrungs// gshin rje gshed dang rta mgrin dpal// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa khro bo yis// rnon po rtse mo kI la ya//
4b3(rnying rgyud): gsum dang rab ldan pas// dkon mchog gsum dang dpal mgon rnams// bgegs rigs 'gro drug la sogs pa// gtor ma mchod pas bskang bar bya'o// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing gnas pa// tshan+do nye ba'i tsha n+do dang /
4b4(rnying rgyud): dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod sogs// ma mo mkha' 'gro lha srin rnams// rab tu bskang bar byas nas ni// tsha tsha gdab dang 'gyod tshangs dang // srog chags tshe yang bskyab par bya// sku bzhi dpal brgyad tshang ba yi// shar phyogs su ni yul 'khor
4b5(rnying rgyud): srung // lhor rdo rgyal po 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs su ni spyan mi bzang // byang ni rnas thos bu bkod nas// phyi mtshams tho yis gcad par bya// mi g.yo mgon pos dam sri gnan// phyi yi bar chad gshin rjes bsrung // nang gi dngos
4b6(rnying rgyud): grub 'phrog pa rnams// bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsrung byas na// bar gyi mtshams yang gcad par bya// mi dge bcu po bsrung ba'i phyir// phyogs skyong bcul phung ba gdab// dug lnga'i mtshon chas kun 'joms phyir// mtshon cha 'bar ba'i dra ba
4b7(rnying rgyud): dang // ra ba gur gyis bsrung ba bya// lus ngag yid la bdag 'dzin pa'i// rU tra rnam pa gsum po yang // blta spyod gnyis kyis mnan byas nas// sgo srung dur khrod bdag pos bya// de nas byin gyis rlobs pa yang // dbang bskur chen po
5a1(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis// gnas khang byin gyis brlab pa yang // rjod kyi 'jig rten khang pa na// bcud kyi sems can lha tshogs bzhugs// sring gsum bdud rtsi rnam lnga gas pa// phyag rgya rgyan ngang ting 'dzin gyis/
5a2(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor byin gyis brlab par bya// lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs// spyod lam rnam bzhi lha skyur gsal// 'byung ba bcud len ting 'dzin gyis// chad rlabs dza ga dbyin gyis brlab par bya// bsreg sbyang stong pa gzhal yas khang // mi
5a3(rnying rgyud): bskyod dbyings phyug 'od du zhu// mA ma kI yis bcud bsdus nas// cha bzhi dag tu bgo bar bya// yid bzhin nor bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// rdzas dang yo byad byin gyis brlab// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// bsam dpag 'das pa'i shing chen dag
5a4(rnying rgyud): bum pa bzang po 'dod 'jo ba// ji ltar dmigs par 'byung bar snang // sa yi lha mo brtan ma nyid// ser mo phyag gnyis bum pa bsnams// phag gi khri la yang dag gnas// klu gnyan pa bdag 'khor dang bcas// de las ni rab bslang
5a5(rnying rgyud): nas// bslab pa'i dkyil 'khor chag chag gdab// ye shes dam tshig thig gdab la// ka ba babyung dang 'khor lo brgyad// padz+ra brgyad dang rin chen brgyad// sgo bzhin babs brgyad ldan pa// rdul tshon byin gyis brlabs nas bri// del
5a6(rnying rgyud): wA li sku yang dpyod// ces gsungs so// bdud rtsi chen po 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i las rim bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'dis kyi bsgrub par bya ba lha'i su byag tu chen po
5a7(rnying rgyud): 'digasungs so// phyag rgya chen po skye'i sku// las kyi phyag rgya sum dang 'thil// dmachog phyag tu sbyong bar bya// chos kyi phyag rgyakyi rnams bskyed// rang sems yig gzung dugs pa// pa me zag zugs pa nyid//
5b1(rnying rgyud): las sku rdzogs pas// cho ga rnam pa gsum las bskyed// rnam shes phung ba rdo rje sems// g.yas mthing g.yon dmar dbus ma dkar// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// badz+ra ral gri dril bu bcas// gzugs ni snang mdzad gaper gyi mdog/
5b2(rnying rgyud): mthing gi dmar ba'i dbu gsum pa// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang // dril bu badz+ra ral gri 'dzin// tshor ba dkon mchog dpal ni mthing // dkar dang dpar nga phyag drug pa// rin chen rdo rje 'khor lo dang // dril bu 'di rol gri 'dzin// 'du shes
5b3(rnying rgyud): 'od dpag med pa'i sgra// dkar dang sngo dang bye ru'i mdog/ pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo dang // dril bu rin chen ral gri bsnams// 'du byed don yod grub pa'i sku// dkar dmar ljang bu zhal gsum pa// ngal dri rdo rje 'khor lo dang // dril du rin
5b4(rnying rgyud): bad+ma g.yon// dbyings phyag ma dang sangs rgyas spyan/ mA ma kI deng gos dkar sgrol// rigs lnga bdud rtsi ltar gnas shing // yum lngas shaM lnga skyong mdzad pa// khams dgu 'dus pa'i dngas ma nyid// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// sang
5b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas rigs ma yu ma dang 'dril// sa yi stong pa zlog mo dkar// rin chen mya bu me long 'dzin// nam mkha'i snying po mA le mazeng // ngal thu na chen phreng ba 'dren// spyan ras gzigs dang bra ma dmar// pad+ma dkar po pi wang 'dren//
5b6(rnying rgyud): rdordo rje gar mkhan ljang // rdo rje rje lnga gar mdzad bsgyur// rnam shes bzhi dang yum bzhi yis// blo dang dngos po bsres nas ni// byang chub sems dpa'i lha mo gnas// nang du yang dag slob ro// byams pa spos ma dkar mo la// klu shing nga
5b7(rnying rgyud): spos gzung bsnams// sgrib pa sil dang me tog mo ning // chos kyi 'khor lo mo tog phreng // kun bzang mer me mar mo gas la// rin chen skye ma spang gsal 'bar// 'jam dpal dri chab ma ni ljang // ut+pal dung por dri chab mdzod // dab
6a1(rnying rgyud): bdun nga sru na/ dag na / sa sa rdzunas// gsas rgyu// u nam ma // dad na/
6a2(rnying rgyud): 'thus pa ldang bsdams// lha min pas ma gtan go cha dang // mi dbang tshul khrims gseg par nyid// byol song shes rab po ti 'dzin// li dwags sbyin pa rin chen skom// dmyal ba bzod pa me dang rtsa// gshin rje mig ma lpags kyo dkar//
6a3(rnying rgyud): rnam thul do zhags pa sar// te ma smin skul zhagasu lpags klog dmyur// bdud ci kya tham tshul bu ldang // blam rdo rje dzin pa la// \u0f88\u0f90 la dus nus dbang thob pas// rnam pa mi bskyed chul da // med pa ni bdud rgyal na hU~M rA/
6a4(rnying rgyud): bdud 'jo mas snang mtha' yas// dril bu chos sgra don yod grub// ming ni rnam pa snang mdzad do// le ma dus dag lngar dbang bskur bya// zab mo'i dbang gsum thob pa'i phyir// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil
6a5(rnying rgyud): gadzi du// bdud kyi khrol bu bsgrub par bya// thun mong dam pa rigs brgya las// rang gi rtog tshogs ster sbyar// rtsa yi dbyibs ni lha srung gastsal// sngags kyi log gsung dri sbags// khams kyi bdud rtsibs suza// snying po drud na thugs
6a6(rnying rgyud): ts+tsha/ bsgrub pa'i dam pa rig pa bcu yos// sbyin gyi rtog pa bzlog byas nas// thams cad lha mi su rugs la// sprul ba'i bla ru sangs rgyas so// gsung gi bslab pa byas pa yod// de nyid rigs lngar yan lag gnas// lhar 'dren rje dang
6a7(rnying rgyud): mam dang // blon bye dngos po rang byud par// 'dzin pa'i rtog pa bzlog byas nas// rigs lnga skye shes lnga dro sgrub// longs spyod rdzogs spur sangs rgyas pa'o// dran pa sde chags snang ba yang // sbrad bcud dam pa rigs 'byer spyang // de nyid drun
6b1(rnying rgyud): med rigs lngar 'dus// snod brgyad rigs su dbye ba med// dpyir gsang chen rigs gcig bkom// rigs lnga ye shes tha dad du// 'dzin pa'i rtog pa bzlog byas nas// gnyis mang chos skur sangs rgyas pas// dran med dang du rigs gcig gnas/
6b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis med chos kyi dbyings su thim// btag btsag mi tog bdud ci che// gzung 'dzin skye ba med par bsgral// bye ma gong bu gcig pa yis// thams cad 'khor 'das dbyer med cing // bdud rtsi chen por ro gcig pas// blo snang spang ba las nga
6b3(rnying rgyud): so// a mra skyong ba'i bu mo ste// shing gi lha mo 'od ldang ma// dug 'joms spyan gyi bsgrub pa bya// rgya spos ni lo pa la dang // ldod ros paglang mkhris pa dang // tsan+dan dkar po sdang spos dang // sha mo sa dang sha sir// kA re ki ta bi la ka/
6b4(rnying rgyud): rnams ni chu mnyam ste// zhib btags dang tshags dag le btsag/ dkyil 'khor zlum po maiN+Dal steng // ga'u khe sbyar nang du thug/ gzung thag btags nas dang khang de dug// shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang ma'i// sngags 'dis rab tu gdang par
6b5(rnying rgyud): b+ha'o// oM AHhU~M sarba bany+dza ma mr-i ta badz+ra lA s+ye hU~M/ kalpa br-ik+ShA de b+hI prab+hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te tud tra yA/ ha rA biSh+Ta na ha / bi Na ne mu swA hA/ shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang ma// rdo rje lA s+ye'i sprul pa ste// mu mdog dkar la dzod zer 'bar// phyag na shi
6b6(rnying rgyud): gi bum pa bsnams// shing tog kun gyi srung ma ste// shing gi lha mor phyag 'tshal lo// sman 'di chu yis phul byas nas// khong du btung bar bya ba dang // yang na snar yang blug par bya// lus la bsdus par byas pa na// sbyar ba'i dug ni rtswa
6b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs pa// gang yang rung bar gyur pa ste// dug go cog rnams med par byed// sems can che ba dug can rnams// so yi gdug pas zin pa yang // de dag med par byed pa dang // phol mig dang na 'bras nad dang // me dpal la phyogs
7a1(rnying rgyud): sel byed cing // gzhan gyi ngan du byas pa yi// drug gis mi tshugs zhi bar byed// nyes sdig byung bar byed pa ste// bram ze'i sngags kyis gnon byas pa// de dag las kyang thar bar 'gyur// mgon pa sa
7a2(rnying rgyud): gnas bu mo ste// sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyan// yo byang nor gyi bsgrub pa ni// dben pa'i gnas su rab gnas nas// srog chags med pa'i sa gtsang ma// bzeng zhing snyam pa rab btsal nas// maN+Dal zlum po legs byas nas//
7a3(rnying rgyud): grAm gi wang dzA ti dang // spos dang sbyar nas byug pa ni// ba yaM sgra lnga dag gis bya// tsan+dan dkar po'i chu sbyar la// sngags ring brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas// lag pa g.yon pas maN+Dal dbul// srin lag g.yon pas chos 'byung bri/
7a4(rnying rgyud): steng lha mo bsam pa ni// sman b+hi lha mo nor rgyun ma// zhal gcig phyeg ni gnyis pa la// sku mdog btso ma ga ser gyi mdog/ dzam pra nA da'i gser 'od 'dra// g.yas pa'i phyag na bsdams pa ni// shing thog bI dza pU ra bsnams// g.yon
7a5(rnying rgyud): na 'bru yi bla ma bsdams// rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan// bzhengs nas bzhugs pa'i zhabs gnyis 'og/ rin po che yi bum pa ni// cung zhig yo bar rnam par mnan// gsang ba'i sngags 'dis sku yang bskyed// oM skyed du sdud du/
7a6(rnying rgyud): ma ma ku ne ku ne na swA tA/ sman gyi lha ma nor gyi dbyibs// rdo rje mA le'i sprul pa ste// sku mdog sngo sangs 'od zer 'bar// phyag na gter gyi bum pa bsnams// sman dang gter gyi srung ma ste// sman gyi lha mor phyag 'tshal lo// rtsa ba'i gsang stug
7a7(rnying rgyud): 'di la ni// bsnyen pa 'bum tsho su ma 'bum bzlas// oM shri ba su ni d+hin k+She tre swA hA/ maN+Dal 'bul zhing bsgrub pa yis// sngags ring phreng ba dpal dang ldan// 'dod pa thams cad rab sgrub pa// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di dag bzlas// oMn
7b1(rnying rgyud): mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tat+t+wa thA/ g+hA ta mdze bas rak+Sha ni/ phal ta ti b+ha sun d+hi/ dz+hi wad ka re shAn+tiM ka ri/ b+ha ya nA sa ni sarba dud+hAn/ dz+nyAn dza b+hin dza/ dzad+hadza d+hA/ a mr-i ta ud+b+ha be/ sar+b+ba kArba/ ma ma kaR+Sha swA hA/ mA g+hing rab tu skal ba'i sngags so// rab
7b2(rnying rgyud): tu gsang ba'i dam pa 'di// oM badz+ra mU le baiDUR+Ya de bI ba su d+ha ra/ 'gul 'gul/ ma mthing tring / mkhar shi mi snying 'gul/ ni 'gram chog/ hring hring spus spus/ ma ma ni bai swA hA/ pho mo dbang du bya ba ni/ gsang sngags rim ma dam pa
7b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// A kaR+Sha ya hUM hrIH/ srid pa'i mo chags thams cad kun// dbang du byed pa'i gsang sngags so// A kaR+Sha ya hUM dzaM dzaM/ srid pa pho ru gyur pa kun// dbang du bya ba'i gsang sngags so// lha mo nyid kyi rig pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das la
7b4(rnying rgyud): rab phul lo// rtsi yi lha mo blo gros ma// rigs rgyud srid kyi bsgrub pa ni// sngags pablo ldan dben dga' bas// gnas su btsal bar bya ba yang // rtsi sman 'khrungs pa'i yul khams te// nub tu kha bltas rtsi rnams skyes// der ni
7b5(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i maN+Dal yang // rab tu zlum por bya ba'o// yang na rigs rgyud gang spel ba'i// gnas su bsgrub pa rab tu bya// ba bla ba yi chu nang du// zhag gsum bar du spangs byas la// sngags de zhag gsum bar du gdab//
7b6(rnying rgyud): nas ba chu 'thungs pa nas// mngal chags pa yi gdams pa yin// yang na lanA tshwa rnam lnga dang // ka rA dkar dang sbrang rtsi dang // mar dad ldan pas bud med la// zla mtshan byung nas sngags khrus brus// gang la blud par byas pa de/
7b7(rnying rgyud): gsham yin yang bu skye 'gyur// yang ni rab tu bshad par bya// bta la yi rtsa ba dang // kar gnyis la ro lo// me ni gnyis gnyis ma bzhi po// chu grang sbyar la sngags btab chud// me gsham bu yang bya bar 'gyur// yang na
8a1(rnying rgyud): kar ljang ros dang // pa pi ling ni rtsa ba dang // shing mngar dang ni bi pi ling // b+hi tang rnams ni lhan cig btags// byin na srid kyang 'phel bar 'gyur// yang na nA ga ga sar dang // kha lung dang ni dra
8a2(rnying rgyud): la dang // srang rtsi rnams ni cha mnyam par// kun la zho ni gnyis gnyis te// bye ma dag tu legs brtags nas// 'o ma dang ni lhan cig tu// zla mtshan byung nas zhag gsum du// gsang sngags btab nas de 'thungs te// de dag
8a3(rnying rgyud): zhu ba'i tshad tsam nas// 'o ma dang bcas zan zin na// nges par ma gsham bu yang skye// yang ne a sho kan+ta yis// rtsub ma dral ma sums pa// 'o ma srang ni nyi shu brgyad// bskol te mar dang lhan cig blang // bud med mngal yang
8a4(rnying rgyud): ngon par 'byung// yang ni ka tsam ti // bu zhal tsa dang zil ba dang // yungs kar dang ni srata dang // tha ska dang ni bu ram rnams// lhan cig bkres nas sbyar ba yang // zhun mar dang ni lhan cig tu// thA mtshan rgyu ba'i dus
8a5(rnying rgyud): ni// zhag bdun sngags bzlas brkyang ba dang // zla ba dag kyang re re la// zhag grangs gsum gsum btung bar bya// de nas zhag gsum bsdad pa dang // de nas yad ni zhag bdun 'thungs// gang 'thung bud med de yini// mngal
8a6(rnying rgyud): bu ni myur du ldan// 'di la the tshom med pa na// yang ni bla gor zho sha dang // nA ga ge sar sa bon gnyis// phye ma sbrang rjes sgras zas la// 'o ma dang ni sbyar la byung // zas su 'bras kyi zad dang ni// 'o ma lhan cig zos pa na// bud med
8a7(rnying rgyud): mo ga sham yin byar kyang// de la bu ni skye bar 'gyur// de dag la ni gdapa pa'i sngags// srid sbal mas ni 'di gsungs nas// bcom ldan 'das las 'gro dan du// rang gi rig pa phul ba'o// oM badz+ra gau rten mo sa d+hing shA ka
8b1(rnying rgyud): NiN+DA bka bi ti swAt+ma/ nas sha tsha 'di zhes bya ba las skye bar gyur cig swAH/ sngag sa 'di lan 'brum pa zlas pan// des ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// dmu bya phug ran snang dang mig/ gar can lce dang khrag/ dngul rdo rnams su sbar byas
8b2(rnying rgyud): la// sngags 'di zhag grangs nyi shug cig/ btab ni bud maud dbang du 'gyur// oMn ya nA ma no ta ri/ ni ni mau de ba s+thA hA/ lang tang tso dang bye drug pa// a pa man ta la dang ni// yungs kar btags nAs ti la mar sbyar// byed med rtag pa
8b3(rnying rgyud): bsdus nas// rab tu dam 'gyur sngags 'di gdag// oMn mo shA tsa la/ dz+haiM da bris bris na ni/ tshig mazhes bya ba bdag gi dbang du gyur cig swAH/ mon sran gri b+ha dang gzam dang // 'an zin gsum po tsho mnyam ste// bskul / gis
8b4(rnying rgyud): pa yis// mi de'i rdo rje rtag tu 'greng // gti ni gnyid par mi 'gyur ro// b+hi ha ti yi 'bras bu dang // bal po se 'u gi shun pa dang // go phye rnams ni nyungs mar bskal// rdo rjer bslus shing mnyes pa na// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du ni// ma
8b5(rnying rgyud): che bar 'gyur ba'o// ba dang ra yi 'o ma dang // de rnga'i 'o ma rnams sbyar ba// rkang pa gnyis la bslus pa na// 'dod pa bsten par byas kyang ni// sa bon 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// byi ba'i gzhang dang til mar dang // byiHsad+ha ka yai na/
8b6(rnying rgyud): sha khu de rnams sbyar byas pa// mo mtshan bslus par gyur pa ni// thug kha che chung bar 'gyur// de dag rig sngags bshad pa ni// lha mo dag gis rig pa phul// a~M ga r-i hi cing/ A A bu ma sha ni swAhA/ sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas
8b7(rnying rgyud): nus// phyag lo ni bskya bar bya'o// rtsi oM lha mo tho thos sa// lha mo bA ti'i sbrul pa ste// sku mdag dam ngags pa 'ad thang 'bar// phyag nang dud ci'i bum pa bsnams// rtse dang ldan gyi srung ma ste// rtsi maM lha mo phyag 'tshal lo// nags
9a1(rnying rgyud): mo rma bya'i mdongs// gnod pa srung ba'i bsgrub pa ni// sngags pa gzhan la phan 'dod dam// yang na rang nyid bsrung bar bya// mi yi rus pa skra dang ni// lha la phul ba'i me tog dang // shin kun dang ni/
9a2(rnying rgyud): tsan+dan dang // 'bu sug haM dang shu dag dang // skyu ru ra dang tsa rong dang // a ru ri dang mur dang // yaMng k+She mur spang khyang+ga dang // d+hi ha ti dang rnam gnyis dang // d+h+r-i ti phral yungs kar dang // na t+ya'i mkhris pa ras bal dang // sra ma
9a3(rnying rgyud): klad pa khyi rus dang // byi la'i thun dang glang po'i thu ni// ba blang lci bzang shing dang // a pa man sgrog skya dang // shra ba Na dang 'bras gang dang // bud ta go shing rgo l-i min// phal ta ka po so 'cha'// de rnams lhan rtsig sbyar ba
9a4(rnying rgyud): yis// rdzas dga'ur thugs nus ni// sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra nIr ti da ba nan mo b+ha ga bi te/ ru tra yatad+yaSh+Tha/ hA ra ha ra/ tu ru tu ru/ ta la ta la/ ni mi li sarba gra ha nA sha ni/ badz+ra pA Ni ha ra ha ra/ murba dza ta ni sAhA/
9a5(rnying rgyud): sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas pa yi// rdzas kyi dud pas bdug pa na// grib gnod spyo byed brjed byed gdon// gnod sbyin gdon la sogs pa yis// rnam pa sna tshogs gdon zin pa// gdon rnams med par byed pa sgo// lkugs pa
9a6(rnying rgyud): rmi lam ngan pa dang // gang dag bkra ni mi shis pa// thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed// nags kyi lha mo r+Na bya'i mdongs// rdo rje nI ra ti'i sprul pa ste// sku mdog ljang ser 'od zer 'bar// phyag na dri spros rma bya bsdams// rdo spos
9a7(rnying rgyud): kun gyi srung ma ste// nags kyi lha mor phyag 'tshal lo// gsad pa dud rjod mapa' 'gro ma// bsgrub par bya ba'i las dag ni// gang dag sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig/ dkon mchog dbung phang rjod par byed// rnal 'byor dpa
9b1(rnying rgyud): ga chen po rnams// dam chos 'khor lo rmad byung la// bar du gcod pa bskal ba'i phyir// dur khrod gnas sam chu gling ngam// ma mo'i gnas sam rtswa chen gnas// lam gyi bzhi mdo gzug lag khang // na da/
9b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnas phyin nas// 'grub khung khru gang gru gsum ste// ngur sol khrag bkres dmar nag bya// de yi kha la gtor ma gzhag/ 'og tu ling+ga bcas te gzhug/ gri lag g.yas pa'i mchog zhur gdab/ tshan skud btag
9b3(rnying rgyud): 'od zer spro// dus gnyen rnams la gtor ma gtang // mtshan ma byung nas phyogs su 'phang // 'gro 'dug byed tshe gtor ma bzung // zas phud sngags kyis dang por dbul// gtor ma'i gong du bu rab gdab// bsnyen po'i dus su
9b4(rnying rgyud): ngos song na// bzlab pa'i dus srabs dpas gdab// yang rig tu pas te ga tor mar / khyim 'dzigang bsgyur bgyi// bdag nyid bsam par byab ste// slo gi lha ma 'ang 'chung ma'o// sprul pa mapa' 'gro rgyas na pa
9b5(rnying rgyud): ma// sman gyi lha mo nor rgyun ma'i// sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro rmongs byed ma// rtsi yi lha mo blo gros ma'i// sprul pa mkha' 'gro za byed ma// nags kyi lha mo rma bya'i mgrin// sprul pa'i mkha' 'tsho tshe 'phel ma// gsang ba'i ma
9b6(rnying rgyud): 'gro bzhi yi nI// las mkhan bdag nyid bsgom pa ni// sku mdog nag mo ral pa can// g.yas na gri gug bsnams pa la// g.yon na b+han+ta 'dzin pa'o// sku stod dar ras khro bos brgyan// dpung pa gnyis kyang de bzhin no//
9b7(rnying rgyud): po sku mdog de bzhin du// bdag nyid kyang ni bsgom par bya// mon po mon mo bud med dang // rab byung la sogs tsha 'phrul mang // 'od dang dril sogs pa'ong // 'od long lhag nyan sgrub 'byung // mkha' 'gro g.yon ba
10a1(rnying rgyud): sngags kyis dgod// bdag nyid gos nag re ba gan// stod g.yog dar ras khra bos brgyan// da mod gzug shags kyang gdab b.raH// gtor bskal bcol ba drag tu bya// nyams pa bshag+sas
10a2(rnying rgyud): na du mon// bdun bsags zas byin me tog gtor// tshig mthol mgo la bshags pa bya// bdag gi mgo la 'jog tu gzhug/ mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol zhes brjod// sba bcad dkyil 'khor gzhan mi bstan// rtsa ba yan lag
10a3(rnying rgyud): dam tshig ni// nyi shu rtsa brgyad tshul bzhin bsrung // bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa bya// oM na nI na ni ma hA kA laM/ g+ha ro b+ha rau/ bu la mi dzI ma ra li/ sa ngan sa dAn/ pho d+hi ka d+hi/ ke ra ke ra ka baH/ bo d+hi che ga mo kAr ma ka \u0f7f/ pa
10a4(rnying rgyud): brtson pa 'dum thu sa/ shA ba d+hAn na ma thun// nin ga sa shArnamamams / d+d+ha \u0f7f/
10a5(rnying rgyud): rtsa sngags re re la/ sngags 'di re re gdags par bya// sri mo badz+ra no ti sta kI la ya kI la ya/ sa me ya b+hes/ gtso mo sman gyi srung ma bzhi// sprul pa gsang ba'i yum yang bzhi// las mkhan mkha' 'gro rnam pa drug/ 'byung lnga
10a6(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur tshe bdag mo// sngags brjod phur pa btsugs pa yis// phur bu sgra ni re ra gyur// klong krong 'byin zhing bzhugs par byasam mo// sa yi mkha' 'gros gzugs phung 'jig/ chu yi mkha' 'gros tshor ba 'joms// me
10a7(rnying rgyud): yaM mkha' 'gros 'du shes bsreg/ rlung gi mkha' 'gros 'du byed sdud// nam mkha'i mkha' 'gros srog rlung spor// tshe bdag mos ni gnas nas 'byin// nyams pa gang dag zhing du bsgral// skyes med pa'i sa la gnas/
10b1(rnying rgyud): paN+Dal brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bcu drug 'khor los mtha' bskor nas// sku gsung thugs lhan ka pA lar// sha rI ra ma dang nya dI ram// cu gang dang ni ga pur dang // thal kar rnga rnga la sogs pa'o// yon tan rdzogs ldan ka pA lar// chang
10b2(rnying rgyud): gi rnam pa mang po blug/ yid bzhin gter ldan ka pA lar// snying zho sha dang mkhal zho sha/ gla gor zho sha tsatra// ka ko la sogs sbyar ba'i ldan// bkra shis mtshan ldan ka pA lar// rin chen sna tshogs bdar ba gzhag/ khams gsum yo
10b3(rnying rgyud): bsgral ka pA lar// pad+ma rak+ta sbyar ba'i sman// tsan+dan smug po li shi dang // skyu ru ra dang star bu dang // rgun 'bru la sogs sbyar ba'o// mi 'gyur sra mkhregs ka pA lar// 'o ma sna tshogs sbyar ba blag/ tshe 'phrul rtags 'byin ka pA lar// b.rung
10b4(rnying rgyud): kyi dri chu brag zhun dang // cong zhi dang ni gur gum dang // kye+e pog dkar po la sogs so// mtshan ma spos thal ka pA lar// sna tshogs chu rnams blug par bya// ye shes rnam lnga'i ka pA lar// dri chen dag dang sbyar ba'i spun// dzA ti pa la a ru rA/
10b5(rnying rgyud): a ga ru dang du ru ka/ gla rtsi dag dang sbyar ba'i sman// dri chen dbus la byang sems shar// mAM sa lho la ra kya nub// dri chu byad ste rtsa ba lnga// shar lho chang la lho nub tu// rin chen nub byang 'o ma yin// byad shar chu ni sna tshogs gzhag/ de bzhin
10b6(rnying rgyud): dar gyi mthing yol gyis// dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi 'khor bar bri// mda' bzhi dang ni dar sna bzhi// tshon skud sna lnga phur ba brgyad// maN+Dal de yi rgyan du dgod // rnal 'byor mched dang lhalcam dral la// dza gad phyag tu bzhag nas kyang // la
10b7(rnying rgyud): dang bya ba bsgos la gdab// rang ri'i phrin las ci nus bya'o// snod rnams sems ma bcu drug bsgom// sgeg mo dang ni thos me ma// lcags kyam dang rdo rje sgrol// shar gyi rtsibs la yang dag gnas// phreng ba ma dang ma tog ma// zhags pa ma dang ran
11a1(rnying rgyud): spyan// lho ya chibs la yang dag gnas// pi wang ma dang mdum ma// lcags zlog ma dang gsal dkram// nub kyi rtsibs pa yang dag gnas// gang ma khan ma dang ma 'am// drilang dru ma dang rjeng drangs/
11a2(rnying rgyud): rtsibs la yang dag gnas// bcud rnams sems dpa bcu drug bsgom// der ni tsika li yang dgod// rdo rje sems dpa' rdorje bsnams// rdo rje rgyal po lcags rgya 'dzin// rdo chags ngan dang gzha gengs// rdo rje gas pasrag la spol/
11a3(rnying rgyud): rigs su grags// rdo rje rin tshun rin po che// rdorje gzing rjid nyi ma bsnams// rdo rje rgyal mtshan rin chen tog/ rdo rje bzhang po sa phre 'dren// lho yi rin chen rigs su grags// rdo rje chos ni pad+ma bsnams// rdo rje rnon po la ji 'dzin// rdo
11a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor la nyid// rdo rje spras yang 'dzin// rlub phyogs par+b+ba rigs su grags// rdo rje las ni n+ya bram bsdams// rdon srung bgo cha 'dzin// rdo rje ga nod sprin mche ba 'chang // rdon khu tshum du tshur nyid// byang shi thams dpa' las kyi rigs// ma ma
11a5(rnying rgyud): rnams gdong par bya// snod bcud dbyings su sangs rgyas yin// dbus na rnam par ljang mdzad che// sangs rgyas sprin dang gnyis su med// shar ni rdo rje mi bstod pa// shar sbyor dbyings phyug ma nyid do// ston rin 'dur dkon mchog dpal/
11a6(rnying rgyud): nub mA ma kI zhes tra// nub ni snang ba mtha' yas la// nub bya na bza' dkar mo nyid// byang na don ya grub pa la// b+ha shar dam tshig sgrol ma nyid// dbus kyi ling tsho dgu po la// rigs lnga yab yum su rnams dgod// chos su dri ma med
11a7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid du rnam par gnas// yongs su ye shes sgyu ma las// kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'di ni// sprub sems can dam mdzod kyi// rdulas sangs rgyas yang bsrung// slang ci 'jig rten 'byung ba lnga// yul lngaH
11b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i dbyings// ma bsgribs yongs su 'od gsal bas// gzhal yas khang pa gdan dang bcas// bdag 'dzin phung po lnga sogs pa// lha sku phyag rgya chen por bsgom// 'og myin gnas nas spyan drangs nas// brdugs su gsol nas phyag
11b2(rnying rgyud): btsal te// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // de kho na yi mchod pa dbul// bsnyad cing thugs dam bskul byas nas// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang // bcud kyi 'gro ba lha yi sku// 'byung bzhi las skyes rtsi shing dang // ma
11b3(rnying rgyud): tshal ma lus snang ba rnams// thams cad sman chen ra sA yan// dgun gyi dus na rtsa ba'i sman// dpyid ni lo ma 'dab mar skyes// dbyar ni me tog ma dngas dang ldan// ston ni 'bras bur smin pa ste// snang po'i dus na stong nyid pas//
11b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis med chos kyi dbyings su thim// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi chen po 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ sman khrel bur bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon btag bcog phyem
11b5(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// sbyor sgrol ma mo bcu drug gis// btag btsag sbal la sbyar te gzhug/ gang zhig sbyor bas sbyang ba ni// mar me ga so dang tshangs pa'i thob// rtsa dang srub shing thig le dang // gcig gnyis bzhi dang man
11b6(rnying rgyud): ngag dgu// srin po r+yA tra k+Sha gnas la// me rlung drag pos bskyod byas na// lte ba'i AM yig bdud rtsi 'bab// mar me gso bar bya ba'o// me rlung rab tu g.yos pa yis// spyi bo'i haM yig bdud rtsi 'bebs// tshangs pa'i thog ces
11b7(rnying rgyud): bya ba nyid// dbugs nyid phyir la ldang ba na// g.yas kyi ram nyi ma mo// dbugs ni nang du 'jug pa ni// g.yon gyi rgyang ma zla ba chu// rlung nyid khong du gnas pa na// dbus kyi kun 'dar ma nyid ni// pad+ma chu shing til mar dang // rgya
12a1(rnying rgyud): nas snang can la gnas pa'o// than dang lags 'khyong dmar// maldan 'brar ba zlum par gyur// brnas ma kun 'dang byug sheng la// rlung pa bdag pa sa byas pas/ na
12a2(rnying rgyud): khrag gi thig le 'bar// srub shing 'khor lo zhes bya'o// snying gar nyi zla kha sbyor nas// lte ba'i dpa' bo 'ba' zhig la// gsang gnas bde ba'i theg le dang // mdzod spu sra dkar sa bon bzhi// rlung dang bsnyun la nyams su blang // jig
12a3(rnying rgyud): le'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'o// bshang sgor rlung la sum mdor me// lte basprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du// phyi sgor drug cu rtsa bzhi ste// nang sgor 'dab ma brgyad pa la// sde tshan bco brgyad g.yas su bskor// lte ba phra ba'i a yig dmar// rlung
12a4(rnying rgyud): gis me bus a las me// rab tu 'bar ba bsgom par bya// 'khor lo gcig la brten pa'o// staM ba dang ni snying ga gnyis// snying ga'i dkyil 'khor 'dab brgyad la// thur bstan sngon po d+hi ni dbus// a haM shin tu cha phra bas// kun 'dar ma
12a5(rnying rgyud): la zung du 'brel// gyang sems dkar dmar rab tu 'dzag/ rlung yang rim gyis kha sbyar ba// 'khor lo gnyis la brten pa'o// lte basprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi la// A li g.yon bskor kA li g.yas// ha dang k+Sha yig
12a6(rnying rgyud): rnam par spang // nang bskor sde tshen brgyad kyang dmar// snying ga chos kyi dkyil 'khor du// 'dab brgyad yi ge 'bru gnag cing 'tsher// phyogs bzhi yab la mtshams bzhi yum// dbus ni hUM yig gnas pa'o// mgrin pa longs spyod dkyil
12a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor du// 'dab ma bcu drug lte ba oM// yi geng mar po gyen du blta// spyi bo bde tshon dkyil 'khor du// 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis la// A le bcu drug g.yon rung bskor// ka nas te sogs bcu drug g.yas// he yog zur bstan yig
12b1(rnying rgyud): tas// mug dung 'bar ba'i dmyal 'bar rnams// 'byung lnga'i bskal pa rnam krung shing // dug lngal shas num wA 'byung// sa y-i nAng ni ba kar gnas// man gyen 'bar thud du r+tha// rmang na gsags la 'grab dang // nam mkha' rgyang/
12b2(rnying rgyud): med pas na// srog dang rtsal ba'i rang bzhin nan// rlung lnga la ni yang dag gnas// mkha' mnyamathong gi dkyil 'khor ni// khro ma gnam zhal dgra dgram// bcwa brgyad phyag dang yang dag ldan// zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du gnas// !rnas
12b3(rnying rgyud): bskyed dang sbyor ba dang // dbang bskur sprin sreg la sogs pa// yum 'dir rab tu sgrub par byed// de phyir mkha' klong rnam par dag/ rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// rta mgrin gsang ba'i yum dang bcas// b+h+rUM chen stobs chen steng 'og
12b4(rnying rgyud): gnas// bcom ldan ta yi rgyal po ni// mtshams kyi dus nanub na gnas// ny+tsa la brtsig na bdag gi sgra// nam mkha' ba skang gnas la bzhugs// 'gro 'a la spyan gyi pho brang bzhugs// bzlas ga dbu yi phyag rgya nyid// phyim gnam zhal tag na/
12b5(rnying rgyud): dngos grub zlag ma dkyil 'khor steng // dbang bskur las kyi slob dpon nyid// khrol bu rus sbal khag pa la// mdzad pa'i las yang de bzhin mdzad// 'chi mang rngo ma'i dkyil 'khor du// cha mchog ma mo dgongs pa ni// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco 'argyang gnas/
12b6(rnying rgyud): za mchog bdud rtsi sman la dgongs// phyag nam mnamakha' brgya dang // shugs 'gram ma 'bad ma rnams// rga mchag chos nyid dgangs pa ni// sangs rgyas bzhi brgya ca gnyis bsnams// dbun nyi shwa cag cag la// sangs rgyas bdun gsum nyi shu gcig/
12b7(rnying rgyud): byas kyang ngashi bcu rtsa gnyis sa// zhabs brgyang rab tu rnam par sa blags// ljags las sa nu c-i// dkyil 'khor bdun bcags rnam pa chags pa// sbyor ba brgyad ni 'du 'dul gyis// lus dang ngag dang yid dang gsum// sgra gsung thugs su rnam par snang
13a1(rnying rgyud): bzhad dang ka ka bya rog dang // 'ug gdong ma mo bcu drug srung // shar du blta ba langs pas brtul// lho du bsgom pa gsal bas bcug/ nub tu spyod pa zhib pas sbal// byang du 'bras bu mthar sbyin slar
13a2(rnying rgyud): mo nod pa kha sbyar nas// dar gyis bcings nas bzhugs su gsol// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi chen po 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rgyud las sman phye ma btag btsag gi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud
13a3(rnying rgyud): rtse gong bu gcig pa'i sman sbyar bar bya ba 'di dag yongs su gsungs so// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// yon tan phrin las rnam pa lnga// stong gsum khro bo sku gdung 'bar// rta mgrin dbang dang mkha' mnyam klong // 'chi med rdo rje'i dal
13a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor rnams// sgra yi dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// chos nyid yongs su rgya chad med// de phyir lte ba zlum por gnas// tshogs brgyad yul las ma rmongs gcod// de rtag ka ba mchog brgyad ldan// nyon mongs g.yul gcod 'khor
13a5(rnying rgyud): brgyad// yon tan zad med rin po che// ye shes bzhi ldan sgo bzhir shar// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// mu tig a sma gar+b+ha dang // rin po che yi gdan khri 'bar// rigs gsum rigs bzhi rigs lnga nyid// rtse gcig N+DI lnga rtse dgu zag/
13a6(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug phra mo dang // byol song gtso bo brgyad steng na// rnam par rgyal ba dbyug sngon can// gshin rje gshed dang mi g.yo mgon// rta mgrin 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang // bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rnam rgyal khams// stong gsum khro ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis//
13a7(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu'i bdud btul mtshams bcad pa// kye ma btig btsag khrol bu dang // gong bu gcig pa kun la khyab// shar na huha ru ka/ lho marin chen khrag 'thung nyid// nub na padra khros pa'i sku// byang na las bya khro rgyal che// dbus
13b1(rnying rgyud): phrag dudu bar na rgyal mapar rnams// 'brung gA'i baphrul pa nas kyang shing // ngag las gag nam 'byur// sas rlu bdag gnas// man khyen 'dang thung \u0f7f// gagasags pa 'thab dang // rnams 'a
13b2(rnying rgyud): meng pas na// srog dang rtsal ba'i rang bzhin can// rlung lnga la ni yang dag gnas// mkha' mnyamathong gi dkyil 'khor ni// khrom gnam zha la gra dgram// bcwa brgyad phyag dang yang dag ldan// zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du gnas// nyarnams
13b3(rnying rgyud): bskyed dang lhor ba dang // dbang bskur sbyin sreg la sogs pa// um 'dir rab tu sgrub par byed// dpyir mkha' slong rnam par dag/ rta mthe na bang gi dkyil 'kho d+ha// ta mgrin gsang ba'i yum dang bcas// ts+tsha cheni stabs chen myong 'og
13b4(rnying rgyud): gan sa// bcom ldan yi rgyal bani// mtshams kyi nas nanab na gnas// rgyas brdzigan bdag gi b+ha// nam mkha' bar snang gnas la bzhugs/ 'gro'adul ldan gyi po zung bklags// banas dang bu le rgyag tsanyid// khyim gnamazhal tags/
13b5(rnying rgyud): dngos gru bzlag ma dkyil 'khar steng // dbang bskur las kyi slob dpon nyid// khrol bu rus sbal khag pa la// mdzad pa'i las yang de bzhin mdzad// 'chi mang rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du// cha mchog ma mo dgongs pa ni// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyang gnas/
13b6(rnying rgyud): mchog bad \u0f7fman la dgongs// rdzag namamanam pa dang // thugs 'jam ma'ab ma rnams// rnam ra ga cas cad dgangs pani// sangs rgyas pa pacwa nyis brnams// dgran tha \u0f7fgcags// sangs rgyas bdun gsum /
13b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyang pa bdu ldan nyisas// zhabs brgyad rab tu rnam par gzugs// ljags lasas chud rtsa// dkyil 'a bar bdun bachags rnam pachags sa// sbyar babargyad ni 'dra 'dul gyis// lus dang ga dang yid dang gsum// skra gsung thugs surnam par sdur
14a1(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba la yi thugs rnalas// mnyal brgyad pa'i gzung bzhin du// dpal dang ldan par snad bgags// sgyid las sbyar ba lanas dag/ blugasal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// 'tha bu ye shes 'an du
14a2(rnying rgyud): las// khams zab pa don gyis nas// ngas sasumatshal pa rjo pa 'byong/ ga ba mang ltan/ sgrub pa baman na ts+tsha// bdag nyid cham chog gyur gnas pas// 'bar ba'i gzhal las khang // ban
14a3(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' tshon gang ba// thugs kar den chan zung brgyad las// yig 'bru thugs mtshan 'dadu 'gros// 'gro ba 'dril ba'i thugs kar brim// thugs nyid 'gro ba'i don la bskul// zhe sdang rgya 'bras cad nas bcad// sar 'dus bdud
14a4(rnying rgyud): ldan la thim// mu tig dkar po dri med ltar// rtsub pa pos kyang nan tan kya // bdag nyid na mchog srung 'gyur // ljags kyi parje'i gdan steng du// parnamams dpa' thon gang // bad+ma yig bru gsung lahrI ma// khro ba gsung gi dbyig
14a5(rnying rgyud): gyur// gsung nyid 'gro ba'i don la bskul// 'dod chags rgya 'bras kyad nas brgyad// slad nyid bdud rtsi sman la thim// sman nyid bdud rtsi 'das na// padz+ra rak+Shatre med ldar// sgrub pa pas nanan tan bya// bdag nyid rgya mchog ta /
14a6(rnying rgyud): 'dra zla ba'i gdan steng du// bde gshegs sems dpa'i tshon grang la// 'bar po'i mig 'bru sbrul thim// sku nyid 'grab don la bskul// gti mug rgya 'bras kyad nas bcad// bla'i 'dus bdud rtsi sman la tham// sman nyid byang chub sems \u0f7f/
14a7(rnying rgyud): ma sa nga// rlung sa pa zhin tun bye// sa ma ba sa 'ab dus srung cu gdung gabs su gyi// zugs bu da ma mtham gas su gyu/ byingang theg byu// lam ma dbu dang mtsha
14b1(rnying rgyud): zhabs su sbyar// mkha' mnyam dbus zhal che mchog gsang bar sbyor// che mchog phyag dang phyag mtshan zhe gnyis sbyor// sa na ye shes thabs dang shes rab sbyar// rta ma'i na gsang ba'i yum bzhi gnyis med sbyor// stong mtshams brgyad na badz+rad
14b2(rnying rgyud): thang brgyad// sbyor ba brgyad brtsegs nges pa de la rdzogs// oM AHhUM badz+ra a mr-i ta hUM hrIHtha/ rang byung rtsab che mchog gsal ba yi// thugs kar nyid kyil rdo rje 'bru dgu bskor// 'phro 'du rang bzhin med la bzlas brjod drung // gra h+ya phyag rgyas pa
14b3(rnying rgyud): chad dngang mi gtang // oM AHhUM badz+ra a mr-i ta trAM hrIHtha/ bzlas bskul gsung yig bdud rtsi mkha' las bab// mkha' nas shangs drang gsang ba'i gsung dang 'dres// gsung nyid kyang sems dkar dmar gnyis su 'thos// rta mgrin d+ha mtshams
14b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad dbang du sdud// oM AHhU~M badz+ra a mr-i ti hUM hrIH/ mthe ba sran ta mgrin yab yum sbyor mtshams nas// 'od 'phros pho brang rta mgrin yab yum gyi// thugs kar phog pas sgal tshigs rta brgyad de// byang sems dkar dmar bdud rtsi nyid
14b5(rnying rgyud): gyur// oM AHhUM bidz+ra a mr-i ta d+hA dz+dza tshaM/ de las 'di 'phros te mgrin thugs kar thim// thugs kyi dbyings su byang sems dkar dmar 'a la// oM AHhUM badz+ra a mr-i ta hU~M dz+dza tha/ de las 'od zer kha dog lnga du 'phros// sku gdung 'bar ba'i thugs
14b6(rnying rgyud): tra khril// oM Adz+nyA badz+ra a mr-i tad+hISh+T+rI tha/ de nas 'od 'das me long has btab tshul// bang he d+ha'i thugs kyi dbyig tu 'khyil// oM AHhUM badz+ra amr-i ta d+hoSh+Tha wa/ de nas 'od dkar srog zag lam nas 'phros// 'bu yi gtsug tu mkha' mnyam hAs
14b7(rnying rgyud): 'a// mo AHhU~M badz+ra a mr-i ta~M Sh+Ta hrIH/ de nas 'od zer gyen duthugs nas lpags// gsang ba'i lam zhugs thugs kar 'od dmar 'khyilo// oM hU~M badz+ra a pr-iHtrAM hrI Tha/ de nas phyag brgyad phyag mtshan thugs nas 'phros// gtsug
15a1(rnying rgyud): mayin ma ba sa mthugs ka 'gyul// mangs na pa/ danas ma nas pacang byung dung// brtan pa brgyad rgyas pa ba ldanal// rdzun chu rnam pa nanam/ 'a'ad
15a2(rnying rgyud): babyung / khong seng nas brgyad rnal 'byod thugs bdun nas// oM A d+hi ba hrIH/ dbyang brgyad nas gzungs thag brgyad mig 'anas// te mthon pa ba sum s+t+rai ba'i mkha' la 'khyi/
15a3(rnying rgyud): las 'od 'gros satshwa mkha' gas jam// san ma pa yum sbyor mtshams mkha' la 'phel// oM hU~M hU~M brdzas dz+dzaHts+tsha/ rnams 'od 'gros thugs las rgyag ma tshan 'thos// phyag dang phyag mtshan sbyor byas par la 'khyil// oM A
15a4(rnying rgyud): mr-iHb+h+rU~M hriM ma/ de nas mar babs zhabs brgyad dag nas brgyad// dbu zhabs sbyor byas byang chub sems su 'tshal// oM AHhA badz+ras main+ta trA~MHsa/ zhabs bta byangasems gsang la mazhugs nas ni// gsang ba zhabs kyi sbyor byas ljags la
15a5(rnying rgyud): 'tsha la// oM A badz+ra sa oM ta N+yai \u0f7f/ de nas mang babs pad+ma'i rtag 'dus// byin mtshams b+ha gar sbyor byas dbul 'khyil// oM AHhU~M badz+ra AmaHSh+T+r-i / dA nas mkha' mnyam zhabs bcud sgra gdung dbu// dbu dang zhabs kyi
15a6(rnying rgyud): zas dbul 'khyil// oM A hU~M badz+ra a mat+ma hU~M hrI \u0f7f// lha gdungs so da la cung zhabs la bab// ta ga tad bu dang s+thir byas thugs kar 'khyil// oM sa badz+ra a mai r+g+ho hrIH/ khro brgya'i 'od 'dres rnam gran gsang bar zhugs// yumaH
15a7(rnying rgyud): ma khang 'thos pa thang bdun ci 'o byal// oM l-I hU~M bang sa meHtra~M ma/ danas bdag cad rang thub wa las 'anas// sbyor ba brgyad kyis slobadag chos srung gas me// oM y-i b+hAb la mr-i \u0f7f/ bdag nyid bdun partags gas ma
15b1(rnying rgyud): mchogag/ thugs kar 'brug sum brtsegs par dgu bas bskor// lce steng du yang de bzhin gsal ba ni// lhums su zhugs pa zhes ni dalabya// bzlas pas bsgral te lpags byung lag 'bru rnams// mgur lam byung nas thugs ka'i 'bru/
15b2(rnying rgyud): zim// bzlas pas bskul te yi ge'i zer ba nyid// gzungs thag bskyon pa lums nas bsnams pa'i tshul// rtsa ba'i bdun brtsegs cha mchog spyi gtsug gi// rta mgrin thugs phog dgu pas bskor ba las// sgor mtshams mkha'
15b3(rnying rgyud): 'brugasal byang sems bstim// brgya byin gyis blangs sku khrus gsol ba'i tshul// rta mgrin nyid kyi thugs las yig 'bru 'gros// tshe mchog thugs kar rdo rje dgra pas bskor// de nas rim brgyad rnam rgyal rigs lnga ste// bdun thugs yid
15b4(rnying rgyud): gsil gom bdun bor ba'i tshul// rigs lnga'i thugs nas dgu pa phyogs bcur 'phros// 'khor 'das kun \u0f7ftil gong bzhin du khyab// bzlas pas bsgral te 'phags mtshad 'gradan byas// 'khor 'das yig 'brur gyur pa rol rjod tshul// yig
15b5(rnying rgyud): 'bru slar 'dus thugs kar thim gyur te// skal tshegs rta brgyad gsang ba'i lam nas byung // rang byang sbyor mtshams byang sems yig 'bru gnyis// bdud rtsi byangs mas zhu ba khab bzhes tshul// de nas gyen du skal chags ta brgyad de// thugs
15b6(rnying rgyud): ka thaMm nas yog 'bru 'odas T+Ta// gzungs zag nas brgyad rta mgron thugs kasaH// rim par ci mchog dkyis bltar langs spyod tshul// de nas sgra gsum yab yum mkha' la 'phros// char gyi rgyan bzhin pabs pa rab byang tshul// sAnaH
15b7(rnying rgyud): 'drig rten yum gyi mapa'i nang du// drag rnams bdud kyi byung pas dge' thub chum// de nas slar 'dus phyags bcul khro ba nas// bdun brtsegs dbar bcas bdun brtsegs dang draT// 'tha 'dras rang byung rtsa ba gnyig la// mgal ma lta zur
16a1(rnying rgyud): bkar bams 'khar nas// dad badrad pad thur bas myo sha byung// dus la 'dang bya gyur pas bdud paphrul tshul// da snang bdag gzhan dan drug pa na ma ra bya// srung tha ba rtag mang pas sangs
16a2(rnying rgyud): tshul// phru gsung thugs dang yan tan cin las wa// ru wA la shrIs phrug drung bags de'i tshul// oM A hU~M sa Sh+T+r-i/ bdud kyi rgyang chub semasanag nyis med chos ya~M tshul// byin napas bde gshegs mangs snang rdzogs pa /
16a3(rnying rgyud): rdul bu'i mdzad pa bcu gnyis mthar byung nas// sgrar 'bros bdud rtsi bram pa'i lung la thim// gnyis med pade chen byang chub sems su 'tshal// dus gsum bdag shegs gnyis mang byang chub sems// bdag nyid rang bzhin dkyil 'kho ga
16a4(rnying rgyud): thim// thabs dang shas rab zung chub sems su 'phrog// thog la byang chub sems kying nga du 'phel// mngad pa bcug ces thog la grodon mdzad// thugs ni brjod kyi chen pa'i nga muH// thang chub sems na na rdzasems dpa' ste// ma la sa
16a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes dkang la 'khyal// rnga chen bdud rtsigs ma dag nam nga mdzad// thos kyang dbyings su mngon par sangs rgyas sa// sha chen mi d+hinI la don chen 'byung // mnyam pa nyid \u0f7fye shes chan pa dwags la// pap+pa b+ha snang ba mthal
16a6(rnying rgyud): da // masar kun tu rtag pa'i la shes byang // ji chung ni yod grub pa ldad ka'i mdog/ tha ba grub pa'i ye shes chen par dgasal// bdud rnaM ma shes chen po rang sharabs// snod brgyang thams cad dbyings su ye shes shang // da las mas
16a7(rnying rgyud): rgyang ba nas med// mas pa'i nga yangs rgyas gangs pagasas// sas mapa'al bdud ci pa pa rtsa// rnam thas kyis dpapa par bya // kyi nang du bab / lus khapas
16b1(rnying rgyud): bcud gnas pa// sngags kyi legs sbyin gyis rab brlabs nas// snying po rlung gis bskul la dbab par bya// oM A hU~Msarba pak+Sha sa mr-i ta me rba ba sha ya pha pha pheM/ dkyil 'khor rnams su bdud rtsi bsgril pa yang // rtswa nas dkyil 'khor bag po rnga
16b2(rnying rgyud): du// srog shing gsum gyis brgyad la thor byas nas// lus khams bdud rtsi chen po gnas su bskul// gsang ba'i sngags kyi byin gyis rab brlabs nas// snying po rlung gi gnas su bskyil bar bya// srog gi rlung gis nang du rab bsgril te//
16b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i rlung gis kyi nas nang du bsdus// sa yi rlung gis mi g.yo brtan par 'dzin// chu ni zheg nas bdud rtsi rdzing du 'khyil// me yi rlung ni lhag mthong gnas su 'dzin// rlung gi rlung ni rdo rje rgya tham brtan// yon tan bdud rtsi grub pa'i rtags shar ba// byang chu
16b4(rnying rgyud): sems kyi 'od ni rdo ri'i rtags// dri chen dri ni rnam par snang mdzad la// mAMs 'phel ba rin chen 'byung ldan ga tso// rak+ta'i sgra ni snang ba mtha' yas nyid// dr-i chu'i du ba don yod thub pa'i rtags// dmardzas lnga 'dus lha mo'i gzugs kyang stan/
16b5(rnying rgyud): ni rnam pa gnyis las grub pa'i sku// nyi zla skar ma 'ja' tshon dang // 'gro 'du me stag yud tsam zer// snang ba tsha tsha mar me'i 'od// bar chod 'od ni rnam pa gsum du snang // skrag nag ma mo sna 'od rgyal po dang // ldang dmar krug tan sa bdag 'a
16b6(rnying rgyud): po kun// 'od kyis dngos grub bstim nas len thob pa// 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin thob// bar chad nyams kyi phyag rgyas rang don sang // byung na bsrung zhing bzlog par bya'o// dri ni zhim gyur dngos grub rdzas la bsdu// tshe la dbang ba'i
16b7(rnying rgyud): rig 'dzin 'grub par 'gyur// bas dri ba zag srin dri hUM b+had d+ha gcod// sad pa bzhi yi bar chad bsrung bar bya// mang du 'phel ba dngos grub tha ma nyid// nan tan byas na tshe yi dngos grub 'grub// thub pa'i sgra dang bar chad grub sgra gnyis// gdang
17a1(rnying rgyud): gag pa'i slad ku 'byung // sangs rgyas mas dang dge 'dun dang // mngon zhes byubyang sems bdud bzh-i'apham// mang ma thun las byung ba ldog/ dngos grub blangs shes bstim par bya// mgo 'a byung bachu
17a2(rnying rgyud): sogs// gang yang dngos grub blang ba ni// phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'don 'grub// du ba'i rtags ni rnam pa bdun// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dbyibs// pad+ma ral gri lcags kyu dang // mchod rten dbyibs 'byung hUM gso chub// phyag rgya chen po'i reg
17a3(rnying rgyud): 'grub// lha mo lha dang bar chad gzugs// bar chad gzugs mdzes dri mi zhim// lha mo mchod rten lta bu dang // lha mo dngos dang rig 'dzin 'grub// bdud rtsi chen po'i phrin las brtsam pa yang // bar chad bsrung dang mdzub spogs pa dang // dngos drub
17a4(rnying rgyud): blang dang dbang rnams bskur ba dang // yon tan 'bras bu las mthar phyin par byed// bar chad bdud rnams rab tu bsal ba yang // dang pa lam la 'jug pa rnams// 'jig rten ma chos par gcod bsrung // lam la zhugs par gyur pa rnams/
17a5(rnying rgyud): rol bdud kyi bar chad bzung // lam drug cung zad brtan gyur na// bdud stobs 'phel ba'i bar gcod bsrung // sems brtan lam du gyur pa na// ting nge 'dzin bye bar gcod bsrung // sad pa bzhi yis bsrung bar bya'o// nyams kyi sad dang ting 'dzin/
17a6(rnying rgyud): sad// sngags dang lha grubasad pa yis// bar gcod bsrung bar bya ba'o// rdzas kyis spog dang ting 'dzin sngags// rtsal shugs phyung nas 'bad par bya// thun mong dngos grub grub chen brgyad// mchog gi sku gsums la 'gro// slob ma'i tshogs rnam
17a7(rnying rgyud): ma lus la// nus pa'i dbang lnga bskur ba yang // bum pa rdo dril cod pan ming // bdud rtsi bum pa spyir bzhag bskur// zab mo'i dbang gsum bskur ba yang // bdud rtsi'i rdzas ni lce la bstim// gsang dbang shes rab ye shes dang // bde
17b1(rnying rgyud): ba chen po'i man ngag sbyin// cha 'dar nang mad 'byor ba 'phel// mkha' 'a gro mchod pa'i mthu las byung // phyi ma ting 'dzinas thob pa// drang srong mnyes pa'i mthu las byung // man+ta thug sangs rgyas 'bras thob pa// pra dang gsung dang thugs dang /
17b2(rnying rgyud): gsum// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo 'grub// sangs rgyas mchod pa'i mthu las byung // bdud rtse chen po'i phrin las mchag/ nyan thos rang rgyal byang sems kyis// 'bum gyi tshar yang mi nya bas// shin tu brtson gyis 'bad par bya'o// @
17b3(rnying rgyud): ci chen po'i 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ bdud rtsi gong bu gcig pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs 'khor rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas nas brjod pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni kun mkhyen
17b4(rnying rgyud): mdzod// chos sgra dri med snying po las// gzugs sku gnyis su spang bar mdzad// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams// mongs spyod rdzogs pa'i srung sdang ba// shes bya'i dri ma dag par mdzad// 'gro drag sems can thams cad la/
17b5(rnying rgyud): sku'i mdzad pa mthar gyon pas// las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa stong // 'bras bu sangs rgyas sa la 'dren// sku gsumangon ldan che ba'i lha// ston pa khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// bdud rtsi chen po'i bsgrub pa'i bya// snod kyi 'jig rten zhing khams su
17b6(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyi sems can 'khor ba rnams// shing rta'i 'khor lo lta bur 'khor// snong las byung ba skyobs pa'i spyan// bcud las byung ba rtsa ba'i sman// bdud rtsi chen po rab 'bad pas// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rgyud chen 'di// bdag cag rnams kyis
17b7(rnying rgyud): bas bzung nas// lha mis 'dzin par bsgrub par bya// zhes rjes su yi rang ngo // bdud rtsi chen po 'khor la 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ yongs su gtad cid bzung nas nas sul rang bar bstan par bstan pa'i me'u ste bdun pa'o// / brda nas
18a1(rnying rgyud): 'khar lo 'bar babargyad rdzogs so// rgyagar gyi mkhan pabs pa mi tha dang thadakram rnang gtag nan sum ras bsgyur bag/ chug sa dang/ mthab sas ma ta b+hA bar ma la Sh+TAn pa/ bang dadang/
18a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che zang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po bdud kyi ba da ba chen pa nyid/ gnas
18a3(rnying rgyud): mchog yum gyi b+hag chos kyi dbyings chen po na/ nyan thos rang rgyal theg dman mo yang med pa'i nang na/ rang byung bdud rgya chen po'i lus kyi khams rnam par dag pa rnams dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
18a4(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can ma lus thams cad la// lus khams bdud rtsis kun khyab kyang // rang gi rnam rtag sgrib byas pas// rang byung bdud rtsi'i don ma rtogs// de nyid rdo rje 'chang bral du// phyag rgya chen po'i mchog gin/
18a5(rnying rgyud): dngos grub dam pa thob bya'i phyir// phun sum tshogs pa rnam lnga yis// dkyil 'khor chen po rnam gsum du// bsnyen bsgrub rnam pa bzhi dag gis// phrin las drug po mthar phyu nas// dngos grub gnyis su 'dus pa yis// lha bzig lar
18a6(rnying rgyud): lha bzla ba'o// rang byung bdud rtsi bshad du gsol// zhes byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das lakhar 'das kyi chos rnga bcan dam pas srid pa gsum gyi sems can rnams las kyi dbang gis grol bar byed pa/ lus kyi khams bdud rtser sgrub pa'i thabs dmapa
18a7(rnying rgyud): 'di ga sungs sa// blta na spyod pa dang // sgrub pa'i gra la rab bcan pas// sbyin pa yum dang 'bar du bcas// gnas dang kyang chum chags dang / gyanang gsang pa dmyal 'khor du// brtson pa nye brtson pa ba dang bslag// /
18b1(rnying rgyud): darjod pa dang // dmachog brlab dang ngas par slab// phrin las bsgrub byung dag dan// phrin las dang sa zlab bsgru pa rnams// matag ngan can grang bstar// las kyabyud 'di bshad kyis nyon// nas gzungs sa// thams cad bzu ca nga na
18b2(rnying rgyud): na po mthong ba'i rgyud las/ grang gzhi dang gleng bslang ba'i le skye nga po'o// da nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad bsgrub par bya brgyan sumatshogs pa lnga gsungs so// na chos kyi mang bdag rdzogs// mamad
18b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud// gzung bar bde ba bsgrub pa'i lung // gnang du ston cing la bzla' ba// dpyir byi nang rgyud la mkhas// mnyam nyid don la brog zhol bas// ri ngogs med la lha srung te// bgegs thub pang char ming byung bas// zin las mna' byin nyud byis
18b4(rnying rgyud): bkur// yag thams mi tshugs paM// bka' yi bla ma sbyin pas ni// nges shes skyed pa rgyad 'di yin// brgyad pa kun bzang las byung ba// lus ngag yid la byin gyis brlabs// dngos dang las 'gro la ldan rnams// gang dang gang mdzad rtogs pa
18b5(rnying rgyud): ston pa 'di na dang po bzung // sa yi yum ni dung can ma// reg pa sla ba byed pa nyid// skad gdangs che la rus pa rags// lus ni g.yas su bag tsam 'khyil// chu ni ri dwags can zhes bya// gsher ba byed pachu yin pas// lus sben rlom la
18b6(rnying rgyud): phrabs// ri dwags chos dang ldan par brtag/ me ni pad+ma can yin de// mdog gas la 'gro ba me yi las// yan lag phra 'jam bung ba 'dra// pad+ma lta byar rab gnas pa'o// rlung ni ban glang can du bshad// g.yo bas thig le myang du 'babs//
18b7(rnying rgyud): lag zung la sha lus gel// bung ba'i tshags ni ldang ba'o// par+tha rtag gcig la yang // 'byung ba bzhi pa chang 'gyur yang // las bzhi rlung dang sbyar ba'i yum// yab dang mthun par phyogs dbus gnas// bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i sdod bstan pa/
19a1(rnying rgyud): na du da pa nam 'anas yang pas da sa ba/ na su da pa dud pas dza// ldananas ma sam g+sas/ margya nanus sa sa/
19a2(rnying rgyud): gang dang ched pashin lasags pa// thab rnams pa ma // dman bya sacad byung // gnas pams na 'dasaH// shar chang za bam gas// khyod pa la pa
19a3(rnying rgyud): dang chen rnams d+his// byang na shing nags lha mo gnas// dadabus nyams dga' gnas kyi mchog/ thug zhug banags kyi nga // bzlab pa'i gnas kyang dA sa \u0f7f// ya na da nyams dga' ba// bar chad med pa
19a4(rnying rgyud): de nis ma byang bal ba yang // bas bza sa/ khyon ldan rnams patsal bdun/ da pachog ga tsang ma smras bdan pa// da nas sgra sathuban// ba ma pa bachod pa dang / rkyen gsang bdul//
19a5(rnying rgyud): nga'abrags na pas// 'dab tu bas ga la cha gsum pa// sman dang tha pa sasus dang // gam tsan ma mun thab sgya bas so// ces sangs rgyal dang ba ba shes dag/ yi nga bcad la 'dug par byag/ dkyil 'khor chen pa
19a6(rnying rgyud): gas pa/ 'asgragasangs so// thams ci 'ad lce rlu gyud pas/ brdab pa gas sun sa chags pa rnam pa bstan pa tha nyis pag/
19a7(rnying rgyud): das rgya dkyil latshang can po rnam mi gsum pa 'dug su / bldan byed kyipa mdzin// thang ba dang ni byed pa dang / dra du ma mdang // bad de 'bras bu dang / 'das sa danam /
19b1(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba rnam pa brgyad// nyan thos rang rgyal byang sems gsum// 'dul ba mdo sde mngon par gnas// kri ya u pa yog ni// rigs gsum rigs bzhi rigs lngar gnas// rnal 'byor chen po nang pa ni// zhi khro lha bcu'i sgrub byed can// rjes su rnal 'byor lung gi chos/
19b2(rnying rgyud): bdun rtsi nang gi rtsa ba brgyad// dri chen byang sems mAM sa dang // rak+ta dri chu rnam pa lnga// mngon pa gyi yi rtsa ba bzhi// sbas pa nang gi rtsa ba bzhi// brgyad tshan lnga yi rang bzhin can// gsang ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa bcad// kun gzhi dkar nag bag chags las// bsags pas
19b3(rnying rgyud): ba mya ngan 'das// nyon mongs yid ni rnam pa lnga// gti mug mun pa sel bar byed// zhe sdang me yang rab bsad nas// nga rgyal ri bo bsgril byas te// 'dod chags chu bo rgyun bcad pas// phrag dog rlung yang rab zhi pas// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yis//
19b4(rnying rgyud): nad yongs la khyab par byas// sgo lnga dbang pos phyi nang sbyar// de nyid kho na'i rtsa ba brgyad// phyi yi sman gyi dkyil 'khor che// bdag nyid rang byung dkyil 'khor ni// dri chen gser mdog rnam snang mdzad// dzam bu na da'i gser 'od 'dra// byang sems mi bskyod
19b5(rnying rgyud): rjesems// puN+Da rAka lta bur dkar// mes rin chen 'byung ldan gtso// in+da nI la'i mdog dang mtshungs// rak+ta sdang ba mtha' yas gtso// padz+ra rA ga lta bur dmar// dri chu rta mchog don yod grub// rin chen mar gad lta bur ldang // glang po sha ye mchog
19b6(rnying rgyud): sa// sangs cas spyan du yang dag gnas// ma ma na na dbyings byug sa// NI sha mA maH zhes bya// dbazhan pa blangags dkar ma// byar+g+ha'i shan ldan mar bshad// rigs lnga yab sngal 'di rnams kyang // sems can lus khams bdud ragA /
19b7(rnying rgyud): dbyi dang ni dkyil ma che// me shes dkyil 'khong rab bgadaH// gar phyogs mengon par dga' ba na// mi brgyad darda dbyings phyugs// sa phyags dpal dang ldan pan// dkon ma chag dpal dang mA ma kA/ nu brgyags bdab cad pon/ da
20a1(rnying rgyud): mad dang gas dkar ba// rdzang rdzogs na ma dag pagad pan// rgyamachog dmachog thol ma gnas// dpas phyogs kyang chub byung ban// rnam par dang mdzadasangs rgyas spyan/ mas nyid ma dang la shes na// natan dang bla las dang sa
20a2(rnying rgyud): dbus dang nga sems tsam// rlung dang rnam ma par gnas pa yis// ting ga chos byed dkyil 'khor ci// zhes gsungs so// thams cad padu chen po lnga'i dang bzhin/ rin po cha zing ba'i rgyud las/ gyon rjod bcud ma lus pa'i chos thams cad bdud rtsecan po da la ba
20a3(rnying rgyud): du bstan pa'i la'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i thabs kyi rim pa 'di gsungs so// lha baspyad pa dmachog dang // smrab dang ngas par thub pa dang // phrin las bsgrub par bya ba dang // bdud rtsi dam pa 'dir 'dus /
20a4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor lta ba blta 'dod na// ma skyes pa yi rang nyid las// ma 'gags pa'i rang bzhin shar// gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid yin// sna tshogs rtog pa cir sdang yang // thog la byang chub sems su shar// nges pa don gyi kun gzhilas// ye shes lha ma'i sangs
20a5(rnying rgyud): rdzas drang // myor ba na ci kun ga ga las// logatog su ma'i sems can sdang // rna tshogs sogs pa'i kun gzhi las// 'khor ba dang ni myang na 'das// sru dang lus dang gsung dang nga// ya shes bag chags gnyis sdang rnams// byang chub sems ni kun gan nyid//
20a6(rnying rgyud): da nas kyi sung gnas pas// 'khor 'das sangs mi chos nyid dang // byang chub sams ni phyagargyam// blang nga sbra dang zag pa gsung / nga tigazugs kyi theg N+Dar 'dzi // byangs mas phyag rgya chen pon// bcol ba mad pa'i rang duganas// snang thang mas
20a7(rnying rgyud): ca pa'i grong nas byung // ra ga kyang chub sems la gnas// gang bcus kyang chubs sa la// gangs spangs me pa / nga yang rkyang chubs so// dmang sa gsun pas bslangs// dngas sa grangs
20b1(rnying rgyud): tad// rtsol ba med pa'i rang bzhin la// 'khor 'das gnyis med byang chub sems// ma sbas pa las ma 'gags shar// gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin bstan// blta ba gnyis meng chas byed na// blo dang dngos po 'jas pa 'phyir// snod brgyad ldan du rtsen
20b2(rnying rgyud): gnas// gnod nas rnam par dag pa ni// blta ba bdag nyid chen po yin// matogs pa la bdud yin yang // rtog pa'i ma sh-i ni sbyar bas// lus ngag sems kyis ci spyad cing // tsaM bsrub bskum pa ma lus kun// thams cad 'byed ci bran chen nyid// da
20b3(rnying rgyud): gtogs gzhan du ni// bdud rtsi btsal yang mi rnyed kyir// dngos grub bdag nyid chen po yin// snang ba yul ni bdud rtsi'i sdod// srid pa bcud ni sman gyi rdzas// dbang sgyur lha yi bdag nyid shes// byin thabs ngo mtshar bsam mi khyab// yon tan bdag
20b4(rnying rgyud): da can po min// rjes dang bral ba chos kyi // ban ma tshan pas kun la khyab// lus pa med pa la nas chag/ thab dang mkhya med pa'i dacings// 'dres pa med par kun gnas pas// khams gsum malus chos kyis// bad tshan nyid las ga na
20b5(rnying rgyud): bzhan dag nyid can pa sa// maung bgasus dang bsnas gsum dang // 'thab sems can ma lus pa// bdud na can par gnas la// rang gas rang mam med tha nas/ ma ny+dzu dang thub pang satwA dun// 'ab na pad
20b6(rnying rgyud): gsungs/ nga bdu rtsa chen pa lnga'i dang bzhin don po cha byed pa'i gyad las/ bdud chechen po 'dar 'das bas par stan pa'i lang skye bzhipa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis smad pa 'di dge gsungs// spong ba'i sbed pas bdeba' bar/
20b7(rnying rgyud): sbom ze'i spyod pas lag lha dag/ sgor sbal bdud rtsa chen pa yis// mam mngon par sangs rgyas lam// de nas sgrub pa'i thogs ma mchag/ gzungs ma mthod spyad cing gdung // 'ad chags byang chub chen par 'bar// khyed la yis rab ba shang /
21a1(rnying rgyud): bya// skye bas dag pa'i rig ma ni// pad+ma chos dang rab ldan ma// mdog gas la yang 'ong yan lag cas// yan tan tshogs dang rab tu ldan// ri dwags can k+She yum bshad na// baspyod nu ma mkhrang ba dang // ra rmad sha niHsa pa
21a2(rnying rgyud): de// sked pa za zhing 'gros yang dal// de yi lta stangs bstan pa yang // skyes pa mthong na mig me 'dzum// dbugs dang dri yang gra rtse zo// ri dgas bla ba 'dra bar bshad// glang po can zhes bya ba'i yum// lus sha tshi la yan lag thung // spobs che mig chung
21a3(rnying rgyud): pA bshal ring // rdul dbyung tshen dri yang zhim// khog shed che la mdzangs pa ste// khyad par bung ba'i tshogs rnams ldang // dung can ma yi gzungs ma ni// rgas pa rags la sha 'jam dkar// lus kyi stobs ni tsha la myur// lte bar ri mo byung ba ni/
21a4(rnying rgyud): dung chen g.yas su 'khyil ba 'dra// skad kyi gdangs yang che zhing ring // dung gi chos dang rab ldan pas// ri mo can zhes ming du thags// ri mo can gyi reg ma ni// mdog ni dmang la sha yang chung // de yi lte ba'i steng na yar// ri mo 'greng bu gsum
21a5(rnying rgyud): yod pa// sIn mtshams mdzod spu'i bu ga na// ri mo 'grang drug ceg kyang // mgo yaM mung gang mthang gnyis na// dang thod la zla 'iri mo yod// tshogs rnams thams cad ring ba dang // da ni khyad par dag tu bsngags// sna tshogs can gyi sgor yum
21a6(rnying rgyud): na// bzhi ka'i yon tan ldan pa'am// gsum mam gnyis kyi yon tan ldan// sbyangs pas dag pa'i bu mo ni// thos bas ma dang ni bslab pa yis// rgyud yang yongs su dag par bya// dbang gis dag par bya ba yang // gyi nang dbang yang bskur bar bya// ras
21a7(rnying rgyud): 'byor rang bzhin dag par bya// gyi dang nang gi khrus byas nas// gsar dngul rgyan dang rab ldan pa// sgogatsug 'khor lon can dang // mgul pa phrag zhabs ga ga 'khor dang // gos dang dang byis lags par bcan// nub kyi dkyil 'khor zlog ma la/
21b1(rnying rgyud): dpa na bzhin stan pa dang gnas// g.yan ma lpags skur ba gnas bya// 'ad 'ang 'jam pa'i mdangs byas pas// yab phram lus ngag ma pa'o// yang ma nyal kyagatur brnam// gas ba'i thugs kyang bzlas par \u0f7f// bdag gi sams dang
21b2(rnying rgyud): rnam pa la ba dang yum dgasas// bdang med par ma gyu nas// rdzas dang ga sums sa shAm pa/ dpa mams// mnyam pa na pa // mirnam myed lu 'i na// kun d+habasamanyam par byed pa
21b3(rnying rgyud): ba rnal mar gyi sa 'jug/ yabac+doMs gams pa'i ma ca bdag// 'ad gas byung ba da pas ste// bdadab pa 'dang bdapa m-i na pa ma sam yun gyis pa dzin// ming migs nga pa
21b4(rnying rgyud): mjugan/ / 'anas sa ma ba byu/
21b5(rnying rgyud): pa shes par byar / sa dag ma la can nas/ shUn b+h+yAs bags na sa// 'du 'a gardzogs pa da/ masan byamanas// dban byung chu ba dad par/ da da pa nyis ldanas/
21b6(rnying rgyud): la ma nag ma / nan 'dus zad pa sab ba bzhan pa/ la sa nas / da nags pa'abang sa med 'i// 'ad man nam par/ pa
21b7(rnying rgyud): gas // dbazhin sus ninas ci gas par// ran nga byed pa bsam par bya// bzhi mnyams pa zlas tha sbyin de kya byin ma ma 'o// tham nga sa ca dang // na ma gyis ga pag// rmang
22a1(rnying rgyud): dam / 'ad gan gsas pa/ na rdzu ga ga pa bam sa// la kA shAs n+ta/ da da shA na// pa' 'gyur bas bzang pa
22a2(rnying rgyud): sang bdu chog la ldan / gan dum pa zhesas rgyag
22a3(rnying rgyud): rjes brgya thub// bdapa ma tog zha n+d+haH/ dbang bcing bdas ga pa sgom// bskrad pa'i mtha' baspang gas par // da ci ma yang gsam pam// bd-i ngam mnas nas rbaH// thig ma nam pa dzad \u0f7fsaH// thig ga gzung sa
22a4(rnying rgyud): yang bgyur/ sbyang rlung rnam par 'gag pa la// 'byung ba rnam drug thig sa babyed// sras kyi khyod lam brtan byas nas// lag gi mes nyi mag na paT// bus mi gtas ma ba rnam / r+dz+dza hU~M nga mdun dri ngas// g.yas g.yan dag tu
22a5(rnying rgyud): gas s+hoH// 'byud pa gang ya dang dub pa gsas// 'khor bdag tu sang ba \u0f7f/ mdag na gsum pa la// ra klubs sathas par 'gyur/ me pa la pan bajas// yang ma bya pa ni dag tugazhig// mag gnyis snang du babyed par ma
22a6(rnying rgyud): 'das nanam 'dzin par bya// mdzin ta la la jag tu badzad// lus kyi 'thal la bdag na yang bya// 'dis kyang thog sa dzin par gyur// mang chen tugags kyi bad de// mi 'du ces thaM ga hU~M// gcan ga can thugs kyis mthun pag
22a7(rnying rgyud): sbres pas skyeg tsu / thamangs can la nga ba // 'din kun byags dug// nam thal cig thas las la dmam// dmas pa mabs pan da // dbapa rnamams yangasan// na sa gyung byasas mad// gang
22b1(rnying rgyud): mkhas na// bde ba yun lang byung ba yin// bzlog pa'i las lam mkhas na// de ni chu dang brjod pa yin// dgram padag la ma mkhas na// des ni nad du 'gyur ba'o// de yi gnyen po mkhas pa bzhi// dbab la mkhas pa rus sbal 'gros// gzung ma khang//
22b2(rnying rgyud): lus ngag 'gyur ba bya// bzlog mkhas dud 'gro'i 'gyur ba bzhi// khyad par bya ba dag la mkhas pa yis// de ni rnam grol phyag rgya bya// rlung gi skye rags bcings pa dang // zhags pa 'phang dang gtan shing bskor// bu chung lta bu'i spyod pa bya/
22b3(rnying rgyud): bsrung ba dka' bar gyur pa na/ skad cig bzhi par bsrung bar bya// de dus rtags rnams 'byung ba ni// srin lam bem bem lci bar byed// rtsub rtsab byed cing dri chen dang // dri chu yang ni res mi thon// res dga' mi thong byed pa dang // skra rtse zed zad byed
22b4(rnying rgyud): pa dang // g.yal dang mchil ma 'byung bar byed// de dag ci rigs byung ba'i ma// da ni thig le zin pa yin// bsrub bzhis ni de la bya// rten ni yongs su dag pa yis// gzungs mdag la wa bsnyad nas// rtsa swa btsal ba'i sbyor ba yi//
22b5(rnying rgyud): brlab gasram po sngon song bas// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan 'gyur bas// yab yum sbyor ba'i tshul bstan pa// rdorje dang ni badz+ra gnyis// rtsa gnyis thig le rnam pa gnyis// rlung gnyis kha skor gyur ba las// bad dang stong pa zung chud cing //
22b6(rnying rgyud): gangos bzung bral ba yaM// ting nge 'dzin yang sle rtse// ting 'dzind ltung zhing bskrad mtha' bsrung // gsang yang thub par bya ba yin// 'gyur brtag gis bsrung ba ni// rgya mtsho rab dag lan ma// sring ba na dbang du bsdub dang // ra 'dzin rang ga gan
22b7(rnying rgyud): swa spyar// dbang po'i mchog yang spyad du bzhag/ ngag stobs cu drag ring bar bzang // ting dzin hUM ma mda' gaku 'phangs// skad cig mni bzhi pa la// lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba na// thig la brtan pa'i drod ces \u0f7f// gdon kyis 'angs na sngags
23a1(rnying rgyud): zas bzung // bgacags dang gnas tan pa na/ dgapas 'as rgyan 'thar/ la 'ang tubastabs pacung / na thams cad padabyas+ho/ na nabyas ma man gangasargas pa da
23a2(rnying rgyud): da cig bzhil snang bar// rnam pa sna ma ga skad cig dang // rnam par nyid dang rnam par smin// mtshan nyid thal ba'i skad cig yin// byas nas ltos pa'i bde ba'i// lus rmyi lal bur rgyu ba dang // was rnams pam skye ba dang // las
23a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad khyab par skye// snang ba'i dngos po bde bar 'char// nang gi gnas la ltos pa bzhi// spyi ba nas ni mgrin pa dang // mgrin pa nas ni snying gar bang // snying gi lta ba'i bar du ni// lte ba gsang gnas par bya'o// spang bltos pa'i bde baH/
23a4(rnying rgyud): dzinan ma tog dgas ma // bdag gi rnam / rang rim ga/ phyag ci'i rnamartag 'gag pa dang // bad pa gsum pa na macag 'gag/ ri na rab byas pani// pa dnga'i nyams kyang chung ba dang // bde bacha bar 'bar ba dang // bad pa ma
23a5(rnying rgyud): dang ston// ngang bstong pa gnyis med // bdang 'i lashes brgyadrug gis// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin sa// lhab rnam par dgang bstan// sangs rgyas sems can mas san// yab yum bdapa chen po las// rang tha thams cad 'das pa'i/
23a6(rnying rgyud): ma gyi b+ha ga'i gzhal yas nas// khams gsum sems can thams cad dang // 'ad gshegs lha dang gsung da thugs// mi bzad rgyan gyi 'khor log nas// gsang ba'i mchod ka dbul ran// don pa mnyam bzhag nas// thig la ba phru bu gnas/
23a7(rnying rgyud): kyai yi dwa ba lta ma ka/ nang ga bang bsgrag sogs pa'i// gas dpa'i lha mo rnam pa pa'i// sgob gi yi lham rnams// bdenga'i ye shes bcu drug mtshad// bde brlung gi gtum mo yis// rlung gi gzul ba yi mda'// byangs mas tog 'phan la brdan
23b1(rnying rgyud): bya /
23b2(rnying rgyud): mas
23b3(rnying rgyud): ma su
23b4(rnying rgyud): thu
24a1(rnying rgyud): ma das sa ma pa sna na// ma ga nagags / sa nga gag gas / na sa nags pa /
24a2(rnying rgyud): rnam ma 'dod na la ldan rnams// gsang ba dkyil 'bar gam bsdu// ngan sa gang mthun bcad ci// rnal dang ldan pa 'dir na gcig/ rgyan pas bsungs pa'i rnam pa'i tshas// gzung 'drin log par bstab pas// kham
24a3(rnying rgyud): gnas ltung / blamad kyim nyid rtogs na pade// bzung 'dzin madrang ba dkrol phying bye// bdud pazhin pas kyis mnan pa yang// sa yid kyil 'tshang ban mtshan// bdag dang de'i mthil gyis mnan// gnas kyis 'di ba ba
24a4(rnying rgyud): 'di na nigs thugs sa gzung drugs la// mdzad bsgrubs bapang dang // khab 'jug na da dga' byad dang // bin la ka DeSh+ku nga // gsad kyang brgyad pa smras pa ni// chags pa'i dazung nangs gnas nir// rdo ba zug
24a5(rnying rgyud): napa bya bas/ da pa'i drug pangs padang // mtha canas dpam thug pa/ khams brtsam 'bar bya rdza bapa// gnas kyi du nga phyub da// dam pa
24a6(rnying rgyud): rnapa lta/ gang ban sa mad kya 'das// shA pa'i lam la gzung ba / rga' thams cad 'bar ba na// 'bang pa brtan pad // bcom ldan pa da gshegs pa chog gin// 'anas gsum dgal
24a7(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f// de ltar stsol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dar// bdag cag 'bar dang brtas pa rnams// dpa' bo chen pa 'phrul 'dud// thugs rdzas dgongs nas bskyab tu gas pa// da nas dalus dung zad gnas// rbagang yul na bsal ba'i tshal// byed
24b1(rnying rgyud): tan gang na' shang // bal yul ya ma \u0f7f kha// rgyakha kha shang kA ranaH// sing ga'i yul na sku la rdzogs// nga btal tshu ta'i shing // zag yul na gsang chan pa// mchad tan mag mang shing ral ta// kha ma'i yulan d+ha zan rom/
24b2(rnying rgyud): shing ba ba ti// za hor khu yug klong dgun// bde byed gzhon nu ka kol shing // li yul 'jig rten mngon par rdzogs// go da shan dang shing pata// bkra shis ya mtshan 'byung ba'i gnas// 'bras bu chen po lnga bskal phyir// byung gi dkyil 'khorda ljang
24b3(rnying rgyud): bzhag/ mi che gra kli phyo ba yang // shar lho nub byang dbus su bzhag/ des don gcig tu bstan pa dang // rgyad lngar 'khor ba bsgral bar bya// de nas 'jigs byed skya babyed la// dkyil 'khor bu gsum steng du bzhag/ gnas sbyong ting 'dzin bsgom par
24b4(rnying rgyud): lan gsum dang po 'dod khams sbyang // dang po rang gnas spong ba yang // lha yis pha na a dkar ba// de la rlung sams mnyam 'dus na// lha yi nyams ni sems la 'char// rang nyid rtswa yin tam byed 'byung // ga ni lus la 'char bar//
24b5(rnying rgyud): me tog zeng sogs brgyan pa dang // sngags kyang dag la 'char ba dang // saM skr-i ta ye skad yang brjod// mthong sbrang yul la 'char ba na// rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang mthong // rang nyid lha yi gtso ngar mthong // gzhan rnams lha yi 'khor du mdzod// bab chags
24b6(rnying rgyud): ma lam 'char ba yang // de dag ci rigs rmi lam 'byung // lha min su yig ser po la// nyams ni khro zhing tshig pa za// gar ni mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// sngags kyang rgyob sod bu ma 'byung // mthong sdang ri rab khong seng na// lha ma yin gyi 'thab rtsod dang /
24b7(rnying rgyud): bdag gzhan der yang khrid pa mdzong // ngag chags ci rigs rmi lam mi// mi la nr-i yig sngon po ste// mi nyams 'jig rten chos la dga'// gar ni yul dang cha lugs 'gyur// sngags ni so so'i yul gyi skad// mthong sdang gling bzhi gling phran mthong // bdag
25a1(rnying rgyud): dang gzhan yang dang khrid mthong // marigs mi mthun du ma mthong // rmi la ma de dag cha rigs so// lha dang lha man ma dang gsum// 'ad khams mtho sa gnas gsum ste// dge ba brtsam lapa las 'byung // dadag da
25a2(rnying rgyud): 'bring bram yin// dud 'gro du lag dung kade// nyams ni dud 'gro sngar bas blun// gor du baglang spyod la ma 'byung// sngags kyang dud 'gro du ma'i nad// mthong snang gyi yi rgya ma mra mthong // byo la sa chu srin la sags pa// bang ba gzhan du med pa'i blang // da
25a3(rnying rgyud): rigs rmi lam ma// yi dwags ze yig dmar po la// nyams kyang bkres dang skom pa dang // gar ni lus cha yan lag za// sngags kyang the tang na dzad wa// mthong sdang srong khyer ser sgra mthong // yi dwags ba zos dang sgom pa dang // bdag dang gzhan yang dang zh-ing
25a4(rnying rgyud): rmi lam bag chags de dag me// dmyal ba'i dri yig nag po de// sems nyams tsha grang sdug bsngal 'byung // lus gar gsum btab gdung zhing til// sngags kying dag tu kyi hud sogs// mthong snang lcags kyi khang sgrom 'bar// dmyal ba cha grang can mags
25a5(rnying rgyud): mthong // bdag gzhan der yang khrid par mthong // rmi la ma de dag ci rigs mi// da dag rin song gnas gsum dang // minas bcu yi lam gnas pas// 'dod khams tha ma'i gnas su ltung // mchog 'bring tha ma'i las yin na// gnas stong bzhi ba rtsa gnyis sa/
25a6(rnying rgyud): nal 'byor gang gis 'byings padas// mtshan nyid pa chags 'char ba'i nyams// rang bzhin rang bzhin stong pa dang // nga bzung du 'dug pa dang // rim pa yin min nyams bya bas// ning srin bu spong ba dang // ngan sang mi 'phrog dang dbang// mthongs pangs su
25a7(rnying rgyud): bas na// byar mi ldog pa'i sa gnas pas// byang chub sems dpa' med dang 'o// drod rnams byung rgyal bskyud par bya// gzugs khams bsam gtan ma du gnas/ rtog pa dang ni bcas pa dang // bapyod pa dag dang bcas pa pa// shes rab dang po'i
25b1(rnying rgyud): dga' ba bcas shing gnas pa dang // bde bar bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bdapral 'ga' tsam ting nge 'dzin// btang snyoms yongs dag ting nge 'dzin// rim pa yin min skyeb nas// drod kyang byung rgyal bskyang bar bya// gzugs mad sgra mchad mu bzhi'i nyams// shas
25b2(rnying rgyud): rab a la rlung sems 'dus// chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' tsam// rang gi rnam par shes pa tsam// yad med las kyang 'das pa las// ci yang med par nyams skyebs// de yang rim pa yin min skye// tshad med bzhi la gnas byas nas/
25b3(rnying rgyud): gnas gzugs khams skye ba dang // maM g.yo stong pa yid la byed// gzugs med skye ma chad mu bzhi gnas// mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer mchog/ snying po 'is las rlung sems 'das// spang bya gzung 'dzin rnam rtog spang // thob bya chas su bad chen
