25b4(rnying rgyud): thob// zung 'jug rgyal rlung sems 'dus// rang byung ya shas chen pa 'o// ting 'dzin rgyud la skye ba ni// lus ni yang la sams ni gsal// dper nanam mkha' stan mda'adra // 'khor 'das nyams myong byas pan// sgrol ba ched dang ldan pa yin/
25b5(rnying rgyud): chos nyid spyi 'gag zal ba la// matogs 'khor dang mya ngan 'das// rtogs na rang bzhin lus dag sems// 'khar 'das rdzogs par shes paH// dus la bab pa' sems canadade// drod tshad gnas spang 'byangs pa yis// rnal 'byur dbang phyug chen pa ya
25b6(rnying rgyud): gang yin nam shes dgug par \u0f7f// bdApa'i lam 'byed gsang ba la// dkyil 'khar chen po khyod shig nas// d+ha drug gnas pa'i gdul tha rnams// ngan song gsum pa spang bar \u0f7f// oMn ma rtag la ta sarba d+ha ga ta pa sha \u0f7fna// rAd+hA ya/
25b7(rnying rgyud): yas d+yaH/ sarba ma pa// a gtan gtan/ sa thapa pagatan/ ba granyis rnam par khrig tan \u0f7f/ oM bad d+ha ti rbag man mdun pa mchis lag ta d+g+has/ mthamathas mams tata thA paT// data ngas na
26a1(rnying rgyud): ta te tu hUM phaT/ de nas ngan song gnas sbyangs nas// sdug bsngal gsum gyi sgo yang dgag/ raM yaM khaM/ gang yang rung ba'i sems can de// yab yum b+h+rUM las lhar bskyed de// 'og min gnas su 'phang ba yis// rgyal ba'i
26a2(rnying rgyud): sras su skyes pa la// rnam shes rig pa chos kyi skur// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur bas// sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings bzhugs pa'i// zhabs drung ye shes rlung gis bgrod// bsam yas zhing khams dpag med na// chos kyi 'khor lo
26a3(rnying rgyud): rab bskor nyan// sa bcu gnas pa'i sems dpa' sogs// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pa 'bul// sdug po bkod dang kun tu 'od// 'khor lo pad+ma can la gnas// yang dag nyid la yang dag bsngal// chos sku dri ma med pa thob// dri chen rnam
26a4(rnying rgyud): par snang mdzad nyid// byang chub sems ni mi bskyod pa// mAM sa dkon mchog dpal yin te// rak+ta snang mtha' tshe dpag med// dri chu don rab grub pa nyid// bskal ba rdzas kyi bdud rtsi ni// thugs rje chen po rtsi yin pas// ma rig dug yang sel bar
26a5(rnying rgyud): byed// thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las bskal pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dam tshig 'di gsungs so// dug lnga mi srang ye shes lnga// dam rdzas lnga ni dang du blang // ngab
26a6(rnying rgyud): brlang rdzun sgrol ma byin sbyor// phung sogs rigs lngar shes par bya// yan lag dam tshig nyi shu la// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// re re la yang lnga lnga ste// de yang lnga lngar dbye bar bya// de nyid thabs dang shes rab gnyis// bsgrub par
26a7(rnying rgyud): zla ba rigs lnga nyid// rtsa ba sku gsung thugs dang bcas// dam tshig stong dang rtsa brgyad bsrung // bum dbang gsang ba'i dbang bskur zhing // shes rab ye shes bde chen dbang // dam tshig bsrung bar bya ba yang // rnam grangs rab tu phye nas bsrung // mnyam
26b1(rnying rgyud): smel
26b2(rnying rgyud): bzhag rjes spyod bzung ba dang // bsrung dang mi 'bral dam tshig yin// gang zhig bum pa'i dbang thob pas// bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom byas la// snang stong zung 'jug blta ba dang // bdud rtsi lnga yi ril bu bza'// dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad bsrung /
26b3(rnying rgyud): dril bu mi 'bral 'chang // phyi ba dag dang mthun pa yod// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dbang thob na// rtsa rlung tsaN+Da lI yang bsgom// rang byang ye shes zhes bya ba// nyon mongs rnam par rtog pa dang // smin bzhigasal zhing yang ba ye// stong gsal zas
26b4(rnying rgyud): bza' bar bya// rang byung rlung dang 'gal bar bsrung // zhi drag gang rung mi 'bral lo// shes rab ye shes dbang thob pas// mnyam bzhag dkyil 'khor 'khor lo che// rjes spyod lhan skyes bcu drug la// bsrung ba zig le 'dzag pa drug/ dpe
26b5(rnying rgyud): sam ye shes phyag rgya la// mi 'bral dang du blang ba nyid// bde ba chen po'i dbang thob pas// rdo rje rba rlabs rnam gsum bsgom// shin tu rnam dag de kho na// rgyu mthun pas ni skra dkar 'joms// 'gro ba rnams kyi yid 'ong 'gyur// rnam par
26b6(rnying rgyud): smin pas stobs ster byed// mngon par shes pa cung zad 'char// skyes bu byed pas rnam par 'phel// 'jig rten ro rnams longs spyod nas// dri med pas ni 'chi med 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul cung zad ston pa'o// bde chen bde stod bza' bar bya// shes
26b7(rnying rgyud): bya'i sgrib pa bsrung ba dang // pad can phyag rgya mi 'bral zhing // mi nyams bsrung ba'i tshul yang bzhi// tshul bzhin rgyud la bskyed pas bsrung // rnam grangs rjes dran mi nyams bsrung // nyams myong ci skyes mi nyams bsrung // phal gus pas khyad par can//
26b8(rnying rgyud): nyams par gyur pas rnam pa gnyis// srid pa'i sdug bsngal 'dren pa yi// dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad po// thog mar bum dbang dam bcas so// lam gol ring du 'khor ba yi// zab mo dbang gsum dam tshig de// nyams na las sbyor dngos grub ring //
27a1(rnying rgyud): masan 'ad pa'a'as bshadapa// dam cug bams cad tums thang // das spya tham pa// rdza ba dang pan nam sa dang / nadag byung sum mAthun dun thul// mnam btasha papa ba tums pa// man
27a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro langs su nyid// 'og min gnas nas spyan dngas la// lha brgyad du bamyal b.raH// rnaMs snang mchog nyams pan// mamamakha' sbrul sprul// bskam pa zab ma bas ma gtan dang // bcwa ba tshad du d+ha lo bad+maH// zhag ma dam
27a3(rnying rgyud): chog nyams pa la// sha za mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams la// gtor ma gtang zhing lhag mas mchod// dam tshig mkha' 'bran rnga'i spyan// tshogs kyi 'khor ma rgya chenaH// zhes gsungs so// thams cad bdud nI l-I'i rang bzhin rin po thang pa'i hUM
27a4(rnying rgyud): las/ gsang ba sngags kyi dam tshig bstan pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// bsnyen pa'i dam tshig la gnas pas// byang chub mchog 'di rnyed par 'gyur// nye ba'i bsnyen pa'i
27a5(rnying rgyud): dmachog gis// dam tshig rab tu brtan par byed// sgrub pa mchog la rab gnas na// dngos grub shin tu nye ba dang // bsgrub che ni dmatshig rdzogs byang chub// mchog dang thun mong thong gyur pa// ye shes rdornga dag gis bya// shin tu don du gnyer ba'o//
27a6(rnying rgyud): gang zhig bsnyen pa byed 'dod na// bsgrub pa'i yul yang brtag par bya// mnyam zhing snyam pa'i sa phyogs la// ro rnams rab tu bral bar bya// btsal nas blang bar bya ba yang // 'jig rtenas bdag lha klu la// rtsod pa zhi par bya ba'i phyir// sa rin
27a7(rnying rgyud): 'atsal tes blang ngo // rang byung gnas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di// las dang bya ba ting nge 'dzin// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang bar bya// ni dus lto 'phye shes par bya// yid 'ong gnas su 'dug nas su// bskrad cing byin gyis brlab pa'o// sbyang dang
27b1(rnying rgyud): pa bsal pa'i phyir// phye la bshags pas dag par bya// bskang ba dang ni lus ngag yod// bag chags dag pa bya phyer bshags// mtshams dang bgags rnams bsrung blun// bgegs ribs rnams la gtong ba gtong // rgyal po bzhi pag ta
27b2(rnying rgyud): yang gtad// mthang gnan par bya ba dang // khrobacu srung ba'i 'khor la bkram// ma dag pa ni mtshams gcad phyir// dam gri mnan cid blo byang gdags// nye ba'i bsnyen pa bya ba yang // dkyil 'khor rab tu gru bzhir gyi// bdud rtsirnam paSha b+h+yaH
27b3(rnying rgyud): nas// ra dmang gyi chag chag gdab// ras b+ha la pad+ma'i sbal ma dang // ba su ta yaM rgyu ma dang // dam tshig srud pa gsum d+hil lam// ye shes theg srung chen pa y-i sa// rdo rje grags dang ldan byas nas// mkhas ldan chen po ya
27b4(rnying rgyud): ma gyis// rdoH tog yang gdab par byar// ti 'dzin par chad sbyin len yang // gzugs brtan rdul tshon dmi tshig sa// dbyer dam tshig tshul shas bya// shar gyi dkyil 'khor d+hang dun// rdzas thams cad spangs la btA
27b5(rnying rgyud): nam zad pa'i tshogs mchog ste// nub tu lab sam spyor ldan la// byung du rgyam chag bsngal ba \u0f7f// de nas 'bru bstan byab yang // ma 'das pa dang bkra b.raH// 'dras pa rnams la dam tshig bstan// de kyang zag seMs nga bab//
27b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi zlos la gdab pa yang // zhe rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod la// zhi ba'i tshon shar nu gnas// rgyas pa lhol dbang ni nug/ byang du drag po lhun 'grub dbus// sa chu me drung chu dusaH// zhi ba'i cha lugs can dang bcas// khro bo drar khrod rdzas kyis
27b7(rnying rgyud): brgyan// de nas sgrub pa brtsam pa yang // de khro'i phrin las gzhung bzang la// sgrol sbyor nang gi dmathas dang // phyi la rdzas su bya ba yang // sman gyi kha tshang byung nas// sgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe// rab tu bsgom nas bslab par bya// gis ga
28a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'drang kyi chen pa lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin pa ma zung ba'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa'i la'u skye bcad pa'o// / de nas bcomaldan 'das kyis bsgrub par bya ba sman phyin pa'ang dag gsungs da
28a2(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs pa'i// rigs 'dzin rnams kyis rab zhus pa// nang gi rtsa ba bdud ci ste// de ni sgrol dang sbyor las byung // phyi yi tsa bstan nyid de// ji ltar gnas pa bshad du gsol// drang srong rnams la kun bzang gis// nges par rab tu gsu
28a3(rnying rgyud): ni// bcud kyi dam pa sman gyi mchog/ khyed la bshad kyis leg par nyon// de yang thugs rje'i byin brlabs las// 'byung ba bzhi las skyes pa'i sprin// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // sman rnams ma lus byed pa'o// de bzhin srog chags thams cad kur/
28a4(rnying rgyud): rnams kun la spyod pa ste// 'chi gsos rkyen dang ngan gsos sngan// de phyir bdud rtsi sman gyi mchog/ sems can sangs rgyas sgrub pa'i rdzas// nal 'byor dngos grub thob par byed// rgya yi bcud la kun spod bzhin// de bzhin 'byung lnga phran gyi bcud// ror
28a5(rnying rgyud): mthu ldan par grub// thams cad srid pas chags pa'o// de dag kun gyi yon tan yang // rtsa ba brgyad ldan ro dang mdog/ mthu dang las dang rang bzhin dang // nus pa du mar ldan pa yin// ldan gyi rgyal por rnams ldan// lha rdzas dge ba a rur// rigs
28a6(rnying rgyud): rnam pa bdun ldan pa// tshangs pa kun 'gro chen pos bsgrubs// shar lho nung byang brag phug nang // yum bzhi'i rak+ta zags pa ni// sman gyi rgyal po brag zhun mchog/ drang srong nabs so ljang sngon bsgrubs// srid pa chags pa'i nyi zla'i chu// stang bu rgun
28a7(rnying rgyud): rnam pa gnyis// rdo ni tsar ka yis bsgrubs// de nas drang srong bdud rtsir 'brus// Sha nas thigs gnyis lung ba dang // ram nye ba dang nye shing ba// drang srong na bla so byas kyis bslabs// de nas drang srong drag sha s+dza// lha chen khros pa'i lug mig pa/
28b1(rnying rgyud): kalas /
28b2(rnying rgyud): srong tha skyar bu yis bsrubs// de nas kyi yi lha man// nakya zag pa'i rtsa ba de// drang srong chen po lhas skyabs bsgrubs// rgyal bu don grub sra gdung las// thub pazag rje dang // drang srong rgyun shes kyang nyid bslabs// de nas lha yi lag pa ldang //
28b3(rnying rgyud): dbang po lag pa zhes bya ba// drang srong g.yon phyogs lce yang bsgrubs// pud+d+ha'i na pa a shwa ka/ drang srong thad la gnas yang bsgrubs// nya hu lug mig chen po yang // drang srong me bzhi 'jug gis baM sgrub// tsa tra ka dngal ba'i rting // gtso ba stong de na
28b4(rnying rgyud): drang srong rkang gnyis spyod yang bsgrubs// bud med ser mo ban glang can// me tog ha dmar klad pa nams// drang srong ka yan yis bsgrubs// ha lce ki ya de pa dang // lte ba u du mA ra yang // drang srong shing khyer chen pos bskabs// srid pa'i bdag po'i
28b5(rnying rgyud): nal bu'i lce// drang srong ldang sngon bu yis bsgrubs// me tog sla lo kri la kril ni// drang srong nyi ma'i bu yis bsgrubs// rtsa ba ma hA mgon srig/ do ba zla ba'i bu yis bsgrubs// dung dang 'brug rus rtsal sogs// rin po che dang gau te sha na bslabs//
28b6(rnying rgyud): rgya mtsho chu la sogs pa rnams// glu yi drang srong 'jog pos bsgrubs// 'di dag ston pa'i thugs rje yis// sa steng khyab par skyes pa yis// tha mal sman du sbyar ba yang // nad ni bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi sel// bcud len sman du bsgrub pa yis// tshe yi/
28b7(rnying rgyud): dngos grub thob par byed// yon tan brjod las 'das pa yang // sman rnams kun las byung ba'o// de bzhin skye bo rnam par spyod// thams cad bdud rtsi chen po lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ sman sgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //
28b8(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi chen po phye ma sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// de nas gzugs brtan dkyil 'khor yang // thig bzhi btob pas le'u tshe dgu// 'khor lo brgyad dang pad+ma brkyang // sgo dang sgo khyud ldan par bya// de la yig 'thu gsal bkod nas/
29a1(rnying rgyud): rang sngags srog dang ldan par bya// rdzogs pa namatshams brgya dbus su yang // b+han+ta dgra sbyar rab tubya// ting 'dzin gas ma las byung ba 'i// dam parigs brgya bsgom par \u0f7f// spyan dang phyag 'tshal mdzad pa
29a2(rnying rgyud): 'bul// bstod nas 'dzab bzlas dngos gru bablang // rgyal 'ju 'dul rdzogs rim bsdu// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM shU n+yatA dz+nyAn badz+ra swa thA wa At+ma ko&ta/ oMtrA~M mahA r+thas+t+wa~M thA pra yAH ko&haM/
29a3(rnying rgyud): tA A/ e maN+Da la e/ yaM karma yaM/ baM mA ma ki rI baM/ suM su me ru suM/ laM ga r+b+he la/ raM dzA la raM/ b+h+r-i bi shwa bi shud+het+te/ paM pad+ma maN+Da la paM/ ma sAr+tha maN+Da la maM/ a tsad+d+ha maN+Da la a/ hUM badz+ra dzAM ga mAM d+hA tI shwa rI/ i na / dwe Sha /
29a4(rnying rgyud): rat+nadzA ka/ mAM mo ha ti/ e A ro l-i kaM/ b+h+r-i rA ga ti/ ha pradz+nye d+h+r-ika/ trAM badz+ra ti/ n+yA hai rAHya/ hUM lA s+yai sa mA maM stAM/ traM A gan+d+ha ya/ traM mA li sa ma ya stAM/ br-ih+Na hUM badrI ba dang/ ts+li Sh+TI kau&ti/ kyaiH pai Natri/ ai nI ti rA ga Na mi/
29a5(rnying rgyud): dzad+ha be pra be sha/ b+h+r-i ni sA da~M b+hU ya/ hUM puSh+pe swA be sha/ sarAdz+dza ya/ bidI pA su gi rI/ mr-i shrI a~M dA gA ya/ ho gad+d+hoHd+hiho/ oM mu ne kr-iswA hA/ oM mr-i nitrUM swAhA/ oM mu ne sruM swAd+d+he/ oM mr-i ne dr-i swA hA/ oM mA na~M k+Shi swAr+tha/ oM mu ne ye swA hA/ hUM thA 'adz+ra \u0f7ftatAM/ a
29a6(rnying rgyud): b+had+hA sa mat+ta A/ pU ya mAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ oM badz+ra d+ha ro ma hA kro tI shwa d+hi dz+wa la naM hU~M phaT/ oM big+h+nAM ta kr-ita phaT/ oM rat+na d+ha ra ma hA boSh+Ti shwa rI dr-i la ni hU~M phaT/ oM bad+yAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ oM padz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro tri shwa rI dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ bruM pradz+nyAn+ta gr-i ta phaT/ hU~M karma d+ha ra ma hA krot+ta
29a7(rnying rgyud): la ni hU~MT/ thod pa mtshan ldan nang du ni// dkra shis dus phral khog po'i nang // de mi nang du gtso bo lnga// rgyal po lta bur rab tu che// skyed lnga'i 'bras bu dam pa lnga// blon pos bur gnas pa la// dri zhis bcung ldan kun skyobs pa// mang po 'dul
29b1(rnying rgyud): bas maT byin ldan// yang na rtsa ba rnam pa brgyad// phye dang nang du sbyar ba yin// phye yi dbang po rnam pa lnga// sha lpa dag dang sbyar ba dang // da ye 'brang du ba ba yang // nang gi dbang po rnam pa lnga// shing thug la sogs rnam pa lnga// kyai yi brgyad du byu
29b2(rnying rgyud): dang // dri ni chen po sbyor ba dag/ rnam pa lnga yang shes par bya// yang na rgyal po dri lnga yang // de yi skyabs su sbyar ba'o// de bzhin a ka ru la sogs// spos lnga dag dang sbyar ba dang // gser dngul la sogs rin chen lnga// yon tan dpag tu med
29b3(rnying rgyud): dang // sna tshogs ra sa ya na'i rdzas// ma lus lus pa med par bsags// rigs mthun dar gyis b+han+ta dgab// yang na gnod sbyin nor rdzas bcings// de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi ni// dkyil 'khor rnam pa gcig tu na// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus
29b4(rnying rgyud): dag tu// rigs lnga ling tshe dgra la bzhugs// rang sems bar dor yi ge hUM// gsung gi cho gar rab gnas nas// pha ma'i tshe shas rdo rje stsogs// thugs kyi cho ga chen por gnas// chen po lnga las skur grub pas// yongs su rdzogs par yang
29b5(rnying rgyud): dgagasal// oM badz+ra ak+Sho b+hu hUM/ badz+ra d+hatrI shwa rI hUM/ oM bud+d+ha bai ro tsa na a~M// bud+d+ha lo tsa nA oM// badz+ra ratrA sa~M b+ha batraM/ badz+ra rat+na sa~M gi tratraM/ badz+ra pad+ma a mi taSh+Tha hri/ badz+ra ban+d+ha ra badz+ri/ badz+ra a mo g+ha sid+hi hrI/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya tA rA ha/ bde gshes
29b6(rnying rgyud): rdorje rin chen dang // pad+ma las de rigs lngar bcas// dbyings phyug spyan dang mA ma kI// gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma dang // rigs lnga yab yum 'di dag kyang // 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed// hU~M badz+ra satwa hUM/ badz+ra lA s+ye hUM/ badz+ra rAdzahUM/
29b7(rnying rgyud): badz+ri d+ha be hUM/ badz+ra rA ga hUM/ badz+ra aM ku sha ya hUM/ badz+ra mA d+hu hUM/ badz+ra ti sha tA ra hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje rgyal po lcags kyu 'dren// rdo rje chags pa mda' gzhu 'gengs// rdo rje legs pa se gol dkrol// sgeg mo 'gying bag
30a1(rnying rgyud): rnas mas// lugs rgyas dang sprul// shAng kyi gyung pa rdzabs lags// gas pa rnam par chags// bdas / bar bya 'a/ brda stan/ rdzun/ du na/ banaH/
30a2(rnying rgyud): b+h+rUM/ badz+rad d+ha ne d+hatrAM/ rdo rje rin chen nor bu 'dzin// rdo rje gzi 'arji nyi ma bsnams// rdo rje rgyal mtshan rin chen tog/ rdo rje bzhad pa so 'phreng bgrangs// phreng ba ma dang me tog ma// zhags pa ma dang rin chen spyan// rin chen rigs kyi sems
30a3(rnying rgyud): dpa' ste// lho ya~M rtsibs bzhi dag la gnas// badz+ra d+ha ma tri/ badz+ra gIr ti tri/ badz+ra tik+Sh+Na tri/ badz+ra A lo ka tri/ badz+ra tsag rbi/ badz+ra s+phoT hrI/ badz+ra b+haShAdz+riM/ badz+ra rA gad ti hri/ rdorje cho swa ni padz+ra 'dzin// rdo rje rnon po ral gri bsdams/
30a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo 'khor lo bskor// rdo rje smra ba lce yang bsdams// pi wang ma dang mar me ma// lcags sgrog ma dang gsal bkram// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la// parba rigs kyi sems dpa' gnas// badz+ra karma ha/ badz+ra nir tihri
30a5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra rak+Sha ha/ badz+ra gan+d+he a/ badz+ra yak+ka ha/ badz+ra g+haN+Te ha/ badz+ra san d+hi ha/ badz+ra da ti ha/ rdo rje las ni rgya gram bsdams// rdo rje bsrung bgo cha 'dzin// rdo rje gnod sbyin mche ba 'chang // rdo rje khu tshur khu tshur nyid// gar mkhan ma deng dri chab
30a6(rnying rgyud): ya/ dril 'khrol rdo rje 'bebs ma ste// las kyi rigs kyi sems dpa' rnams// byad phyogs rtsibs bzhi dag la gnas// sems dpa' sems ma bcu drug ni// mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis yin// thabs shes dbu rgyan rigs lngani
30a7(rnying rgyud): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cung gnas// badz+ra Ar+ya te ting ngo / badz+ra a mra khe d+haM/ badz+ra lo ka baM/ badz+ra b+hasmai pa la yab tu ho/ lcags kyu shar la zhags pa lho// lugs sgrog nub la dril bu byang // sgo bzhi dag la rab tu gnas// rdo rje dbyings
30b1(rnying rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor ro// chu yi dbang ni bla mas bskur// lam du rang nyid dbang blang ba// bum dbang ye shes rnam pa lnga// zab mo'i dbang gsum sku gsung thugs// oM ma hA shwA n+ya ta badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA A dan+ta tron badz+ra swa b+hA wa A
30b2(rnying rgyud): ko&haM/ oM ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA pra t+ya bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA kr-itA nuSh+TA na dz+nyA na badz+ra swab+hA wa At+ma ko&ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ka&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma
30b3(rnying rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ 'og min chos dbyings pho brang nas// rgyal ba gang bzhugs 'khor dang bcas// bla med lha dang lha mo yi// grub pa'i phye na rlab bsam mi khyab// sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad// de bzhin
30b4(rnying rgyud): sbrul sku thub drug dang // mthu chen khro bo khro mor bcas// bde ba chen pos yongs brgyan te// rdo rje sems gtso mdzes mdzad ma// brtse phyir gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// e h+ye hi ma hA b+ha ga wAn/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka dr-i sha ho/ sa ma ya
30b5(rnying rgyud): sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dpa' bo chen po mthu ldan pa// bdag la byin gyis brlabs mdzad cing // bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams// grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol// chos sku nam mkha' bzhin du dbyed med kyang // gzugs sku 'ja'
30b6(rnying rgyud): tshon bzhin du so sor gsal// thabs dang shes rab mchog la mnga' brnyes pa'i// rigs lha bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// mdzes pa'i sku mchog sems can sgrol la mkhas// ngo mtshar pho brang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
30b7(rnying rgyud): shes rab thabs kyis gtso la mnyes mdzad ma// rigs kyi yum gyur rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bsod nams tshogs chen yongs su rdzogs pa la// 'gro zug 'grob ma lus smin bya'i phyir// dpe byad mtshan gyis yongs su brgyan
31a1(rnying rgyud): pa yi// sems dpa' sems ma'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// yid chos rnam dag kun bzang yab yum dang // 'gro na rdzogs mdzad sprul snga thub pa la// rab tu dngas pas phyag 'tshal lo// 'jigs tshul
31a2(rnying rgyud): rngam pa'i khyad par gyis// gdug byed thal bar rlog mdzad pa// bdud bzhi dpung bcas 'joms byed pa// sgo ba yang yum brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pra ho// pra hi ts+tsha ho// a pa la ho// rang byung gdod nas dag pa yi// lus
31a3(rnying rgyud): khams bdud rtsi chen po 'dis// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa bzhes// snang stong rdo rje chos dbyings las// ye shes sgyu ma'i sku mnga' ba// rgyal ba sangs rgyas sras dang bca// rab tu dang
31a4(rnying rgyud): bstod phyag 'tshal// chos nyid mnyam pa'i ngo bo la// ma rtogs rtog pa bsal bar bya// de nas bzlas pa b+ha ba yang // rdo rje bzlas par yang dag bshad// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ra sa ya na ta na dz+nyA na gu ya sid+d+hi hUM hrIH/
31a5(rnying rgyud): bde chen dkyil 'khor nas// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la// thub drug kun bzang yab yum dang // gshin rje'i gshed po yab yum las// sgra yi dam pa rigs brgya spro// don mdzad sman la rab tu thim// mtshan pa longs spyod
31a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor nas// sdang ba mtha' yas gos dkar mo// spyan ras gzigs dang klu ma dang // kun tu bzang po mar me ma// rta mgrin yab yum bcas pa la// gsung gi dam pa rigs brgya sgo/ snying ga chos kyi dkyil 'khor nas
31a7(rnying rgyud): mi 'askyod rdo rje sems dpa' yum// sa yi snying po sgeg mo dang // byams pa spos ma byang chub sems// shes rab mthar byed yab yum la// thugs kyi dam pa rigs brgya spro// lte ba sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// rin chen 'byung ldan
31b1(rnying rgyud): ya sum la// nam mkha' snang bzung ba sa// zlabs la gtag sa dang brdzus// man tan dam pa rigs pargyas// don mdzad skang 'dus san latham// gsang ba'am drung dkrol 'bar nas// don zlab phral ma skal 'brel// phyagan
31b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gar mkhan ma// 'jam dpal dri cha bsgo bar bcas// las kyi dam pa rigs brgya las// gsang sngags rlung gi rtul 'gro// snod kyi ban+d+ha yum gyi mkha'// bcud kyi sman nyid lhar gsal bas// rjo badz+ra dam pa rigs 'argyar gnas/
31b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis su rdza brgyad stong zhes bya// don dam spros med thig le las// kun bzang dngos grub byung bar bya// oM a mr-i ta sid+d+hi ha ha kan/ rnam smin 'bras bu rig 'dzin 'gyur// nyi zla lta bu'i tshe yang 'dzin// bdag nyid kun bzang yab yum gyi/
31b4(rnying rgyud): gnas lnga'i rigs ni lnga brgya dang // snod bcud dam rdzas lhar gnas pa'i// rigs lnga'i rigs ni lnga brgya nyid// stong la 'dzab kyis bzhu btul nas// bdud rtsi sbrul skur sangs rgyas so// zhes gsungs so// thams cad bdud rtsi chen
31b5(rnying rgyud): lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ dam pa rigs brgya'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi rigs lngar sangs rgyas pa 'di gsungs so// mi shigs mdzod ldan ka pA la// dbus su ya
31b6(rnying rgyud): dag gzhag par bya// sku gsum lhan grub ka pA la// shar gyi zhing khams rdo rje'i rigs// yid bzhin gter ldan ka pA la// lho nas 'byor ba rgyas par byed// khams gsum dbang sdud ka pA la// nub na mtha' yas bsod nams spyad// tshe
31b7(rnying rgyud): 'phral rtags 'byin ka pA la// byang na las dab rdzogs pa ni// gzugs brtan dkyil 'khor g.yas dag tu// sdod bsdus dbang du bsdu bar bya'o// dbus su byang sems dri chen sharang // mAM sa lho la rak+ta nub// dri chu byang ste byang chub sems// lu
32a1(rnying rgyud): khams bdud ci chen por gnas// rang bzhin gsum las bdag nyid lha// bdi chen mo la longs spyod AH// chos mdzad d+ha yig sprul par sa// gsang bar yi ge thA gnas te// rlung lnga 'byung ba'i 'gro 'duni// rten
32a2(rnying rgyud): mdzad gsung gi mdzod pa sgo// skad 'dus spyan la thim pa ni// de nyid rgyal ba rigs lnga'i sku// gsung dang phyag mtshan srung rdzogs gsal// rang rig cha shos chen po lnga// de nas 'phyo 'ang bya ba yang // spyir niH pa'i gsang sngags mcho//
32a3(rnying rgyud): hUMs+yA)/ dz+nyA na badz+rI a mr-ita sa ma ya swAH/ de nas spyong ba byas pa yis// byang chub sems ni snang ba bya// oM AHr+g+haM badz+res twad+h+waM/ sarba me'u shrad+d+he a mr-i ta su ba ma N+Da mo d+hI ts+tshiHtrA~M/ a b+hi d+hA dA/ r-i tI sa mA la ste/ lho dra dpa ltas l-I byang /
32a4(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs bsgral ba'i sha rnams nyid// oM AHhUM datrA saM b+ha ba ma hA mAM sa sa ma ya/ ma hA sa mA ya dA go&haM/ rat+na ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ nub nas pad+ma rak+ta la// snang ba mtha' yas sngags kyis sbyang // oM saHhUM pad+me a mi ta b+he/ rak+ta mU la a mr-it+ta/ rAg
32a5(rnying rgyud): ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ byang nas dri chu'i snod blang la// don yod grub pa rta mchog sngags// oM AHhU~M a mo g+ha sid+d+hi a mr-i ta kAN+Da li/ badz+ra ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dbus sdod dri chen rnam snang gis// ltung bar bya ba gsang ba'i sngags// oM A chu bung por
32a6(rnying rgyud): ts+tsha na maN+Da lo ga a ti s+pha ra Na/ bal+lIn at+ti sta u tistA aM/ mo ha ra ti sa ma ya badz+ro rA ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ bdud rtsi rnam lda dbyin phab nas// ye shes rnam pa lnga yang gsal// de nas 'bru bcur chang rnams la// gsang ba'i sngags kyis sbyang bar bya//
32a7(rnying rgyud): oM a mata badzag dpab ta swAt+ma/ oM tan hU~M/ tititrAM/ bitas sho d+ha ya/ kro ta thA rI swAd+ha/ 'om sna tshogs spring bya zhing // de yi brgyad kyang mang ltar byung / oM sa hU~M ma mr-i ta'i thos shi la hU~M hrIH/ rin chen sna tshogs pa dbyes nas// yon tan/
32b1(rnying rgyud): dpag tu med pa 'o// oMs skyes rbapa sdus ma ta kAN+Ta ba/ chu rnams snga chags thad dpa// lan ma 'od ltar spyang bar bya// ma mA sa na pasgras mAta pa ni kAN+Da la dz+nyAn pa/ bdud rjernam pa la pa na// rlung gi lus kyi khams yin pas/
32b2(rnying rgyud): phung po lnga nyid gso mdzad cing // rigs dang ye shes 'ju 'dul bya'o// zhes gsungs so// thams cad bdud rtsi chen po lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ de nyid rigs lnga'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//
32b3(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi chos kyi sgrar sangs rgyas pa'i dgongs pa 'di gsungs so// dbus kyi pho brang chen po ru// bad+mad rtsi chen po'i snod bzhag pa// byang chub sems kyi chu bo la// 'khor 'das chos rnams 'dus pa ltar/
32b4(rnying rgyud): mdor na sangs rgyas lnga rnams ni// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la 'dus// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// ting 'dzin gsal bas lha yi sku// 'og min gnas nas spyan drangs nas// gnyis med su la gnas par bya// de nas 'dzab dgod
32b5(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa yang // gsung ni rlung gi sgra la gnas// de rgyun srog shing rnam pa gsum// ldang 'jug gnas pas sgra rnams sgrogs// oM AHhUM sarba paHa mr-i ta badz+ra satwa hUM/ mtshan don bsnyen pa rdzogs nas ni// dngos grub dag kyang gla nga
32b6(rnying rgyud): bya'o// mi bskyod rdo rje sems dpa' rjid// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la ga nas// ji snye pas ma yas bdud rtsi rnams// byang chub sems su rnam par zhu// thams cad bdud ci lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ sra
32b7(rnying rgyud): srung ba gsang chen rigs gcig gi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khrol bu la dngos grub blang ba 'di gsungs so// de nas zhi ba'i lha tshogs rnams// rigs rnams so so'i yig 'bru yang // @
33a1(rnying rgyud): kyi chen po sman la bstim// gsang ba'i sngags kyis rab tu tu'o// oM a br-i ta sar+thas ma yog n+d+haM/ badz+ras ma ya trAM/ maHsarba a mr-i ta ma hA sa? ban+d+ha/ oMsarbab shud+d+ha/ adz+rah+nA shan/ sarba sho d+ha ya/
33a2(rnying rgyud): dz+ra a mr-i ta hUM/ gsang sngags rgyal po mchog 'di yang // rab tu bzlas par bya ba nyid// de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi ni// lha tshogs mang por gnas pa kun// sangs rgyas dang ni rig ma yum// byang chub sems dpa' lha mo dang // sprul pa
33a3(rnying rgyud): sgo'adams la stod// sman pa'i che ba yod tan brjod// de mtshar chen par rab bskyed d+he// slob ma sbyin ci snying ba ga de// lus kham s+ya bad ni chen po 'di// khams dgra 'dus pa'i dngas ma nyid// dus gas sa sangs gas mchod pa dang /
33a4(rnying rgyud): ring nyid bsgom zhing bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsngags// mchog gi dngos grub sku gsum 'grub// thun mong grub chen brgyad la sogs// ma lus 'di yis 'grub pas na// dngos grub dam pa blang bar bya// sku
33a5(rnying rgyud): sku sangs rgyas mdzad pa rdzogs// longs sgra rgyal ba rigs lnga nyid// lhag pa chen po chos kyi sku// sku gsum sman nyid sangs rgyas pas// de phyir 'du 'dul dgongs pa yang // las rnams gzugs la bya bar ni// kun bzang rdo rje
33a6(rnying rgyud): sems dpas gsungs// zhes gsungs so// thams cad bdud rtsi chen po lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ sman khrol bu la dngos grub blang ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de na sa bcom ldan 'das
33a7(rnying rgyud): kyis zhi tho mtshams sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// srub pa'i gling rnams chas su zhugs// glang po'i ko bzang ba nyid// tshul khrims zhing lpags chos gos dang // stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can// de na btsir ba'i zhing lpags
33b1(rnying rgyud): la// ta kr-ita dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// ye shes snying po'i gnas bzhugs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i chos// rtsa brgyad yan lag stong sbyar ba// rtog pa'i mtshan ma sngags kyis dag/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hAn tan tu
33b2(rnying rgyud): phaT/ da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ pa tsa pa ts+tshadz+dza phaT/ rang bzhin rnam pa gsum po yang // dbyer med bdud rtsi nyid la 'khyil// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drang yang // bdud rtsi nyid la thim par gyur// sha chen la sogs bdud rtsi lnga/
33b3(rnying rgyud): rnam rtog dbyings su dag pa'o// oM AHhUM sarba par+Na a mr-i ta kuN+DA li hUM hrIHtha/ de nas btsag par bya ba ni// mtshan ma dag par byed pa ste// haM ba ya bi shud+d+he swA hA/ de nas bsre bar bya ba ni// 'dres shing shin tu bsres pa'o// a
33b4(rnying rgyud): mr-i ta mu sa la mu sa la swA hA/ de nas sbyar bar bya ba ni// rab tu dri mdag ldan par bya// ka ma la kuN+Da li hUM hrIHtha/ de nas gzhal zhing tshad brtags te// sbyin bsreg me phung sman du blug/ ha ya grI ba hUM/ parba ta kr-ita hUM/ hu lu
33b5(rnying rgyud): hu lu hrI/ kuN+Da li hrI/ de nas b+han+ta kha sbyar nas// dar gyis gril la rgyas btab de// tshon skud bcings nas bum par dril// zla gam dbang snang gnas su gzhug/ ces gsungs so// thams cad brdung rtsi chen po lnga
33b6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ btags btsag mtshams sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrub pa chen po sman pho brang bum pa'i sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// pho brang de
33b7(rnying rgyud): la byin brlabs nas// mtshams bcad bar chad med par bstan// de nas dkyil 'khor rtsigs pa ni// 'dom gang gru bzhi legs byas la// dri sna lnga yi maN+Dal la// chag chag bdud rtsis rab byugs shing // thig gis
34a1(rnying rgyud): rab tu gdab pa yang // mtshon mthan rnams la phyad/ tshon nams byin gyis brlabs nas ni// la bcad la 'khor lo bcad// rid ched babyang la na bzhing ldan// dung 'dus ca tu
34a2(rnying rgyud): yongs su bskor// de dbus pho zang bram pa'i snod// brgyad ldan dbus kyi byugs nyid// mda' dang ral gri phrar pa yang // dar dang bcas pas brgyan du bskod// klung nga gar dang skabs bcas pas// sangs kyis rab 'dor byin
34a3(rnying rgyud): dbab b+ha// bdud rtsi dbus bzhag mtha' bskor nas// phyogs bzhi nas ni yon tan brjod// ma dag pa la mtshams bcad nas// las kyi gtsor ni bsrid bshags bya// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang // rgya las byung ba'i dkyi
34a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor ni// 'byung ba lnga yi rim pa nyid// d+hu dang a ya~M dngar// bi ki b+h+rU~M las byung ba ni// gzhal yas phyi nang med pa de// dur khrod khang pa rab tu bsgom// rdorje zag chen po coM byed gdan// e sbyongs che mchog te drug
34a5(rnying rgyud): dbu ni nyi shu rtswa gcig la// dus gsum sangs kyis dbu la bzhugs// phyag ni bzhi bcurtsa gnyis la// phyag mtshan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bsdoms// yum ni dbu dgra bco brgyad phyag/ oM ma hA shrI te r+tha kA ra~M dz+wa la raM/ mahA ba~Md+d+ha
34a6(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang rigs bzhi he ru ka/ badz+ra khrag 'thung rnam pa lnga// badz+ra shrI he ka/ bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka/ rat+na shrI he ru ka/ padz+ra shrI he ru ka/ karma shrI he ru ka/ stong gsum khro bos rab bkang nas// khro boganas su yang dag bzhugs/
34a7(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra ma hA krotad+h+r-i kAR+Sha hU~M/ badz+ra me hA krot+ta ba dza ma hU~M/ badz+ra ma hA kr-i d+hi nI lad/ hU~M/ badz+ra mthA kro d+ha ya mAn ta kan+d+haM/ badz+ra ma dzAkro d+ha Ar+ya a tsil hUM/ badz+ra ma hA kro& ha ya grI bahU~M/ badz+ra ma ta kro ta a pa rang hadz+dza/ badz+ram
34b1(rnying rgyud): d+hag Na'i/ ba mar+b+ba ma tha ba ya/ bangs nam ta mkhal na/ tamathon bang po lathol ba dang // yo shes soms dpa' sa n+ya dgas na// 'ang/
34b2(rnying rgyud): nasar+b+ba hU~M/ hU~Ms ma yas hU~M/ de nas tshul bzhin dbang yang bzur// phrug sung thugs sa byin gyis brlabs// oMs tu gta mang sa b+hi ShitsitrA~M/ a~M kA la wA ma AH/ ye shes dkyil 'khor chen pa
34b3(rnying rgyud): sa kyid byings nas sun / sahA ga padan nahU~M/ as / rnamamakha' mtha' mnyam ma lus pa/ gnas
34b4(rnying rgyud): sal laH/ ri ba zhin la tshog khrim / ga ma bzhin bzhugs sugasol/ na \u0f7fsa ma ya wAn/ phying du nang dang gsang ba dang // de khon mi mtshang ba 'bral/
34b5(rnying rgyud): dang gsung rdzogs yon tan las// che ba rnams kyi sgonas pazod// dngos grab la shes gang mi de// 'dod pa'i dodan pa sgron lam gdab// ti byagasal ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'byud ma'i 'gro 'ang sa bslabar bya/
34b6(rnying rgyud): lagri pa'i rgyag sagis// rnam da pa sogs la ba // nus panas pa // da sems badrang pa'i ring men na// rnamapa ts+tsha / sa so// / 'a mangs slong rdzogs pa'i smra/ sa pa
34b7(rnying rgyud): shes kyis// zhe byang sems dge byan cing // sbrul mra'i yig 'brang bu mas// bcuganyis tshul du rnam par dag/ oMn mi ra bzhin te// sbed snang ba'i chos rnams kun// rgyas kyi skulas mag pa
35a1(rnying rgyud): skams sa grags pa phral dang sang // TIgs kyi nga ba shA // bye ba med la sum pa'i tshul// 'dzin na mags sa rgyal lanupas// sgyums nas bltam pa tshul dang skur//
35a2(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi rang bzhin te// khams gsum sems can thams can la// thugs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas// gzhon nu rol rtsed mdzad pa'i tshul// sa ni yum gyi rang bzhin te// bdor gshegs rgyal ba'i ye shes lha// thams
35a3(rnying rgyud): cad bskyed pa'i gzhi yin pas// khab tu bzhes pa'i tshul dang sbyar// rba ni rlung gi rang bzhin te// thams cad bskyod pa'i mthur ldan pas// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par bskyod// khab nas rab tu byung ba'i tshul// pa ny+dza ni chu yi rang
35a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin te// byang chub sems kyi chu chen po// thams cad rgan zhing sdum par byed// dka' thub mdzad pa'i tshul yin no// tsa ni me yi rang bzhin te// ye shes chen po'i me long gis// nyon mongs thams cad sreg byed pas/
35a5(rnying rgyud): bdud rnams btul ba'i tshul dang sbyar// a ni byang chub sems kyi dang // 'gro drug sems can thams cad kun// skye med dbyings su rnam dag pas// sangs rgyas pa'i tshul dang sbyar// mr-i ni dug gsum rtsad bcad ste// lus
35a6(rnying rgyud): drug yid gsum thams cad kun+da// sku gsung thugs su rab ldan pas// cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i tshul// ta ni 'gro ba so so la// bstan pa'i don gsung gnyis med bka'// theg pa chen po'i chos ston pas// chos
35a7(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// hrIHni thams cad dbang du sdud// thugs rje'i 'od zer thams cad kun// slar la bsdus te mi dmigs pas// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'o// tha ni tha tshig chen po ste// khams gsum sring
35b1(rnying rgyud): sa thams das// thags sa gan ladzubabs nas// zhwa dang gags pa rgya dang byud/ sbrul smras de lta don da ngas/ na ngas kyang chub sa smras sa ngan sapa nyid du gas na sam/
35b2(rnying rgyud): gnas ye shes chen po'i dang // lnga khrel bdud rtsi klong phyag 'dud// hUMsan badz+ra ma mr-i ta hrIH/ A~M las 'od byung a yis sbrel// b+h+rUM gis bdud rtsin ma dag bkyil// oM AHhUM sarba oM dr-i ta kur+tha le ts+tsha sdetra/
35b3(rnying rgyud): dang mtshan ma 'byung ba ni// byang sems 'od dang dri chen dri// mAM sa'i 'phel ba rak+ta'i sgra// dri chu'i du ba 'byung ba de// spyi 'dus lha mo'i gzugs su ston/ rtags med nyams chags bskar ba der// spogs pa
35b4(rnying rgyud): sgrub thabs bsgyur la bya// thang gcig yud tsam nyin zhag gcig/ bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig de// phyi ma'i dus la mi ltos par// tshe 'dir 'bras bu thob par byed// de nas bdud rtsi dbab pa yang // sngags
35b5(rnying rgyud): dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin dbab// oM me pra be sha ya pheM we/ de nas zla ga ma dkyil 'khor ru// klu bdag rgyal pos dbang du bya// oM AHhUM sarba bar+N+Na a mr-i ta bar+d+han+ta krita ha ya bI ba e ka dza ti hu lu hu lu A yuN+De dza ya/ de nas mtsha
35b6(rnying rgyud): don bsnyen pa dbul// sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag bzlas// oM sarba par+ya a mr-i ta mdzu shrI bya ba lo ki te hUM d+hI wa/ oM ma hA gu ya sid+d+hi hrIHwa/ de nas lha tshogs thams cad la// gus pas gsol ba gdab par bya// slob ma
35b7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'jug pa yi// sngon nas slob dpon rig pas 'jug/ gyi ni dA sa ya ni'i dbang // khrol bu bsgrub pa'i dus su bskul// nang ni bdud rtse bum pa'i dbang // gsang ba'i dgongs pa smin par byed// oM AHhU~M sarba
36a1(rnying rgyud): amr-ita/ kA la sh+yA ma d+hI \u0f7fhU~M/ gsang bathabs dang shes dbang ba // sbyong ba'i dus su bsgyur bar b+ha// dngos grub rab ni sangs rgyas te/ phyag rgya chen po mchog rdzob bo// 'du
36a2(rnying rgyud): rig 'dzin go 'phang thob// bram tshe dang mngon shes 'byung // oM AHhUM sarba paSh+Ta a mr-i ta/ a ho su kha d+harma kA ya ni/ a mr-i ta sid+d+hi hrIHskye med na ro thig le'i gdangs// rmya de dang po rten med gsung // kre 'byung gdahA yang thig les sbas//
36a3(rnying rgyud): gyi sems la yang dag gnas// sa rlung chu me nam mkha'i gnas// skye med skye mtshon so lce sbyar// sngags rnams kun gyi rtsa ba re shar// klad du che ba rgyal po 'dra// chos skus kun la khyab par gnas// bdud rtsi chen po su 'chang ba/
36a4(rnying rgyud): lnga nyid la gnas pa de// mkha' 'gro kun dang 'grogs pa dang // yon tan brjod las 'da' ba'o// thams cad ma lus bdud rtsi nyid// rang 'byung dang za dang la thim// ril por 'dzin pa'i bsam gtan yang // rjes su gzhi gnas chos skur grol
36a5(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas sems can don gyi phyir// rgyal bas gsung phyir de don bsngo// dus dang gnas skabs ma lus pa// dad la gnas pa'i bdud rtsil// rnal 'byor pa yis 'bral mi bya// chu bo rgyun gyi ting 'dzin gnas// lus dang grib ma ji lta bar/
36a6(rnying rgyud): 'byor lus khams bdud rtsis sbyang // zhes gsungs so// thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ sgrub pa po sman phye ma dngos kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis blta ba bdud rtsi chen
36a7(rnying rgyud): po la bzla ba 'di gsungs so// lus kyi khams dgu 'dus pa yi// bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin yang // spros med chos skur gnas pa las// ma rtogs 'gro ba rnams su shar// rtogs na rdzogs sangs rgyas pa rnams// gzhi lam 'bras bu'i bdud rtsil/
36b1(rnying rgyud): zhig rnam par gang gis 'byed// nam mkha'i rang gis 'byung ba la// 'byung bar phye yang nam mkhar gcig/ rang bzhin chos sku chen po yin// rnal 'byor don du gnyer ba rnams// bdud rtsi lnga la rlung sems 'dus// nyams ni sems la 'char bar byed// sngags kyang ngag tu 'dra lngal
36b2(rnying rgyud): gad ni lus la rig lngar 'byung // mthong snang yul 'di bdud rtsi lnga// bag chags rmi lam rmi ba rnams// bdud rtsi lnga ni dang po'i nyams// bar du rigs lnga longs spyod rdzogs// tha ma ye shes rnam pa lnga// khams kyi 'dug lugs rnam gsum gyis// dang po thang dang tha ma yin// noms shigan rnal
36b3(rnying rgyud): 'byor dbang phyug rnams// zhes gsungs so// thams cad bdud rtsi chen po lha'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ mjug blta ba thig le chen por la bzla ba'i le'u lte bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnams kyis/ bdud na chen pos mchod nas/ 'di skad ces
36b4(rnying rgyud): gsol ba 'debs shing bsngag pa chen po brjod do// blta bas thag bcad rgya mtsho zab// de phyir dngos por thag bcad pas// tha mar la bzla'o mtshar che// gsang ba chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// spyod pas la dor dam tshig bsungs// de phyir dam tshig dang por gsungs// bar du sgrol dang sbyor ba yis//
36b5(rnying rgyud): bdag gzhan stod pa khyod phyag 'tshal// bsgrub pas nyams su blangs pa ni// bsnyen pa phun sum tshogs pa nas// sa cho ga bshags pa mtshams rnams bcad// nye bsnyen dkyil 'khor sta gon rdzas// bsreb stan las bskos gdab pa dang // rgyan btags phrin las gzung bsrung ba// nang gi
36b6(rnying rgyud): rdzas sbyor sgrol dang // phyi yi dam rdzas ni sman btsal// bsgrub pa khrol bu rnam pa gsum// rigs brgya rigs gcig rig lngang bsgrub// phye ma btagra btsag zhi khro spel// sgrub chen che mchog bum pa'i lung // sgrub pa nyams len khyod phyag 'tshal// zhes rjes su yi rangs nas/ ston 'khor chos kyi
36b7(rnying rgyud): ma med pa'i nga du thim mo// thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ rjes su yi rangs pa'i le'u steb cu bdun pa'o// bdud rtsi gsung gi rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar kyi daN+Di ta ba~M ma la mi tra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba gnya gra dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur ro//
37a1(rnying rgyud): rgya ga da dadu/ amr-itA ma dz+nyAH/ bat+taSh+TAnA ma/ bdag du/ bdad kyi bdab can pa chud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zas pa'i dus gcigan/ @
37a2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ga sung thugs rdo rje/ yon tan phrini las ma lus lus pa med pa'i bdag nyid/ khams gsum pa'i sems can gyi de khon nyid dang dbyer med pa/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje/ rdo rje nying
37a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la/ srid gsum pa'i bud med dang byed med pa'i nga stong po// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi rol pa chen po la yang dag par bzhugs pa/ de nyid kyi sras rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa yum dang bcas pa dang / de dag gi klas gyi dang
37a4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' yab dang yum dang ldan pa dang / khams gsum pa'i rigs drug 'dul ba'i ston par gyur pa skul pa'i sku thub pa chen po drug kyang mchod rten chen po brgyad kyi mdzad pa spro ba dang / gdug pa 'dul ba'i khro bo ya ba yum dang bcas pa
37a5(rnying rgyud): bzhugs so// sangs rgyas dang / yul dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / gzungs ma dang / sprul pa dang / khro bo dang / rig mar bcas pa rnams kyang / lus kyi khams dku 'dus pa'i dngos mchen po/ bdud rtsi chen po
37a6(rnying rgyud): gsangab bas kyang ches gsang ba/ yang gsang rmad du byung ba/ snying po las kyang snying po/ 'khor ba bdud kyi dug can la/ mya ngan 'das pa mgon po ye shes kyi rtsi gtong bar byed pa'i bdag nyid/ lus kyi khams bdud rtsi chen po'i dgongs pa
37a7(rnying rgyud): la tha mi dad par spyod pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bde ba chen pos khyab pa de nyid ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul mdzad pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so//
37b1(rnying rgyud): rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul mdzad pa ni/ gnas myong ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang / byin gyis brlab pa'i rdzu 'phrul mdzad do// chos gnang ba'i tshe 'phrul ni/ 'khor sdur pa dang / chos rnams spang bar bskul ba ma dzang ngo // de nas 'khor gyi nang nas rdon chos byas/
37b2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsar seng ge'i 'gro stangs kyis dong nas/ zhabs spyi bor bzhag ste glang po che'i lha spangs kyis bltas nas/ khams gsum gyi ston pa 'khor 'das kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces nus so// ho ma lus srung skar nam mkha' lte bu'i sku/
37b3(rnying rgyud): ma'i snying po bzhin du rab gsal ba// stong nyid shes rab thabs kyi snying rje can// stong nyid snying rje'i snying po khyod bzhengs la// lus khams bdud rtsi'i lus la ji ltar gnas// bgrod byed gom pa lam du ji ltar 'dud// bdag gzhan dngos slo ba dang
37b4(rnying rgyud): gi 'bras bu gang // 'gro la phan phyir khyod kyis de ltar gsungs// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad par zhal gyis bzhes pa 'di gsungs so// ye nas bdud rtsi lus gnas gzhi// de nyid nyams len bkod zhal ma//
37b5(rnying rgyud): mthar phyin 'bras bu nyid// lus la rten 'brel rab bsdigs nas// tshad mas gtan la phab nas ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'da' bya'i phyir// dgongs pa brda' yis rab bshad pas// 'gro ba'i don du// rjes longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
37b6(rnying rgyud): pa brdas bshad do// bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi dang skyeng bslang pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ gzhi dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs 'di 'gro ba'itshe
37b7(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// kye ho'akhor 'das dbyer med chen po'adi// bcing med grol med rig pa nyid// thams cad kun bsang sdeng shar// dbyer med bdud kyi chen por gnas// mjig las dang nyon mongs kyis// khams gsum 'khor bar snang
38a1(rnying rgyud): thog mtha ma med dus na// snod brgyad 'khor ba 'khrul par snang // ma rig pa nyid ye shes la// las nyid bde bar rang snang bas// ye shes mnga' bdag rigs pa nyid// dus gsum sangs rgyas mas pa yin/
38a2(rnying rgyud): sems can lus la bdud rtsi gnas// rang byung bdud rtsi chen po ni// byang chub sems ni rgyu yi rtsa// bcu tshan gsus gyi steng du gnyis// de ni gnyis 'dus kun bzang gzugs// don dam gzugs kyi bdag nyid do// de yi gtso bo gsum gsum ni//
38a3(rnying rgyud): shes rab ting 'dzin la la nA// thabs kyi rang bzhin ra sa nA// de kho na nyid gnyis med gzugs// a ba d+hU tI chos 'byung gnas// dkyil 'khor de la rab gnas pa// mi bskyod rgyu ba la la nA// rak+ta N+ya ba ra sa nA// a ba d+hU tI byang sems rgyu/
38a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'das chos rnams thams cad ni// phra mo phra mo'i rang bzhin can// de ni la la nA zhes bya// chos rnams thams cad brjod du med// de yi rang bzhin ras nA// dbyer med pa yi bdag nyid ni// a ba d+hU ti zhes bya'o// rtsa ni sum cu rtsa
38a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi// gnas dang de bzhin ming bstan pa// rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong na// de yi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir// ming ni a b+he da zhes so// rkang pa dag gi byin pa na// nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin phyir// de med su k+Sha ma rU pA//
38a6(rnying rgyud): brla ni g.yon pa dag na yang // 'dod pa lnga yi bdag nyid phyir// bdud rtsi di bya rgyu zhing gnas// gsang ba'i g.yon na de kho na// dmigs pa'i shes rab byed pa'i phyir// lus khams bA mA ru zhes so// lte ba phyag rgya chen po dang //
38a7(rnying rgyud): mthun dag gis bA mi nI// snying ga lte ba'i g.yon pa na// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// kha sbyar gzugs phyir kur+m+ma dzA// nu ma g.yon na gnas pa ni// bde chen sgom pa b+hA ba kI// mgrin pa g.yon na gnas pa ni// dri ma med byed sha
38b1(rnying rgyud): 3// lag mthi la g.yon na dang bar phyogs// dus byed pa ni Tha'o// ma ma chu dag la gnas pa pang // rga can 'babs pa'i gyur// mkhur rjes g.yanan gnas pan// rnam par bltab sa tan// mig g.yon padab rgya ma na/
38b2(rnying rgyud): 'bru bdag gis san ni// rna ba g.yon pa'i rtsan yang // rlung rab shes pa shA taH// rngan padag ni g.yon pan// maskyes phyir ni uSh+TaN+Da'o// sdig drug rdzo 'dzin pa'o// mis dang dga' byang la la thA/ spyi basmos pa dang bram phyir/
38b3(rnying rgyud): bad+hU tI zhes bya gnas// spyi bo'i gtsug ni g.yas pa na// myang bas dga' phyir ra sa nA// blta ba dag na gnas pa dang // sku sogs bdag gi sra ba tsA// ldan pa g.yas na mi bskyod pa// bdag nyid kr-iSh+Na pat+ta'o// rna ba g.yas pa'i rtsu ba na/
38b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad rjes 'gro sa man+ta// mig g.yas byed pa'i bdag nyid du// gyur phyir he tu dA yi kA// mkhur chos g.yas na dpa' bo yi// dga' ba bral ba'i yo bA'o// ya ma chu dag la gnas pa yang // thams cad 'gro ma b+he ra NAM// mgrin pag yas
38b5(rnying rgyud): nathog ma yi// rang bzhin med phyir sit+t+ra'o// 'bru mthi la ga yas sgeg tshogs pa yi// de byed phyir na pA ba 'aM// nu ma g.yas na lus 'bral ster// thob byed su ma n+ta gnas so// snying ga'i g.yas na sku gsung thugs// bdag nyid yin phyir dza driH//
38b6(rnying rgyud): g.yas na 'dod pas ni// dga' ba'i phyir na kA mi nI// chos 'byung g.yas na sangs rgyas rnams// gnas pa'i phyir na ge hA'o// brla ga yas thams cad bde chen pos// / khyab byed tsaN+Da At+ma'o// byin pa g.yas na bgegs rnams ni/
38b7(rnying rgyud): med byed ka t+ya la ni'o// mthe bong g.yas na sreg bsngal rnams// mi 'jug ma d+hA ra~M ka// de ltar rtsani sum cu gnyis// lus gnas lugs dang lugs las bzlog/ rtsa ni de dag rnal 'byor pa'i// dngam pa yongs su gyur pa'o// lus
39a1(rnying rgyud): la stsogs pa rang bzhin bcings// bde ba chen pos yongs su 'gyur// khams kyi bdag nyid rgyub la// chos grangs bzhin du phur rabs btab// dur khrod mkha' 'gro'i mthu ru 'gyur// grangs bzhin bde ba bsgoms
39a2(rnying rgyud): pas ni// tsaN+Da lI yi gnas brtags pa// bde ba 'dzin pa'i bsgom du 'gyur/ a la sogs pa'i A li dang // ka la sogs pa'i kA li dang // rdo rje dang ni pad+ma dang // thabs dang de ni shes rab dang // bde chen longs spyod chos dang sprul// dpa'
39a3(rnying rgyud): po'i dga' ba mchog tu dga'// bral lo lhan cig skyes pa dang // sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams so// e baM ma yA'i yi ge bzhi// oM ni chos kyi 'byung gnas dang // stong pa nyid dang dga' ba dang // lha mo sangs rgyas spyan ma'o// baM ni chu dang /
39a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma med// mchog tu dga' ba ma ma kI// man ma dang smon pa med// dpa' bo dga' ba gos dkar mo// lha rlung mngon par 'dus mthus// lhan cig skyes dga' sgrol ma yin// lte ba sprul ba'i dkyil 'khor na// 'dab mchog su rtsa bzhi la//
39a5(rnying rgyud): li sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// lugs dang lugs las bzlog pas na// yi ge drug cu rtsa bzhi'o// pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa ste// ri rire dka la stsogs pa bzhi// stong pa bcu drug yi ge ni// rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas pa// rang gi po yongs gyur pas// 'dab mjug cu
39a6(rnying rgyud): rtsabazhi pa'i// rnam pa chos kyi 'byung gnas 'khor// snying ga chos kyi dkyil 'khor na// bdang brgyad yi ge brgyad gnas pa// a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya// sha yi sde tshan dang po rnams// 'byung ba 'byung ba las gyur pa// phra mo la ni phra mo'i gzugs// pad+ma 'dab mang rgyad
39a7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// mgrin pa longs spyod dkyil 'khor na// 'dab ma bcu drug gnas pa la// A li bcu drug gnas pa de// stong pa bcu drug rnam par gnas// lo yang bcu drug lon pa yi// shes rab longs spyod rnam pa'o// de byir 'dab ma bcu drug pa/
39b1(rnying rgyud): langs su dkyil la gar nas gyur// slo bo bdang can pa yas// dkyil la kho das ma su mduganyis// thAs tha chen pong mtshan rnams ni// rnam drug 'angadab na lung chu gnyis// 'di ha dang po bzhi byu nga // skad cig ma yang rnam pa' de// nan pa
39b2(rnying rgyud): rnam par smin// rnam par 'joms dang rnam mtshan ni// nyon mongs rnams la bden pa bzhi// sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung dang // lam dang 'gog pa'i bden pa yang // chu yi theg pa rnams la snang // de kho na nyid bzhir sdang ba// ba gi sngags lha dang ye shes
39b3(rnying rgyud): kho na nyid bzhir snang ba yang // gsang sngags phyi ba thabs rgyud la// dga' ba bzhi ru snang ba ni// dga' ba mchog tu dga' ba dang // dpa' bo dga' ba lhan cig skyes// ma hA a nu dag la snang // sde ba bzhi tshwa snang ba ni// gnas brtan pa yi sde pa dang // thams
39b4(rnying rgyud): cad yod par smra ba dang // legs dpon pa yi bde ba dang // dge 'dun phab chen sde pa'o// de ltar skad cig dang ni bde ba dang // de kho na nyid bye brag dang // sde ba'i dngos po chung rnga dang // 'bring dang chen po la sogs pa'i// bye brag gnas bzhir rnam par gan
39b5(rnying rgyud): ba g.yon la nyi ma g.yas// A li pra mo kA li rags// saM kA n+ti yang bcu drug ni// me Sha dang ni pr-iSha dang // mi thu na dang kar ka dang // sid ta dang ni kaD+hA dang // tu 'dang ni pro rmo dang // d+ha TA dang ni ma ka ra// ku mA dang ni smen dang // tsan+da d+ha ra su r+ya d+ha // ti
39b6(rnying rgyud): dang A ka sha/ saM kArti ni bcu drug rags// khu ba g.yon nas dkar po dang // g.yas nas bskor ba'i bye brag gis// gnas kyang bcu drug ldog pa mi// rim pas si kran+ti bshad de// nyi mdang po mthe bong a// gnyis par A ni byin pa na// brlal gsum pa
39b7(rnying rgyud): zhes bya// Ini bzhi pa gsang ban// lte ba na yang ldang sgra// drug da u ni snying ga na// nu ma na ni bdun pa'i// brgyad pa rnon mgrin pa ni// lag mthil na ni dgu pa'i// bcu ba la ni mkhur chos mAM// e ni mig la btsu gcig le// snang ba'i rtsa n-i
40a1(rnying rgyud): e// bcu ga sum oM ni dpral ba na// dzin m+b+hi bor rabatu bzhi pa// g.yas dang g.yon gyi dbus na yang // yongs su gang ba'i me dang AH// da dang de lba ba grub la// rnam pa bra ma la sogs pa// ris kyis rlubar zang
40a2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// bdun pa de dag dril nas bstan pa la// de la gsum de grangs bzung ba dang // dbyug gu drug cu rtsa bzhi dang // dus kyi cha dang ldan pa dang // skar ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // nyi ma bco lnga gza' dgu dang // sa~M kAn+ta yang bcu gnyis kyis//
40a3(rnying rgyud): kyi cha yang gzung bar bya// nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo la// dbyug gu'i grangs ni drug cu ste// bzhi ni 'phel dang 'grib pa'o// de ltar gzung bar byas pa na// dus dang byug gu drug cu bzhi// thabs dang shes rab kun rdzob dang // kun rdzob med pa'i bye
40a4(rnying rgyud): brag gis// ji ltar bstan pa'i gnas su ni// saM kAN+DI yang bcu drug po// rnam par dag pa khu ba yi// bye brag rgyab gzung ba ste// dbug gu'i grangs ni de dag ni// gnas pa sum cu rtsa gnyis so// de dag thams cad 'khor lo bzhir// legs
40a5(rnying rgyud): par gzung bar bya ba ste// bzhi po de yang lte ba nas// tsan+da lI ni 'bar ba yis// phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid 'gyur// nyi ma phyed la dbugs kyi grangs// de yang lnga stong bzhi brgya'o// nyi ma gcig la dbugs kyi grangs// de yang khri dang brgyad brgya'o//
40a6(rnying rgyud): chu tshod gcig la dbyug gu'i grangs// sum brgya dang ni drug cu'o// de ltar dbugs kyi grangs brtsis na// nyin mtshan gnyis la dbugs kyi grangs// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o// grangs kyi de nyid shes bya zhing // dus ni nges dang gzung bar bya// chu tshod
40a7(rnying rgyud): dbyug gu drug cu bzhi// dus dang dbugs kyi mtshan nyid ni// nges par gtan la dbab pa ni// yum la sbyar la bdud rtsi dbab// dgra bgegs gnas bstab bsgral bar bya// phye le bdud rtsi gnas pa ni// 'byung ba bzhi las skyes pa rnams// snod
40b1(rnying rgyud): 'jig rgyun can pon// mul da N+Dagal ba dang // dam bu drub zhwa dang // phal tha~Mthod nam pa brtan// nAkas num rlung las// rigs ni nam pa lngar yang gzungs// nad nams lus sal bar byed// na bgrus yang shi ba nga// byang chu
40b2(rnying rgyud): zhes bya'o// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ lus khams bdud rtsi ring la gnas par rgya'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lam gyi bdud rtsi chen po sgrub pa 'di dag gsung /
40b3(rnying rgyud): stan pa rgyad lung mnang gi shes// lha spyod skom 'bras ldan pa la// gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung bzhi yum// 'khor rnams wa las nyung ba min// yo byad rdzas dang nad khams gso// gyi nang sman rnams tshang bar gas // dben zhing nyams
40b4(rnying rgyud): dga' ba yi gnas// chu shing rab tu 'dzom par gnas// skyon dpyid brgyad dang snga dro yi// dus pa thams cad 'du ba bya// bgegs gtor rgyal chen mang ba gsol nas// dam sri mnan pa sgo byang gdags// khro bcu phyogs phyong phur bas gdang // mahA 'o
40b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzhal yas khang // mtshon na dra ba gur la sogs// 'gros dang stang stabs bsrung bar bya// blang zhing brtags nas skyon bsal nas// sbyang zhing bsrung ba'i sa blangs la// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang khru gang bya// bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab// @
40b6(rnying rgyud): ta yi thig skud kyis// ling tshe dgu pa shin tu zlu ma// bcu drug 'khor los mtha' bskor cing // gru chad par khyams sgo dang bcas// sgo rgyan rdo rje me dpung 'bar// rdul tshen sna lnga rab sbyar nas// dpa' bo 'bru lngas byin brlabs te// de nas phyag rgya dgod
40b7(rnying rgyud): par bya// rdo rje dbus la 'khor mo shar// shir lhor spyan rje na chen b+h+yo// b+h+yo rlu rdo rje 'a ga// rlung bya n+ya gran byang // byang shing ut+pal ring tshe dgu// bdu drug rtsibs la thob yang // shar du dro phyogs kyu dang // mdang gzus gol theb
41a1(rnying rgyud): bya// lho ru rin chen nyi ma dang // rgyal mtshan tog dang so phreng bri// nub tu pad+ma ral gri dang // 'khor lo lce yang bri bar bya// byang du rgya gram go cha dang // 'tshe ba khu tshur bri bar bya// rtsibs mtshan phyag rgya dgod pa
41a2(rnying rgyud): ni// shar du me long bdug spos dang // lcags kyu dang ni 'od zer 'bar// lho ru phreng ba me tog dang // zhags pa spyan yang bri ba'o// nub tu pi wang mar me dang // lcags sgrog rab tu 'bar ba'o// byang du phur bu dri chab dang // dril bu rab tu 'bebs pa'o// shar
41a3(rnying rgyud): sgor tho ba lcags kyu bri// lho ru be con zhags pa dang // nub tu thod sbrul lcags sgrog bri// byang du rgya gram dril bu bri// mda' dang ral gri me long dang // tshon skud phur pa brgyad brgyad bskor// de la snod ni bcu drug dgod// dbus ni ye shes lnga ldan la// shar du
41a4(rnying rgyud): gru gsung thugs ldan te// lho du yid bzhin gter ldan la// nub tu khams gsum yongs sgrol nyinyed// byang du chu 'phrul rtags 'byin no// mi 'gyur g.yung drung thod pa dbus// shar lhor mi shigs mdzod ldan la// lhan bsring pa longs sgrol te// nub byang dug gsum
41a5(rnying rgyud): gtan thugs nyid// byang shar mtshan ma spos bral la// gru chang bzhi la dgod pa yang // yon tan rdzogs ldan shar lho'i gur// bkra shis mtshan ldan lho nub grur// mi 'gyur sam khregs nub byang thung // A yu dpal ldan byang shar zur//
41a6(rnying rgyud): bzhir bang can pad+ma'i rigs// dung can ma ni rdo rje'i rigs// rin chen rigs ni baglang can// ri mo can ni las kyi rigs// rigs mthun b+han+ta dgod par bya// de yi nang du thug pa'i sman// byang sems dkar dmar dri chen dang // pad+ma rak+ta mAM sa dang /
41a7(rnying rgyud): dri ru nang gi rtsa ba lnga// ma hA de ba'i byang sems tshang // rdo drag drang srong dri chen dang // lha yi mAMs dbang po lag/ ram bu srin mo'i rak+ta dang // tsong zhe khyab 'jug chu dang wa// phye yi rtsa ba lnga zhes bya// ga prar dang ni nu gang dang // a ru dang suSh+Te da
41b1(rnying rgyud): phub bangs rnams su bzang srung yin par du 'dra/
41b2(rnying rgyud): ta nga ni go sha dang // mon char dang la shrI dang // gu gum mon l+h+wam ka ko la// skran gyi rtsab rnam pa wa// skr-i ga blo mang ldan// ma las byur ba rnam lnga yang // skal ba sa dang mo dang // b+ha brtsarnams pa yin// mnab can las byung du
41b3(rnying rgyud): wa// stag dang seng ge spyang ku dang // khyi dang dom ni lnga yin no// rmig pa kha brag gyur pa lnga// g.yag dang sha ba glang po che// ba blang phag dang lnga yin no// rmig zlum rnam pa lnga sdang ba// rta dang rnga mong dre'u dang // bor bu byang dang rnam pa lnga// gzhos
41b4(rnying rgyud): pa can las gyur pa lha// rma bya khyung dang shang shang rten// bya wang dkar mo khyim bya dkar// de sogs klang pa dri chen sha/ khrag dang chu rnams bskal rdzas ni// nyi shu rtsa lnga bsog par bya// mi sha glang po rta dang ni// ba glang bya khyi sha rnams byug// ting 'dzin
41b5(rnying rgyud): gsum las byung ba yi// 'byung lnga yum gyi b+ha ga ru// gzhal yas gdan dang bcas pa'i steng // mi bskyod kun tu bzang mo dang // rnam par snang mdzad sangs rgyas spyan// rin chen 'byung dang mA ma kI// sdang ba mtha' yas na bza' dkar// don yod grub pa dam
41b6(rnying rgyud): chog sgrol// rdo rje sems dpa' sgeg mo dang // rdo rje rgyal po spos me dang // rdo rje chags pa lcags kyu ma// rdo rje legs pa sgrol ma 'od// rdo rje rin chen phreng ba ma// rdo rje gzi brji dam tog ma// rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhags pa ma// rdo rje bzhad pa rin chen spyan//
41b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje chos dang pi wang ma// rdo rje rnon po mar me ma// rdo rje 'khor lo lcags sgrog ma// rdo rje smra ba gsal bkram// rdo rje las dang gar mkhan ma// rdo rje bsrung ba dri chab ma// rdo rje gnod sbyin dril 'khrol ma// rdo rje khu tshur 'bebs ma'o// stobs po che dang lcags
41b8(rnying rgyud): kyu ma// gshin rje gshed dang zhags pas 'ching // rta mgrin lcags sgrog sdom pa ma// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dril bu 'bebs// dam pa rigs brgya mtshon dpe'i ched// dgongs pas lha dang sman do spang // rtog pa sprul skur sbyang bar bya// gsang ba'i
42a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ sngags kyis yan lag snang // oM mA hU~Ms rbab rgyas m-i ThA ra swA yan ta na ya hru d+has ti hU~M hU~M ba/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas gang la dgyes// nam mapa'i khams kun ga kyis bkang // sku gsum sangs rgyas gapal dgyes/
42a2(rnying rgyud): sa gzhi kun kyang gar gyis bkang // do nub sangs rgyas gang la dgyes// gzhal yas 'di yang gar gyis bkang // gar gyi mchod pa bla na med// g.yas kyi se gol ta la ho// g.yon gyi thal mo bsham pa brgya// ta la bsham pa bstan byas
42a3(rnying rgyud): nas// sman mtshams dag tu thal sbyar bas// nam ni dag la btib bya'o// 'di ni 'byung med ye shes yin// phyag rgya yin pa dpa' bas bshad// phyag rgya'i mchod pa sna tshogs yin// gzung 'dzin rdong brtan pa'os// ma long la shes rdo dru
42a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje bdud 'dul phyag rgya 'dzin// phyag 'tshal rdo nga ma 'khrugs la'o// s+yAd stong rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings// tsam dbyings ye shes nam dag n+d+ha// dza d+ha mchog gi phyag tu 'dzin// phyag 'tshal dzin nam snang la'o// rdo rje rin can 'bar ba'i ma// mnyam
42a5(rnying rgyud): pa nyid kyi ye shes sku// rdo rje mchog sbyin phyag rgya 'dzin// phyag 'tshal rdo rje rin chen 'byung la'o// mtha' yas rdo rje chos kyi bu// kun rtog yo shes rdo rje'i sku// rdo rje rje 'dzin phyag rgya 'dzin// phyag 'tshal rdo rje mtha' yas la'o// don grub rdorje bstod mdzad
42a6(rnying rgyud): rlung/ nan tan la shes // de rlabs sbyin rgyug hA// mug caladzin den grub sa// dza rdza sems dpa' yad dag gzungs// do ni dz+nyAn med// chos rnams dbya bsgrags pas// las byed par 'gyur// dgas
42a7(rnying rgyud): na rngon// rdorjesangs rgyas la can// thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid pa// phyag 'tshal rdo rje yum khyed mag/ rdorje can mo na chen ma// rim can mA ma ste// rin chen dbyings mdam cag mchog/ phyag 'tshal dong kun mchog lag// dang mangs drub
42b1(rnying rgyud): can// man+da ra ba rab dgyes ma// dgyes par mdzad pa dam tshig slong // phyag 'tshal rdo rje mdzes sdug la'o// rdo rje khra mo 'dul ba cha// sa ma ta ra dam tshig skrong// thams cad dgyes shing mnyes mdzad pa// phyag 'tshal rdo rje sgrol ma la'o// shin tu 'phags pas
42b2(rnying rgyud): rdorje ste// mchog gi sbyor bas lcags kyu'o// phra bar 'bigs pa mda' yin la// mgu bas dga' bar byed pa'o// spro bas rin po che ru bshad// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gzi brjid 'bar// bsgreng bas rgyal mtshan rjes su bshad// bzhad pas bzhad pa zhes
42b3(rnying rgyud): su grags// 'dod chags dag pas pad+ma ste// nyon mongs dgra bcom ral gri'o// dkyil 'khor tshul du 'khor ba'o// tshig tu brjod pas smra ba'o// sna tshogs las ni rdo rje ste// mi tshugs sbyor bas go cha yin// 'jigs par byed pas mche ba ste// bcings
42b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyir na khu tshur ro// rdo rje 'gyings ma 'joms pa ste// rdo rje phreng ba yon tan 'byung // rdo rje sgra dbyangs don mchog bzang // rdo rje rol mdzad rol pa che// rdo rje sdug pa 'dod pa che// rdo rje mdzes sdug pad+ma can// rdo rje mar me snang mdzad ma// rdo rje dri chab
42b5(rnying rgyud): dag par byed// bde ba rgyas 'debs yum gyi phyag rgyar gsal// bde ba za byed dkyil 'khor phrin las mdzad// bde ba rmongs byed gnyis su med pa'i don// bde ba tshe 'phel skye shi med pa'i don// thugs rje'i lcags kyus thugs kyi rgyud bskul zhing // byams
42b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i zhags pas gnas nas spyan drangs nas// bka' yi gnas thob pho nya lhags sgrog ma// dril bus gsung rab rgya mtsho'i sgra sgrogs ma// stobs chen rtse gsum dug gsum 'jom// gshin rje mi g.yo log lta sol// rta mgrin thod sbrul klu dugasel// bdud
42b7(rnying rgyud): rgyagra mgrin las mdzad// bskyod ma lcags kyu thugs dam bskul// sdom ma zhags pas gnas nas bskyod// sdud ma lcags sgrog gzhu mdzad ma// 'bar ma dril dkrol dgyes mdzad ma// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod par bzhes// dam skongs mthu dbang dngos
43a1(rnying rgyud): nathabartsol// sems ma bcu drug g.yon pa nas// lus kyi rtsa bar btuganas// sems dpa' bab drug g.yas pa nas// was kyi bdud rtsi gnas bcal nas// kun 'gra bar du 'babs por byed// rigs lnga ma ba yum 'khor mthun/
43a2(rnying rgyud): bsdam bya yin pas sdom par bya// nang gi phyag rgya dpa' bos bshad// ces gsungs so// bdud rtsi bde bachen po'i rgyud las/ lam gyi bdud rtsi bsgrub pa las/ dam parigs brgya'i la'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das
43a3(rnying rgyud): sprul pa longs skur them pa'i lam bdud rtsi bsgrub pa 'di dag 'gro ba'i don du gsungs so// bum pa rig pa'i dbang lnga dang // gsang dbang bde ba tsaN+DA lI// shes rab ye shes dkyil 'khor bzhi/ bde chen srog shing rnam gsum las// dbang thob rnal 'byor chen pa
43a4(rnying rgyud): los// lus khams bdud rtsi bslab par bya// dkyil 'khor ling tshe dgu bya zlum// gru chad par khyams sgo dang bcas// rta babs rdo rje me dpung 'bar// mkhas pas tshon gyis bris nas ni// rigs kyi b+han+ta rnam pa lnga// phyogs bzhi dbus dang rdza
43a5(rnying rgyud): bkod nas// bdud rtsi byang sems rtsa ba brgyad// ji che na snang mdzad rtsa brgyad dang // shaM chen rtsa brkyang dkon mchog dpal// pa d+mo g+ha bye brgyad ljang mtha' yas// dri chu'i rtsa brgyad don yod grub// rigs lnga phye nas snod du blugs// byang sems dkar la 'tshor
43a6(rnying rgyud): zhe nas rdo rje sems dpa' phra// oM AHhU~M badz+ra sar+thahU~M/ sar+b+ba sa ho b+h+yaH/ a mr-ita s+'u baSh+T+rIH/ ma hA yo ga tsit+tat+ta/ a AHhA/ a b+hi hrI ThaHsa ma ya hU~M/ dri chen 'khor long oM gsar mdog/ zhwa nas rnam par snang mdzad su/ oMng na
43a7(rnying rgyud): sa pa ya s+t+wa~M/ mi hA la ka A d+hi rten banaH/ aR+tha ti/ u \u0f7f ma/ gatshan tu lag sang po las// zhunas den 'byung dkon mchog dpal/ oM A dz+ra hA sa~M b+ha ba tA ra ta sa ma ya nA~M/ bad+mad slod mngalas// zhunasad+ha@
43b1(rnying rgyud): yas sku// oM AHhUM/ ma hA pad+ma rak+ta mu la/ a mi de ba rA ga ra ti sa ma ya hUM/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hrIHsu kha ho/ dr-i chu ljang gu yaM ge hA// zhu nas don yod grub pa'i sku// oM AHhUM/ a mo b+ha sit+ti/ badz+ra sid+d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM/ rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi sku/
43b2(rnying rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes byar// mi brjod sems dpa' rdo rje'i sgra// me long ye shes dag cing gsal// rin chen 'byung ldan longs spyod bri// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes yin// snang ba mtha' yas mngon byed sku// so sor rtog pa'i
43b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes nyid// dan 'or grub pa sprul pa'i bu// thA bgrub pa'i ye shes gnas// de nyid rigs lnga zhes bya bas// swa wa ye shes lngar dgongs pas// gru dang maM shes longs sunA// gsal gad ba dgongs pas longs sgyur bsgrub// ragazung bsngor
43b4(rnying rgyud): pa bya ba yang // lus kyi brlabs bsgom par bya// mgrin bzhi dang drag po yis// ngag gi rba rlabs bsgom par bya// pad+ma can nam dngos ni rab// ye shes phyag rgyal brtan 'bring // ting 'dzin sems kyi na rlabs rngog/ dang baM thabs rgyud dag par bya// shes
43b5(rnying rgyud): rab chud kyang dag par bya// gnyis rgyud dang por dag par bya// yab yum lus ngag mnyam pa dang // 'dod pa mnyam par gyur pa yis// thabs dang shes rab snyoms zhugs pas// yab yum khams kyi dwangs ma nyid// mchog gi ze ba'i gnas su byon// thig
43b6(rnying rgyud): 'od 'phros rnam par 'gyur// g.yas kyi ro mo lte bar byon// nam langs nyi ma shar ba dang // gle ba bus pa lta bur ni// mal yal sangs sangs ltar ltar btang / ro ma snying gar chos gsum ldan// ro ma chos gsum mgrin par ldan// rna ba g.yas nas
43b7(rnying rgyud): 'od byer 'phros// lhag pa lnga yi dkyil 'khor spro// sems can rgyud la dbang bzhi bskur// de dag lhag pa'i lhar yang byas// gnyis bsres bdud rtsi'i bcud du gyur// / tshangs pa'i buga'i byor zhugs nas// skye bor chos gsum ldan par dran// mgrin
44a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnas su byon pa yis// nyi ma stang ga gza brjid ldan// skang ga ba dag lngar gyur ba// rtsa dag lta ba'i lam nas byung // de ni yum gyi mkha' la gnas// g.yas pa bzung ba'i rna bas dngas// rnamathar mtshan pa
44a2(rnying rgyud): med pa'i sgo// de bzhin g.yon du byu ba ni// 'dzin pa'i cha rlabs rangs pa nyid// rnam thar sman pa med pa'i sgo// de bzhin dbu mar spangs byas pa// gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi cha rlabs rengs// rnamathar stong pa nyid kyi sgo// 'bras bu gsum la
44a3(rnying rgyud): pa ni// thabs rgyud dag par byed pa'o// de bzhin shes rab rgyud la yang // g.yas g.yon gnyis nas 'phro ba med// dbu mar song nas tshangs pa'i sgor// spro dang bsdu ba rab tu bya// rba rlabs gsum dang rnamathar gsum// thabs dang shes rab rdzam
44a4(rnying rgyud): pa gnyis// so sor dag par bya ba'i phyir// yab yum gnyis kyi dbu ma nas// lus khams bdud rtsa'i dngas ma nyid// 'od zer gtsug tor mchog tu thim// yab yum sku lnga lhun grub dran// nyams ni gang skyes nges pa med// ci skyes byang rgyal gtang
44a5(rnying rgyud): babya// rgyu mthun pa yi 'bras bu na// yum kyi sgra dkang 'joms pa'o// rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni// lus kyi stabs kyang sbyang bar byed// skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yis// lce dang dpung pa rnam par 'phel// dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu ni// nyi
44a6(rnying rgyud): mnyam 'chi meng bgyir// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ lam gyi bdud rtsi bsgrub pa las// de nyid rigs lnga'i sa'u sto bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sku gsang chen rigs gcig 'a
44a7(rnying rgyud): gsungs sa// snod rnams tha dad sdang ba yang // chos kyi dbyings kyi nga du 'dus// brgyad rnams mang por snang 'gyur yang // chos kyi sku yi dang du 'dus// snod bcud ma lus thig le che// mdor na sangs rgyas lha rnams ni// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du
44b1(rnying rgyud): 'dus// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso// rdo rje dril bu yang dag 'dzin// chas lngas rab tu mdzes par brgyan// oM sarba pa lA ma mr-i ta badz+ra g+had+ha hUM hrIHtha/ gsang chen rigs gcig zhes bya ba// chos sku thig le nyag gcig yin// dgongs pas rdo rje
44b2(rnying rgyud): sems gsal gdab// nang gi dgongs pas dus rnams su// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyun du bsgom// lam la bar chad yad srid na// byang dang goms pa la sbyar ba'i// 'pho bas rnam pa skad cig ma// rdo rje gsang lam chen po ru// man ngag cig char lam
44b3(rnying rgyud): da bya// rlung sbyang gang yang rung ba yis// nyi ma dang po srog rtsol rlung // khyag pa bcu bdun thun pa nyir nges// de bzhin nyi ma re re la// khug pa re re spel byas la// nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du sbyangs// nyi ma tha ma srog rtsol la// khug pa sum cu rtsa bdun
44b4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// nyi ma dab po gcig phri nas// de bzhin nyi ma re re bri// zhag grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig na// de yang sngar gyi tshad bzhin 'gyur// zhag kyang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su// rlung sbyangs rgya ba gsal ba dang // rnam par nges pa 'byung ba'o// deng nas gom
44b5(rnying rgyud): par bye ba nyid// sma dang yi ge rnam pa gnyis// lus la sogs pa gnad phab la// tig kyang nyi shu rtsa gcig grangs// nyer gcig pa yang gso bar bya// yi ge goms par bya ba yang // gyi dang nang gi yi gnyid// bshad pa'i sgo la sogs pa ru// gas
44b6(rnying rgyud): bsgo dgu'i gnad dgul// rgyang ba 'azhi dang wa ba bkri// sreg mtha'i sbyor ba yis// ngan srong mtho ngas gnas tshwa dge/ nab du dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi// rim pa yi ga bstan par bas pa// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i srog shing la// A li brgya drug
44b7(rnying rgyud): na ba sa da // gso gar tha~M sa bltas// khrel pa dag tu ga pa bsgom// gams sa nanapa pa gnyis bgan s+ho/ tshol ba 'dus rnas pas gsal ga nga/ ma gangs las nas gas la gang baH// blan pa zhag bdun pa
45a1(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / las myar bde 'gro 'gro gzhan dang // gling 'gro gzhan dang phyag rgya che// bde 'gro nges par 'chi ba'i tshe// tsog phur lus kyi phyi sgo rnams// yi ges bkag la mig sogs las// gang 'dod sgra ni stong pa
45a2(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ snying gar rlung rtswa'i steng du hUM// tig gis nye ragacig mgrin par drangs// tha mar 'dod pa'i sgo nas 'phang // sgo yi drin 'brel de nyid kyis// bde 'gro de dang de phyir 'grub// grong gzhan rgyal po'i bu sogs pa'i// rma med ma rul na cho
45a3(rnying rgyud): dang // rjes su mthun pa'i ro rten blang // khrus byas gu gul dung bas bdug/ lhar bskyed gnas gsum bsrung ba dang // nub kyang dang por srung 'khor mtshams// gnyis par rten de gnas dpe ni gzhag/ dam tshig sha za mkha' 'gro sogs// cho
45a4(rnying rgyud): kyi mchod pas mnyes par bya// nyin zhag gsum pa dag la ni// rang rlung ting 'dzin shugs btags la// nye ring tshod ni zin byas te// ci rigs par ni lus gnad phab// phyi sgo yi ge'i sbyor bas bkag/ sna yi sgo gnyis stong par gzhag/ sngar spangs
45a5(rnying rgyud): rtsol ba'i rlung gis ni// sems rten snying ga la gnas pa'i// hUM las bye nas sna g.yas byung // rten gyi sna brag g.yon par bcug/ de yi snying gar hU~M bzhag ste// srog rlung ni bder 'od du gzhug/ de ltar yang nas yang byas pas// de yis rten la rtags
45a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung ste// snying ga spyi bor rjod kyang 'byung // de nas lus ni thams cad khyab// mig 'byed 'dzum kla la sogs 'byung // sems gcig dag gis rten gnyis ni// gzung ba'i dus zhes bya ba ste// de nas drag por byed pa ni// hig ni nyer gcig
45a7(rnying rgyud): mgrin par drangs// rtsa gcig sna bug g.yas phyung ste// rten gyi g.yon nas zhugs nas ni// snying gar zhugs par bsam pa'o// zhi bas byed na rtsol ba nyid// sems rten mazin pa'i bar du drangs// phul sogs tha ma sna g.yon bton// rten gyi g.yon
45b1(rnying rgyud): bcug snying gar gzhad// srog 'jug pa dang bral bar bya// nges par las la sbyar te 'grub// de nas drin lan bsab pa'i phyir// rnying pa'i rten de dang gis spangs// gsar pas 'gro don spyod sogs zla// gling dang b+ha gnas gzhan sbyor bar/
45b2(rnying rgyud): lus sogs gnang la phab byas nas// phyi sgo thams cad yi ges dgag/ dri chen po'i lam// dri chu'i lam du b+h+rUM ser po// lte ba hUM sngon po la// mdzod pur hU~M sngon dkar po// lce rtsang zla ba suM dkar po// pA la zla ba yuM sngon mo// yuM dmar
45b3(rnying rgyud): bla ba rna ba gnyis// mig gnyis hUM sngon re re la// skye gtsug khyud ni kha dog chu dkar// dmyal babyol song 'dod khams kyi gzugs// gzugs kyi khams yi dwags gnod sbyin dang // grub pa'i lha mi mi rgyal gnas// tshangs sgra
45b4(rnying rgyud): 'ba' zhig stong par bzhag/ snying gar rlung dang zla stengs su// sems rten mthing nag hUM bsam la// mgrin par nyer gcig hUM gis drangs// rtsa gcig gnad gsum 'dres tshul gyis// tshangs pa'i sgo nas 'phangs byas nas// rang nyid
45b5(rnying rgyud): mngon par 'dod pa yi// bde ba can la sogs pa yi// gling dang skye gnas la sogs par// brdzus skyes dag tu 'dod pa na// ut+pal pad+ma la sogs pa'i// snying po las ni brdzus nas skye// mngal skyes 'dod na bram ze dang // rgyal po la sogs btsun
45b6(rnying rgyud): mo yi// mngal de yid kyi yul de ru// 'phangs nas mda' gzhu sgyogs dang ni// 'khrul 'khor bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ lam gyi bdud rtsi sgrub pa las gsad chen rigs gcig pa'i le'u
45b7(rnying rgyud): ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lam gyi bdud rtsi phyi ma yongs su btag pa 'di gsungs so// shun chen steng du tshags ma gding // rak+ta'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad dbus// zla gam dmar por sman spungs nas/
46a1(rnying rgyud): dbyings kyi b+hag shes rab stong // thabs kyi rdo rje snyid rje nyid// mthar byed brgyad kyis rnam par brtag/ sman dang rtog pa dgra bgegs dang // mtshan ma dbyings su dag par bya// oM AHhUM sarba pad+ha ma mr-i ta ha na ha na hU~M phaT/
46a2(rnying rgyud): da ha da ha hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsahU~M phaT/ b+har+b+ha b+haR+tha hUM phaT/ hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ tit+tatiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ s+yo ts+tsha ts+tshats+tsha hU~M phaT/ bid+ha tit+ta hU~M phaT/ shid kyi dkyil 'khor zlum po ru// rdzas rnams gtun bras gnan tu btags// dbyings kyi rin chen gzhong ba dra// rig pa
46a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes tshags ma yis// lho yi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ru// mchod rdzas me mar lnga brgya sogs// mchod cing sman rnams btsag par bya// dar tshangs seng rgod nyid la bya// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta sa ma ya sid+d+hi phal hUM hrIHtha/ nub kyi dkyil 'khor
46a4(rnying rgyud): kla ga ma du// yab yum sbyor ba byas pa ni// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // de kho na yis sbyor ba bzhis// byang sems 'o ma sna tshogs sbrengs// mar gyi bcud dang 'dra ba ga nas// oM AHhrI sarba pad+ma a mr-i ta ho sa ma ya bi shud+d+he hUM hrIHtha/ rgya mtsho la
46a5(rnying rgyud): sogs 'byung ba yi// chu rnams tha dad ro gcig glengs// oM AHhUM sarba pa r+thA a mr-i ta sa ni sid+d+hi hUM hrIHtha/ gser dngul zangs lcags la sogs pa// rin chen sna lnga brdang ba bya// oM AHhUM sarba ba Sh+Ta a pr-i tar tA b+he Sha dz+wa sud+g+ha tI hrIHtha/ spang chung bur chang la sogs pa'i/
46a6(rnying rgyud): char rnams ma lus sgreng bar bya// oM badz+ra kr-iSh+Ti shwa dwe sho d+ha ya/ sho d+ha ya s+yai sho d+hA ya oM te na hUM hrIHwi/ byang gi dkyil 'khor gru gsum du// zhing bcu bskal pa'i sha khrag la// sbyin sreg byas la me mi phung // sman gyi nang du thug par bya// oM sarbab d+ha a mr-i ta raM dz+wa la
46a7(rnying rgyud): a g+ne saM d+hi sa ma ya hU~M hrI Tha/ oM a d+hi hAr+ya phaT/ oM ba sha~M k+Sharba hrIH/ oM puSh+TiM ku ru swa/ oM shAn+tiM kuru hA/ rang byung zhal bu kha skyer nas// rta mgrin dpal gyis rgyas btab ste// pho brang srang la gzhal byas nas// dkyil 'khor dbus gzhug gzungs thag gdags
46b1(rnying rgyud): rigs lnga'i phyag cas dbang bsrung nas// tam grin bdud rtsa 'khyil bas bsrung // sman gyi lha mo sman yang drung // drang srong rnams kyi rtog pa bsal// gu phul gyen gsang ba yi// dud pas 'dug la spun drang zhing // gang gis bgag sa rnams bskrad pa ma/
46b2(rnying rgyud): oM A hrIsarba ba \u0f89\u0fa4 sa mr-i ta ha ya grI ba a mr-i ta kraN+Da li raM She ga NA si d+hi daM bI tsi ri pha la sid+d+hi pany+tsa ku la kA ya lA ka tsin+tahUM/ mtshan ma'i tog slong dgongs pa yis// mtshan ma thams cad dag par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// brgyad rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyad las/
46b3(rnying rgyud): lam gyi bdud rtsi bsrub pa las/ phye ma btog btsag pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi gang bu gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor grub pa 'di dag 'gro ba'i ched du gsungs so// thig bzhi btab pa'i dkyil 'khor
46b4(rnying rgyud): du// dbus su zlo gam gru gsum mo// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas// gru bzhi sgo dang rlababs ldan// mdun du dpa' bo bdud rtsi sdod// mchod pa rdzas dang bcas pa dang // chos sru de bzhin nyid las ni// longs sku 'byung ba kun tu snang // srub su rgya yi
46b5(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin ni// 'byung ba lnga dag yum lnga'i klong // nam mkha' rlung dang khrag mtsho 'khyil// keng nus ri rab me dpung 'bar// drang khrod brgyad kyis yongs bskor ba'i// bder gshegs khang pa rab tu bzang // mu tig a swa gar+b+ha dang // nor bu mtshan nyid theg pa
46b6(rnying rgyud): gsum// rdo rje rje gcig rtse gsum lnga// kri yog gsang sngags phyi ba gsum// pad+ma ba sbyor nyi shu bzhi// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dag dang // 'dus nye ba'i 'dus skye// tshan+do nye ba'i tshan+do nyid// dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod
46b7(rnying rgyud): du// dbang phyug ngo mo nyi shu bzhi// kha s+phar ma hA log yin// byol song gtso bo chen po brgyad // 'bar ba'i gdan rnams rnam par mdzes// stong gsum jo bo'i dkyil 'khor du// mthar byed khro bo'i rnam pa brkyang // gsung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du
47a1(rnying rgyud): hA/ ta nAka ne dgu klong 'bar// mkha' mnyam klong ga dkyil 'khor na/ khro ma gnam zhal grum dang gnas// 'tsho mang dadza'i dkyil 'khor du// dpal lta bar namachog tu rbaka/ sku gsung thugs su byin bsgrub pa'o// dgongs
47a2(rnying rgyud): pas byin yang dbab par bya// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsis dgang ba dang // sbyor ba brgyad kyi 'du 'dul bya// de nas 'dzab dgongs bzlas pa'i sngags// dgupa 'di ni 'dzab du grangs// oM badz+ra tsid+d+ha sa ma ya hU~M hrIH/ gsang sngags rgyal ba yang gsang ga/ sa
47a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi thugs mchog las// gsang ba 'di ni rab byung nas// mdzad pa bcu gnyis 'phro 'dra bya// oM AHhU~M sarba bany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM Sh+T+r-iHTA/ chos sgra'i ngang las bzhugs pa ni// lhums su gshegs pa'o ngo bo'i tshul// ting nge 'dzin yang rnam
47a4(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis// sku bskyed pas na bltams pa'i tshul// 'gro 'dus 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// gzhon nu rol pa mdzad pa'i tshul// g.yon gyi phyogs su yum bskyed pas// khab bzhes mnga' dbang che ba'i tshul// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas//
47a5(rnying rgyud): dbyer med rab byung thar pa'i tshul// thabs dang shes rab bskyod pa ni// do ni dka' thub mdzad pa'i tshul// yab yum lhan cig dgyes par rol// sku nyams bstar ba sangs rgyas tshul// phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi ldan pas// bdud bzhi bcom pas bdud bcu
47a6(rnying rgyud): tshul// byang sems dkar dmar tshad 'phros pas// rdo phrul bstan pas tshe 'phrul tshul// 'gro la theg pa'i chos sgrogs pas// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul// slar la 'dus nas mi dmigs pas// mya ngan las ni 'das pa'i tshul// thugs rje kun
47a7(rnying rgyud): la khyab bstan pas// de ni sku gdung bgos pa'i tshul// oM AH badz+raHta hU~M hrIH/ dang bskon pa'i thugs rje yis// sa steng sman babs lhums su gshegs// de nas sa steng skyes pa ni// de ni sdums nas bltams pa ste// de nas sdong bur gyur pa ni/
47b1(rnying rgyud): gzhon nu rol rtsed mdzad pa'o// de nas yal ga 'phel ba ni// yum ni khab tu bzhes pa'o// sman rnams bano zhing bregs pa ni// ston pa rab tu byung ba'o// bskams shing snod du bsrel ba ni// rtswa 'gram dka' thub mdzad pa'o// khrol bu tshom du/
47b2(rnying rgyud): lngar byed pas// rigs lngar sangs ni rgyas pa'o// nus mthus nad dang bdud sde bzhi// btul bas bdud ni btul ba'o// shes rgyud 'gro ba'i nyon mongs bcom// chos kyi le la ri lo bskor ba'o// dri rolnga 'od du ba sogs// 'byung bas cho 'phrul
