47b3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'o// spyan rnams btags dang btsags pas na// sra ni mya ngan 'das pa'i tshul// bdud rtsi rim par bags pa ni// sku gdung rim par bgos pa'i tshul// oM AHhUM badz+rA a mr-i ta hU~M d+hIHtha/ da la grod rtags 'byung ba ni// byang chub sems las /
47b4(rnying rgyud): 'byung zhing // ji chen dag la dri'ong zhing // shA chen mang du 'phel ba dang // rak+ta la ni dud pa 'bral// dri chus rmA ni sgrogs pa dang // lus khams bdud rtsi lnga 'dres pas// lha mo'i gzugs kyang ston par byed// de dus dbab dang bskyil ba'o// dgongs
47b5(rnying rgyud): pas mtshan mar bstan par bya'o// 'chi med rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du// bde chen dkyil 'khor taM la dbab// // mkha' mnyam klong gi dkyil 'khor du// longs spyod dkyil 'khor aM las dbab// sku gdung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// chos kyi dkyil 'khor hU~M las
47b6(rnying rgyud): dbab// stong gsum khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du// sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor aM las dbab// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa oM mr-i ta me pra be sha ya pheM pheM pheM/ srog shing gsum gyi mdud pa la// bdud rtsi rab tu bskyil bar bya// la la nA dang ra sa nA// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi
47b7(rnying rgyud): nang du bsgril// nyi ma zla ba rnam pa gnyis// gzung dang 'dzin pa 'khor ba'i rtsa// dbyings dang ye shes bdud rtsir bsgyel// a bad+hU tI gzung 'dzin spang // gnyis med chos sku chen por bskyil// pade chen longs spyod chos dang sprul// rang gi gnas
48a1(rnying rgyud): ba sa/ ldan cig rgyas pa pa sgyur 'gyul// byas napa rdus / sa sa/ danas dkyil 'khor nas/ rgyag shA ga sa//
48a2(rnying rgyud): dag dang sa pa'o// ngas cig na 'dubs par byed// gangang ba bya banal 'byung mus// 'dasas pa byed pos sgyubar ci su btsu // da ma dpe bskyed pa// lta mas pa
48a3(rnying rgyud): phyag gi rgyas btu bzlas// lam gyi 'jigs pa malus rnams// dus par bsrung zhing stsal 'gyur lta // de bzhin rnams sa rnyed la/ yi sa pa // 'khor rje'i phyogs pa dag las thos// dbyi rnam pa shi ba
48a4(rnying rgyud): na pa d+ha mahU~M/ makyig ga tu yum dang 'thong// las kyi mkha'ags pa sha byed// chos kyis sprul pagakhor ba 'dzin// phyag rgyags ni n+yam bsogasas// d+ha mdza do nga la/ rnamathal bang po /
48a5(rnying rgyud): ma dpal dbyug pa bsdams// gshin rje thod dbyug dathasta dang / mig yo ral gri zhags pa la// d+ha mgrin dbyug to sbrul zhags bsnams// gzhan gyis mi thub ljags kyu zhags pa dang // bdud rtsirgya bram dril bu la// khams gsum
48a6(rnying rgyud): yon la pa snams// stobs chen thod bzhugs paste// gzugs brtan dkyil 'khor dag la bris// bde gshegs zag 'thung phyag rgya ni// 'khor gong gra sta zhags pa g.yas// ta k+sha rjedu chung laT+wAM g.yon// rdo rje khrag 'byung chen po ni// ngo na
48a7(rnying rgyud): dz+ra ga yas// tan+ta ning che chu zhags g.yon// rin chen khrag 'thung chen po ni// rin chen gshol dang gtun shing g.yas// d+he D+ha dgra spa de'u chung g.yon// pad+ma khrag 'byud chen po ni// pad+da rje'u tshung ral gri g.yas// tan+ta la dz+ri thod phreng g.yon/
48b1(rnying rgyud): khrag la nga can ldan// ma phags parda' nang g.yas// bu rlung blag pan// khra bar thAH// dang pa tha thugazod pa ste// bar ma la buste// tham 'byung g.yon// ba tan// ma
48b2(rnying rgyud): thod pa la// bar ma rin chan dril buste// tha ma sngon cad te' bsnams// khro mcho ga yaHte rtseg/ dang po gri gug zod pa la// blar ma pad+ma dril bya ste// tha ma dpra s+thA Na ma \u0f7f// khyo tshon ga ti s+ya// dang mi srog thod pa la// nga rgyag mthil
48b3(rnying rgyud): tha mar la gyi ne'u chung bsdams// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gnas su bri// dkyil 'khor rdul tshan chen po la// lha yi phyag rgyas kyis btab pas// byin brlabs par ched dag las grol// dus bzhi dus druka nya la ma// bzlog cing bsrung bar byed pa'o//
48b4(rnying rgyud): blta ba'i don gyis bsrung ba ni// khro bo dpal ldan hete rug/ 'bar ba'i gar dgu rab tu khro// sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs su rung // rgod dang gshe dang rngam pa dang // snying rje ngo mtshar zhi ba nyid// dbang phyug chen po 'dod chags sgeg/ lha min pa su kar dpal/
48b5(rnying rgyud): khyab 'jug 'jigs pa'i gzugs su sprul// sku li gar gyis 'dul bar byed// gzhon nu smin drug rtagang dgod// tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan lag she// skra gcan nyi zla med pas ngam// gsung gi gar stis 'dul bar byed// brgya byin snying rje'i sems kyis sbyong//
48b6(rnying rgyud): chen 'dri ldog ngo mtshar che// me lhas bsregs nas 'jig rten ni// de dag zugs kyi gar gyis 'dul// nyams ni sems la shar bas thugs// sngags ni drag du shar gas gsung // gar ni lus la 'thar bas smra// mthong snang yul la shar bas wa/
48b7(rnying rgyud): bag chags me la marnal 'byor ston// brgyad ni rtogs pa bdag gi dpal/ sdong ni thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal// sbyor ba bdag la rtog pa dang // sgrol bas gzhan la thugs rjes slong ba dang // zhi ga nas bdag tu rtog pa zhi// lhag mthong gzhan rig rnam par
49a1(rnying rgyud): rtags// chos su rig pa nang na gsal// gzugs rgya thugs rje kyil 'chang // snang thong yul la bgyis pa'o// pa stong lus la chags pa stan// ngag nang sams kyis mdza ngas/ chos na yul ladabs pa ta/
49a2(rnying rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs pur chags pas ru// sprul pras mdzad pa mthar phyin ka/ 'di ltar snang srod 'khor 'das rnams// dpal ldan te ru ka ru gnas// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ lam gyi bdud rtsi gong bu bsgrub pa ste le' ba
49a3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu'i bdud rtsi 'di dag 'gro ba'i ched du gsungs so// de nas dngos grub dkyil 'khor mchog/ bla ga ma rno ni shar du bstan// rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni// skya rengs 'char ba'i bar du bslab// dngo
49a4(rnying rgyud): grub rdzas rnams rab tu bstsog/ tshe dang gal dang zla rgyas dang // zla phrum 'jam des kun du rgyug/ bran mo g.yo can skyur po bsog/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa khro bo che// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ma ldang // rgya gram bsil byed ral gri g.yas// thod wag
49a5(rnying rgyud): ba kha T+wAM g.yon// oM AHhUM sarba pany+dza a mr-i ta kuN+Da li a hUM su kha d+harma kA ya sit+te pha la a la la haM// thun mong grub chen brgyad dang ni// sna tshogs las rnams grub pa dang // mchog gi rig pa 'dzin pa dang // sku gsung dngos grub rgya chen blang // de nas dbang gi dkyil
49a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor mchod// dbang stegs zla gam sgo dang bcas// rta mgrin g.yas dkar g.yon sngo ba// rta mgo ljang zhur le brgan rtog/ khe T+wAM lcags kyu ral gri g.yas// thod pa mdud dang zhags pa g.yon// mi pham ma dang ral pa gcig/ khro gnyer ma dang ro langs
49a7(rnying rgyud): thams nad dbang du 'dus nas ni// slob ma snod dang ldan rnams la// bdud rtse mchog dbang rab tu myor// bu ma bcod pan rdo rje de la// ming dang rig pa'i dbang lnga po// dam pa rigs brgya'i dbang du bskur/ nyan dang 'chad dang bsgom pa dang // phrin las
49b1(rnying rgyud): slob dpon dbang // de nyid rigs lnga'i dbang du bskur// gsang dbang bde ba chen po dang // shes rab ye shes gsang dbang gsung // dngos grub len pa'i dbang du bskur// khro bcu khrag 'thung klong dgu ni// bdud rtsi bsrub pa'i dbang du bskur// bdud rtsi dum pa'i
49b2(rnying rgyud): dbang chen ni// bdud rtsi mchog gi dbang du bskur// oM AHhUM sarba ba snam mr-i ta a d+hiShiSh+Tha maM a d+hi/ Shi ka te sa ma ya shrI he sa// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ dngos thab bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsrung ba dang / dbang rta mgrin gyi dpa /
49b3(rnying rgyud): bya ba ste 'bras bu'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgyad rtsi bded chen po'i gzhi la ma 'bras bu'i don bsdus pa 'di gsungs so// de nas rten 'brel smrig pa'i gzhi// rdo rje lus kyi mtshan nyid la// lus khams bdud rtsi
49b4(rnying rgyud): sngar gnas pa// sprini dam pa rigs brgyal// gsung ni nyid rigasum skye/ thugs ni gsang chen rigs gcigaganas// de ltar shis pas brtag bcag gnyis// dbyer mang gong bu gcig par gnas// ten brel thog mtha' rab bstan pa// tog
49b5(rnying rgyud): makun gzhi rgyud gnas pa// lus ni thabs kyi rgyu nyid la// mtshan ldan mo'i sbyor ba ni// byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi nyid// zhing bcu gnas nas sgrol ba ni// bsgral ba'i bdud rtsi chen po lnga// tha ma gnas 'gyur 'bras bu ste// sku bzhir mngon par sangs rgyas
49b6(rnying rgyud): 'jug// rten 'brel nyid ni gang yin na// tshogs dang sbyor lam zhes bya ba// 'khor lo 'cham pa 'jig rten lam// bsgom dang mthong ba mthar phyin pa// 'khor lo bskod pa 'das pa'i lam// lam lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// lam bzhi las ni gang yin na/
49b7(rnying rgyud): nyan thos mos pa rngub pa dang // rang rgyal dmigs pa phra ba dang // byang chub sems dpa' dag dang ni// 'di ni byang chub chen po ste// thabs kyi gsang sngags khyad par 'phags// tshad ma bzhi ni gang yin pa// dang po lo rgyas tshad mar bshad// rten 'brel dpe
50a1(rnying rgyud): mchan mang tu 'dun// rgyan bdud caca bcub// rten cing brel ba du shig gis// lam nu yangs surdzogs par byed// na 'brel bdun gyi gsang sngags kyi// rgyal ma 'bras grardugs par byengad// thar brdud dang samasasags par// zhal na byu byung
50a2(rnying rgyud): rlabs nas ni// dgongs pas 'khor du gang gsungs pa// bde gshegs bka' yi tshad ma yin// rgyal ba rig 'dzin gang zag rnams// gang nas gang du rgyud gyur cing // gsang bzugs la gnas pa ni// bla ma'i man ngag tshad ma yin// dbang po tha ma 'bring dang mchog/ thos bsam
50a3(rnying rgyud): bsgom par bsgyur nas// rang gi nyams su gar myong ba// rtogs pa rang rig tshad ma yin// phyi nang dngos po ma lus kun// sngon 'byung rjes 'jug la sogs pa'i// gtan tshigs byung khungs bcas pa rnams// dngos po lo rgyus tshad ma yin// drang srong chen po tshangs pa dang // ljang sngon dang ni
50a4(rnying rgyud): ra ka/ nab so skyes dang tha skar bu// lha skyabs dang ni rgyun shes dang // g.yon phyogs lha dang thang la gnas// me bzhi 'jug dang rkang gnyis spyod// ka ya na dang shing khyed dang // ljang sngon bu dang nyi ma dang // zla ba dang ni drang srong klu// gzhon nu sprin dang gzhon nu srid// 'dro ba skyong dang ni rin//
50a5(rnying rgyud): po che// go'u ta ma dang mngon shes can// shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang ma// sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun// rtsi yi grub pa'i blo gros ma// nags kyi lha mo rma bya'i mgrin// 'di dag rnamal kun bzang gis// rten 'brel sman gyi sgrub pa bshad// a rur ni rnam pa bdun// rnam par rgyal dang gsum
50a6(rnying rgyud): kyis bsgribs// gso byed dang ni bdud rtsi dang // 'jigs byed dang ni 'phel byed dang // skem byed dang ni bdun yin no// rnam par rgyal ba'i a ru ra// maN+Dal steng du bzhag nas ni// bdud rtsi lnga dang rab sbyar nas// rdo rje sems dpang rab bsgoms te// gsang sdug bzlas par gyur pa na//
50a7(rnying rgyud): chol dbang ba'i rig 'dzin 'grub// oM badz+ra ak+Sho d+ha a mr-i ta badz+ra A ru She hUM ma/ a rur ni gsum gyis bsgribs// bur ma sbyang ba'i ri lul// rnam par snang mdzad bsgoms nas ni// nang de gnyis gnyis rta gzos na// mi de na kun med par 'gyur// gsang ba'i sngags 'dis bslab
50b1(rnying rgyud): a bar tsan an ka ri t+na k+Shi dzi ni dzika/ rog pra sha ma na swA hA/ a rur ni gso byed yang // ser skya ba ye mar dang sbyar// zos na tshe ring nad med 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ldan rab bsgoms nas// gsang ba'i sngags kyi rab tu gdags// oM rat+na sam+b+ha ra an ha ri tA k+Shi radzA d+haka/ rog pra shA ma na swA hA/ adza/
50b2(rnying rgyud): ni bdud rtsi yang // bu ram sbrang rtsi gsum po dang // cha mnyam zos na bcud le nang gyur// snang ba mtha' yas rab bsgoms nas// zos na yid gzhungs drod spyod cing // stobs kyang ldan zhing nas kyang sra// lus kyang dag pa nyid du 'gyur// oM a mr-i ta d+ha ba en he re tAM k+She a ro le ka/ sA
50b3(rnying rgyud): a ru da ni 'jigs byed ni// rlung nad la ni rgya mtshar sbyar// mkhris pa lu ni pi pi leng // bad kan la ni sbrang rtsir sbyar// ma zhu ba la lga dang sbyar// rlung skran rgya mtsha mar dang sbyar// pad kan ma zhu lga dang tsha// skrangs pa'i nad la ba gcin sbyar// mdze nad sha bkra can la ni// tse tra ka dang dang bar gyur/
50b4(rnying rgyud): nad rnams kun la mar du btso// sangs kyis don yod grub pa bsgom// oM a mo g+ha sid+d+hi a na ha ri tA kA prad+ho d+h+r-i ka/ rog pra shA man swA hA/ a ru ra ni 'phel byed ni// chu rngus dom mkhris sbyar nas ni// sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po bsgom// oM badz+ra tsot+to khrag nyag ra ma swA hA/ rma la bta ba na phan 'gyur te// sha3
50b5(rnying rgyud): mi zad par yang byed// rma rnams 'grub par byed pas na// mchog tu mtshon dpal 'joms pa'o// a ru ra ni skem byed kyang // gu gul shing kun ga pur dang // gla rtsib bla ldong ros dang // mu zi shu dag sgrog par sbyar// bu chung lus la btag gyur na// gdon rnams bsrung zhing nad rnamag so// kun tu bzang /
50b6(rnying rgyud): mor rab tu bsgom// ma dang bu la bsrung ba gdags// oM badz+ra ta dra sa man+ta pu tra dak+Sha ka s+ya ya swA hU/ star bu'i cho ga bstan pa ni// grang dro snyoms pa'i dus bzung nas// dang po zhon phyed dang gnyis// de nas nyi ma re re zhing // zhe ni phyed dang gnyis gnyis skye// srang ni phyed dang gnyis 'thung na// zla ba gcig tu 'o ma dang //
50b7(rnying rgyud): spyad 'thungs zas gzhan ma thos na// tshe dang stobs brtan gzugs bzang ste// mdangs dang lang tsho bud len 'gyur// dbyings phyug ma ni bsgom par bya// oM d+hA tI shwa rI A yuHphal hUM/ bdud rtsi dam pa nye shing pa// shun gsal nang gi snying po phyung // brdungs nas gtsang ma'i ras la btsog/ sbrang rtsi ro ma rgyar
51a1(rnying rgyud): ba ni// zhag re srang re ba skyed byas nas// zhag brgyad 'thung ngam tha ga cig bza'// de 'og pa'or 'bras bcos bza'// nad kyi 'chi med bcud len yin// sangs rgyas spyan ni bsgom par bya// oM badz+ha lo tsan A u UM A/ dbang po lag pa zhes bya ba// mar dang 'o ma
51a2(rnying rgyud): ram sbyar// snam tshig par me la bskol// mA ma k+Shi ni bsgoms la bza'// oM mo ha ra ti A yu She hUM a/ tshe ring bsam pa 'phel ba dang // lus yang sha yang ma khregs par 'gyur// brag zhun bgrungs pa'i khu ba'i nang // gur gum bu ram sbrang rtsi dang // a bskyar nas lcags kyi snod// sna
51a3(rnying rgyud): ma tshig par mas bskol nas// ril bu gos dkar bsgoms la bza'// nad med tshe dang lang tsho ldan// oM rA ga ra ti A yu She hUM a/ tsong zi dang ni bu ram dang // sbrang rtsi ka ra 'o ma dag/ mar dang sbyar nas lcags kyi snod// snam tshig par legs bskol nas// zla ba gcig tu bza' ba
51a4(rnying rgyud): mang // dam tshig sgrol mar bsgoms la bza'// nad med tshe ring bcud len 'gyur// oM badz+ra da ti badz+ra A yu She hUM a/ sman ni gnod sel zhes bya ba// tsan+dan dkar po pa ti ba// a ru ra dang gur gum dang // puN+Da nI ka spang spos dang // chu srin sder mo shing tsha rnams// snga
51a5(rnying rgyud): re cha ni bzhi bzhi dang // ru rta ut+pal sug ske gsum// sA re cha yang lnga lnga dang // ba le ka ni brgyad brgyad kyang // skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par la// char pa'i chus sbrus sngags bta ba sbyar// dpral ba dag la bskus pa na// lha klu gnod sbyin srin po dang // lha min 'byung
51a6(rnying rgyud): po zhi bar byed// dug nad can la chu dang sbyar// khong du 'thung na dug kun sel// mtshon gyis rmas pa'i rma byung na// rma khar bskus pas 'tsho bar byed// sdom dang sdig bgyi ba dang // dug sbrul gcan gzan gdug pa can// gang dag zin pa'i mi de yis// thigs
51a7(rnying rgyud): pa gsum ni snga ru thug/ mig bsdus 'thung dang rma khang thug/ bdug pas zin pa'i dug las thar// rtag tu lag tu bcangs pa na// gdon rnams thams cad thub pa dang // don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de yi rig sngags 'di dag la'ang // sems dpa' bcu drug
51b1(rnying rgyud): gang mosas pa// sems ma bcu drug gar mos la// skyes pas sems dbang sgom dang grus// bud med yin na sems mar bsgom// mchod dang ba stod dang mtshan thos bya// yang na yon tan dran byas la// sngags 'dis sman la gdab par bya// oM tad+yaT+Ta TI ga she bi mug phral sa bam N+Da
51b2(rnying rgyud): hiti li/ na mo bud+d+hA ya sid+d+ha n+t+ra man+t+ra pAd swA hA/ zhes ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ rten 'brel tshad ma gtan la phab pa'i sman bdud rtsi sA yan las sman thun mor bcud len dang rig 'dzin sgrub pa'i le'u steng
51b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas 'khor du 'dus pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bstod do// mi dmigs spros bral mnyam pa'i chos nyid las// thugs rje'i mdzad pa sems can don mdzad pa// shes rab stong nyid thabs kyi snying rje chen po las// snod kyi 'a
51b4(rnying rgyud): rten sman rnams bsrub pa bcud len gyis// thun mor rig 'dzin lus kyi nang de rnams 'joms// lus khams bdud rtsi bcang 'thung phung po'i nang / sangs rgyas rang zhal mthong byed dkyil 'khor lus// 'khor 'das don ston ska la rab tu bstod// ces mgrin gcig tu rab
51b5(rnying rgyud): bstod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gtad do// bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi chos// dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod pa'i sems// lus ngag yid kyi dri ma dag/ ma mo mkha' 'gro mchod pa yis// mthu dang rtsal gyi dngos grub thob// byang chub sems dpa
51b6(rnying rgyud): mchod pa yis// nAd med tshe yi rig 'dzin thob// phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor mchod pa yis// dam tshig nyams skong dngos grub 'byung // snod bcud bdud rtsi gtan la 'bebs// ma 'ongs bsgrub pa'i man ngag tu// khyed rnams tshogs kyis zung la spel// zhes gsungs so//
51b7(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad cing bstan pa mi nub par bstan pa nye le'u brtsuba'o// / bdud rtsi bdeb chen po'i rgyud rdzogs so// / rgya ga kyi paN+Di ti bi ma la mi tra dang / bod kyi lo rlob gtags dz+nyA nas bsgyung ba'o//
52a1(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ sarba a mr-i ta pa t+ya b+ha ba dz+nyA tI dzi na ni phal rat+na pra b+h+yo ta ma dz+wa latwAn+tu/ bod skad du/ thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin du 'khrungs shing skye bar byed pa'i 'bras bu rin po che 'od ltar 'bar ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan
52a2(rnying rgyud): 'das gas ba mchog gi bdag po/ rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs bdud rtsi blang ngor med pa'i mdzad skyod de nyid dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad thams cad bdud rtsi sman du shes pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gzhon nu/
52a3(rnying rgyud): rigs dang ye shes kun gyi bdag po/ phyi dang nang dang mthar thug kun gyis kyang // bdud rtsi sman gyi rang bzhin dngos mdzad pa/ gdul bya gdug pa can dug lnga dang nad bzhi brgya rje bzhis gzir ba rnams la sman gyi mchog tu bzhugs pa/ mtha'
52a4(rnying rgyud): dang dbus med pa phyogs dang ris med pa/ thams cad badrung rtsi'i pho brang chen po'i gzhal yas khang na/ zhi ba'i lha tshogs bdud rtsi mchog nyid bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid yum bdud rtsi 'bebasam/ rigs lnga ni bdud rtsi skyel ba/ khro bo bcu ni 'dud rtsi
52a5(rnying rgyud): srung ba/ lha dang klu dang tshangs pa rnams ni bdud rtsi 'thung ba'i 'khor grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab brjod kyis mi lang bzhing gi rdul tsam gyis bskor te bzhugs so// de lta bu'i 'khor gyi nang nas dpal phyag na rdo rje rang gi stan las langs nas zhu ba'i stobs
52a6(rnying rgyud): pa dang ldan par bzhugs so// bdud rtsi rin po cheng ltang 'khrungs pa'i rgyud ces bya ba las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas yang rdo rje khros pa des sa la gnas pa dang / sa la spyod pa dang / lam rim par sgrub pa dang / tshangs pa
52a7(rnying rgyud): dang // lha dang / klu dang / gza' dang skar ma dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha dang lham srin sde brgyad dang / nam thu dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / mi dang dud 'gro dang / dmyal ba dang / yoM dwags dang / 'byung ba
52b1(rnying rgyud): swa dang / rtse shing dang / nags tshal thams cad rngu 'phrul gyi stan gyis gzigs nas/ thams cad bdud rtsi'i dang bzhin du mkhyen to// de nas phyag rnordo rje rang gi stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ldan gsum dub skang zhing bcang phyag btsal nas
52b2(rnying rgyud): nganor ba mdzad de/ rdo rje khros pa la zhus pa/ thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la// drug ces 'byung ba ci 'iyi phyir// skye shi 'byung ba ci yi rgya// 'di dag gson ji ltar lags// gdul ba'i thabs ni ji ltar bgyi// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje khros pas
52b3(rnying rgyud): bkye 'phrul pa/ thams cad yenas bdud rtsi la// drag ces b+ha~M ba ga la yod// rang gi sbyong ba lag mong kyi// ta la nag po bya'i gsos// chu dang mar skyed snying drung sbran// drug tu 'dzin pa stod pa'i byon// grang btsun la gzur rnams// sbyor ba
52b4(rnying rgyud): log na 'chi bar nus// chu yis gsos na sman mar drug/ de bzhin bdud rtsi thams cad dang // sbyor ba log na kun kyang dug/ mkhas pas sman du shes gyur na// 'jig rten gsum du grags pa la// dug ces bya ba'i ming yang med// thams cad sman
52b5(rnying rgyud): gyur pa la// mkhas pas sbyor ba rig par bya// gyen na 'chi'i chu bo la// 'khor ba'i sa bon rtsub mo rnams// sdug bsngal lam gyi rgyun du chags// zla ba bdud bzhi mchod na// sgra 'chi 'di las thar dus med// de dag gso ba rnam bzhi ste// skyeb
52b6(rnying rgyud): yod bsod nams tshogs// skye ba rnam bzhi kun dka' yin// nab gso ba sran gyis gso// de la bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi yin// rgas pa gson zas kyis gso// yang na rlung rnams zad pa yin// 'chi ba gson bdud rtsi bsrub// tshe la rig 'dzin thob pa
52b7(rnying rgyud): gdug pa'i thabs ni sru gsung thugs// tshe 'phrul zad mi shes pas 'dul// zhes bka' stsal bas/ yang phyag rdordo rjes zhus pa/ 'jig rten khalas ni rab 'byams na// shin tu log pa'i sems can rnams// spen zhes bya ba'i ming med pas/
53a1(rnying rgyud): nam/ su na tu pa na ma / ga smra/
53a2(rnying rgyud): sa/ 'as / la
53a3(rnying rgyud): sa/ na
53a4(rnying rgyud): 'ang 'as pa // / wAng kya na ngas rgyal sprin pasu 'angab lam/ lal sa / thas dpa sbyin ma // na
53a5(rnying rgyud): nas pa mthal na// rlo ngag pas gdul bar das so// ga ba ga grags// rgya rdza ba po la ba thugs da// ngarab ma mamatag 'bras bu // mams na sa
53b1(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs pas// khyad kyang brdzun pa 'di la gzung // bzhi ban rtsa ba tha'i na dang bral// b+he 'argya bya ba med yang med// nus bka' stsal bas/ n+ya tranag pa nas so la lan gcig pang bas nas/ sams gsum sa dgasu mang maphral/
53b2(rnying rgyud): gsams can y-igs/ nga nags tshul pa mi gsos// sa phyogs 'ang ts+tshad ci ba dzugs// nga nas lam nyan/ bdu sbyin pa pang ltar 'thungs pa byad nas d+ha ba las dadapa gdus /
53b3(rnying rgyud): nas rje mtshan pas rgyas pa// lag pa'i rlung nan pa da// rgyud nga rgyan na rgya las byung // rigs dang po ni gang dag rtags// 'bras brdzun pa ni TIg lags// brtsal na yon tan tsam thog// ma baN+Dal ba la dz+nyAn \u0f7f// bka' stsal pa/ na
53b4(rnying rgyud): gzung 'don sngon laman+ta// rgyun ni chags tha~Mng spod la zhen// rigs ni 'khor ba'i rigs can te// wA ni 'byung po gdol par gtogs// sems la drug gsum thun bcangs nas// 'khor ba'i la 'drab rgyas po las// sems can sran du me
53b5(rnying rgyud): shes par// 'jig rten khams kun drug tu snang // 'bras bu na rgya chen por smin// btul ba'i yon tan dpapa las 'das// drug gas mdzad gtsang 'khor dong sprugs// 'khor bcos nyid chen por 'gyur// sems dang rdo rjesams bya
53b6(rnying rgyud): gnas// khog padur zhing brgyad du byud// phrang ba bdud tu spun ldangs// drug ces bya ba'i meng yang 'ad// srid pa gsum gyi 'jig tan yang // rnas yan sngon du 'gyur// thams cad badrang rtsi thang chugs mas// ma gtul ba ma
54a1(rnying rgyud): s+ho// su / ga tu na
54a2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyis bgros pa/
54a3(rnying rgyud): rgyan
54a4(rnying rgyud): nas
54a5(rnying rgyud): na sa
54b1(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba tshogs// kha rlangs bsam sbyor drug tu bsgyur// bzhi bcu rtsal na nad kyis 'gangs// thams cad bdud rtsi sman chen la// drang srong tsam du bzhag pa yi// gdug pa'i rlu tra drug pas sgrol// zhes bgros so// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i can/
54b2(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba las bde bar gshegs pa bka' bgros pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / da ltar bzos nas bad bar gshegs pa thams cad dgangs pa gcig tu bsdus nas/ rlu chen po de'i tshul dang bskrun pa'i phyir na/ da bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin chos
54b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad zlos pa dang bral bas mtha' dang dbus mdapa khyen pa// glan tu snang ba'i ti 'i 'angan tan mongs padrug gsum dang drug ma dang / bzhi brgyam bzhis nyan pa rnams la/ thugs na ma mkha' lta bu gcig gis khyab par mdzadag// @
54b4(rnying rgyud): sa
54b5(rnying rgyud): na / denas b.las zag par byung bal 'dzi / 'ad bdang chen pa gyu 'i byangs// na sa la san bcad pan / ba mapa' ba ci rnag pa'i bsad
54b6(rnying rgyud): bzhes sa thams cad pa' bdung d+ha byu/ 'dus dad brgyang pa dang b+ha ba dag rjeng // nyes pas spyong byung phyu ba rgyags/ den kyang tshab ba nithos pa gdanamal pa'ib mam byed
54b7(rnying rgyud): na ma su #
55a1(rnying rgyud): sams da sa nan gsums las dag ga sungs gang yang mad par gyu / da sa na 'du 'ang du la dubyung sanas lam pa la chu da/
55a2(rnying rgyud): dazla ba 'a tshal bas ma thas pakadang / mang mas thagapas 'di byung dra ba'i tshus da/ tham bcas pad 'amanga' can las pa/ ba bac+doMs ni leshes kyi kyi byas/ gas byam dus
55a3(rnying rgyud): bsgral/ rigs kyi sras lngas bdud 'bebs so// mche gshog nye shus bdu b+h+rUM 'khrugs/ bzang phyug bcwa brgyad pa na bdud kyi 'ang por bzhugs/ dbul ba bzhi bcon bzhon dag bzhi bcu rtsa bzhir gsang zhing ba
55a4(rnying rgyud): bzhugs pa// shin rje rjod kyi zhing tshomachag dbu kun brtsegs te thams cad bdud rtsi'i ngang du shar ra// bdud rtsi'i ngang du shar bas rdu dza ngas lan ldan pa dang thabs pa'i glegs ma rnyed // ras pral ltar grags pa zhi ga/
55a5(rnying rgyud): chen po'i lcags sas gnang te/ 'ji b+hang+ga rag sh+tsa sa bsngags pas rlung nag po dan de la shes khyeng kyis bzung ba lang nyam thag pa po yin tanga'i gnas la ba ga zi brjid la ltos dang zhes zaradeng dpal zan pas
55a6(rnying rgyud): bas gnas 'khor da gyur pa nam dang zung pashA ldan pa'i tshogs pas ma bris kyi slob pa ga zigs nas dbang du bsdus myong ba mdza nas/ thams cad dbang du bzlas ngas thams cad bdud rje sman pa lta mar bzhag pa/ dajug pa can ga
55a7(rnying rgyud): ga dang mdang mag ci gyitshogs pas mabyas sa pa yang dbang du bgrus ta bskal la khadapa cam du mad dade/ gzhal las bdag gnas 'dir phyir pa de/ byang chub mas kyi ring bzhin ga nang gi yangs kyi'i zung nga
55b1(rnying rgyud): gsung nga byang chub sams las bdud zer sgrur tA/ zhal du ram ma// me gtsang ba'i 'ad 'ardabs rna chags med pa na nan/ dz+wa tshan las bdud rtsis tshogs pa la te zhal rung ma la// gnas 'khor den na gangang nasar gyi zhang thabs pa ma khya /
55b2(rnying rgyud): gcig gnas pade rnams dri rgya las bdud rtsi sna tshogs su sbrul te rol ma// gnas 'khor den dka'i rgya me tsha lakhyil pa rnams pad+hA ha las bdud rtsir zhal dro la lo// der rna drug khri brjid nyams so// nyams 'di la gdab pa'i sngags drug gi 'khor lo d+ha
55b3(rnying rgyud): gas par bskoran/ mig gnyis par snang la khas su bsgyur bas/ thugs la ban pa/ nga langs spyod can nga khro pas bcad la sogs pardzogs de gnas/ da yang masha kyi phra bas btang nas sa pa la/
55b4(rnying rgyud): thad byud ni zhal drug stsol/ bdag 'i sa tha ma de gnas sa// yon lag dang bahrul c-ig ni la shas kyi ma dpa gas bsregasan po chu dang gsung duganas sa// lus kyi yan lag rnams bshags te 'jig rten kha gyis khyab par gtong ba// la
55b5(rnying rgyud): ma chog par gnas so// snying bcwa rtswa brgyad tshungs pa'i gnas su brgyung pas tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan par gyur to// tshwa ba rta'i yul du bsgyur bas ste yongs spo dang dra cang dulanano// lce gnong drun yul dubasgyang ngas gnang sbyin mthu spobs chabar dra / ma
55b6(rnying rgyud): gta bar sna 'ams su bsgyur bas te tha gnyis kyigs la bza pa// gang pa 'byung ba'i yul du brnyeng bar 'byung / srog phran pa'i yul du bgyur bas/ sran pa bdon gyi byung shin pa 'ams byed // len pa g.yas pan kya
55b7(rnying rgyud): ngas bca las keng bye blang druganams// lag pagasan pa 'ang bzang dubatu / 'dra rtsibs dang na/ thabachen na mkhyen du gyur bas/ ma ma spangasasam mngagasulas
56a1(rnying rgyud): bas/ sbrul grwa'i zhabs kyis gcag pa dang / smad nas byon pa'i snying stobs che/ lte ba kra yi yul du bsgyur bas/ sred pa'i ma tha tsam byed pa'i gtan tshigs byung / slad ma lus kyi bye brag rnams// 'jig rten
56a2(rnying rgyud): khams kun khyab pa ru// thams cad bdud rtsi sman du sprul// phyag gis drangs nas btsir nas ni// rdu rnga chen po snam du bton// shin tu d+hi tra 'gyod pa skyes// ngu zhing 'gyod pas bshags par byas// bdud rtsi chen po'i don gnyis byas// lhag
56a3(rnying rgyud): ma'i lus kyang gdan du phul// sems ni rdo rje sems dpar brtags// 'jig rten khams 'di khyab pa ru// bdag gi rnam shes sman du shog/ ces dmod bor rabs lus bshig tshad sman du gyur nas/ dpyid rtsa ba'i sman/ dbyar sdong po'i sngam
56a4(rnying rgyud): ston me tog dang 'bras bu sdong po'i sman dgun shun lpags dang thang chu nyil ba'i sman/ rang rang gi rtsa ba brgyad la yon tan stong dang ldan zhing 'jig rten khams sus le gnas so// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba las/ rlu tra bskal nas
56a5(rnying rgyud): lus 'jig rten du gyur pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pas rang gi stan las langs nas rdo rje khros pa la/ oM maho rdo rje khros pa'i gtso// sangs rgyas ya 'gyur dam pa'i bdag/ bdud rtsi nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod/
56a6(rnying rgyud): dbu la sangs rgyas bzhi bcus brgyan// bdud rtsi mchog la phyag 'tshal bstod// che mchog dgu ru brtsegs nas bzhugs// bdud rtsi 'bebs la phyag 'tshal bstod// gdug pa slad kyis tshar bcad nas// 'jig rten khams kun 'du
56a7(rnying rgyud): 'khrungs// sman pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal ba skyed// thams cad sman du bsgyur bad// bdag cag 'khor bcas ngamatshar // thugs rje chos kyi char sman gyis// steng dang 'og mad 'ang gtan gsum// ri rab tu dang sul dang /
56b1(rnying rgyud): bams cad khyab pa'i thugs rje yis// bdud rtsi'i char chen dbab tu gsol// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos bdud rtsi'i drod nam mkha' rlan bzhin du g.yos// bdud rtsi sred par byed pa'i sprin mgan phyogs ris med par gtabs/
56b2(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi'i skye gnas sa dang gangs dang ri brag krung shong dang / brag sul nam mkha' chu dang ri khyad dang // rtsi thog rang bzhin drod ni g.yo mdzad pa// rang bzhin 'jug dang glog sgra yang // bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs pa'i T+ya nA// thugs rje chos kyi char
56b3(rnying rgyud): sprin gyis// phyogs ris med par khyab par babs// me yis bdud rtsi drod phab nas// smin pa 'byung ba 'di lta ste// rtsa ba sdong po yal ga rnams// rlu tra'i lus las skyes par mdzad// bdud rtsirin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya
56b4(rnying rgyud): po las/ chu tha'i lus bshigs nas bdud rtsis bon du btab pa la thugs rdo'i char srin phab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas rdo rje gzhon nu ma// d+hu chen po bskal ba'i tshe// srog pa rtsa yi khrag yar bas// rgya
56b5(rnying rgyud): klu yi yul du yar// rtsab dmyal ba'i yul du zug/ sdug bsngalas la ba'i sman brgyad byung // tsha ba brgyad dang brang ba brgyad// chos kyi rgyal po'i lag na spyod// sdong po klu yi yul du zug/ bdud rtsi shud dag dkar po byung // rtswa rgyas
56b6(rnying rgyud): kun la phan pa'i sman// shin tu spangs pa'i lums la 'ji bas// bcangs na kra yi kha rlangs 'jil// klu ye drang srong bcu pos spyod// ra rab bar snang khams na 'gyo// bdud rtsi rnon po thad kar babs// skar ma'i drang srong bcu
56b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis spyod// yan lag lha mon yul du skyes// stobs dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsibabs// gza' yi drang srong brgyad rnams stong // 'dab ma gzhong thogs lhal sleb// zas dang ldan por 'dud ci 'khrungs// 'bras bu sum cu rtsa gsum
57a1(rnying rgyud): wA ya~M mAl san zab par la thAs// dge stong par gyur pa no// 'bras sa kun mchog san+d+ha// skye sa dbang pobargya byin dang // rnye pangs su rgyan gnyis ste// mAn ma chog dral snang pa yin// bAn/
57a2(rnying rgyud): zos pa'i dus pa yis// 'chi ba med pa'i gsung drung thob// lha rnams bsod nams che zhes bya// lha rnams kun kyang ngo mtshar nas// shing la bskor ba lan gsum byas// ngos des dag nas med yang btags// sher gyi lha yis ming btags la/
57a3(rnying rgyud): bco mo tshun chad la// dpag tshad khri tsho bcu bdun bcas// sems can kun la bzhon par 'dug/ ming yang dpag tshad bzhon shing zhes// shar gyi lha rnams kun gyis btags// rtsa ba sdong po yon tan stong // yon tan de bzhin 'byung bas na//
57a4(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi// kha lo stong 'byams zhes su btags// ri rab chen po'i dkyil brtol nas// nub na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi// yongs 'dus btol zhes su 'dogs// 'dzam bu gling gi dbus shed ni// lha rnams kun gyis bkra shis gsol/
57a5(rnying rgyud): longs spyod 'phel 'gyur bas// 'di ni lha yi bsod nams yin// shing chen byams ldan zhes su btags// shing gi yal ga dum bu kun// byis pa kun gyi rtse gyur pas// skad cig yud la lus bong rdzogs// shing bu bi la ba zhes su grags//
57a6(rnying rgyud): shis chos rnams 'byung ba'i rgyu// 'bras bu sman chen arbar// 'chi ba med pa a rur btags// med kyang chags pasar du btags// rigs ni rnam pa bcu ru gyes// ngo mtshar ldan pa'i a rud// snying gi dkyil dang 'dra ba gcig/ tshang
57a7(rnying rgyud): yul du gyes te song // tshangs pa kun grol chen pos zos// tshe yi rig 'dzin chen po thob// tshangs pa'i drang srong brgyad rnams dang // bu dang tsha ga yang tshar bcas// tshangs pa'i drang srong bu rnams kyis// 'chi ba med pa'i dngos su /
57b1(rnying rgyud): sa/ sa sbyin pa// rnam ma gyu // na/ la kya sa / na/
57b2(rnying rgyud): yon tan thob// gcig ni lha 'i yul du spyod// dpagu du med pa'i macar// kye chung mi ni pan pa// stod dang srad dag zla bar 'dug/ yul ba dge kyang med pa la// dkar sar ma dag byed gting na 'dzid// 'angs dpa la don pos da byes pa
57b3(rnying rgyud): bzhag pa tsam gyis nad rnams sol// lho rigs lta bu'i mi rnams sam// bsod nams can la sbyar ba las// gzhan gyis de ni thub pa med// gcig ni gnod sbyin yul du 'khrungs// stobs dang ldan zhing gzi thabs can// kha dog dgra na
57b4(rnying rgyud): gnas// che chung tshad ni bca' ci'i stod// rtse mo rdo rje'i dbyibs su 'dug/ phyag na rdo rjes dbang bsgyur bas// mthu dang stobs su ldan pa yin// bgegs kyis spyod pa'i nad la gtang // gcig ni gza' yi yul du yar// dbyibs ni dra ye dbying
57b5(rnying rgyud): su 'dug/ tshe chung tshad ni sbyangs dang mnyam// bai DUr+ya yis byin gyis brlabs// drag shul spyod pa'i nad la gtang // gza' yi drang sprong brgyad rnams spyod// gcig ni ri bdun kha la 'bas// srid pa gzhom pa'i a rur// dbyibs ni zla ba'i dbyibs su
57b6(rnying rgyud): 'dug/ ser la dmar ba nyi ma'i mdog/ sul bu phyogs gcig dag nas skye// pra zhing mang bas nyi zer 'dra// 'od kyi rgyal pos byin gyis brlabs// che chung tshad ni lnga bo dri tsam// grang bas nyen pa rnams la sbur// gcig ni klu yi yul du
57b7(rnying rgyud): babs// 'joms par byed pa'i a ru rare// sul bu shin tu phral zhib// sul bu dmar zhing logs rnams dkar// gyen dugs pa'i ser ga can// che chung tshad ni na gi pi tsam// spyan ras gzigs kyis byin gyis brlabs// rma mi grang bdun la
58a1(rnying rgyud): rla bas// rtswa dang nagand // gcig na gardzag 'din sul dubabs// sbyin ma nga bags byam // sa 'a cing sprum la 'dres// du du ba// / thub par rdzogs rgya gyis brlabs
58a2(rnying rgyud): sha rnams rab tu skam pa dang // rlung dang rgas par gyur pa yi// sha tshil me ltar 'bar bar byed// gzhon nur 'gro la the tshom med// gcig ni gtsang ma'i gnas sra babs// dbyibs ni sgo/ nga'i dbyings su gnas// sul bu med cing yu ba tsan/
58a3(rnying rgyud): che chung lug pho'i long ga tsam// lha mo sgrol mas byin gyis brlabs// 'jam chos kun la rab tu bsngags// de ltar 'jig rten dgu po ru// zos pas tshe lo khri 'bum thub// bsgrubs pas rkyen med dngos grub thong // bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i na
58a4(rnying rgyud): rnams kun// 'jig rten dgu ru ljang ma nu sa// shin tu ngo mtshar gyur nas ni// 'di ni tshad med shing gi snyun// rdzab dmyal ba'i yul na yod// rtsa ba bcad pas sdong ma 'gyel// grwa yi bsod nams yin par ngas// sdong po bcad pas dang
58a5(rnying rgyud): chags// lha min gza' skar bsod nams yin// ngar pa bcad pas yal ma bskams// drang srong brgyad kyi bsod nams yin// yal ka bcad pas 'dab ma longs ma nyil// gzhong thogs lha yi bsod nams yin// lha ma yin/
58a6(rnying rgyud): gyi ral gri yis// lha rnams kun la zhe sdang langs// 'bras bu 'dab ma'i mtshams su bcad// lha yi bsod nams ma gribs// 'bras bu bar snang khams su smin// me tog u dum wAr yang // bdun gyi mtha' ma bskor nas
58a7(rnying rgyud): gnas// sngam pas kyang medangs dang ldan// me tog su dum war la// lha rnams kun gyis bltas gyur pas// spyan gyi dngos su' chen po thob// reg pas lus kyi nad rnams byed// zos pas rgya mo rig 'dzin tho// lha rnams kun gyi ngo mtshor thob/
58b1(rnying rgyud): lhung ba'i dpag bsam ljon shing 'di// lha yi bsod nams las las grub// klu dang dmyal ba gzang skar gyis// bcad de thung bar mi 'gyur la// bzhog ste phra bar ma gyur la// lha ma yin ni zhe sdang gis// lo ma phral yang 'bras bu smin// ya mtshan
58b2(rnying rgyud): me tog gting nas skyes// 'di yi ngo mtshar che tshod la// shing la lha gcig mi bdog gam// sman la srung ma mi bdog gam// zhes nam mkha' la bltas te nam mkha' la dmod pa por ro// de nas cung zhig ljon pa dang / lha rnams bsod nams che ba
58b3(rnying rgyud): dang // mdun gyi nam mkha' dag las ni// 'di lta bu yi sgra rnams byung // e ma ho// ngo mtshar che ba'i shing dang sman// skyes pa rU tra'i srog rtsa yin// mchod pa ni rU tra'i mthu// me tog lha yi bsod nams yin// 'bras bu smin pa kun gyi gsos/
58b4(rnying rgyud): 'dis ni lha mo rim par 'byung // zhes bya ba'i sgra byung nas/ mdun gyi nam mkha' na srin mo kro d+hI shwa rI zhes bya ba bdud dang rU tra'i chung ma de byung nas/ bdag gi gtso bo dpag bsam gyi shing du skyes nas 'dug go// shin tu gdung ba'i sems kyis ni//
58b5(rnying rgyud): la hril gyi 'khril nas 'dug/ 'od ni dpag tshad gcig dang chas// shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang mar// lha rnams kun gyis ming yang btags// shin tu dung ba'i mchi ma ni// thang la thigs gcig lhung ba las// ga bur dmar rtsa can gcig 'khrungs/
58b6(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi skyobs yin te// dkar la dmar rtsa chags pa zhig/ bltas na gting rnams shin tu 'tshir// dri yang bro mo dag tu mnam// khrag gis mig rnams long la phan// shin tu chags pa skyes pa las// mngal gyi g.ya chu thigs
58b7(rnying rgyud): gcig 'jigs// lha rnams kun pa ngo tsha nas// tsan+dan shing gi sdong bu yis// g.ya' chu blangs te sa la bsgyur// 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su skyes// bdud rtsig pur zhes su grags// de yang shel gyi pog phor dri// mkhregs shing dkar
59a1(rnying rgyud): lak+sha pa da ldan// khrilang nyam mang sadumanams// tsha ba na rnams phyogs drus// zhen napa si la ba'i bdudu sa// yag byung mas lhag ma cig/ sngags pa na
59a2(rnying rgyud): lha mos chu gcig gtang ba las// dri chu sAl lug ste byung // lha rnams kun la dim nas// dung chen phyogs kyi lhums kris bcus// rgya mtsho'i nang du sa bkyis po// bdud rtsimu tig dag tu smin// n+ya mtsho'i mtha' kun khyab par smin/ ba
59a3(rnying rgyud): las chu thigs sngon po 'khrungs// mu tig dkar po dri ma med// nyi ma'i 'od bas shin tu 'tsher// zla ba'i bkrag pas shin tu dkar// rus pa chags pa kun gyi gsos// stobs kyang zla ba nya pa bzhin// sems rnams gso ba
59a4(rnying rgyud): shis// byang chub sems kyi gtso bo yin// chu las chu thigs byung ba ni// nyi ma'i zer gyis phogs pa ni// nam mkha'i thigs pa 'thigs pa 'dra// kha dog 'od ni ut+pal la// dri ma med cing bkrag mdangs ldan// spobs chen
59a5(rnying rgyud): gyis rab brgyan nas// chu rnams lpags sa kun la phab// sa dang chu ru 'dres pa las// mu man theg rgya'i rdo ru ljin// kha spo sa yi mdog tu gnas// sbrum gyis phog na bkrag kyang gsal// skyobs chen drug gris khrid gyur
59a6(rnying rgyud): glang rnams na pa'i sman du 'gro// de nas lha rnams mdun mar 'dus// 'u cag bdud rtsi'i rgyal po 'dus// rma rna mis byung yang sos 'gyur bas// lha ma yin la dmag drangs zer// lha yaM g.yul ro chen po bzlog/ lha min rnams lang
59a7(rnying rgyud): drangs pas// lha yi g.yul ngo rab tu rgyal// shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang ma// zhal nas sman mchog a bar gsol// lho ru bltas te 'dzum gcig shor// sman mchog a rur gcig ni// lho yi 'dzam bu'i gling du yar// deraskye
59b1(rnying rgyud): rgal po bsod nams can// dza zhes bya ba'i khang stengs su// dro la gcig la babs te byung // tsid+b+ha pi ta byA ba'i shing // ya mtshan can la 'khrungs te byung // ming yang rnam par rgyal ba bya// che chung b+ho ra'i b+har+d+ha tsam// dbyibs ni bum pa'i
59b2(rnying rgyud): dbyibs su 'dug/ dkar dang ser dang dmar ba'i bkrag/ spri yi bar na nag po yod// bdas pa'i shun ni sngon po ldang // zur gyis tsha ba'i nad rnams sel// skyibs kyis grang ba'i nad rnams sel// sha yis rlung gi na rnams sel// pags pas
59b3(rnying rgyud): rnams dag kyang 'tsho// dri yis 'dus pa kun kyang sel// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams la// btang na mi phan gcig kyang med// sbyor ba kun kyang 'jil ba'i sman// rgyal po rdo zhes bya ba des// gsol bas tshe lo khri phrag bub// yul bu brgya dang
59b4(rnying rgyud): bco lnga gnas// ro res na pa bzhi bzhi sel// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i gnyen po la// bcu gcig rgas pa gso ba'i sman// lha mo rnams kyis bskor ba bgyis// chos skyong mgon pos srung ma bgyis// shAkya thub pas byin gyis brlabs//
59b5(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpas bkra shis gsol// mi rnams kun gyis ngo mtshar brjod// bcom ldan shA n+ya thub pa yis// bsam gtan mdzad pa'i shar phyogs su// kha ni shar du bltas nas skyes// lha rdzas dge ba ma rung // lha srin sde brgyad kun gyis ni/
59b6(rnying rgyud): bkra shis ngo mtshar kun gyis gsol// gza' chen khyab 'jug skrag pa bdun// lha rdzas de yi mgul du lug/ rigs bdunas lnga ldud ste sprin// lha rdzas dge ba a rung // rigs bdun sa la lhung ba ni// brgya byin bdud rtsi 'thung ba'i tshe// tri
59b7(rnying rgyud): pa bdun nis la lhung // rlung gis khyer te sa la gyes// bdud rtsi'i gtso bor rab tu grags// dngos su a ru'i 'bras bu ste// rigs ni rnam pa bdun yod de// rnam par rgyal ba dang / gsum bsgribs dang / gsod byed dang / 'jigs byed
60a1(rnying rgyud): da/ nga na/ // sa / du spyo na/ rgyu sa // /
60a2(rnying rgyud): dral la yod pa pa lngas pa la ba byed pa ni/ na grags pas pas rnye na sel/ rjes pa me ban ma khris sa la/ nid nabs pa kun nal/ dbus lda pas tshus mam/ gan gyi dus pa 'dus skyel/ rang ba
60a3(rnying rgyud): de 'dran// man dag can gyis bsgru gyur na// byin rlabs la mtshan chen por 'gyur// tshong dpon bu ma nar bzang ma// nor bu rin chen yon durdul// bkra shis mchog tu 'di brjod do// 'dzam skad rgyal pi bsod nams ca /
60a4(rnying rgyud): badz+ran mkha' las byung ba'i// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i gnyen po 'di// bdag gis dang du blang bar bya// zhes phyag tu bzhes pas/ mi rnams kun gyis 'jig rten/ sman gyi sgyu mo nor gyi rgyun zhes su rmugs// u du ma bar ba bdun
60a5(rnying rgyud): la// yam tshan che ba'i bya bdun chags// snying po za ba che bu byung // smin gyi bya yin dug rnams za// lha mo kun sbyang ma bu'i mabyin// nags kyi sgom zhes su grags// ga gis dang srin ta kun teg dang // bza mo ma bya ba shis rlo/
60a6(rnying rgyud): chung la grogs te lding ba'i bya// sman las gur bas drug rnams thub// spyir yang mkha'i lding bya rnams kun// shin dutsha ba'i stobs dang ldan// dpag cad dag gis gang khyab pa// mthu nga drang srong rnams kyis ni// gza' dang ma
60a7(rnying rgyud): ra/ sa su sa// du 'a kyi gyu 'a nga chug tha da kyi zung ga gyi ma da na/
60b1(rnying rgyud): chen po bsgral ba yi// srog chags bsad pa'i khrag rjes kun// kro d+hi ma yis zhabs kyis bsdus// thu ba g.yas su bcu ga nas khyer// lha rnams rol mo byed par mnyan// yangs pas tha ba'i mgul nas shor// nga yi skal nyan pad//
60b2(rnying rgyud): ba yin+d+ra T+TerA nAs brang gcig brdungs// 'dam bu gling gi nub tu skyes// rtsa rnams 'jam pa'i phyogs su 'khrungs// nub tu kha bltas kun tu skyes// dbyibs ni a ru dang 'dra ste// sul bu med cing babruna'i mdog/ yu ba can de da
60b3(rnying rgyud): srong yin// shi tu myur la~M kha ba'an// ming yang bahU~M oMSh+T+r-iH// bram ni 'khyil bstan gyi mchog/ ri yang myu nga mdangan dang rdzun// khrigarnams pazla can lag ta// 'bras thogs ma du ltar gyun// gnams sbyin rje rnam
60b4(rnying rgyud): slong // btogs nas zhag gsum bar du ni// gcan gzan spu yis byibs te bzhag/ byi shun rang gis 'byed 'don na// drod tshad dus la babs pa yin// grib ma spangs la me nyir bskam// ha cang tsha bar gyur na ni// nus pa cung zhig 'dzag pa
60b5(rnying rgyud): yin// grang sar phyin te bskam par bya// sbyor ba gang dang gang byug pa// sum cu tham pa'i cha gcig gtang // bung ni gtso bos 'jal ba yin// sman tshad dag tu sbyor gyur na// phul gang phan chad chu yis ni// nyen par byas pa ma yin no// gam
60b6(rnying rgyud): phye dag la gtong 'gyur na// ran la mdzes pa'i chang du spang // drod kyis zhag gcig pa bug la gtang // gal te zangs thal byung ba na// mi tsha de yi che gcig dang // kha mo thabs la sbyar te gtang // de yis khrag gi zil pa rnams// bdud rtsi rab mo
61a1(rnying rgyud): seMnas smras// nga rnams rgyas pa'i san lathungs// dral chengs la 'khrang sa mod kyang // rtsa brnal sdong po la phyog/ 'dab sa yi na pa'ang// dang buklags brtag ka// 'bras panam 'dram kyang // 'ag tung
61a2(rnying rgyud): kAr mngar ba'i ro// bdakan stug pa'i gnyen po yin// 'khru dang skyug pa gtsad byed cing // sman rnams kun gyi sangs pa 'gyur// khabs lA bu rjes cung zhig ce// rig pa can gyi gyi rnams za// mi rnams can gyis rgyas su na// khong gi dang rnams
61a3(rnying rgyud): khad kyis 'byung // mnan nas zos na nus pa 'byung // phabs mya byas nas kun la 'jug/ gcig ni ki ni ba tsos bya// mkha' lding gong mo kun gyis tshor// rtsab lo maram bu 'dra// 'bas bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rtsi ba brkos te sa
61a4(rnying rgyud): 'od nad rnam pa kun la byams// sbyar nas sman rnams langs pa'i sman// khrag zags pa la rab tu bsngags// nu tra'i se ni yar ba las// shing chen ma gi ta dra skyes// mu la gram shing mgul du rmis// de las sa te 'ang khu pal/
61a5(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi gang byung // mdog ni dkar la dri ro med// khro sogs 'dra ste shin tu smon/ gyis// shin tu bsil te grol 'jug/ rU tra'i ba su pa ra ba las// brjod rtsi chen po pa la// phra ma nyen rdzal me lag sngogs 'dra// dkar ser mdog da
61a6(rnying rgyud): ma ma s+t+rai d+h+waM// ston pa rab tu byung sar skyes// kun la rab tu snyoms pa'i sman// d+hUH'i ste khrag yang ba las// tsan+dan sgeg po dag du 'khrungs// shin tu sdug N+Di dri yang ldang // labs la gtad mang tshel ba byed// dgags rnams can
61a7(rnying rgyud): gnyen po yin// khrag gin dang lte ba mgul// pho grang kun la cung zhig ni// nu tra'i sras sgra tshoms gcig/ sa mi steng du yar ba yis// gad+hAd+ha dra'i sprin du khrungs// dbyibs dang mjugs ni mangs te// shi dgi pa la gdag dang dru/
61b1(rnying rgyud): nad rnams rtswa ru zhugs la phan// mchin khrag de yi steng du yar// bdud rtsi grwar gum zhes su grags// sman mchog de yi me tog ni// la che'i rgyal khams kun tu skyes// ston pas kha ba ni bzhes pa'i saru// dmar rtsa ldum bu rtsa ru skyes// khA ba'i/
61b2(rnying rgyud): ro ldan mchin pa'i sman// mig ni rgud pa kun la phan// de las gyes pa'i yal ga yang // sman mchog bdud rtsi a ba bya// rtsub pa brag ri'i sked la 'khrungs// ldum bu grug po rtsayi dbyibs// rdzi thog mar dang sbar gyur na// de yi nus pas mig
61b3(rnying rgyud): nad sel// rU rba'i rlig 'bras yar bA las// bdud rtsi de yi steng du babs// sngo skya'i mdog ste mi mgo'i gzugs// ming ni dza ti phal bya// dri yang bzang zhing stobs dang ldan// rlung nad kun la rab tu bsngags// gal te 'gyangs par
61b4(rnying rgyud): na yang // dri dang stobs kyis nad 'jil nus// sbyor ba dag tu gyur pa na// me dang chu yi nyen mi bya// kun la snyoms pa bdud rtsi yin// snying rlung kun la rab tu bsngags// kha ru tsha dang cha snyoms nas// rtsi rdog mar gyis sgra khrid na// zos pa
61b5(rnying rgyud): tsam gyis snying rlung rnams// nges par ming yang med par 'gyur// rA tra'i mdzub mo yar ba las// kha brag lam gsum mdo chen dang // gas gle brag gi sde la 'khrungs// bdud rtsi chen po ka ko la// 'dab ma rin chen phyir srog 'dra// snying po re'u
61b6(rnying rgyud): thul phyir srog 'dra// mgul pa shin tu dra ba la// yan lag shin tu meng bar gnas// 'bras bu nu tra'i mdzub mo 'dra// zhu rjes grang ba kun la snyoms// ston zla 'bring po'i nya la brda// grib ma dag la bskams te gtang // rU tra'i mchan khung
61b7(rnying rgyud): dri ma ni// rgya gar bal po'i mtshams su yir// thang gas brag glo dag dang // ri rtsub dag gi shing du 'khrungs// bdud rtsi chen po sug smel yin// rtsa ba rin zhing shin tu phra// snying po phra zhing 'dab ma leb// 'dab rtse zur gsum rtsi mo rno// me
62a1(rnying rgyud): dum brgyag/ / brtad pa// bstsu/ nas kla/ seM das kyi rgyun/ ma ma 'du sa bamam tu/ gzhan dul zugs kya
62a2(rnying rgyud): kyi 'a du shA// mgrin pa bangs / tshabad na// dus supangs par gyu te// tshe thang ldan pa rnams pa'o// rna'i khrims khrid gyung / dzad dun kyi / sde'i rgya sa
62a3(rnying rgyud): sa de rkye mig la tha // khags phyi gas pa mags ngab // mamyong ba da pa gtub dgas// bdu bye na cigaspangs pang du zhes byabya sa/ bskya 'alas yang
62a4(rnying rgyud): sa 'od sa na mas bzhal bam mdzes par b.las// glegs pa 'i nga// gtog nas bye da ci ya // saN+Dags pa'i mi nga grags//
62a5(rnying rgyud): drabyung // nabu drugs pa'i dbyil drug nas// nag patshung dag gis midangs byang na// he ma'i 'a dang ldan par 'gyur // ngad ba tu lde gcab s+ho/ zlad kyi 'phel 'dadang dro// wa 'gyur ba'i bdud yin// gcig na bdud gyur
62a6(rnying rgyud): po sa stsog pa ris pa med / bdug pa 'i 'a pa rnas / thug man par da // nag pa bye na no// phyi'i balhags par byung // ma nadapa dzi nga/ rdzag da na
62a7(rnying rgyud): sas kya ma ma thongs pa ste/ byed dus myangos nga tsu pa mi dgas su kyi ma mad/ so mtshur / ba na spong ya da/
62b1(rnying rgyud): dgal ga// sha mthos sbyin pa'i du man// rjegs pag ci de yar bzlas// b+h+yo dug lardzus// sum tshug par gan las// nga ba chags kyang thug pa gnas// martag ma sgragasasal // / ba pa na pa
62b2(rnying rgyud): 'ardza // ston tha dgran pa'i mtshams sa kye// byib ma dag la rab tu bskam// kaun tu bsil ba'i nga d+ha gas// thigs pa gcig ni yang ba ltas// bdud rtsi chen pa teg tu byung // kyi shing 'dris pa gas padag dang // rjerjen mang bya bal
62b3(rnying rgyud): nad nams 'khyogs pa 'go 'byed yin// zlas rnams kun gyi ldemig len// shin tu gding ba'i sman zhes bya'o// thigs pa gcig ni yang ba las// ji ltagasar gri zhing du zlas// la dag myur ba 'dra med kyang // sra ma 'i kang ltabur bya/
62b4(rnying rgyud): mgul klog 'dra ba skyes// sra ci gtang ba'i mdog dang ldan// lo mchung zhing rtsabasdom// shin tu dro ba'i zag la 'khrungs// khrag gis sbyang bar gyur pa dang // bal na dag gi bdud rtsi yon// theg pa gcig ni yang ba las// bdud chen
62b5(rnying rgyud): da ts+tsha// rna bzhi cag pags// man po gagag pa dra// dang 'dzus mngog// gapa dug kyi mtshams sul byung // khyod chung sa bang / lam ya dag na ba ste// chudang thams tamang gta
62b6(rnying rgyud): 'din ni nyid kyi 'dud kyi men// zas su mas na mig byed// gang tedul bar gyur na// bdam khris bcas rdzog par 'gyung // gdu ba ba da de// gri ban pa ri lams dgag// mo gnyis par dru bangs shing bsgyud/
63a1(rnying rgyud): na / sa sa gyu/ na sa su smra// smos s+ho//

63a5(rnying rgyud): da byung kyi dul sa// slang nga zang brnams sa dang // na sbyinas tshul dus rdza mi yin// bta sa te ma du byas byung / ma yi che sa dang yid la gardzongs// du kyi stobs rgyad// bad 'a gzugs dzig
63a6(rnying rgyud): sa// drug pa thal rngu ba khrag pa'i mdog/ bcag na rlung can ni na bil// ga ng+gA byu ba do la rungs// mo'i rgyang gas khrid gyur na// gad pa nyams pa'i bdud kyi min// thad dge jigs gcig yang b.las// gang pa
63a7(rnying rgyud): thabs par dri ma ngas// mdog dgang mthogs shi tagasan 'das// rkyen kyi khrid gyun// ma dum nga yang ya // 'byung par 'a ma ma// thad pa nga na yang ba'ang// dbang dpa ga
63b1(rnying rgyud): sas pa yang// don gal ba su la yar // bdun nan jus te// cad du nas gsas rgyan/ smra ga// sgrubs nams padrugs gnas// sa nga /
63b2(rnying rgyud): sa ma ngag dang / 'thang pa'i rjes pal// ma ma khrigs kyigs sa gyur/ shi mi 'tshar/ nas nga ba ma sadaga'// mig dag sa
63b3(rnying rgyud): rgyaphra pa mam+b+ha mi sbed// rkyen gyis rnam pa chog gyu // btang na ltab 'tshor mi sred// ya nan tsas gang zin pa// zhi cwa d+hags te sgyum dang bkres// ba skum nye byas par gyung nan// was zungs dag cing 'tshor mi srid// hU~M 'i 'gas pa'i
63b4(rnying rgyud): pa ni// gtsug ni phul yang ba las// rgyam gyi can pa'i sde las 'khrungs// skyeng chu za mo'i nang du 'khrungs// sems can ze byig du 'khrungs// btags te theg dkar brdos gyu te// rmad brgya dang phyur gyur nas// mang dag dag gis khrid krung /
63b5(rnying rgyud): sa /
63b6(rnying rgyud): la ba'i d+hA ts+tsha ba~M/ nigs byin gyis brlabaste// bad ma dung ga nyis byung ba// klan+ya pa dag pa brgyan gyis brlabs// btags na 'od gyur// rlung gyis pa pas byas te// zhag gsum pa na bya na//

64b1(rnying rgyud): ngal lam pa ma thams kyar ba // dgran na tsud la bar// 'iganams sa 'd-i du d+hA// na mig slo ra byag+sas// phyogs zlogasus // da nga bar dul dus// nga d+han da dra /
64b2(rnying rgyud): ci yin// ka ra dkar dang sbyar byas nas// grang ba'i thad du 'thung gyur na// dpag tshad gsum du grag pa yi// mgrin pa bde ba'i bdud rtsi yin// mig sprin dmar po'i mchi ma las// nags kyi gseb tu yang ba las// chu shug shang
64b3(rnying rgyud): mgul du 'khrungs// rtsa ba phra zhing lo ma phra// dar ba'i tshad ni mtho gang skyes// phyi ldang nang dag skrag po la// ming yang u mu ta ru grags// mig la rkyen gyis bskrad pa la// go snyod dag gis spu khrid nas// mar dkar dge dang rung zhing
64b4(rnying rgyud): sbyar// lho du za bar bya ba'am// rkang mthil lag mthil spyi bo ru// lums kyi thabs su dug byas na// mig ni tsha la sogs pa rnams// 'bras bu zhar bar gyur pa ni// gsal bar 'gyur te the tshom med// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khru
64b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud las/ rU tra chen po bskal ba las mig bcud mchi ma'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas rdo rje gzhon nu yis// lha yi snyan dbang 'thob bya'i phyir// nu tra'i rnab par ba las// cha ni bcu gcig yar nas song // gcig
64b6(rnying rgyud): ni tshungs pa'i yul du yar// yA mtshan 'phrul gyi me tog skyes// sangs rgyas chos rnams 'chad pa zos// gcig ni dga' ldan gnas su yar// u dum wa ra'i me tog 'khrungs// tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs drug cu thob// gcig ni
64b7(rnying rgyud): thal du // rnams pa' bldan kyis sun nga// gciganag na byin bral du ma // btsuna'i nga// phyag rigs gas thos// gcig na bdun pa la me // matog na
65a1(rnying rgyud): 'akrungs// 'khong mas nam na yang thos// gno na rgyam pa la dum // rin can rtog 'anal // man dus tha med sgrum pa// rang rgya// bdu pa
65a2(rnying rgyud): sa dngas par gyur ba dang // rnarnams dngas par gyur ba 'o// bdud mi yin ta thams kyildan// glegs panyims la yang b.las// phrin pa tham pa'i la 'jungs// bcu chen pa dang yin pa// tshor ba thams 'jug/ @
65a3(rnying rgyud): nab bya// rtsa ba'i sngags sul zla yong // rim chog kha bar gyur pal// kun rtag paden pa'i bdud ci yin// thigs ga snams la yar ba las// sa phyogs rlos med kun tu ngas// bza bar gyur bal// 'dab khrig gan pa dang /
65a4(rnying rgyud): pa byung po sems can bzhin// maud yang rtag sul dkar gyis// dbyar zlan chung spyad la bangs// maur dang sbyar nas zos na 'tsho// drang zhig chas rgyan gyur na// yig 'gags pa'i bdud rje yin// bdungs te thams sa zas rgyan// ma
65a5(rnying rgyud): rings bkun kya // thigs bzhis pa yang ba las// gangs sbyangs bral po'i mthal du la khrungs// l+h+wam tha la zhes su grags// lo ma thal phal ga med// kham ser sna 'i mtho// drag za gso 'a'i dadun ci yin/
65a6(rnying rgyud): sa pa sang ba las// mdzod ga yang se la rgyal du khrangs// bdud ni thug pa la yin// rnab po ma shon tu na// kun pa zhug pa'i khyod dang mtshungs// gdug gsong 'i bdud ci yin// rjod dam sa thal bar mgyun na// na
65a7(rnying rgyud): thecom med// bcu rin gyi'i bya zhes bya ba'i rgyud las brgyad da srabs kyi yang gyi bcugasum ro// / don jigagan na thong // mi dngos sru 'thong bya byor// skabs ni gsus duyang b.las// thas
65b1(rnying rgyud): dang dru ra// rnam pa ba la bas// bzang na pa la bsanamang// gas bad// maba'i na thobs kyiyin// thag la sar thas cad na byung // sram sumazin pa dag dang snang// rung gisam ma rnams// da
65b2(rnying rgyud): la sbyar te btub byas na// bu mo gzhon nu la sogs pa// mA mo mra so mdangs can rnams// skye zhug shin tu dang chags nas// 'gags par byed pa'i bdud rtsi min// gcig ni sa la yang ba las// kye pog dkar ba dag tu byes/
65b3(rnying rgyud): pa zh-i zhing me rtog za// lo ma de dag de bzhin pa/ tshar dri yang mi ni ma n+ta// nad ldog byung ba'i bdu rtsi yin// gcig ni mcho ga ter ma gul du par// skyon nA kun mtshams su la blangs// shel ma khrims na rdzudapa/
65b4(rnying rgyud): drang zer 'i tshe// rgya mtsha shing tshabral tshad de// rwa tsha dang ni kha muH// nad rnams 'dril bar gyur pa dang // sran rnams rengs dang mazhu dang // mang ba'i zas kyis ri 'don zhing // gnas su bstims pa'i bdud rtsi pan// @
65b5(rnying rgyud): drin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ rlung chen po bskal ba las sna bcud skabs kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// / dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu yiswa// rlu nga chen po bskul ba'i // smra ba'i seng ges dbang bslar /
65b6(rnying rgyud): lde bcud mchil ma'i bdud rtsir gyur// thigs pa bzhi ru ya rab las// khrag dang mchil ma 'dres pa las// gnod sbyin chen po kha 'bar byung // shAkya thub pa'i gam du phyin// rang gi sde bcad daphul ba las// bdud rtsi chen po
65b7(rnying rgyud): gser brgyudan// mi bde rtsub pa'i sa ru 'khrungs// cab 'dril zhing ngar bshar// shing mdog spug la me tog dkar// 'bras bu dmar ba'i mdog tu 'khrungs// rtsa bsgyur la ma ngar ba'i sman// bdakan la sogs nad rnams /
