66b1(rnying rgyud): bar byed// rlo mngang khru rjes med par bstan// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ lce brgyad mchil ma'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon nu yis// rlung chen po bsgral dang rtsa//
66b2(rnying rgyud): bred nas rdul gcig byung // yar ni thegs pa gsum du yar// swA ya~M rtse nas rdul byung bas// sA phyogs sa blo dag tu 'khrungs// bdud kyi chen po rdul rdo byung // chu mdog dkar rdzo'i mdang sa dang ldan// a rbar lI spyan sbyar rnams
66b3(rnying rgyud): du bzla' bar byed pa'i dus// lus kyi drim pazlas gyur te// hri li yul dathugs sbyar nA// phung ngo ma 'jigs bdud rtsi yin// shi ba'i rol bkrus gyur ni// sems de khrag par mi 'gyur kyang // lus kyi ga'i byin pa'i tshor bar// brga
66b4(rnying rgyud): pa sa zhig par du ni// phung po brtan pa'i bdud rtse yin// mtshan khung sgra la dz+wal gcig ni// shing chen thug pa'i steng du yar// shing gi 'bras bur gyur pa la// 'dab ma dbyur rjes dgun ni skams// 'brul zan la mnan gyur na// phabs
66b5(rnying rgyud): gyur pa'i bdud rtsi yin// nad la bdud rtsi'i bcud bton na// sems kyi rtsal shugs bskyed pa dang // rlung nad kun gyi bdud rtsi yin// shing chen de yi 'bras bu yang // lo gcig ba spu'i tshul du 'khrungs// lums su bgyis na nad rnams 'a/
66b6(rnying rgyud): lo gnyis ma smin sgo ril 'dra// gsher dug kun gyi sna 'dren yin// lo gsum lon nas smin pa yang // rU tra'i rdul nag 'dra ba gcig/ ro mngar thang chu'i bag dang ldan// brdungs te chu la sbyar gyur na// chu ba rengs dang yan lag rengs// rlung
66b7(rnying rgyud): dang rgyas ba rjings la phan// po batshan las dul byung // khyim mu skang la yar// bdud kyi ldan pa tid bathung // Nabacu rtsing 'dad rgyag// bzlas d+ha ba ra mag 'dra// rlung zhig smin pa la bang // yang da dun nyid du //
67a1(rnying rgyud): mas lags pa smras // sa sa nan/ ma na zla / na
67a2(rnying rgyud): rkye rjeg rnon na yis// rlung rkyen po bsgral ba'itshe// khrag gi brgyad ni btsun pa laste// thigs pa bdun du ga ranas mang // gcig ni rin chen pangs dor 'khrungs// shin d+ha brda ba lhun na meng // dran 'brir ga po yi// mi
67a3(rnying rgyud): ling 'og byung ba'i sman// thigs gnyis sa la yur ba las// bdud rtsi wAn a mr-i ta// zag dmar mo mtshan 'dra ba'i shod// sa phyogs shin tu 'jam par 'khrungs// rtsu ba ring zhing ngar ba shar// grangs med me tog ser la spangag// 'tha
67a4(rnying rgyud): khrag gi zig pa bzhin// mon dgaso pa'i bdud ni yin// thigs gsums la ya ba las// garba Ta yi shing du 'khrungs// thang chu mar ser kha ba'i ro// de yang mon dag so ba'i sran// thigs pa bzhi rtsa ya rab las// lug ldem la
67a5(rnying rgyud): gang b.ru'i shing // 'bras bu che zhing snying po bsil// lkug rgya zil bur gyur pa de// nad rnams kun la byams par 'khrungs// mchin pa'i nad la rab tu bsngags// thigs la rdol ya ba las// bdud rtsi chen po mug chen byed // g.yang
67a6(rnying rgyud): dang bye ma 'dres par khrungs// rma rnams kun gyi rtsi rdul khrungs// mchin pa'i rtsa g.yas yang ba las// bdud rtsi chen po la tog ni// skyil 'phol ba'i sa dral khrungs// la ma 'brad cing rtsa ba ring // srur la mdar ba'i ro dang zhan// Sha
67a7(rnying rgyud): dog dmar zhing lkug phran 'dra// rtsand tshabs zin pa dang // glo dang mchin la tshod zhugs na// gtan nas 'byin pa'i bdud rtsi yin// mchin pa'i rtsa g.yon par ba las// bdud rtsi chen po ma nur skyes// rtsa ba dmar zhing 'dab ma ste
67b1(rnying rgyud): la spu yi tsher ma yod// me tog spug la thur du gug/ de yang rtsa yi sman yin no// bdud rtsi rin po che chen po la bdud pa'i rgyud las/ khrag bcu mchin pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon nu yis// rna man
67b2(rnying rgyud): po bskal ba'i tshe// rtsa bcung chub myur ba las// de yang thig pa bzhi na yar// gcig ni grangs kyi ljongs su yar// bcud rtsi chen po la chub// mngar la zhim pa'i ro dang ldan// rtsa ba ser zhing rtswa mtshams dkar// ngar ba sdug cing 'a
67b3(rnying rgyud): shog/ snying po 'bras bu med pa'i rtsi// btsos te zas su zos gyur na// ban ka na gnyis ka ming yang med// thigs pa lung pa'i srol du babs// bdud rtsi chen po chu chung ba// rdza mo lung pa'i dkyil du 'khrungs// 'dab ma chung zhing ngar ba
67b4(rnying rgyud): ze bahrI~M na rgyangs / na sa chu shig 'jug/ pa mas skye bas par gyur nas // bad kan rdzu pi~M na// ga sa cigasul par ba las// sra ba na cigs zad la ltagangs/ 'a
67b5(rnying rgyud): ra ba gong ma byin te// snying po'i lhung lta bre nye// rin b+har la gdang bar ston// btsos ste zos par gyur na yang // bad kan dkar po med yang med// sol bur zos par gyur na yang // bad kan dag la rdung zhig phan// gong sa
67b6(rnying rgyud): rlodang mi ldan zhing // sa phyogs rlos ra gyis gyur na// de la bdud ci sman mi 'byung // thigs gtsigs la ya rab lngas// ri krung chen po'i 'dabs su ste// bdud rtsi chen po sum bu skyes// dbyibs rnams chub 'dra mod kyang /
67b7(rnying rgyud): gis / sa sa su/ sa na sum gyu/ nga / su na sa
68a1(rnying rgyud): chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// de yi slo ba bshegs pa las// thigs brgyad sa la yang ba las// tsan+da na dkar po'i bdud rtsi yin// 'khrungs ni nags tshal dbyibs spru la blangs// rtsa ba zab cing ngang ba ba shAn/
68a2(rnying rgyud): 'dang ma dag kyang sman bzhin gyi// dkar zhing mdog ste chung zhing so ba// de yang rigs ni gsum du gnas// gdang ba'i dri dang mngar ba'i dri// cung zhig tsha ba'i dri dang gsum// gadrang ba'i dri ni gsher la 'khrungs// tsha ba'i dri ni shing dang /
68a3(rnying rgyud): bad pa'i del 'khyangs// rkyen gyis ral dang skyugs kyis lteb// tsaM rigs ri bu dang sbyar nas// glo rnams gso ba'i bdud rtsi yin// mngar 'gyur pa'i tsan+dan la// 'dab chags bu yi tshang bcas na// bsil bar 'gyur te khye mi 'gyur
68a4(rnying rgyud): gal te bya yis mau 'tshal nas// mnyam 'dra shing dang mtshungs pa la// bsil ba'i chu yis bran nas ni// gzhan gyi zil ba zhu gyur kyang // de yi zil ba zhu mi sred// gal te mi yis tshol gyur na// mnyam 'dra'i shing gnyis bsreg pa rang /
68a5(rnying rgyud): 'tshig dang mi 'tshig shin tu gsal// thigs gtsigs la yar ba las// mtshan pa gsum du gyis te song // shing chu gtong dang ltengs ka'i mtshams// sa ma brag gi gse cu yar// shing gachu las byung ba ni// kar skrag po'i chu ru 'khrungs/
68a6(rnying rgyud): rlung gis btab pa'i sgrol phan// stengs ka'i bar nas byung ba ni// kar dkar po'i chu ru byung // drug gis zin pa la sogs dang // tsha ba'i nad rnams kun la btang // tsha ba'i grol rab tu ban// sa ma brag la yang bani// shin tu dkar la drub
68a7(rnying rgyud): bar 'thungs// bye ma sar zhes su grags// del rigs kyang gsum yod de// thaMgatings ting shel ti gsum// bragating khab bzhin du son// sa ting mdag kyang drung zhig phrug// shel ting zla ba ta bzhin// brag ting rdzas pa
68b1(rnying rgyud): tang // sating narnabs tshal gtad// shal ting bu ba'i bsil bde// gzur lta bus thob pa min// spobs kyis khrid nams nus// sngon ka'i zlab nya dngadu mtshungs// shwel ting btsal ba'i thabs bstan pa// rgarnams rab ba nal 'ang// deng
68b2(rnying rgyud): ting btab par gyur na ni// khol shi chu grang tshad du 'gyur// chu yis btsal ba'i man dag yin// me yis blta bar gyur na ni// ji tsam brdos kyang mdog mi ldog/ zung gis blta bar gyur na ni// lcags kyi rdo dang bsres te 'phyar// snyigs pa
68b3(rnying rgyud): las shel ting yin// mnyam par 'dug na brag ting yin// sna la khyer nas ting yin// thigs pa gcig ni yar ba las// g.ya' dang gangs kyi ljongs su 'khrungs// g.ya' yi bdud rtsi zla ba'i 'od// sro lo phung po bdun gyis bskong // ra
68b4(rnying rgyud): rnams gzhan yang mtshan gyis 'gengs// lung mdo sru ba yi sa bcad// lha shing sur bu'i zur du skyes// skad 'don chu yi ral pa bzhin// brtag la la chu ba yis bskor// brag dang 'khan pa sngo yang 'khrungs// mthong ba'i ri rnams shin tu
68b5(rnying rgyud): 'jam// rtsa ba dag kyang bdun du gyes// rtsa ba'i lkugs pa cung zhig dmar// lo 'dab sro lo dkar dang 'dra// me tog ti pas dkar ser 'byung // zhag bdun bar la skye mi 'khrungs// tshan dang spo lo gzhan rnams kyis// khru gang ba la nye mo
68b6(rnying rgyud): nus// ston zla 'bring po'i slad la btsal// cung zhig me tog ma rnyed na// me dang chu yis gong bzhin btsal// gal te cis kyang ma rnyed na// rgyang bu sha ba'i gdos su gzhung // grol gri brgyab su bar gtang // sems can de yis rnyed par 'gyur//
68b7(rnying rgyud): yang na 'di mes btsal bar bya// rgod kyi bye drug stil bzung // gtod de grol thar ma brdeg/ pha dang ma yis btsal ba blta// de yis rnyed par gyur nas ni// rtsa ba brko pa ma yin te// lo ma dag gis lo brgya 'tsho// dregs gcag
69a1(rnying rgyud): sa pa yang ba las// sribs dri'i logs dang drag la labyungs// bdud rtsi chen po bal bu bya// rtsa ba 'dril zhing ngar ba shar// 'dab ma cung zhig gzhung bu can// dri yang zhim ni ro yang skur// 'dang ba
69a2(rnying rgyud): ngar ba snyoms// sdong po rab tu bsil ba de// tshan dang sbyar ba glo yi sman// 'di yang tshan zhes yongs su grags// thigs gtsigs la yar ba las// spang nags gnyis kyi bar du 'khrungs// rtsa ba 'dril zhing 'dab me leb// bdung gyi
69a3(rnying rgyud): lung // kha mngar zas dang sbyar byas nas// de yang cung zhig glo la phan// thigs gtsigs la yar pa las// bud shod nye ba'i sa ru 'khrungs// bdud rtsi chen po 'bri mog yin// rtsa ba 'dril la 'dab mkhad// dpyid blang chung skad
69a4(rnying rgyud): mar dkar ka ra dag dang sbyar// de yang glo yi sman du bshad// thigs gtsigs la ya ra ba las// 'bru rnams skye ba'i sa ru 'khrungs// bdud rtsi ba thag ces kyang bya// de yang rigs gnyis dag tu 'khrungs// gshengs ma grangs
69a5(rnying rgyud): skam sar 'khrungs// gsher sar 'khrungs dag lji sa dag yin// skam sar 'khrungs dag skyabs dag yin// bcos te rtag tu zos gyur na// glo nad phyis kyang mi 'byung la// bad kan dag gi gnyen po yin// k+Sho yes o la
69a6(rnying rgyud): yar ba las// su brtan brag gi sked dag dang // si la yang ni de bzhin 'khrungs// ra sgog g.yang sgog dag tu 'khrungs// g.yang sgrog ces su bstan pa la// shin tu ring la sdum pa gcig/ ro yang shin tu bangar zhing zhim/
69a7(rnying rgyud): nad tsha grang thams cad kyi// sngon du 'gro ba'i sman yin te// ston zla rab 'bring po gnyis// rtag tu lho du zos byas na// lo bcu lon pa tshun chad du// glo na dbya ba 'byung mi srid// bdud rtsi rin po che 'ablangs pa'i rgyud las/
69b1(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi glo ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas khrag 'thung rgyal po yis// rU tra chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// snying lpags thun pa bshus yang bas// med nI pa tso shing du blung // brang ldabs 'dra ba'i sal 'khrungs// rtsab
69b2(rnying rgyud): khyad cing snying po ring // 'bras bu gong mo bsnying 'di 'khrungs// ro lci cung zhig yang ba las// tsit+ta zla khro ma zhes su grags// rtsi mar ngag dang sbyar gyur na// sems mi dga' ba'i sman du gsungs// nu tre'i mkhal ma yar ba las// ri
69b3(rnying rgyud): min thang min 'debs su 'khrungs// 'dzin me yi ni sheng du skyes// rtsa ba bzang la ngar ba rags// lo ma rgyas shing me tog dmar// snying po dag kyang zum zhing che// ma sha dmigs mi zhes su grags// khod gi nad rnams 'khrugs pa dang /
69b4(rnying rgyud): mkhal ma'i rtsa rnams kun la phan// rU tra'i chu ni yar pa las// brag dang spang gi bar du 'khrungs// phal cher bye ma'i grog las skyes// shing dang kha ri dmar po 'khrungs// 'dab ma phra zhing ngar ba 'khyog/ kha ni sho sha zhes su grags/
69b5(rnying rgyud): mchu nad phya l+la pa kun la phan// rU tra'i rmen bu yar ba las// ri min thang min rtsub par 'khrungs// rtsa ba dar ba shin tu rgyas// lo mchu shing me tog sgrub// kla gor zho sha zhes su grags// stod rnams 'gying zhing na ba'i sman// D+ha tha'i mcher pa
69b6(rnying rgyud): ya ra ba yas// thigs pa gsum du yar ba ni// rdo yi phyogs su 'khrungs pa las// gcig ni phal mtsho lo ris// bgegs chen gzir ba'i stobs dang ldan// rdo sman dag tu cung zhig khro/ 'a'o yang / gcig ni khab len ljang gur 'azungs// lcags
69b7(rnying rgyud): 'du ba yi stobs dang ldan// mtshar khrag 'khrugs pa'i bdud rtsi yin// gcig ni bal po'i yul du 'khrungs// mnyen la snum pa'i rdo ru 'khrungs// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku yi chu// paru tsha dang sbyar gyur na// spo dag la cung zhig phan// btags na
70a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ hrug tubyas A// khrag byung pa 'byin par byed// gas pa dag la byung zhig gnang // bsregs te shing kun gtad byur na// sa yi srin pa 'dun par nas// btags na gyim byas byu // 'dugags rdung bad
70a2(rnying rgyud): 'a ga bdug b+ha n+tu// mkhal ma ma khris pa gtan nas 'don// bdud kyirin po che 'a blangs pa'i rgyud las/ sdod phra gang bu'i hU~Mni thaba'o// / bcom ldan ji gzhan nams// rnadu chen pa bskal ba'i rtse// de mas
70a3(rnying rgyud): mdzod yar ba las// thigs pa bcu gtsigs la lhung // thigs gtsigs la ya rab las// bdud rtsi kun tu chug tu gyur// 'di zhing gi ni mgul dag dang // mu zi nag po yod sar 'khrungs// kun rnams 'ju ba'i 'dun // khyad par nang
70a4(rnying rgyud): bsngags// thig pas la ya ra ba las// mtsho rjeb ma yi mgul du 'khrungs// bdud rtsi chen po 'bri mi ta// nu zho skams pa kun gyi sman// thigs gsums la yar ba las// chu 'bab pa yi mgul du 'khrungs// shar chung ki na yod pa yis//
70a5(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi chen po thal tshes bya// mes tshig kun gyi sman du gsungs// thigs bzhis la yar ba las// gangs dang mtsho yi mtshams su 'khrungs// bdud rje chen po rnam mas bya// chu nad gso ba'i bdud rtsi yin// thigs du gsal ya ba la
70a6(rnying rgyud): rgya mtsho bu su 'gra ma dag tu 'khrungs// sdig pa ka ka re tu byung // de yang chu nad gso ba'i sman// gzugs ni sdig pa'i dbyibs 'dra la// kha dog dkar zhing sha srul med// ro ni sme zhing cung zhig 'angam// shin tu legs par skams gyur na/
70a7(rnying rgyud): pab nad dang rje ye sman// thigs pa bdun pa par rab las// dbyar chung dbun thams steng kar 'khrung sa// sa phyogs dro zhengs dr-ican// dartsibs ni zhing mnga' 'dram da kyang // / kha dag gong mad dang mtshungs// ramab par gzhug ma
70b1(rnying rgyud): srong gis spyod par dag padud // chul dran pa gang bzhin na// rdzogs brgyangs la yar ba las// bal thaH la'i mgul du 'khrungs// ming yang ma ga ta zhes bya// thos kyi glang po zhes cang bya// rje gung mang ni lug tsam la// sa ring rnab shin tu ma
70b2(rnying rgyud): tshig pa rdo zhing nang lag pani// dus gcig mchong zhing 'gro bar byed// mo la mi gnas phol 'khrungs// lce skor chu yi mtshams nas byung // byi ni 'dril zhing nang na sob// che chung skyes pa dang ma'i rtse// dril 'di zhes bya ba ni// dpag gis le la
70b3(rnying rgyud): tan 'byung // ro gyang pa yi thabs kyang med// shin tu 'khris nas mi zhim mo// byi zhes bya ba'i ming yang 'dogs// rA tra'i sde ni mthar thag las// byang chub sems dpa'i sgra yin pas// dri yis 'phags pa mchod gyur na// yi dam
70b4(rnying rgyud): l+r-ing zin 'gyur// man dgatan gyi bslab gyur na// gamo'i gzugs pa ston pa gyur// 'jam gang du las 'gengs par ni// the tsamathul tshul mina'o// rlung chen parda lan pas// rdo rnarnams kyimachog tu gsungs// sras la @
70b5(rnying rgyud): bar gyur na ni// hA rnga chen po'i dri skams nas// bu chen pa chud kyi slong ba yang // yud tsam gcig kyang rtsom minas// gdug pa can gyi mtha yin pas// sbrul dang sbrang bu tre ma dang // tri mthug la sogs kyis// mi rnams na ru'ong yod kyang /
70b6(rnying rgyud): mnam pa tsam gyis mgo rags shing // tshor ba tsam gyis ldan par 'gyur// gzhan yang lus la bcangs gyur na// chu tra chen po'i dra mnas nas// mamo mkha' 'gro rnams kyang ni// bsgrub pa bzhin du dril 'khor// bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi'i ra
70b7(rnying rgyud): yang // stobs kyi mthu rnams yod mod kyang // lhag par dri chu bsdams pa dang // grang ba rdo mas 'gags pa rnams// chu sman bcu yis skyobs byas na// sol ba'i sdong po drab la// lcags kyi thobs 'argyab pa bzhin// gzhan yang
71a1(rnying rgyud): tan rna tshogs dang // 'di ru brjod par mi lad kyang // dri chen brgyang pa'i nang nas bshad// thigs pa dgu ba yar ba las// tsan+da rags tshal dbyings su 'khrungs// shing ni phe la la zhes bya// tsadran 'od dang
71a2(rnying rgyud): meng yang matal bya'o// de yang dkar nag gnyis su byung // dkar po la yi thang tu 'dra// nag pa rtse rtse'i 'dab ma 'dra// mnam pa'i dri yang zhim pa la// bsreg pa'i dri yang shin tu gdang // de yi yon tan brgya dang than// ye shes lha yi thugs dam
71a3(rnying rgyud): deng // sras mchog kI la ya ni banag pa'i las la 'dzud// dam can mkha' 'gro ma ne mngag pa'i las la 'jud// dgra ba sdang bzhwa dang k+She thag bcad// dgegs kyi zong khyer chongs chen po 'debs// spos dang dra bkun gyimacha chen byang /
71a4(rnying rgyud): na dpal ya mras thams cad dang // bgegs las phyung ba'i nad dang 'byung pos byen pa la// dra ba gtang ba tsam gyi 'jil bar byed// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi rnams kyi nad la chug mod kyang // phyag par chu ser nag po gtan nas 'dan// lums sa bya
71a5(rnying rgyud): 'brar ba 'jil// thigs pa bcu pa ya ba las// rnga sngog mo'i shing du lajungs// chu yi bur mo lta bur gnas// chu brepa na bur brtsegs pa ste// zhes su grags// lus pa'i bya dang srur gyur na// mi 'amadung 'gro gang drang pa/
71a6(rnying rgyud): nas nyas pa'i badrang rtsi yin// gal tem nam nas za ma nus// bu ma dkar po dag dang sbyar// 'phong nas bcug pa 'tsho bar 'gyur// chu nad can gyis rtag tu 'jang // thigs pa bcug cig ya rab las// rgya mtsho chab kyi nang du lazung
71a7(rnying rgyud): nang nas skyes pa yi// can rtse modag tul drangs// rtag tu zas su zos gyur na// nu rdo bshig pa'i bdud rtsi yin// glang po'i rtsa las gyur pa yin// dbyibs su dpo mtshan tshul du gnas// 'jam zhing snying yang mgo la yod//
71b1(rnying rgyud): du spong // de zos du rdo 'jigs par 'gyur// bdu rtse'i rgyal po ngas bshad do// bdud phyirin po che 'khrungs pa'i da las/ chu 'od skung pa'i lengs ter gcig pa'o// / dpral chen do gdon du yis// bye por
71b2(rnying rgyud): de yi phom tshan yang ba las// be ta gsang mtshan gsar mdzod de// be ti'i 'bras bu bzhi ru yar// gcig na gyi tshe shing gi mgral du 'khrungs// lamachub cing nga rab mkhrang // sha pa'i rlig pa 'dra mod kyang // sku can la
71b3(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi chen po a 'bras yin// chu dang mkhal ma rlig pa spang // rtsa rnams cung zhig 'khrugs pa dang // 'gags pa gso ba'i bdud rtsi yin// thigs pa gnyis pa yar ba las// 'jam byed byis pa'i shing ru 'khrungs// pags
71b4(rnying rgyud): 'dab marlog/ snying po spu gu can du 'khrungs// 'bras bu g.yu sgong lta bu la// nus pa gong dang 'dra bar bshad// bdud rtsi chen po 'jam 'bras yin// gsum pa sel yar ba las// nags tshal thag tshen gling du 'khungs//
71b5(rnying rgyud): las gyes pas na// bdud rtsi chen pos 'bras yin// gnag la 'dril zhing za mo kyong // nus pa gong dang de bzhin 'dra// bzhi pas la ya ra ba las// brag par sa 'jam gling la 'khrungs// rtsa ba ldem la ngar ba ldem// snga bcan
71b6(rnying rgyud): ma srab// phyin po ma thegs la khwa tshe gsum// bdud rtsi po ni so 'cha' yin// stug pa 'dren pa kun gyi sman// de yi gsang mtshan yang ba las// tshan pa lnga ru gyes te song // gnyis ni snang ldan shing la babs// gcig ni da
71b7(rnying rgyud): babs// sdang ldan shing la babs pa ni// mtshan ma'i pags pa ya rab yin// pags pa'i phyi shun ye rang las// lte ba rgyan ga cad ces su byung // tshar rung yod pa'i ma ru 'khrungs// shing tshad gzhan gyi zo lus su// slo ra bca
72a1(rnying rgyud): mi nus// rtse mo khrad rjeng rtsab kyang // 'dab ma dag kyang chung zhig sbyar// sems can byam gyi yang za// gcig ni sngo med gram pa'i gling // sde rnams/ skye bar mi 'gyur zhing // sa phyogs rtsub pa'i gnas sa
72a2(rnying rgyud): 'khrungs// de ni rabs chad nag po'i shing // nag la khrad cing 'bras bu nag/ shing ni de ltar gnyis dang ni// byam gyi yi spu dang gsum// rin chen gser dang bzhi ltar na// sems can mos pa mi mthun pas// bye ba mang pa kyi na 'gegs yin/
72a3(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi chen po yin par bshad// lo mtshan gyi shun yar ba'i rtags// 'bras bu med pa de ltar 'gyur// pho mtshan nang shun par ba las// mchil pa dpyid de la babs// nam mkha'i bdud rtsiza ba'i phyir// gangs kyi stengs na de bzhin gnas// ra
72a4(rnying rgyud): mkha'i bdud rtsi zig gsum byung // dpyid kyis ni 'thungs pa las// khar tshad 'thungs pa'i de ring sbyar// bcu drug nyin ma mi la bsnun// de nas kyi thog ma rgyas par// mo pi lus la gnas par nges// bdud rtsi zig gsum babs pa de// gzhan
72a5(rnying rgyud): gyis tshor bar mi 'gyur // mchil pa dag dang de bzhin 'brangs// dpying mchil ba de nyid sha/ sems can gyi du 'brel ba yi// bo mtshan nang sha yin pa'i rtags// chung 'greng dang 'bras bu'i gsos// sems can 'khor bar zags pa pa
72a6(rnying rgyud): kye rgyud 'phel ba'i brjod kyi min// dog pos la babs pa de// snyis krung shing drug tu 'khrungs// rtsa ba zo mtshan gi bya'i zhal// lo ma gcin gyi rjes 'dra ste// dri yang mda'i sde na mnam// ra yang mang dral sde rbal// bdud rtsi chen po lngang
72a7(rnying rgyud): de zas 'dul ba'i sman// de li gas mdzod par ba las// de yang thigs pa gsum du yar// thigs gtsigs la par ba las// bsil lam gling gi steng du la blangs// mdog sdug tshar mdzub pas// me tog dkar dang po
72b1(rnying rgyud): ba// ga'i ba dang cithab+h+yaH/ tharnams can sem kyimachog/ 'dun pan sasun kyim ga/ dbang bkur byud shA bya// rkyen nag kyang dgang drug// mams pathud na pa gsu bkur/ na pa tag pa// gsang ma cang
72b2(rnying rgyud): rlig bar rtse zla ba yarang// bsod nams can gyi khang rtsang 'khrungs// rtsa ba sti zheng ngar pa spug/ btab na skye zhing 'bras bu ngan// bdud rtsi chen po zur shing byung // de yang pho mo gnyis su srid// po gyes ser la mo skyes thug/ dus su bzhu bar gyur na yang /
72b3(rnying rgyud): skyes sbeng la mo skyes rog/ po nI mu kA'i tshun bu 'dra// mo ni grang chang gyo ma bzhin// sbyin sreg byed namachod pa'i rdzas// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad la yang // pho skyes phyogs dag kun tu rgyug/ mo byes zung zhig tsha bar gnas// nad rnams kun la rgya
72b4(rnying rgyud): zhig 'gyings// pho byes 'dra ba'i bdud rtsi len// gtso bo yin par ngas ma bshad// snam log g.yas g.yon yar ba las// rgyal po'i khang bzang lta bru 'khrungs// bdud rje chen po shing kun yin// shing yang tshan che lu ma bzhir// lte sta na yi
72b5(rnying rgyud): skyugs pa bzhag/ dri yang 'tshub ci dri gzhug kha// po skyes dkar la po skyes nag/ ri bong sla ba'i ril ma 'dra// ya ma dkar nag gnyis dang ni// tsha rlung grang rgyang gnyis kyi bskul pa las// pho mtshan yar bas de lta byung / bdud
72b6(rnying rgyud): rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyud las/ gsang mdzad po mtshan gyi le'u skye rtsa gnyis pa'o// / bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon nu yis// nu tra chen po bsgral ba las// de yi kye chung yang ba las// 'dzam bu gling gi byang du 'khrungs/
72b7(rnying rgyud): mu le drung zhing zhes pa byung // yan lag nyin lag shin tu rgyas// de la 'bras bu lnga byung ste// gcig ni mkha' lding bya rgod za// grang nad 'ju ba'i bdud rtsi yod// gcig ni gshog byas na las za// blo yis drug rnams byas gyur na// shing gis
73a1(rnying rgyud): phag pa'i rnams // shing gnyis pa tshob 'gyur// ga 'greng bgags sa babs// kunams pa bdu med/ rdzugan da grags paban// lagasanas 'du
73a2(rnying rgyud): ng+ga yar du sman yod mod kyang // srad pa ze ba glo ba dang // mkhal ma mchin pa dag la bshad// lag pa'i rje chen yar ba las// de yang g.yas g.yon gnyis su yar// bdud rtsi chen po seng lding shing // grug po rgya spug kyis par//
73a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis su ga nas// pho skyes sro ma kA rba la// phra ma thung pa bstan te byung // mdangs dang gting nas du ma gcig nag/ mo byas srom spa gul// kha dog mdangs kyang cung zhig ser// kha yang gyen la bstan nas byung // po tres rkang la
73a4(rnying rgyud): yin// mo gyes chu ser chos mdza'i sman// bla rtsa g.yas g.yon yar ba las// stag pa dkar po'i sngags su 'khrungs// stag pa thun lpags bsil ba'i sman// srag ni khrag zags pa la gtang // klad pa'i rtsa gnyis pa la
73a5(rnying rgyud): paglang mtho mor 'khrungs// shug pa dag gi 'dab ma yang // dug dang bdud rtsi kun la chug/ glang ma lcang ma ngang ba yang // stobs dang byang bu 'jam pa'i rtsi// chag dang tshigs byud 'jam pa'i rmyi// brjod byibs legs par thon na ni// rtsen gyi
73a6(rnying rgyud): chags pa'i bdud rtsi yin// mtshan rtsa g.yas g.yon yang ba las// bruM dang mda' yi phyogs su 'khrungs// phra rgyas pho yi g+harta bya// mda' gyes ma yi 'o ma thaH// yun gcig nus gcig ro yang gcig/ dmar shal 'gram pa can gyi shang /
73a7(rnying rgyud): romago kha lar rtse mngar// chu ser bdakan stug po'i sman// mkhal ma'i rtse gnyis yar ba las// brag dang yul khyab par 'khrungs// bdud rtsi chen po stug ma 'khrungs// de yang po mo gnyis thung ste// phrin sbom zhing ma khrag nga
73b1(rnying rgyud): shAl zhag chog bgas+ho// 'dab mtho ba'i tshul duganas// man mo yim bal gyi ldan// mnI mnad can la gtang // al gdas chen mar ba las// byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa rbab bas// rdza bcung zhig phog pa dang // 'dab pa'i sum
73b2(rnying rgyud): zhig sman// mo lder gnyer 'dra thod kyang // blangs dang chas te phye mod kyang // sha rnams lci bar gyur pa la// yang bar 'gyur te gdon mi za// sran rnams rgyad la 'drad gyun kyang // 'di yis khring gzigs par 'gyur// khA dz+ra dad drwa
73b3(rnying rgyud): rnams meng meng me par 'gyur/ ma ga dang shAr gyu no// shes ga rtags pa'i da pa na/ na nga nas rgya bu phyogs sa mag/ rlu ma lagong pa ma shing / tshig ci gralas g.yin par
73b4(rnying rgyud): cig cig tu 'i mgul du 'khrungs// bdud rtsi shing rtsa ba myur byung // rlung zhing rjod dang snga ma'i dz+wal/ po skyes sul mo gyis s+ho// kun la 'jug paN+DI du ci bshad// nam gu yas g.yon lar ba las// rnam pa ma gnyis su skyes// nang lta
73b5(rnying rgyud): la 'khrungs// bu mo po yi shing du 'khrungs// lo mang pa'i mtshams na ni// rnying pa'i zhum bud mar rtswa gcig/ shin tu bsil bar gyur pa yin// srin ma'i rtsa gnyis yar ba las// rtswa med bug med byis 'khrungs// 'dab ma
73b6(rnying rgyud): grog ma'i sbed 'dral// me tog ser po bkrag medang byung // snying po ug chos g.yug gi tshul// lug gi dra bzhin skyes pa de// 'gyur na roni tshar gro// rA tsa zhes su grags pa yin// chub 'dra ba'i bdud rtsi yin// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa
73b7(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ cab shing gi wan+da d+ha nyi shu gsum pa'o// / bcom ldan rdo rje gzhan nu las// chung chen po bskal ba'i tshe// rlung dras pa'i mchim dang // kha cu ma chu bo mtshan du// bzhi chang dus gcig drabs pa las// gcig
74a1(rnying rgyud): thag/ pa thag gi mgal na la / ma rdzu sho 'daban ldan/ marnams gzhanas / sa dang ga 'dum yon/
74a2(rnying rgyud): yang ba las// gting 'khyil ma dris mtsho na khyil// de la dkyil du 'drug pa'i de// thamatshan lta bu'i dbyibs 'dral// dzam wiH'i shing du lakhrungs// drang dregs pas dang chu lug/ bar dra bya me la // nang du da
74a3(rnying rgyud): lug/ kyi ni thung chung gsang ba dang // mo ni nang chung rno ba yis// gtan tshegs dang po de nas byung // d+hA gnyis gyen du btegs pa ni// lha yi bdud kyi chen po yin// sa la 'byung bas lug zur 'khrungs// lums su ng+yas nalci ba'i nang //
74a4(rnying rgyud): gsum lon nas sel bar byed// mo ru byas na mug pa babs// nad pa sman pa gzhi bdag la// lha yis 'go ba spyod mi spyod// rig pa de ru shar du byung // nAd chung zhig bsregs byas nas// ha cang tshig min grang ba mi// lang tsha
74a5(rnying rgyud): kyar na// pho log na bar gyur na yang // skad cig ma yis 'tsho bar 'gyur// de yi bal dgun za chung brda// dI yang gisum du gsungs pa las// gcig la du zhig zi gu'i mo// dgra dang grogs dang gnyen stobs rnams// rig pa de pa
74a6(rnying rgyud): d+hang zhing babs// gcig ni gos su byas gyur ram// stan du bting nas mal g.yogs na// pal sras chen po zhes bya ste// grang ba'i nang med nyams bder 'gyur// shing bal be'u 'jug dang zab rnams// dro bar gyur yang nad skyed drug
74a7(rnying rgyud): mi phyogs su 'gro bar yang // 'dab chags spro dang gcan gzon hUM// stug spu ma spum gtogs pa// thams cad demi skyobs su bshad// dom spu mig gi sman len te// stag spu de bzhin chu ser sman// grang bas nab pag gis /
74b1(rnying rgyud): gdabus su bgag pa zad// gtag ba rdzun dbar dazung/ dang gsum drag nas pags/ ma can thug/ sa rnams gra ba nas// byus bya da brjod// dasung kyi
74b2(rnying rgyud): ga pa rnams pa/ rnga bcug dums dpab bya// chumang drug pa 'dil pa dang / dum pa byed de rnas du/ ning rnams sbyin nubazung // des nas miyin/ dkyigs pa nges pa med bye kyi/
74b3(rnying rgyud): ga dang na// gang grangs rgya bcings / 'thar ba'i da ma smra bugs misade yang po la rje bdu sa/ rgyagam med gang pa / 'bresar dag nga na sh+tha / badz+rang+gA pa dag pa pa'i tad/
74b4(rnying rgyud): sri tshor dang ci// grad pa legs par rtsos nas ni// chu skams 'oms bskad cing po \u0f7f// srog pa cwa la na thugs dang // mgo 'a khor lus kyi cha 'bum na// zhag brnyan thos na 'tsha ba'i blan// chu 'brang ngan thos gyur na// de la dris pa'i byung ngo // de'i rlo
74b5(rnying rgyud): sa du na she/ gi thegs mye byugs gyis// ngag 'das pa sa sa ci rtse// bad kyi sa rgyab nga// gsanam byung 'thu// de'i sri du ba dadang // da grags pa'ibal 'ad sa/
74b6(rnying rgyud): gas kyiyin// da ga migs pagasas ga 'an/ ma kyi byi gyis pa rlabs// da pa'i ngasadu sa dang/ na mi kya ba na gas byung // du byung mam phyin rgyams kyi// me bya rlabs pasregs pad// na nga gas
74b7(rnying rgyud): spyo/ shin 'thod pasags sapa gyur// sogs sa kyigs napas// sman pa bzang bar bshad pa las// ni la lag 'gargyabs yang // nad pas thas dang mas kyang // gcanag pa thos pa rin hU~M // cib pa brjo ci ga pa yin// ga
75a1(rnying rgyud): bya // mtshan dug d+ha yi mchin pa yin// b.rang ngan ltas kun de la ban// hu brdud snying dang rus bcung dang // khrag bcud mchen dang rngu bzung zhag/ ska mi'i 'phrin byed pang thun 'brel// rig pa'i lhas kun babs pa las// bdud rtsi gcig kyang
75a2(rnying rgyud): 'bas so// nad pa 'tsho dang swa gyi rnams// rig pa snod can de la dri// mkhas te shes par gyur na ni// rtsa chu gnyis kyi do yang min// nad pa klad pa chag gyur na// de bzhin lug gi mgo pa yang // rus pa steng 'og de la brtag/ de bzhin snod la nyen langs na// snod kyi mtshan nyid
75a3(rnying rgyud): brtags// rig pa'i gnas gzhi brtag gyur na// la phyi bzang ngan kun kyang mthong // phyi ma sha rnams kun kyang chu// glo long bdud rtse yin mod kyi// ril ma phran chad sman yin no// sha ye skor ba gong dang mtshungs// gal te rlung nad che ba la// gsar du gtang dang rting du gtang /
75a4(rnying rgyud): la gtang dang gsum du 'dus// gsar du gtong bar gyur na yang // sha dang rus pa khrag dang gsum// tshal dang mar rtang dag gis bsres// rmi tsha drod kyis de bzhin brgyan// nas rjen gyi yis kha brangs nas// grod pa dag tu brags gyur nas// g.yem sngon pa yi steng du gzhag
75a5(rnying rgyud): dub med pa'i ngar// 'od kyi kha ring chos par ba 'o// gar skyon char yang gtang gin bzang // shes pa rgyal po'i thugs ka nas// tshangs pa lnga bya dkar po byung // gshin je dag po 'thugs ka nas// sha zan mchu dmar nag po'iH// khros nas srong dgur phyung //
75a6(rnying rgyud): gnas la 'dril te song // gnas la bdud rtsi thugs gsum ni// zo rog bya rog khwa dang gsum// lding rje ldan pa'i rtags men te// bsad pa'i sha rnams me za bar// ser du shin tu chud par yod// de yi sring dar 'dzang ba'i ldan// bsil ba'i srubs na
75a7(rnying rgyud): bdun yod na// shin tu brjod pa ma long zhing // stong rlung dag gi gnyen po yan// tshe gsum dran byed pa rtser med// tho ga srog gcod shin tshe// srog paHye khrag dang ni// 'dru ga sum a rba ra dang srung // rtsi bar dag gis 'a ni//
75b1(rnying rgyud): 'gang rna sa tham dzang // btan ga dang / nga sang ste// gdang ru pa ya bar gyur// mig 'bras klad pas na byas te/ mar dgar dag gis lnga khrid na// mig sman kun cig ca brnyan// sa ma ga tu sgrus pa pa// gtor mthong ba 'a bam sa med// ga 'a
75b2(rnying rgyud): rnga dang lug pa tsar ba gsum// thug pa 'i na yis kun kyang 'jigs// tor ba'i g.yis kun kyang 'a // zhwa yis drod rnams kun kyang snyoms// thug pa'i klad pa tor ba'i byung // khA pi pa shul sha dag la yod// sgong gsums la yar ba las// gtsug ni ladrang ngo
75b3(rnying rgyud): pu lug/ lug pas shin tu sleb par lug/ lug ces bya ba'i sems can 'byung // sgo drad ni ma mal bar// drol lug pas rjod kyi spyan// de yang phyi yi mngon pa drug/ sha yaM gdeng yi ba shin tu dro// zong tsher grang ba'i sgo rnams sel// tshe sug kun kyang de dang brdungs//
75b4(rnying rgyud): dang na padag la yang // cha bar byed pa'i sbyin mdang // thang zhag 'das kyi bub man// rmab gnyis su bcid blangs na// migating med pa dred tu 'gyur// byung nad can cig nangs// macan dag gis zung myi thub// shIng gi rlom burab ga rje na// dun
75b5(rnying rgyud): pa// ma narnams la sol bu 'dzangs// de yang gang zhig tshun myur na// nuser sde ba'i rgya yinan// gcang chas par me bya zhing // zhug po bgrangs te bdang bar 'byung // phyiskams nang ma galas la gtong // bcom bskal gnyis pade bzhin no// bskal ba'i ju dang blon
75b6(rnying rgyud): gsung // ma bzla mnas na byung // dbyeng blag tum pa bdag na thong // dbyar namadzes par bdan te// chol brgyas pa dud gyun// rang rasasu gnyen ci ba rjong // dbyar rtson nas yang bdang // nangag gan dra pa yang // rags bya pa bangs na du
75b7(rnying rgyud): dedang de rje yang drung zhig rtsu// khengs pas rnam gtar ba mang // zla radang bral la jogs padagang // rtse 'jog cing ci ngag ba// rten du 'asil ba bdud kyi yang // slobaslad pa mchin par med// ngo ma karas mtsho bzung ban// me mi ci yang 'chi bar bshad// du ga na

76b1(rnying rgyud): ba ngas gdang // rlung dang spyan du ba sdongs la pan// long ga ba nas mgogatang na// yam dkar nag 'joms par rdzas// la lnga man par gyur nas na// skya ba drung nang kun la phan// 'drug yon nas 'thabs la// mo bdun lon nas shed drung ba/ za bar 'byung na ma med// sa rab
76b2(rnying rgyud): dus pazad ces bya// sha yi sbyor bar gyur na ni// bud med sha dang bsres te btso// mdzend dag la rab tu bsngags// la brgyad 'das kye ma ran rnying pa dang // ma phrad gzhon gyi sha dang rus par bcas// khrag gi mjug dus med pa de bzhin brdung // lug gi pags pas thal te zla gcig bskal du dug
76b3(rnying rgyud): shin tu zos par byas te khra bde la bstim// chang gsar thigs gcig thugs te bcos gyur na// spyod de b.ru tshwa yis rab brgyan na// snying rlung brjed byed smyo byed rtsub gting nas 'don// phag pa'i sha tshil dag dang sbyar gyur zhing // dong gra dag gi srod bas gsar par gyur na bad kan sman// rnga gran
76b4(rnying rgyud): dang gnyis su med par brdung // kar dkar po'i spyod kyis brgyan par gyur// shin tu bcos dang mdzo zho mngal dang sprad// rma rnams tshad kyis rnag rnams gcod pa'i sman// lo gsum lon pa'i lug ru dang // rgod g.ya ga sar gyi sha tshil shin tu cho// lug gi khog par thugs te bka ba byas te/
76b5(rnying rgyud): tshab gsum gyi sbod dang kharba tshwa// 'bri mar cung zhig dag dang sbyar// kha ches lums su byas te chang gis bcotso// nar gyen chang gis btung rgya byas gyur na// lcags kyi rdo rnams khong na yod kyang 'dra// gal te sman mar dag gi gsos byed na// grang bdag la sbyar na sha rting gtang // dpyid dang dbyar nyon na
76b6(rnying rgyud): dge tang ba min// snyoms par 'dod na 'phral sha gtang // dpyid dang dbyar gyi sha yang gsar mi gtang // dpyid dang dbyar ni rnga bran sha yis gso// lug gi sha ni zla drug yin te zla drug bzang po min// mig chu sna chu gnyis po yang // gong du 'khrungs pa de dang mtshungs// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i hud las//
76b7(rnying rgyud): rlu chen po bskal pa'i chu bzhi 'drub pa las/ pheM mtshan chu'i le'u ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa// / bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon nu yis// rlung chen po bskal pa'i tshe// de yis drag pa yang b.las// bung ga rtsa mar 'khrungs so// dral gzhu byung drang srong thogs// mi rnams 'jig rten mda' yis su// sha las da
77a1(rnying rgyud): // bung grang ba 'joms// ston tham chung dpying zla zang // dus ni bo la yod mod krung // brgal nas mo la bdud rtsi 'byung // pho mo 'khor bar gnas mod kyang // de sha dag la sman mi 'byung // 'dril na rnams kyang legs par bshad// d+hA chen po 'dregs yin pas// de nas
77a2(rnying rgyud): gyur na// drug pa zhu bzhin du baM bas yal// 'dril pas dreg bzhu 'gyur te// rkang dbyi gnyis kyi bar nas ni// grang ba 'joms pa'i sman yod de// dpras pa'i ka bdag la yang // mar rnying dang 'ja' sman dang // chog pa byed pa'i sman yod do// trA tra'i bsku ya ba las// cung dang
77a3(rnying rgyud): 'grungs// byang khres bya ba'i sman rnams ni// zhol rtsal rdzogs sa la bro// bye yis zos pas dus tshad ma khas// gtses zhes bya ba'i sring khrag la// srid tshol ba yi bdud rtsi babs// bu mar ste ba'i bud med dang // grA ma mkhyen pa la gtang // rdzas zhes bya ba'i sun mod// klad pa 'gyur ba
77a4(rnying rgyud): mgo spen sel ba'i sman yod do// rA tra'i rkang sor yar ba las// rtswa t+yang rnga mo ba men sha/ mdze dang bong bu gnyan dang ni// gna' dgo gnyis te bcu byung ngo // rta ni chu ser tshabs ro'i sman// mchin padag la yod pa yin// tshon brang gi ldebs la gnas// chang ni chu ser spangs pa'i stan/
77a5(rnying rgyud): na pa'i sha/ ba men sha 'ugaso pa'i sman// me shal dug gso ba'i sman// mngon shin tu snyoms pa ste// bod dbu tshabs rod dag la phan// rnga mo kun la snyoms pa'i sman// gnyan sha gna' dgo snyoms par gsungs// rma tra'i rkang sor yin pa'i phyir// nA mgyogs kyang grims na rngo ste// ba me ya
77a6(rnying rgyud): gzugs// mdze yi rtsal dang bong bu'i skad// gnyen gyi bang dang gna' ba'i 'dzegs// khang par sprod pa'i yon tan re// rU tra'i rkang pa yin pas byung // r+yA tra'i lce las gyes pa ni// kom pa'i ko brgya ye sha/ shin tu 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i sman// rU tra daM yi mthu las ni// lhag pa'i yon tan re re yod/
77a7(rnying rgyud): dang ni rin po che// dgo ba'i thul bachu bsam nyen// gom pa'i gnya' bas sa gzhi rlog/ de ltar mi rnams don du byung // rlu nga'i mche ba bcu bzhi la// mche ba re re bton pa las// sman dang ngan sngags bcas nas byung // 'o ma bsil la tshil bu rjod// she rus sris rnams cha snyoms phan// de yang nasus
77b1(rnying rgyud): yin// lci dreg phyugs dreg dom dang gsum// sha chi la grang ba'i gnyen po la// sbangs dang rengs pa thams cad 'du// mkhris pa de bzhin rma yi sman// dom gyi brang ze snying la yod// de rtags spu ni ka nAr 'byung // mi dreg nu ma'i dkyil na yod// de rtags num sbas mi 'gegs// phyugs dreg barba yi sul na
77b2(rnying rgyud): yod// de pyir ba dril grom chags// sme dang sbe dang byi la gsum// de ltar gas mni na thugs yin// rtag dang gcig dang klung dang gsum// bdaka ni 'joms pa'i sman yin no// sgrog nal sman dadu mes tshig dang // gzhan ma chis kyang mi 'tsho ba'i// 'amaud dag la mkhris pas phan// sram dang kyi snyam che
77b3(rnying rgyud): gsum// de ltar gsum ni ngan skyugs yin// stag gi 'gram pa dag la yod// de rtags 'dzum phran dag tu byung // gzig gi sru sul dag na yod// de rtags su yang thig ler byung // gung gi bshul sha dag la yod// de rtag mjug ma'i sku yang 'tsher// sud ki 'phar pa wa dang khI// spyang gi
77b4(rnying rgyud): sha dro pa'i sman// 'phar ba snga dro gsod na rkang pa g.yas// dgongs mo gsod na mig la babs// nub mo snying la de bzhin te// bdud rtsi 'phar bas 'phar ma yin// rma rnams dros par gyur pa dang // mo tshang langs par gyur pa'i sman// khyi yi lce yang rma yi sman// wa yang gro la phan pa'i sma//
77b5(rnying rgyud): dkar bra ba byi// de ltar bzhi ni ngan skyugs yin// spra dang spre dang byi la gsum// grang ba 'joms pa'i bdud rtsi yin// ga yaM yi rna ba gas la yi mjug/ spre yi nu ma gsum la ni// ma dgug pa yi sman yang yod// chu lug chu rtar rgod gsum// de ltar gsum ni ngan sngags yin// ra rgod bsil te rma rnams
77b6(rnying rgyud): 'joms// sog blag dag la ce spyang byed// khrag rengs kun kyang 'ju bar bshad// de yi ngan skyugs kha sha yin// ru tra'i lag sor gyes pa las// gcig ni mo rnams kun la ba bas// ma phrang gzhon gyi sha rus rnams// rlung gi bdud rtsi yin par bshad// 'phyi ba'i tshil bu dgun rwa gsum/
77b7(rnying rgyud): mig gi bdud rtsi yin// rtsa pa'on yang dreg la phan// sbal bde bzhin lkog ma'i sman// de rnams lag pa g.yon pa yin// g.yas pa 'jig rten mkha' masbyar// gcig la babs pa yod pa yid// gzhan yang sems can tha dad pa'i// mthun pa'i bdud rtsi yod mod kyang // rdza tra ba
78a1(rnying rgyud): babs pa med// shar sman ra smos pa yang // rang re'i sha dang stobs kyi sha/ bsil ba'i skyabs kyang bsil bas b+ha// tsha ba'i skyabs kyang de bzhinaH// skams pa ci rags pa las \u0f7f// gal ta la/ gas pad gyur ldan// d+hana'ib chu
78a2(rnying rgyud): nor ba yis// lo yi mthu dpal byin rlabs kyis// nad rnams rengs nas 'khrugs par 'gyur// dpon med po cho skal brten// shes rgyud med pa'i khong dregs mkhan// nad rnams 'khrugs pa'i dka' ba med// gdams med drug tu sbyor ba de// lus med mthong ba'i skyon pazla mas/
78a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dmyal bar de 'gro ste// nad rnams 'khrugs pas mi chog ste// dU tra chen po'i bka' chad 'byung // sha sman de dag kun kyang ni// chu tra'i sprul pa ma yin te// kho yi bdud rtsi babs pa yin// nor bas log pa'i lam du 'gro// rdo rje phur pa bdud rtsi ji ltar 'khrungs pa'i rgyud las/ rlu tra'i lus
78a4(rnying rgyud): bshig sha sman gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas dU tra'i dpag bsam shing // shing gi dkyil du srin gcig byung // srin bu de yi kha chu las// srin de zhag tu khyil gyis chags// de yang dngul sgong dkar por smin// de las da tra la sha ru bcu byung // rgyo nas shing gi kha la rtse// bdud kyi byol kha log
78a5(rnying rgyud): pa yin// skyo nas bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'thungs// mdze res gnas bcu'i bdud rtsi'i nags// rab tu gnam la 'gengs pa yang // mi yi tshe srog gcod pa 'dzin// ltogs na shing gi 'bras bu za// mi yi yul du 'khor ba'i rtags// rab tu dung gi kar yod// lha yi sprul pas don byed rtags// dbyar zla 'a
78a6(rnying rgyud): lnga rab tu sbyar// lA yis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtags// pags pa gnyen la mtshon rtse drug/ bdud kyis dbang bsgyur byas pa'i rtags// sa la brdung na gyi ba 'gram// sha la bdud rtsi babs pa'i rtags// rngubs su rul dang dug tu yod// mo la byin gyis ma brlabs pas// rnga med yu mo sman med do// srin
78a7(rnying rgyud): gyi bu las byis pa'i phyir// mjug ma'i steng na srin sman yod// ston zla na chung ti shu bdun// lhag pa'i bdud rtsi gsum yod do// dgun tu byung nas mo la 'jug/ mo yi mngal du zhag bdun gnas// dpyid zla ze chung nyi shu bdun// 'di glang gnyis kyi bar na gnas// de nas gzhung ba dag la zhen// zhag
78b1(rnying rgyud): grangab rtsi yin nu bar zhes// dang po shing gi srin rgod yin// de ltar rang mig yin pa la// srin la ma phan ci yang med// byung ba'i dus na phyir la log/ rA ni lha yi srin sman byed// lha yis gzung ba'i bzung rtags su// rubacu yod de brdung mi shas// rA gsum gdus pa'i khu ba de// tag pa dge 'ad
78b2(rnying rgyud): dge bzhes smran// sdig pa lceni 'dud kyi spyan/ bdud gis byer ba'i khyer rtags su// rjel bu rgyas pa'i dus na na// drag thul srin log kun la gtang // mthis pa klu le sprin du phyug su phes byed ba'i rtags pu ni// mthis pa gzugs med tshu mar zug/ mkhris nyid khrag gling yin pa ni/ ba
78b3(rnying rgyud): bral// zas kyi srin log rnams la gtad// de nas lha mo phrin las mdzad// chang ni zim zim dus su 'babs// gangs kyi gongs su babs pa las// lkog pas g.ya' sman zla tshar zos// g.ya' sman sgyu sngang la chu las// sro lo phung po bdun du byung // skyes pa'i 'dab ma la sogs pa// gangs ldan da
78b4(rnying rgyud): 'dra mod kyang // thung zhig klad pa me tog med// yan tan gangs sman sum gnyis dang // bsil ba'i sgo nas 'dra bar bshad// bal bu sur bu'i tshe ru gshegs// kha chu bcingad dang thigs pa yar// tshab sol bdud ci'i sman byung ste// de yang yon tan bzhi ru shes// cod tshal sdong po bsel// drang na
78b5(rnying rgyud): lang byung // ngar bas dgra ske'i bla shing byed// srung bu shin tu tsha gyur te// lha dang grwa mi bdud rtsi yin// rgyab lo ma med par tshe// de nas phrag gi sked la gshegs// brag sman mkhan sun le chu// de yang bsil ti klo pi sman// de nas srung gi mad drug shegs// mung dazigs gcig par dmas// l+r-i Ta
78b6(rnying rgyud): ma'an dmang gras ma// grang bcab skyed pa'i sman// de yang mi sul d+hi ti na// 'dre gnasal par b.las// sums kyi bdud rtsi chen por babs// shing po la sman mi 'grangs// ke 'i ngas na ba dkan bye// skom bu tha ris snyoms pa'i phran// bdug nyis la sran yod ngo // phongs nas ga thun bdun no
78b7(rnying rgyud): yang // gnyis ni a ba dusu// gnyis ni wang zlos g.ya' sbas gnyis// gnyis ni drug zlam rgod thos gnyis// sdug sa cu tho khrag byung // de dang snye mi zin lam 'byung // po rjes ni bdun du bar// e mra la dzes 'ams grod byung // nags kyi rjes las snga byung // na po nges pa thub pa byed//
79a1(rnying rgyud): g.ya' yis rjes las ro zang byung // brag gi rjes las klang ba byu // srang gi rjes las byang ba byung // chu rgal bas shub labyung // shing srin ka ba'i le'u ste nyi bAcu drug pa'o// / dag nga chen pa da'i lus sran du bshig nas 'jig rten gyi khams sa nga pa tad/
79a2(rnying rgyud): mas dpang gnas thob cing sangs rgyas/ 'khor rnams phyi rabs kyi tshogs kyang ngo // yang 'khor rnams sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams na sman min pa'i ming yang mi grag go// de nas 'jam dpal rnon pos rang gi stan las langs te/ bskor ba lan stong byas nas nga/
79a3(rnying rgyud): stong btsal nas mchod pa du mas mchod nas 'di skad ces bstod do// e ma bde gshegs kun gyi sku// grags tshad rmad byung ngo mtshar che// e ma bde gshegs kun gyi gsung // smadan gyi sbyor ba ngo mtshar che// e ma bde gshegs kun gyi thugs// sgrub pa'i blta spyod ngo mtshar che// e ma bdeg
79a4(rnying rgyud): yon tan che// drang srong rig pa bco brgyad mkhyen// e ma bde gshegs phrin las che// rlu tra'i mthu dpal sman du che// rU tra sman du gyur pa bzhin// bdag cag rnams kyang sman du gyur// rlu tra sangs rgyas sa thob bzhin// bdag cag rnams kyang sa la zhog/ ces 'khor na gnas
79a5(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams dang / drang srong rnams kyis gsol ba btab pas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyi gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ 'jam dpal gyi phyag g.yas su log rtog thams cad 'joms pa'i ral gri gcig gtad de/ sems slar te bdud rtsi sman du gyur par dbang bsu
79a6(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang thob nas 'jam dpal gyis rang lus bshig nas bdud rtsi sman du sprul/ de nas lha'i gnas thams cad bdud rtsi sman gyis gang ngo // de nas brgya byin la babs/ de nas ded dpon la babs/ de nas gzhon nu sred la babs/ de nas mi tsA bi dri ma med pa la babs so// de nas 'jam dang
79a7(rnying rgyud): kyi ral gri phyag na rdo rje la gtad do// yang lus gong bzhin bsgral te/ gnod sbyin gyi yul thams cad bdud rtsis bkang ngo // de nas gnod sbyin lag nardo rdo rje la babs so// de nas nab so skyes la babs so// de la sog drang srong bco lnga la babs so// mi'i gnas su 'khol la phags so// de nas 'jam dpal gyi ral gri de/ spun ras
79b1(rnying rgyud): gtad nas lus 'azhigapa nang/ klu'i lul du ldan dang 'du rtsis pagazug// de nas dga' bam sogs pa/ drung srong bcug smras la babs so// mi'i gnasas su grub snying pol babs pa// de bzhin du sgra dang gra dang / tshangs pa dang / gza' dang / skar ma dang / gan sbyin dang / lham srin sde brgyad dang / nam bu dang / sa dang
79b2(rnying rgyud): yang ba dang / mi dang dud 'gro dang / dmyal ba dang / yo dwags la sogs pa kun la ral shi gta dang / lus bzhigs na// 'tshod rnam mchod par spel te sman du mdzad de 'did ces dmod par do// bdag ca dmapa ni bdu rtsi'i mchog nor pa 'is bkrubs lagag/ gal ted pa ga pa no
79b3(rnying rgyud): gcig tu skye bar shog/ dpal gyi thugs rje 'byung bar dog/ bdag cag rnams ni bsgral par shog/ bskal nas dpal chen gsol bar shog/ yan lag sman du 'khrungs par shog/ khog pa gdan du 'ding bar shog/ sems ni rdo rje sems dpar shog/ cesad mod por zhing lhan ne lhang der kun kyang bsgrub cing gdan do// dang srong
79b4(rnying rgyud): ldan/ pam 'bras nag rjeg bzhugs pa las rban thA rje 'itha la shAsadrug pa'i ba las/ nga 'i ni ca dun pa/ ba naman kyi kyi kyi bang nas de kyi phyim log par dag // mad myong ga pa
79b5(rnying rgyud): par srog rtsa'i bam po dang / snang bcud brgyad kyi bam po dang / dngas pa rtsa'i bam po dang / dngas ma snod kyi bam po dang / yan lag sha'i bam po dang / lam ring drang srong gi bam po dang bdun no// 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du/ dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nus mdzad spyod brgyad las/ zhi ba'i mdzad spyod sems ca
79b6(rnying rgyud): 'dul// khro ba'i mdzad spyod drung 'dul// tan skye ni med pas gnas srung nyon// gaN bcing krol med pas mo rnams sbyor// mthun 'jug chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong ston// mi 'gyur chos nyid rol pa'i lha ba ston// thugs rje'i gsos kyis thams cad sman du 'khrungs pa las// 'og mi na thugs de'i /
79b7(rnying rgyud): kyi mdzad pa las/ bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba 'og min du grags pa rdzogs so// / lha yul du grags par yang 'gro'o// mi yul du grags par yang rgyud kha cig bzhugs so// rgyagar gyi mkhan po bims me tra dang / gnyigs dz+nyA nas bsgyur ba'o//
80a1(rnying rgyud): rgyugar mdu/ a mr-i ta ka mas ma drA tad+han ma/ bdag dudu/ bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho'i rgyud ces byab/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal la// 'di ska bdag gis byas pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu ma sa/
80a2(rnying rgyud): gnas mchog chos nyid ma skyes pa'i klong nas/ 'khor chos nyid la chos nyid bdu rgya chen po 'di bshad de/ dus gsum 'dus ma byas pa'i dus na/ dpal kun tu bzang po'i thugs las rdo rje sems dpa' phyung nas/ thal mo sbyar nas lan gsum bskor na
80a3(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi chen po las rgya mtsho'i rgyud 'di zhus so// lta ba rgya mtsho ji ltar blta// spyod pa rgya mtsho ji ltar lhod// bsgrub pa rgya mtsho de ltar bsgrub// sbyor ba rgya mtsho ji ltar sbyar// bskal ba'i phrin las ji ltar bskal// bdud rtsi sman chen gang du bslab// dmachos
80a4(rnying rgyud): bsrung ba ji ltar bsrung // phrin las rgya mtsho'i las rnams kun// lung dang man ngag rnam pa du// kun tu bzang pos bshad du gsol// kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod nyon cig/ gnas mchog yum gyi dkyil 'khor nu// gtas med
80a5(rnying rgyud): lhun gyis gnas pa'i tshe// de tshe nyan thos dge 'dun dang // byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang // dgra bcom ming yang med nang du// grwa gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor na// srid gsum sems can drug chen lnga// pra lnga ye shes lnga dang ldan// rang bzhin
80a6(rnying rgyud): da par spyad byas pas// stong gsum b+had+ha bzang 'khor du// zhe sdang lta bu'i dug chen la// me long lta bu'i ye shes gyis// rang bzhin med par sbyar byas pas// bdud d+hi zhes ni de la bya// shar phyogs sku gsum gzhal yas swA// bde bar gsheg/
80a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i po brang du// gti mug lta bu'i drug chen pa// stong pa nyid kyi kyis myongs pas// bdud rtsi zhes ni del bya// lho phyogs thub med gzhal yas su// rin chen rigs kyi pho brang du// nga rgyal lta bu'i drag chen la// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/
80b1(rnying rgyud): nyis su med par btsongs pas// bdud rtsig pa ning lakra// nub phyogs dpag mad gzhal las sa// badz+ra gas kyi ba zang du// rmad dkrus ba'i surdzun la// mas byags pa'i rgyas sbyangs pas// bad rtsi ni dal //
80b2(rnying rgyud): maud gzhal yas su// las kyi rigs kyi 'azang du// phrag dog lta bu'i drug chen la// bya ba nan tan gyis spangs pas// bdud rtsi zhes ni del bya// don gyi bdud rtsim bcos so// rtog pa'i bdud rtsi sangs rgyas pa'o// rdzas kyi bdud sa
80b3(rnying rgyud): grub// kun tu bzang po'i thugs dkyil nas// dus gsum srid gsum sku gsung thugs// ye nas bdud rtsi yin pa'i phyir// nges pa'i lung nas bka' stsal te// zab mo'i grong nas phyung ste bstan// de nas bde gshegs thams cad dang // thob sacig/
80b4(rnying rgyud): bklags pa'i dgongs pa ni// blan med pa'i byang chub cu// ye shes mnyam pa'i nyams rnyed nas// rdo rje gsang ba'i thal thob ste// kun gyi dam pa 'di gsungs so// srub dang bsrub par bya ba dang // 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir// gsang sngags gsang
80b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i man ngag ni// bdud rtsi dam pa mchog gi lung // snying por bsdus pa'i nges pa yi// byang chub 'byung ba'i snying po mchog/ blta ba dang ni nges tshig la// bsam gyis mi khyab bstan pa dang // brgyad khri bzhi stong rnam grangs kyang // theg pa'i sgo ni gsum
80b6(rnying rgyud): du 'dus// gsang nyid yi ger bsku dang bzhi// ldem por dgongs dang don dam yang // dkri ba'i don te sangs rgyas yin// rna brgyud bstan par thugs/ brtol te// thig le chos sras khyab pa'i phyir// nges pa'i lung yang sangs rgyas so// sangs rgyas ma/
80b7(rnying rgyud): dang dbyings su grol// gsang sngags gsang bas sangs rgyas te// byang chub sems 'di kun tu dag/ rdzogs pa'i ye shes pani chen nyid// ma lus mtha' dag nyid kyi rtsa/ ye nas bya med bya mi dgos// rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul ba'i wa// me tog myang ba'i yul
81a1(rnying rgyud): ma yin// de lta bu li rtag 'dzin gyis// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshar gyur pa yin// nges par 'byung ba chen po la// bdag 'dzin med bzhin bzhag pas na// byang chub sems nyid lhung gnas med// zug cig ma btsal ba par gnas pa/
81a2(rnying rgyud): dang lung dang man ngag gsum// dmangs dang rje dang rgyal po'i tshul// khyad par rtsal 'phags zag ring yang // gcig la gcig gi dang nyid du// dbyer med tshul gyi rang bzhin pas// gcig ste rnam pa yongs kyis med// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la n+d+ha// de
81a3(rnying rgyud): bos sku gsung thugs kyi chu// sku dang rgyun dang 'khor lo yang // lung chen zab mo'i nang na gsal// lnga bzhi'i nang du 'khor ba yang // ye shes sangs rgyas de las med// dbyings su gyur nas mnyam gnas pas// ye nas sangs rgyas bde chen nyid//
81a4(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi zhes ni de la brjod// skye 'chi med pa'i dbyings su gyur// dbyings gyur dag mnyam ldan grub pas// blta ba 'di la gnas pa yi// rnal 'byor 'di ni skal ba bzang // ci skad ci bsgom ci bsgrubs kyang // bdud rtsi yin te sman gyi mchog/ bde ba
81a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i thugs dam nyid// byin rlabs ngo mtshar rgya chen 'byung // rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi gsos// sangs rgyas bde chen nyid las 'byung // thams cad ma lus bdud rtsi 'di// spros med thig ler gnas pa la// mtha' yas sems can don
81a6(rnying rgyud): gyi phyir// rang la mdzod cing rang gis bza'// sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ ye shes chen po'i thugs yang dag pa nas dgongs te/ bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho 'di gsungs so// bdud rtsi las rgyu mtshams
81a7(rnying rgyud): lha ba'i leb ste dang po'o// / de nas yang 'de bar gshegs pa kun tu bzang po la/ rdo rje sems dpas gsol pa/ kun tu bzang pos bdud rtsi'i spyod pa ji ltar spyod/ bdud rtsi'i gnas ni gang nas skye// bdud rtsi'i rgyun cel
81b1(rnying rgyud): bgyi// bdud rtsi'i snod ni ji lta bu// bdud rtsi'i yum ni gang la bya// rgyal thabA karma ji lta bu// bdud rtsi'i yo byad ngu zhig 'tshal// kun tu bzang bas bka' stsal ba// spyod pa'i yo byad rnam pa gsum// kun tu bzang po'i gnas mchog ni// sems
81b2(rnying rgyud): ma pa 'di sa ga da/ drun pa ga na/ las da nag 'chabs// 'du gas dag sus nas // khrims pa/ ga gdag pags sa rgyas
81b3(rnying rgyud): gser gyi sa gzhi mdzes// nga rgyal dag pas ri rab la// laM las gser gyi ri rab 'bar// gling dang gling phran ri bo dang // thang dang mtsho dang chu bo dang // chu mig 'bab chu steng ka dang // g.ya' dang gangs dang nags dang sbar// na dang thang dang 'das las rjes//
81b4(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba lnga yi gzhal yas su// ri bo dpag bsam shing bu la// bdud rtsi sman gyi shing skyes pa// rtsa ba sdong po shun lpags dang // thang chu snying po yal ga dang // lo ma me tog 'bras bu dgu// yal ga brgyad po phyogs mtshams brgyad// dbus bya
81b5(rnying rgyud): bu rdo rje'i rigs// sdong po tshur mnan gyi rigs// rdo rje rigs myi sman yin no// shar gyi shing bu bde gshegs rigs// lo shun ring la 'jam pa'i shing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sman yin no// b+he yi phyogs su shing byas pa// lo lag rgyab pa 'bras bu
81b6(rnying rgyud): shing // rin chen rigs kyi sman yin no// nub kyi phyogs su shing skyes pa// me tog byas pa sdong po sbom// pad+ma rigs kyi sran yin no// byung gi phyogs su shing gyes pa// zung mjom zhing swa skad ma// las kyi rigs kyi spyan yin no// rtswa dang ma tob ma
81b7(rnying rgyud): kun la dgu dgu yod par bshad// rtsab sdong po shun pa dang // snying po yal gzang chu dang // 'dab me me tog 'bras bur bcas// mi dang byol song rtsi shing dang // 'byung ba lnga yis bsdus pa'i sman// kha dog dkar po rdo rje rigs// ser po bde ba gshegs
82a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rigs// sngon po rin po che yi rigs// dmar po pad+ma'i rigs yin no// kha dog sna tshogs pas kyi rigs// sman dum gyur gang yang med// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ bdud rtsi gnas nas skye ba'i le'u steganyis pa'o//
82a2(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog rnam pa lnga// mAM sa rin chen rak+ta dang // dri chu bdud rtsi byang chub sems// 'bras bu lnga dang b+han+da lnga// snying po lnga dang dam rdzas lnga// oM ser po/ hUM dkar po/ AHdmar po/ sA mthing ba// hA ljang ku/
82a3(rnying rgyud): sku lnga ye shes lnga dang ldan// 'phro 'du lnga yi sbyor ba yis// dug lha skyongs shing rab gsal bas// ye shes lnga yi dbyings su 'gyur// bdud rtsi'i chu ni byang chub sems// bdud rtsi'i snod ni yum gyi mkha'// bdud rtsi'i rgyu ni yab kyi klong // stong gsum
82a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor yug tu// b+h+rUM gyi 'phro 'du chen po las// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang // ye shes lnga ldan rdo rje ka pA la// sku gsum lhun grub rdo rje ka pA la// yi de bzhin re skor rdo rje ka pA la// yon tan tshogs chen rdo rje ka pA la// bkra shis mtshan ldan
82a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje ka pA la// mi 'gyur mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA la// mi shigs mdzod ldan rdo rje ka pA la// cho 'phrul rgyud 'byung rdo rje ka pA la// srid pa yongs grol rdo rje ka pA la// khams gsum dbang sdud rdo rje ka pA la// dug gsum gtan sngags rdo rje ka pA la/
82a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma'i skyon bral rdo rje ka pA la// zhal bu ka pA la yi mtshan gsol pa// 'phrul bkad yid bzhin phra men rgyan gyis brgyan// dang med mkha' la 'gro ba'i rdo rje thog thog rkan skra can// nga ni sngon gyi sgrub pa po yi rdza ma yin te// su zhig dngos grub 'dod
82a7(rnying rgyud): par las phong // gang gi bka' ltar mi byed dmal mi gnas pa// nga yi gzugs tsam mthong bas mod la chog pa dang // sgra skad thos pas mod la brlag par 'gyur// dkar po zangs yag 'tshor ba ni// snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
82b1(rnying rgyud): 'das// chos kyi sku dang bldan zhing // 'gro ba 'don la dbazhin gshegs// n+dan pa sbyar por 'khyil ba ni// da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// mdzam spyad rdzogs pa'i sku dang dab ldan zhing // 'am pa'i dan pa na bzhin gshegs//
82b2(rnying rgyud): dmar po ra re 'tsho ba ni// slad kyis 'byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// sprul pa'i sku dang rang ldan zhing // 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs// thabs kyi snying po rin chen dpal gyi mgur// pho brang rtags dang ldan pas snod bcud rgyan du che// srul
82b3(rnying rgyud): 'i lung long bud can// dbang po sna lnga snod bcud can du che// mi gnas bdud rtsi bzhugs pa'i rgyan du che// bdud rtsi sman chen khrol bu bzhag/ de ni bdud rtsi rnam lnga so// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ sbed badz+ra de yongs rdzogs kyi le
82b4(rnying rgyud): lhagasum pa'o/ bdu rkyen mi ba dpa n-i ni// thad gyis rgya ga sa yin / gaganyis med par bya// byang chub sems kyi dan rtogs pas// gsang ba din dang mi 'gyum gang // ba la mkhas pa brjod phyin pa
82b5(rnying rgyud): dbang rim par brtsegs te rdo rje rgyal po bka' rab 'byams kyi dbang thob nas dam la gnas shing dam tshig bsrung ba dang / theg pa chen po'i don la mkhas pa dang / phrin las kyi go rim la mkhas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ma nor ba'i tshul dgu ste/ dgongs pa
82b6(rnying rgyud): blta ba'i tshul/ gar ye shes kyi tshul/ phyag rgya sku'i tshul/ sngags gsung gi tshul/ snying po thugs kyi tshul/ mchod pa yon tan gyi tshul/ glu phrin las kyi tshul/ dkyil 'khor zhi ba'i tshul/ stangs thabs khro bo'i tshul/ tshig dang 'brel
82b7(rnying rgyud): pa dang / gang 'og ma 'chol ba del me tog gtor ba/ rde slob dpan dpas dang ldan/ 'phags pa rnams dang bdegashegs rnams kyi sku gsung lung // rna bar brgyud pa'i man ngag 'chad// sku gsung thugs kyang rdo rje ra gyur// bdud rtsing rgyal por /
83a1(rnying rgyud): mang 'gasal so// bdud rtsilas rgya mtshalas/ slo ba das yon tan bstan pa'i les ste bzhing // badz+rad ci'i yul / tha/ gcapa dgongs pa bzhin kyang nus ma dang / sakyang dgu nga rdzun na/ yus
83a2(rnying rgyud): shes pa/ shong che ba/ nog thub pa/ gsang sgo thub pa/ dmal gnas pa/ dad pas mos pa dang gdams pa spyad pa dang / rtog pa chung ba mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ sems bzung ba/ dgu dang ldan pa las ma gtogs pa/ ded mod dang / rnyed dang /
83a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin dang / sngon 'dres pa dang / mtshan dan dang / gsang 'dzag ma yin no// bkra shis mtshan ldan rdo rje'i yum// mig dbus ring la lags ma// tshig mig zum la rba zhing bshad// kha nas ut+pa la dang ldan zhing // lus la ga //
83a4(rnying rgyud): bri zhi ma dang ldan med skabs phyed// skra 'jam nag la mthod mthing g.yas su 'khyil// sa dkar thags dam rnyil ni dkar dmar byed// mig gri dkyus ring zang ma'i me tog 'dra// dpral ba'i dbyes che sra mtshams bla ga ma bzhin// sA yi zur mdog ma tog
83a5(rnying rgyud): lus drang sgred rir byang chub sems ma'i tshul// nu ma khyed sra sha dkar tshags su dam// khong dal 'gro na gom pa 'jab pa bzhin// grags pa'i skad kyang ngang pa gzhon nu ltar// snyan par smra zhing mdzes tshul stabs dang ldan// bdud rtsi'i yum du mnga' gsol lo//
83a6(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi'i karma rgyal thebs ji lta bu// dper na rgyal po'i bka' blon pos bsungangs dang 'dra bar/ dgongs spyod kyi don la tha mi dad par de nyid dang mtshungs pa la/ gzhan 'dren pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang / slob dpon gyi sku bsnyel ba'i thun slo ba dang / snyoms
83a7(rnying rgyud): pa la sogs pa la bar ma chad par bsgrub par bya ba dang // slob dpon gyi zhal tshab tu gzhan la chos ston pa la mkhas pa'o// dgongs pa'i don ldan phrin las thabs la ma las// lta ba'i don ldan man ngag gting nas 'chang // sku gsung thugs kyi srin las rdzogs
83b1(rnying rgyud): ba ma // gsang sngags bdud byu danam tshig lpags la banas// gsang ba da kyis mkhor zin par bka' gas ma dang // rgyal bak+Sha/ ma don rnams bstan pa'o// bdud rtsi'i byud nam pAl// ya thad rnam pa la po la// thams cad ma dang /
83b2(rnying rgyud): gang yang med// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ spyod pa rgyas pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / bsgrub pa rgya mtsho de ltar bsgrub pa ni// bsgrub pa rnam pa lnga la/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las rnam pa lnga las/ dkyil 'khor dang /
83b3(rnying rgyud): dgod pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / byin gyis brlab pa dang / gzhung bsrang ba dang / lnga ni yon tan no// dam pa rigs brgya ni sku'i bsnyen pa'o// de nyid rigs lnga ni gsung gi bsnyen pa'o// bteg bcag ni phrin las kyi bsnyen pa'o// ldan
83b4(rnying rgyud): dgong pa ni yon tan gyi bsnyen pa'o// gsang chen rigs gcig ni thugs kyi bsnyen pa'o// bsgrub pa rnam pa lta la phun sum tshogs pa ni bdun/ lung chen po gsum/ ting nge 'dzin bcu tham pa/ skabs sbyor chen po bdun/ grod tshad gsum ge
83b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'bod dang bdun do// phan sumachags pa bdun pa/ dang ba gnas phran sum tshags pani/ te da dzin ma dngas pa nang nyam pa dga' ba// me tog 'bras bur ldan pa // dga' yang yid du 'ong ba'i gnas// yid 'ong gnas pa
83b6(rnying rgyud): 'jug nas su// byin brlab mtshams gtsang brtan byas nas// sa ni gzung zhing byin gyis brlab// de dang der nis sbyang ste// chos nyid gad la pa'i nam mkha' la// ye shes lnga yi 'byung chen brtseg/ kun gzhi gdal ba'i nam mkhar la/
83b7(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa'i byung chen rnam lngab rtseg/ b+h+rUM las rin chen gzhal las khang // mtha' dang dbus med kun tu khyab// dz+hala'i spyi shing cang kyang drib// thA ga ma dmar pa dbang gi rgya// b+h+rUM kha ta li gyi hUM/ gzhal yas phur sum tshogs pa'o// theg par/
84a1(rnying rgyud): gcad skabs dag rtsa// rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i pho brang der// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi bya// dri sA lA yi man+tal bya// thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe dgu// dbus su dpag bsam shing bul// phyogs bzhir
84a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi ga ba brgyad// shar phyogs maN+Dal brgyad pa skye// zhi ba chen po rdo rje'i rigs// lho ru rin chen bur brgyad bris// rgyas pa chen po rin chen rigs// nub tu pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri// dbang mchog chen po pad+ma'i rigs// byang du 'khor lo rtsigs brgyad dri/
84a3(rnying rgyud): phrin las chen po las kyi rigs// mtshams su rin chen 'bar ba'i rigs// grwa bzhi'i bar du bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor dgu po gzhung bzhin bri// de yi dbus su bsam pa yang // srid gsum b+han d+ha bzang rgong yug/ ye nas ma bcos rang rgya
84a4(rnying rgyud): dpal dang ldan pa'i snod gzhag la// de yi nang du zug pa'i sman// ye shes rang byung bdud rtsi lnga// de yan chad ni gnas phun sum tshogs pa'o// yo byad phun sum tshogs pa ni// gsang ba'i don la 'jug bya'i phyir// gsang ba'i las kyi sngon rol du/
84a5(rnying rgyud): sbyang byang chub sems bskyed de// spar skong bklag cing cha gsum btang // bstan pa spang ba'i mgon po la// sbyin mchod bsrung ba'i las chen bcol// gzhan yang las kyi phyi rol du// mgon po gnas pa'i rten bzhir mda' gsol lo// ri
84a6(rnying rgyud): gling bzhi'i phyogs phyogs nas// rdo rje gsang bdag dbang gi mthus// 'jig rten myong ba'i tha tshig can// mthu chen rgyal po sde bzhi rnams// so so'i bgegs rigs 'dul la mkhas// chos skyong longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// phrin las rnam bzhi
84a7(rnying rgyud): mthar byin pas// rigs bzhi'i kha dog so sor gsal// rang rtags lha yi phyag mtshan thogs// dkyil 'khor myong ba'i rdzu 'phrul can// bdag cag rnal 'byor rtsal 'byor pas// rang rang 'khor rnams thub par mdzod// bslab pa'i rtsal rnam

85a3(rnying rgyud): spyan po 'bar ba'i rtsa brgyad las// 'bang ba'i rtse brjid bkyil nas kyang // dpal chen rdo rje'i bka' sdod nas// shin tu mi bzad 'bar ba y-i// gtu ma tshan rgal rnams pa'i gzugs// skya chen khyab 'jug pags pa zlas nas// chen gas
85a4(rnying rgyud): gzhin bzar mnabs// gshin rje ma drang 'bar ba'i me// rong thug chen po lag na 'phyar// phra min dgra khri mang po dag/ 'brar ba'i tshogs ni 'thabs thag chad// gangal ci 'dul der ston pa// tsit+ta 'bar ba'i mthong gis// do pral ma gur chu zeng/
85a5(rnying rgyud): bas spangs// bskal pa'i mi dpung 'bar ba'i klong // srid pa'i rtse mor 'brar zhing 'gro// nam mkha'i khams kun me dpung gtings// rdo rje 'khor lo ma kye 'thor// dung khrod dgon pas phyogs dag/ me li ri bo 'bar ba la// mye ya~M yi dwags ma
85a6(rnying rgyud): gtogs pas// gang yang gnas par mi phod do// steng gi me lce 'bar ba ni// 'og gi phyogs su 'phro zhing dakhrugs// 'og gi me lce 'bar ba yang // gyen du 'khyil zhing steng du bral// 'ur chem 'ung chem 'thab cing 'khrug/ dur khrod me ni sdug nAg
85a7(rnying rgyud): nga/ sa pa tha dag / 'a dag las pa nga/ da cigs rnam pa mi mnan pa/ danan pa yang ldang dag la chags// gnyi ga sa sa drug dag
85b1(rnying rgyud): rdol sA la ma N+Dal ta la ha par/ dA nas gathud tshogasam pab+hU/ gcig na dkun mchog pung du skang/ gnyis pan la 'byor ba'i tshogs sapa // gsum pa 'thab yongs la ba na// dkan ma tsug nasu snor gnyis pas// lcags dang tun
85b2(rnying rgyud): rgyas byin gyis brlab// dbus kyi bdud rtsi dri chen la// oM gyi 'phro 'dra chen po las// zhu nas phyag mtshan 'khor lo 'bar// dag pas bdud rtsi chen por zhu// shar gyi byang chub sems chen las// yi ge dz+haiM gi 'phro 'du las// zhu nas phyag
85b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'bar// byang chub sems ni bdud rtsir zhu// lho yi bdud rtsi sha chen las// yi ge swa yi 'phro 'du las// zhu nas phyag mtshan rin chen 'bar// mAM sa sha chen bdud cir za// nub kyi pad+ma rak+ta las// yi ge A~M g+ni 'gro 'du las// h+ya nus phyag mtshan
85b4(rnying rgyud): pad+ma 'bar// pawarak+ta thig ler zhu// byung gi bdud rtsi dri rgyalas// yi ge hA yi 'gro 'dra las// zhu nas phyag mtshan rgya gram 'bar// dag pas bdud rtsi chen por zhu// badz+ra lA h+ye hUM/ badz+ra mA le nAM/ badz+ra gi d+hi hrIH/ badz+ra nid+hi yAM/ rdo rje bkra
85b5(rnying rgyud): shis gzung mchog 'dren pa'i dpal// rdo rje can gyi byin stobs kyis// skal ldan can gyi zas su bya// skal med rnams kyi dug tu 'gyur// dper na sbrul la 'o ma bzhin// oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ lhag zil lha mo gnyen gsal ma/ rlan rnams
85b6(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsir bsgyur mdzad ma// bdud rtsi'i chu rgyan dngos grub 'dzin// rang gnyer las skal chu rgyun 'bebs// shig ni lha mo gdong bzhi ma// shing mi 'dab las bdud cir bsgyur// bkra tog sna tshogs dngas grub 'dzin// rang gnyer las skal
85b7(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu bskyod// lha mo sra brtan dbang ba sbyor ma// khrab brgyad las bdud rtsir 'gyur// bdud rtsi lu chen dngos sung 'dzid// rang gnyer las skal brtan par byed// rdo rje lha mo she la mdog ma// nyi zar bdud ci bsgyur byed ma// gsalab mdangs kyin /

86a2(rnying rgyud): me tog bdud rtsi bsgyur byed ma// rdzi mchog kun gyi dngos lub 'dzin// rang gnyer las skal tshims byed ma// sman gyi lha mo nor gyi spyan// dug rnams bdud rtsing bsgyur mdzad ma// bdud rtsi sman gyi dngos thub 'dzin// rang ga nyer lngas rgal na
86a3(rnying rgyud): rnams 'joms// rigs kyi lha mo 'di kun gyis// longs spyod bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs// rat+na saM b+ha wa ga gAn khaM swA hA/ yo byad byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ dge slong ga dang dge slong ma ye pa khyad
86a4(rnying rgyud): lha mor byin gyis brlabs te/ lci bor oM ser po/ mgrin par A dmar po/ snying gar hUM dkar po/ lte bar sA mthing ga/ rkang mthil du hA ljang gu/ spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// oM ldan 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlab
86a5(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur nas// rnam par snang mdzad su mchog bsgom// snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// hUM ldan 'bar ba'i tshogs su bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// rdo rje sems dpa'i sku mchog bsgom// lte bar rin chen dkyil 'khor la/
86a6(rnying rgyud): sA ldan 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// rin chen 'byung ldan sku mchog bsgom// lce dbus pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// aM ldan 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas/ snang
86a7(rnying rgyud): pa mtha' yas su mchog bsgom// gsang gnas rgyas ma dkyil 'khor du// hA ldan 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// las kyi sems dpa'i sku mchog bsgom// 'khor lo byin gyis brlags pa'o// de nas rung
86b1(rnying rgyud): thod kyi chag chag garab pa 'di skad ngo // bdud rtsi dri chen ye shes lngar ldan pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir// bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi dri chen chag chag 'debs// ma hA ba su ta ma d+ha la hU~M/
86b2(rnying rgyud): bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i dacil 'khor chen po ru// dam rdzas bdud rtsi dri chu 'dis// ye shes rang byung bsgrub pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chag chag 'debs// ma hA sa ma ya mA ma kI ku ru ma d+ha la hUM/ bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor
86b3(rnying rgyud): chen po ru// 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod byang chub sems kyi dang // mkha' dbyings rnam dag yum gyi gzhal yas su// rak+ta gsang ba'i chag chag 'debs// ma hA rak+ta dz+wal hUM/ dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// thugs rje rmad byung brla bar 'i phyir//
86b4(rnying rgyud): dur khrod bskul ba'i rdzas mchog sha chen gyis// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la chag chag 'debs// ma hA mAM sa ma d+ha la hUM/ dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// bdud rtsi chen po ye shes dri chab 'dis// gsar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la chag cho ga di
86b5(rnying rgyud): dz+nyA na maN+Da la hUM/ dur khrod chen po bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor du// chags pa rak+ta'i chus byugs pas// 'khor ba dbang sdud khrag gi go ma ye// tsakra d+ha ra hrIH/ de nas thig gdab pa ni/ rang bzhin gyi thig dang tu phreng gi thig go// rdo rje sems dpa'
86b6(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa na// rin chen rdo rje bla na med// rdo rje chos kyi bla blangs pas// las kyi rdo rje byed 'gyur gyi// lag pa'i 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsang ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// b+h+rUM gi phyag rgya'i tshogs bcas la// las kyi rdo rje gsal 'phro thim// khyed

87a1(rnying rgyud): 'debs kyis// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med pa yis// chags pas dbang spyad 'khor ba zil gyis gnon// kun bzang yum gyi mkha' la thig 'debs so// a ka dz+ra ti ra la gcig ma// gsang ba mkha' dasnying
87a2(rnying rgyud): dag pa ru// gar gyi dbang phyug bde chen po// byang chub sems kyi thig gdab pas// ma hA kro tI shwa rI dur khrod gnas nyul ma// b+ha ga hri ti mkha' la char 'babs ma// sa nub ga lo tog 'bras bur smin// me ze thag gyon rgya mtsho'i gting nas rol// ye shes
87a3(rnying rgyud): chu rgyun bdud rtsi chen po 'dis// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la thig thob dang // stong gsum khrag gi rgya mtsho las// rak+ta dmar gyi thig le dang // rak+ta dmar gyi thig gdab pas// khams gsum ma lus dbang du spyad// stong gsum ke la bus ri rab
