87b1(rnying rgyud): dmar sna mthing la sogs/ sa so'i mdog 'dra'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ bder gshegs gdan gyis bon dgod ces bya'o// de nas d+hat+ta lA dgod de/ dbus su b+han+ta stsal med ces mdzum bu gcig pa dgad/ rdzas bram thu kod pa yad na bzang /
87b2(rnying rgyud): de la oMn ma mrarbA ta ShA ga ta sarba pa d+ha a mr-i ta/ shrI ma hA su lahrIH/ sngags de bris la gzhag go// shar du had+ha sbal 'grengs zhes bya ste/ tshangs pa'i skud pa can dgod/ lho nyan sul mang zhes bya ste/ dpag bsam shing lo can dgod/ nub kya
87b3(rnying rgyud): mang bla ga ma can zhes bya ste/ gshong bu hral dgod// byang du b+har+b+ha sbal rgya gram can zhes bya ste/ gshong bu bzhi pa dgod/ de nas d+han+ta'i nang du gtso bo lnga dgod de dbus su byang chub sems/ shar rje rje chen/ lhor ba chen/ rngub tu ra/
87b4(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu lnga dgod pa ni/ dbus su aru zhes pa/ a ho pu'aM zhes bya ba/ glang po che la sogs pa rmig pa kha zag gi sha gzhag/ shir du pan sa zhes bya ba ste/ stag dang seng ge la sogs pa sder chags thams cad kyi shi gzhag/ sgor kun 'phrus
87b5(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ste rta la sogs pa'i rmeg zlum thams cad kyi sha gzhag/ nub tu na li ke ra zhes bya ba ste/ rma bya dang / rgod dang / khrung dang / ro dang / glag la sogs pa gshog can thams cad kyi sha gzhag/ byang du sbran pa'i a 'bras zhes bya ste/ mi
87b6(rnying rgyud): shung shing ti la sogs pa gdang po can thams cad kyi sha gzhang // de nas snying po lngal byang chub sems skyong brjid dkar ba/ shar gyi bdud rtsi sbyong ba yi sar po/ lho'i bdud rtsi skyong ba snyamathi ngag/ nub kyi bdud rtsi skyong ba yi dmar pa/ byang gi du
87b7(rnying rgyud): sbyang ba cwa lda sa/ de rnams sman lnga dbus su/ kal/ shang drung / spyor das sa/ thub tu 'i dzi nas/ byang du gro gi dka ba/ ldan nye la la/ dbus sra ya trir/ shar dru ga zung/ sgor kya tham/ drung tu
88a1(rnying rgyud): du bo lugs/ sman gco lnga la/ a 'bras/ rgun 'bru/ pa nas/ ge n+yas/ a ga ru dang lngar// 'bras bu'i gtso bo lnga la/ mi sdom pa dang / rta dkar po dang / glang po che dang / khyi dkar po dang / shang shang te'u dang /
88a2(rnying rgyud): dbang po lnga la/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / sre dang / snying dang lnga'o// phrad lnga la/ trag rAH/ rgyun 'bru/ ka ko la/ srag slel/ ba le ka dang lnga'o// dri'i rgyal po lnga la/ nA ga ge sAr/ shing tshA/ drag rmel/ gar+b+ha
88a3(rnying rgyud): hA/ tsan+dan dkar ba'o// dri'i blon po lnga la/ kye gros/ hA ti pha la/ gsur/ tsan+dan/ li shi dang lnga'o// thos lA la/ a g+ha dra/ lurbaH/ pog/ sbyang rtsi/ lde po ga dang snga'o// nad lha la phan po ni/ tsha ba thams cad bang kAn/
88a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad mkhris pa la/ sbyar ba thams cad 'dus pa la/ lan tshwa ba thams cad rlung la/ tha dad pa thams cad 'dus pa chen po la/ skyob lnga la byang chub sems kyi skyob la/ ga bur/ g+hi hang / tsi ha / gdung sha ri raM/ thal kar rdo rje/ hung dang
88a5(rnying rgyud): tsan ka/ shug kri be ra tha ma la g+h+ra/ go ro tsan/ bud med kyi 'o ma/ rkang tshil bu gzhungs pa/ khyi'i 'om/ 'gro'i 'o ma/ ba'i 'o ma/ rta'i 'om/ thar chu'i 'om/ khur mangs kyi ngom/ sha ru'i spren/ kun la srang re yod par rtsal/ mig
88a6(rnying rgyud): mngon shes 'thob pa'o// dri chen gyi skyob la/ dzA ti pha la/ ka ko la/ a ru ra/ a 'bras shing tshwa/ rgya spos/ sbrang rtsi/ mkhal ma zho sha/ snying zho sha/ mchin pa zho sha/ gla gong zho sha pra shang zho sha/ 'bras bu lA/ bskal ba'i phying
88a7(rnying rgyud): dang kun la cha mnyam srad re'o// mngon par shes pa lnga yang 'grub bo// mAM sa sha chen skyob la/ sug smel/ gan+d+ha pa tra/ 'bro sha/ li shi/ sna ma'i 'bras bu/ 'bras bu lnga/ bskal pa'i rna ba dang myar te/ kun la cha mnyam srang re'o// rna ba'i
88b1(rnying rgyud): mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur// rak+ta'i byob la/ tsan+dan dmar po spug po// nA ga ge sar/ nA ga pus pa/ leng leng ha/ khrag gi nyung ma/ yab kyi sna khrag/ 'bras bu lnga bskal ba'i snying gi rak+ta/ rtsa ba'i rak+ta mu la rak+ta/ tsan+dan dmar //
88b2(rnying rgyud): bu lnga bsgral pa'i sna kun la cha mnyam srang re'o// sna'i mngon shes 'thob par 'gyur/ dri chu'i rgyob lnga la/ a rung/ li ga dur med du mi rung / du ruka/ ka sho ka/ shing tog chun 'bru/ thang bal/ bu mo tha/ a l+ye kA la/ rje/
88b3(rnying rgyud): 'ug pa'i lce/ ngang pa'i lce/ 'bras bu lnga bsgral ba'i lce/ kun la cha mnyam srang re'o// lce'i mngon par shes pa'o// gzhan yang kha dog lnga/ dkar ba rdo rje'i rigs/ ser po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ sngon po rin po che'i rigs/ da
88b4(rnying rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs/ kha dog sna tshogs pa las kyi rigs/ ro lnga la kha ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ mngang ba rdo rje'i rigs/ tsha ba pad+ma'i rigs/ ro tha dad pa las kyi rigs/ gnod sbyin lag byi tshe lag// dbang po la ga ra sA ya na'i pang //
88b5(rnying rgyud): me lnga tshang ba ni sgrub pa po'i lag pa gdab bo// a ru ra/ ba ru ra/ skyu ru ra/ nya'i mig/ sbrul gyi mkhris pa/ gu gul thal chen/ spos lnga/ pog lnga/ snying po lnga/ rin po che lnga/ sman lnga/ phab lnga la/ rgya phab/ mon phab/ hu
88b6(rnying rgyud): phyab/ bde pheb/ sngon sgrub pa'i phab/ chung lnga la/ 'bras chang / rgun chad/ spang chang / nas chang / til chang / chu brgyad la/ rgya mtsho chu/ gtsang po'i chu/ gangs kyi chu/ klu yod pa'i chu/ chu mag gi chu/ khron pa'i chu/
88b7(rnying rgyud): ston zla ba'i nye char gyi chu/ gnam dang lcags chu til sna gsum/ bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga bsag pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / 'dis dkyil 'khor dgod par bya ba rnam pa gnyis su shes par byas te/ khrol cad
89a1(rnying rgyud): phyi ma gnyis/ khrol bu bgrub pa lnga rnam pa ban+de/ yon tan brjod nas sman dgod pa dang / rtswa ba'i lha dam pa rags brgya ga dpa'o// dbus kyi ka ba brgyad snang na// ban+d+ham+ba 'ong grangs rgyas // nam
89a2(rnying rgyud): la// byang chub sems ni ye shes rang bzhin te// dri med rang bzhin char bzhin 'bebs pa las// 'gro ba kun bskyed yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul// gdod nas dag pa bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la// gnyis mod sbyor bas bdud rtsi'i rigs mchog 'grub// me
89a3(rnying rgyud): lta bu'i ye shes de nyid yin// dbus kyi b+han+d+ha'i nang du shel phor bzhag la/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / gdung gro ro chen la sogs te/ dbus kyi snod du thugs la/ gul lag gi phyag rgya bcas la/ de'i steng du bzhag la sngags 'di
89a4(rnying rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM AHhUM badz+ra satwa hU~M/ sarba e shud+he a mr-i ta su kha ma hA yo ga hUM/ ts+tshiHhUM oM AHhUM ak+Sho sho d+ha dwe Sha ra ti sa ma ya s+thAm/ zhes brjod dbus su gzhag go// byang chub sems kyi b+han+d+ha'i nang du hUM bsams te/ phyogs bcur 'phos te
89a5(rnying rgyud): 'bas pas/ srid pa gsum gyi byang chub sems dang / srog gi zungs kyi bcud dang / rtse shing nags tshal gyi dngas ma la phog pas dbang bskur/ slar yang de bzhin du bsdus pa ni/ dper na phung bas me tog gzhib pa bzhin// b+han+da'i nang du byang chub
89a6(rnying rgyud): sems su bsdus shing / yang byang chub sems yum gyi mkha' nang nas slar blangs te// dbus kyi b+han+d+ha'i nang du bstim mo// snod kyi nang nas 'od 'phros pas/ 'gro ba'i don mdzad sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu gnyis mdzad nas/ slar rdo rje sems dpa'i
89a7(rnying rgyud): sku tshon gang bar gyur nas dbus su bzhugs so// de nas dri chen gyi snod kyi steng du oM ser po bsams te/ phyogs bcur 'od du 'phros pas stong khams thams cad kha dog ser por gyur/ tshe dang lus kyi dngos grub la dbang bsgyur zhing 'dus pa dang / gser
89b1(rnying rgyud): dag gas
89b2(rnying rgyud): so// mal sa yogs ngasal/ sa da dag gas padza/ gas pa rtogs pa mas
89b3(rnying rgyud): sa dag pa rang bzhin pas// 'de gshesas gas kyi thugs dus rnyed/ da pan d+hAr baman/ sa dbye ma nas dmachog grub// mangs stong rdzogs sranam // thams cad du bzhin gzugs pa
89b4(rnying rgyud): mig / ma thamathams gas
89b5(rnying rgyud): da na// ranas sgo baSh+Ta nang drug ldan pa bsams te/ de las 'od 'thos pas stor khams dzi ma sa/ sa tan/ sa gyur pa dang / rgyas las 'a thos pas/ phyogs brgya khyab nas 'grol mngon nas/ ma
89b6(rnying rgyud): nyis rdzogs nas/ bla'i rin po ma zer brgyad partson ga/ byas til gyi gang zab sbyi gang nas bklags pa la rjo rje thos pal sa 'gro bajams cad kyi yul dang glang po dang / gnas dang ba'i 'arjid dang / reg tu bsus nas rin chen 'byung
90a1(rnying rgyud): thand rnams tham ca dang thus pa'o// mi dwags smra mthag chad pa yang // bdag sras gtong na mi da na// skal sogs pa'i bamad rnams byas// las can rnams ta rgyanag tho// dbas 'did nas nga brgyan /
90a2(rnying rgyud): rang byang bdud rtsi bstan pa yin// lhas kyang lnga yi bdud rtsibaba'i// mi la sogs pas de bzhin du// rnal 'byor pas cang spyad cing ba ba'o// 'di ltar bdag gzhan ni 'byed pa ste// blang dar med par grol bar hU~Ms// mnyam pa nyid kyi ni mthong na
90a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad mnye ma nyid ye shes sku// bad+ma gshegs rin chen rigs mchog 'grub// mnyam nyid ye shes yin par bshad// oM AHhUM ma hA mAM sa ma ya ra No ti/ rat+na ra ti sa ma yA tI/ zhes brjod pas/ lho phyogs rin chen zur brgyad kyi rngog nas/
90a4(rnying rgyud): sul mong du 'bras bu chen po lnga bsgral ba'i sha chen brgya rtsa brgyad dgod do// de nas nub phyogs kyi pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi thog nas rak+ta'i b+han+da'i nang du AHdmar po gcig bsams la/ AHlas 'od 'gros slar 'dus pa las pad+ma rany+dza ra gyur/ rak+ta las
90a5(rnying rgyud): tshod du 'anas te stong khams khyab pas 'jig rten srid pa'i ngar 'dzin pa rakar chags pa ril dbang bskur te slar 'dres pa las/ ling+ga ra k+Shas bslus pa'i sdang srid kyi bkrag dang gzi mdangs kun bsdus nas/ mdzad pa brgya gnyis byas nas slar 'dus pad
90a6(rnying rgyud): snang ba mtha' yas kyi sku tshon gang pa 'od dmar po 'bar zhing nub tu bzhu gas par bsam mo// rak+ta'i snod blangs la sgrub pa po kun kha nub tu bltas la rak+Shas g.yab cing 'di skad do// rA ga rak+Sha pad+ma 'byung // smad pa mi gtsang rdzas 'di dag/ chags yul ba
90a7(rnying rgyud): 'a nan kyi sa byung chu// maso tag pa'i sargyas pa// zhes cing chu gyi nas rnam la sa na na/ sam sad do/
90b1(rnying rgyud): gyi b+han+ta sul zla kha ma du ma hA rak+ta dang / mU la rak+ta dang / pad+ma rak+ta dang / rak+ta brgya rtsa bkyang dgod do// de nas byang phyogs kyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad steng nas/ dri chu'i b+han+ta la hA ljang gru bsam zhing / hA las 'od 'phros slar 'dus pa las ni chung gu
90b2(rnying rgyud): dri chu las 'od 'phros pas stong khams khyab par dri chus bkrus te/ dbang bskur nas slar 'dus pa dang / rdo rje rgya gram ldang gu tshon gang bas til gyi gang bu bzhin gang ngo // de las 'od 'phros pas snang srid kyi chu dang / 'gro ba rigs drug ril gyi chu bsdus na
90b3(rnying rgyud): pa bcu gnyi la mdzad do// slar 'dus pa dang don yod grub pa'i sku tshon gang pa gcig tu gyur nas/ byang phyogs gi snod du bzhugs par bsams la/ de nas dri chu'i snod blangs sgrub pa po kun kha byang phyogs su bltas la 'di skad do// kun 'byung zag pa kut+pa sa/
90b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dri li chu yin te// chu las ma byung gang yang med// las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang // nan tan ye shes mchog kyang 'grub// oM AHhUM sarba khaM trUM a mo g+ha si d+hi badz+ra ra ti badz+re sa ma ya b+h+rUM/ zhes brjod de byang phyog su gzhag go// de nas grwa bzhir
90b5(rnying rgyud): po che bzhi'i thog tu gser phor dngul phor zangs phor lcags phor dung por bkod la/ sgrub pa po kun thal mo sbyar la/ dbus kyi snod yab yum gyis blangs la 'di skad do// hUM ye shes snying po can rnams kyi// sangs kyis kun gyi chos nyid 'di// snying po chas
90b6(rnying rgyud): kyi don las byung // byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin// smad par bya ba'i rdzas lnga po// kun la yon tan lnga lngar bshad// gcig la'ang yon tan gsum du dbye// dam tshig rtsa ba bco lnga yin// yang na nyi shu rtsa brgyad do// snod bcud dbus su
90b7(rnying rgyud): bsdus nas ni// bcu drug por yang bstan par bya// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa lnga// sems dpa' sems ma'i tshogs su blta// 'dus byas pa yi rdo rje te// dgongs pa 'dus pa sems dpar bshad// rdo rje sems dpar rab sbyangs nas// rdo rje sems

92a1(rnying rgyud): rAng/ kAma? n+tA// kam \u0f7f\u0f7f/ ka ma t+ta/ kamas+thAH/ kama?kAH/ kamany+dza sa/ ka maHma/ karba t+tiH/ karma \u0f7fga/ kar+m+maSh+TaH/ kArma kat+tha/ kam raH/ kA ma yAk+ta/ kAmarba n+te/ byang gis /
92a2(rnying rgyud): shar du nyi shu rtsa lnga hUM las bskyed// lho yi nyi shu rtsa lnga d+h+waM las bskyed// nub kyi nyi shu rtsa lnga AM las bskyed// byang du nyi shu rtsa lnga hA las bskyed// spyir dam pa rigs brgya sku'i bsnyen pa'o// de ltar lha bar+Na bkod nas tshig tu 'di skad do// rnam par mi rtog
92a3(rnying rgyud): sbrul sa da padza ga/ rnamams dpa' me da // dbus pa mas 'gyu na thags dam dzung /
92a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs nas kyang // bdun kyi di labyi rjes rnaMngs// oM hU~M A Sh+yo ga rnaMs ma ya stam/ zhes brtse brgyad bzas migayon/ de nas sbyin drangs la/ bstas la di bang do// rnam par mi tig chos kyi // dartsal ma ma
92a5(rnying rgyud): sku// sbrul sgras cir yang don mdzad pa// rin chen sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas// lho phyogs b+han+ta sul mang du// mAM sa las ni sbyar ba'i sman// rin chen rigs kyi thugs dam bskong // 'byung ldan 'khor bcas gshegs nas kyang // bdud rtsi 'di la byin gyi
92a6(rnying rgyud): rlobs// oM AHhUM sA rat+na d+h+r-ika/ mAM mo ha ra ti sa ma ya sAm/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// nub kyi b+har+d+ha blangs nas 'di skad do// rnam par mi rtog chos kyi sku// 'dod chags longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgra// sbrul skus cir yang don mdzad pa// snang ba
92a7(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas 'khor dang bcas// nub phyogs b+had+ha zla gam du// rak+ta las ni sbyar ba'i sman// pad+ma rigs kyi thugs dam bskang // mtha' yas 'khor bcas gshegs nas kyang // bdud rtsi 'di la byin gyis rlobs// oM AHhU~M AM a ro lika/
92b1(rnying rgyud): rA gang nyi sa ma ya sbram/ bcwa rtsa brgyad bzlas so// thung gi b+har+b+ha blangs pa 'di skad do// rnam par mnyan chos kyi sra// phrag dag yongs spyod rdzogs pa'i sra// skal sras ci yang don mdzad pa// don yod zab pa 'ang dang bcas// rgya
92b2(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas sgra// dri chu las ni sbyar bya'i ldan// las kyi rigs kyi thugs dam bska'// don grub 'khor bcas gshegs nas kyang // bdud kyi 'di la byin gyis rlobs// oM AHhU~M hA pranA~M d+h+r-ika/ 'adz+re ka m+bar ti sa ma ya sA ma/ de nas sha
92b3(rnying rgyud): la 'di skad do// rnam par mi rtog chos kyi sgra// gti mug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgra// srul grusan+d+hi yang don mdzad pa// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas// shar phyogs b+har+d+ha sul med du// dri chen las ni myar ba'i sman// bde gshegs ra
92b4(rnying rgyud): dam pazhing // snang mdzad 'a khor bcas gshegs nas kyang // bdud rtsi di la b+h+rin gyi rlabs// oM A ts+tshi dang / Ani Ni ti pa me ya sAm/ brgyan brgyang bzlas so// dang ma thugs thal dag zil du// drir khrod kyi byeng lhan gyis thag// sras
92b5(rnying rgyud): bzhugs gnas dam pa 'dir// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs su// rnal 'byor dges shing bzhugs su gsol// gsang ba'i las rnams bya ba'i phyir// phrin las brgyad kyis mtshams bcad do// slob dpon mnga' gsol las ka bsro// gsar du 'jug pa mchis na yang /
92b6(rnying rgyud): bla na g.yog mna' dbang bshags pa bgyi// de ni bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ro// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ yon tan sgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / yan lag stong gi sman dgod pa// 'byung ba lnga yi thugs rje las// sman lnga b.rung
92b7(rnying rgyud): phyir rnam par dag/ 'gro ba yongs kyi gsos mdza par// thugs rje chen por byin cis rlabs// dngos med dngos bub blang phyir du// ye shes lnga yi rdzas su dgram// sman gyi srung mas rtog bsal te// srid gsum ye nas bdud rtsi lnga// byang chub sems
93a1(rnying rgyud): ni kun tu dag/ rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde chen nyid// ma lus mtha' dag grub pa'i rtsa// ye nas bya med bya mi dgos// rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul pa'i sra// rA sA ya na'i spang ma rnams// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas mchog na /
93a2(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa dung gi thor tshugs can// spyan gsum srid pa gsum la gzigs// phyag bzhi phreng ba gun+d+he sbyin// bdud rtsi sman las dngos grub thob// bdud rtsi 'di la byin gyis rlobs// tshangs pa kun grol chen po ni// dkar po bung mdog sgra yang sogs//
93a3(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi 'di la byin gyis rlobs// drang srong ljang sngon rA hU la/ tsa ra ka dang na ba so skyes// gza' dang skar ma'i rig 'dzin yin// tha skar bu dang lha skyabs ni// dri za lha yi rig 'dzin yin// rgyan shes dang ni g.yon phyogs lha// cha yi lha yi rig 'dzin yin
93a4(rnying rgyud): thang la skyes dang me bzhin 'jug/ me yi lha yi rig 'dzin yin// rkang gnyis spyod dang ka ya na// dka' thub spyod pa'i rig 'dzin yin// shing khyer dang ni rig 'dzin rnams// bdud rtsi sman la byin gyis rlobs// dge bsnyen li ts+tsha dri ma med// mi yi
93a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin chen po yin// klu yi rgyal po 'jog po ni// byol song rnams kyi rig 'dzin yin// shing gi lha mo 'od 'chad ma// sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyan// grub pa'i lha mo blo bros ma// rtsi yi lha mo nad sal ma// rig 'dzin lha mo mched bzhi yang // bdud
93a6(rnying rgyud): rtsi sman 'a byin gyis rlobs// phyag rgya bzhi'i bdud rtsil dgug ning spyan drang ngo // pheMts+tsha ba~M hoH/ a mr-i ta A be sha ho/ byas la stan drang ngo // de nas byin dbab pa'i sngags la/ oM ma hA sarba par+Na a mr-i ta s+tha kha d+hi pa ba~M/ nam mkha'i mtha' dang
93a7(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ bya ba yang brjod/ de nas dam pa rigs brgya'i bsnyen pas ltung bar bya ste/ bde bar gshegs pa re rol bsnyen pa brgya rtsa brgyad brgya dbul nas/ de'i 'od zer 'phro 'dus sman thams cad ldan gyi dngos po dang bral nas kyang ba ni/
93b1(rnying rgyud): gas brgya bstan pags can// don bu'i bathun ga/ denas gsang shi bsta na par nyid rigs 'i bstan pasud+ha na/ bsas yang mo btsud pa la das/ da na shAng mnas dun/ du
93b2(rnying rgyud): rtsalnga 'od dpag med la 'dus/ byang gi nyi shu rtsa lnga don yod grub pa la 'dus/ spyir lha brgya rngam pa lngar 'das pas/ de nyid rigs lnga'i bsnyen pas sbyang bar bya ste/ de yang dbus kyi rdo rje rigs kyi bdud rtsi srung ba sh+yas+t+wa~M/ 'di skad do// da
93b3(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas su// byang chub sems kyi sman sbyar bas// hUM gi 'phro 'du'i sbyong ba las// lhag mthong chen po'i ye shes kyis// zhe sdang chen po'i bdud bcom nas// sbyar 'dus b+had+ha'i gzhal yas su// mi bgyod rdo rje yal yum bsgom// hU~M dz+nyA na
93b4(rnying rgyud): rASh+TadzaH/ zhes 'bram bzlas pa'i dus m+b+ha/ dbus kyi gar+b+ha nas byang chub sems la sogs te rdo rje rigs kyi bdud rtsi thams cad phran gyid dadzas po dang zlal nas/ hU~Mgi tshogs su 'gro zheng nam mkha' gang ba'i dus na 'jig rten drug gi phyogs brgyanam
93b5(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa'i sems can nyon mongs zhe sdang gi dbang gis/ 'khor ba'i mtha' la zhen pa thams cad stongs shing zad par bskul nas/ slar dbus kyi b+han+d+ha la tshi li li 'dus pa la/ rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum gyi phyag rgyar srog zin par gyur to//
93b6(rnying rgyud): des ni nyon mongs pa zhe sdang gi bdud bcom nas/ thugs rdo rje lta bu byang chub sems kyi ni/ ma~M mong+ga l+ya bu'i k+She shes kyin+ti sa sleb pas/ 'bras ze rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum gyi sku phyag rgya chen por srog zin par gyur to// de nas de bzhin pa
93b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi bdud kyi rkyang bar byaste// de skad do// shar gyi d+ha'i gzhal yas su// dri chen bdu 'i phrin sbyar te// oM tsi gro du gsal ba las// chong nyid dag pa'i ma shes kyis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs brgyan// gti mug chen pa
94a1(rnying rgyud): lam gnas pa// stongs shing zad par rab bskul te// slar 'dus d+hasgra'i gzhal yas sa// rnam par snang mdzad yab yum bskum// oM d+han 'jaskar Nas/ zhes pa dang 'bum bzlas pa'i dur/ nang
94a2(rnying rgyud): yas su/ bdud rtsi dri chen la sogs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bdud rtsi thams cad kyi dngos po dang / mtshan ma de dag dang bral nas/ yi ge oM gyi tshogs su 'gro zhing nam mkha' gang ba'i dus na/ 'jig rten drug tshogs
94a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sems can nyon mongs pa gti mug gi dbang gis 'tshar ba'i mtha' 'azhen pa thams cad stongs shing zad par bska lA ngas/ s+phar byad+ha'i gzha la las 'dud 'das nas/ thams cad oM na rang bzhir du gyur nas/
94a4(rnying rgyud): pa las/ rnam par snang mdzad yab yum gyi phyag rgya 'asrog zin par gyur to// de nas lho'i \u0f7ftrA~M nas rin po che'i rigs kyi phrin snang bar bya ste/ 'di sa // gzhal yas sa// sha chen bdud rtsi stan sbyar bas// sA yaM 'phra du
94a5(rnying rgyud): mnyam nyid chen po'i ye shes kyis// 'jig rten drug ni phyogs brgya// nga rgyal chen gyi mi gnas pa// stongs zhing bang bar rab 'brel nas// sla ra gan chen 'byung ldan yab yum \u0f7f// sata na
94a6(rnying rgyud): byed pa sa pa'i dusan/ sa / tha semams cadamakha' 'ang 'a 'asla/ na
94a7(rnying rgyud): nam rtogs pa'i sems can dmyal gyi dbang gis 'khor ba'i mtha' lazhen pa thams cad zad cing stongs par bskal nas/ slar lho'i brtang tshi li'i 'dus pas/ rin chen 'byung ldan yas 'i rtsa srog zin par gyur to// deni pa rigs
94b1(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi sbyang bar bya ste/ 'di skad do// nub phyogs b+har+d+ha'i gzhal yas su// rak+ta'i bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar bas// A gyi 'gro 'dra'i sbyor ba las// so sor rtog pa'i ye shas kyis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs ban+dan// 'dod chags chen pong lam
94b2(rnying rgyud): gnas pa// stongs shing zad par rab bsgral nas// slar 'dus b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas su// snang ba mtha' yas yab yum bsgom// zhes dbyangs dang srul tshig brjod// AM dz+nyA na badz+ra s+pha ra Na dzaH/ zhes bzlas pa'i dus na nung phyogs kyi d+hAd+hA'i gzhal ya
94b3(rnying rgyud): khang na/ pad+ma rak+Sha la sogs te pad+ma rigs kyi bdud rtsi thams cad sman gyi dngos po dang bral nas/ AM gyi tshogs su 'phro zhing nam mkha' gang ba'i dus na/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na ma rtogs pa'i sems can nyon mongs pa 'dod chags kyi dbang gis
94b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i mtha' la zhen pa thams cad stongs shing zad par bsgral nas/ slar nub kyi b+han+da'i gzhal yas su 'dus pa las/ sdang ba mtha' yas yab yum gyi phyag rgyar srog zin par gyur to// de nas las kyi rigs kyi bdud rtsir sbyang bar bya ste/ 'di skad do//
94b5(rnying rgyud): byang phyogs b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas su// dri chu'i bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar bas// hA yi 'phro 'dra'i sbyor ba las// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs brgyan// phrag dog chen po'i lam gnas pa// stongs shing zad par rab bsgral nas/
94b6(rnying rgyud): slar 'ja b+har+d+ha'i gzhal yas su// don yod grub pa yab yum bsgom// hA dz+nyA na badz+ra s+phA ra Na dzaH/ zhes khri 'bum bzlas pa'i dus na/ byang gi b+har+d+ha'i gzhal yas khang na rdo rje dri chu la sogs pa las kyi rigs kyi bdud rtsi thams cad stan gyi dngos po dang bral nas/
94b7(rnying rgyud): bI'i tshogs su 'gro zhing nam mkha' gang ba'i dus na/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcun ma rtogs pa'i sems can nyon mongs pa phrag dog gi dbang gis 'khor ba'i mtha' la zhen pa thams cad zad cing stongs par bsgral nas/ slar tshi li li byang gi b+han+tar 'dus pa
95a1(rnying rgyud): byas/ na ma thub pa la ba sras kyims kya ma na s+ho// 'angag tan dug gzugs brtan du rgya pa mams can yong tu dang sa bya sa dam sa pa dang byas pa/ drag
95a2(rnying rgyud): dang kyis gdungs pa/ 'thor bar rnamang gi gnas sa gtan ni bathams cad la ma shes can pa zhes ni spangs la/ thugs byang chub kyis ma sa hrI kyis slebs/ 'bras pa phrag sung thugs kyi srog 'dzin ma pa'i phying dab gyi te/ bang
95a3(rnying rgyud): bus ba sgra gsung thugs zhes byam/ sa sa / da nus pa/ las ma da gas bya gnas/ ma cigagasus ga nga yang sa/ la mi me pa
95a4(rnying rgyud): nga'i steng banyid na// bdud byer 'gyur ba'i sngags la/ A hA 'jas bla a mr-i ta sa ta'i Sh+Ta shar phyogs nas mi bar can la ma m+b+ha ta la ts+tsha thA/ phyogs ngas/ oM hA rjes d+d+ha d+ha \u0f7f/ rngabarjo pa
95a5(rnying rgyud): hA badz+ra sarbA a rbaM ta t+ya 'i hrIH/ byang phyogs nas/ oM mr-i ka masar+b+ba a me ta kuH \u0f7f/ yum rnams kyi g.yon phyogs nas/ oM hrI sa hU~M \u0f7f hrI/ zhes pa mi ma na pa dang / thong
95a6(rnying rgyud): bang 'bor phrag/ 'bul ma zhes 'tshang dulas// 'ams khyab par dan byas rnas// brgyad de dam pa sa bzlas nas// gnyis pa pa shes rje re dang // dkyi pa pa dam pa rigs /
95a7(rnying rgyud): da nyid rig pa sgra'i dkyil mdzar yang // gas chen rigs gci gaskul 'bru// b+hatu rdzani sum sngar 'jug// dbyings sus sa rgyas mr-i ta ra A yan ta bya dzegs dam dngos tho
95b1(rnying rgyud): blang / b+har+d+ha ni smos pa med pa yum gyi b+hag pa d+ma'i gzhal yas khang na/ bdud rtsi'i bye brag dngos po dang thal nas/ byang chub kyi sems ye shes dpa' bo 'bru lngar gyur nas/ par 'phros pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs brtsan/ nyon mongs pa lnga la zhen/
95b2(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad spongs shing zad par bsgral nas/ slar 'dus pa las ye shes lnga rang bzhin lhun gyis grub par bsgom/ de nyid rigs lnga'i bsnyen pa gsung gi bsnyen pa'o// kun tu bzang po thugs zhi ba'i bsnyen pa'o// bdud rtsi las kyang tsho las
95b3(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi khrol bu'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas khrol bu'i dkyil 'khor bsdus nas/ tsan+dan dmar po'i dri chab la khro mo dbyings phyug ma'i sngags kyis gdab/ oM ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI sarba dra byaM hUM thA/ mtshan ma'i rnam rtog bag chags bya
95b4(rnying rgyud): brtag dang brtag dang gzhal ba las/ thun chen gzhini bting ba la// ra k+ta'i thig la bris la// der dang na 'og stong du gding / ti zla ba ba'i gtan pa brgya// zo ma ba cu yi gtsun mad// zlab badz+re li rdo rjes brdung // sde byin ma yi gta
95b5(rnying rgyud): khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi dug chen la// steng phyogs srung ba'i hUM kA ras// ye shes lnga yi tho bas brdung // stong khams khyab par don byas te// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// 'chi med bdud rtsi chen por gyur// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtshos gsol//
95b6(rnying rgyud): hUM dz+nyA na badz+ra bin+d+ha dzaH/ gardza gardza hUM/ rdo rje snyems ma'i gtun khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi dug chen la// shar phyogs srung ba'i rnam rgyal gyis// ye shes lnga yi tho bas bzung // stong khams khyab par don byas te// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// 'chi med
95b7(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi chen por gyur// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtshos gsol// hUM dz+nyA na badz+ra bi nU dzaH/ ha na ha na hUM/ dur khrod bdag mo'i gtun khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi dug tshon la// lho phyogs srung ba'i gshed po yis// ye shes lnga yi tho bas brdung //
96a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ stong khams khyab par don byas te// brgyad kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// 'chi med bdud rtsi chen por gyur// dus gsum rgyal brgya mtshos gsol// hUM wA nabi nA dzaH/ pa cangaHhUM/ rdo rje gtum mo'i gtun khung du// ta
96a2(rnying rgyud): lha yi dug chen la// nub phyogs srung ba'i rta mgrin gyis// ye shes lnga yi tho bas brdung // stong khams khyab par don byas nas// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus te// 'chi mdo bdud rtsi chen por gyur// dus gsum rgyal brgyam mos gsol//
96a3(rnying rgyud): dzaH/ hu lu hu hUM/ rlung 'byin ma yi gtun khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi drug chen la// byang srung bdud rtsi lagyi lham yis// ye shes lnga yi thobs brdung // stong khams khyab par don byas te// brgyad kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// 'chi med pa
96a4(rnying rgyud): gyur// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtshos gsol// hUM dz+nyA na bi n+du dzaH/ Sh+Tha tshin+ta hUM phaT/ rdo rje sder mo'i gtun khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi dug chen la// shar lho srung ba'i dbyug sngon gyis// ye shes lnga yi tho bas brdung // stong khams khyab par
96a5(rnying rgyud): byas te// brgyad kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// 'chi med bdud rtsi chen por gyur// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtshos gsol// hUM dz+nyA na bi nu dzaH/ ha na ha na hUM/ gtun khung ma yi mkha' dbyings su// nyon mongs lnga yi dug chen la// lho nubasrung ba'i
96a6(rnying rgyud): g.yo bas// ye shes lha yi thobs brdung // stong khams khyab par don byas te// brjod kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// 'chi med bdud rtsi chen por gyur// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtshos gsol// hU~M hU~M ni baT+Ta dzaH/ brti bat+tadz+dza/ gsod cad ma
96a7(rnying rgyud): gtum thang du// nyon mongs lnga yi dug chen la// nub byang gzhan gyis mi thub pas// ye shes lnga yi tho bas brdung// stong khams khyab par rngon byas te// brgyad kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// 'chi med bdud kyi chen por gyur// dus gsum rgyal brtsa
96b1(rnying rgyud): gsam// d+hA dz+nyA na bi d+ha / tiHti/ hU~M/ mnga' ba sems ma yi gtum thung du/ nyon mongs lnga yi drug can la// zung shar srung ba'i khams gsum rgyal// ye shes mA ma thobs brdud // stong khams khyab par don byas te// brgyad kyi nga
96b2(rnying rgyud): makun bzlas nas// 'chi med bdud rtsi chen por gyur// dus gsum rgyal brgya mtshos gsol// hU~M dz+nyA na bin+da dzaH/ b+hin+ta b+hit+tahU~M phaT/ sbrul byed ma leg tun khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi drug chen la// zhag phyogs spang ba'i stobs
96b3(rnying rgyud): ches// ye shes lnga yi tho bas brdung // stong khams khyab par don byas te// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// 'chi med bdud rtsi chen por sbyor// dus gsum rgyal brgya mtshos gsol// hU~M dz+nyA na bin+da dzaH/ Ta s+phon d+he/ khro bo chen po ba#
96b4(rnying rgyud): khro mo bcu'i b+ha gar/ bdud rtsi 'chi ba med pa'i byang chub sems su lhun gyis grub par brdung bar bsam mo// chos kyi dbyings kyi gtun khung chen po ru// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje thobs bzung // snod bcud bdud rtsi'i bye brag sna tshogs kun/
96b5(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu byang chub sems sgra rab tu sbyar// hUM dz+nyA na bin+da zhes rtog pa bsngal lo// bdud rtsi las rgyas tsho las/ bdud rtsi phrin las kyi sgrub pa btag pa'i las kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas btsag ste dar tshags dang la tshags kyis/
96b6(rnying rgyud): btsag ste/ bse gzhong ngam zangs gzhong ngam/ 'khar gzhong du yum dang the tshom med pa'i bya rog mas btsag dar zab kyis brgyan la yab yum thabs da' shes rab kyis sbal zhing btsag go// 'di skad do// e ma ho kun tu bzang mo yi// thugs
96b7(rnying rgyud): las byung ba'i gsang chen 'di// sngon byung sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bur byin brlabs de// 'bras bu bde chen byang chub sems// ye nas grub pa'i bdud rtsir sA yan// 'chi med bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin te// rang thung gdang /
97a1(rnying rgyud): nas dag pa yi// cu brgyad stong bas tha ba'i ldan// rAHyan la sags d+ha// nab 'am thag yang ba'i brgyad// gnyis med pa de ldan las byung ba// byang chub blas sa na dong 'o// gartson mam zu // dra du
97a2(rnying rgyud): ho/ yang dag ldan// zas mchog tshe yi dri chen po// rdo rje'i chu ste bdud rje'i mchog/ ga pur shel gyi pog phor dri// rin chen me ltar 'bar ba'i tshogs// yon tan 'bum phrag yangs pa'i gter// reg 'dzin dmatshig lnga yi da ngong // ye shes
97a3(rnying rgyud): lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// rgyud drug sems can kun sgrol phyir// dug lnga sel ba'i thabs mchog ste// thams cad bdud rtsi'i rnal 'byor gyis// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le 'di// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam skor phyir// gcig tu dpa' bo 'tshornams dang /
97a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad dang // rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la mchod// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// 'khrul pa'i bag chags dag bya'i phyir// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pas gcig/ oM AHr+g+haM sarba bany+tsa a mr-i ta
97a5(rnying rgyud): dz+nyA na badz+ra saM sho d+hA ya hUM hriHtha/ btsag pa'i sngags so// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta mu sa la mA sa la/ ha na ha na hUM hriHTa/ bsre zhing sbal ba'i sngags so// de nas bcal te/ mi bskyod byang chub sems nyid btsal// lhag mthong chen po'i the yis bcang //
97a6(rnying rgyud): yo ga la med pa'i srang la bcal// 'gyur ba med pa'i khal du blang // rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyis gsol// dz+nyA na badz+ra ho sa ma ya hUM/ rnam par snang mdzad dri chen 'jal// me long ye shes bre yis 'jal// yo gal med pa'i srang la 'jal// 'gyur ba
97a7(rnying rgyud): med pa'i khal du blang // rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyis gsol// dz+nyAn badz+ra ho sa ma ya hUM/ rin chen 'byung ldan sha chen 'angal// mnyam nyid ye shes bre yis 'jal// yo gal med pa'i srang la 'jal// 'gyur ba med pa'i khal du blang // rgyal ba
97b1(rnying rgyud): rgya mtsho rnams kyis gsol// dz+nyAn badz+ra gos ma pa hUM/ mtha' yas pa d+marak+ta'angal// so sor rtogs pa'i ze yis 'jal// yo gal med pa'i srang la 'angal// 'gyur ba med pa'i khal du blang // rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyis gsol// dz+nyA na badz+ra ha sa ma/
97b2(rnying rgyud): hUM/ don yod grub pa dri chu gur gum 'jal// bya ba nan tan ze yis 'jal// yo gal med pa'i srang la 'jal// 'gyur ba med pa'i khal du blang // rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyis gsol// dz+nyA na badz+ra ho sa ma ya hUM/ sku gsung thugs kyi chu yis gdab/
97b3(rnying rgyud): gcig pa dpal chen he ru'i rgya// gnyis pa yab yum gnyis med rgya// gsum pa sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// bzhi pa ye shes bzhi yi rgya// lnga pa rigs lnga lha yi rgya// drug pa thub pa drug gi rgya// bdun pa ma mo bdun gyi rgya// brgyad pa gau rI brgyad kyi/
97b4(rnying rgyud): dgu pa he ru khrong dgu'i rgya// bcu pa khro bo bcu yi rgya// gu h+ya lag gi phyag rgyas gdab// ras bal ba su ta yi gzungs thag gis// b+han+ta yas phub pa ni gnam yin te// mas bkab pa ni sa yin la// kha khyer du snang ba ni ri rab yin la/ dum bu bzhir snang ba
97b5(rnying rgyud): ni 'dzam bu gling bzhi yin la/ dum bu gsum du snang ba ni srid pa gsum yin/ gzhal yas khang nang na bdud rtsi rnam pa lngas khengs pa ni/ mu tig dkar po dri ma med pa la lhas gnan du med pa/ mnan pa thams cad bdud rtsis khengs pa/ 'dres pa chur med pa/
97b6(rnying rgyud): brkum pa thams cad bdud rtsis khengs pa/ dper na mtsho'i nang na nya sbal bzhin no// gzungs thag gi phyogs bzhi nas bskor ba ni/ dbus rgya mtsho chen po las chu bo chen po bzhi 'bab pa/ shar seng ge'i kha nas 'bab pa/ lho rta sngon gyi kha nas 'bab pa/
97b7(rnying rgyud): nub rma bya'i kha nas 'bab pa/ byang shang shang gi kha nas 'bab pa/ chu bo bzhi 'dom nas dbus kyi pho brang rgya mtsho chen po las 'bab pa ni/ glang po che'i kha nas 'bab pa dang / glang po che'i ya rkan rta mgrin/ markan gsang ba'i yum bzhi/ de yab yum \u0f7f
98a1(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab las/ lkug pa'i byang sems dkar lhung lha dbyung bar bsgom mo// de yan chad phrin las kyi sgrub pa'o// bdun ci las rgya mtshoms/ zlab stobs pa cha btag bcag btsal ba'i me nyi bcu pa'o//
98a2(rnying rgyud): denas gnas mchog gsang ba ru// dkyil 'khor lnga po rim par bri// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// de'i phyi rim rin po che zur brgyad// de'i phyi rim ka ba mchog brgyad// de yi phyi rim maN+Dal bri// grwa chad d+mo khyams
98a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par bri// dar gyi khang bu bklubs pas brgyan// me tog phreng bas phyogs bzhir bskor// bdud rtsi'i pho brang bzhengs su gsol// phrin las dbang rnams rim par bskur// byin chen dbab cing yon tan brjod// dgu pa'i sngags kyi gad
98a4(rnying rgyud): pa ni// spyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi sngags// sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li tha/ sar ni sa yaM snying po'i don// wa ni nam mkha'i snying po'i don// pa nya ni sgrib pa rnam par sel// tsa ne byams pa me tri yin// a ni kurA tA bzang po'o// l+r-in
98a5(rnying rgyud): dpal gzhon nu'o// ta ni spyan ras gzigs dbang ngo // kuN+Da sangs rgyas kun tu bzang // li ni phyag na rdo rje ste// tha ni spyan ras gzigs dbang ngo // gtso bo kun bzang rab tu gsungs// phyi yi dgra pa'i sngags zhes bya// nang du'ang ma dang
98a6(rnying rgyud): gshin rje gshed// spyan ras gzigs dang rta mgrin tshul// phyag na rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil// kun tu bzang po dbyug pa sngon// sa yi snying po rnam par rgyal// sgrib pa rnam sel stobs po che// byams pa mai tri mi g.yo mgon// nam mkha' snying po
98a7(rnying rgyud): rAng// che mchog he ru ka dang dgu'o// nang gi dgu pa zhes de la byang // gsang ba'i dgu pa ni/ sar ni sa yi rang bzhin no// wa ni chu yi rang bzhin no// panya ni rlung gi rang bzhin no// tsa ni me yi rang bzhin no// a ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no//
98b1(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsildan pa// tadapa cig rten pa// gtul ni 'thil ba/ thani sreg dang 'dzams par// gas ba'i sngags ni rnam pa dgra// dgra pa nas ni del bya// mam med pa'i brtson 'bras kyis// bar kyad med pas na ba gnas// nam
98b2(rnying rgyud): 'du rgyu ba'i thabs ni/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim bzhin bsgom// rgyu yi ting 'dzin 'bras bu las// nga nyid byang chub sams su gyur// 'thung ba la yum dkyil 'bar dag/ byang chub sams las rim bzhin pabyed// ye 'i kha hU~M /
98b3(rnying rgyud): dkyi ting 'dzin na/ chos nyid stong ba'i rnam mapa' las// thug cang tshul du phra 'di'i byung du// mi gnas mi rtog pas ma dang thal// mnags thal bas yul las 'das// cir yang de 'byung cing ma yin// rang bzhin pa da dang thal pa sa/
98b4(rnying rgyud): byung bas chos thams cad nas mkha'i rang bzhin drags lam// de nas kun stong na nga yin pa snyoms par thugs te 'di skad do// yangs la khyab pa nyi ma'i yod// snyid rje byang thub sems yin te// rnam nag mun pa sel bar ldad// med
98b5(rnying rgyud): r-i chen 'brang ba'i 'od// ces ma byung bas ches thams cad byang chu bya 'ad phyir du gsal bar gyur te// de nas rgyung// dang 'dzin pa rnams par thugs te 'di ma dang// a ni ma chags la ga'i mdzod// cha 'phrul rtag pa 'thung ba'i sa/ snron mongs
98b6(rnying rgyud): thus zla ba'i ma dag/ tsha 'phrul tshogs 'byung ba'i ste// zhes sa zung bas thos thams cad 'thal gyi rang bzhin du gnas par sna to// de das sum can ma nam mapa dbyings sdug ma'i byung ba 'dzin pa rnams par grags te 'drigad do// u ni e lce rang ba
98b7(rnying rgyud): ti// a las a byung ma kha'i thab la// mi 'gyur po tha mad nam mapa'i dbyings// mtha' dbus med par kun ta ga la// zhes byung bas nam mtha' kun tu bzang pa'i rang bzhin drugasas so// de nas srung nas chog sgrol ma'i ting nge 'don la phyo /
99a1(rnying rgyud): bar zhugs te 'di skad du// A yi ye shes byin rlabs las// rlung gi snying po ye du shar// thams cad bde ba'i stobs dang ldan// rang bzhin g.yo zhing thogs med 'bya// zhes byang gas mang gad pa
99a2(rnying rgyud): par gyur to// de nas yum mA ma kI'i byin rlabs las sba 'di 'byung ngo // chu yi snying po'i 'od zer las// chu yi snying po 'od zer shAr// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar mnyam pa'o// chu yi rgya mtsho thams cad gyes par gyur// zhes spa phyung pas thams cad kA
99a3(rnying rgyud): bas las sgra 'di 'byung ngo // de nas yang rdo rje 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas skra 'di 'byung ngo // mi dmigs pa las sna tshogs par// snang ba'i cho 'phrul 'di byung bas// rnal 'byor sa bcu rdzogs pa'i dod// lhan gyis zab
99a4(rnying rgyud): bdes che// zhes sgra byung bas sa bcu rim gyis 'dul ba'i bye brag thugs su chud par gyur to// de nas rdo rje 'bar ba ri bo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad do// rnam rtog shes rab mkha' klong nas// rdo rje 'bar ba'i ri bo shar// rgya che gte
99a5(rnying rgyud): za ba gnam 'phang gcod// rtog pa'i ri bo 'joms par byed// ces sgra byung bas rdo rje'i ri bos nyon mongs thams cad 'joms par byed do// de nas gzhal yas khang yum gyi mkhar byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// b+ha ga gsang ba'i
99a6(rnying rgyud): 'od zer las// bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gzhal yas khang // nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dpag tu med// lus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings// zhes brjod pas gzhal yas khang dpag tu med par bsam mo// de nas me 'bar bas bsreg pa zhes bya ba'i
99a7(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// a yi byin rlabs ye shes las// cho 'phrul me yi snying po shar// 'bar ba gsal byed ye shes 'gro// dngos po kun zad me klong tshul// zhes brjod pas/ gzhas yas khang phyi nang gi mtshan ma'i rtog pa thams
99b1(rnying rgyud): cad po'i 'barla bas bzag par bsnam ma// de'i nang du che mchog gle sra bskyed pa 'di skad // a ma tsa// chos kun thams cad phul rdzogs pas chos kyi sgra// rdo rje che mchag phyag 'tshal nyes// chos nyid mkha' la skang tshogs nyam pa'i rgya
99b2(rnying rgyud): dbyur gyi char smin lta bur gtibs pa'i su// rgyurlabs lta bur brjid pa'i zhal gdangs shing // nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer brdal ba bzhin// theg chen 'khor ba'i chos rnams can// phyag rgya gcig tu rdzogs pa'i sku// chos su spun grub chos sur
99b3(rnying rgyud): rtogs 'bar// dpya sgra lam nag ral pa'i cod pan can// klu rgyal 'bum gyis bklubs shing mchod pa 'bul// rdo rje gsung gi sngags su brdab pas kyang // hUM dang phaT gyi sgra skad 'jigs par ston// theg chen don dang gisang sngags phrogs
99b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshig/ 'bar ba'i smin ma mun rum klog ltar 'gyu// spyan dmar bzlog pa'i sdang mig nyi ltar 'bar// 'bar ba'i grong nas bskal pa'i 'tshubs nag 'khyil// hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra skad 'jigs par sgrogs// rdo rje thog dang gnam lcags ser
99b5(rnying rgyud): pa 'bebs// rno pal mche bzung yag gtsigs pa yis// nyon mongs log par blta ba'i tshogs la rngams shir 'khrugs// thod rus sha khrag rkang rus phul dang rtag/ za byed drims pa'i zhal du rtse mchim gsol// sbrul gdug go rngon la sogs
99b6(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i rgyan// rngams pa'i spru la shin tu brjid par brgyan// za byed rnams dang 'jigs byed mang po'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan sprul pa'i pho nya mdzad// 'khor ba kun dang thar pa'i chos rnams ni// dpa' bo chen po'i gdan du brjed cing
99b7(rnying rgyud): rol// gyi nang rjod bcud srul/ rdzogs pas na// 'gran gyi bla med ze bcan gcig pu nyid// gsang mchog 'bar ba'i yul phyag 'tshal lo// oM A hU~M sarba pany+tsa a pra ta ra sa sid+d+hi tA su lahr-i da ya pa ra bidz+nyAn A kra maN hridz+dza/ oM A
100a1(rnying rgyud): ze na /
100a2(rnying rgyud):  mr-i tA mAr+tha s+t+ri b+hA ba lo ga hi ng+ge hrI pa/ oM a yu~Ms zab kyi a mr-i ta Sh+T+rI b+ha ga wAn b+h+yo ho// oM A hU~M sa pa ma a pr-i ti ra~M sa si d+d+hi mad+has mdzad pa pa ri bi d+hana~M lA~M ba~M ma Ni hrIH/ oM A~M hU~M sarba pa wA sa mr-i ta na thams cad bdun rtsir mgyur pa med pa
100a3(rnying rgyud): ras yun ni b+h+ya sa ni rigs lnga yi ba yum sangs rgyas/ nang duH yan nr-i phreng po rigs pa'i sangs rgyas/ de gnyis kyis bskyed pa'i khams dang / mtshangs mas dpa' dang / sems mdzo dbyangs kyi dkyil mdzang ngas nas
100a4(rnying rgyud): l+ya ba'i dan rig cing rtogs dka' bas na/ nus pa natan pa/ dz+nyAn bdud rtsi ma byung po med pa'i// nin mgrin/ bra ni 'di kyar snang ba thams cad bdud rtse lnga'i rang bzhin du ma gyur pa rmed pa'o// yang nas pa ba stangs /
100a5(rnying rgyud): ni gsung / hUM ni thugs/ hUM sarba bany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ni thams cad bdag la 'khyil pa'o// bdag thams cad la 'khyil pa ni/ gros pa med pa'i chos nyid byang chub sems/ rang rig pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang 'dra ba'am/ rang gang gi ye shes nam
100a6(rnying rgyud): dang 'ja ba ste/ ljongs kyis rtogs pa de thams cad la 'khyil pa'o// thams cad bdag la lasgril pa'o// gyi 'byung ba lngar sangs rgyas// nang lha dang lha mo sems dpa' dang sems mar sangs rgyas so// de kho na thams cad bdag la lakhyil pa'o//
100a7(rnying rgyud): chub sa man bla// nga du du sabashed pas byang babrang ba ma dang/ byeng ba nga da sbyin pa ga
100b1(rnying rgyud): btang zhig pa'o// b+han+ta ni mgo nas choms shig pa'o// hUM rang byung gi byang chub sems de kho na lhangs kyis rtogs pa'o// tha ni thams cad bdud rtsir ma gyur pa med pa'o// oM AHhUM sar+b+ba pany+tsa a mr-i ta badz+ra sarba hU~M hrI a ni 'di ltar snang ba thams cad rdo rje sems dang
100b2(rnying rgyud): gyur pa gang yang med pa'o// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ka ma la kuN+Da li sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hUM hrIHtha ni dkyil 'khor yang yin la yul yang yin pa'i dngos grub pa'o// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta many+dza shrI byA ba lo ki te hUM hUMHwa ni 'jam dpal te 'di ltar snang ba thams cad
100b3(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi rnam pa lngar ma gyur pa gang yang med pa'o// las de khyod la gtad kyis 'gro ba sems can gyi don mdzod cig pa'o// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta shI b+ha ga wAn hU~M a ho ni chos nyid byang chub sems a'i rang bzhin du ma gyur pa med pa'o// zhes 'das pa'i
100b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas zhal bdun nas kyang sngags bdun bzlas so// slad kyis 'byon pa'i sangs rgyas zhal bdun nas kyang sngags gong ma bdun bzlas so// de ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal bdun nas kyang sngags gong ma bdun bzlas so// che mchog he ru ka ni
100b5(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi sangs rgyas yin no// 'das pa bdun/ da ltar bdun/ slad kyis 'byon pa'i sangs rgyas bdun no// dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig gi zhal nas sngags bdun bzlas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i sras brgyad/ khro bo bcu/ gau rI ma btang
100b6(rnying rgyud): phra men ma brgyad kyi gsang sngags mang po'i skyon rnams ni 'bras bu bsrub thag ring bar 'gyur bas/ 'bru dgu pa'i gsang sngags zhig zhu zhes chos 'khor lan bcu gsum du bskor te zhus pa 'di skad do// nam mkha' don gyi glegs bam la// skar tshogs
100b7(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i yi ge bris// 'gyung chen bzhi yi sba bsgrags nas// gsang sngags mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad// gsang sngags chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// stong gsum b+han+ta bzang kong du// srid gsum sems can dug chen la// dus gsum rgyal
101a1(rnying rgyud): brda rtsi myur bas// bdud rnying macad brgyan mi 'chad// bdud mas kyi khang ma bskang// 'bor ba mtshar skrod pa la// mchod pa zlum ma'i gtad yi te// sred pa'i nam mamathar yas kun// kun rdza/
101a2(rnying rgyud): bachod pa rgyan mi 'chad// bkrus brjod chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'khor ba shes rab yum nyid la// snying rje thabs kyi rgyal po yis// 'dra bral med par rab sbyar na// thams cad rgyal ba'i rdzas su bskyed// rnal 'byur pa yis mcho dang sbyin
101a3(rnying rgyud): 'chad// rnal 'byor pa yis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'khor ba bskal pa'i zhing 'di dag/ ye shes 'bar ba'i mtshon chen gyis// rang bzhin med par bskal byas nas// mnyam nyid chos su chen por ston// sgrol ba'i mcho nga chun
101a4(rnying rgyud): sgrol ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'dod khams rmang gi ri rab la// gzugs khams pang ri ma khri 'phang brtan// gzugs med bum rten bum par bcas// sku gdung mchod rten rgyun mi 'chad// sku gdung chos 'a 'khor lo bskor// jug pa
101a5(rnying rgyud): yan lag glang gzhi'i rten// 'khor lo tshogs chen khri 'phang rten// yan lag dang po bum rten bcas// lung po cod pan phreng bas brgyan// sku gdung chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// gtsang ma'i rgya las byas pa yi// yid 'ong rnam pa'i mchod pa la/
101a6(rnying rgyud): rkyen gyi rnal 'byor sna tshogs kyis// brgyan te bslab pa'i sprin phrang rnams// mnyes pa bgad kyi h+la/ ya bul// mr-i chu'i mchod pa rgyan mi 'ched// pri'u'i chos kyi 'khor lo// kyi 'khor skyong ba'i mgon po la// 'dod yon wa la sogs
101a7(rnying rgyud): pa yi// yid bzhin yo byad rkyen dang bcas// yon tan chal smon lam mchod// mnyes nas skong pa'i skabs pa 'gyur// yon tan mchod pa rgyan mi 'chad// yon tanams kyil kho ra lo bskor// khams gsum snyeng rje'i gnas dka na/
101b1(rnying rgyud): yo byad sbyin sags can pa las// 'ad pa'i bsam pa rab gyur na// dgupa bstan pas skabs su 'gyur// snying rje'i mchod pa thun mi 'jud// rnying rnaM chos kyi mang ma bskor// gegs su gyur pa'i bgags dgas la// mnyam rjin du
101b2(rnying rgyud): mi dbyung // dmigs kyi kha zas sna tshogs pas// bgegs rnams mgu nas thams cad kyang // lan chags thal ba'i 'khor lo bskor// des 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang sems ma dang / khro bo dang khro mos gsang sngags
101b3(rnying rgyud): mo thams cad kyi bdud rtsi lnga'i yang snying / lung bdag la bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas lung bdag la bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / che mchog he rus bka' stsal pa/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / da
101b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor sems dpa' dang / sems ma dang / khro bo dang khro mo dang / dri za dang / drang srong dang / gshin rje dang / srin po dang / klu dang / rlung lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams nyon cig
101b5(rnying rgyud): oM AHhUM pharba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hrIHthA/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang snying yin/ sman thams cad rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / snying po dang / shun lpags dang / thang chu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog
101b6(rnying rgyud): dang / 'bras bu dang / dgu po 'di la yi ge 'bru dgus sbyang ngo // de la yang sbyang lugs rnam pa gsum ste/ rgyu nas sbyang ba dang / rkyen gyis sbyang ba dang / 'bras bu nas sbyang ba'o// de la rgya nas srung ba ni bcom ldan 'das gsang ba
101b7(rnying rgyud): mchog gi bdag po'i zhabs kyi gdan khri yan chad nas dbu'i gtsug tor man chad du rdzogs par mthong ngo // nam mkha' stong pa ni dbu'i gtsug tor dge ba bcu/ de yang 'khor ba 'dod pa'i khams ni chags pa khrag gi rgya mtshor rdzogs/ mdza
102a1(rnying rgyud): pa gzugs khams zhing chen sa gzhi brtan par rdzogs par mthong ngo // keng rus la gzugs med pa'i khams rdzogs par mthong ngo // ri rab kyi kha mu tig gi btsal dang / asma gar+b+ha dang / nor bu rin cha 'bar ba
102a2(rnying rgyud): nyan thos rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams su la rdzogs par mthong ngo // nor bu rin po che'i steng na rdo rje rtse gsum dang / rtse lnga dang / rdo rje'i brag gtams pa ni/ li ya dang / u pa ya dang / yo ga rnams rdzogs par mthong ngo //
102a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje phrag chen gyi steng na pad+ma kha dog dmar por gnas pa ni/ ma hA yo ga rdzogs par mthong ngo // pad+ma'i steng na nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang / zla ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi kha sbyar du bkod pa la/ dbang phyug pho nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang / mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rdzogs par mthong ngo //
102a4(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug pho mo'i steng na byol song gi gtso chen po brgyad la/ dpa' brtul stag dang mi 'jigs seng ge dang gdug pa gzig dang / gtum pa dom dang / stobs glang po che dang / brjid pa'i ma he dang / 'dzin pa'i chu srin dang / zhe sdang
102a5(rnying rgyud): rnams ni rig 'dzin rnams nyon mongs dang / zhes bya'i sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ rig 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo // gzhal yas khang chen po nam mkha'i rig 'dzin du phyogs chad par gyur pa ni/ yum kun tu bzang mor rdzogs par
102a6(rnying rgyud): mthong ngo // me dpung chen po dgu yongs su 'bar ba/ ye shes dgu yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo // zhabs brgyad la gsang ba'i yum bzhi dang / sgom bzhi yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo // dur khrod bcong rgyad ni ma mo bco brgyad rdzogs par
102a7(rnying rgyud): mthong ngo // phyag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni phra men ma bcu dbyug par 'phyar ba'i lag na/ khyud bcu 'bar ba'i kha nas mtshon cha sna tshogs 'tho ba phra thabs bcu dbyug par 'phyar ba'i lag na/ seng ge kha glal ba'i kha nas ral gri brgyad 'phro ba/ gro
102b1(rnying rgyud): chen po'i lag nas stag mche ba gtsigs pa'i kha nas rdo rje sna tshogs 'phro ba/ sgrol ging mo dgu'i kha nas mi mgo brgyad rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis btags nas glad la bskor ba/ khro bo bzhi'i lag nas me dpung chen pos thu lum du bsreg pa/ phyag bzhi
102b2(rnying rgyud): bcu rtsa gnyis su gsal lo// zhal nyi shu rtsa gcig ni sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gcig tu gsal lo// dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig g.yas kyi dbu bdun gyi spyi gtsug ni sangs rgyas kyi sku re re byung ba'i dbul 'khor lo re re 'od zer dang bcas par 'bar ba/ da
102b3(rnying rgyud): dbu bdun la dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyi sku re re byung ba la/ rin po che'i mchod rten re re gsal lo// g.yon pa'i dbu bdun las sangs rgyas kyi sku re re byung ba la/ nor bu rin po che bdun gsal ba/ 'khor lo dang mchod rten dang / rin po che de dag gi
102b4(rnying rgyud): pa dang / rtse mo las rgyal mtshan chen po bcu 'bar ba ni/ rgyal byed lcags kyi rgyal mtshan dang / gdul bya sha ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / gcan gzan gzig gi rgyal mtshan dang // sprul pa rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che thul nag gi rgyal mtshan dang /
102b5(rnying rgyud): dpa' bo stag gi rgyal mtshan dang / gzi mdangs mi'i rgyal mtshan dang / dmar gsal khrag gi rgyal mtshan dang / rtsal chen seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang / gtum pa dom gyi rgyal mtshan te de rnams kyi rtse mo gcig tu 'dus te/ gser gyi tog stong
102b6(rnying rgyud): gcig tu 'bar ba'o// dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / rgyal mtshan chen po bcu dang / dbu yi gtsug tor rgyal mtshan gyi tog stong ni/ rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor nyid du gsal bar mthong ngo // spyan 'bar ba drug cu rtsa bzhi ni/ khrag 'thung drug rgyar gsal lo/
102b7(rnying rgyud): ljags kyi dbang po la sa nu he ru ka yab yum bsgom/ che mchog thugs nas b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang / nad b+han+d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / gnam sa gnyis kyi gzhal yas su bdud rtsis khengs pa/ bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen por chu bran bzhi 'bab pa/
103a1(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi'i chu bran bzhin gzungs thag bzhi yin/ bzhig cig tu 'dus pa glang bacha lde la nas 'bab pa/ glang po ca'i ya dan la rna mthen/ mnyan gas pa'i yum hA ni/ ba yum thapas dang shes pa
103a2(rnying rgyud): dkar me ri 'bab pa las/ bdud rtsi shar seng ge'i kha nas 'bab pa/ lho rta sngon gyi kha nas 'bab pa/ nub rma bya'i kha nas 'bab pa/ byang shang shar te'u'i kha nas 'bab pa/ sems can de lnga'i kha nas rigs kyi yum lnga/ de la dbus rtsed na lang
103a3(rnying rgyud): gu phyag bco brgyad zhabs bzhi dang ldan par bsgom mo// che mchog gi zhabs brgyad kyis khro mo'i dbu brgyad mnan pa/ dbus kyi gnam zhal gyen du bltas pa'i zhal na/ che mchog gsang ba'i rdo rje phyed nub par bsgom mo// khro mo gnas zhal gyi zhabs ba
103a4(rnying rgyud): rigs bzhi he ru ka bzhi'i phrag gong nas mnan pa/ gnam zhal gyi gsang ba'i b+ha gar dbus badz+ra he ru ka yi smin mtshams yan chad nub par bsgom mo// che mchog gi lhag pa'i byang chub sems ni khro mo gnam zhal ma la zhim/ gnam zhal gyi byang chub sems
103a5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra he ru ka'i dbu la thim/ de'i byang sems rigs bzhi he ru ka la thim/ rigs bzhi'i byang sems ni yum la thim/ yum bzhi'i byang sems ni sems can bzhi'i kha nas chu 'bab pa la thim/ chu bo chen po byang chub sems kyi 'dud
103a6(rnying rgyud): gyur to// de ni rgyan mo sbyang ba'o// rkyen gyis srung ba ni sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang ste/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuH'i hrIT/ oM ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas te// oM las ye shes 'od kyang zhing // oM gyi mes pa sre gzal bar brlag/ da ltar 'khrugs
103a7(rnying rgyud): pa rnams kyis gsung // hU~M ni bdud rtsi rnam par dag/ skad kyis 'byon pa'i sangs rgyas yin// sar ni sa ye snying po yin// zad pa med pa bdud rtsi'i mchog/ pa ni nemamakha'i snying po yin// thams cad bdud rtsi chen por bstan// pa nya ni sleb pa
103b1(rnying rgyud): na rnams ma nasadas // na byams pa ma yin// 'ang byas na pagachags sa/ nangan ba // ngadu byu dun byu rjod// na nga mya pa ldagasod s+ho// brnyan pa na na
103b2(rnying rgyud): nga // ta ni stan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ bdung rje 'doni ni byang chub sems// kuN+Di mchog rte ru// gdud rtsi'i dang ne mnyam pa nyid// li ni phyag non dzin// brjod ci nyid ni bag zags spyong // sbyini d+hamachog chen po ste// bdud
103b3(rnying rgyud): na pa 'thob// dgra pa'i sted hA oM A trAM/ sti mthun pas ni bcu gsum mo// phyogs bcu gsum po 'di 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs/ du ltar dang ma byon pas kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro// sems dpa' dang sems ma
103b4(rnying rgyud): khrib la mo rnams kyis kyang gsungs so// gnas yul gyi ma mo rnams kyis kyang gsungs so// lhas srin sde brgyad kyis kyang yang snying yog dbru bcu gsum pa 'di gsungs so// dgu pa la yig 'bru bcug sum pa dang / bcuganyis rdzi te mgrin las
103b5(rnying rgyud): mkhan pa dang bcu gsum mo// bdud ci las rgyam tshalas/ thugs kyi bsnyed pa'i mjug bcu gcigs // gsang chen rigs gcig ba'i basbyin pa // 'bras bu sbyang ba ni/ 'dzab dpral ba dang / thugs dbang baphrul
103b6(rnying rgyud): dngos sru blang ba dang / bshags pa thu ba dang / chags kyi 'kho lo bskong ba dang / ba gi tsid kyi dgags bskrad pa dang / smod lam gna' ba ni/ kye mo'i bras pa song rgya'i m+b+hir 'dogasungs so// bzhin slab kyi 'ang 'thangs pa ni/ dang
103b7(rnying rgyud): da cing // thugasung thugs kyi dgangs pa ma / sa sa 'a da pan skyed/ ba rjeg/ yodas sa ma tha gyi ga/ nas rnas gas shes pa bya
104a1(rnying rgyud): hUM ni sangs rgyas thugs kyi ye shes so// gnyis pa ra sA ya na khrol bu'i bsnyen pa la/ oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ra sA ya na ta na dza ya hU~M hrIHtha/ oM gyis ye shes 'od 'byung zhing // AHyis mes bsregs thal bar
104a2(rnying rgyud): brlag/ hUM gi bdud rtsi nyid du zhu zhes bya'o// gsum pa rtsa ba dgu'i sngags 'byung ste/ oM AHhUM sarba pany+dza a mr-i ta badz+ras twe hU~M hrIH/ oM ni sku ma skyes pa'o// AHni gsung smon pa med pa'o// hUM ni thugs mtshan ma med pa'o// bzhi pa
104a3(rnying rgyud): dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ha yA gI wa hrIH/ hu lu hu lu hrIH/ pad+ma pad+ma hrIH/ b+han+ta b+haHhrIHTa/ oM kyis su mchog yon tan du 'gyur ba'o// AHyis gsung mchog yongs su gyur pa'o// dzAM gis thugs
104a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes su gyur pa'o// lnga pa la bdud rtsi bum pa'i lung bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'byung ste/ oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ka mA la kuN+Da li sid+hi sid+d+hi hUM hrIHTha/ oM ni bdud rtsi chos kyi sku las bdud rtsi'i yon tan du 'bul ba'o// AHni bdud rtsi chos kyi gsung las
104a5(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi yon tan du 'dzag pa'o// hU~M ni bdud rtsi thugs las bdud rtsi ye shes su 'char ba'o// drug pa las rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta many+dzu shI bya ba lo ki te hUM tha bI Ta/ 'jam dpal gyi bdud rtsi'i gong bu la
104a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lnga ru bzhengs gsol bya ste/ b+hA ba lo ki zhes pa ni lha dang sgrub pa po kun so sror zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pa la bya'o// oM ni sle'i kun tu bzang po blta bas chog mi shes pa'o// AHni gsung kun tu bzang po
104a7(rnying rgyud): pas 'thun pa bskyed pa'i// hUM ni thugs kun tu bzang po gdud rtsi'i don thugs su chud pas 'tsho 'pho dang 'gyur ba'i dus med pa'o// bdun pa la gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor la/ oM AHhUM sarba paSh+pa a mr-i ta shI b+ha ga wAn hU~M a ho// oM ni sangs
104b1(rnying rgyud): srung mchog tu byur bar// a nis ngas rgyas gsung gilam du gyur dang // d+hu ni sangs rgyas thugs kyi ye gsas gyur ban// 'das pa'i yum chog 'thob pa yang bdud rje 'di yin no// da ltar gyi gsung la mdu gyur pa yang 'di yin no// brtson pa'i dag pa
104b2(rnying rgyud): pa ye shes mdzad pa yang bdud ci 'di yin no// hrI ni thams cad kyi sgor zhugs pa'o// tshe mchog he ru ka'i dbul dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhugs pa'i sngags so// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ 'bras pa'i lung ba'i
104b3(rnying rgyud): ge ba cu gnyis pa'o// / thugs dam bskul ba 'di skad do// oM AHhUM sarba pal+ya a mr-i tAk+sha tA li sbyiH/ zhes 'dzub bar ma chad par drang ngo // oM la sA ye shes 'od byung zhing // AHyis mes bsregs thal bar brlab// hU~M gi
104b4(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi rnam par dag/ sarba thams cad bdud rtser bstan// pany+tsas rnam lngar mngon sangs rgyas// a ni skye med chos kyi sku// pri yis dug gsum rtsa ba gcod// has ni 'khor ba stongs par byed// oM ldan dkar la 'tsher ba'i 'gro 'du dang //
104b5(rnying rgyud): dmar la dang ba'i byin rlabs kyis// hU~M ldan sngam la 'dril ba'i bdud rtsi pa l+ya a mr-i ta/ ma gyes kun tu bzang po yab ci mkha'// mi dmigs kun tu bzang mo yum gyi dbyings// yab yum dbyer med pas ni byang chub sems// byang chub sems la
104b6(rnying rgyud): chen gzhal yas khang // lce shi med kar skyon yon rtog pa bskal zhes bya// 'du 'bral med par rtogs na gnyis med sbyor zhes bya// bstod pa ni/ e ma ho sangs rgyas kun tu bzang // gsang chen thig le nyid la rdzogs// ma rig mug sel ye shes
104b7(rnying rgyud): dpa' bo khyod la skyabs su mchi// rang byung bdud rtsi dri med 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi bsngags pa'i mchog/ mi shes dri ma kun bcom nas// nges pa'i dbyings la 'god mdzad pa// gnyis med dgus pas phyag 'tshal lo// snang mdzad na nga rgyal sun
105a1(rnying rgyud): 26/ mab tu ga ma ska mtha' yas// dad ya bdud rgya 'phel pA la// dges shing gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad kun la rnams zhugs pa// dbyings rgyas rgyags rnams pa// du sa ga
105a2(rnying rgyud): 'tshal// lag na rdo rje rgyal po dang // kun bzu zla gros chen po dang // don rabs sgyid la sogs pa// rab tu gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i 'jig rten dbang phyug dang // 'gro ba 'dzod mchog dam pa la// gnyis med dgas pas
105a3(rnying rgyud): da/ na // g+sa ga zlug ga // bdag pa pa nis/ sa ma nga// /
105a4(rnying rgyud): byed tshogs kyi bdag po mchog/ rdo rje srid pa 'dul mdzad pa// khro rgyal yab yum 'khor bcas la// gus pas bstod de phyag 'tshal lo// bdud ci las rgya mtsho las/ thugs dam bskul ba dang bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//
105a5(rnying rgyud): de nas dngos grub blang ngo // hUM mnyam nyid gdod nas ma skyes gnyis med phyir// rtsal dang stsol bar mi dmigs kyang // rig dang ma rig sgyu ma'i khyad par la// rtogs pa'i khyad par mnyam par ma gyur te// rgyal ba'i dgongs myod dbang du ma 'dus pa
105a6(rnying rgyud): mkhyen rab ting 'dzin dngos grub stsal du gsol// chags pa'i nad kyis gdungs pa'i gcong rnying pa// bdud dang srin po zhe sdang glo bur gyis// tshe srog rgya ba'i lus la bar gcod pa// che mchog mnga' chen tsham dza mra gzi byin gyis// bdud dang
105a7(rnying rgyud): stegs zil gyis gnan pa'i phyir// rdzu 'phrul mthu yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// bag chags rkyen gyis bslebs pa'i rmongs pa la// gdung ba'i bdud rtsi mnyam pa'i chang phang kyang // brlan pa'i shes rab blo dang ma ldan par// mngon shes
105b1(rnying rgyud): rnas thab stsal dugs la// rgyud drug rim kyis drang ba don spyad du// khams gsum sri gsum ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// bdud rtsi dngos grub bdag gi lus 'dzinan// yon tan mchog gdangs grub sul d+ha gsol// rmudregs pas myos pa'i
105b2(rnying rgyud): skar lha zan dang // chabs 'gyings pa'i mkha' 'gro ma mo'i tshogs// rdo rje gshog pas zil gyis gnan pa'i phyir// thugs med mkha' la 'phurang ba'i dngos grub grom// blang dor med pa'i don la thugs brgya phyir/ so so'i bu dang rje skar 'thad papa
105b3(rnying rgyud): mthun 'dug rtags kyis 'gro ba 'dul lags na// pra sen yi lo ga'i dngos grub rtsal// drag gsum nad kyis gdung pa'i gtsang rnying la// ngartse byang thabs kyi rgyal po'i rtse btang nas// kye shi med pa'i dngos thub chen po de// bdud rtsi'i rdzas la brtan
105b4(rnying rgyud): te rgyal du gsol// bdud rtsi bsrub pa'i zhag grangs danang tshang // bdud rtsi ba grub pa'i 'dzab kyang danang rdzogs// bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i yo byad da nang bas// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// rkun ma mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par
105b5(rnying rgyud): mnga' bas// yon tan ldan grub dngos grub sbrul du gsol// cho 'phrul mthar phyin 'dren pa'i sku mnga' bas/ phrin las mthar phyin thugs rje'i dngos grub grol// ye shes thugs rje khyab pa'i sgra mnga' bas// 'chi med thugs kyi
105b6(rnying rgyud): grub stsal du gsol// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ dngos grub blang ba'i bre'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas bshags pa byung da // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // bar gcod kyi bgegs bskrad pa dang / smon lam gdang
105b7(rnying rgyud): pa dang / de yan chad sgrub pa rgya mtsho'i leTa'o// de nas sman gyi bram pathang pa 'di skad do// gdod nas ma skyes nam dag chos kyi dkyi // dag dang me dag mi cog rtog pas 'das// dus gsum gcig bsrung bstan gyi rgom med// dngos grub tu tshogs rlabs chen 'bar ba can/
106a1(rnying rgyud): kun ma su gan dag
106a2(rnying rgyud): sa lda dpa
106a3(rnying rgyud): ma tshus pa ma drug pa'i pa
106a4(rnying rgyud): mi tshu ba matan ma ha~M / ma / zhe dang brkyang do// cha dang gang deng yi dring // legs nasas zhing gas te// nad med dpa 'di dadong
106a5(rnying rgyud): da 'dis bag/ / yul hA/ ning brgya gsum pa// mugs tung bags pa las yang // thug ma thu zhe phral ma// gsunags pa gsu ma gas pa yi// gras
106a6(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems sar btu mi// zhes brjod pas dang bdu'// grol ba rgya mtho ltar thab la yang denanam pas te/ dang po gas pa byedang / bskul 'dag sa pa dang / bskal ba zin pas dang / theg sa dang byang la
106a7(rnying rgyud): dri nga'i grubs rgyas chub tu/ dang / gags 'grung ba nga/ brgyal ba/ bcul ba dang / ma pa
106b1(rnying rgyud): ge dang / nA dang / mi dang / rma bya dang lnga bskal ba/ gang gis bskal na/ thabs la mkhas par byas bu chen pos lha'i dkyil 'khor dang gnyis su med par bsgral lo// gang du bsgral ra/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings bya sa zang yub kyim
106b2(rnying rgyud): don ched ci'i phyir na/ mnar med par ltung bar nges pas/ de mtho ris su gdon pa'i ched du thugs rjes gzung la bskal lo// ma bskal pa'i skyon ni rdo rje theg pa'i bka' ba cag cing / rnal 'byor gyi chos khyod nub pas/ rgyal khams phung ba'i
106b3(rnying rgyud): de la bskul ba'i dgongs pa ni/ bdud rtsi phung po khams dang skye mched lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du gsal bar byas la/ dkyil 'khor chen por bkug la/ 'khor ba zhe bcad rgya gad byas la/ zhe sdang dbang gis dmyal bar skyes// gtso bsreg sung
106b4(rnying rgyud): bsngal bAs ma mi khyab// dpal chen he ru'i bka' la nyon// mi chen 'bar ba'i 'obs las brgol la shog/ mtshon cha spu bri'i po la 'jog la shog/ phrag dog dbang gis yi dwags kyis// bkres sgom sdug bsngal bas me mi khyab// dpal
106b5(rnying rgyud): na he ng+ga'i maka' rton la// yi dgas gnas nas zos la shog/ bkres skom gnas nas mchongs nas shog/ gti mug dbang gis byol sor gnas su gyes// dpal chen he ru'i bka' nyon la// gyol song gnas nas zos la shong// don
106b6(rnying rgyud): gle na gti mug gnas nas mchong sA la shog/ mtho ris thar pa'i gnas yod kyis// kye shi med pa'i sa yod kyis// 'khor ba 'di la ma chags shig/ ljin na 'chi'i sdug bsngal gtan bor la// skye ba rnam bzhi'i lus la ma chags shig
106b7(rnying rgyud): mtho res thar pa'i gnas su da 'dedar gyis// ngan song gsum gyi gnas la ma chags shig/ ye shes lnga yi gnas su da 'der gyis// nyon mongs dug lnga 'di la ma chags shig/ sku gsung thugs kyi sa la da 'ded kyis// lus ngag yid gsum
107a1(rnying rgyud): salam chags nas/ sreg ba dang mtshams gcad babyug/ ram Na/ bag tu ba sa drug thal ban nus pa/ grang ba byu pa sa yang saH/ rgyalas kyang ba dang / das
107a2(rnying rgyud): kur spyang pa'o// dang por pho nyas dgug pa dang / ngan song gsum nas drang ba dang / mig dbye ba dang / bar gcod bsal ba'i phyir/ mtshams gcad pa dang / bsreg sbyang de yaM kha~M gis rgya'i gnas spang ba'o// rkyen gyis srub chu gsung
107a3(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi gnas srung ba ni 'di skad do// e mcho 'phrul 'od 'phros pas// yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs byung de// yi ge yan lag ye shes las// sangs rgyas sku yi sa bon 'byung // dpag tu med pa'i rgyal po rnams// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa
107a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs// phyag rgya sna tshogs mdzes par snang // de nas yi ge'i rang bzhin ni// rgyal ba'i sgra nyid yin par bshad// a ni thugs kyi sa bon te// ka la sogs pa dang po lnga// mgur gyi gsang ba'i rang bzhin yin// ka kha ga g+ha / gnyis pa
107a5(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa lnga// zla gam ljags kyi rang bzhin yin// tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ gsum pa ta la sogs pa bcu// ljags kyi rtse mo'i rang bzhin yin// ta tha da d+ha na/ bzhi pa pa la sogs pa lnga// zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar bshad// pa pha ba
107a6(rnying rgyud): b+h+ra ma// lA pa ya la sogs pa yi// bcu tshan gnyis kyi yi ge dag/ sku las 'phros par rab tu bshad// ya ra la wa sha Sha sa hak+Sha/ i I/ u u/ e ai/ o au/ zhal gyi 'khor lo'i 'od zer las// sgrib pA sel
107a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i yig 'bru he// gsang ba mkha' yi 'od zer las// cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i yig 'thun// sku li khwa tshad lte ba las// 'dod pa 'byung ba'i yig 'bras// thugs kyi dpal be'u chen po laswA// mAtshan ma dag pa'i yig 'bru// phyag gi 'jor
107a8(rnying rgyud): Ats+tsha yod pa
107b1(rnying rgyud): po'i 'od zer las// cho 'phrul ston pa'i yig 'bru sha/ skyes bu chen po'i dpung pa las// rtog pa 'joms pa'i yig 'brul// skyes bu chen po'i sta zur las// 'dod chags sreg pa'i yig 'brur// skyes bu chen po'i dku skabs pas//
107b2(rnying rgyud): gti mug sreg pa'i yig 'thum// khyis bu chen po byin pa las// 'khor ba gnon pa'i yig 'brul// skyes bu chen po'i spyan gnyis las// rang bzhin yi ge e gnyis shar// skyes bu chen po'i lhan gnyis las// rang bzhin sreg u ga
107b3(rnying rgyud): shwar// skyes bu chen po'i shangs gnyis las// rang bzhin yi ge oM gnyis shar// skyes bu chen po'i tshems gnyis las// rang bzhin yi ge i gnyis shar// gyes bu chen po'i spyan gnyis las// rgyal ba'i sa bon oM gnyis shwar// skyes bu chen po
107b4(rnying rgyud): yig 'bru rnams// gsung yig 'awa~M/ thugs rtswag mtshan/ sgra rgyug tu rnams kyis gnas sbyang ngo // 'od zeng chen po'i 'adz+ra 'dra yis// sa so rang ri'i sgrib pa bsreg/ grib pa bsregs pas 'od du gyur// 'od kyang mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings
107b5(rnying rgyud): dbyings las yi ge a byung ba// a ni s+ye med de bzhin nyid// Sha ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa// rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa'i sku// Ta las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa// phung po rnam par snang mdzad su// ra las rin chen zur brgyad pa// tshor ba yon tan rin chen 'byung ldan//
107b6(rnying rgyud): d+ha las pad+ma 'dab brgyad de// 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas gsung // Na las ral gri 'bar ba ste// phrin las don yod grub pa'i sku// tha las kun tu bzang mo ste// 'byung ba nam mkha' sems nyid yin// ha ni sangs rgyas spyan yan te// 'byung ba dag pas
107b7(rnying rgyud): sa yang yin// da ni rin chen sems ma ste// 'byung ba dag pas drod kyang yin// D+hani chos kyi sems ma yin// 'byung ba dag pas mA ma kI// na ni las kyi sems ma ste// 'byung ba dag pa dam tshig grol// ka ni spyan gyi myu gu ste// rnam par shes pa'i nyeng
108a1(rnying rgyud): po yin// kha ni lhan gyir ldam yin// rnam shes nam mkha' byung ba yin// gan shangs kyi badz+dzaH// rnam shes spyan sa gzugs dbang yin// shAn thug cu byu ba// rnam shes phyag na dro mig/ na
108a2(rnying rgyud): 'du shes te// be cen 'bar ba gshin rje gshed// tsa nI s+yA na ma mumra 'gyings te// yul rnams dag pa lta s+ye ma// dz+nyA ni sman gyi phreng ba ste// yul rnams dag pas mar me ste// dza ni shangs kyi'i wang ste// yul rnams dag pas kyi
108a3(rnying rgyud): na thugs kyi gang bsgyur te// yul rnams dag pas nI n+ti// ts+tshini yid kyi hrul ni// yan lagagayo ba skyabs pa che// pa ni dag gi 'phags 'dren te// d+hAm shas byams pa ma thi yin// phan yid kyi sgrogs ma ste// rnan shes dag
108a4(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang // pa ni lus kyi ral bri ste// rnam shes dag pas sgrib pa sel// b+ha ni ngag gi ut+pal te// rnam shes dag pas 'jam dpal yin// ma ni yid kyi thod dbyug ste// khros pa'i rgyal po rta mgrin dpal// yan ta pe bdug spos
108a5(rnying rgyud): wa ni puSh+pe me tog ma// ra ni A lo ki mar me me// la ni ga d+hi chab ma// yul dus 'dus pa lha mo brgyad// mau ni bdud kyi dakhyil pa ste/ yan lag bzhi lnga kho mo bzhi// ta dzI rtag pa med pa ste// shini chad bya med pa yin// saM ni dA
108a6(rnying rgyud): med pa yin// ha ni mtshan ma med pa ste// a ni kun tu bzod mo la// k+Sha ni kun tu bzang po yin// i gnyis lha dang lha min te// u gnyis mi dang byol seng yin// e gnyis yi dwags dmyal pa yin// mthong yod snang grag thams cad kyang
108a7(rnying rgyud): yi ge'i tshogs su mngon sangs rgyas// yi ger mgyur gang yang med// chos nyid snying po nyi ma la// 'od zer yig 'bru'i tshogs su 'bar// chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu la// yig 'brus lha tshogs skar ba kra ltar// dus gsum rgyal ba'i dkying
108b1(rnying rgyud): jugs/ mthabar pa 'thong ba su/ ba ba thug sa na 'a byu pas na gas/ rdzogs kyi zhing dgags// nyam 'ad bya tshu pa las// pag zur bya mabs da na
108b2(rnying rgyud): zer 'bar ba las// pheg 'bru 'od kyi sgra 'bras pas// rin chen snying pos bon te// rin chen rigs kyi zhing du grags// nyi ma'i 'od zer 'phros pa las// 'od zer yi ge AM ru 'bar// ng+tha ri kyi zhing du grags// sgra tshogs yi ge'i 'od 'bros pas// tshad rgyal yi ge lpags la te// tshogs spri sas 'on yin// la
108b3(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi zhing du grags/ nyan mangs sems can sa bon te// rgyal ba'i zhing la btab byas pas// 'bras bu smin pa'i sras su 'khrungs// yi dam lha yi dpal brjid che// kun tu bzang po'i yon ma byed// rdo rje sems dpa' rtse zla byed// A
108b4(rnying rgyud): dkar mos phyag tshangs byed// zhing khams kun tu ston par shog/ de nas yi ge'i tshogs a la thim/ hU~M la thim yang hUM zhes brjod/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis btegs nas 'og min rgyal ba yab yum gyi sbyor mtshams su 'phang pa 'di skad
108b5(rnying rgyud): rigs drug bskyed pa'i phung po la// dpa' bo'i yi ge pra bkod pas// rnam shes hUM du bsdus nas kyang // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng bzhag nas// 'og min gnas mchog dam pa na// gtso bo lnga dang gtsa mo lnga// phaT b+hi phrin las chen po yis// sbyang ba
108b6(rnying rgyud): hUM du 'brangs byas pas// rgyal ba'i sras par de 'gyur ro// thugs kar bems pas sku yi dbyig/ rdo rje'i lam byung yum gyi mkha'// rgyal ba'i sras por de 'gyur ro// yongs la dbang bskur rgyal ba'i mchog/ gang la ma chags spos dang bral/
108b7(rnying rgyud): sring len med pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'du 'bral med pa'i dbang bskur ro// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi// snyan par ye shes lngas dbang bskur ro// de nas thugs dam bskang ba dang // rtog pa sbyang ba dang / phrin las rnams bya ba na
109a1(rnying rgyud): gyis sbyang ba'o// phung ba da sran sgrub chen pos lus dbul te/ 'bras bu lnga la dbus su ma klo su gzhes bya ba/ glang po che rnyen la sags pa zlog pa kha zag gA sha bzhag pa 'di skad do// grang pa rin can 'dags pa'i byung
109a2(rnying rgyud): dang ldan// bsgom pa'i sran chen yon tan brgya dang ldan// rdo rje rigs kyi thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi sha 'di shes par gyis// oM AHko su kha swA hA/ a la sa 'od 'phros steng khams bsreg sbyang nas/ skar ba
109a3(rnying rgyud): pas sha 'od du gyur nas med cing mi dmigs par bsam pa ni/ rdo rje rigs kyi thugs dam pa skang ba'o// shar du stag dang seng ge la sogs pa sder chags thams cad kyi sha bzhag pa 'di skad do// rtsal chen gzugs bzang dgos pa lus la tshang //
109a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i skad kyis srid gsum zil gyis gnon// yon tan brgyad ldan mthu stobs phun sum tshogs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi sha 'di shes par gyis// oM pa na se a mr-i ta hUM tha/ bsgom bgod pa/
109a5(rnying rgyud): no// mi dang shang shang te'u la sogs gdong pa can gyi sha shar lhor dgod pa/ skyes bu shes rig dgos pa lus la tshang // thugs rjes bskal ba'i dam tshig chen po 'di// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel mdze rnams thub// rin chen rigs kyi thugs dam
109a6(rnying rgyud): bskang ba'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi sha 'di shes par gyis// aM smin pa a hUM/ bsgom pa gong bzhin dang // nub tu rta la sogs pa rmig zlum thams cad kyi sha dgod pa ni 'di skad do// dgos pa'i don ldan brtson 'grus shugs 'chad pa// pha ro
109a7(rnying rgyud): phyin pa rta mchog rmig zlum ni// yon tan brgyad ldan blo rno shes rab gsal// pad+ma rigs kyi thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi sha 'di shes par gyis// oM ma hA mAM sa hUM a mr-i ta hUM tha/ byang du rgod dang khrung dang re dang klag pa
109b1(rnying rgyud): sogs pa gshog pa can gyi sha dgod pa 'di skad do// thog med nam 'phyang gcod cing srid pa zil gyis gnon// gshog pa rlung ngu bslus pas 'dzam bu gling bzhi bskor// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel byings tshugs bsal// las kyi rigs kyi thug sa
109b2(rnying rgyud): dam bskang ba'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi sha 'di shes par gyis// oMn le ge a mr-i ta hrAM/ dbang po gsal byed spyan lnga rnam par dag/ stong khams gsal byed rnam shes bskal bde mig/ sa yi snyeng pa'i thugs dam bskang ba dang / wa s+ye /
109b3(rnying rgyud): po dgyes pa bskyed pa'i phyir// gzungs ma yum sbyi sha 'di shes par gyis// oM badz+ran tu hUM zhes brjod pas/ mig la nA rje 'gro zhing 'dus pas/ stong khams thams cad kyi spyan chub kyis 'dus pas/ mig gi dbang po la thim pas/
109b4(rnying rgyud): sa'i rnying ba dang / bye kar ma gyur to// ti ngam 'i hU~M/ zhes de bzhin rnye pa byeng/ gnas pa'i glethas dgas pa'i tshig gazlas pa// myug d+has rlung gang yi chub// rna ba'i dbang po rnam par zhes rig tu// sa
109b5(rnying rgyud): brgyad ldan thos pa rgya mtshos gas// phyag nardo rje'i thugs dam bsgreng ba dang // ni ti sngon mo kris par brgya dru pa'i phyir// gzungs ma bris spa 'di shes par gyis// ji gra dum d+hananad+ha/ sna yi dbang mas sdom pa'i dre shes nas// 'thom
109b6(rnying rgyud): dang drangs deng dru ba dang // spos dang spyan dang zhal zas rlangs pa'i sde// yon tan brgyad ldan lnga yi rnam shes 'di// nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs dam bskang ba dang // mA la sngon mo dgyes pa bskyed pa'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi sgra 'di shes par gyis
109b7(rnying rgyud): Ag d+ha ma'idri/ skye yi rnas zhes demachog brgyad ldan// kha ding mad dang ngo mchog skyer deng drub// yon tan bcu ldan lnga li rnam zhes 'di// spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs des bkang ba dang // gti mar mod kyis pa bskyod pa'i byer// gdungs
109b8(rnying rgyud): dang 'ag khams shig dug kyang byung /
110a1(rnying rgyud): yum gyi sde ni shes par gyis// tri pad+ma bar+d+ha ma gIrti go&hi/ lce brgyang pas stong gsum tsam bzlas pas zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bsam mo// lus kyi rnam shes dro 'jam reg bsil lta// phug dang mdzes dang yid 'jug
110a2(rnying rgyud): yon tan brgyad ldan gzugs phung 'di// sgrib pa rnam sel thugs dam bskong ba dang // rU pe dkar mo dgyes pa babyed pa'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi lus 'di shes par gyis// oM ba gong blang la/ oM la gong zhal byed drug gi rnam shes 'di// ci
110a3(rnying rgyud): gyur zhing sgra sgrogs tshangs pa'i gsung // yon tan brgya ldan ngag gi rnam shes 'di// byams pa me tri'i thugs dam bskang pa dang // pu n+de sngon mo dgyes pa bskyed pa'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi ol gong shes par gyis// mi d+ha da Ni a mr-ita
110a4(rnying rgyud): snying blang la 'di skad do// yid kyi rnam shes byang chub 'di// yod med rtag chad mtshan mar yongs mi 'dzin// yon tan brgyad ldan tsit+ta dam rdzas 'di// kun tu bzang po'i thugs dam bskar ba dang // A lo ke mar mo dgyes pa bskyed pa'i phyir//
110a5(rnying rgyud): gzungs ma yum gyi sman 'di shes par gyis// sa rA dza a mr-i ta hUM/ srog pa rtsa blang la/ shes pa'i don 'dzin log pa'i lam yang 'gog/ nga rgyal de'u gcod don dam dbyings su sdud// yon tan brgyad ldan rin chen srog pa rtsa// 'jam dpal
110a6(rnying rgyud): nu'i thugs dam bskang ba dang // gan+d+he ljang gu dgyes pa bskyed pa'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi srog rtsa shes par gyis// many+dzu shrI a mr-i ta hUM/ nya bzhi rtsol bzhi sgo ba yab yum du bkod de/ bsgral ba'i nya sha bcud kyi nyid khu 'di// yon tu
110a7(rnying rgyud): brgyad ldan spel pa'i dam rdzas 'di// sgo ba bzhi mi thugs dam bskang ba dang // gzungs ma yum bzhis sman 'di shes par gyis// ma hA sa ma a mr-i ta b+h+rUM/ mAM sa las 'od 'phros stong khams bsreg sbyang nas/ slar 'dus nas nya bzhi
110b1(rnying rgyud): thim pas/ nya bzhi yang mi dmigs pa 'od kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa ni/ sgo ba bzhi'i thugs dam bskang ba'o// de nas rtsos bzhi blang la 'di skad do// rgya mchog bsgral ba'i zas mchog chos bzhi 'di// sha yi snying po rus pa'i brgyad chen 'di/
110b2(rnying rgyud): tan brgyad ldan sgrub rdzas chen po 'di// sgro ma yum bzhi'i thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi chos bzhi shes par gyis// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ a mr-i ta hUM/ de nas rus pa'i mdud drug blang la/ 'khrul mig mdog 'dzin yan lag 'bur
110b3(rnying rgyud): gzungs kyi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ste// thub pa drug gi thugs dam bskang ba dang // gzungs ma yum gyi rus pa shes par gyis// i u e las 'od 'phros pas stong khams bsreg sbyang nas/ slar 'dus pas 'phags ma
110b4(rnying rgyud): 'gro drug gi sgrib pa sbyangs/ 'od du zhu nas mi dmigs pa ni thub pa drug gi thugs dam bskang pa'o// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ sgrol ba rgya mtsho le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas ga Na sbyar ba'i yum// rgyal rigs ma dang rje'u ring
110b5(rnying rgyud): pad+ma can dang dung can ma// mi rtog can dang rnam lnga'o// de la sbyor ba don bya ba// gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul pa dang // slob mar dbang ni bskur ba dang // bde bas sangs rgyas sgrub pa dang // 'di rnams rigs ma dag la brten//
110b6(rnying rgyud): sa dag par bya ba yang // dbang bskur chos bshad min pa yin// dam tshig ma nyams bsrung bar bya// theg chen chos la gzung bar bya// yab dang yum gnyis mnyam par yang // lus kyis bskyed rim zung 'jug bsgom// ngag gis
110b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i bzlas pa bya// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i rim pa nyid// yab ni yum la rab brten pas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab srub byed// yum yang yab la brten byas nas// yang dag sangs rgyas thob par 'dod// bsnyen pa rig ma'i gzugs
111a1(rnying rgyud): khris gas las ni rababartags nas/ bde bska ning byung bar ga// byung ba pa ni bstun pade// chas gas can dang 'dran dang // kha yo yang ba brjed/ sbyin byas basbyor ba// dgang
111a2(rnying rgyud): gdab pa dang // zangs kyi mdog gis gzung bar bya// ljags kyang rab tu brkyang byas nas// 'dod pa'i bstan bcos mtha' dag gis// bde bar rab tu bskyed byas nas// nye ba dag tu bsnyen par bya// de ni bde ba bskyed pa'o// bslab pa bya ba
111a3(rnying rgyud): dbyings kyi pad+ma gzhal yas khang // dbyibs ni yi ge a dang mtshungs// gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi la// gzugs khams pasam gtan oM dang bcas// 'dod khams rigs drug sa bon dang // bde gshegs su gsung thags gan
111a4(rnying rgyud): mi zad rgyan phre 'khor lo nyid// yab kyi ye shes rdo rje ni// dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i nor 'u ste// yad bzhin rin chen bzhin du 'bar// rdo rje pad+ma rab bsrungs pas// bde bslab par byed pa nyid// bslab pa chen po zhes bya ba// rdeg le byang chub
111a5(rnying rgyud): na/ bde dang myong par dbyer med cing // mal khrim ga tas med kyang ga/ dpe nga thang gnyis gshebs rna mas// gang ga zla ba byed pa tshad// de bzhi mthun 'gyur la zu n-i// 'badag sa dgra ba du shA// dbyung rjerdzogs pa
111a6(rnying rgyud): rnam par smin dang rnam pa nyid// mtshan nyid dang ni thal ba'o// skad cig bzhi dang bsnyen pa slab 'i// dang po rig pasra bas sa// sangs rgyas spyan kyi rtags su 'gyur// gshe ba tu nI mA ma kI// rdo bas me da gos dkar mo// yang brgya
111a7(rnying rgyud): tshig blol// nam mkha'i khams ni kun 'bang ga// yum bzhi 'debs bsnyen zlab ni// sa kyi lha mo 'bugs pa dang // me tog mas na rnam pa de// mar migasal bar gyur nas ni// rje chab bdud rtse rab 'tho ba// phyi ye lha ma'i btsun
