111b1(rnying rgyud): bzhi// bde bas sgeg pas bde ba dang // mi brjed gzungs 'dzin pade bral ma// glu len dbyangs ni mchog bde ma// gar ma lhan cig skyes pa nyid// nang gi lha mo'i bsnyen bsgrub bzhi// thig le g.yo dang 'byung ba dang // 'bebs dang
111b2(rnying rgyud): por drod 'byung bas// rus sbrul 'gros dang rnam par grol// mkhas pa'i man ngag bla mas ster// mi mkhas chu dang bsrong sogs pas// dbab dang gzung dang zlog pa dang // lus la khyab par dgram pa rnams// rnal 'byor mor mcho
111b3(rnying rgyud): yis// 'og rlung dag la brten nas ni// gsang ba'i sems lnga skye bar 'gyur// g.yo ldang gnas 'jug rdzogs par byed// sems lnga brten pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sbyor ba 'di ni brtsam par bya// gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul 'dod na
111b4(rnying rgyud): b+ha ga la ni ling+ga gzhag/ mchod pa'i lha mo spro ba'am// thig le khu bas mkha' bkang nas// rgyal srid rin chen sna bdun sogs// yang na bkra shis rdzas brgyad sogs// bde gshegs mchod pa mang po rnams// nam mkha'i khams
111b5(rnying rgyud): kun gang bar mchod// las kyi sbyin sreg bya ba yang // gsang ba'i sems dang rab ldan pas// b+ha gzum po sna tshogs mdud// byang sems zhi ba gti mug chun// gru bzhi phyi yi khyams nang du// dga' ba'i sems kyi thig le 'drar/
111b6(rnying rgyud): thig le'i mdog kyang gser du snang // skye gnas zla gam chen po ru// chags pa'i sems kyis rab sbyar nas// thig le pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs// khA la mu kha bya rog gdong // khros pa'i sems kyis rab sbyar na// thig le mthing nag khro ba'i
111b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs// drag pos thams cad bskal bar bya// 'dis ni las bzhi yum gyi mkha'// spyan gyis grub par rab tu gnas// mnan dang zlog pa yum gyis bsgru // phrin las bzhi dang mnan zlog nyid// drug gims rnams sbyin gyis
112a1(rnying rgyud): zag/ zlab sa rnams pa dbang bskrun na// rtsag nas dkyil la ra can pan// theg pa khams kyi bdan ci nyid// mi gzugs kyi stod ba nas// steng pa rlung gas ba 'phrul nas// dasungs rgya ba
112a2(rnying rgyud): gnas// mtshungs rgyu rang la mi gnas na// zasran 'bras su yangs mi 'gyur// bde ba'i ye shes ram man// skye sgrog yi ge tha ga nas pa// srin po r+tha tra'i sa pan gyis// khams kyi bdud rtsi grams nas// 'ang zhi 'a tu 'dzag
112a3(rnying rgyud): dper na mar gyi thigs pa yis// mar me gsob lta bur 'gyur// bla ma ya ba yu ma rol pa yi// thig le khrab chen po ni// slob ma'i lce la rab gzhag nas// gsang ba'i dbang mchog byin par bya// 'di yang skabs kyi nyan dang 'char/
112a4(rnying rgyud): bzung phrin las bya ba dang // rdo rje rgyal por dbang bskur na// gsang dbang 'di la rab brten nas// nus pa'i dbang lnga thob par 'gyur// de nas shes rab ye shes dbang // yab yum bde ba'i rol pa bzhi// spyi bo bde chen 'khor lo ni//
112a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor sum cu rtsa gnyis nas// 'bab pa'i thig le bde ba yin// mgrin pa longs spyod dkyil 'khor nas// bcu drug bdud rtsi'i rgyan yang 'dzag/ snying ga chos kyi dkyil 'khor nas// brgyang pa'i dkyil la dor rab tu rdzogs// rtse basprul pa
112a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor nas// drug rngu rtsa bzhi'i thig le 'dzag par gyur// bde ba dang ni mchog tu dadi// bral ba'i bde bstan cig skyes// 'ad ba bzhi la gdams ngag ni// yab yum slob ma gnyis la gtad// yid ni nang du brtan par gzung / @
112a7(rnying rgyud): phig sa bye ldan nas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' mtshad// rang yang dngos grub mthang rtsi// de nas padepa chen po yi// dbang yang rab tu bcur byan// g.yas kyar mnye ma ma// g.yon sa cang rngas parba// dbus te bunang dang nga
112b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin spang // srog shing rnam pa 'di gsum yang // rdo rje rnga rlabs lam bzhes bya// gzung ba 'dzin pa'i rnarlabs dang // gzung 'dzin spangs pa'i rnarlabs gsum// sangs rgyas byang chub slab byang bas// gnas nas blo gang gnas su bstim// sangs
112b2(rnying rgyud): rgyas go 'phang thob par 'gyur// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ sbyo rab rgya mtsho ji ltar sbar ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas kun tu bzang po la rdo rje sems dpas gsol ba/ lha ba rgya mtsho ji ltar bste// 'bras bu sangs rgyas
112b3(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang byas bka' stsal pa// blta ba rgya mtsho 'di ltar ltos// 'bras bu sangs rgyas 'di ltar rgyas// bdud rtsi'i lus ni khyod la gtad// lta ba man ngag gi le'u 'di bre shad// phung po khams dang sgra mched dag/ ye nas sangs rgyab yin
112b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// kun rdzob tsam gyis mtshan ma ru// chos su mtshan mar rgya ba de// ye shes rang gnas rol pa yin// phye nang snod bcud ma lus kyang // kun tu bzang po dbyings kyi rgyan// kun bzang yab yum rol pa las// phyi nang ma lus sangs
112b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas so// mtha' la thug pa med pas dbyings la bri ba med// dbyings la 'gyur ba med pas chos skur 'gyur ba med// don dam dbyings su rtogs pas bltas dgu de ltar gsal// thams cad sems su rtogs pas gang bsrub ldan gyis 'grub//
112b6(rnying rgyud): rtog ming yang med pas gang bskal gcig mi blta// thabs mkhas rol pa yin pas 'khor ba'i skyon ma gos// thugs rje byang chub yin pas thar pa bde chen thob// kun gyi bdud rtsi yin pas lha rnams rang bzhin khol// bde chen rgyal po yin pas
112b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rje bo yin// thabs mkhas bdag las byung ba kun gyi bdag po yin// nga rgyal gdeng du che bas 'gro drug thabs kyis 'dul// thug chom 'brug sbas khams gsum yongs su rdzir// thugs rje byams ldan nyi ma'i 'od bzhin 'char// mi rtog gnyen
113a1(rnying rgyud): bos thabs kyi rgyal po byung // 'khor ba'i gnyen por ma byung sangs rgyas te// bdag dang sems can thams cad chos slar gcig/ nam rtog thams cad gtan ma nan rtags na// lha dang 'dra'ad pa 'brag
113a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i don rtogs na// dgra bgegs bsngal zhing tshar gcad bya mi dgos// ye 'byams ya mtshan klong gi dbang rdzogs na// nga rgyal rtags kyi phyag rgyas bsgrub mi dgos// phrin las bye btsal spyod pa yi 'a
113a3(rnying rgyud): bsgrub dkyil 'khor bya ba'i ming yang med// 'di ltar man dag rtogs pa'i gdeng gyur na// bgrub na'ang skyon med ma bsgrubs btsal ba med// bsam du med pa chos sunam mkha' 'dra// bsgom du med de phur spod na
113a4(rnying rgyud): dgongs drug sum kyi rgyal mo yin// ma ga gas kyi der yin dkyi yab suM mkhang // sems la gang med kyi tsog rang thung bre// zabs nyid myi 'gags rang byung ba hU~M// don la gang yang ma d+ha/ kyai phreM/
113a5(rnying rgyud): pa med// 'phro 'gyur med pa'i klong la btsal zhing bslab pa med// ye shes byang chub sems su bdag rtog na// 'du'i 'byis pa'i rtsod mos ci zhig b+ha// mi dang slong gi dam tshig bsrung med na// 'di sdig lang rang bya nga
113a6(rnying rgyud): mkhas rol pa'i ting 'dzin shar ba la// phung bache da sgor bsru ces spyad// byin rjo chu sangs rgyas na// gzhananadang dran pamed// brdad rtsi las mtsho pad/
113a7(rnying rgyud): bcwa bdun pa'o// 'bras bu 'i grangasangs rgyas pa 'di dad do// snod kyi 'jig rten mas kag sum gyi dbyings// bdud kyil garten las dgeb yang kyi mkha'// yab me mkha' dbyings ya
113b1(rnying rgyud): rlung sems su sangs rgyas so// phung po khams dang skye mched ma lus pa// lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor ye nas yin// yin pa'i don la rag pa gsal bkod nas// bde rjen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas pa// sems dang ye shes dbar dzad
113b2(rnying rgyud): dan gcig pas// sems kyi ye shes sems kyis byan rtogs na// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// 'khor ba'i rgyu nyid thar pa'i lam gyi skas// sdug bsngal rgyu gnyis chos nyid byang chub sems// ma spangs ldan gyis grub par
113b3(rnying rgyud): ni// pade chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// chos nyid kun tu bzang mo'i rig pa la// la' ba dang ni mya ngan 'das par mnyam// sangs rgyas sems can sems nyid gcig tu mnyam// rtogs dang martogs sgyu ma'i ngang du ma tam// rig pa ma
113b4(rnying rgyud): chos kyi bu na mnyam// mnyam pa'i rgyal po'i don la ma yengs na// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// nyon mongs sdug bsngal ye shes lnga rba snang // 'byung ba lnga po chos kyi dbyings su mnyam// dbyings dang ye shes 'brel pa'i don rang
113b5(rnying rgyud): na// bdo chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// ye shes lha dang ma mo mkha' 'gro dang // pho ny+dza la sogs mang po'i don brjod kyang // bdag gi byin rlabs mang por snang ba las// gzhan nas grub cing 'byung ba ci yang med// bdag sngar
113b6(rnying rgyud): bdug lab la ldan tu bdag yin te// bdag nyid g.yos na sbyin sdod bzud g.yos// kun gyi che bcan 'gran byed med pas// yongs kyi thog dang de byas rgyal po la// bad chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas sa// bdud rdul
113b7(rnying rgyud): mtsholas/ ye nas 'bras bu sangs rgyas yin pa'i le'u ste bci rgyad pa / de nas kun tu bzang pos rdo rje sems dpa' brgyad ya gzung bar gtad pa 'di ga do// gsang thub bka' rten nges pa dang // bden par dri zhing medan
114a1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// des ni rgyud 'di yongs su gzung bar gyur// brtan zhing thags 'chang brtson 'grus \u0f7f// drang zhing sems 'jam gas sgra med// nas ni rgyud 'dog zung bar byung // mdzangs shi shas pagasal ba dang /
114a2(rnying rgyud): shing bya ba ma nor ba// des ni rgyud 'di gzung bar bya// zungs thub rtag thub khong yongs shing // le lo bar chad skyon bsal ba// des ni rgyud 'di gzung bar bya'o// spyod pa thogs chags med pa dang // dam tshig srang len med par bsrur /
114a3(rnying rgyud): des ni rgyud 'di gzung bar bya// nyan cing sgrub la brtson pa dang // 'dra 'dzi'i dbang du mi gtang ba// des ni rgyud 'di gzung bar byan// rang shid nor thub zo thub pas// yongs la me gnod rgyal babrang bas// rgyud 'di yongs su gzung
114a4(rnying rgyud): srang mod cing par mi gtong zhing // slob dpon rig pa'i gting bru ba// des ni chud 'di gzung bar bya'o// rang shes mu tsor mi byud cing // brtags shing las rnams brtson byed pa// bud 'di yongs su gzung bar bri// rtag par smin dang mi
114a5(rnying rgyud): zhing // rgyus dang lag chags thogs pas// rgyud 'di yongs su gzung bar bye'o// dad pas skyong la mi byed cing // n+dan mo rabs ma byed pas// skad 'di yangs su gzung bar byel// dbang bar gnang ba ldan bcang // gzugs
114a6(rnying rgyud): shes pa phyogs rnams pas// gung 'di yongs su gzung bar byug// gagasam tha nga zang yod la// bsnyen na rnas pa'i man me pas// nasan tshun 'ad gzung bar bya'o// bdan ci las rgya mtsha lus/ da yongs su gzung bar bya
114a7(rnying rgyud): sa lu su pa cu bang pa thog samag da dang mthun pas su du zhes su nasun su dus/ tubang 'asab gyu ba/ su na pa dngag
114b1(rnying rgyud): deyang dpe gcig pas 'acur gan
114b2(rnying rgyud): drang / mas dbang kyang bar byed ba dang / mni ga ning zab du smra pa dang / lhab la gdang med pa dang / spad bas mngon pa dang / rtsub pa gzung mthugs pa dang / nAH dang / rab gabyed pa dang / dang / ngagadang /
114b3(rnying rgyud): gyen byed pas chud 'di bcangs kyang seng ge'i 'o ma dang 'dra ste/ bdag phung gzhan badrug/ snying 'gas/ mdza dang nad kyi bskal pa 'byung / 'bras bu mnar med par skye ba'o// de bas gsang ste/ sems kyi gter du sbas te/
114b4(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi thig le gcig tu la bzla'o// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ snod min la gsang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta bi ma la ma tra dang dzad
114b5(rnying rgyud): lo ts+tsha ba gtag dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta b+hA ba ma hA sau d+hi u bahr-i da yod+hA ma/ bod da du/ thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i mchog/ bcom ldan 'dam
114b6(rnying rgyud): tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po/ kun rig chos kyi rje dpal chen po shrI he ru ka s+thi ra ma ti de gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor na/ rigs lnga'i 'khor tshogs kyi mtsho dang
114b7(rnying rgyud): bcas pa dang / lha dang klu dang mi'i rig 'dzin rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni ming yang mi grag pa'i nang du/ gsang sngags kyi snying po/ bdud rtsi'i mchog bcung du bya ba'i lta ba dang /
114b8(rnying rgyud): man ngag bsgom pa dang / bslab pa dam tshig rnams bsdus te gsungs so// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nus
115a1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal nas/ gsang sngags snying po blta ba'i don+da// blan med pa bstan du gsol// de skad ces na gsol ba dang // bcom ldan 'das ni kun bzang gis// lha
115a2(rnying rgyud): brgya mtsho'i nang nas kyang // gsang sngags gsang ba'i snying po gcig/ lta ba bla na med pa bstan// brgyad khri bzhi sdang bsam yas kyang // sde snod gsum dang theg pa dbu// rdzogs chen a ti yo gar 'jus// a Ni yo ga
115a3(rnying rgyud): skad ni// ba gran dang bal ba mo// yang dag ngan la ba de// kun thal ci yang ma spangs pa// rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba yin// snang dang med pas bsdus pa dang // 'byung ba sngal sogs pa kun// nam mtha' bzhin te kun la
115a4(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' yenas 'gyur ba med// dus gsumasangs rgyas thams cad dang // mtha' yas sems can ma lus kun// sems su 'dus shing sems su khyab// sems la ye nas phye shi med// phye nang sded bcung ma lus dang // mtsho na mar
115a5(rnying rgyud): d+hAng nga thams cad kun// chos ci dbyings su 'das shing thab// dbrangs las 'gyur ba yi nas med// dbang po spyod yul bur ba dang // gzugs su srung ba thams cad gar// ye shes su yaM phyag tur rdzing // phrini le nas bu 'jig med/
115a6(rnying rgyud): sems can gang dang sku la sogs// bde gshegs ma sras gsung dag kyang // thabs ma bskyabs rang byung gsung // gsung la mtshan ma yin sa med// sems can 'phral pa'i blo dag kyang // rig pa byed pa'i bede gshegs can// byang chub sems pa
115a7(rnying rgyud): rogacig pas// sems la menas smod du med// sru dang rgyan dang 'khor lo yang // lung chen zab mo'i nang nags la// rigs pazhi'i nang du 'khor ba yang // ye nas sangs rgyas de las med// med ces byang stong pa las// stong pa nyid du rnam da//
115b1(rnying rgyud): chos kyi sgra zhes de la bya// de la gzung zhing gdags su med// byang chub sems 'di kun tu dag/ rdzogs pa'i ye shes pad tshan nyid// ma lus mtha' dag nyid kyi bya// ya nas byang mad dbyar ma dgos// dngos grub chen pa nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud pas//
115b2(rnying rgyud): blta ba rgya mtsho'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang 'jam dpal gzhon nus bcom ldan 'das kun rig chos kyi rjel phyag btsal nas/ gsa'i thugs snying po mnA ngag don// bla na mod pa
115b3(rnying rgyud): bstan du gsol// de skad ces ni gsol pa dang // bcom ldan kun rig chos kyi rje// man ngag rgya mtsho'i nang nas kyang // gsang sngags gsang ba'i man ngag gcig/ man ngag bla na med pa bstan// sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa la// sangs rgya
115b4(rnying rgyud): nas btsal du med// sangs rgyas ye nas ma byung bas// dus gsum rtag tu 'gyur ba med// sems nyid gdod nas ma byung bas// dus gsum rtag tu 'gyur ba med// sems nyid chu las ma skyes pas// 'byung ba lnga la rag ma lus// sems nyid ma
115b5(rnying rgyud): du mi snang bas// dngos po kun gyi don dang bral// sems la mtha' dbus med pa yis// phyogs dang ris su gdags pa med// sems la kha dog ma gyur pas// tshig tu gdags pa'i rten dang bral// sems la mun pas mi bsgrib pas//
115b6(rnying rgyud): nas snang ba rang la gnas// sems kyi rig pa'i spyan yin pas// thams cad ma gzigs gcig kyang med// sems nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// phyi nad snod bcu da kun la khyab// sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas pas// thams cad kun
115b7(rnying rgyud): ston pa yin// snying po rig pa'i snying po bas// 'khor ba'i nad kyi sman du che// sems nyid rta ga'i glong yangs pas// thams cad 'byung ba'i khyed mos tshal// sems la skyon gyis ma gos pas// rig pa kun gzhi'i gnas su dag// sems
116a1(rnying rgyud): skye shi med pa yi// chos su mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sra// de phyir nor bu rin po che// bzang bar bdel 'khur bar yang // swa par sbal dkor du che// sems las man ngag rgya mtsho 'byung // thams cad ma lus sems pa
116a2(rnying rgyud): te// sems la snang zhing sems kyis byas// sems la dngos po med pa las// sems sngags la zhing sems su shes// de phyir gnyis med shes pa gces// gnyis med shes pa klong srung na// bdud kyi zhes ni la bya'o// gango tha
116a3(rnying rgyud): nya ba'i snying ba'i rkyed las/ man ngag rgya mtsho'i leSh+ma ste gsum pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nus bcom ldan 'das bded chen po lnga phyag btsal nas/ gas ga
116a4(rnying rgyud): pa bde ba'i don// blan med pa bstan du gsol/ goskad ces ni gsal pa dang // bcom ldan 'das ni bde chen pos// bzlum pa mtsha'i nang nas sang // gsang sngags gis du bdi bsgom pa gcig/ rnarnam pa blan med pa ba ma
116a5(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa bsam gyis me khya ba grangs las 'das// bsam gtan byang chub den la gang 'jug pa// bskam mo snyam pa'i nad kyis zen d+ha re// ston pas bstan pa'i lung pa mthong dpung pa// mtshan mang na ma rtog dran du khye ra tA re// bde na
116a6(rnying rgyud): phra len cig gis mtshan du med// sangs rgyas yul du bags pa 'jal pa'i lam// bzlam du med bya'i sgrib la// yengs pa med pa'i blog cig gzhag/ snang ba med pa'i chos nyid la// ma ba col bzhizhin pa sgom pa yin// nga /
116a7(rnying rgyud): der ni rnam btsal na// de las de bzhin me 'byung ste// skye ba med pa'i dbyings nyid la// 'chi ba med pa'i blo gzhag pa// 'du 'bral med pa'i rang bzhin la// btang rnams chen po blo gzhag ste// chags sdang med pa'i 'de byams pa//
116b1(rnying rgyud): len med pa'i shes rab gzhag/ gzhi rtsa med pa'i blo yongs su// khyab brdal chen po'i ye shes gzhag// ye nas rang byung chen po la// brjed pa med pa'i ting 'dzin gzhag/ thogs pa med pa'i dbyings nyid la// dmigs pa med pa'i don pa
116b2(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ yul du sdang ba yum gyi klong // rig par snang ba yab kyi mkha'// mkha' blong gnyis su thams cad chub// de la dpe yis mtshon du med// de 'tshig gis mtshon du med// de phyir dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis// btsal mar
116b3(rnying rgyud): bas mi rnyed do// bde gshegs kun gyis gzigs pa dkon// dngos bung rte ba'i byung po'i rgyud las/ bsgom pa rgya mtshan midra the ban pam// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i zugan mo dang sha ma dang la gzhan rgyas bcomaldan
116b4(rnying rgyud): dpal nyisag pa zug btsal nas/ gsang sngags stong pa bsgrub pa'i dzin// dang sa tha shin tu ta pa'i thabs/ rdzog dgas pa pa tha ba da // mnor dam pabargyan dgasol// des ces na pa'i badz+ra/ sanangadas dpal
116b5(rnying rgyud): bsrub pargya mtsha' nang nas kyang // dngos grub shin tu nye ba'i thabs// rim par spang te bshad par bya'o// snang sring thams cad chos sgra thig le'i ngang // sdod brgyad ma lus bdud rtsir gnas bzhin du// 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa bag chags /
116b6(rnying rgyud): bskal ba rgya mchor 'khor zhi byams pa rnams// yang dgrangs pa'i don la gzud pa dang // drug rten byang rtsi ba ni la dgod pa'i phyir// dus gsum bdi gshegs rtsal ba rgya mtshalas// ra k+Sha ya na'i reg 'dzin srang ma rnams// gtam ma
116b7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems la gcig pa'i phyir// gisang mchog 'dud kyi chen po'i spab thabs pazhed// dang po dngos ba 'thung ba ga 'i// tha ma dpang tha gang ldan pa// dbang dang daci gatshul bzhin thang // rgya rig gams pa'i pe 'bya sa/
117a1(rnying rgyud): AT/ tshogs pal ldan pas// bsad nams chags na ci nus bsags// mthun rnams ram par mchud pa dang // mgan pa gnas pa rtan gzhal// mthad dbyem tshams bsrang bar bal// danas gyur pa 'das gang na/
117a2(rnying rgyud): ya ma dam sri bkug la mnan// sgo la chos kyi rgyal po bri// mchod de bar mtshasas bsrung bar bcol// dur khrod badrag po ma traM ni// thal ba dag las gzugs byas la// bdag nyid cha mchog spug nag 'bar// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag mtshan nas//
117a3(rnying rgyud): zla du blugs la na so// thaMd padag pa bgag nas bsla/ wang dang pa la yas 'a tho bathung // sa pa srin las rgya/ yid gnas su dbugasam// byin pa na pa sems gcad tho brnyan bya/ dang sa snang min
117a4(rnying rgyud): nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa la 'jug pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ste// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gu bzhi la// bdud rtsi lnga yis spyad nul bya// bdag dang gsang yum shes rab mas// thig gi cho ga

119a7(rnying rgyud): bdang pha mangs byas la// ril zas namam// rnal 'byor ril bu gsum gsum ste// lus ngag yid la ri re gzhag/ a zhes bya ba'i man dag gis// rdeg le byang chub sems lung bsten//

119b2(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba'i rlung dang ni// yid kyi rnam shes bsres byas nas// phyi nang gnyis las gzhan du ni// mi 'gro ba yi thig le nyid// rdzogs pa chen ba'aman ngag yin// dngos pa pa chen po de la bya'o// dngos grub chen po nyi da'i ting D+ha dang
119b3(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi ril bu bya ba'i byang chub sems thig le sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ste// bdud rtsi bdud rtsi zhes bya ba// dug lnga sman du 'gyur ba ste// sman lnga ye shes chu ba thab pa 'di// rnal 'byor dang

119b7(rnying rgyud): bya tso'i nang nas kyang // 'brab sder bstan pa la nu bstan// bdeg shegs rigs byed pa tshig na// 'khar mo bsgor zhing drug lngan rig cod pa'o// rigs kyi dmachog ni// phung byas gnab cing bsgral pa'i phrin pas ces// dug sde ba nga thud pa'o// rin chen rigs kyi dang chog ni// gtong mas dug lnga mas byed pa//
120a1(rnying rgyud): pad+ma rigs kyi dmachog ni// sbyor bas drug lnga dag byed pa'o// las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig ni// hom gyis drug lnga sreg byed pa'o// rigs lnga dril te drug lnga ldan du 'gyur ngo // yang na 'di ltar shes par bya// gzugs

120a6(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po/ kun rig chos kyi rje dpal bde ba chen po shrI he ru ka s+thi ra ma ti ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la bstod pa/ e ma sangs kyis kun tu bzang // gsang chen thig le nyid la rdzogs// ma rig mun sel ye shes smon// dpa' po khyod
120a7(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstad do// mngon par bstod de// de nas kun yi rang ste/ gsang sngags bla na med pa'i don thugs su chud nas/ zhabs skye bos blangs shing ring ra gas pa gshegs so// lha dang mernames kyis sha klud dam
120b1(rnying rgyud): pos blangs shing chem bu'i dkyil 'khor dam par// dngos grub nye bar bsgrub pa las 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi sa la gshegs so// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud las/ gzhug baspyod pa dang / gtad ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//
120b2(rnying rgyud): dngos grub nye ba'i snying po'i zud rdzogs so// / dngos grub mchog mnyes ya mtshan chen po'i bka'// thabs chen bla na med pa gsang sngags 'bras bu'i chos// kun gyi thun mong ma yin ma ni ngag rgyud// tshig don rim pa sla yang don
120b3(rnying rgyud): par dka'// bka' rgyud dam pa'i man ngag bla med 'di lta bu// bdag 'dra bi ma la yi man ngag dam pa 'di yin te// dri med zla shar yi dam chos su gtad kyis thub par chongs// dri med zla shar yi dam man ngag dam pa 'di// yang dbang gte

120b5(rnying rgyud): a mr-i tat+tarma t+ma gu h+ya tanA nA ma/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshab mo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas tham
120b6(rnying rgyud): ngo bo nyid kyi sku gsung drugs yon tan phrin las ma lus pa'i bdag po da ni/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams dang / rdo rje yid bzhin nor bu'i btsun mo b+ha ga la snyoms par thugs nas/ khams gsum pa'i sems can ma lus pa'i du
120b7(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi chen por rang byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas rdo mos rang gi gdon las bzhengs nas/ 'di skad ces gsol pa gdang 'o// gtsang ma'i zas la spyod pa yi// lha dang bram ze thu dang bcas// ra ga la 'bru sogs za
121a1(rnying rgyud): gling sa ni sems can mi dang bcas// las dran lhags pa spyod pa yi// dud 'gro yi dwags dmyal bar bcas// rang byung bdun rtsi matogs pang // mtshan nyid rje gsum drA yog gsun// pa ma dul ba dang /
121a2(rnying rgyud): sbal ngan theg pa drang ba'i phyir// rang byung bdud rtsi chen po'i don// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol// zhes zhus pas rang gi gdan la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes nu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas pa
121a3(rnying rgyud): byid kyil 'khor la spyan gyi lha stangs kyis gzigs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// sems can nyon mongs snang ba la// rtsa ba dug gsum las byung ba'i// nyon mongs rnam par shar ba lnga// brgyad khri bzhi stong rnam grang sdang //
121a4(rnying rgyud): nyams kyi snang ba la// mtshan nyid gyi bas ma rtogs kyang // bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga po las// khams kyi 'du lugs gsum du sdang // bde bar gshegs pa dus gsum gyi// sangs rgyas rnams la zug pu dzugs// mi zad kyad kyi 'khor lor snga
121a5(rnying rgyud): snang ba gsum las byung ba yi// rang byung bdud rtsi grub pa'i thabs// khyed pa bshad kyis legs par nyon// sems can nyon mongs snang ba la// rdul tshon dkyil 'bor chen po dra// reg 'dzin ldan pa slang bshwa ngar bya// nal 'byor nyams kyis
121a6(rnying rgyud): la// phung po dag la brten byas pa'i// rang byung bdud rtsi ba grub par bshad// bde bar gshegs pa'i snang ba la// rigs brgya rigs lnga rigs gcig dang // bdud rtsi gong bu che mchog gi/ ye shes lha yi dkyil 'khor bshad// lha
121a7(rnying rgyud): gdong bya// spyod pa'i la yang rab dar nas// 'grub pas nyams su blangs nas ni// dam chog zhings gshin po la// bsnyen bsgrubs po na rab btang nas// rim pa dbang gis bgrod byas pas// 'bras bul thog smin par byas// rab
121b1(rnying rgyud): sa// dug sa// bca na mas du na stsu sa na na// na// da na
121b2(rnying rgyud): gleng gzhi dang gleng bsrung ba'i khre'u ste dang pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsgrub pa thams cad kyigazhi phun sumatshogs pa 'di gsungs sa// ston pa tho yang sakha cig drung // gyen cud la mkhas par chung nga// dza gnags
121b3(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi nyid 'atogs// mi 'gyur spyod lam mkha' ltung yangs// dgyes pa slong ba yum gyi rigs// mchod stobs gsung ba'i phyag tshangs pa// bla mu'i thugs dang 'thad pa dang // rdul phyug kyi nang mtshams palen dang // nyung yang ra lnga sogapa pa
121b4(rnying rgyud): yaM// yab ma thabs dang shes rab ldan// mchod ldam sa rgyud// gdung bzhi da nga gamig sar 'phangs// b+ha ba la gcan dag dang // seMn gtan thos sal med kyang // dben rnyed mas dag thugs pa'i gnas// rtse ldan shing da
121b5(rnying rgyud): sasu
121b6(rnying rgyud): bairgyad la brnam// bAs ng+ge nams chags kyu rdzogs par 'gyur// ngaHN+ra 'das la dngas thu tha~Mng // rtswa rgyas pa gas rdzogs can rdzogs// da rgya ba zas dang drug ngoms man// mchod pa'i das dang rje'i pa das// 'dzugs pa
121b7(rnying rgyud): gtong// mgron bzhi mnyes par bya phyir do// sbyin sreg kyi chos sgrib pa thung // bsod nams brgyad cing 'asrung ba'i phyir// 'azhigs rigs kyang brag brgyad bya'o// gtir ma gsar byams gtang par bya// phyogs zhing tha bzhi cugs nas phyi//
122a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba chen po sde bzhi pa// phyi mtshams bcad pa'i zin pas bcol// spyan drang phug 'tshal mchod pa blang // phrin las bcol la gsol bya dgadags// tha ba dang da pa can//
122a2(rnying rgyud): phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng 'og bcur// rim pa bzhin du gnas par bya// dur khrod gnas rnams ring bsrung bar// dam gri mi g.yo mgon pos mnan// bar chad dngos blang ba sung dod du// go byang bad rtsegashin rje gshed /
122a3(rnying rgyud): gnan pa'i phyir// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'bar bas bskal// lha dang dkyil 'khor slob ma rnams// sta gon la ni gnas pa'i phyir// ma 'dres pa yi mchod phye la// zhi khro'i dgel 'khor mchod byas nas// mnyes nam mkha' 'gro
122a4(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ de nas sman gyi rdzas mchog gis// dam tshig bsnan zhing bskyar bar bya// de nas sngags pas thod pa'i nang // dman byin gyis brlab par bya// rab dra bsur bcas pas// de lus bar chad paphrad par byed// yol nang rdo rje'i rnam pa la//
122a5(rnying rgyud): kyang drang bar bya// mtha' yas sems ni rab rmongs pas// theg pa chen por des sems bskyed// rdo rje slob dpon bla ma la// byin gyis rlob par zhus nas ni// bla mas bu rnams lus ngag yid// sku gsung rdzogs su byin gyis brlang // yid dam lha log
122a6(rnying rgyud): skad phyir// lus ngag dang bas phyag 'tshal nas// tshe rabs thog ma med pa nas// bsags pa'i nyes pa bshags par bya// ma rig mun pa mdongs pa yi// sun yang dbye bar zhu ba zhus// slob dben gyis ni gnang nas ri/
122a7(rnying rgyud): yang dbye bar bya// mthong ba'i yid mtha brtag pa// lha la me tog rang gtor 'bul// bla mas me tog lhar bcas pa// slob ma dgal bstim par bya// lha la bdud rtsi la sogs pa// mchod pas kyang ni rab tu mthod// rtsa ba yan lag
122b1(rnying rgyud): pa yi// dmatshig rlom pa dngog par bya// 'dres pa'i chos dang ma 'dres pa// dmachog gnyis sgra med par bsre// bskal par srog la bab gyur cang // mi gtong ba srung bar dam yang bdar // rang gi yi dam gang yin te// bla ga la yang 'jog par/
122b2(rnying rgyud): zhus// gnang byas sku mdog phyag mtshan bcas// phyag rgya chen por 'bog par bya// slob ma las dang skal ldan rnams// su gsung thugs kyi dngos grub sbyin// de la phreng ba rang gtad nas// 'dzab kyi snying po 'dren du gzhug/ sngag
122b3(rnying rgyud): zal chen las// rim pa yang dag gnas par bya// slob ma dam par gyur pa rnams// bla ma rin chen sta bu la// dza gad gtad rag rab tu gtang // dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa// 'phang du chag gang yod par bya// dang po dgar bya
122b4(rnying rgyud): bdud ci lnga yi chag chag gdab// oM sar+b+ba patu A mr-i tA ma d+ha la hUM/ de nas byin dang ldan pa'i phyir// nang gi dam rdzas chag chag gdab// oM bu h+ya a kra ma maN+Dal hUM/ mkhas pa rdo rje slob dpon gyis// ba su ta yi rgyu zhags la// gzungs mu'i
122b5(rnying rgyud): tu byin brlabs nas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa// lhag pa byang chub sems kyi thig/ yum gyi mkha' la bde stong 'khyil// rig pa ye shes lnga yi thig/ srad bu ye shes lnga dang ldan// mtshon pa gzugs brnyan rdul tshon jig
122b6(rnying rgyud): cha chen cha phran rnam par darje// oM ma hA d+hA t+ya dz+nyAn su N+ya a kra ma ma d+ha la hUM/ mtha' gnyis ma spos kun nas zlum// chos dbyings kyi med gu bzhir rgyas// tshad med sgo dang rab ldan pa'o// ling tshe dbu yi dkyil 'khor der// snod ni bzhi'am
122b7(rnying rgyud): brgyad gzhag la// cha yi grangs dang mnyam ste bgo// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud las/ sta gon du bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ smin sA ya na srung
123a1(rnying rgyud): thabs 'di gsungasas// mu nyi la ba DUr dang // nAta shing mdar po 'i yang // rtsi sde ba dang chabarnams te// byam ga na 'askur nang // bcug nas gzungs cag/ btag byas nas// thags 'di na rtsa brjod pa ga
123a2(rnying rgyud): oM ka li ka li ma hA ka li/ man pa sho na d+ha b+ho dzi ni/ ha na shu la tI shU le na/ bdag gi nad zhi nas tshe ring bar gyur cig swAhA/ phye ma chu dron sbyar 'thungs na// rlung las gyur pa'i zug gzer dang // sran dang khrag 'khun pa dang // dbu gra 'i bde dang steng
123a3(rnying rgyud): na dang // myos dang drod chung khro thos pa// kha zas mi 'ju long mi bde// srin bu'i nad dang cham pa dang // shu bathor bu g.yen pa dang // dregs nad mi ser khrag rgyas dang // lkog ma smad dang rgya so'i nad// mtshan pa dang ni mtsher ba dang /
123a4(rnying rgyud): gzhog byed nabadang // mig gi nad do cog rnams sel// skabs su bstan pas de ltar 'grub// rtag tu gtang bar gyur pa na// spyi ther skra yang skye bar byed// sma na ga pur cing bzhin yang mdzes// skra dkar gnyer ma med pa ste//
123a5(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// bcud len ra sA ya nAr 'gyur// bcom ldan bdud bya'i rgyal po yis// phye ma sman gyi rgyal po 'di// bram ze gzhon nu'i sprin la gsungs// de nas srin bu'i snang ba de// bA u ba yi rtsa ba dang // a r+thar dang rje tres dang // skyer ba
123a6(rnying rgyud): rtsab cha bskams bskol// bzhi cha lus pa'i nang du ni// gu gul mnyes te bsags pa yi// khu ba sngags kyis btang 'thung na// 'od dang rgyu sra ba dmu rdzi drand// bad kan las gyur pa yi nad// spangs pa'i nad rnams sel ba ste// na mchod yan
123a7(rnying rgyud): lag nad la phan// oMn+d+ra pr-i d+hu shu k+ke phu swAr+tha/ sngags da btab nas chu pur thud// sdud cing mazhu'i nad zhi byed// bcom ldan 'das kyis khu ba'i sngan// bsgrub pa'i man ga chog 'di// drang srong rin po chel bshad// larba tsha dang go da
123b1(rnying rgyud): na ldagag dang ga khur// gang kyi myu ba'i ma smin// sngags pa'i nad rnams ga par byed// ga cadag rnal smra pa// 'am/ ma nam du dang / can dang tha mang dang // ma dang marnams/ rdzas
123b2(rnying rgyud): rjes byin na them pa'i nad// dbugs mi 'dibazhi par byed// sngags 'de btabs nas rgan la ba zlab// thob pa thos mthal du bdags// thugs pa'i na rnams ni zer byed// me tra~M ga la ta/
123b3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das ces drang srong na// goT ta ma la bshad pa yin// lderma bsgrub pa'i cho ga// kyai ting ga y-i se dz+nyAn dang // ska drar dang mdzad// 'jas thag tsu lasang ngani// drar byed mang gsan bye // phur ma
123b4(rnying rgyud): ral tha zangs ni sa shA// sram smra bar rabardal// mngon na pa gra bugs mi 'ad// sra yang du badzin nang 'brim dade// gcin nang pakyi nang pa nga nas// nams pa ban sa
123b5(rnying rgyud): ba sam snad kyi spar ba yis// 'khru bar byed de bzud len pa chags// oM mtshan de ma ni sa rtag sha/ hA/ bcod ldan 'das kyis bzung nga ldan/ nga gzhan rje phred pa bshad// ri lu sman gyi slob pa'o//
123b6(rnying rgyud): gtas/ ga sbas pa'i bral ba dang // bdud mi shi ca dang / ga 'a// 'a de de'i phrengs ka dang // yin 'a sum bcani dang // phal ta ka sa tho /
123b7(rnying rgyud): thams ma / ma ma tham zhing par gdas// bsagacan dang tha mthus sa// chags pa than/ de bu'i drug dang sa na// bakhwa na dang medapa pa dang // maman par rdul dang 'bras can/
124a1(rnying rgyud): bcwa brgyad dag la yang // bsdus pa tsam gyis nus pa ni// shing la thog gis brtsub pa 'dra// a a mra ta ga pra shwa man ya swad+ha/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong mchog/ ma klubs can drags bzhad// 'thang
124a2(rnying rgyud): dang shing kun dang // sbal gyi pags pa po sache// ras pa la sa bon mi yaM swa// nas kyi phub ma briha ti// ser po rnam gnyis na la sham// rma bya'i sgo dang shun pa dang // lha la phul ba'i me tog dang // nga la dacig spang //
124a3(rnying rgyud): drug cu dud pa 'di// gang la bdug par gyur pa la// rims nad thams cad med pa dang // yaM dwags grul pum lus sul po// sha za gnod sbyin srin po rnams// gdon gyis zin pa grol bar byed// oM na maHtsha dzo d+ha ya ku nas sun \u0f7f/
124a4(rnying rgyud): kun na kunaH/ tsan+ta bu ta sA ma ye swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ni// rtsibs kyi mu khyud 'dzin pa la// dud pas srung ba'i cho ga'o// dngul rdo lcags rdo brag zhun rnams// mar dang sbyar nas byin gyur na// bud med pa d+mar d+ha na//
124a5(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba sel bar byed// e na mo lo hi ha ra sing ga la ya/ ma ti gA ra dzaH/ ya ri ya ri naM/ ru ti bi/ praM baM/ pra ba ga krA mi/ tu ru tu ru/ la g+hu la g+hu/ ti li ti li/ tsi li tsi li/ mi'i maM li sA hA/ sngags 'di srid pa dmar po /
124a6(rnying rgyud): bzlas te mdud pa gsum por la// rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong bcing // zla mtshan dus min 'byung la phan// shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang mas// sems can rnam pa'i don du gsungs// bcom ldan 'das la rig pa bral// chu rtsegs shing gis
124a7(rnying rgyud): dang // shal ma la yi me tog gnyis// lhan cig 'byung na bu 'gags sel// ri bong khrag dang rta khrag brud// bu yang bde bar 'byung bar 'gyur// oM na mo ru tra sha pa na nam thin to pa ting ma pa rngam pa pa ni muH/ e na tri ya ga tra naM/ pi sha 'a
124b1(rnying rgyud): parba/ gar po ni 'di zhes bya ba la swAt+ma/ sngags 'di spyad pa dkar pol// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas byas nas// mdung pa nyi shu rtsa gcig por// bud med bu 'gags mgul du gdags// bu yang bde bar 'byung bar 'gyur// ldan b+hi rtsa ro
124b2(rnying rgyud): mas// rang gi reg pa bcom ldan la// sems can don du phul ba ni// sbrul gyi pags pa rgya ru dang // khyi yi mtshan ma khong du gtang // skyes pa'i ling+ga'i tshod ma gtang // sngags 'ang grog dag la bri// gang gi spyi bor btags pa yis/
124b3(rnying rgyud): yang myur du 'byung bar 'gyur// bu rig kyang ni de bzhin 'byung // oM ka sa pa~M ka sa ma hA ka sa swA hA/ rtse yi lha mo grub pa yi// blo grom mas ni bcom ldan pa// rang gi rig pa 'gro don phul// bud med na mtshan dang ldan zhing //
124b4(rnying rgyud): yi dus su na// glang gcin srang ni sum cu gnyis// til mar srang brgyad bskol byas pa'i// mar lus pa de byin pa na// mo gsham bu yang btsa' bar 'gyur// ma he'i mar gsar srang gi sum dang // ra chu byur nas bud med byed// bu med pa
124b5(rnying rgyud): skye bar 'gyur// a shwa gan+d+ha bskol ba yi// khra ba dar ba mar yang 'grol// maM lus pa de bud med ni// zla mtshan ldan pa'i dus 'thung nas// de yi 'og tu sbyor ba bya// des kyang bu yang 'dzin par 'gyur// rgya phyogs lo ma bsdus pa dang /
124b6(rnying rgyud): rtakhrag sbyar te blung ba na// lan stong bar du mngal 'dzin 'gyur// oM shaM kha~M ni hu d+d+he phu swA hA/ nags kyi lha mo rma bya'i mi grin// rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di// bcom ldan 'das la phul ngo // zhes gsungs so// bdud kyi chen po chos nyid gsar nga
124b7(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ sems can nyon mongs pa'i sdang ba la/ sman snga lan brgyang pa 'i dzub pa la tha gsum par// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rang byung dud gyi chen po grub pa las/ rnal 'byor dbang phug chen po rnams la/ rnam byar/
125a1(rnying rgyud): pa nyams kyi snang btsun pa zhes bya ba 'di dag ched du brjod de gsungs so// dkyil 'khor lerje tshe dkrub la// rtsibs ni bcwa drug bkod byas nas// bar khyams slobazhi bcas po la// rta babs rdza rnga mar bcas// rtsab 'bras bu rdza
125a2(rnying rgyud): po dang // yub mAn lpags lo ma dang // me tog snying por bcas pa ni// b+h+rUM ya~M rtsa ba brgyad du skyes// lus po bugs pa yan lag dang // rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu dang // snying po lo ma rnam pa brgyad// mchog chen mi sris gcig la tshang // la
125a3(rnying rgyud): rnam lnga bskaskul ba yi// dbang po rnam lnga'i bcud lnga dang // sems bcud gor tsan lnga// mAM sa'i bcud ni tshal bu lnga// chu bcud dri chu rnam pa lnga// rus pa'i bcud kyang gang mar lnga// lus po snyir dang khrag gi khrag// gsang ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa brgyad//
125a4(rnying rgyud): yab kyi rgyang gi gnas pa dag/ yum gyi gnas bzhi gsang bar// kun gzhi zung chub sems las ni// ma ga yis bzhin du 'das bran// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs bcud gsel// doni don dam rtsa ba yin// dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag
125a5(rnying rgyud): rdzas// ye shes lnga ldan ka pU la ra// yab yum drang srong rgyu bskal zhing // rang shi phrag nya phug ron brgyad// a ba ra di tu du ruka/ dkar nag dbus su gzhag pa'i rdzas// de yi shar du gzhag pa yang // sgra gsung thugs ldan kA pA lar// srad gzhung
125a6(rnying rgyud): bai rer sha rta ri la// mchen snod b+ha ga rgyud kyi lam// ga bur cu gang thal kar gdung // dkyil 'khor de yi lho phyogs su// yid bzhin gter ldan ka pA lar// lce snying mkhal ma gzhang dang bzhi// ka bzhi phyi nang gsang ba brgyad// tsa tri ka ko gla gor snying /
125a7(rnying rgyud): rgyabaskyabs dang bcas par gnas// nub dud dam rdzas dgod pa na// khams gsum yongs smal ka pA lare// rgyu lnga yab yum bya bar rigs// ci rten li gi rgan 'bru lnga // byang gi phyogs su dgod pa ni// chotshe 'phrul rtags 'byin ga pA la re// rgyud lding mdzun/
125b1(rnying rgyud): ba yab yum rgya// 'og zag ca dgu dgra ma skye// rgya ni rang las b+ha dbul// rnam grangs cha yang mthun pa lnga// rags na rnam par ngas pa lnga// 'bras bu gzhan du mi 'gyur lha// gzha las rtsa bsdu gyur pas// bar+b+ba lnga yi nang du stsal/
125b2(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu chen po lnga bskal ba// a karu ni dbus su ste// pa ni se ni shar nyid la// lho ru a 'bras zhes bya ste// nub tu chun 'bru gzhag par bya// byang ngun le dge rgyas so// de la sogs patshogs tshad de// yan dge slong dang bas
125b3(rnying rgyud): dbus su mi 'gyur g.yung drung lha// shar lho mi shigs mdzod ldan te// lho nub srid pa yongs sgrol la// nub byang drug gsum gtan spug ste// byang shar mtshan ma spos bral ma// de lnga'i nang du grags pa'i sman// rgya lnga bye bam dang
125b4(rnying rgyud): cu gang 'dam bu gi hang dbus// lug mig le'u mig gdung bzhi shar// rna lce sha sna lho nu bsog/ sa rtsi shing dang me tog nub// de bzhin srog dang gnam chu sogs// byang du chu rnams thams cad de// shararo lho mtshams kyi gu chad la// yon tan chog
125b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs ka pA lar// dza ga dgar chang sna tshogs nyid// lho nub mtshams kyi gru chad la// 'o ma sna tshogs sbyar ba yang // bkra shis mtshan ldan ka pA lar// nub byang mtshams kyi gru chad la// mi 'gyur sra mkhregs ka pA la ra// rin chen sna tshogs pa dngang dang
125b6(rnying rgyud): byang shar mtshams kyi gu chad la// A yu dpal ldan ka pA la ra// sna tshogs chu rnams gzhag par bya// sgo bzhir yum chen dung chen ni// shar du dung can rdo rje'i rigs// lho ru ban glang rin po che// nub tu pad can pad+ma'i rigs// las rigs cang
125b7(rnying rgyud): mo can// brag zhun bdun dan lug mig gsum// a rur ni rigs kyang bdun// dbang po lag pa rnam pa gsum// shing thag thams cad tshang bar bya// sprin gyi rig 'dzin tshangs pa sogs// drang srong rnams ni spyan drangs la// gtsang ma za ba'i sems
126a1(rnying rgyud): can rnams// rtog bzlog yang dag lha la gzug/ rigs rnams so sor bkod byas nas// lha mo bzhi yis byin gyis brlab// rags lngar sngags kyis brtan par byas// phyogs bzhu dbus dang lda gan
126a2(rnying rgyud): rnams ma lus thams cad kyang // rang bzhin gnyis su med pas na// rigs rnams tha dad ma yin pas// dbye ba med par dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor rgyan rnams dgod pa ni// dang kyi yol ba rigs lnga'i rgyan// tshon sung ngas
126a3(rnying rgyud): das / ma pa / ma sa / pa ga
126a4(rnying rgyud): brda rgo dbye la ba ni phyag 'tshal// mchod pa byin dbabargya gul bdug/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// dza gad b+hanA 'bar bde// dpa' bo 'bru lnga lus khams kyi// bdud rtse lngadu byin gyis brlab// las rnams 'askos la gdab pa yang // slob dpon ston pa sprin pa
126a5(rnying rgyud): gdab// yum ni kun tu bzang mo la// rgyal po rdo rje rin chen dang // bkra las kyi rigs su bya// yum bzhi yangs pa'i spyan chen dang // rin chen pad+ma las mya bya// rgyal thebs bzhi yang rigs bzhir gnas// ye shes spyan dang dus tshad do// phyi dang nang gi
126a6(rnying rgyud): mtshams mkhan dang // 'dzin geng stob gi sgrol ging dang // gsang ba'i phyag tshangs phud zas rgyan// mched lcam bya rog mnga' gsal bya// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po la// dpal gyi chas brgyad mnga' gsol nas// 'khor gyi mched dang lceman pa pa//
126a7(rnying rgyud): zhag thal ba'i rtags btab pas// dpa' bo dpa' mor 'gyur ba yin// chas dang mi ldan rtags med na// ma mo mkha' 'gro dam can gyis// bsgrub mchog yin par nga mi shes// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsa /
126b1(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi bye ma bsgrub pa yi// rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum// khrol bu'i bsnyen pas dag par rjud// btag btsag gzhal ba lugs bzhin byed// gong bur byas te dbus su gzhag/ dpal 'khor chen po dmanga'ags la'o// dam pa ga
126b2(rnying rgyud): brgyas srungs byas nas// rnam snang mi bskyod mtha' yas dang // rin 'byung las dang yum du bcas// sems dpa' rgyal po chags pa legs// rin brjid tshul mtshan bzhad pa dang // chos dang rnon po 'khor lo sgra// las slang gnod sbyin kha tshur dang /
126b3(rnying rgyud): dbyangs can mA ma gos dkar sgrol// sgeg mo spos dang lcags kyu thub// phreng ba me tog zhugs pa khro// glu dang mar me lcags sgog ro// gar dang dri chab dril bu za// stobs dang gshin rje rta mgrin bdud// 'gugs 'tshong sdom dang daces pa baphyed
126b4(rnying rgyud): spyan drangs mchod bstod bdud rtsir bzhu// lha tshogs mang pos byin gyis brlabs// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta re sA yan tan dza ya gu h+ya sid+d+hi hrI hrIHtha/ ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs// thams cad bdud rtsi chen por gnas// de nyid rigs ni rnam pa lnga// 'du
126b5(rnying rgyud): rtse rnam pa lnga yi nang // dpa' bo 'bru lnga bsam par bya// tsi d+ha'i dkyil 'khor sdod du gsal// khams kyi bdud rtsi lha yi sku// oM hUM A~M swA hA rnams sngags/ rlung gis sgo zhing badz+ra ba dang // lus khams bdud rtsi srog rtsol ba skyon/ oM AHhU~M swAhA/
126b6(rnying rgyud): dkar dmar ser dang mthi ga ldang // bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga po las// gsung gi yig 'bru sbyangs nas ni// phyag mtshan sru dang ye shes lnga// spos pas sgrib spangs thugs dam bskul// 'dud pas dug bcom bdud rtsi rags la// rigs lnga sangs rgyas
126b7(rnying rgyud): 'ab dang bcas// bskyed nase mnyes par ra ste // oM sa rgya bri ba tu bya/ rnaM sems / zhes kya chub sems su spyong // so ma skyes pa rgyam tho na mi / sa mas sa/ zhes
127a1(rnying rgyud): sa
127a2(rnying rgyud): da// donamags gas / sa ma rgya stes/ sa ca chung sa// nam nangs kya sa//
127a3(rnying rgyud): nad pa/ mams da cing dinan // gsang byag sa dmas pa bdus ning sa thal dzi ba di// ga nangs pa ba/ gas te ga na 'tsha dem/ me sna mal la ca ra// ngag chag pa dag

127a6(rnying rgyud): mangs pa'i chug pa dang // thang datha gad // dngadzin dpa pa rtog pa rnams// brjod pa 'a // rmal rgyamadrug tan du/ k+Sha/ ba / ba d+haH/ hra pra ma
127b1(rnying rgyud): sa na nga/ sa sa kun / ngan/ ga sa zla nan/ na na
127b2(rnying rgyud): ba srid// 'i na canan// byings na smrag d+hes ces dbyug/ ya sa thugs panam gyis bzlas// a ma thus kya mam tan na sa nanam rgyu pa/ zhes ca gachags pas byung // oM kye+e ng+yas rtson te 'dasas
127b3(rnying rgyud): 'om tshogs gang shing shon pa du bus pa'o// oM A skyes nub rgyam ta ga coM tIn+d+ha / zhes na pa tshogs pa dang la thug ga// oM ng+yas rbab rgyam ti'i kyi ma ma/ zhes rgyu tshogs snangang // 'bras bu bu dang ma shesas// rnams cangad ngog ci
127b4(rnying rgyud): pas nas// yab yus bat+pa rje'i mkhar// gnyis mid ga cig tu sbal bar bye// ai s+thA d+hus rbas rdza ma mr-i ti pus la pras pa d+h+r-in+ma \u0f7f/ zhes gnyis smra med par sbyar bar bya'o// de nas gong zung rib byas nas// dang ngas gtsang ma nang du dril// rdzogs pa ni mtshams/
127b5(rnying rgyud): nibatu du yang // rta mgrin phyug rgya rnamam gdab// ai A hUMsarba paH adr-i tA ha ya g+hI r+tha hu lu tra l+r-i t+sIny+dzitha/ de ltar rgyas btib chad gzhag phyir// legs par srang la gzhal bar bya// I chus rba pa \u0f7f ama?ta to pa la bi shwad+hidz+yo d+de \u0f7f/ thabs dang shes rab pha ma yaM/
127b6(rnying rgyud): ga srung bar la// rigs ldangags pa'i sangs rgyas bkrigs// thos rgyam pa'i dud pa bdug/ zhi ba las ni za bar byung // drang thaMd can pa'i gnas saH// longs spyad gza' chags srings// tha bdu zad gnas med ces// drid med tshan gyis
127b7(rnying rgyud): bris pa// dbus na buM dbu la// gdan pa badz+ra dpa ma brgyad// 'khor brdzibs brgyad rtsomal// nang du dan chen zung brgyad po// mu byung bar thams zla bzhi pa// tibabs mchod rten bcad dang ldan// 'dags pa'i stobs ldanaka bibargyad// yul pa
128a1(rnying rgyud): mthongs kyi bsang ba dang // ga na la byed med padz+ra ca// yon tanami zad pa chen brgyad/ ngag satho su byung // ye shes sun sasabyad kyangs mchod rnams rten par mabyed tan kyang /
128a2(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyis mtha' bskor bas// gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor yin// bdud rtsi bum pa yum dang ni// bla mas phyag tu bzhes nas // mtshams bcad 'a bor bkur// srung da'i 'khor la rab tu bsgom// dbus theg sa ngang gas
128a3(rnying rgyud): gnas bzhugs dpa 'i// 'gro ba'i don yang rab mdzad par// dgyes par bzhugs su gsol bya'o// oM AHhUM sarba paH oM mr-i ta ma hA shrI he ru ka/ ma hA kro d+hI shwaHs+t+waM/ sa ma ya taSh+Tha ldan/ skong ba lan gsam bskor byas nas/ dro shar du 'dru
128a4(rnying rgyud): stsol la sus// las kyis ni byang nyid do// de nas mtshams bcad bsrung ba dang // mchod pa byin gyis brlab par bya// lus ngag yid kyi nyes byas sbyangs// brda sgo brda phyag byan chen dbab// gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag chos nyid ni// car yang mi
128a5(rnying rgyud): stong pa'i rang bzhin te// thang dong med pa'i don las ma g.yos par// mnyam pa chen po'i dang du bsgom par bya// e ma hA shUn+ya d+hadz+nyA na swa d+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ chos rnams thams cad gdong nas dag pa pa// sems kyi rang bzhin kun pa khyab par dang rdal// thams
128a6(rnying rgyud): cad 'byung ba'i ye shes chen po ste// sems dang ye shes kun la cing yang snang // oM d+harmad+hA tuswa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ byang chubo sems ni hU~Mg rang bzhin te// dz+riM nyid gdod nas dag pa'i su rugasal// mngon sum gyur pa thams cad 'thung ba ni chu// gsang chen
128a7(rnying rgyud): yum lngagasang mchog dkyil 'khor gsal// e yaM dang bi kaM hUM/ e las ye shes nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ni// dngos dang mtshan nyid thams cad mi dmigs pa// chos kun ye nas dag pa'i dang nyid ni// mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha' mtha' dang mnyam/
128b1(rnying rgyud): a ag gas/ 8\u0f7f/ yalas ye shes 'drang rlung can pa// babardzags sdug bsngal lo sha kyang gas brgyad// dalas dbyangs phrag dbyangs sumanyam spang nas// yalas rlung gang \u0f7fla dbong bskyed dang bya// yags paH/ ngang sam
128b2(rnying rgyud): chen po ni// dngos por snang ba'i bag chags sdug bsngal bsreg/ rin chen dbyings phyug mkha' dang mnyam srur nas// ngi las me yid kyil 'khor bgyid par bya// ra pa maN+Dal b+h+yo/ ra las ye shes khrag gi dkyil 'khor ni// 'dod chags pa
128b3(rnying rgyud): gtan sbyangs te// pad+ma dbyings phyag mkha' dang mnyam sbyar nas// ra las dalta'i dkyil 'khor ba phyed par bya// ra rak+Sha raN+Da la hUM/ baM las zhing chen gtam pa'i sna gzhi ni// zad med gter chen rdo rje rgya gram gtams// sangs rgyas dbyings phyag mabar da
128b4(rnying rgyud): nas// bo las zhing menas gzhi bskyed par bya// bai ti maN+Da la hUM/ kun tu bzang mo yum gyi mkha klong nas// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje brtan pa'i sku// srid gsum 'degs byed byar nan tan te// ye shes bzhir gyung rang bzhin sbyin 'khyab// dka'i rgya ma
128b5(rnying rgyud): gyi mkha' klong nas// thams cad skyed byed yum gyi byang chub sems// dus gsum 'du 'bral med par chags pa'i klong // rang bzhin rnam dag pad+ma dA ga'i klong // ko rus ring ba rdo rje brag stengs na// dregs pa bsgral nas zhe sdang phung po bshig/ chags med nya'i
128b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang byung ba// bcom ldan dpal chen yab yum bzhugs pa'i gnas// b+h+rUM las bskyed pa 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // phyogs bcu kun tu rgya yongs ma chad pa'i// phyi dang nang med ye shes gsal ba'i ngang // rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i bzhugs
128b7(rnying rgyud): gnas so// oM gu ya a kra ma d+ha la hUM/ gu ya gsang chen byang chub sems kyi thig/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi thig btab pas// maN+Dal brgyad pa mtha' dbus med par gsal// mtha' gnyis ma spros
129a1(rnying rgyud): lce bzlum po la// lte dbus thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe dgu// dbus su dbang chen zla gam dmar po la// 'jigs byed mthang dag gru gsum 'bar bas brgyan// chags med pad+ma 'dab brgyad brdal bar// ya sha
129a2(rnying rgyud): 'thor pa cings brgyad pa// rin chen zu brgyad yin tan du tshogasung // mi drar mi shigs dordo bas bgod/ 'ab 'gro thugs snga 'od thang mang po'i thungs// ye shes pa'i ldan kya rba pa na yis brgyan// 'ab ba can du de bar rnams ras ngas
129a3(rnying rgyud): shes sgo bzhi rtsa babs brgyad dang ldan// b+har+b+ba skam blon mang po'i rdzogs pa la// gnam lcags ngung mo 'bang ba'i gzed kyis btab// zhing chen po mor sngol ba'o// gdung la// zhing phrin mang po gtams pa'i gral byam btang // zhing ban g.yang gadri rmo ngaphan
129a4(rnying rgyud): dang // b+hASh+Ta'i bo long sbrul nag rkun po dang // nyi zla gza skang mdo po'i tshogs kyis brgyan// khams gsum kun tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khong khyab// d+h+yaM gu ya maN+Dal tAM/ nong bu mu tig gaN+Dal du legs par bkram// a swa gang d+ha'i 'od kyis phyogs bcung 'phrigs// nor bu
129a5(rnying rgyud): rin po che ye brag tu gtams// rdo rje rje gcig rtse gsum rtse lnga dang // ma ni shes rab 'du 'bral med pa'i dang // dbyings kyi thugs rjes mtha dbus med par khyab// nyi ma'i maN+Dal gdan gyi khyad par ni// snang ba ma 'grags yo la khyab par bsgom//
129a6(rnying rgyud): sUrba maN+Da la b+he/ a ni ma skyes thabs kyi rang bzhin te// rig pa byang chub sems kyi thig le che// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam par rab snang ba// mtha' dbus med par gdod nas dag par bsgom// a tsaN+Da maN+Da la hUM/ bi ni chags med pad+ma dmang po'i mdog/
129a7(rnying rgyud): 'dad chags thams cad dbang bsdus yus bye mapar// badz+ra gas rgyas kyi dbu bang nas// ji ltar 'byung bar 'byung ba'i N+Dal bsgris// paM badz+rasaN+Da la N+yai/ hUM s+sa Na dzaT/ sa ta / b+h+rUM/ badz+ra hrI ti d+ya/ badz+ra k+Sha ya/ dz+ra gr-id+d+hi hrA rIs+t+wa~M/ bcom ldan dpa sa/
129b1(rnying rgyud): chog te ruH/ u mdog mthong ga nga gas byed kyar gyis brgyad// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dzA t+yan d+hang dkrug/ zhabs gnyis brkyang bsgyu nyi blang gdan pa bzhugs// a A dz+nyA sarba ta thAn tak+Sh+Na ya badz+ra swak+Sh+ma dz+ra Ar+d+han t+ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta lpags
129b2(rnying rgyud): ko&haM/ sarba ta thA ga tA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na gu ya badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&hUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&ha~M/ byol song gtso bo brgyad kyi gdan sdang na// 'jigs byed chen po khro bo chen po bcu// hU~M chen rdo bya daMH
129b3(rnying rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje ster dkar// de byug pa ljang sngon dkrug to me lha 'dzin// gshin rje mthing nag rin chen grul bum bsgoms// mi g.yo spug nag ral gri srin po thogs// rta mgrin dmar po srul zhags khyud chen gshog/ mi thub dmang s+ya ba dan rdung
129b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzi// bdud rtsi ldang nag rgya gram gnod sbyin bsnams// khams gsum ser ljang ne'u le bgegs chen bzung // stobs chen dud kazong gshel gtun shing bsnams// badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M kAr hUM/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha pi dza ya hUM/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha nI la det+ta hUM/ badz+ra ma
129b5(rnying rgyud): hA kro d+ha ya mAn+ta kehU~M/ badz+ra kro d+ha Am+b+ha a tsa la hU~M/ badz+ra mahA kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha a pa rA dzI ta hU~M/ badz+ra mu hA kro d+hi a mr-i ta kut+tA li hU~M/ badz+ra mahA kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hU~M/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ oM d+h+ya d+ha NI he ru ka/ badz+ra shrI ha~M ruka/ rad+da
129b6(rnying rgyud): shr-I dr-i ka/ pat+sa sh+le he dru ka/ kaMrma shrI he ru ka/ bi shwa sa nu shrI ti ru kaM/ gr-i h+ya saM ma ya shrI he ru ka/ yak+ka shI hi ru ka/ rar+tha shrI hi ruH/ rang byung khro rdu la bcu yid dbu stengs su// khrag 'thung chen po klong dgu he ruH/ ye shas chen po dbu rnams spun thub pa// bcom
129b7(rnying rgyud): khrig 'thung ba byed pa no// dbugasum g.yas sang g.yon dmod dbus ma sdug/ phyag drug khong la dbu sgronags pa g.yas// b+hU/ dzA chung baT+wAMg yon na bsdams// bcom ldan thag 'thung rdo chen po ni// dbug sum g.yas dkar gi yon dmar 'tha~Mng nag ste/
130a1(rnying rgyud): phyag drug rdo rje khan+ti s+thir g.yas// dung dmar rgyu zhags zhing chen khung gi khwa// bcom ldan khrag 'azung rin chen chen po ni// dbu gsum sngon gseng dang dmar ba'i zhal// rin chen gshol dang gtun shing dbyug zo g.yas// b+han+ta dgra sta gtun shing
130a2(rnying rgyud): rde'u chung g.yon// bcom ldan pad+ma khrag 'thung chen po ni// dbu gsum dmar nag sngo dang ljang dkar zhal// g.yas pa pad+ma rde'u chung lnga gri bsnams// b+han+d+ha kha n+do thod phreng g.yon pa na// bcom ldan las rang khrag 'thung chen po ni// dbu gsum ljang nag dmar sad de kang ba'i
130a3(rnying rgyud): rgya sa ma ngal gri zhags pa rnge'u chung g.yas// b+had+d+hi 'u chung dril bu kha T+wAM dbyug/ bcom ldan khrag 'thung sna tshogs chen po ni// zhal gsum dkar po g.yas mthing g.yon pa dkar// phyag drug gri gug rdo rje kha T+wAM g.yas// thod pa dri phe bu rde'u chung g.yon na bsnams/
130a4(rnying rgyud): ldan khrag 'thung gsang ba chen po ni// zhal gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmang dbus ma seng // gri gug rin chen be con g.yas pa na// thod pa dril bu cang te'u g.yon na bsnams// bcom ldan khrag 'thung gnod sbyin chen po ni// zhal gsum dmar po g.yas mthing g.yon
130a5(rnying rgyud): pa sngo// gri gug pad+ma dgra skra g.yas pa na// thod pa dril bu TA ma ru ni g.yon// bcom ldan khrag 'thung srin po chen po ni// zhal gsum ljang gu g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba// gri gug rgya gram ral gri g.yas pa na// thod pa dril bu rnge'u chung g.yon pa na// mi
130a6(rnying rgyud): gnas ye shes chen po'i klong dkyil du// sku gdung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// muM phaT kro d+hI shwa rI sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ye shes khrag 'thung dgu yi dbu steng du// mkha' mnyam klong gi dkyil 'khor gnam zhal ma// dpu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad zhabs kyang brgyad//
