130b1(rnying rgyud): dz+walar/ gsang ba yum gyi dbu steng gnas bzhugs pa// 'tsho med rdo rje cha mchog ta ru// dbuni nyi shu rtsa gcig 'bar// ma ma'i rgyas phyi na chen gtsug spyad dang // me dpag mad dang rngam pa gzugs pa dang // rin chan mang dang gathag tang bA ra /
130b2(rnying rgyud): gser bye dri bral snang ba dpag med dang // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor spobs pa brtsegs pa dang // seng ge 'bum gzigs seng ge rnam par rol// yon tan kun 'diri yi rgyal po dang // byams pa kun gzigs kun nas 'od zer dang // dpal brtsegs rgya
130b3(rnying rgyud): par gnon// rnam dag sku dang snre la'i rgyal po bzhugs// 'khor la mchod rten rin chen rgyal mtshan brgya// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag mtshan bskams pa ni// sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bdud rtsis mchod// zhabs brgyad rdo rje yum gyi rgya bar 'jig/
130b4(rnying rgyud): zhal bdud rtsi 'om bcud kyis 'bebs// dkyil 'khor bar khyams drang srang nyi shu gcig/ sgo bzhi lham sman gyi srang ma bzhi// grwa bdag rta mgrin me drung thod pa ste// mi dzub de langs tha byed rgyas 'debs ma// steng 'ag nga stobs chen khro bor bsrungs/
130b5(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi sman gyi pho brang srung mar bzhugs// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol// phyag mtshan bdud rtsirak+ta gtor mo 'bul// thugs dam bskul po snyad gsang ba'i glu dbyangs blangs// rol mo'i sgra dang bri stabs gar gyis brjid// 'og min
130b6(rnying rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas// chos sku skye ba med pa'i dbyings nyid las// longs su ye shes sgyu ma'i srung ldang ba// bdud rtsi yon tan lha tshogs spyan 'dren pa// dus gsum sangs rgyas sgra yi rgyan du bzhugs// ma mo mkha' 'gro phyag mtshan sprul pa
130b7(rnying rgyud): 'byed// 'bang ba'i gang dkyus gdul blos sor 'dul// tshe mchog te du spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// spun gyi lha stangs mkhor 'gro dbang du sdud// gnas yul ma mo phyag mtshan po ti mdzad// b+hag pa de stong klong nas khrag 'thung 'chang // rje
131a1(rnying rgyud): mo dbyings phyug spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// sku ni grong dgu khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i sku// gsung gi lha dbyangs rmad byung gsang sngags 'chad// thugs ni ye shes chen po gas pa ba'i dang // dgra klang he ru ka rnams gshegs su
131a2(rnying rgyud): gsol// bdud rtsi sman gyi pho brang rta mgrin su// gsang ba'i yum bzhi'i mkha' la sbyor ba mdzad// hUM mdzad stobs chen me rlung las kyis snod // d+hi mgrin dbang ga dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol// mi dge bcu sbyin phyogs grong rnam par 'du // da/
131a3(rnying rgyud): brgya mtho ris thar pa'i lam yang ston// rang byung dkyil 'khor ma lus srung mdzad pa'i// mthar byed khri rgyal rnams kyang gshegs su gsol// oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA dzaHhUM hoH/ gyol song gtso bo brgyad kyi wa steng du// stong gsum tho bar/
131a4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bzhugs su gsol// ta kr-ita khro bo brgyad kyi dbu steng du// sku gdung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhugs su gsol// klong dgu he ru ka yi dbu skyed du// mkha' mnyam klong gi dkyil 'khor bzhugs su gsol// khro mo dbyings phyag ma yi dbu steng du// 'a
131a5(rnying rgyud): med rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhugs su gsol// oM ma hA maN+Da la kAM ya bA ka tsit+ta ti Sh+Tha wAn/ dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// bdud rtsi sman gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i lha// khro rgyal bgegs dpung 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// khrag 'thung ye shes klong
131a6(rnying rgyud): dgu phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' spyod dbang spyad yum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'chi med rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho// pra tIts+tsha to// a la la ho// khrag 'thung rgyal po gar la dgyes// g.yas su thabs gsum bskyod byas pas// zhe sdang rgyad bcad thugs
131a7(rnying rgyud): mchog sgrol// g.yon du thabs gsum brgyad byas pas// 'dod chags rtsad bcad gsung mchog grol// dbus su thabs gsum brgyad byas pas// gti mug rtsad bcad srumachog sgrol// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab nye// spang bas phyag tu 'thung bar
131b1(rnying rgyud): g+ha// khro bdag chen po'i phyag rgya ni// spug nag cir yang 'gyur ba'i sku// nyi shu rtsa gcig dbu dang ldan// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag mtshan ni// g.yas g.yon dang po'i phyag gnyis na// kun bzang thabs dang shes rab pa rnams// de dag g.yas ga yon
131b2(rnying rgyud): pa ni// rigs lnga thabs dang shes rab bsnams// de 'og g.yas g.yon bcu po ni// nang gi sems dpa' yab yum bsnams// de 'og g.yas g.yon brgyad po ni// nang gi sems dpa' yab yum bsnams// de 'og g.yas g.yon brgyad do ni/
131b3(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' ya ba yum bsnams// de 'og g.yas g.yon brgyad po na// rnam thar zho ba yab yum bsnams// de 'og g.yas g.yon drug po na// rigs drug 'dul byed thub drug bsdams// zhabs brgyad khro mo'i dbu brgyad mnan// gsang yum thabs dang //
131b4(rnying rgyud): shes rab sbyor// gnam zhal khro mo'i phyag rgya ni// sku mdog skug nag dbu dgu la// bco brgyad phyag ni dang po na// rdo rje dung dmar dbug cing gsol// g.yas brgyad ko rI ma brgyad bsnams// g.yon brgyad phra men ma brgyad bsnams// zhabs brgyad
131b5(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung dpung steng brdzis// phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// badz+ra he du ka yi phyag rgya ni// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rje zhing dbyug kha T+wAM ga yas// b+han+ta zhing chen rgyu zhags khwa// b+h+yad+d+ha he ru ka yi phyag rgya ni// dkar ser
131b6(rnying rgyud): dmar sgo dbus smug zhal// 'khor lo dgra sta zhags pa g.yas// b+had+ha rde'u chung kha T+wAM g.yon// rat+na he ru ka yi phyag rgya ni// g.yas seng g.yon dmang dbus ma ser// rin chen gshol dbyug gtun shing g.yas// b+han+d+ha dgra sgra gtun shing g.yon// pad+ma he ru'i
131b7(rnying rgyud): phyag rgyan// dgang rje sngo lnga pa dbus mdam // padz+ra rje ba chung ngal khrig yas// d+hIm+b+ha baT+wAMg ser thod phreng // kan te d+ya/ ma phyag rgyan// dkar dam sa dkar ljang nag dbus// sngags ri'i gri dgas pa // b+ha tha~Md pa sno la// pi thAs na te sa// g.yas
132a1(rnying rgyud): TaH/ mthing dbus dkar g.yon pa dmar// thakhrag thab nA g.yas// zad pa dral na mang gson// dam chog bsung da hUM bya// g.yas dkang ga yan dmar dbus masar// gre thug dan chen portson g.yas// thadang dril bus pa lu
132a2(rnying rgyud): g.yon// gnod gyen khrag 'thung phyag rgya ni// g.yas mthing g.yon sdo dbus ma dam // praM khrag pa twa dgra p+ta g.yas// thod pa rdzil bu D+ha mar+tha// srin po khrag 'thung phyag sa ni// g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus ma ldang // gri bug rgya tha ma ral grig yas// thod parjing
132a3(rnying rgyud): thad rlung g.yon// 'ab ba'i gdanapa pakangs nas kyang // h+yag d+ha dbye mchod pa bzhes// ts+tsha sa hU~M tra~M b+h+ya ba ba la// dzarje ma 'chang ma'i mtshan// g.yon pa N+Di ng+ge'i rlung pa gzung // rnam par rgyal ba su mdag dkar// rdo rnga g.yas pa te rag sbyin// dardzag
132a4(rnying rgyud): brdzun pa spang ldan su// g.yas kyi dbyug to me dpung 'bar// g.yon pa mi lha'i rkang pa bzung // gshin rje mthing nig rin chen dkrug/ g.yon pa grul bum rkang pa bzung // migayo sdug nagang la gri g.yas// g.yon pa srin po dbyug pa 'chang // rta mgrin dam
132a5(rnying rgyud): pa gnod sbyin dbyug to 'phyar// khams gsum rnam rgyal ser lnga dgu// ne'u le g.yas pa bgegs chen g.yon// 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhengs nas kyang // phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa bzhes// rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag/ dam rdzas bdud rtsi chen po ni//
132a6(rnying rgyud): 'chi med dkyil 'khor che mchog dang // mkha' mnyam dkyil 'khor gnas zhal ma// su gdung dkyil 'khor dgu klong nas// mthar byed dkyil 'khor khro rgyal bcu// bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor rta mgrin dbang // mchad par 'bul lo kha ra~M khA hi/ dam rdzas bdud rtsismra
132b1(rnying rgyud): bad bzhin sa sal// 'thags la sa nags nas// na das dang// / sa rdzusmrams// dwanas mtshanan nga napa/
132b2(rnying rgyud): ba dpa/ rang thaMd cis thong gi dkyil bar dus// shin tu mi bad ba 'i thung rtson cing // yangasas pag te// sras ni myid dag tsha nyid 'i theg gsagags rnams rgyas/
132b3(rnying rgyud): byangs b+h+yaH// dang bangasu rjes dang da/ sags kya sa rjo pa spyod byed// sbyin ba// gsum pa pas da stod//
132b4(rnying rgyud): nagazhan ma thug// bzhi pa tshad byang pa yis dang sbed // zi lazhin na sa shes dang nita mdzin dpa la// sra pa kyang ba dga' ba'i sadang stod // mdun migs dbun ma ma mgo// drag pa zong dbyung ba'i sa deng spyong // thabs mkha thu na
132b5(rnying rgyud): gshin nga'i gshed// bdun pa ring du song ba'i sa dang myong / togs ldan mi zhes dbu ni dbyig seM ni// rgyu dang mig mi bras sri bye/ byin dam pa'i zhes da ni ba rgyam// dbu pa migs pa 'i ni masas nga byung / brjod pa ni migs dngan
132b6(rnying rgyud): 18// brgyad rgyas kyi smin gyi sad+yang snyeng// mngon sangs la nas la // brgyag ci da tu ng+ge kyis dang byung // brad ma byen la gas // mchags pa drican gyis dang stong// byams mtshan mo shes sa r+b+ba t+te ts+tsha// migal
132b7(rnying rgyud): su sa sa mu sa
133a1(rnying rgyud): slebs la ma shes na ga/ mtshan rdugs da 'chang gas dang stod// 'bar 'an pa zhes tate // chos nyid bde brgyan pa sa dang srid// rtags ldan la shes batha druka/ ma spangs san rnam
133a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs ye shes dpal chen he ru ka/ kun bzang dbye ba med pa'i sa dang sbyor// za byed chos rna seMs mcho ga ha ru ka/ lhan grub yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa dang sbyor// ye shes chags chen rdzogasal phyag 'tshal bstod// yang gas rgyas pa
133a3(rnying rgyud): bcu rtsa gnyis phyag mtshan mngon sangs rgyas// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi dang po na// byed pa yid bzhin kun bzang rdo rje bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi dang po ni// kun bzang bya ba mnyam bzhag pad+ma 'phro// bzhi cu rtsa gtas g.yas kyi dang 'drar
133a4(rnying rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo bsnams// bzhi btu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi 'og ma na// skyed mdzad sangs rgyas spyan ni thod tshugs bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi gsum pa na// rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyed rdo rje bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
133a5(rnying rgyud): g.yon gyi gsum pan// kun tu bzang po mthar stong ril bu bsdams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bzhi pa na// rin chen 'byung ldan mchod sbyin re skong bskams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bzhi pa na// mA ma kI ni sung byeng rdo rje bsdams// dazhi cu rtsa gnyis
133a6(rnying rgyud): g.yas kyi lnga pa na// snang ba mtha' yas dbang sdud pad+ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi lnga pa na// gos dkar mo ni sreg byed zhun mar bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi drug pa na// don yod grub pa rdo rje rgya gra med sdams// bzhid cu rtsa
133a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis g.yon gyi drug pa ni// dam chog sgrol ma myir mdzad ut+pal bsdams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bdun pa na// sa yi snying po rin chen mu gu bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bdun pa na// lA s+ya dkar mo mo bong rgya ma bsdams/
133b1(rnying rgyud): bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi brgyad pa na// nam mkha'i snying po gcod byed ral gri bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi brgyad pa na// mA le sngon mo rin chen phreng ba bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi dgu pa na// sun
133b2(rnying rgyud): pad+ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi dgu pa na// gIrti dmar mo pi wang rgyu de mangs bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu pan// phyag na rdo rje 'joms byed rdo rje bsnams// lani bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon rdzi badrub na// steng du ga
133b3(rnying rgyud): pan bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu gcig na// byams pa chen po bdud rtsi kun+d+he bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu gcig na// bdug pa'i sprin 'phro mas ni spos me bsdams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu gnyis na// sgrib
133b4(rnying rgyud): pa rnam sil klu shing lo ma bsdams// bzhi bcu rtsa gtes g.yon gyi bcu gnyis na// dgra' ba'i mdangs ldarnams ni me tog bsdams// bzhi bcu rgya gnyis g.yas kyi bcu gsum na// kun tu bzang po rin chen snyom bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
133b5(rnying rgyud): g.yon gyi bcu gsum na// gsal ba'i 'od ldan mas ni zhu mar bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu bzhin// 'jam dpal gzhon nu ut+pal mthing ga bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu bzhin// rtog bral dgyes mdzad mas ni dri chab pa rnams//
133b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bco ldan// bgegs chen mthar byed rdung byed tho ba bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bco ldan// thugs dam yul byed ma ni lcags kyu bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu drug na// gshin rje mther byed// grwa
133b7(rnying rgyud): kyi dbyug to bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu drug na// gnas nas skyong mdzad ma ni zhags pa bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu bdun na// pad+ma mthong byed dgug pa'i sbrul zhags bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu
134a1(rnying rgyud): bdun/ rtagagra blags pa ngas ni lcags grag sasams/ ngan gtas g.yas kyi ba kyang na// gas ba sathar byed gcing ma dang zla btangs// da ba mag
134a2(rnying rgyud): gsung srog ma ni dril ba bsdams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu dgran// lha le thub pa pi wang chud 'dren bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu dgun// byol song zab pa 'chad pa'i po ting sdom la// ban ba
134a3(rnying rgyud): lha min thub pa thags bzang go cha bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi nyi shu na// yi dwags thub pa rin chen sgrom bu bsdams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi tha man// mi ya rngub pa gsil byed par du bsdams// ngan btu nA ga sa ga
134a4(rnying rgyud): ni// dmyal ba'i thub pa me chub si li drod bsnams// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa las// dbyings la ye shes tshe li mnga' brnyes pa'o// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// d+h+r-i/ yang sangs rgyas pa'i tshe mchog he ru ka/ ting
134a5(rnying rgyud): zhabs pa rgyad khro ma'i dbu brgyad mnan// rig pa yum la snang ba'i dbyings la sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi dang po bgrang pa na// thig le chen po'i ting 'dzin chen po dang // chags pa med pas mchog gi dbyings dang sbyor // zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi
134a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa bgrad pas ni// bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin chen po dang // klong du gyur po chos kyi dbyings dang skyod// zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi gsum pa bgrad pas ni// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin chen po dang // 'gyur ba med pa chos kyi dbyings dang kyor// zhabs
134a7(rnying rgyud): brgyad g.yas kyi tha ma bgrang bas ni// thams cad 'azung ba'i ting 'dzin chen po dang // zag pa med de'i chos kyi dbyings dang spor // zhabs brgyad g.yon gyi dang po bgrad pas ni// chags pa med pa'i ting 'dzin chen po dang // ye nas dag pa'i chos kyi
134b1(rnying rgyud): nga// 'thas dag ma tu sa sa// 'du / nga// das sa sa su sgyur// rnams ldan pa tugasu pa bzung pa// dmangs pa sa pa
134b2(rnying rgyud): sa
134b3(rnying rgyud): dang // bya ba lacan pa 'das kyi byeng pa dang byed// drang rta drang po'i byang ste yang sdig 'dzidu/ 'ikyi dang dmedan du/ ti ga pa ga 'tshal bgyid// 'dags kyi man pa das na
134b4(rnying rgyud): rnam pa'i zas gnas 'alas// sgyum dag dung cwo tshogs ma skye// kyi pa 'i zhes dbu // stong pa ba brgyad thugani rtag da tshul// stong na bdun ga nga dbang chu// 'das ca ga las kyi dang ga nga
134b5(rnying rgyud): yang ba med pa'i nag chen pa dang // thig sa rkyed pa byeng chub sems dang ts+tsha // zhabs bcu dag yas kyi m+b+hi ngas di// zong can dgu ba gsang de'i tig dang // bde ba chen po byang chub sems dang byung// zhabs brgyad g.yas rtse gsum pa gde
134b6(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba med pa gas ba'i b+hag dang // rdo rje lta bu'i byang chub sepas dang stong // zhabs pargyad g.yas kyi tham gangangs pan// 'ad pa med pa'i gsang ba'i b+hag dang // thams cad byung ba'i byang chub sems dang myod // zhabs brgyad ga yin gyi dang po sung
134b7(rnying rgyud): gdi sa dag pa'i gas pa rtag pa// rigs pa 'a pa'i chubs sa kyis// dab cad ga yo nyis bgangs na// srung chen shes pa'i phyag dang // 'ang ba ga/ ba bya chu ngas dang byung // zhabs pa ngag pa kyis
135a1(rnying rgyud): pa gdangs pa ni// rang bzhin med pa gsang ba'i b+ha ga dang // dmigs pa med pa'i byang chub sems dang stong // zhabs brgyang g.yon gyi tham gdengs pa ni// 'du 'bral med pa gsung ba'i b+hag dang // skye shi med pa'i byang chub
135a2(rnying rgyud): dang sbyar// gsang ba b+hag pad+ma'i grong dkyil na// gsang ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dbyings su nub// brdal khyab chen po gsang ba'i yum// lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub sems dang sbyor// bde byang chub sems ni thig leng zla// mkha' mnyam grong gi dkyil
135a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor de min nam// sa nu kro ti rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// shin tu 'bang ba'i khro mo'i zhabs 'og nas// khrag 'thung chen po klong dgu he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum mnan// 'jig rten rdegs pa'i khyo sheg dbang phyug dang // mya ngan
135a4(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i khro bcu zhabs kyis gnon// thugs kyi gdung 'tsho ba badz+ra he ru ka/ rdo rje dbyings phyag mkha' klong dag pa na// thabs dang shes dbyen du 'bral yongs kyis med// byang chub sems ni dngul zhun rin po che// me long lta bu'i ye shes de min nas// rdo
135a5(rnying rgyud): gyu rgyad// sa// sa / sa yongs kyis da// rdzu gA ma zhi nga// pan/
135a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung gnas chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// yon tan gdung 'tsho ba rat+na he ru ka/ rin chen dbyings phyag mkha' klong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// byang chub sems ni bai DUrma yi mdog/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes de min
135a7(rnying rgyud): nam// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// gsung gi gdung 'tsho ba pad+ma he ru ka/ pad+ma dbyings phyug mkha' klong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// byang chub sems ni pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ so sor rtog pa'i ye
135b1(rnying rgyud): shas dmin nam// mngon par byang chub srul phyag 'tshal bstod// phrin las gdung 'tsho ba karmA te ru ka/ las kyi dbyings phyag mkha' klong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// byang chub sems ni in+d+ra nI la'i mdag/ byang nan
135b2(rnying rgyud): tan ye shes de min nam// sprul pa mthar phyin skul phyag 'tshal bstod// rnam shes mthar phyin bi shwa he ru ka/ bde ba zag byed mkha' klong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// 'dra' dka' thugs kyi ye shes de min nam// dmi
135b3(rnying rgyud): med chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// gnod sel mthar phyin dam tshig he ru ka/ bde ba tshe 'phel mkha' klong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// dbyings su 'gro ba'i ye shes de min nam// ngo bo nyid kyi skal phyag 'tshal bstod//
135b4(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba mthar phyin yak+ka he ru ka/ bde ba rgyas 'debs mkha' klong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// klong du gyur pa'i ye shes de min nam// bde ba chen po'i sgral phyag 'tshal bstod// sgrol ba mthar phyin rak+kha he ru ka/ bde ba rmong
135b5(rnying rgyud): byed mkha' klong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes de min nam// lhun gyis grub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// sku gdung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor de min nam// klong dgu he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod//
135b6(rnying rgyud): sku gdung 'bar ba'i khro bo'i zhabs 'og nas// hUM mdzad 'dod chags rgyal po nyi zla 'dul// rnam rgyal ma byin len pa'i dri za 'dul// dbyug sngon me lha log par lta ba 'dul// gshin rje srog gcod grul bum 'chi bdag 'dul// mi g.yo dag 'tshal sla ba'i
135b7(rnying rgyud): srin po 'dul// rta mgrin phra ma skyel ba'i klu rnams 'dul// mi thub rdzun du smra ba'i rlung lha 'dul// bdud rtsi tshig rtsub sla ba'i gnod sbyin 'dul// khams gsum gnod sems can gyi bgegs rnams 'dul// stobs chen brnab sems can gyis bdag 'dul//
136a1(rnying rgyud): man+ta byA rtsal bcu ba man dam// gsum na pa sral lhag rgyal baspyod// yang sangs rgyas bden ga tu// sogan su myang da dus pa bdun pargyangs// gas kyang na pa dang kyang
136a2(rnying rgyud): ni// dbu zla kha ma nag rkyen du 'khyil pa ni// srid pa gsum lus rnam par rgyal bas na// 'bras bu su gsung thugs ni ldan gyis grub// srin mtshams khri gter gag stong 'gru ba ni// ma rig mongs pa'i 'khong ba'i rmad drang du//
136a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes klog 'gro ba'o// 'dir ba'i spyan bzang bums mgon ye re gzigs// g.yas kyi rtswa gcig mig zhe lagan// 'khor ba'i phrag bsngal zhel mnan te gzigs// g.yon gyi rgyag nagazung mig bzhog ste gzigs//
136a4(rnying rgyud): sdug bsnga la n+ta gams 'debs// dbus kyi rtsa gzig dbus su ye re gzigs// 'gyur med ches kyi dbyings las ma g.yas par// shangs nas bsal pa'i rlud dmar ldang bas ni// 'azung ba g.yul las chu ti mya ngan 'das// gsal
136a5(rnying rgyud): ya~M shes nyi tha'i snyan// nyon mongs rlo bas gdung ba'i sdug bsngal bsal// sra nyid ring bzhin med de sa mthar stong // rngam pa'i zhal gang d+ha byings mye la hi man// khams gsum dmang ba'i sdug bsdung po med ma dang// ti 'dzin dzad
136a6(rnying rgyud): mchem tshang yag gtsigs// lce shi gyad gcod mya ngan 'das par spyod// le brgan ljags kyis thog dang bu yug 'bebs// rgyu drug 'khor ba'i skam zlog zugs rje'i skyabs// dzas du lum rtsel mo 'bar te// can la chag dbang kho ma
136a7(rnying rgyud): pas// mchogs 'dus gyi rdul mi gnas pa'o// rdo rje rjer mo lcags rgya 'dzangs pa yis// skyeng ga byung batha~Md cheg dbu'i sal banyid// don chen gshig pa garten mags par bkag// rigs ra na mang ba cu 'i dpang ga rten mdzad d+ha/ @
136b1(rnying rgyud): rnam pa'i tsamachog cod// ngu rjod med po 'bar ba'i nga na gzhugs// sku b+had tshangs pa'i ga yang gzhi gsol ba ni// 'byung ba zhing gi lag rtog zang bcad nas// 'bras bu longs spyongad rdzogs pa'i sun brjes pa'i// su srang rtagagag thabs das pa
136b2(rnying rgyud): dpa' badza pas sa dugs pa gsu// nyid pa sa rnam pagis thaM da ba byin pa'o// 'azas thaskul pa ca pa tha brnyes pa'o// rma ca ma byung sas la ba // cis tho gyis pa dang lasam nathos pang // 'ang ba shA das /
136b3(rnying rgyud): cid yang thogs med pas// 'brus bu chos kyi su nyid btus pa'i// thod pa mang pos yul brgyan pa ni// dus gsumasangs rgyas bsnyen pakung dbul bar byed// gti ma blangs pa'i mun pa kun pas la nas// 'bras bu ba nyid kyi su brnyes par
136b4(rnying rgyud): nig ting ga dzin pas can pani// gdunan g+sa gas dbang brdzus nas// zhesnang bar bgyid rnaMm brgya nas kyang // 'bras du su su bzlas par// bu rgyu ni dpas can mams pacan// dod pan kyis mau ngas
136b5(rnying rgyud): zhes pas// thig dgas mi nas byungs so// bzas cu'i kyin pa su brnyas pa'o// 'bu dang gzugs brgyad pa ni// mam bya bang sa su pabar thos // 'dud chags zag ga mamasas nas byang/
136b6(rnying rgyud): rnaMgs pa dunas byung sa nA~M// khres bu mngan par byang chub su brnyes pang // bsu pa'i dung nga na pa zugs pa ni// dad das gnyis pa da dbyings sa rtags pa'i thor// ye shes rdza ldan su gsum mye gyis thab// du rdul drag pa
136b7(rnying rgyud): da/ lu ma ni nas ma nga'i gru rgyas pa'o// mdzad pa sangs rgyas su la cug tsal brgyad// dadu nyid ni shos su ma byos// lags par byags nas 'dung byas nas// gcab pa na mang gsopabya/ gas ma bya ba'i dbul pa la nyid// dngan/
137a1(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi cha gzugs gnas// rin chen skrag pa'i gzhal yas dang // thugs kyi bsnyen pa dang sems// gsung ge bsnyen pa sdung mtha' yas// thugs bsnyen tun ta du// s+yA dang gsung dang thugs bsas pa// bzad pa
137a2(rnying rgyud): du snyed bsnyen pa che// phyogs bzhi gzung thag thams gzung // g.yon kyang mtheb srin rdo rje gzungs// g.yas pa'i phreng ba rgyal gtad// g.yo 'gul med par bgrang bar bya/ 'dzab ni dbyings kyis bstod byas nas// dgu pa'i dbyangs la
137a3(rnying rgyud): oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i taSh+TahriHwa// sku gsung thugs kyi 'phro 'du yis// lus ngag yid gsum sgrib dag nas// yum gyi mkha' la bsgrub pa bya// yum gyi mkha' nas bying spros pas// snod bcud bdud rtsir slar 'dus nas// nye ba'i bsnyen pa
137a4(rnying rgyud): bdag rdzas dag pa sgrib chen thim// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtse chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i hud las/ che mchog rtsa bskyang ba ste le'u bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba'i don du 'di gsungs so// lhong sgrol gnyis kyis mchod pa
137a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba mnyes shing thugs dam bskrad// bar gcod byed pa'i nyams len la// rus tshod shes shing bzlog par bya// rarba d+ha ta ya thA tshal pa ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ bsrub kyang rtags med stong pa na// an+ma su tri pre du dza// rigs drug srog drang bro brdung bskor//
137a6(rnying rgyud): tshod gang la stong pa dgug/ oM AHtrAM sarba pad+d+ha a mr-i ta hi ya grI wa hu lu hu lu b+had+d+ha b+har+b+ha A yuSh+Te hU~M d+hIHtha/ srod gung 'jing dang rdo rangs dros// dus der stor na btsal byas la// dbug 'dren drag tu byas nas ni// 'dzab bgrang che ba'i yon tan brjod// slob dpo da
137a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'dzab bgrang zhing // rgyal po bzhi yis khro bo bzhi// dkyil 'khor lnga la 'dzab bskul bya// ba bar dag tu bshags pa bya// dgu pa'i 'do ba ni bgrang nas ni// che ba'i yon tan brjod par bya// oM las ye shes 'od thung zhing // AHyis mas bsam
137b1(rnying rgyud): tA la bar rlag/ hUM gis bdud rtsi rnam par dag/ sazas thams cad dbang du sdud// pany+tsas rnam lnga mngon sangs rgyas// a ni sne med chos kyi dbyings// mr-i ni bdud rtsi rnam par dag/ tas ni 'khor ba stong par byed// hU~M ni thugs kyis ban/
137b2(rnying rgyud): hriHni bag chags dbang du sdud// thA ni kye shi med pa'o// rtags kyang 'od dud 'phel sgra dri// ya mtshan byung yang bskyod mi bya// de nas bdud rtsi bskyil par bya// so sa mkha' la bskyil ba'i sngags// oM AHr+g+haM sarba paN+Da a mr-i ta kuN+Da li
137b3(rnying rgyud): dang sman dung rtsi dang nags// sman gyi srung ma bskul bar bya// de nas bdud rtsi dbab pa yang // lha mo brgyad kyis dur khrod sbyang // aM AHhUM sarba beny+tsa a mr-i tA me pra be sha ya pheM pheM hUM hrIHtha/ de nas bdud rtsi dbang du b+ha// oM AHhUM sarba paN+Da a mai ta tA ya
137b4(rnying rgyud): lu ru su Sh+T+rIH/ pad+ma pad+ma hrIH/ b+har+d+ha d+had+hA hU~M hrIHtha/ rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // pad+ma las kyis dbang du bya// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // dkyil 'khor zhugs pa'i lha rnams la// 'dzab dang snying po rkang thon dbul// stod chags
137b5(rnying rgyud): dbul nas ni// de tshe myur du dngos grub blang // oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta many+dzu shrI b+ha ba lo ki te/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hUM hrIHtha/ rig 'dzin rta mgrin che mchog dang // mkha' mnyam sku gdung 'byung lnga yum// bdud rtsi dbang chen kun 'dus nas// che mchog
137b6(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs yon las// dngos grub dkyil 'khor zhal bsgyur nas// mtshon ma rdzas la blang bar bya'o// oM AHd+h+waM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta A yuHpha la grA h+ye sid+d+hi d+hI dz+dzaHwa// oM bo d+hi tsat+ta k+Sha ya wA ka tsit+ta sa ma ya ts+tsha/ slob dpon rig pa'i me tog dang
137b7(rnying rgyud): sprin gyid dkyil 'khor bdag la bstim// rgyal po bla ma mngang gsol la// mched kyis phreng ba dbul pa dang // slob ma 'jug cing khu dbang nod// pho brang skyeng bzhig dbang bskung ba// tshe yi dbang yang bsrung ba bya// thob dang mthob rnam par brgya/
138a1(rnying rgyud): oM AHhUM sarba bany+tsa a mr-i ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hrIHtha/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ A yuHpha la gu h+ya a b+hiShiny+tsa hUM/ phung po khams dang skye mched kyang // ye nas sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin// rang rig sems su rtogs gyur na// spyod yul gang
138a2(rnying rgyud): rang sems gsal// rtog pa lha ru shos gyur na// lha dadang du 'bral ye nas med// rnam rtog chos nyid gsal gyur na// dgra bgegs tshang bcad bya mi dgos// ye 'byams klong gi dbang rdzogs na// rtags kyi phyag rgya bslapa mi dgos// phrin las
138a3(rnying rgyud): ye 'das na// bsgom bsgrub 'bad rtsol ming yang med// 'di ltar rtogs pa'i gdeng gyur na// bsgrubs kyang skyon med 'gal ba med// ma bskyabs skyon med lhun gyis grub// bsam med chos su nam mkha' 'dra// bsgom mad dang grang klong nas shang //
138a4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems rtogs na// 'du 'dzi byis rtsed ci zhig bya// thabs mkhas rol pa'i ting 'dzin la// tshe tshad sgom srub ci zhig bya// snod bcud thig ling sangs rgyas ni// gzhan nas btsal zhing ston pa med// rtogs pa klong du sus 'dral ba// mi zhes bya bas
138a5(rnying rgyud): rgyas yin// bcom ldan 'das kyang gud na med// brtan g.yo'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya rdzogs// rtog 'dzin sba mtha' ting 'dzin sngags// 'di ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ni// 'khor 'das yongs rdzogs brdal ba'i sa// sku lnga dbyer med dgongs pa yi
138a6(rnying rgyud): kun bzang thugs kyi nyid khu yin// rgyan du bsgoms shing bskyab byas nas// sih+la 'byongs na sems ngag lus// mthong snang rmi lam gang du yang // stong gsum nyi mas gang bar mthong // ga pur zla bas gang ba ste// mAM sa dur khrod gnas chen na// khrag 'thung ba
138a7(rnying rgyud): pa gsal ba dang // dak+ta khrag dang dri chung bcas// bde ga shegs rigs lngar mthong bar 'gyur// sa ni dri chen chu la thim// d+hu ni dri zum pa thim// me nid byung la thim// rlung ni sha ched nam mkhar thim// nam mkha' byang sems chos kyi sku// bdud rtsi sna lnga
138b1(rnying rgyud): songs rgyas sa// sman yad ma tha ma mdzad// gsung na stong po th+yag byag// thugs ni gsang ba man dag yin// brdzun sbyang ga bzang byung dang thol// bdud rtsisman dang dbyung // nyon mangs mi snang ma shes yin// rigs sbyar shes na kun pag /
138b2(rnying rgyud): bas// rdo rje rgyal pos rgya bcag la// slob dpon 'dza ba bzlas brtsedas// yum gyis ma mtshan che bar brjod// bdud rtsi'i tha~Mng nas dpung ngo // lpags brkyang nas gtang ma gtang // gting du sgra dang sbyin bklag \u0f7f// mthar sa ma la la nas
138b3(rnying rgyud): gtong ma mthang du dbyung bar bya// lhag chad bshags te dag par bya// tshig gis mched zla ngan pa bshags// gcig la gcig ni tshang bar bya// dkyil 'khor bsdus la ye shes gshegs// rang yul zhing dang bzlas pa dang // bu dang chung ma la sogs te// rang
138b4(rnying rgyud): lus phul pa yin gyis bas/ ci byor bam mnyes par bya// de ltang banosos shing bslab pa yis// sku yigs babasam mi byeg// chos du drim med pa thog// sgra ni thams cad de las byung // gzugs su gnyis sa byung ba'o// gsung gi gsang babasams
138b5(rnying rgyud): 'a kyi gas dang ldan// gsang nims cad da pas byung // gsung shang sa yan pa gargya chu thugs// thags cagabyung babs ma ma ga// bla m-ing dgangs par bying rmugs pa// rgyag mams cad dpas byung // ldan pa rnamagrangs
138b6(rnying rgyud): bas dungs dzin// brang gas thas pa da gsu// meb tsun gyi pa migs pa// rtags sung cig ga tu tu / gas trang sadung rgyas bad byed// dashas gi smras pa mdzang // bya byings dung can g.yas su byung// sras
138b7(rnying rgyud): bdud ci sdig cig 'thon// gsang ba'i ring 'asrem chen po gnas// rlung gi 'ad zeng tshang bug gro// zhes gsungs so// gdung dri byin pa rgyas ti dgas pa'i chu / babras bu mthang byin pa'i le'u skye smra ba // / de nas pa'ir rnams kyis sbyin
139a1(rnying rgyud): byu/ pa la mchod pa mang pos mchad nas 'di skad brjod cing ba stod do// phun sum chags pas gzhi bcas nas/ chog lnga 'i las gzung bskang / dkyil 'khor gsum gyis rtog pasrungs// garjes pa bzhi yis mtha' bsdus nas/
139a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'das bdud phyi skyong mdzad pa// ston pa khyed la phyag 'tshal mo// spyi 'i sbe zlab chen pa yis// sems cad nyon mongs snang bskyeng // nang gi bdud sgrub pa yis// rnal 'byor nyams kyi snang bshad// 'bras bu bde gshegs snang ba la/ nga
139a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor long grub// snang ba gsum gyi rgyun tshad pa// ston pa bde gshegs khyod phyag 'tshal// zhes baspyod nas 'khor rnams sbyin pas gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang par gyur to// de nas ston pa pa rnams chos kyi dbyings su thi ba nas/ gsang ba'i rgyud chen po
139a4(rnying rgyud): u mun gyi yul du dpal du ba lta bu'i mchod rten gyi nang du bzhugs so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos 'gro ba la smos te/ bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud las rdzas su yi rang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / bdud rtsi che ngo gas nyid
139a5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// / rtsig khyi ma khan tho ba ma la mdza dang / zong kyil ba gnyigs rgyun su mangs bskung ba'o// / rgyag na dadu/ a mi taSh+That+ta li a ma des su rgya d+ha pa/ bodad dang / dang
139a6(rnying rgyud): pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ye shes dpag ta med pa
139a7(rnying rgyud): dang bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad la longs spyod pa'i bdag po chen po de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rje rje snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i padral bzhugs so// de nyid la sogs pa rigs snga'i sangs rgyas rnams da/
139b1(rnying rgyud): dus gsum gyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches so la sogs pa rnams dang / thabs tsog tu bzhugs so// nar tsha 'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ben pa rdo rdza chos rang gi stan las bzhengs na
139b2(rnying rgyud): khams gsum gyi sems can ma lus pa rnams la thugs rje chen pos gzigs te/ 'di skad ces gsol ba 'debs so// bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// srid pa gsum gyi sems can rnams// tshe ni nyams byed rgyu dang rkyen// tshe nyams byung ba'i rtags dang /
139b3(rnying rgyud): tshe cho ga mkhan po'i mtshan nyid dang // tshe yi cho ga bya thabs rnams// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dam can ye chad sngags pas sems dkrugs dang // zhe sdang drag po'i
139b4(rnying rgyud): zod stong babs pa dang / rtsa bsku gsung thugs kyi dam nyams dang // gnas min gnas bcas gyur pa 'di rnams ni// tshe srog nyams par byed pa'i rgyu yin no// tshe yang dbugs spangs bgegs kyi dbang du gyur// chos ga nyams par byed pa'i rkyen yin no//
139b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor la khro zhing du skad 'byin pa dang // bzhin 'gyur spyod lam 'chal bar gyur par spyod// slob dpon 'tsho byed dus las g.yel ba dang // kha zas dag kyang yi gar mi 'od rnams// 'gro ba gang la 'di dang ldan gyur na// don gyi nyams pa yi rtags
139b6(rnying rgyud): yin no// tshe chog byed pa'i slob dpon mtshan nyid gsum// ting 'dzin phra mo las su rung ba dang // rgyud kyi don lam bas shing dang thob pa// mthu byin che zhing dam can nye ba gsum// 'di gsum gang gis bkug kyang khrig par 'gyur// mi mchog bla mar
139b7(rnying rgyud): 'tsho bsrung zhu// tshe tshig bya ba'i thabs kyi rim pa ni// bzung len sman gyis tshe rnams bsring pa dang // yi dam sngags kyis tshe sog 'gugs pa dang // bzang btung longs spyod tshe yi cho ga dang // longs spyod tshogs kyi tshe bsgrub chen po dang // gsang bar/
140a1(rnying rgyud): pa'angs pa bsgru rgyad// ma 'a kyis dag pa'i ma bsgrubabya// 'don pas gangags tsam gtams // zhes gsangs su// 'du las khyim thang dang/ klung gzha
140a2(rnying rgyud): ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis no nyams par byed pa'i rgyu rkyen 'di gsungs sa// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i dam can rnams// mo dang zla bar mchod pa'i dam bca' rnams// pra ti tan du
140a3(rnying rgyud): chos kyang snang ma ma lus yi chang nas// cho 'phrul mi sdug ston pas yid kyang dngangs// de kon mchog sri zhu 'khor dang bcas pa dang // yon tan mgron gyi dpal ldan mgon po dang // lan chags sogs pa'i 'grags rigs sde brgyad dang /
140a4(rnying rgyud): mgron gyur rigs drug sems can la// mchod sbyin ma btang bsung ma ma dgyes pas// rang sems 'khrul pas lus dag sems nang ldang // dge 'dun rnam gnyis longs spyod srog la rgol// dam can lung ma lha srin ma lus rnams// bskal
140a5(rnying rgyud): ni nad la rbad bya bas// dus min 'chi bar byed pa'i bar chad yin// yi dam dang gi srog ltar khur ba dang // lus ngag yid kyis bla ma mchod zhabs 'degs// sngags dang phyag rgya bar du mi gcod cing // gsang ba'i man ngag snod ngan mi spel la// lhor
140a6(rnying rgyud): sgrol la sogs spyad par bya ba dang // bdud rtsi rnam lha drang du len byed cing // nyon mongs ye shes ye nas mi spangs te// rigs lnga bsgrub par dam bcas de rnams dor // de dag tshe srog nyams par byed pas na// 'di bzhin gyis zas mched
140a7(rnying rgyud): chags// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba gyi meng kyi spyod las/ mnyams pa byed pa'i dru bstan pa'i skye gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyams pa'i rtags 'di gsungs sa// gang dag bgags kya
140b1(rnying rgyud): myo ba ngan// sa pa das pa na namong ba dang // mams du thong na ba dang // me ngapa'abral de da pa ga sus pa dang / dus kyis 'dus padu canams pas gas// nas dag song bya ba byed dang / yang byas pan
140b2(rnying rgyud): sngon las rjod ba dacing // de k+ta'i snying bzang byang dga' ba lta// skyes gang gyi 'bras nu mi gas pad+ma// da nya'i rjesang di 'di bang drug smad 'arjid// lus kyi mdag nyams dang sa mthos pa dang // da kyi na 'byung / gdangs shid na /
140b3(rnying rgyud): gis cho ga ngan gro la dga' bar byed// lus kyi spyod la madran pa mi gas ra hA// 'dra ba'i nad kyis lus la zin pa na// 'tsho byed ldan pa dus su mi khrugs shing // bla ma bsod nams che ba gzhan du shang// lus kyi stobs med kha zas yid mo 'ong //
140b4(rnying rgyud): seMd+hon nyams pas 'ang stongs zhan// zhes gsungs so// bdu rtsi kyil bar tsho med che'i rgyud las/ tsharnams pa'i rtags bstan pa lits+tsha ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma chog byed pa'i slob dpon sa mtshan nyid ba
140b5(rnying rgyud): pa'adi gsungs so// ya~M dam gsal zhing bsnyen pa zengs pa yis// dra rtags phra mo'i nus po sbyin pa dang // dmigs med de bzhin nyid la blo gtad pas// stong nyid phra mo chud la shar ba dang // rgyud de thugs la gsal bar mkhyen pa yis// chog ldan pa
140b6(rnying rgyud): da pa sgrings pa dang // drim dbang smras mthob pas byin dang ldaT// lus kyi rgyarnams bskyed ris sgra byud zhes// gas pa bang dngag la bsrung bas sngags dang ldan// bzlas pa'i thabs pa shin tu bus pa dang // shes rab po byed yid la gnas pa mim
140b7(rnying rgyud): nas kyi bdu rtse spyad kyis ye shes myong // bdido can dbang ge nying po zung sa goms// gzungs ma mkha' nas byung sems rang 'a spyad// lus ngag yid rnams dag kyir dbang rnams thob// dab rdzogs rgyad ma byen yan lag ldan pa yis// mthu dang
141a1(rnying rgyud): byin pas dang gis che ba yin// nyis gang tu shang bar ldan pa sa la// yon tan rgyu ma can sang sa nya// 'di ldan pa sa'i mtshan nyid yod par// gyis thams smra 'dags yongs pa gaspyod// nang na thams dang blangs da
141a2(rnying rgyud): shar// gsang ba'i thams lhan cig rjes pa ston// de nyid tha ma'i chos rnams shin tu dag/ 'di yis tshernams drag par theb sa thal// gang nams skyes bris brtson 'gras rab bskyeng ngas// bla ma 'di la tshachas rgyung du zhus// zhes gsungams// badz+ra
141a3(rnying rgyud): me ci'i byar byas/ tshe chog byed pa'i mdzan po tham bstan pa'i leb ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcud yin man thos tshe bsring ba gsungs so// gang zhig bzung yang sang kyis chernams bsring // shing gi 'bras pa
141a4(rnying rgyud): pa dang // rdo la bzung la brten nas thang bya dang // hrI li rtsa ba rnams su srung ba dang // sha yi rigs kyis ngornams ma bye zhing // sa ma~M zhags rnams zas su bskyed cing // chu yi rigs na na sam du tung ba bya// 'byung ba'ang rnams ldan pa maru
141a5(rnying rgyud): nus pa'i bcud ldan ldan mchog bdur// tshwa ba'i nang sel grang 'joms spu ngur// rgyam lnga bcu chu yi nang du spang // khub btsag nas 'bri mar bzang po dang // ngo ma chu dang bcas nas bskus pa yi// spen mang bsten pas skra dkar gnyer ma med pa dang /
141a6(rnying rgyud): lhas ni shin tu bde bar byed// 'du ba'i nad kyis mi 'jig tshe yang brtan// 'bras bu gsum gyi bcud ldan mo rnams spyod/ tso ni me yis bzlas pa'i phye ma dang // thag zhun chu yes ba zu ba'i khu ba dang // bud ma steng la rtag tu zas su bza' // nad rnams
141a7(rnying rgyud): shong nas bzhin dus/ shing shag tu dang // gan tu bzhi da/ the ba'i rje dam ni ci skyas sa te// yang da lazung su tshogs pa rtse/ khang kyis brjod pa 'olas ga// chu las mtshan sa
141b1(rnying rgyud): dkrugs pas 'jusnya mkhas pas sbyang bar bya// rtsa ba lnga yi sman mar nad rnams sel// rgas su lus kyi nyams stobs bcud mdangs 'phel// tshe sog brtan par byed de nyams su zad// dpying rtsad paskal pa mchil pa'i sha/ sbrul gyi sha dang dbang po lag
141b2(rnying rgyud): pa dang // bu ram sbrang rtsi cong zhi rab sbyad zos// rgas pa ro sra lus kyi zung rnams rgyas// mig rno gzhon pa'i lus dang 'dra bar byed// tshe chog yin phyir dang du blang bar bya// sa yi zhag rnams zas su za byed na// dang pos bdag klu gtan redas nas//
141b3(rnying rgyud): sbyin la bzang zhing sbrum pa'i sa rigs nas// gtor ma byin la yi dwags sogs la bskang // bdag por snang ba rnams la zhu bar bya// tshang ngam rgyal sbyar te btung ba yang // khro bo dkar po la gri thod pa 'dzin// bsgom nas bdud rtsi dbyin brlab bzang bar bya//
141b4(rnying rgyud): l-ig na bul tog sa zhag bsres la bza'// chang zhim lho ru btung bar bya ba yin// sa yi lha mo che yi bdag mo yi// bsgrub pa'i man ngag tshe yi cho gar bsrung // chu yi rigs rnams skom du btung ba yin// dang po nas gdus che ba btung ngad b+ha// kham
141b5(rnying rgyud): log brung na bu ngam mur bar bya// de nas tshe med pa yi chu bzang la// bskol grang byas te mang du 'thung ba yis// srin gyi rigs rnams phyi ru 'thon pa dang // kham log zung na rus khu bzang po gtang // 'byod par gyur nas rtag tu chu grang btung // 'dis nis bdag klu
141b6(rnying rgyud): gnyen ma lus pa'i// tshe yi bang chad sel bar byed pa yin// chu goms bzang po rnal dpyod pa yis bya// de la bcud len rigs kyi sngags 'di gsungs// AM A mi de wa hrIH/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hrIH/ A yudz+nyA na puN+ye swA hA/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tsha
141b7(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ bcud len sman gyis cho bsring ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yi dam sngags kyis tshe srog 'gugs pa 'di gsungs so// tshe srog brtan pa'i yi dam sngags bsgrug 'di// tshe bsring nad sel rgyal po
142a1(rnying rgyud): !/ yin par gsungs// dang ban sreg rten byed steng nyid las// chad pag med pa sna ga dkar dang skyed pasam// g.yas pas gan nag yon pa mnyam bzhag steng // chas tham par btu bzhag par// ru rgyum
142a2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin can// 'od 'phros bkug nas rang la bstim par bya// na mo b+ha ga l+yA ti/ a ba ri mai ta A yu dz+nyAn su bi nidz+dzid+ha ti dro d+ha dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ar ha nyisam+b+ha br-i prad+d+ha yaM/ tA b+h+yaSh+Ta/ AM sarbas skar ba ro shrad+ha d+harma te ga ga nA sa mu dag ti/
142a3(rnying rgyud): s+yASh+Ta 'i marnam dz+nyAn ya pa de wA ra swA d+hi/ zhag dri la ni brgyartsa bzlas// chu sgrog par chud med par 'gyur// tshe dring nad sel thugs dam ni// nangs par nyim shang ba'i dus// shar gyi phyogs su 'baltas la// nam khang na pa'i kyi la yong la/
142a4(rnying rgyud): dpag med pa mdog dkar zhing // phyag gi bdud rtsi lhung bzed nas// 'chi med bdud rtsi 'gro sbyin btang // gsil byed kha bcad skyil krung bzhugs// bdag gis mchod de gsol ba gdab// hrI shar phyogs mngon par dga' ba na// tshe dang ye shes ba
142a5(rnying rgyud): po khyed// bdud rtsi'i lhung bzed kha phye nas// gsol byed 'byung ba rin chen nas// bden pa bzhi rtogs chu bo phob// bdag la tshe dbang bskur du gsol// tshe dang bsod nams rgyas par mdzod// dus 'dir ba dag la bdud rtsi phob// ces pa sna yi rlung gis ni//

142b6(rnying rgyud): par bya// tshe bskyed pa la rnam pa gnyis// zhi ba ye shes tshe dang ni// rol pa khro bo'i tshe bskyed do// tshe 'gugs pa la rnam pa gnyis// 'byung ba chen po lnga yi tshe// 'bras bu byang chub sems kyi tshe// bstim pa lus kyi gnas lnga ru// sku gsung thugs dang

143b2(rnying rgyud): grub// thugs ka'i dpal bzla zla gsang gzhunas// hA ldang gsal ba'i 'phro 'dulas// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs btsunas// thug dog chen po drug pacom te// rgyagasang ba'i byang nab se na// rdo rje'i cha chung ba tu bsgom//

147b7(rnying rgyud): po bsnams// 'thob yongs kyi tshal mang mdzadangs// rdorje chasachog 'brug pa'i las mdzod cig/ nub phyogs pad+ma'i zhing khams nas// dam mi spyan phrag rigs kyi yum// phyag na ci da dmang po bsdams// 'gro ba sangs kyi tshe la mnga' mdzad ma//

148a5(rnying rgyud): spang gran thong // bad+ma'i gdan la gzhal yas khang // rtsen ming gi pag can// den ba rnams la bachod pa'i byed// 'dulag/ la bzhin drugashegs su gsal// zla'od ljang bu'i dmi 'bangar nas// ljang du sbyin phrag rigs kyi khrus// drang na
148b1(rnying rgyud): yungs ma yang gnas kyang // pad+ma gdan la gad la yas byung // mnang ling gi la gcan// gtso ba rnams la mdzod pa'i gyur// tsha yi l+h+wa ma gshegapa sa gasnyom// oM m+b+has padz+nyAn ma ba du ma thA mak+Shata/ sa mnas da// ngan
148b2(rnying rgyud): na/ rjes rbad yadzAH/ oMt+ma/ \u0f7f// rdzog 'thag par ston// migs par gyur bgrags pa da kyil ba nas// gas lhags 'a pa 'thos pa mas// gas
148b3(rnying rgyud): mgon mdzod cig/ swa lus dmar po brgya byi ni bzhugs pa la// lag pa lcags kyu dmar po thogs pa ni// brgya byin 'khor bcas lag nas tshe khug cig/ in+d+ra ya tshe hUM b+h+rUM/ drang srong me lha'i lag nas tshe 'bugs ma// rdo rje shang lang la ga ta 'phar ba'i ma
148b4(rnying rgyud): kha dog dmar sar las ni tshe khrag cig/ hrIHa b+ha ye b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ grul bu ma 'jig rten gshin rdo'i bdun sprul nas// dpa' ma gyogs thugs kyis rgyags pa'i lo nya ni// sngon mi mo thogs ldan den chen zhags pa ma// gdug pa gshin rdo la gnas cho drangs shig/
148b5(rnying rgyud): ma d+hU trAM/ srin po gdan 'bral lag nas tshe 'gugs ma// sku mdog ser sa nyi ma bu don rigs// rdo rje cod pan mang po gshibs nas ni// srin po khang bu rdul du 'joms pa'i mo// dbyar gyi sprin phung 'bregs pa'i khro gnyer 'dra// zhe sdang srin po'i lag
148b6(rnying rgyud): thug cig// ni ri ti ye 'aM d+h+we/ nub phyogs grwa yi 'jig rten rab 'byams nas// 'gro ba'i ma thog tu sa klu yo rigs// kha dog me sbyar 'bar ba'i mdog can no// thugs rjes klog byed 'thor lo bsdams pa ni// klu ma gnas nas tshe drangs ponyi tshe mchog ma/
148b7(rnying rgyud): ga barba Na sa ts+yag+h+r-i NAM// rlu phyogs spyod lag nas tshe 'bugs ma// khro mo thu mdog sngo bya thal ba'i mdog/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan lag na 'phyang ba'i mchog/ rlung byung byam ni rdul du brlag nas kyang // rlung tu 'khor bcas lag nas blo drangs shig/ bA yaT tsa stAM/
149a1(rnying rgyud): gnad ldan lag nas tshe 'gugs ma// kha dog ljang gu 'bar ba'i bu mdog la// ral gyi u t+pal 'dra drangs nas kyang // gnod sbyin 'khor bcas lag nas tshe drangs shig/ ku ba dA ts+tsha b+hU d+hA/ bgegs kyi rgyal po'i lag na tsho 'grags ma
149a2(rnying rgyud): mdog ldan sna tshogs kha dog ljang bu'i rigs// dbu mang phun can rdzu 'phrul gdug pa'i phyag/ rin chen mtshon cha sna tshogs dril nas ni// bgegs kyi khyim rnams thal bar brlag nas kyang // bi nA ya bA'i lag nas tshe khru gcig/ bi nA ya ka
149a3(rnying rgyud): skar lag nas tshe 'gugs ma// kha dog dmar ljang nyi zla'i 'khor lo 'phen// nyi ma'i khyim dang zla ba'i gnas rnams dang // nyi zla gza' skar lag nas tshe khu ga cig/ sUr+ya tsan+da ya tshe b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ sa 'og sa 'dzin lag nas tshe 'gugs ma// ye shes ti pe 'dzin lhag pa'i
149a4(rnying rgyud): gri yis// phyag mtshan sru kri bsdams pas tshe khug cig/ rA ka pra we thA ya tshe TA t+taM/ muk+ta ho yis bshig pas rdo rjed gyur// rdo rje nyi zla rgya gram gyis// nr-i la bstim nas sba bar bya'o// oM pat+tA n+ta kr-i ta h+ya kI wa e ka/ dza ti hu lu hu lu hU~M b+h+yo hUM/ takr-ita dmar po skal
149a5(rnying rgyud): phyag gnyis pa// karma rgya gram bsnams nas yum dang 'khril// a ka tsa ti khaT+wAM thod pa bsnams// thugs kar tshe dbang bsdus nas bsrung ba yis// stong pa'i dbyings su tshe sbas nas// chos kyi dbyings nas ye shes gsal// zhes gsungs so// bdud
149a6(rnying rgyud): 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ tshe gzhan gyi kha skong gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe'i cho ga kun la 'gro ba 'di gsungs so// tshe bsgrub kha bskad nyin gcig pa'am// gang yang rung ba'i bya ba ni// bum pa chang bkang mo rgan
149a7(rnying rgyud): bca'// mda' dar dmar po ma long thogs// rigs lnga so so'i snyid po'am// kyai bsdus bgrangs la tshe bum pa nyim// de nas tshoni dgug pa bya// oM pu N+ye puH/ ma hA pu tse/ a pa ra me ta A yudz+nyA na/ sas+tha ro pa tsi ta swA hA/ hUM bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag
149b1(rnying rgyud): thub pa'i rnamam lus stsal// mtha' dang mnyam pa' duyanga'ab// mnyam thad bral phyag 'tshal la// bcom ldan mnan sa chud pa ga mang// gsung macab rnam pa dag pa'i gsung // mnyam tad gsang la nags pa //
149b2(rnying rgyud): dpag med// thugs mchog rnam par mi rtog thugs// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba// mnyam nyid thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// a T+Tad+halo tsamA A yu Sha ma/ badz+ra lo tsam+b+ha mA yu Shen+te/ rat+na lo tsanA A yudzes/ pan+da lo d+han+ta A ya
149b3(rnying rgyud): lo tsa nA A yu She A/ hUM nam mkha' dbyings phyag ma nI ye nas rnam par dag/ rdo rje dbyings phyug ma ni ye nas skye shi med// rin chen dbyings phyug ma ni dgos 'dod re bslongs// pad+ma dbyings phyug ma ni 'dzin med chags dang thal// las kyi dbyings dpag ma ni mngon
149b4(rnying rgyud): spyod phrin las mdzod// dbyings phyug chen mo lnga rnams kyis// rdo rje tshe yi dngos grub stsol// oM badz+ra A yu She a/ hUM shar gyi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// gsang ba'i lha mo rgyas 'debs ma// rigs kyi lha mo sangs rgyas spyan// phyag rgya'i lha mo lha gya ma//
149b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i lha mo d+hU pe ma// 'gugs pa'i lha mo lcags bu ma// tshe bdag chen mo khyed rnams kyis// shar phyogs dri za'i lag nas tshe drongs la// shar lho me lha'i lag nas dpal stobs shig/ badz+ra aM ku sha dzaH/ lho mi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// gsang ba'i lha mo brgyad
149b6(rnying rgyud): ma// rigs kyi lha mo mA makI// phyag rgya'i lha mo mA le ma// mchod pa'i lha mo puSh+pe ma// 'ching ba'i lha mo zhags pa ma// tshe bdag chen mo khyed rnams kyis// lho phyogs gshin rje'i lag na tshe drongs shig/ lhonu srin po'i lag nas dpal skyobs shig/

151b2(rnying rgyud): byams pa'i ljags byams ni zhi bas 'gugs// lci rje'i zhags pa mas ni rgyas pas 'ching // dga' ba'i lcags sgrog mas ni dbang du sdud// btang snyoms dril bums ni drag pos 'bebs// lha mo nyi shu'i thug kyi dpal po du nas// rnal

153b1(rnying rgyud): dngos su ba bsrub// oM ru ru sU du drol tin+ta mr-ir+t+ta bcan sa a rba sAd+ha nA A yudz+nyAn zin du thA/ a par marta / b+hung dbus kyi mgon po tshe dpag med// yab yum thugs kyi gdu nas// A yu dmang pa rang zur nas/ dran pa zugs rgya rang nan
153b2(rnying rgyud): dzas la panyi ma zhing bsgrub par bya// byang phyogs nub phyogs pad+ma dbang gi dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan bya mos mgon tshe dpag med// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor zla gsang ga'u nas// byang chub sems kyi A muHdmad po 'di// rtse gcig dbang gi sa
153b3(rnying rgyud): lags na// byin gyis brlabs shing bdag la dngos grub stsol// rigs kyi rgyal ba yab yum rnams// tshul mchog 'di yis shes par bya// tshe yi pho nya btang nas kyang // srid gsum gnas nas tshe srog ni// yi ge nr-i ru bsdus byas nas// gyang sa
153b4(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po yi// kun gzhing rnam par shes pa nyid// A yuHdmar po shes par bya// skye ba med pa'i sems nyid 'di// 'chi med rdo rje zhes bya ste// mi 'gyur g.yung drung ye brdal che// mi nub ye shes rgyal mtshan yin// de lta bu yi dngos grub ni//

153b7(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i rdzas btsal te// mdo sde zangs gzhor 'khor sbed du// kr-i ya nyaM phyis rung chos la// ma hA s+yo ba bdun padzo// bya rgod dang gi sbubs bltas te// zhun chen mang ming gzugs bdun pa// 'am shel mig dpral dbyibs che// sbeng dun
154a1(rnying rgyud): rang thal byung // drangs 'khang bar med pa yis// rmo rnams tshor bas blazungs zlag bzung // spyod ni gzhal yas bang d+ha dngas// byams sad+d+ham+b+ha // lung sang zhal gcig sdug sazhes// da sngug ga yas pa

159b3(rnying rgyud): hU~Ms// nyer gcig zas namis mi thung // blag cig kyis na nad sbyin spyad// ba gnyis kyis snang bang ldad// tha ba gsum gyis zag pazang // thob pa ni yis rdodzang 'byung // rdza ba lnga yis rig 'dzin copa// nye shing rje ba gtan du bdung // dam pa cing
159b4(rnying rgyud): bzungs na// nam yang dag yang chung nus// rnaMn stong gi dpa' ba bgyur// rdo badrud cing no rje dang du// shing brgyad mjugs mdog paH// zla byed par rlam sa nas ni// gzus kyis dag bdun srang // phyung la thag gnas dkyi kyig//
159b5(rnying rgyud): sa nyon na bzhin// ring thos na mob thung// sa dang rdza jal dpag med byung // dzad ldananas can kyad pa dang // blangs pa mang rdo bang byung // zas dpe ma kun la phang // dzod ldan zungs thab tshad byung // bud med thosan nang byen pa
159b6(rnying rgyud): sus tsam tid dzin pasul 'a 'dzur/ bsreg dang gnis dang bar 'byung // 'odi ldan dang gzig min// des ma btang ba // ba yi ma dang snar byas nas// gnam stong dus su sring thaM thug/ TIg brten cing theg yin// 'do ba
159b7(rnying rgyud): 'thung ba bang zer// 'od ldan gyi pa'i gzhang mi mar// byi'u bar shadung skyed// rdo rje la thug spyad na dam// 'od ldan ga zung hU~M rtsi dang // shing cha bud med nu dang sbyar// cug nas skyed na tshe zhing bde// 'od ldum bug chos ldang rgyan dang // shang shA
160a1(rnying rgyud): ca dasang ga bca rnams// tha 'am la sa mi gzhan// srung te bud mdal ba ma/ phan chos 'ong da yis// byed par mo bsnang sa dam ma// srag sos d+hA gang shang rnanas
160a2(rnying rgyud): srang mang la btab// bud me dang thung na pa ba 'byed// 'od ldan lngam bcud dbang lag dang / 'am nyenya shing rdo khab len// bud med zas te ga ny-id la// lcags pa byi na pade ba 'dra// tho la mo la byas kyang 'grub// shA dkar nyams 'phel
160a3(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang yang dag pashang bye ba// 'od ldan lnga ba'i khaN+Da lis/ sha yi brgyad rnams 'phel bar byed// ram nye'i khartas dus brdung 'phel// nye shing khaN+Das chu bcud srud// sa shug khatas grang ba sel// 'dam bu'i khaN+Das mig lA phan// gze ma'i gnas
160a4(rnying rgyud): sel// me tog khaN+Das dbang po gsal// lug phur brtas gnyid yang phebs// yungs ma'i khaHsa dug 'dred spong // bum ser la N+Das sha dug 'joms// tig ta'i kha rjes mkhris nAd 'joms// lga s+ya'i khartas stor khragasil// pi li'i khaN+Das mchin tshang se la/

160a6(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i mngon yis bsnun// ye shes 'od ldan rgyud las/ kha N+Da'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ye shes 'od ldan lho bsgom ni// blam dkon mchog gsum yin te// bskal stong sangs rgyas bla ma phul// bla ma lha dang btsod
160a7(rnying rgyud): med de// rang gi spyi bo snying ga ru// d+hun tshad med par bsgom par bya// mchog dang thun mong ci bas me 'grub// oM AHhUM/ gu ru gu ru gu ru/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ye shes 'od ldan lha bsgoms na// nga nyid che mchog he ru ka/ zha pa ga ga

161a3(rnying rgyud): pa ni// rang nyid khyab 'jug chen por bsgom// oM AHhUM/ A~M khrag rtsa zung/ rtswa khrag chung/ snying la rbud/ mA rA ya khaM/ 'od ldan bre gu gser thig la// 'bum bzlas lce la byugs gyur na// gsang ljags thams cad thogs pa med// byin dra
161a4(rnying rgyud): dngos grub mkha' 'gro lnga// bud+d+ha DA ki nI/ badz+ra rA ki nI/ rat+na DA kI nI/ pad+ma DA ki nI/ ka man+da ki nI/ srog gi snying po yi ge lnga// bru~M ha di nis/ bar chod sel mdzad dpa' bo lnga// bud+d+ha he ru ka/ badz+ra he ru ka/ rat+na he d+ha ka/ par+tha twe ka/ kam te rug/ gsang
161a5(rnying rgyud): bsrog gi snying po lnga// hUM nga tsa tri ya/ sde brgyad lha klu gnod sbyin dri// de ba ratA/ trA gar t+na/ yak+Sha rad+ha/ gan+d+ha r+tha ran+d+ha srid pa tshangs pa khyab 'jug ma hA de/ lo// de ba me dz+nye tri ni/ b+he tra b+hi tra b+hA sa ra/ a me rat+na/ ba suMt+tA rI ma tre/ ye shes 'od ldan rgyud las/
161a6(rnying rgyud): lha bsgom pa'i leru ste bcu pa'o// / de nas yang dgra bshad bya ba// ye shes 'od ldan palta ba ni// stong nyid rtogs pas nam mkha' 'dru// ye shes 'od ldan sgom pa ni// dang rig gsal bas nyi kle 'dra// ye shes 'od ldan spyod pa ni// dgag bsrub

161b2(rnying rgyud): ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ rgyas pa puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ dbang la pa shaM ku ru swA hA/ drag po la mA ra ya mA ra ya/ 'gugs pa la phadzaH/ dngos grub 'gugs pa la sid+d+hi dz+dza dzaH/ sid+d+hi trUM dzaH// srod pa d+ha d+haM/ gnon pa la dza ts+tsha \u0f7fhUM/ gzing ba la hUM phaT hU~M phaT/

165a4(rnying rgyud): ze la rtsigs pa bsrung // 'od ldan gi had gA r+Ni dang // btsan dug thang nu re lhag pa// shu dag gu gul mu zi nag/ shing kun tu stag a rung // ra khrag sran nag re re la// sngags 'di brgya rtse brgyad bzlas te gdags// oM AHtrAM/ badz+ra ka pra na brang ti/ tigatag
165a5(rnying rgyud): trar brag shig/ ta thA ga ta ya/ tsa la he/ duM hUM phaT/ sarba dzA d+hi ri ga shaM ku ru hUM phaT/ rdzas rnams smin mtshams spyi gtsug dang // mgrin khung snying ga rkang lag mthil// thugs pas sa bdag klu gtan dang // lhog pa 'bru mthong du gzeng rngub// gal nad mig
165a6(rnying rgyud): ser mkhris g+hag+na thub// ye shes 'od ldan rgyud las/ 'bru mthong bsrung ba'i le'u ste so drug pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bcud len sngags kyis lhogs pa sung zhing bsad// 'od ldan pong nag sngags bzlas gdags// a~M

166b6(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi len ste zhe drug pam// de nas yang dgu bshad bya ba// bcud len sngags kyis zho 'asrung ni// 'od ldan yungs kar sngags brgya bzlas// 'o blo bskol dang gnon sreg gdab// oM A T+Te/ tir ti kas na pre te srog rterla chod/ 'o zho lar k+Shar/
166b7(rnying rgyud): shes 'od ldan rgyud las/ zho bsrung ba'i le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bcud len sngags kyis 'bru phyugs 'phel// skar ma the yi nyin par la// lcags kyi byi ba'i gzugs nang du// 'od ldan rta phyugs snying po la// gong sngag
167a1(rnying rgyud): ma gcig bzlas nas// 'jog dang bar thus na 'brel// yags 'di ldan rgyud las/ 'dra lpags 'phel bar byed pa shA' stezhe brgyang ldan// danas pang dgub byug// btsu 'ad ga
167a2(rnying rgyud): 'brug// N+Da rin chen gzhan// 'ad ldan ri rjen mas// khye' bu meng byengad sems dang / bzang srin mi ga mur bya'o// de la brtag la mabs pas ni// gdod byin tu dbang mtshan pacin// denang rtsa mngon pa ga sa pa/ ra
167a3(rnying rgyud): brgya rtsir bas// rang gi thos par shAr ra yang // me lda na drims dkrug nu bsrung // dus min 'chi lnga rtsi bas pa 'grub// oM A t+ma/ tad+yaH/ na mo swA t+na bA ma/ nam pa b+had+ha ya ma hA lak+Sha sa na pa ta ye/ oM tri dang dkyu 'i b+h+yo bkya / ran
167a4(rnying rgyud): a d+hi ba ta d+he ba yak+Sha sa ma ya/ ma nu s+t+rai ra tri hU~M phaT swAH/ 'di ni yid bzhin nor gyu'o// ye shes 'od ldan hU~Md las/ tso bsum 'grub pa'i le'u stezhe dgu pa ni// / de nas yang dag bshad byeb// bcud len sngags kyis rdza ba dang // slar nag zong ri byi bslang /

167a6(rnying rgyud): bzlas te lus la thugs// sgrib bskyang bar tha tsho ma med// 'od ldan chu dang yu 'i'i na// drig rmang gtor na gyur nag thub// 'od ldan gtsang kha'i phye ma la// sngags bzlas gtod na bong ri dang // byig na khye'u thub// 'od ldan zhang thung mar bsres bug/ drag spang lus la po 'ad
167a7(rnying rgyud): na// yi nas 'od ldan nud las/ lnga bskur na cang dang / byi ba dadag rlung bu byi bsrung ba'i le gyi lnga bcu'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bdud la sngags kyis shogasol pa// zan gtong na can gag dang bangs// kha~M bang sdigs kyis mad chag
167b1(rnying rgyud): lA/ b+h+yob la gtad ste bden pa bdang // 'od ldan drug kun phrag drug dang // gartsi sbyi rgyargad thos// rartsa gdud pal mi thun sbyar// yang na mang nug gyur ba la// sngags 'di brgyabazlas lus 'thug/ mo A/ kha la tsabs nam du tu ye hAH/ zla ba ral lan dazug/ la rdzu
167b2(rnying rgyud): shig ni 'ong mi 'gyur// ye shes 'od ldan chud lam/ shig sel ba'i le'u steng gcig pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bcud len sngags kyis zhing lung bya// 'od ldan mi thun phug ron kun// lug mur sa rul 'ba'acha labs// bud med chus spang zhag gsum bskal// sa
167b3(rnying rgyud): mang nag zhol byas la// sngags 'di stong bzlas zhing la gdub// oM Ar+g+haM/ d+ya tI A dza d+ha ma hA si ti t+yai/ rtsa ba zug la zan sran \u0f7f// mig nad mi 'ong nas ldog che// 'byung rkyen phongs ni che bar 'gyur// ye shes 'od ldan chud las/ zhing gi me'i steng gnyis pa'o// / de nas ya

170b3(rnying rgyud): hrid na mya ngan 'das// bcos slad med par mya ngan 'das// zhes gsung so// 'khor ba bcos bslad med rto gla na// yid bzhin nor bu dang 'dra ba'i// gang ltar byas kyang lhun gyis grub par yin par ston// dbye ba med pa'i don rtogs so// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ni// nam mkha' bzhin du brtag dka'

170b6(rnying rgyud): yis// mi mthun pade sdug myong bar 'gyur// rdo rje lta bur gnas pa lngas// lha ma chu zla brag cha 'dra// zhes gsang pa'i tshig tu gsung so// kye k+She/ thug rje chen po'i byin rlabs las// stong gsum rgyal ba'i sgras gang yang // byang chub sems las g.yos pa med// dper na nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon bzhin// dgra
170b7(rnying rgyud): dmar sngo skyongs gzung med// de bzhin sem gyi rang bzhin yang // 'di zhes gcig tu bstan du med// mi shes par sngang 'dzi chen 'dra// de phying ma bcos de bzhin pa zhig/ ches rdo rje gsang pa'i tshig tu gsung sa// bde ba dag sheg pa kun gyi gtso// yab yum sras bcas snang ba yang // byang chub sa gying ba da
171a1(rnying rgyud): mas gas so// suzas pa mam/ sang ca ma/ ma med sa la ba ste/ pagapa pa rlos da ga sa rnams/ gas sa byu gnas// rnams /
171a2(rnying rgyud): dra bzhi sems kyi rang bzhin phyung // 'di zhes gcig tu bstan du med // bstan na ga drung 'dron 'altas pa'i chos// bstan du med pa bstan pa'i mchog/ blta bad pa btu ba'i 'chog/ bzhim med pa rnam pa'i bcag/ b.rung dra badra ba da pa /
171a3(rnying rgyud): drangs pa ni du na kyis thu // mnar ma bcos dbyings nyid pa// rang bzhin pa skyes phrab ba'i tig// tho ma gan pa las blang du ba sems/ drong tu bros pa ba gradzes// dpe tum bcin po// byang byams bci // dri
171a4(rnying rgyud): byung chubasams nyid la// 'khor 'das gnyis kang byung 'dang du// zhes drags dang rgyag tu gsung su// mem bde ga shegs byung byod// dmal 'a' bzhing du btag du byed// me yang bzhin dugab nga med// thab bzhin dang dang bral/
171a5(rnying rgyud): ni// bdag dang gzhan du byer meng // brtade dra bar pa'i chos nyida'ang // brjod du po stis go par stis// brdad byed pa da brjod pa'i mchog/ mnyan pas na bya ma shes 'byes// sgo brtog pa 'a du// nges pa'i do phyogs
171a6(rnying rgyud): did 'de tsugs na/ thob pa pasgrub brdzud dang yang // shes gzung drin cing 'dud// dbyer rtags badzin du 'am// rtogs pa gdang du mgyur // / slar ba shad pa 'thong ba'i rgya// rtogs pa gang gab tapa di// dngos drag gi gnas
171a7(rnying rgyud): grags pa // ngas pa dzin 'di 'dags na// mnyam pa zhag pa nosasang chags pa \u0f7f// sugra dgas tshas pa sogs kyad // rang gi rtag pa bas pa byed// dbyu rtogs brjod du da// rang tshogs pa 'di sangs/ rtogs ngas gnas
171b1(rnying rgyud): zug/ rtogs pa 'dan 'dang thags/ shes dpa zhi gshegs pa padapa/ du shi gshegs nyid kyis pa / danas ngag kyin gyigadam mtha' dad dpa ma med pa/ rung ba gang bang ma 'i gsun/ gnags
171b2(rnying rgyud): nga ba gnas/ bcomaldan das dung srong kyi bdag pazhes pa ba dang / gtsub pa dbri ba'i phrum dang / thugs pa chen dbang nga dud pa dgas byed can papa dang / 'dril ba'i yum dang / thugs pa mad pakhyimag d+han dang / yangasu
171b3(rnying rgyud): po dang bzlas nas/ rang bzhin gyi sa gnas so// de nas dur 'ad kyi bdag po mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas 'di spyad ces gsungs sa// kye ste/ gcags rgyam 'khor bcas kyang // rang bzhin dur khrong chen pon// mi'i thun ga ga pati
171b4(rnying rgyud): mangs drims gos pa med// rang bzhin don gyi dbyings na ba zhugs// rnam ma pa'i tshe 'phrul ston pa ste// rang bzhin drung srod dam pa na// gsung gis chos rnams mi ston te// grags kyis chos rnams 'dril bar ston// thugs kyi bdi 'ayos 'ang ma TI/

172a2(rnying rgyud): mig yo 'di ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yang yum chen mo nyid kyis mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// kye/ bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gtso// ma rig mun pa 'joms pa'i bdag/ kun kyang 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir/

172a5(rnying rgyud): skyil mo krung gis bzhugs nas/ rgyal po dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i tshig tu 'di skad ces glengs so// kye ma'o// rgyal bas 'gro don bya ba'i phyir// rigs kyi yum de dganyis med par// pad+ma chen po brdeg tu gsol/
172a6(rnying rgyud): rnams ma lus bskyed du gsol// zhes dgongs pa gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de nas yum chen mo nyid kyi bsam pa g.yos par gyur te// e ma ho// ston pa'i bstan pa bstan pa'i phyir// 'khor ba 'dus pa'i ded dpon gtso// dgyes pa'i rdo rje dbang po yi
172a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis med dgyes par gyud nas ni// gseng brtson char chen po to// sa ma maho// sa ma yar+thaM/ a nu rAg rA mi/ a mra ga N+DI D+hi/ dza chu ba hoH/ hUM hUMts+tsha/ de nas ya yum gnyis su med pa las/ blo dade/ blo mod nga sprul ba dang yang sprul bcas pa
172b1(rnying rgyud): dathon par gyur nas du rjerna na phaT/ badz+ra kIl la hU~M phaT/ ces don zer ba dadrag po'i grabyung nas/ 'jig rten gyi dregs pa sla bkod nas/ yang rang bzhin gnyis su ma dpar mnyam pa nyid kyis bzhugs te/ snga ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzhugasas/ cos
172b2(rnying rgyud): paza ba'i rgyud las gleng baspang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de ltar mnyam nyid kyi dang du gnas pa las/ bdag tu rmongs pa dang / rtog pa la mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis yang dag pa'i lam dang bral nas/ gang pa'i gas rab ma rdzogs par/ sbas pa
172b3(rnying rgyud): 'al mngon par 'tshal nas/ rgyu dang 'bras bul rmongs pas srid pa'i sa bon rgyab mar gyur nas/ rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so// tsha ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pas/ 'di bas kyang shin tu grang na ce me rung snyam pas/ shin tu grang pa'i nang du skyes te/ tsha ba dang /
172b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams brgyud cing / bskal pa stong phrag bcu gnyis su myong ngo // de nas yang yan lag sna tshogs pa dang / gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs pa dang / nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs par byed pa/ lha'i rigs dang lha ma yin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'bras pa

172b6(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi sras su bskyed nas/ sras ni chos nyid skye ba med pa las/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs sur bzhengs pa'i phyir na sras// mchog ni de las bzhengs kyang g.yos pa med// sras ni rdu tra 'dul phyir bde gshegs byin gyi sras// mchog ni de las lngal kyang
172b7(rnying rgyud): g.yos pa med// sras ni skye med sras pa rdo rnga gzhon nu'i sku// mchog ni gang la gang 'dul mi bzad phur ba drug/ ces bde bar gshegs pas byin gyi rlabs kyis bstod nas/ dbugasum phyagadrug dpa bzhi gcig tu sprul nas/ hU~MhU~M phaT ra Ta phaT ces khros pas lus
173a1(rnying rgyud): gcig la mag pa rgyar smras nas/ phyag namatshon mam tshogs pa b+ha skams pa/ 'khor rnams cad bsdus nas/ shin tu 'gyings pag dang bangs par gyur te/ \u0f7fhaM zhes shan dang myal dang bcas par sh+tsa hA// dan

177a6(rnying rgyud): gsus du ska nas kyang // byang chu sems pas rnam thos te// nga bang ba dam shegs nas kyang // gathag pams gsum gang pa migs// rlogs rab rnamam pa' bang // da thar ci ti byas te// darjem sha po dgang dag// 'ami ya
177a7(rnying rgyud): tems ba ca du 'dri'// kyang po'adi nyid kyis / tshu ma sa brtsims gyu/ nyi nyi dag pa'i phyilangab dis tu kyang // su tsun na na// bral pa'i dra bdas kyang/ badrung 'arjod na
177b1(rnying rgyud): du// ma sa sas ca ma da// 'ag ltangs // rnamapas lta ga la bar gyu// dab ga gagags cangs/ sa// sa / ga An/ tha na
177b2(rnying rgyud): dang sa sems kyi phung po tsa la// / khams gsum dang tha~Md khrag yin te// thigs rduchags pas bskul phyir du// srid pa gdang sha bcad nas ni// khyod nga rnam pa brgya dang ldan// glegs bya ba zhal bzad // srid pa dbang du bsdus nas kyang // / khams gsas
177b3(rnying rgyud): 'das par bzhom// 'jig rten kun las 'das pas na// lhan no por yang bdag nyid sbyor// 'jig rten kun las grub pa'i rgyal// man ngag snying khu gseng ba'i rdzas// 'dzin dang rtog pa rnam spangs te// byang chub sems ni skad cig ma// snong dang srid dang 'dzin
177b4(rnying rgyud): kyang // 'asam pa las kyang mya ngan 'das// 'jig rten las kyang mya ngan 'das// byang chub sems kyi golas bcad// grub mtha' 'di la 'jigs mtha' med// 'di ni mi 'gyur byang chub sems// mya ngan 'das pa rtogs pa'o// sgrib pa med pa'i mthar phyin pa//
177b5(rnying rgyud): rtsol ba med par ldan gyis grub// mi nub pa la rtag gnas shing // rdo rje yi ni mtha' la thug/ bgrang nus med par shin tu dpag/ 'di ni snyan gyi bu ga nas// sman gyi bu gar gang ba yin// rgya mtsho'i gting gi rdo ba bzhin// byang chub sems ni rdzogs so zhes/
177b6(rnying rgyud): ngan snying po gsal ba'i rdzas// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid bskul ba// mi zad gter du bzhag par mdzod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// bstan pa'i snying po de las med// man ngag bstan pa'i snying po 'di// don gyi bcud phrang sangs rgyas chu// 'di las
177b7(rnying rgyud): sa sa kyis nyid kyi mim byed no// rdo khris partsa ba'i byung las/ ting 'dzin gtan la babanga'i 'a du drug pa'o// / danas ldan das dang rdzun 'od rgyud kyis gdug bcan bas ngas gcig na 'i skyangs pa
178a1(rnying rgyud): // nas// dur khrod chen po yi grong na// dur khrod kyi ni gzhal yas khang // me lha drang srong sreg pa'i mchog/ lho nub srin po gnas pa'i sa// nub byang rlung lha 'bang dang dbye ba snga// byang shar 'byung po dbang ldan sgrol la mkhas// dkyil 'khor po brang gi 'gyur
178a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i mchog/ gdug pa can gyi mthu 'phrog cing // bsnyen srub gnyis kyi las bya'i phyir// bkra shis byin brlabs yod pa'am// rkang gcig pa'am rkang gnyis pa// gnod par nges pa'i sa de ru// phyogs skyong bcu dang rgyal chen bzhi// bsrung ba'i rim mtshul bzhis
178a3(rnying rgyud): maN+Dal 'dom gang gu bzhi la// gong du smos pa bzhin du bri// ma traM khog par gnas byas nas// phye med thabs dbyings phur pa ni// mnyam nyid skye ba med pas thebs// thugs rje'i phur pa thugs rje yis// log par 'khyams pa rnams la gdab// gsang
178a4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi phur pa 'di// rtog tshogs rdud phyir yum gyi mkha' la gdab// 'dus byas rdzas kyi phur pa 'di// bsgral ba'i zhing bcur gyur pa rnams la gdab// 'dus byas rdzas kyi phur pa ni// man ngag nyid du bkol ba bdun// med du mi rung de bzhin bshams//
178a5(rnying rgyud): bsnyen phur la yang rnam pa gnyis// nyung da kar dang ni phur bu dngos// lcags sna lnga'am bdun kyang rung // mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur gsum// sked pa rgya mdud gzhal yas khang // bcum gzhog la ni sor bcu gnyis// bsnyen pa'i phur pa de bzhin bya//
178a6(rnying rgyud): se ldeng phur ba sor brgyad ni// mthu 'phrog byin rlabs yod pa yin// de bzhin bya rgod gshog phur yang // 'gugs par bya ba'i nus pa yod// ser po gser ram yang na ni// ster ba dag la byas pa ni// zil gyis mnan pa'i phur ba yin// skyes pa dang ma rigs
178a7(rnying rgyud): can gyi// sbom po ma yin thur ma phra mo tsam// zangs sam mjo mo shing dag gis// dmar po dag la byas pa ni// dbang du 'dus pa'i phung bur bstan// tsan+dan dag gam rgya shug ni// gzi byin 'phrog par yang dag bstan// lcags sam shing ni dag po ni
178b1(rnying rgyud): dran pa slar pa mtha' dgag// drulang drag par dngadu // rgyags bya thab rngungs// btsun 'am yang na sa// dbazhin mang thang grangs kyis das// mthing dag dang thod pa dag dgas// zhwab mjam gsum kyad kyang rung // mthan dang dran na
178b2(rnying rgyud): nag po'i 'bru yis bkang nas ni// rim par gzhug cing byin brlab bya// mthing nag dar gyis kha bcad la// byin brlab dbang bskur gzhung bzhin bya// mi 'gyur po brang rdzas su dgod// me lha drang srong sreg pa'i ser// drag po'i hom thabs gzhung ba
178b3(rnying rgyud): tsher ma can gyi shing bcug la// ming dang dus su bcas pa dang // drag po'i rlung gis bskor ba'am// bsreg pa'i rdzas rnams kun kyang bzhag/ lho nub srin po gnas pa'i sar// de bzhin drag po'i gru gsum la// rim pa bzhin du rab tu bskor// men na ma ra
178b4(rnying rgyud): thod pal// gang yin ming rus bris nas ni// tha mar drag po'i sngags kyis bskor// gru gsum dbus kyi steng du bzhag/ ldog pa med par mthar phyin pa'i// brgya dang brgyad kyis phur par bskor// tha ma bzhin rtsang gis bskor// nub byang chung lha 'phang dang dartse
178b5(rnying rgyud): par// drag po'i gru gsum gong bzhin bu// thod pa dum bu drug gam bdun// mtshan ma ngan par gyur pa la// bri ba'i thabs ni gong ma bzhin// gang yin ming rus bcug nas ni// drag po'i gru gsum dbus su bzhag/ mAn dag nyid khu bskol pa yi// phurab
178b6(rnying rgyud): zur gsum dpal dang ldan// drag po'i gtod ma skyed du 'ged// khrag sA lnga dang snying wA wa// mtshanag nyung nug rdo dang mda'// drag po zod kyi rdzas su bzhag/ tha ma de ni rtsang gis bskor// byang gar 'byung po dbang ldan sgrol ba'i sar// gru gsum rim pa gro
178b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin bya// bskal ba'i rim pa gang yin na// snying gang rus la dpral bar mod// yan lag bzhi la yig 'brung ni// me ge mo ni dbus sug drug// mAr ya yis tham bskor// gu gsum dbus su gzhug par bya// tha mthang gis de bzhin bskor// dbus kyi
179a1(rnying rgyud): brang dgod pa ni// lid bya ba'i rgyu rnams la// gzugs dang li nagazung bzhin bya// rdo ba'i mtshon gyis lus la gtug/ lcags thag nag pos mthul nas gdugs// yan lag lnga la tshon spang lnga// de bzhin po brang dbus sa dgos
179a2(rnying rgyud): thabazang gis de bzhin bskor// bsnyen pa'i phur pas gzir la bzhag/ de yi phyi rim gru gsum la// khro bcu'i phur pa rim bzhin dgod// sras mchog mi zad phud pa drug/ sgo bzhi steng 'og gnyis dag gam// yang na rim pa drug tu dgod// dpal rtse gtor ma ga
179a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin bshams// srung ma rnam gsum thun rdzas bsag/ drag po'i las su gyur pa yi// zangs phye lcags rtse rdo phye drug/ khyad par bal tshon dus kyis gdags// srung ma rnam gsum phyag mtshon dang // gtun dang rdo rje tho ba dang // blar rdzas sna tshogs dgod par
179a4(rnying rgyud): bya// rdo rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ drag pos 'dul ba'i bya thab bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas ye shes lha rnams kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ste// de yi rang bzhin gzhal yas khang // thod pa sam rlon rtse gas pa pa// gnas
179a5(rnying rgyud): lcags gzer gyis de bzhin gdab// zhing chen bzhi yi gdung ma la// gza' chen brgyad kyi ka ba btsugs// zhing chen zhing chud gcal du bkram// nyi zla'i mtho khung rnam par gsal// rgyal po bzhi yi skyes bu la// zhing chen sgo yis de bzhin bcad// lU dum bcad
179a6(rnying rgyud): bor rgyan gyis brgyan// nang gi grug sum 'bar ba dgu// sgro dang rta babs rgyan du byas// dbus kyi gru gsum 'bar ba la// nyi ma zla ba padz+ra gsum// dregs pa'i rgyal po bsnol mar gsal// ma a pa sud+ya tsan+da maN+Dal/ ra tre ru tra ti // de steng
179a7(rnying rgyud): pho yab yum ni// sku mdog phyag mtshan gong du gsal// dI p+ta tsakra ha na ha na hUM phaT// yum yang 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma// rgyan dang cha lugs yab dang mthun// bstod pa dag gis rab tu bstod// dregs pa phyogs skyong gdan steng na// khrob bcu po bcug
179b1(rnying rgyud): sa// na/ 'a / ngasus rgya pa/ gsu / / sa
179b2(rnying rgyud): dang // dbyings dang ma shes byag c-id // kyi'i byed dpa'i rtogs phyag mo tsho dang // rigs la dang rtags phyag mtshan dang // kun byang drur khrod mas brgyad la// rnga 'phrul ba zhi mi nags kyis bzhugs// bapyid chen mo bcu rnams byung // rgyan dang krigs pa/
179b3(rnying rgyud): dang mthad// yum chen rnams kyi mchen nyid byung // byi dang cha lugs yab dang mthun// g.yas pa dgyes phyir lab la 'khyung // g.yon pa dung dam drag co la stog// mche ba canang nga gshog pa can// chan dang cha lugs gtso dang mnyaH// g.yes par
179b4(rnying rgyud): rtags phra dang brdams// g.yo pa 'dzin byed pags bya ba snams// yang sbal sum spel bsam me khyab// rdo rje zag rten gtams pa yi// sa gzhi chen po'i gdan steng 'dir// sgol byed sum mchog rnam par bzhim// TIT+Te hUM/ / rdzu bac+doMs pa
179b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i drud las/ sku mdog dang phyag mtshad bstad pa'i ma'u ste babyed pa'o// / de nas yang gsang sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dang po gnyis med byang sems bsgyur// gnyis pa rig pa so sor nga ston// gsum pa drag po'i la
179b6(rnying rgyud): dgongs bstan// bzhi pa spu gsung thugs su bstar// yang dag nyid la yang dag pa// rtogs par bya ste rnam par bsgom// yang dag togs na pad cen rdzob// dag par brtags na kun kyang rtogs// mang por bzlas na kun kyang 'jub// dam tshig bsrud dadangos gru
179b7(rnying rgyud): sngar// zung thung sems kyi phung pa 'di// bdag gi don du rtogs par bgyi// stong gsum mo lus sems ca de kun// rdo phur pas ma gang joms// shes pa'i bla med thang pa'i thabs// mudapa 'joms pa'i shes rang rod // bgazags spyod dang khrus kyi cu//
180a1(rnying rgyud): zhing yang minA rA ra
180a2(rnying rgyud): ba'adams pa 'jigs pa'igs/ yang dag pa ying dang // khobar bangs pa'i dang gis 'drug// martogs pa yi sems can // zhi ba dbang dang drag pa dang // byas pa la sogs mang du bsnu/ mi ga 'asrung dang /
180a3(rnying rgyud): ni// dbang po mngon gsum thag par 'gyur// bdag dang lha dang gzas pa gsum// byang chub sems la skye shi med// stong pa'i rang bzhin gnyis su med// nyon mongs srog dbugs rtse rnams bcad // byang chub sems la bye shi med// shing rgyang tso thu rtse nga/
180a4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// don gyi phur pa dam bzhi yang // skabs dang spa ti togs par brtse// phrar ni thams cad byang chub sems// pa ni thams cad kun lathub// phrer ni thams cad gtso ba mchog/ pa ni thams cad 'khor gyi tshul// lur ni thams cad kyi ba med// pi ni rol pa/

180a6(rnying rgyud): yi ge dang // thugs la gnas pa'i yi ge gnyis// kha dog rigs las shes par bya// 'phro bas 'dul ba byin rlabs ni// skabs dang gnas skabs shes par bya// bdag dang gzhan gyi don rnams kyang // rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya// shin du zhal rab tu
180a7(rnying rgyud): blo mi rtogs pas kha byai nas// rig 'dzin sa la rnam par 'gro// rdo rje khros partsa ba'i rgyud las/ dgongs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste dgupa'o// / de nas drag po'i las rnams bstan pa'i phyir// bskal ba'i zhing bcu bsngal ba'i phyir// bstan pa gtan po 'jig pa

180b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi yi klong gis dgug/ nges par rten la dbab pa'i phyir// dbab par bya ba'i klong gis bstim// rten la gnas par bya ba'i phyir// bcing bar bya ba'i klong gis sboms// nyon mongs sha mdangs dbye ba'i phyir// sgrol ba gnas kyi klong gis gdab// skye med chos

180b4(rnying rgyud): gnas su 'jams pal// thugs can po thabs mkhas pas// sgrub mad pa'i don mthong ba// grong zhes rgyal bas dasar gsungs// mu nang can can po la// mu la khrigs pang zlar gsum pas// cung gsum ma lus kun gang nas// bde ba
180b5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i thugs rje yi// gang gis 'dul ba'i don bstan nas// glong drug lha dpral dgug bstim bya// byin brlabs dbang bskur byas nas ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig kI la ya// klad la bskor zhing bzlas par bya// oM laM hUM yaM staMm+b+ha nan/ mo ha g+ha ya/ lhag
180b6(rnying rgyud): wAn/ shi kri bi kri badz+ra hU~M kA ra hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la yaHdzaHhU~M baM hoH/ sarba bi g+h+nAn/ badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badz+ra hU~M kA ra hU~M phaT/ badz+ra hU~M kA ra hUM a/ hUM pa ra bi d+yan hU~M phaT/ sarba A na ya hU~M phaT/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/

181b2(rnying rgyud): khaM pos ngom pa dang // rig pa'i rtsal dang mi ldan par// kha nas lha srin gnyan 'bod pa// 'di rnam nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// mtshan dang ldan pa'i rig ma la// phrad nas sbyor ba ma byas dang // las ngan skyon can mtshan rdzogs pa// bskal pa'i nga rdu

181b5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig 'di la mi gnas na// brtsams pa mi 'grub mya ngan non// dam chog bsrungs pa'i yon tan ni// ci bsam las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// yid ma lha yi dngos grub thob// mkha' 'gro mang po 'bor zhing 'dra// dngos grub rnam gsum rdza bzhin rdzog
181b6(rnying rgyud): tsho nga bsod nams dbang zang 'phel// lha srin kun kyang de bzhin bgyur// dgra bgegs kun kyang gzhom zhing 'dul// bstan pa kun kyang dar zhing bsrung // dam tshig 'di dag gtsor len na// grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// da mtshig gasrung ba'i rim pa ni/

182a1(rnying rgyud): zos pa rgya bskyed nas// 'du 'a rdo'i dbang du mi gtong bar// rtag du grub la brtson byed pa// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// pharo la ma nyams dag bol// dmod bcug bco mi bar bar// gas zhing 'gran nas las kyang sa//
182a2(rnying rgyud): yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// rdo rje phur brtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dmachog bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas dbang rnam par bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ srog dang lus la mi 'dzem zhing // rdor dang dang
182a3(rnying rgyud): byas nas// 'khor gsum yongs su dag byas che// bla ma mnyes par bya phyir dbul// bka' dang 'khor lo bram pa dang // bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang // phan dang nus pa'i phyin rlabs dbang // rim pa bzhin du bskur bar bya// slob dpon de bzhin mnyam
