182a5(rnying rgyud): drang // phu gzugs bzhad cing 'gul ba dang // bum pa nam mkhar 'jug nas ni// dkyil 'khor las la de bzhin bshams// rin chen zur brgyad dkyil 'khor du// dar dkar yol gyis bres pa ru// rdzas dang lag tu kun bkram nas// slob pa lnga 'am gca
182a6(rnying rgyud): kyang rung // gdod g.yog dar gyis rab dkris la// dag pa'i khrus kyis bkru byas nas// rin chen sna tshogs snyim pa bkang // rdo rje ye shes chen po yis// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste// de ring bdag lade bang pur
182a7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rdo che// ma lus gzhung bzhin bsgrubs nas ni// sku gsung thugs kyi phur ba bzhin// ye shes rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du// bdag gi dad pas 'jug par bkye// 'jom byed rdo rje chen po yis// bdag
182b1(rnying rgyud): dbang mchog de ring stsol// nga ni ye shes nga rje \u0f7f// nyon mongs rnam rtag 'joms pa'i phyir// 'jams byed dung chen po 'di// da rig byed la sbyin par bya// 'joms kyang can pa'ang kyil 'khor du// su gsung thugs kya cha// rnam rtog gzham gyir la gas gas pa/
182b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas bdag la dbang ldan shog/ e ma ho rigs kyi bu khyod kyis// gang la phog pa yi dam lha// me tog dam pa dor bar gyis// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu dang // yum chen 'khor lo rgyas 'debs gnyis// g.yon nas yum gyis yab la 'khyud// phyag gis
182b3(rnying rgyud): bum pa rab tu blangs// ye shes dbang gi chu bo 'di// nyon mongs ma gos dkar la 'tsher// skal ldan rigs kyi bu khyod la// spyi bor bum pa'i dbang bskur bas// nyon mongs gsum dang dug gsum sbyangs// dbang gi chu bo rgyan bzhin 'bab// oM badz+ra kI li
182b4(rnying rgyud): kI la ya sarba bi g+h+nAn pa hU~M phaT// dbang bskur yi dam lhar bskyed la// lus kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bskyed// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbang // phan pa'i dbang dang nus pa'i dbang // dur khrod dbang dang dam rdzas dbang // rimapa bzhin du bskur bar bya// phur/
182b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i dbang dang 'debs pa'i dbang // drag po'i las su gyur pa yi// kun kyang ma lus dbang du bskur// srid pa'i phur bu sgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang // rtags
182b6(rnying rgyud): dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // kI la ya yi dngos grubaskol// gsang ba'i dbang rnams bskur ba'i phyir// dbang gi ste gla bu rab brtsegs la// shartsi dkar la lcang lo'i sba// pad+ma'i mchul so tshags dam// smin mtshams par yang ma chad par// chos brgyad zlab
182b7(rnying rgyud): tshig // slo ben gnas zugs bskyed// ma gyis ng+yas gsam padag shegs pabyed// sa ma man/ sa ma maT+Ta/ ana? d+hag 'aM/ a gas te// mad+hA Na// hU~M/ a a a// de bzhin kyang sams banas
183a1(rnying rgyud): dag pa zhin su// mas / dag sa ma / gag sa/ la pad// sa can
183a2(rnying rgyud): byin rlabs tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// bsam pa dag gis rab bsam la// snod ni a las rnam par dag/ bcud ni hrI las bsam par bya// yaM gis 'bar ba'i mi bskyod nas// raM gyi me yis a zhu nas// bcud kyi tshul thim par gyur// dz+nyA ni rnam par
183a3(rnying rgyud): nas// phyogs bcur 'od zer 'phros pa las// dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskul// slar 'dus bdud rtsi nyid du gyur// bdud rtsi byin rlabs chen po yis// ye shes lha la mchod par dbul// bdag la bdag mchod mnyam nyid thim// 'od zer gsum
183a4(rnying rgyud): par gsal// dkar dmar nag po'i 'od dang gsum// dbul dang bshags pa bstab par bya// dgug dang bcing dang bsgral ba dang // rim pa bzhin du rdzogs pa ma// rdo rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las// tshogs srub pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi po'o// // de nas
183a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsdus nas/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dri yi rgyal po lnga yis byug/ mthing nag gru gsum nag po la// drag po rmu gis mtshan pa bri// sgo dang rta 'bas dang zhi lcags sam seng ldeng du rang la
183a6(rnying rgyud): mthing nag dar gyi cod pan can// nyud dkar rgyal po dag dang ni// gu gul sbyang ba la sog pa// dbang bskur rim par byas nas su// drag po bu gsum dbus su dgod// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma dang // rim pa bzhin du spang bskyed bya// mchod pa dbul zhing dzin
183a7(rnying rgyud): las bcol// grub can las rnams byas nas ne// glang gi bya ba'i las byas nas// bsgrub cing bsregs te'abang ba dang // mnan te las bzhes mtha' rdul bya// cho stim bkra shis gtor ma btang // do thos partsa ba'i byed pas/ dpa' bogacig bsrung

183b3(rnying rgyud): tsan na byin las bzod // bdu bcom pa mi shes// ngan pa'i dres sbya 'di dag // thom byin par rgyud las/ rdzas sgrub pa'i le ba drug pas// na phyogs brnyangs pazhi // rdzab med rje /
183b4(rnying rgyud): 'khyams pa bskal sprid du// dag bortsa ba'i chud 'di gsungs// skal ldan yang dab rtson dang // theg pa mchog la rtogs rje// rtsol ba co zhing shes rabya'o// bsam pa dag par gyur pal// khyad 'di yongs su gtad par bya// no rje thos pacaba'i pa/
183b5(rnying rgyud): rgyud gtad pa'i lal ste bcu bdun pa'o// / rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi slob dpon pad+ma 'thung gnas dang / bod kyi lo tsA bangs 'byes les pas ma yis kyi mchims phu dge gong du bsgyur cing khrus te gtan la phab pa'o//
183b6(rnying rgyud): rgya gang ska nga / hri
183b7(rnying rgyud): gad+ha mtham marnam mi / byed ga dang / dbus stsog na thags kyi mapa ba rkyod kyi sa pa zhes kyag/ dpa dang 'don pa la rgyabya 'phrul pa// da dang bdag gis thos pa 'dres gcig/ bcom ldan 'das ba'i dag kau 'a
183b8(rnying rgyud): kyi srung dgasung dang du sa rnyeng ba dang badru po rtag sa/ kha ba dang tsham ma'a' 'grom bye zlag rjeg dpa gtum dpa dang thabs cig tu bzugs te/ dang cad nges na 'jig rten gyi b.ras 'di na sa drag por byur ba dang / yul drag tung ma dang /
184a1(rnying rgyud): bdun dbang phyug ma dang bcas pa/ shadang khrug dang rus pa la phongs spyod pa'i cha/ dpal rdo rje khrag bzung dbu dgu phyag bza brgyad pas/ b+hu rnga bskal ba'i gnas skabs su rdu 'a sbyar khrag thab ma sum danas ma sa dang /
184a2(rnying rgyud): dag med ma tA de wa zhes bya ba/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa thogs pa/ yum drag mo ral gcig ma zhes bya ba dang / drag mo srid pa 'khor byed ma zhes bya ba gnyis dang ldan te/ de gnyis las sras phyogs bcung dam sde bsu
184a3(rnying rgyud): gas ni yab nyi ma 'bar gsal/ yum zla ba spa byin ma/ bu bo nyi ma phag gi mgo can dang / bu mo zla ba smrig bu'i mgo can gnas/ shar phyogs na drin bo rgyal ba'i wa/ dri za mo rgyal ba'i skra 'byin ma/ bu stag gi mgo can dang / bu ra
184a4(rnying rgyud): shar lho na me lha dbyug pa can/ me lha mo lcags sder can/ bu g.yag gi mgo can dang / bu mo bya rog gdong ca ni gnas/ lhon 'chi bdag gshin rje dang / gshin rje mo sha zan/ pu sha ba'i mgo can dang / bu mo 'ug par mgo can gnas/ stoT dan
184a5(rnying rgyud): po g.yo byed dang / srin mo gtun shing 'dzin ma/ bu gzig gi mgo can dang / bu mo khwa'i mgo can gnas/ nud phyogs na klu rgyal rgya zla dbang dang / gru mo pir la zhon ma dang / bu byi la'i mgo can dang / bu me lu shud mgo can gnas/ nub kyang na chung ste gzhan
184a6(rnying rgyud): 'joms dang / rlung lha mo mdzad 'dzin ma dang / bu spyang ki'i mgo can dang / bu mo kha'i mgo can gnas/ byang na gnod sbyin las kyi 'dud dang / gnod sbyin mo rlung la zhon/ bu seng ge'i mgo can dang / bu mo za gdong can gnas/ kyang shar na 'byung po khams
184a7(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi bdag po dang / 'byung mo srog gcod ma dang / bu dom gyi mgo can dang / bu mo sro mong gi mgo can gnas/ 'og phyogs nas bdag gzhan stobs 'joms dang / sa bdag mo rlung gi gzugs 'dzin ma/ sa bdag gi bu dred kyi mgo can dang / sa bdag
184b1(rnying rgyud): nam sa gzhanan tu/ nga su nab mas ma/ zug / yang+gA d+harnam gas na gang/ dang na nga/ da zugs laganas pa mas kyang na rdzun
184b2(rnying rgyud): bar du gcod par byed pa la gnas pa la/ de'i ci 'og mer gyi gnas na/ chos su bye ba med pa'i nga las/ yongs spyod rdzogs pa'i tha rje 'chang yab sum pa/ sangs rgyas til gyi gong bug byas bskor nas gnas pal gdul d+ha drug byed dbang phyug ma d+had langs
184b3(rnying rgyud): nas/ lho yi 'dzam bu'i gling gi u rgyan gyi yul gri dur khyod chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas su/ phyi rin chen lnga las bu bcing / nang thod pa te/ ma tron las grub pa'i gzhal yas pang bya khyon dpag tu med pa sprul pa'i nang du dpal rdo rje gzhon du yang yum me zung gi dkyi lar
184b4(rnying rgyud): 'jigs shing rngam par bzhugs te gnas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdud thams cad brtul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gas gnas nas/ tho go khams gsul rnam par rgyal babyung nas/ khams gsul gyi bdud thams
184b5(rnying rgyud): cad dang / ngam sri bu'i yab yum rnams/ dbang du bsdus nas mdun du bkrag nas kho bo spang gsang gnas su thim mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyagasang gnas dang / sran gnyis dang / rgya bo tshangs pa'i bu gnas sgom pazhi byung ste/ lcags byam
184b6(rnying rgyud): dam sre brda'i snying gnas bzung / zhags bya mas bcings/ lugs spog mas bsdams/ dril bums myos par byas te/ dpal chen po yab sum gyi mkha' gsang bar nas sras kyi mchog byung ste/ bgegs kyi tshogs de rnams kyi klang pa tshal pa 'adz+ra/
184b7(rnying rgyud): dum du gang steng tshal pa bdun du gtubs nas srog ye shes sra bsgyur/ yab sum gyi mapar gsang das 'od kyi gong dra btugs/ zho bo ra sum thathabs su bcas pa phyogs bcur sbal ngas/ dam sra bcu gdan du byas te/ rding thasems can thams cad drus

185a3(rnying rgyud): 'di byings kyi dang // rtogs khyod pa nyid du 'bod// dbas thotha ma bu 'gro ba// namamapa' bzhin du bad+hag dkar yang // 'khor ba'i 'dam las za ba'i thabyas// bdag dang gzhan la yang bdang// don du ma byings kyi theg pa las

186a2(rnying rgyud): tshangs spod cing ting 'dzin su ma gsal// grwa yi dmatshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags// ya/ bdag gi dag ni dang tha me dang // dag 'a khyal chog dub bzlas brjod grangs ma 'tshal// rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i don na bdag gis martogs te// gsung ga da mchog nyams de ma thol lo ngas
186a3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra/ bdag gis rjod ldan sems can thams cad la// brdab sems gnod sems log lnga bsrud pa dang // chos nyid zab ro'i don ni matogs te// lta ba sangs rgyas thugs kyi dmachog nyams pa mthol lo bshags// sa/ sems can thams cad ye nas sangs kyis rgya/
186a4(rnying rgyud): martogs bdag gis mngan dang sngon du bgrangs// sangs kyis yon tan mtha' yas ma brjo cing // yon tan dmatshig nyams te mthol lo bshags// dza/ sangs rgyas phrin las sna tshogs dpag med kyis// ting rje chen pos sems can don ma byas// bdud rtsi lngal longs
186a5(rnying rgyud): glang mdus shing // drin las ngam chog nyams pa mthal la bshags// TA/ skye ba rnam pazhis bsdus pa'i sems can rnams// chos sra ma dag dbyengs las gzugs su dang // bde ba cin pas su la thub rigs te// yang dag dan dam mags mthol lo bshags// ma

187b4(rnying rgyud): tA yi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// las kyi khrag 'thung gsal 'phro bstim// tA// khyod ni rdo rje las yin pas// las rnams ma lus kun gyis shig/ pho nya 'du 'phro mang po kun// khyod kyi dgongs pa byed par 'gyur// a/ spu byed kye yi gzhal yas
187b5(rnying rgyud): suM// gsal ba a yi ngo bo nyid// a yi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// pad+ma khrag 'thung gsal spro bstim// a/ chos kyi bdud rtsi bla na med// dad ldan skyes bu ngom par byed// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la// 'jung bar gsang bsngag gzhan du min//

187b7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun gyi mnga' nga dag 'gyur// oM/ slob ma'i lus ni dgacing smin// rdo rje'i lus ni rnam par dag/ de ni bum pa'i dbang yin te// lha yi spu ni rnam dag dpang // myur du thob ste the tshom med// rdo rje tha~Mgal mos pa yi// bu mo mtshan bzang ldan pa
188a1(rnying rgyud): badz+ral// brubs rgya gzhon nus// de nyid gas babang pa'i tham// dadza'i lam nas pardar 'jil// bad ba thugs thig na s+ho// es du rtag paHsa/ zug med kyi rdzor mar byu// zab pa dag pa yang
188a2(rnying rgyud): sbyin// tA sa sa ma/ la d+d+hi hA// oM d+ham s+ya te// b+ha dad can thig po yi ba sam bzung // rdordo'i lam nas 'dzud 'thil// bu ma~M rtsi la dbang por gyi// snying gi dkyil du byung bar gyis/
188a3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba byang sems rdo rje'i ngag/ rdo rje gsum gyis rnam par dag/ rdo rje gzhon nu khrag 'thung dpal// shes rab bcu drug lon pa yi// bu mo mtshan dang ldan pa la// gang dang ldan mas yang dag spyod// bde chen sku ma'i brda mtshon te// gnyis shong
188a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis mnyam dbus dag tu// dbyings kyi bde chen byung ba ste// rang rig ye shes de la yod// hUM bde ba thugs kyi sems dpa' che// yab yum gnyis med mu tig gi// khu 'phang byung sems phab pa yi// dus gsum bla ma sangs rgyas dang /
188a5(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la bde chen gyis// byang chub sems kyi mchod pa phul// rdo rje bde chen thig le dbyings// zag med dbyings su mi rtog ste// de bas bla mchog longs spyod cig/ hUM yab chen chos kyi dbyings mthong ba'i// pad+ma dag la
188a6(rnying rgyud): 'o byed dam// de las byang chub sems 'khyil ba'i// zag med bde ba longs spyod dam// e ma ho// shes rab lha mo yum chen mo// chos kyi dbying 'thob 'o byed dam// byang chub sems mthong thig le la// rtag tu gus shing bde bar spor/
188a7(rnying rgyud): A~M a badz+ra sarbA hUM// de yis shes rab ye shes kye// dbang gi rdo rje thugs nyid bdag/ rdo rje sems dpa'i byin rlabs kyis// sems nyid mkha' dang mtshungs par mthong // chos su mngon gsum mthong ba'i tshe// mchog gi dbang du de nyid nges//

188b4(rnying rgyud): ses pa ti ci bang ma/ dmatshig sasam pa'i napor sa// 'do pasum spangs palas// sems pa sangs rgyas cing dang / numam bu'i mtha dang munyam pa du mnas ma nul brna mabad pa// nga

188b7(rnying rgyud): nga dpal// rdo chos kyi dbang bslang // badz+ra a r+d+ha dz+ra thA/ prargyad sa ti/ bu mAM// dza/ ma'ang brodran kyi bral ba dbang // rtag med chos kyi thang byen zhing // 'am khrag nga dzin las bdag/ shes rab dra la dza'i da bad
189a1(rnying rgyud): rdzas na brdza d+hA ts+tsha n+ta// // rje mngon tsang nyid de// ces kyang ma zhugs mi shegs// sangs cas thag 'thung bad// rdorje ming du dbang bsgyur ro// d+harma zla ba gaH/ badz+ram rnas ma// thams cad 'dus pa
189a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes la// drug pa rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// zla ba drug gis nges par 'grub// lha klu thams cad dbang srung lding // mkha' 'gro'i gnas su myur du 'gro// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las dbang gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
189a3(rnying rgyud): nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// e mA to bcom ldan khro bo'i gtso// sems kyi zhe sdang 'dul ba'i phyir// rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rdzas// lha yi de nyid bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ga
189a4(rnying rgyud): dang dkyil 'khor phur pa dang // lha yi sku mdog phyag mtshan rnams// nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// rdo rje rigs kyi grub pa'i gnas// dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs dang // ri dang brag dang sa yid dbyibs// rigs kyi mtshan mar nges pa dang // nyam
189a5(rnying rgyud): dga' ba yis phyogs su// gan ga cing cher zla ba sa btsal la// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa// gru bzhi mnyam zhing 'thas par bzhag/ 'byung chen rab 'jigs rdu tra bskal// dud khrod dkyil 'khor gzhi yin no// rdo rje thod pa mtshan ldan la// shi
189a6(rnying rgyud): dur khrod tshon gyis bri// lcags sam seng ldeng rtsub pa'i shing // drag po'i phur pa sor brgyad pa// ye shes lnga yi bsnyen pa brtsam// dur khrod thig tshon rab ldan pas// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rab bris te// phur pa'i dbyibs la khro bor rdzogs// ting 'dzin rdzogs
189a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i bsnyen pa brtsam// gru gsum shel gyi dkyil 'khor ni// nyi shurtsa gcig rab tu bri// phur pa lha yi bsrub pa brtsam// dur khrod thig chen rab ldan pas// drag po'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum ni// drag po'i phur pas las la sbyar// dkyil 'khor bzhi yis
189b1(rnying rgyud): bzhi 'grub// rdo rje phur pa'i bsam gtan gnas// khams gsum sems can bskal gyur na// bsad pa 'di yis mchog thob cing // rdo rje'i rigs su mngon 'chang rgya// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rgyu nyid kyis// mdzes shing 'jigs par rab tu gnas/
189b2(rnying rgyud): rin chen lnga las grub// dbus su nor bu bai DUr+ya// shar ni shel yin lho ni gser// nub ni pad+ma rA ga la// byang ni in+d+ra nI lar gnas// rin chen lnga yi rtsig pas mdzes// 'dod yon lha mo rin chen bdag/ me tog phreng ba mu tig ha ra// tA ra Na shing 'khor
189b3(rnying rgyud): gdugs// ba dan la sogs rab tu mdzes// tog ni rdo rje rtse dbu ba'o// nang ni dur khrod gzhal yas khang // klu chen brgyad kyi ka ba la// nyi ma zla ba lha yi bus// ka gad na ka gzhu mdzes par gnas// lha chen brgyad kyi gdung la ni// zla ba'i skad khung yang dag gan
189b4(rnying rgyud): gza' chen brgyad kyi phye ma la ni// nyi ma'i mthongs khung bcu yis mdzes// nyi shu rtsa brgyad rgya skar gyis// gral ma rnams su rab tu mdzes// thod pa skam rlon ra ri yis// phyogs bzhid rtsigs pa rab tu byas// 'byung po bsnol ba'i ma thems byas// chu srin ya
189b5(rnying rgyud): thems nyid du gnas// ro rlon la sogs skyes bu la// rigs bzhi lnga yis sgo bzhi mdzes// dbus kyi gru gsum mthing nag la// zla gam dmar po gsum dang ldan// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad nag por gnas// dur khrod brgyad du gnas pa ste// mtsho dang
189b6(rnying rgyud): dang sprin dang ni// zhing skyong phyogs skyong mchod rten dang // phrag dang mau yi rnam par gnas// ro ni rlon pas ra ri dang // keng rus bam rul rnam par 'thod// bya ga can 'jigs pa'i ma mo dang // srid pa'i mkha' 'gro mang po gnas// gzhal yas mdzes shing
189b7(rnying rgyud): 'jig sa pang // spyan bcu dang ti shug ti// dbyas sa thug pa dzin// rlung ba zlom pa'i gdan pangs ni// ba rgya badrang bzhi mdan// ma gnon gyi// theg pa dpa ba ga pa// rang 'jigs me kyi pa cugs

190a2(rnying rgyud): 'drags// phyagadrug gams kyi dang gagis// gse kyang gyi dgra bsdams// bdapa rjod rje ba rnams// gson gyi dang papa dpung ba sdams// ba ba pa cu gsung bsdams// mthing gnyis rarab pa byas pa//
190a3(rnying rgyud): bdUd// rigs lnga thod pa lnga yas brgyad// klu chen brgyad dang thod pas brgyad// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs bde ba'i yum// zhal gcig phyag gnyis bde ba'i wa// thal dang thung pa gzigs gis brgyan// dril brjod khrag tu ga dbang
190a4(rnying rgyud): tespel ba'i yum// kri ku ge zong khrag khams gsum spob// res 'gag ba nIH gsum bsdams// g.yer kha dral bu nyid la yang // tog med zos kyi sgra 'byen ma// ma mo bcu drug gi nyar 'gyed// yab sum gnyis med kyir de'i
190a5(rnying rgyud): gtso bo yang 'jal// sde ni du srin phur bu'i dpal// rdong srur pas dgu bgegs spol// de nas phyogs sdong tshar bcad phyid// 'od kyi gong bu skong baH// yab rtsam thathabs te shung bcas// steng 'og shA ga dad stengs //
190a6(rnying rgyud): dang // yum chen rdo rje spa'i byin mo// sprul pa g.yag dang smig bu'i mgo// shar phyogs ji za'i gdan stengs su// khrod rdo rje rnam par rgyal// yul chen rdo rje snyems ma dang // sprul pa rta ga dang h+ya rgod mgo// shar lho mi lha'i gdan
190a7(rnying rgyud): ldan // bram che byung ma dang // sprul pa g.yag pa tshug pa no// rta rgyags gsuMng gdan tengs rgya// slobang drug she rje gzhed// sum ca dur grod bdag ma dang // rnam ba na drug pa 'angs/
190b1(rnying rgyud): stengs su// khrob chen po mi gso mgon// yum chen rdo rjeg tum spangs// sprul pa gzig dang bta mgo// nub phyogs thul gdan stengs su// tshwa ba chen po ta ma grin rtul// yum zin rdo rjegatum mo dang // sbal pa kyil pra shud pag/ rkang rna
190b2(rnying rgyud): rlung rta'i gdan stengs su// khro bo chen po gzhan mi thub// yum chen rdo rje mda' snyems ma// sprul pa spyang ki khwa yi mgo// byang phyogs gnod sbyin gdan stengs su// khro bo rdo rje bdud ci 'khyil// yum chen rdo rje rlung 'byin ma// la pa pa rma
190b3(rnying rgyud): mgo// byang shar 'byung po'i gdan stengs su// khro bo rdo rje khams gsum rgyal// mu mchen rdo rje gsod ma dang // sprul pa dom dang sre mo mgo// 'og phyogs sa bdag gdan stengs su// khro ma rdo rje stobs po che// yum tshan rdo rje 'gyong ma dang /
190b4(rnying rgyud): darjod dang byila'i mgo// lha ni bzhi bcu gnyis rnams kyang // zhal gcig phyag gnyis mdog nag gzugs// stag dang gzig gri sham thabs can// mche ba can dang gshog pa can// phra men mgo martan nyi shu ni// sbal dang rgod pas rab tu babyen/
190b5(rnying rgyud): pa lcags bu phyag na bsdams// sra rjes spyan dmar mche ba gtsigs// dus mtha'i 'od zer 'phro bas 'khrugs// drod gsher las skyes sgom bzhi// shar phyogs dri za'i gdan nyengs su// s+ye ka'i mgo can lcags sum// lce phyogs phul bum ga
190b6(rnying rgyud): stengs su// suM shud mgo tsam zhugs pa ma// nu phyogs chu bdag gdan stengs su// srin bya'i mgo can lcags zlog ma// byang phyogs gnod kyin gdan stengs su// khwa yi mgo can dril bum// 'di bzhig la gcig phyag gnyis ma// dkar ser dam pa
190b7(rnying rgyud): rdzang ba'i mgo// gcig dang thod yul rgyan dubyas// bkrum ning brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas// phyag g.yon phung ba 'debs par mdzad// me dpung dkyilan khro tshul bzhugs// lha ni brgyad dang bzhibartsa rnams// dza ga do'i tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms
191a1(rnying rgyud): 'di yis lus ngag sems sbyangs te// bdud kyis 'tshe bzhi pa dang // tshwa 'di nyid la bud+hAr 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje thos partsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ dkyil 'khor lha'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
191a2(rnying rgyud): nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// e ma ho bcom ldan rig pa'i gtso// dug ldanang nas bcad pa'i phyir// rdo rje khrag 'thung khro tshogs kyi// mngon rtogs rimAM pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis
191a3(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// dug 'joms ye shes lnga ldan 'di// dpyis bshad kyis legs par nyon// dang po bdud bzhi log 'dren tshogs// tsher gcad bsrung ba rab tu byA// sems bskyed gzhan lang ba dmigs la// oM ma hA shu n+ya/ rten
191a4(rnying rgyud): ko&haM/ nam mkha' rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas// rdzus skyes gtse 'khor khro bo ni// skad cig tsam la rab tu gsal// sma yi rkyen gyis yongs su rdzogs// hUM nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// da yi bka' las 'da' ma byed//
191a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshar pa brgya ru khos// lus kyang dum bu stong du gtubs// snying yang tshal pa bdun du gtubs// drag po sngags kyis tsher gcod do// oM badz+ra satwA d+ha/
191a6(rnying rgyud): shu pu gcig nyams pa bskang // phyi nang gsang ba rab tu brjod// mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA la da// bdud rtsi lnga dang rak+ta'i tshogs// sha khrag rus pa gtor mar bsham// oM AHhUM sarba parba a pr-i ta g+h+ri h+ni tA/ oM AHhUM ma hA rak+ta dz+wa la sa puny+tsa hraM/ oM AH
191a7(rnying rgyud): hUM ba lo ta te dz+wa nga li ta nga la ba te bu ya sa ma ya dz+dza/ sngags kyi sme yis dag pa gsum// mchod rdzas rang po zhin dug lngad dpa// dug gsum mchod pa bla na med// dri rdo rje thos pas zhe sdang gcod// mtshon cha sngon po 'bar ba yis// nam mkha'i dmyal nas sha
191b1(rnying rgyud): 'dra// srog gi go rU shar ba dang // snying gi go du bsgom par bya// dz+haiM e yai ra mugarad+h+waM/ hUM bi shA bi shu dz+nyAn tsakra man+ta la d+hI// srog las num mkha' gru gsum dang // rlung khrag sha chen keng rus me// 'jigs pa'i dur khrod gzhal yas khang /
191b2(rnying rgyud): sral rkyen gyis rab tu rdzogs// oM hU~M ba~M b+h+yoH// ti ra bi/ a ma pa~M las rdzogs pa'i gdan// dz+haiMrnaM mo yo ma sra bi rba// bdud bzhi bgegs bzhi yab yum rnams// kha sta ba gan rgyal gyi chings mnan// pad+mA ti yo tan mas// rab ba skyed 'ong se nga
191b3(rnying rgyud): 'khrugs// hUM hUM gdug pa 'joms byed tshogs// oM AHbadz+ra satwa hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum ni// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag rdzogs// rdo rje dril bu bde bar 'khyud// kudA lta bur dkar ba'i mdog/ rigs lnga khrag dpung yab sum barba/
191b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i rdo rje gzhon nung gru// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya dIp+ta tsi kra ha na ha ne tsu lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ zhes pa khrag 'thung rgyal po dang // bde bar sgrol bar byed pa'i yum// khro zhing rngam pa'i tshul basbed pas// gdug pa ma lus sgrol bar byed// hUM/
191b5(rnying rgyud): bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// gsad cing gnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rjes gtamA byas na// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// srog gi go ru shar ba dang // snying gi go ru bsgom par bya// sgra yi stobs kyis gsal bar bsgom// yab yum mkha' ga
191b6(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlab// a dang hUM las rab tu sbyangs// yum gyis yab kyi lce gzhibs nas// yum gyi thugs kar ut+pal gtad// gdung ba'i nga ro 'di skad brjod// hUM rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rjer grub mdzod cig/ srid
191b7(rnying rgyud): phreng ba'i// / ye shes tho thub par mdzad// sam la to// sa ma sa hU~M/ zhe brjod pas yab sum padabs slong ba phyogs pa dur ra tu hU~M// spyi rje hUM hU~M / gang hUMngaT/ ga sbying / yod du rdzamam+bu/ ta
192a1(rnying rgyud): na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM/ da ha hUM phaT/ da ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mA na ta ka trUM/ pa tsa hUM phaT/ pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la b+h+yo d+hA/ ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra krod+ha ha ya hA
192a2(rnying rgyud): hri/ hu lu hU~M phaT/ hu lu hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a pA ra dzA ti hU~M/ tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ti kuN+Da li b+huM/ ts+tshin+dan+ta hUM phaT/ ts+tshan+da hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra krod+ha trai lokyapa~M dzA ya hUM/ b+hin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ g+han+da hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba
192a3(rnying rgyud): phamra/ s+pho Ta dz+nyA Ta/ yab kyis de brjod sgra stobs kyis// khro ba yaMb yum mgo bo rgyan tshogs// lhan bzhi bcu tham pa bskyed// tiD+ga mig bzhi nyid las// oM badz+ra kI li kI la la bi d+ha la bi bo trUM phaT/ oM badz+re kA la kA la ya na maHsarba tat+ta
192a4(rnying rgyud): so badz+rI kI li kI la ya su ru su ru pra su ru hU~M phaT/ oM badr-i kI li kI la ya mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ drod dang gsher las grub pa yi// sngags brjod khro mo bzhi po bskyed// yab yum 'dod chags nga ro brjod// byin gnyis dam du rab 'khyud de// lag pa dam tu
192a5(rnying rgyud): mchu 'jibs// hU~M sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// ngang nyid rdo rje'i chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// spu yi dbyig tu sras bskyed cig/ de brjod bde ba'i rnga rlabs kyis// yi ge 'joms byed sla yis bskyed// oM badz+ra kI laM kA la ya sa rba'i
192a6(rnying rgyud): bi hU~M phaT/ skus mchog rdo rje phur pa ni// yum gyi b+ha gar sku gsum rdzogs// badz+ra sa ma ya dzaH/ de brjod yab kyi phyag gis blangs// phyag ni rigs lnga yab yum bcu// sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ bde ba'i rlabs kyis dbang brda bskur// oM badz+ra hA
192a7(rnying rgyud): 'aye ya d+hi/ She ka hUM phaT// rigs lnga dbu yi gtsug tor can// thams cad 'dus pa'i sras mchog ste// dug lnga rtsad nas gcod par byed// sangs rgyas 'dus pa thams cad kyis// sgra gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab// oM pud+ha kI la~M kI la ya
192b1(rnying rgyud): sa/ nas pa du/ la sa na du 'an/ smras/ na tu sa na da
192b2(rnying rgyud): sI la ya be tA b+hI man+ta la rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/ lus ni bkrag dang ldan pa dang // ba spu'i bu ga rdo rjes gtams// oM badz+ra kI lik+Shi li ya~M ma gu ta la ta la pra ta la hUM phaT/ oM hr-i d+ha thams cad 'dus pa'i sgra// khro bo drams byin gyis brlab// khams gsum gdug
192b3(rnying rgyud): pa bapral ba'i phyir// gdul bya'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// sa ma ya tiSh+Tha/ sku yi stobs kyi yab yum gyi// sngon du bka' stong tshul du ni// khrag 'thung 'dus pa'i phur pa ni// sras kyi mchog tu rab tu dmig/ khrag 'thung 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor
192b4(rnying rgyud): la// dbang ni rab tu blang bar bya// dang po bde ba'i sgra yis mchod// hUM thabs kyis smod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa// dbang dang byin thabs bdag stsol cig/ dbang bzhi rdzogs
192b5(rnying rgyud): par rab tu blangs// oM AHhUM/ b+h+rUM dz+r-IM b+h+rUM/ 'gro drug rten mongs bcings pa rnams// hUM gis dug chen rab sbyang ste// a nAM su tri pre dur 'gyur// raM yaM khaM las me rgyud chus// 'gro ba rab sbyangs hUM du gyur// khams gsum thams cad rdo rje sems//
192b6(rnying rgyud): til gyi gong bu lta bus gang // hU~M rta mgrin rgyal po ye shes la// bstims pas byang chub sems rgyas gyur// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba'i sgras// ye shes khro bo spyan drangs te// hUM srid pa'i phur bu sgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir
192b7(rnying rgyud): ye shes kho bo gshegs su gsol// khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang // rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa da // rdo rje phur pa'i dngos grub srol// oM badz+ra kI li kI la yas ma yadzaH/ a ta~M br-i to// prad+d+hots+tsha ho/ sarba ta thA ga ta ban+dan ka ra yA le/ rma ng+ku
193a1(rnying rgyud): hoH// yab yum bde ba'i sbyor ba las// mchod pa rnams dang 'dod yon lnga// bad ba'i mchod pa rab tu brtsam// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya rmA ba hoH/ san bag+h+na ba dz+nyA phaT/ pU badz+ra swAk+Sh+ma masAt+ma katata/ gtong ma
193a2(rnying rgyud): wAn las rtsom par bya// hUM ma tha thal dpung ba'i dus la bab// dmachog can po'i dus labab// sprul ba can po'i dus labab// phyag brgyan chen po'i dus la bab// oM badz+ra kA li kI la la rdze dzu binaH/ sardi Ta ts+tsha ba dz+ra te wAn/ mahAng lotra ShA/
193a3(rnying rgyud): gsul mchod pa rab phul bas// sangs rgyas su gsung thob par 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa yis// khro bo'i tshogs rnams mnyes par 'gyur// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya na maHsarba ta thA ga ta an+ta pra d+hI dz+nyAho/ shrI peny+dza oM mr-i ta/ khA hi Sha hi/ Sha ri
193a4(rnying rgyud): kha bai khA hi/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya dzaHhUM baM hoH// sarba baig+h+nAM baM hUM hUM phaT/ pany+tsa a mr-i ta khe ra~M khA hi/ bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa yis// drag chen lnga po rab gnas// sangs rgyas lnga pi ngo bor yu ra// oM AHhUM/ shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las// sa
193a5(rnying rgyud): chus sku gsung thugs rnams 'grub// 'dod chags rab tu dge bya'i phyir// rak+ta'i mchod pa brtson par bya// hUM dngos grub par chod byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// rung zhig rdzob cig rnam par chings// gtogs
193a6(rnying rgyud): shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// rengs par khug la smar chug cig/ phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis// nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang // bsgo ba'i bka' 'di nyan par byos// mgar k+ta khA hi/ hU~M bran dang bka' nyan po ha'i tshogs// khyed
193a7(rnying rgyud): dam tshig dus la bab// sngon chad ji bzhin bcas pa yis// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// ma hA rak+Sha khA hi/ hUM dngos grub par chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lha'am 'on te bdud kyang rung // ngal bar zad byed

194a1(rnying rgyud): mkha' mnyam dbyur ya zhag/ la las na d+hAs/ nya rnams bsdus pa ta sa// sems ldog pa thug pa sngams la// lha bung ba byung da thab nag/ drugang / mal grang
194a2(rnying rgyud): srog 'phrog sngags// yi ge mtshan ma mthong ba dang // 'od me 'chog 'khrol mchod lding 'gyur// myur du lha yi zhal mthong 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khos pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ bsam gtan gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
194a3(rnying rgyud): nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// gdug pa tshar gcod bcom ldan 'das// klu tshogs dbang du ji ltar bsdu// 'gro ba ri tha drug ji ltar bskal// thugs rje can gyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis
194a4(rnying rgyud): bka' phul pa// nga yas bshad kyis legs par nyon// kludang gshin bdud la sogs// drag po thams cad dbang srung na// b+ha gsuMm dag po'i gnas nyid du// dring khrod sa la dkyil 'khor ni// grwa gsum mthing nag dkyil 'khor \u0f7f/ sor
194a5(rnying rgyud): brgyad phur pa nyi shu brgyad// dkyil 'khor rdzas su yang dag bkod// gong bzhin mngon rtogs rim pa las// bzhi brda zhe brgyad lha tshogs kun// kun gyi spyi bo'i gtsug tor na// rta mgo ldang zhur rta skad mtshor// khams gsum du tshogs dbang du
194a6(rnying rgyud): sdud // rdo rje'i ga sh+log pas par sdang khebs// phyag na phur pa bya khrung bskams// zhabs kyi bu srin phur pa'i dpal// klu la sogs pa'i snang ga ru gzer// kun kyang kha dog dmar po dmigs// gdug pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur// oM badz+ra
194a7(rnying rgyud): lo la ya chub ho// badz+rag r+b+ha zhes ts+tsha/ bral du sri / padz+ra hU~M r+b+he/ hUM gau d+ha traM/ sarba bi shA~Mb d+ha rjes ba cu chug s+ho/ zhag gsum lon nas dbang du 'gyur// thusags thams cad dbang du gyur/
194b1(rnying rgyud): zhag gsadang par 'dod pa na/ drag po'i las kyi bsam gtan brtsam// lha rnams sku mdog nag pa ste// sngags kyang sgra dang me ru byung // gang zhig gsad par 'dod pa la// phyung ba'i ser chen rab tu dbang// oM badz+ra kA le dwes
194b2(rnying rgyud): yadza NAM ba hoH/ badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI wa nA ga hu lu hu lu sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ sbyor ba zhag bdun byas gyur na// lha klu thams cad 'ching bar 'gyur// mi dang lha dang klu la sogs// yang dgas la bskal 'dod pas// ngang nyid rdo rje snying rje yis// gsad ci
194b3(rnying rgyud): ba ma yin te// phung po rdo rje gtams byas nas// rnam shas rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas// hU~M rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs ni// til gyi gong bu lta bu yis// rtsa bcud kun gyi rtse la 'bar// nga nyid sku yi rnam pa las// sngags kyi 'od zer du ma byung // khro rgyal khyod kyis
194b4(rnying rgyud): par byos// de tshwa de yi rjes la ni// thug kyi dpal ba'u rtse mo dang // ljags kyi pad+ma'i klong dkyil nas// ngan sngags snying po 'di phyur ro// oM badz+ra kI li kI la yA log 'dren thams cad mA ra ya/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hUM phaT/ de yis log 'dren pa
194b5(rnying rgyud): cad kun// skyo zhing smra bar 'gyur ba yin// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyis// smyo byed ces bya'i sngags su gsungs// bcom ldan dbu yi gtsug tor nas// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya log 'dren thams cad mA ra ya/ ta~M thA ya ta thA ya hU~M phaT/ snod bcud log
194b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kuni// rdu la phran bzhin du phye mar 'gyur// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyis// rdul rlog ces bya ba'i sngags su gsungs// bcom ldan gsang ba'i sbubs nas ni// ngan sngags snying po 'di byung ngo // oM badz+ra kI la~M kI la ya log 'dren
194b7(rnying rgyud): cad mA ra ya/ b+hi nA ya b+hin+d+rA ya hU~M phaT/ snod bcud yog 'dren thams cad kun// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du gsol// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyis// zhal du gsol ba'i snying po gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas// ngan sngags
195a1(rnying rgyud): 'dabyung ngo // mad dra sa lul/ gnod bu rnas patas pa macad mardzas/ nga thugs sbyang ba'ang bladubyas// lo ka khams 'dir brtagasos// bdud dayang thams cad pam par gyun//
195a2(rnying rgyud): kyis// lha dang dpral bya'i sngags su gsungs// bcom ldan 'das ky-i ga~M ba nas// dbang sbyid 'grags pa'i snying po byung // oM badz+ra nI pa dz+wa la ya log 'dren thams cad kA le sha s+yaSh+Ta we thA ya Ta/ gling gsur log 'dra thams ca
195a3(rnying rgyud): gas nas dbang phud rdo bzhin 'gyur// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyis// 'bebs par byed pa'i sngags su gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag zhabs las// ngan sngags snying po 'di bung ngo // oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya log 'dren thams cad rtswa ra
195a4(rnying rgyud): shrI dz+dza la na ma hU~M phaT/ bdud dang mo 'dun thams cad kun// yan la gzu ga bzhin dbyur// rdo ri rigs kyi tshogs kyis// byed dugazug pa'i thugs su gsungs// bcom ldan thugs ka'i dpal ba nas// gsang ba ting po 'di byu
195a5(rnying rgyud): la ma dz+wA la ma s+thA mA ya nan/ oMtakA ya b+ha ga wA d+ha ts+tsha ba tho ba drug pam+b+ha/ hU~M lam pa zhe sa na man+ta dz+nyAn kar mau ra/ dz+nyA hrI ma la ka na sha~M ka ra ya thA b+ha kA ra ya d+b+ha \u0f7f/ ba bung mogyi 'dren thams cad kyi// rnam shes 'thos shing ba
195a6(rnying rgyud): sterim+ba m+b+hi b+h+rUM dzAg+sa gyis// drag cing tsho 'dzin sngags su gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyi lte ba dang // thugs ka dpung pa dpyi mig dang // gtsug tir gsing ba'i lam dang ni// spyi bo gsang ba'i gnas rnams nas// gsang ba'i snying po /
195a7(rnying rgyud): hUM ga/ sa rnaMs/ bad+hig smos/ gr-iHkr-ita NA dzaT/ han tan hU~M sa/ bdU N+Ti hU~M phaT/ sarba ldan mdzus/ taSh+Tha a ta thA ng+ku Ta/ 'ad byung grom durnam// gnas sbyin rnamangs rang dganas// log 'ji
195b1(rnying rgyud): dang byar/ bcom than 'das kyi shang sa dang // smyan ldan lags gsang skyabs dang // thugs kyi dpalas bya monas// gsung ba'i stong pa 'a rnams byung / han tan da / ngag nga nga/ byang babarda/ mthal ba rnam ma dun /
195b2(rnying rgyud): rnas chubang/ su dra mra rab / kAt+ya ka ya/ dza la br-i ma/ adzatas pa dang te/ mAng se pa mnan pa b+hai Ta/ 'di byung rig pa'i tho bo brgyas// log par 'dren pa thams cad kyis// gnas bcu'i nyon mongs rnam dganas// thig le dbyings su ma
195b3(rnying rgyud): thim// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi bo dang // snying ga lte ba'i gnas gsum nas// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya bid yaM bid ya hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta nying nying hU~M phaT/ su ru su ru pra su ru hUM phaT/ mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ de byung sgom bzhi po yis// mtsho bzhi nyon mongs
195b4(rnying rgyud): gnas dag nas// dag pa'i mtsho ni nyag gcig ste// chos kyi dbyings su rnam par dag/ ngan sngags 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum mthing nag dkyil 'khor la// gyar ni khwa gang zabs su phyed// kha khyer gsum la sor bzhi ste// dkyil 'khor rnal pa bzhi
195b5(rnying rgyud): yin te// drag po'i ma yi dkyil 'khor dang // mAr la gsad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // 'brub khung las kyi dkyil 'khor dang // bstab pa zhal gyi dkyil 'khor ro// gnag pa dmar nga de mdog 'dra ba// mthun pa'i rdzas ni tsaka gtso// sra ba klang rgyas 'khor lo
195b6(rnying rgyud): ni// lha dang dpral ba'i dkyil 'khor yin// pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i 'khor lo ni// gzugs la dbab pa'i 'khor lo yin// nya lta bu yi tsakra ni// byang du gzhug pa'i tsakra yin// pad+ma 'dab 'dra'i tsakra ni// skyo bar byed pa'i tsakra yin// pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i tsas ni// rdul

196b5(rnying rgyud): phyogs stong gi lo kan// dregs pa bsnol ba'i gdan sbed na// rdo rje khrag 'thung thor bcas// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag su// rdo rje dbyings phyug sam la 'khyud// tsho thod lag dbug cing gsol// drar khyod chos kyis kyi seMn 'dul// rdo dza~M

197a2(rnying rgyud): chu thog pacad// sa yi rten zhur 'og tu bkod// rdo rje rtsag ma thag pas gdags// dkyil 'khor steng du dru rnga bzhin// drar khyod gzhal yis khang du bzung // srab babyed pa'i rjes su bzung // thugs dam skong ba'i bdud rtsir brdung // ra su
197a3(rnying rgyud): dung khrod gnas su byin gyis brlab// bslab pa lha dang bdud rtsi lngar// byin gyis brlabs pa'i yon tan swa// hU~M dza ti dbyings kyi yum chen las// mkha' 'gro mang po'i sbal ba 'gyed// kau R+Sha b+han dmar zhing dadrag sngo// tsau nr-i sir mi ma la
197a4(rnying rgyud): pra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan dmar na ka sngo// bai tA nag mo zhing chung za// pu k+ka dmar ser rgyu zhugs 'dren// g+hasma ljang gu dud khrag 'thung // sma sha ljang nag zhing snying zla// tsaN+Da ser skya zhing lus 'dral// ma mo chen mo khyed brgyad kyis// da
197a5(rnying rgyud): byin gyis rlobs// he ru ka yi grong khyer mdzod// bdud rtsi lnga ru byin gyis rmobs// b+h+yo seng gdong ser mo ro bsnol za// stug gdong dmar mo bsnol mar blta// wa gdod nag mo rol ldag/ khyi gdong mthing nag zur blta len// bya rgod gdong dmar hA
197a6(rnying rgyud): 'dren// kaM ka sngo skya zhing la za// bya rog mdog nag rgyan gri 'dzin// 'ug gdong khra mo rgya gram 'dzin// phra men rdo rje khyed brgyad kyis// ru lu zlos shing byin gyis brlab// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hAM/ thugs dam bskang ba bslab pa'i rdzas// 'dud rtsi lnga
197a7(rnying rgyud): ba li bskang // brten pa'i gnas kyis thugs dam bskang // ro ye ta b+has spyan drangs la// hUM/ bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // d+hA trI n+ya ye byang sems kyis// bla ma dam pa'i thugs de ma bskang // dmachog gnyen po bslad gyur nas// zag meng
197b1(rnying rgyud): 'dab rnas gyur cig/ d+hur pus 'dom gang gru bzhi 'ad// ngur zod gzhal las yang dugastsal// gru bzhi pa la khadag lnga// dri ma nag pa btsur to// thob rnams ljang gu mu nad mngag/ sha chol bu sar pogasar gyung nga // rus pa dag ba sha pad la
197b2(rnying rgyud): lha yi rtsigs pa rab tu mdzes// sgal tshigla dung gi rang bzhin la// rkang brgyad ka ba brgyad yin no// thar ma ldum la rtsib ma dral// rtswa yi dra bas rab 'brel cing // mgo yi gsang sgo shel ltar dkar// mig g.yas lho sgo gser ltar ser// mig
197b3(rnying rgyud): sgo dmar dang ldang // nub kyi tshe sgo pad ltar dmar// 'og gi spu nag smin ma dang // sgra rnams sgo yi rgyan yin no// nang lag sen mo'i phreng ba rnams// mu ti ka dra ba phyed pas mdzes// tshig mdud rin chen pha gu la// phag la 'dod yon lha mos ma
197b4(rnying rgyud): dur khrod gzhal yas mdzes pa yis// dkyil 'khor lha yi thugs dam bskang // phung po lnga ni gnas gyur pa// khrag 'thung lnga yi thugs dam bskang // 'byung ba lnga yi gnas gyur pa// yum chen lnga yi thugs dmi bskang // kun gzhi pa rnam shes gnas
197b5(rnying rgyud): gyur pa// rdo rje gzhon nu'i thugs dam bskang // sgo lnga'i rnam shes gnas gyur pa// e ka tsa ti'i thugs dam bskang // me mo bcu drug zhugs dam bskang // yid kyi rnam shes gnas gyur pa// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs thug dam 'asang // yan la
197b6(rnying rgyud): shas dum bu bcu// gnas grur khro bo bcu le zhugs dam bskang // khro mo bcu yi thugs dam bskang // sbal tshigs nyi shu gnas gyur pa// mgo brnyan nyi shu'i thugs dam bskang // lus kyi mtsho bzhi gnas gyur pas// sgro ma bzhi mi thugs dam pa

198a2(rnying rgyud): pa mthol lo bshags// dngos grub rnam gsum bdag la stsol// sku gsung thugs kyi dag pa dang // rdo rje gsum ni bdag la stsol// dug lnga 'joms pa'i khrag 'thung dpal// ye shes lnga ni bdag la sgrol// ting 'dzin tshe yi dngos grub dang // mngo
198a3(rnying rgyud): shes lnga yi dngos grub stsol// grub pa brgyad kyi dngos grub dang // phrin las bzhi yi dngos grub stsol// 'byor ldan longs spyod dngos grub stsol// a la la to// sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ rdo rje gsum ldan nyid du 'gyur// hU~M bla ma rdo rje slob dpon
198a4(rnying rgyud): dang // he ru ka sogs khrag 'thung tshags// ma mo mkha' 'gro brten pa'i phyir// tsitagasang ba'i rten du bcangs// mtshon spyan rdo rje ka pA la// bdud rtsi lnga yi snod du bcangs// lus la gnas pa'i bded rtsi lnga// lha rnams 'dus pa'i rdzas su bcangs//

198a6(rnying rgyud): sr-i bri pa'i rdzas// zhing ljags g.yang gzhi byas pa yang // phra men ti shu'i rten du bcangs// rgyu ma'i zhags pa 'dren pa yang // ma mo bcu drug brten pa'i rdzas// dbang po lnga yi me tog kyang // yab yum gsum ni brten pa'i rdzas// mtsho bzhi dam bu 'chung
198a7(rnying rgyud): yang // slob bzhi la rten du rung // mal la ho// dur khrod rol longs spyod cing // ngur khrod chas kyis rab tu brgyan// dur khrod gnas su rgyu bya zhing // bdud kyi lngal longs spyod nas// ngur khrod ma par 'gro kun dang 'grogs// 'dod yon lnga la longs spyod cing //
198b1(rnying rgyud): khams gsum pa yi sems can kun// bsad pas grol bar 'gyur ba yin// rtog med dbyings la gnas gyur na// bsad pas sdig gis mgos shing // rig 'dzinas la myur du 'gro// zag med pad stong dbyer med la// mkha' 'gro kun dang longs spyod 'gyur/
198b2(rnying rgyud): dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ ro sgrub pa spyod pa'i le'u sti drug pa'o// / de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// phrin las mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das// phur pas phrin las 'grub
198b3(rnying rgyud): pa yang // 'gro ba'i don du bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phur pa rnam pa bzhi yin te// chos nyid don gyi phur pa dang // rig pa ye shes phur pa dang // 'dus byas rdzas kyi phur pa dang // brten pa lus kyi phur ba'o// 'dus byas rdzas
198b4(rnying rgyud): kyi phur pa ni// dngul lam 'o ma can gyi shing // zangs sam tsan+dan dmar po'i shing // lcags sam rkang dang tshor ma'i shing // gser ram 'o se ser po'i shing // sor brgyad sor drug bcu gnyis dang // bcu drug phur pa'i tshad yin no// zlum dang gru bzhi na ga ma dang /
198b5(rnying rgyud): zur gsum dbyibs su nges pa yin// gcig dang lha grangs mnyam pa'o// maN+Dal dbyibs dang kha dog nyid// gzung thag kha dog bzhi dang ldan// gtor ma'i rigs su nges pa yin// bzlas pas dngos grub myur du thob// shAn+ting ku ru swA hA/ pu Sh+kad ku ru
198b6(rnying rgyud): oM/ wa shang ku ru ho/ mA ra ya phaT/ ling+ga nyid la mngon par bsrub// bdun 'bum grangs kyis 'grub par 'gyur// 'gul dang 'phro dang 'tsheg pa 'byung // grub nas so so'i las la sbyar// dgra dang bgegs dang nad zhi dang // tshe dang longs spyod rgyas
198b7(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// 'di nas phyi mar bsgral ba dang // bla med lnga ru bsgral bar bya// 'di bskal bsod nams dpag tu med// rdo rje 'dzin pa ku mA ra ri// dngos grub thams cad myur du 'grub// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/
199a1(rnying rgyud): phra rabs zin las bzhi 'grub pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// / de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di// gsol// thugs rje byams mgon bcom ldan 'das// rdo yi rig
199a2(rnying rgyud): slab// bskyab pa'i dngos grub ji ltar blangs// mgon mdzad khyod kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de yang sgrub pa'i dngos grub ni// nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// tshe ni rnam pa gsum yin te//
199a3(rnying rgyud): mi 'phrog rdo rje'i tshe// nyams shing 'pho ba thig le'i tshe// 'khrul zhing rtog pa snang ba'i tshe// nyams shing 'pho ba tsho'i rang bzhin// nyams pa'i rgyu ni 'di ltar te// dam nyams bzhin 'gyur spyod lam nyams// dam can 'khrugs shing sems 'khrugs dang /

203b7(rnying rgyud): 'o// ma/ / / 'dis tha sa// 'dus
204a1(rnying rgyud): zhe// bgegs med tina'i tshe dang mnyam// khrag 'thung sra dang dbyer med pasgyur// 'ad dang 'ja' dang drab me// khol ba Na ma rtags yin no// te bsnyen brten sgrub sgrub mi no// dmigs pa'i rten langs par 'grub// sA ga sung thugs
204a2(rnying rgyud): bsgrub gyur kyang // khyad par thugs la nye bar 'grub// grub pa'i rtags ni byung ba dang // lcang lo thod pa kha sbyar du// bdud rtsi rtsa ba lnga btsal nas// rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar ba'i ril bu gzhug/ 'od zer lnga dang yang dag ldan// de bzhin bza' ba bca' ba dang // ba
204a3(rnying rgyud): dang ldag dang gzhi ba la sogs// rgyan dang rin chen gos rnams la// dag cing spel ba'i sngags 'di brjod// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya dzaHhUM baM hoH// a mr-i ta sid+d+hi hrI hAM hri thA/ A be sha ya ho/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyang // mur du 'grub cing mngon shes 'chang //
204a4(rnying rgyud): ga pa 'dzin pa myur du thob// a la la ho// e ma ho/ bcom ldan 'das ni kho rgyal gtso// rdo rje srin po'i nam ni langs lags na// gza' skar rgyal po nyi ma rtse sher gyis// bzlas brjod bsnyen pa'i grangs ni thems lags na// 'grub pa'i rtags mtshan myur du brgya
204a5(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol re ran// dbang dang byin rlab thams cad pa dag stsol cig/ hUM brjod med spros bral chos kyi sku// sku gsum rdzogs pa khro rgyal su// mi gnas ye shes nam mkha'i thugs// thun mong ma yin khyad par 'phags// ye shes
204a6(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur dpal ba'u nas// bde chen tig le byang chub sems// bdud dngul rdo rje gzhon nu yi// mu gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rnams// mthogs lhur du sbal du gsol// mi 'chi tshe yi dngos grub stsol// mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub snol// rdzu 'phrul mthu
204a7(rnying rgyud): dngos grub sbal du gsol// rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub sbal du gsol// phrin las rnam bzhi'i dngos phub rtsal du gsol// rigs rgyud 'phel ba'i dngos grub snang du ngo// thub mchog brgyad kyi dngos grub thal du gso// da 'gegs 'jo sla 'i dngos bu bsngal du gsor// hU~M de mchog
204b1(rnying rgyud): rnam nga dkyil yangs nas// yid dung byon thal ban spyongam// 'ar 'i byas 'dabs rna mngag// yum sde mang 'grong thig la las// thugs kyi dngos bu hral dugs la// d+hurnamul pa' gyu bar dag pa'i lu// mkha' 'dus pa klo tus pa'i bya
204b2(rnying rgyud): gri thig ledze ti ma// zag med bde ba'i dngos grub rtsol// hUM yab yul gnyis med pade chen las// mi zhigs thig le lus byung ba'i// lha rnams 'dus pa'i phur sras mchog/ phrin la sa sna tshogs dngos grub stsol// dz+haiMhi zla bsnol ba'i gdan skyengs na//
204b3(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i khro rgya la ga tso// rdo rje hUM mdzad sgra 'byin ma// sprul pa phag dang smig bu'i mgo// phyag brtan yang sprul mang po'i tshogs// lha yi gdon chen 'dul ba dang // cho la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// hU~M dri za bsnol ba'i gdan stengs na// dri ba 'dul ba'i khro bo
204b4(rnying rgyud): rdorje rnam rgyal mda' snyem ma// sprul pa stag dang bya rgod mgo// phyag brnyan yang sbrul mang po'i tshogs// dri za'i gdon chen 'dul ba dang // las la dbang ba'i dngos grub sgrol// hUM mo lha bsnol ba'i gdan stengs na// me lha 'dul ba'i khro bo gtso// rdo rje
204b5(rnying rgyud): sngon sder mo dang // sprul pa g.yag dang bya rog mgo// phyag brtan yang sprul mang po'i tshogs// me lha'i gdon ni 'dul ba dang // yo byad dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// hUM gshin rje bsnol ba'i gdan stengs na// gshin rje 'dul ba'i khro bo'i gtso// gshin
204b6(rnying rgyud): gshed po dur khrod bdag/ sprul ba sha ba drag pa'i mgo// phyag brtan yang sbrul mang po'i tshogs// gshin rje'i gdon rnams 'dul ba dang // mos la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsal// hUM srin po bsnol ba'i gdan stengs na// srin po 'dul ba bo rgyal gtso/
204b7(rnying rgyud): g.yog tun blang ma// sprul ba gcig dang bla yi mgo// phyag brtan yang sprul mang po tshogs// srin po'i gdon tshigs 'dul ba dang // sngon lam dbang ba'i dngos grub sngal// hU~M k+Sha dbang bsnol ba'i gdan stengs na// k+She dbang 'dul ba'i blagag ci// te mthen
205a1(rnying rgyud): garnam pa dang // skal bcwams thu sa/ zag pacan thal ba par gas// rgal ga du yas 'das pa dang // rdzabatul dbang 'dus pa to// dug ma nal tuskyes pa// na 'ad
205a2(rnying rgyud): gtso// gzhan gyis mi thub mnga' snyem ma// sprul pa sbyang ki khwa yi mgo// phyag brtan yang sprul mang po'i tshogs// rlung lha'i gdon rnams 'dul ba dang // skye la dbang ba'i dngos grub sgrol// hUM gnod sbyin bskol ba'i gdan steng na// gnod pan 'dal 'i
205a3(rnying rgyud): po'i gtso// rdo rje bdud rtsi rlung 'byin ma// sprul pa seng ge pha lung mgo// phyag brnyan yang sprul mang po'i tshogs// gnod sbyin gdon rnams 'dul ba dang // chos la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// hU~M 'byung po bsnol ba'i gdan ste sa na// 'byung po 'du la tso po
205a4(rnying rgyud): gtso// khams gsum rnam rgyal gsod ma dang // sprul pa sre mo dom gyi mgo// phyag brtan yang sprul mang po'i tshogs// 'byung po'i gdon rnams 'dul ba dang // sems la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// hU~M sa bdag bsnol ba'i gdan stengs na// sa bdag
205a5(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i lho rgyal gtso// stobs chen rdo rje bstod ma dang // sbal pa dred dang byi la'i mgo// phyag brtan yang sbrul mang po'i tshogs// sa bdag gdon rnams 'dul ba dang // sems la dbang ba'i dngos grub skal// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags klog dril ba ma/
205a6(rnying rgyud): s+ya ka bu shud srin b+ha khra yi mgo// 'gugs 'degs sdom 'bebs mkha' 'gro ma bzhi yis// phrin las rnam bzhi'i dngos grub skol// lha yi sku rnams g.yo 'gul yig 'bru sba// thugs ni lding 'phyo gos 'od me// bdud rtsi bza' btung gos rnams kyang // dub
205a7(rnying rgyud): 'ja' dang mi dang 'tshag/ mdangs rnams gsalan dngos grub thob// phrin las bzhi dang thub pa brgyad// mkha' spyod gnas su myur du 'gro// rdo rje me lce gsum ldan zhing // mi gnas ye shes spur 'gyur zhing // thig le nyag gcig mur du thob// dpal rdo
205b1(rnying rgyud): gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ tshe dang dngos grub byung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// gdug pa 'dul ba'i bcom ldan 'das// bar chod thams cad
205b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs// de ni gang lags bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bsgral ba'i zhing ni dgra dang ni// bar du gcod pa'i bgegs chen la// dkyil 'khor lho nub srin po'i sar// gu gsum rim gsum nag por bya// rnam lnga'i lin 'khor
205b3(rnying rgyud): lo wan+da// 'khor lo rtsibs drug mu khyud ldan// li 'khor lo'i lto bar byar// rgya ma chen pos rab tu bsdam// ras sred kha dog lnga yis bcing // rnam lnga drung khrod bgegs kyi shul// gnod pa'i ling+ga de ru sbyar// bsam gtan rtse gcig yid kyis 'grub/
205b4(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi grangs ni khri tsho gcig/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe dang // shang tshe bye ma gsum dang ldan// rdo dregazir til nag dang // dug khrag tshogs pas rno ngar bskyed// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya dI p+ta tsakra ha na ha na ru lu ru lu
205b5(rnying rgyud): dzaHhUM baM hoH// sarba bi s+thAn baM hUM phaT/ oM la~M hUM laM/ mo ha g+ha ya che ge mo sta~M b+hA ya nan/ mon dang rabs chad thod pa dang // la cha'i sbal ba glang du dang // spel gri ra yi thod pa dang // spe'u byi la phag thod dang // sbrul sbal rus sbal khog pa dang // mchod
205b6(rnying rgyud): rdzi dang // ri rab rgya gA mi rdo rje dang // mkha' lding sku gdung 'og tu mnan// mi nyid gshin rje mgon po dang // bdud srin ma mo pho mo'i rigs// klu gnyenas bdag ku mo rnams// mnan pas bsod nams chen po thob// bag chags nyon mongs rab dag nas/
205b7(rnying rgyud): 'gag med cing rol pa'i dang // bsam du med cing brjod las 'das// togs nas bla med yul du 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsaba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ mnan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas nam rgyal khro bo yis// b+ha ga
206a1(rnying rgyud): la 'di skad gsol// thugs rje ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das// zor gyis bzlog dang gsod byed pa'o// thabs ni gang lags bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// zor ni lha yi sku yin te// nub kyang rlungs 'du ma tshams pa/
206a2(rnying rgyud): tan cagacig yid kyis bsgrug// drag po phur kun ba'i las// drag po las ni dAng 'i thod// mkha' dpo rnams kyi khrag gabor// dbang phyug pa men sgo nga'i bor// radang thod pa zong du'abang // no bar byed btsun gyi sa// dag por byed pa sngags pa bang /
206a3(rnying rgyud): laM ya dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sarba big+h+nA nA baM hUM phaT/ ma ma pa shi ku ru ma taM nya ka ra i dan/ d+ha ti ma ma karma shi b+h+r-i kA ra ya mA ra ya thun// rab 'bring tha ma brdeg pa'i gnas// dmag dang gtor ma mda' 'phen dang // khrag mtsho kho la na grub pa'i rtags// gang la 'phen pas bzlog par 'a
206a4(rnying rgyud): glo dang gzer thabs mchin nad kyis// 'chi 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// lha klu kun kyang gsod par 'gyur// bsad pas byang chub sgrub par byed// lce 'chi med pa'i byang chub sems// 'khor 'das ro gcig chos kyi dbyings// nam mkha' lta bur khyab pa'i sku// lung du 'gra
206a5(rnying rgyud): the tshom med// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ zor gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// bdud rnams sreg mdzad bcom ldan 'das// sbyin sreg las na ma
206a6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang zhig sbyin sreg ma byas na// las rnam 'grub par mi 'gyur cing // dam tshig nyams pa mi skongs shing // sdig pa dag par mi 'byung bas// de bas nan tan cher bskyod nas// sbyin sreg las
206a7(rnying rgyud): sbyor bar bya// gza' skar phun sum tshogs pa la// dus tshod ldan pas gnas nyid du// bram ze'i khyim dang gtsug lag khang // smad tshong khyim dang dur khrod du// zhi dang rgyas pa dbang drag gi// thag khung zlum zhing dkar la 'tsheng// zla gam dmang la gded pa dang // gru bzhi ser la
206b1(rnying rgyud): snyam pa dang // gnag cing rngub pa drag po'i thab// rim pa gsum ldan zhal gyi dbyibs// shar lho me lha'i mtshams nyid du// ma tri dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas// 'o ma can dang dri zhim dang // dkar nag tshor ma can gyi shing // til dkar yungs kar tsan+dan dpar// til
206b2(rnying rgyud): dang zir nag po dang // sha khrag rus pa gu gul nag/ dug khrag snying sna tshogs tshad rnams// dAr pa ku sha yam shing dang // 'bras dang 'bras so sran ma nas// bra 'o mar khu ske tshe mar// bong bu rnga mo'i spangang+ga dang ni// bya rog 'ug pa'i sha dang bcas// rnga mo ma he gleng gi sha/ 6
206b3(rnying rgyud): dang mi shanya yisha/ yung ba gur bum me tog ser// 'o mazho mar mngar gsum bcas// me tog dmar po lcags lta bu// sbal pa lhod mo sbal gyi sha/ bsreg pas las rnams thams cad 'grub// me yi bdag po drang srod kyang // bsam gtan rtse gcig ma yengs gsal/
206b4(rnying rgyud): hUM/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs me lha'i rgyal po che// bsreg blug zhal zas bzhes su gsol// 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs nas kyang // las rnams 'grub par mdzad du gsol// dngos grub tshul bzhin sbal du g.yol// a dzu sha / mchod
206b5(rnying rgyud): pas me lha mnyes par bya// hUM/ tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras// drang srong chen po'i cha byad can// tshangs pa'i gud pas rab dge ba// rin chen rus pa'i rgyan gyis mdzes// zhal gsum phyag drug khro tshul ston// sku mdog 'dod dgur phyar mdzad cing // phyag drug
206b6(rnying rgyud): mdzes pa'i mtshon cha ni// g+han d+he me thab bgrang phreng dang // spyi glug skyabs sbyin phur bu bsnams// rgyud drug rtsad nas gcod la bstod// zhabs bzhis bdud rtsi gcod la bstod// zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul// chu skyes nyi ma'i steng na bzhugs// dag
206b7(rnying rgyud): byedar yi gdan la bzhugs// bdud rnams 'dul la bdag bstod do// yon tan su thigs tsam bstod pas// drang srong chen po mnyes par byas// bsregs pa'i rdzas kyis las 'grub po// oM ag+na ye swA hA/ shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ buSh+TiM lu ru swA hA/ pa shaM ku ru ho// mA
207a1(rnying rgyud): phaT/ udz+nyAr+tha pA/ u oMn+ti/ at+pa sha rdzanas pas drang srong mnyes par 'gyur// khag tha pa'idakyil 'khor dang // phung ba / yi dkyil 'khor dang // phyogs bcu tsA'i'i dkyil 'khor rnams// mala'i ting gang rdzogs par byed/
207a2(rnying rgyud): brtan pas 'grub par 'gyur// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT/ las rnams sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur// zhi rgyas dbang drag bslang pa dang // dbye ba rengs pa rmongs byed cing // 'gugs pa la sogs dpag tu med// smin sreg gis ni thams ca
207a3(rnying rgyud): 'grub// dmachog nyams pa sgong 'gyur cing // mtshams med lnga yi sdig byis pa// 'di yis dag par 'gyur ba yin// phrin las mthar phyin sbyin sreg ste// khro bo'i rgyal po gzhon nu yis// khro bo rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang // dpag tu med cing brjod du med// yab yumasas
207a4(rnying rgyud): snang ba yang // chos kyi sgra las ye ma 'das// sems kyi rang bzhin cir snang yang // dper na nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon bzhin// thog ma tha ma ste 'gag med// rgyal ba'i dbang po nyid thob 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje thos partsa ba'i chud kyi bshad pa las/ snyir
207a5(rnying rgyud): stebacu gcig pa'o// / de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// e ma ho bcom ldan dngos grub stsol// bde gshegs sras kyi dngos grub rnams// sgrub pa'i thabs ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
207a6(rnying rgyud): pa// thun mong dngos grub thams cad kun// de yis bshad kyi legs par gon// phur ba lha yi dkyil 'khor yang // thugs kyi rten las yang dag 'brub// de yi bu yang rnam pa gnyis// lcags dang shing gi bye brag go// lcags ni rnam lnga 'das pa yin// su'i srog sa
207a7(rnying rgyud): bcad pa'i sngags// gnam lpags drir mo thog gi sngags// khab len dbang sdud rgyal po la// lha dang bral bak+ko yi lcags// mnyen la thug pa rno na'i lpags// dge slong ba shan pa dge bsnyen dang // rnal babyor rig sngags 'chad dang ni// lha bzos blang ba mchog
207b1(rnying rgyud): na/ nanagasams sa rnam na pa// dab thad pa ldan pas pa / gangag du na ma yang / sus byas me jug pa// bas thu las smrag/ 'dun gdu ma sa // las dun ba sa nangs
207b2(rnying rgyud): ram na la zag pa khrag/ shan me rus pas drug gsum 'joms// mtshan ldan drag po'i phyogs las grangs// bzo pas yon tan ldan pas bya'o// shing lpags gnyis kyi tshod dang byibs/ por babyed cingad rdzogs pa 'o// dbu sa rgya mdang por bya
207b3(rnying rgyud): zung gsum brgyad dang khru ba'i lnga// hUM mdzad khrag 'apung lnga rdzogs te// sor gnyis ste pa yan chad la// bcu bzhog brgyad du yang dag shes// khro brgyad mgo brnyan bcu drug rdzogs// stor cig lte ba gsus pa ste// sgo bzhi sgom pa de dang ldan// 'og ni
207b4(rnying rgyud): d+hi na dang// mer rtsig sa ma ma tshan ma he// chu srin pa du yang dag rdzogs// drag gro khro ba'i dkyil 'khor yin// sor gsum dpal dang ldan pa b+h+yo// yum chen lnga yi kyil 'khor yin// bcwa gnyis ldan na dbus rngan \u0f7f/ seM nga po
207b5(rnying rgyud): sor gsum ldan pa rdzogs par byas / gzhan drug dang la du shes par bya// sor dag bcad 'ang chung ba gnyis// sor ni bcu drug ldan pa la// sor gnyis dbu yin pa stod pani// lhu ba gnyis la mtshan mi gnyis// drag ni dpal darjegs po /
207b6(rnying rgyud): tshang ldan pas te sh+le m+b+hi ni// ribi gnas cig cig med kyis rtogs// rang gi lus nyid par ba skye// mag ba cu mad da gong ma yin// mu snod pa mdog brgyad yin no// stob rgya mdud 'og ma yin// chos so mtshon ma chu sr-in ba// rkang ba gnyis ni pal du
207b7(rnying rgyud): ma rkyen du rdzogs pas// phreng pa gcig bathub pa pas// las rnams 'grub par thocos med/ tshor sdel 'bab sangs// gangs thag ldan la bzlas ni// zla dgacigags nga bar 'gyur// 'thol ba ma rnams babyung // de mis pa /
208a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'brag// mtshan ldan rdo rje kA pA la // dkar ci dam sa ji sha can// rigs lnga khrag thung yab yum rdzogs// bsam gtan rdzogs nas dazlas pa ni// o k+Sha Sh+Ta/ san 'ams mi tak+Sha Sh+rab+ta d+hA/ 'jam phag gsum pa
208a2(rnying rgyud): dra rje// 'od rnams byung na thub pa kyi// hU~M badz+ra kI li kI la la N+Di hU~M ba toH/ mtho ga dza/ sun 'i dan pa hU~M Ta/ 'jol khri rje brib/ 'bum phrag gcig gi bzlas pas 'brag// 'od pa'ang pol mo bye rtags// ru la hA/ lha rnams sa kyi
208a3(rnying rgyud): mchog/ mkha' 'gro kun gyi srog snying yin// bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i sngags yin te// yang dag don gyi lte ba'o// 'grub na las brgyad bsrub par bya// bdud rtsi ril bu ljags su dril// khar bcug lag na phur pa thogs// gzhan gyis mi mthong gnas su phyin// yang dag pa
208a4(rnying rgyud): don la spyod// stan de gang gi mig la bsdus// gzhan gyis mi mthong lha srin mthong // sgyu ma lta bu'i sid+d+hi rdzogs// sa 'og/ gter kyang mthong bar 'gyur// nam mkha' mdzod la mnga' yang brnyes// longs spyod kun lam chags shing // kun sAng siN+Di ldan pas kyang//
208a5(rnying rgyud): phur ba lnga yi dngos po la// ril bu de nyid rab bsdus na// phrar pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa thob// nam mkha' la spyod rig 'dzin dang // mkha' 'gro'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// ril bu de nyid rkang la bsdus// phur ba phag na thogs sur// / nam mkha' nyid la 'phur bar
208a6(rnying rgyud): ril bu de nyid rtag tu zos// nad rnam 'an zas shing bgegs rnams med// bde chen nyid la longs spyod cing // bdag gzhan 'de bas khyab par 'gyur// phud pa thogs shing ril bu la// A lurdzan 'bum bzlas na// zos pas che yi rig 'dzin 'gyur// de bzhin nyid
208a7(rnying rgyud): byas nas spyod// ril bus dbang po rab sbyar cing // khrag 'thung lnga dang ldan pa yis// mngon shes sde po rgyud la skye// phur pa lha med 'grub par 'byung // he ru ka yin la mthong 'gyur// skugasum myur du 'grub par 'gyur// sku gsum zhing dang sku gsum lam// 2
208b1(rnying rgyud): mthar phyin yongs su rdzogs// ser ba gcod cing 'bebs pa dang // char ba bcad 'bebla las rnams kun// phur pa 'di yis 'grub par 'gyur// srog chags 'bru la gnod pa yang // phung pa 'di mis gnod pa 'joms// nang dang gdon gyis gnod pa yang // phur pa
208b2(rnying rgyud): yis srung bar byed// tshe thung ba yang tshe ring 'gyur// me stag seng ge'i 'jigs pa dang // sbrul gdug glang chen smyon pa dang // dred mo me dang chur bcas rnams// phur pa 'di yis 'bigs pa sel// mdze yi nad 'joms klu dug sel// las rnams thams cad 'grang
208b3(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ phur ba dang bdud rtsi lnga las thams cad grub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas rnam rgyal khro ba yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// e ma ho bcom ldan bdud 'du
208b4(rnying rgyud): dag// rang bzhin rnam dag bde klong nas// rdo rje khrag 'thung sur snang ba// de yi yon tan ji ltar lags// yang dag lha dang dpal grub pa// bcom ldan bdud 'joms bshad du gsol// su yi cha byad rab 'jigs pas// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs so//
208b5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas// / khro rgyal khrag 'thung lnga byung ste// gsung dbyangs lnga yis 'di skad brjod// hUM bde klong nam mkha'i dkyil nyid nas// dur khrod gzhal yas 'jigs rngam dbus// gru gsum mthed nag klong dkyil nas// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon
208b6(rnying rgyud): ni// sgeg pa dpa' ba gar dgu'i tshul// rab 'jigs me dpung dkyil na bzhugs// mnyam nyid dang las ma g.yos kyang // khro rgyal 'dus pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dkar dang dmar dang gnag pa'i zhal// mchog
208b7(rnying rgyud): gsugasum ldan la bstod// phyag drug pha rol phyin pa drug/ phyag g.yas rdo rje rje dgu yis// 'gro baba'i ma dgu la dgod// par mdo rdo ce lnga yis// dug lnga cud gcod ye shes lnga// phyag g.yon me bung 'bar ba yis// nyon mongs 'dam rdzab skem par byed//
209a1(rnying rgyud): ba ma khad+han gsum shes// drug gsam \u0f7fda nas garjod par byud// mtha' gnyis rarab sang pa 'dul// dgrab gags gtan nas rgal bar nu// sman dang / snang ma ga da myur la rtsam// ram jug gag
209a2(rnying rgyud): smin ma slar klog ltar 'byug/ thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba spel// khro gnyer chu yi rlabs bzhin 'khrug/ srid gsum ma lus rgol bar mdzad// dbu sa kham nag gyen du brjes// 'gro drug pade man dbyings su rgol// zhabs pa'i bzhang
209a3(rnying rgyud): gnon// rlung k+kol la bdag bstod do// dur khrod chas brgyad stsal brgyan// g+ha srin sde brgyad dbang du sdud// thod pa lnga yis dpral brgyan// rigs lnga khrag 'byung lnga la bstod// phyag drug sbal gyis brgyan pa la// a dang ha la'i ma thogs na /
209a4(rnying rgyud): brgyad po rab brtul nas// rigs bzhi'i bu rnams 'joms la bstod// zhal nas ljags 'brel gad kyi sgrogs// 'jigs pa'i hUMs phyogs bzur grags// sba las rdo rje khro chung 'phro// bgegs chen sreg mdzad byed / 'ator// rkyen la
209a5(rnying rgyud): 'dul la bstod// bde chen mkha' blong rgyas la bstod// rtog med bsam mi khyab la bstod// skye gsang bzag med bde ba'i yum// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs khro mo'i gtso// mnyam nyid mi 'gyur mthing nag sra// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sul 'breg/
209a6(rnying rgyud): phyag g.yas dril bu dgu la 'byung // stong pa nyid kyi sna sgrogs shing // / g.yon pas dud dmar gtsol stob// zag med bde ba rgyas la bstod// gzig dang zod stsal gyen du byas// mi rtog ye shes 'phel bar mdzod// mata lu brtan pa thugs
209a7(rnying rgyud): rigs// bde chen yum la bdag bstod do// hUM g.yon nas rol pa grol ba'i yum// ze byed rnam thabs khro gsum 'bar// mthing nag 'bar chen gdug pa sreg/ ra tshol chen thal bas brgyan// gzig dang thod sbal chan du byas// 'aklu thams cad dbang
209b1(rnying rgyud): g.yas pas da ma mug bskum// ras 'ga' la rnan gsum bsnams// skud pa gsum po dbang du spyad// dag zugags srog cu gcod par byed// g.yan pas thod pa tu bskams// bdu kun ma thugs dam bkang // thags ka' dra lu 'bru bajud la// / ma
209b2(rnying rgyud): drug 'gyed// gsang chen mi bzad ral gcig ma// e ka tsa ti mkha' 'gro'i gtso// khro mo'i gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// snang srid dbang sdud khyod la bstod// hUM srid gsum sdug bsngal mthar mdzod ma// sku gsung thugs mchog bdud 'dul mu// yab pra sa
209b3(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba'i sras// dbu gsum phyag drug gtum chen sra// phyag na mtshon cha bsnams pa yis// rgyud drug 'khor bcad nas gcod// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i gdug pa 'dul// sra sma dpur pa zung gsum po// dgra bgegs gdug pa'i steng la 'debs// drag
209b4(rnying rgyud): gyad nas gcod// gdug pa chu srin kha nas phyung // rgya mdud nang nas 'brug stod ldir// chu srin kha nas glog stong 'khrug/ gdug pasdig sbrul sbal ldong 'phyo// klu bdud dbang du sdud la bstod// khams gsum ma lus sgrol la bstod// hU~M phyogs bcu dam sra gto
209b5(rnying rgyud): mdzad su// yab yum gnyis med las la grub// hUM mdzad la sogs khro rgyal bcu// drag po 'bar ba'i sku mdog nag/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis stag lpags dkris// phyogs skyong bcu po 'dul bar byed// phur pa lcags kyu bsnams pa yis// 'gugs shi
209b6(rnying rgyud): 'debs pas srid gsum spol// bruM geng ro spogs par byed// mnyam nyid khro rgyal bcul bstod// mi 'gyur brtan pa sbyor ba'i yum// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// gtso mo yab bzhin 'gugs 'debs mdzad// sme 'byin yul bcu me ltar 'brar/
209b7(rnying rgyud): sla 'brug ltar rngam pa'i sbas// dgra bgegs gnas su sgrol la bstod// yab yum gnyis med thugs las sbal// za byed gsod byed phraman tshogs// mgo brtan nyi shu phyag brtan te// gdug pa 'dul byed su mdog nag/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis mi bad
210a1(rnying rgyud): phrin las 'gugs shing 'debs par mdzad// snang srid grol mdzad ma thu stobs can// hUM dang phaT ni stong gsum klogs// kha rlangs me 'bar gdug pa sreg/ phyogs bcur sbal pa 'gyed la bstod// hU~M drod dang gsher las su 'khrungs
210a2(rnying rgyud): la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgo ba bzhi// prA ka pu shud srin bya khwa// mgo brnyan zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// phrin las 'gugs 'ching sdom pa dang // myos shing mnyes pa'i las mdzad ma// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog ji la// ngul pa 'debs
210a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i las mdzad cing // dkar ser dmar ljang khro mo'i sku// zhal las dzaHhUM bi hoH'i sngags// 'brug sgra chen po phyogs bzhir sgrogs// dgra bgegs gnas su sgrol la bstod// hUM thugs ka dpal be'u dkyil 'khor nas// sgo gcig rin chen kag la yas
210a4(rnying rgyud): bde stong dbyer med dang nyid las// chos kyi sku las longs su shar// patra zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs// gyon gyis ma gos gti mug sel// yab yum gnyis med zag med su// sku mdog dkar gsal rnam dag dbyings// rdo rje dril bu phyag na ba rnams//
210a5(rnying rgyud): shes rab byang chub sems dang ldan// rtog med mi 'gyur lcil krung bzhugs// mkha' dbyings bde chen sku la bstod// khrag 'thung lnga ni dbyings la thim// yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu la// chu thig tsam gcig bstod gyur pas// bdud rtsi log 'dren nad med cing // dngos
210a6(rnying rgyud): drupa thams cad thob par 'gyur// thig le nyag gcig nges thob po// e ma ho// yang dag don lam yengs kyang // kun kyang khrag 'thung rang bzhin te// nges pa'i don 'di khyod kyis nyon// hUM stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// dbus phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// brtan
210a7(rnying rgyud): g.yo ci shing nag tshal kun// kun kyang rdo na phur pa'i lha// zhal gsum phyag drug gazla bzhir bgrad// mthing nag me yi 'od 'phro zhing // rgod dang gshed dang khro ba'i rtsal// phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha yis// 'gro drug d+ha ga'i dbyings su sbyor// zhabs bzhis bdud
210b1(rnying rgyud): zil gyis gnon// zhal nas kI la'i sngags zlos shing // gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs nas kyang // dkyil 'khor 'di la brtan par bzhugs// phur pa 'di la dbang zhig sur// phur ba 'di la byin gyis rlobs// rtags dang ma
210b2(rnying rgyud): ma dbyung ba dang // rig 'dzin bdag la dngos grubaskol// A~M badz+ra kI li kI la ya ru lu ru mA hrI ts+tsha n+tu/ hUM rgong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// shar phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// brtan g.yo sa shing nags tshal kun// kun kyang byud+ha phrar ba'i wa// zhal gsum phyag drag zhabs
210b3(rnying rgyud): bzhir bgrad// dkar gsal me yi 'od 'gro zhing // khro dang bzhad dang gshed dang tshul// phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha yis// 'gro drug b+ha ga'i dbyings su sbyor// zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon// zhal nas kI la'i sngags zlos shing // gnas 'dir ldan 'a
210b4(rnying rgyud): gshegs su gsol// gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs nas kyang // dkyil 'khor 'di la brtan par bzhugs// phur pa 'di la dbang zhig sbyar// phur pa 'di la byin gyis rlobs// rtags dang mtshan ma dbyung ba dang // rig 'dzin bdag la dngos grub stsol// A~M b+ha k+Shi yek+She
210b5(rnying rgyud): ya ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo Sh+T+rI/ hUM stod gsum skyong gi 'jig rten na// lho phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// brtan g.yo rtsi shing na gra tshal kun// kun kyang rin chen phur pa'i lha// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang// ser 'od me yi 'od 'phro zhing // sdang dang khro dang gshe ba'i tshal// phyag
210b6(rnying rgyud): drug 'a'agro ba'i mtshon cha yis// 'gro drug b+ha ga'i dbyings su sbyor// zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon// gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// gnas 'dir spyan 'den gshegs nas kyang // dkyil 'khor 'di la brtan par bzhugs// phur pa 'di la
210b7(rnying rgyud): zhig srur// phur pa 'di la byin gyis rlobs// rtags dang mtshan ma dbyung ba dang // rig 'dzin bdag la dngos grub sgrol// oM rat+na kI li kI la ya ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo b+hUM/ hUM stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// nub phyogs stong gi 'jig rtenan// brtan ga yo rtse shing na gra tshal kun/
211a1(rnying rgyud): // pad+ma rur ba'i lha// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dmar gsal ma yi 'od 'pho zhing // gshe dang khro dang bzhad pa'i tshul// phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha yis// 'gro drug b+ha ga'i dbyings su sbyor// zhabs bzhis bdu nga 'bral gyis kAnan// zhal da
211a2(rnying rgyud): kI la'i sgra zlos shing // gnas 'dir lhan 'dren gshegs su gsol// gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs nas kyang // dkyil 'khor 'di la brtan par bzhugs// phur pa 'di la dbang shig myur// phung ba 'di la byin gyis rlobs// rtags dang mtshan ma dbyung ba dang // ga
211a3(rnying rgyud): dngos grub grol// oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya ru lu ru lu ru d+hu NAM/ hU~M stod gsum skyong gi 'jig rten na// byang phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// brtan g.yo sa shing nags tshal kun// kun kyang las kyi phur pa'i lha// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// ljang bu me yi 'od 'phro zhing /
211a4(rnying rgyud): rnga ma dang bzhad dang khro bo'i tshul// phyig drug 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha yis// 'gro drug b+ha ga'i dbyings su spyod// zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon// zhal nas kI la'i sgra zlos shing // gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// gnas 'dir ldan 'dren gshegs
211a5(rnying rgyud): kyang // dkyil 'khor 'di la brtan par bzhugs// phur ba 'di la dbang zhig smrar// phur ba 'di la byin gyis rlabs// rtags dang mtshan ma dbyung ba dang // rig 'dzin bdag yi dngos gru bstsol// skr-i karma kI li kI la ya ru lu ru lu dzI b+ho dz+dza/ b+ha ga bde ba'i klong yangs nas// me 'gyur mchid
211a6(rnying rgyud): ga'i thugs nyid de// thig le dbyeng med thugs kyi lha// dig lnga thig 'thung chos dbyings dang // dbyings las ma g.yos rnam dag ste// e mai ho sras kyi mchog las ma g.yos kyang // b+ha ga'i dbyings las byung ba ste// rang bzhin rnam dag khro bo'i su// yang dag pa yi don 'di nyon// tra~M
211a7(rnying rgyud): yum pa de klong thig le nas// mi shigs byang chub sems kyi hUM// 'joms byed dpal be'u phur pa'i dbyibs// thig le yig 'bru rnam pa kun// phur pa'i logs la lha bkod nas// 'gyur med dbyings kyi ngang nyid las// khrag 'thung 'dus pa phur pa'i lha// sras kyi mchog gyur phur po'i
211b1(rnying rgyud): tshul// zhwal gsum phyag drug 'jigs byed su// ut+pal ldan pa'i mdog 'dra zhing // blo dang bzhad dang gshe ba'i tshul// phyag drug tud drug rkyang nas gcod// phyag mtshan mtshon chas 'gro drug grol// spu srad chu srin phur pa'i dpal// rtsa mdud nang nas sngags kyi sgra// 'jug sangs
211b2(rnying rgyud): pur ldir ning grag+ha// chu srin kha nas me lce 'od// glog ltar 'khyug cing stong gsum gsal// gdug pa chu srin kha nas ni// sdig sbrul sbal lcong cho 'phrul 'gyed// stong khams gang zhing klu rnams 'dul// thugs ka'i dpal ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bzhi bcu rtsa bdun lha tshogs
211b3(rnying rgyud): dgu la rigs lnga'i khrag 'thung rdzogs// ye shes lnga ldan dug lnga 'doms// sras kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// bde chen yab yum dbyings su bzhugs// khro bo'i sprul pas nam mkha' gang // khro mo'i sprul pas sa gzhi gang // phra men sprul bas bar snang gang // sgo ba'i sprul pas
211b4(rnying rgyud): bcur 'gyed// khro bo phra men sgo ba'i tshogs// thams cad 'dus pa sras kyi mchog/ ma btab tsam na ldan gyis grub// btab na lha yang brlag par 'gyur// dgra bgegs thig le'i dkyil du kI la ya// dug gsum rtsed nas gcod cig kI la ya// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol cig kI la ya// sem
211b5(rnying rgyud): bag chag skyongs shig kI la ya// sems nyid dbyings su bsgrims shig kI la ya// dbyings las bde chen rgyas gyur kI la ya// srul sdus 'gro don mdzod cig kIl la// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn ba~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ e ma to/ sems ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin te// nam mkha' nyid las cho 'phrul 'byung /
211b6(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul nam mkha'i dbyings la thim// rnam rgyal yang dag don 'di nyon// thams cad 'dus pa'i sras mchog nyid// sbyor sgrol sbyor slor thim pa'i tshe// nam mkha'i klong nyid las byung ngo // gdod na sa ma skyes rang bzhin rnam par dag/ srid pa'i phur bu grub pa'i phyir// gzhi dang la ma dang 'bras bu nyid/
211b7(rnying rgyud): mdadang las yang dag ste// dag dang ma dag dbyer med dbyings// bas ma dang ma bsam brjod du med// cho 'phrul sna tsho ga cir snang yang // b+hag dbyings kyi dang nyid du// thams cad bde ba klong nas shar// bsam gyis mi khyab kun las 'das// brjod med dbyings kyi thig le che// 'gro ba yongs la thams cad kyang/
