244b7(rnying rgyud): su su du
245a1(rnying rgyud): na// smras / nan// sa ga // nga/ /
245a2(rnying rgyud): budad 'gro// nying 'khrag gnas thob ni// yan med pa la bsam pa yis// kho nyid lus po bsreg par bya// gyi dang nang gi nyams na ni// man nga ga rim pas myong gzhong bsad// yang nams zlog shes par bya// yang na dgug par shes par bya/
245a3(rnying rgyud): bying pid man// rta yis nges pa gas dpar bya// thar pa btab stegs dpar bya// bor 'phang thod pa ma la thog tu'o// 'di stong gzhom pa rtse// dam nyams ngas par bskal bar bya// bdag nyid bslang babyang bzlogs// 'thag pa gong bzhen ma chong rten
245a4(rnying rgyud): cas// dmangs cang ba dres pa yis// mthar rangs pa kun la yang // thugs pas lung bzlog brtags la ngaT// bum pa dag 'a dgo par bya// 'ogatugs dpa'i rim pa bya// 'khor po phrang ba bcas pa'o// steng du sung ba rim pa yang // ma
245a5(rnying rgyud): gsum byas pa// lung bathog thags bris gzhag par bya// ma la 'og man ngag shes par bya// sbyin las phung ngor de bzhin no// bskyed pa la sogs de bzhin bya// lung ba bklog pa'i rtsa sngags bzlas// ting nge 'dzin gyis bsrung bzlog pas// bar byar zung gyi sa
245a6(rnying rgyud): bcwa// thung ba'i bor yang 'bang bar bya// de dag gabs su shes pa'o// cabs bsngal te byed bzlog pas// lo nying banas tegs bar bya// phrang pa dbang bslar byi brlabs pas// mkhas pas yang dag kyang bar bya// gang thung ma da ngag rim bani ba /
245a7(rnying rgyud): grang ba'i madring po thal du ga dgas// ting gsada' da pur pa gdag// grong 'ab sa grags pa las rnams kyi// mdan pa'i ris brdzogs byas nas// bdag bgrang brda jog nyid chi// 'di byung pa'i ra na ste// ku pags par nges pa nga /
245b1(rnying rgyud): sems can gzhan yang bsrung ba na// gang mtshams dbang dang bskur bar bya// srang ba 'khor lo phrar pa dang // bca' thabs gong bzhin shes par bya// spang ba'i sngags ni btu babras// ma gnod nam mo bsrung // sa bdag gnod nas bdag 'azung // bdang
245b2(rnying rgyud): po la sogs pa// srung ba'i man ngag legs par bya// rims nad la sogs bsrung ba yang // khyad par man ngag gis shes bya// ser ba b.lung ba'i rim bzhin no// 'khor lo phur ba rdzas rnams ni// kun la dgos par ngas bshad do// thugs rje ldan pa'i sngags
245b3(rnying rgyud): des// phur pas thams cad bsrung bar bshad// de bzhin nyid ni ma bcos pa// kun tu snang ba'i snang ba gsal// rgyu ni kun gyi rgyu ru bshad// dus dang gnas skabs shes pa yi// gang byas mngon sangs rgyas par bshad// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa
245b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rtsa ba rnal 'byor chen po yang dag pa'i chud las/ ma na ngag mtha' ba tshul bstan pa ste le'u bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang karma he ru kas/ kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho 'jigs byed thugs rje can// nges tshigs
245b5(rnying rgyud): rnam par nges pa dang // bshad pa'i don rnams yang dag pa// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don phyir gsungs// de skad gsol pas kI la yas// gsan te rab tu bka' stsal pa// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rnal 'byor chen po rigs can gyi// de yi phyir nangs bshad do//
245b6(rnying rgyud): dang po tshigs su bcad pa gsum// ting 'dzin nam gsum rim pa bzhin// lu gsum lta ba yin zhes bya// de 'og yi ge tshigs bcad gsum// gzhal yas khang na ye shes sems// de 'og tshigs su bcad pa bzhi// rtsa ba bskyed pa yang na ni// gnas slar
245b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs su shes par bya// de 'og sngags ni rtsab ste// rtsabs don bzhir shes par bya// de 'og 'khrug bcas dem gsum ni// kho bo ga byed par shes par bya// 'khrugs bcas tshigs gsum phur pa rngas// de 'og tshigs gsum gsol btab pa// de'og tshigs pani/
246a1(rnying rgyud): na dbang bslang bas// 'og gnyis la shes bsrung bar shes// zab ma byeng bzur ngam shes bya// de 'gagasang sngags can bcug cig/ phyogs bcum pa'i gsang sngags pan// dang gdung chog gas / da
246a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khong spyan drangs bzhin// de 'og gsum ni dngos grub dang // rtags dang mtshan ma dzin yin no// de'og dus la bab brgyad ni// gnad la dbab pa'i klong drug dang // sgrub thabs drug tu shes par bya// de 'og dkyus tshig bcu gcig pa//
246a3(rnying rgyud): mchod pa dbul bar bya// sngags ni yab yum bcas pa dang // bsku dang sgo dang mchod pa'o// gnad dbab tshe lung khrus lung ngo // de 'og sngags ni yon tan dag/ nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya// de 'og dpyas tshig bkyed pa ni// sras pa drug ste mchod yin
246a4(rnying rgyud): no// de 'og gsang sngags lnga pa ni// khro bo dag dang mtshams lnga'i wa// de 'og drug ni gab sngags yin// de 'og dkyus tshig bzhi pa ni// dmacan gnad la dbab pa'o// gsang sngags gsum ni khro bo'i sngags// de 'og bdag nyid ma yi sngags// de 'og shAn
246a5(rnying rgyud): ma yi sngags// de 'og bas mo bzhi pa sngags// 'khor bcad gcod mdo sngags yin// de 'og dkyus tshig drug pa ni// stobs chen las rnams 'grub par byed// sngags ni stobs chen ma mor bcas// las gnyer gtang ba yin par shes// de 'og bzhinam
246a6(rnying rgyud): 'jal// med par byed pa'i cho ga yin no// sngags ni steng ngog tho bo yin// de 'ogs nigan bsreg 'phang // de 'og mchong du shes par bya// de 'og dkyus tshig gsum pan// ster ba'i mchod pa dpral bar bya// chags ni pras ma ma bcas pa dang // @
246a7(rnying rgyud): dang spos dang mchod pa dang // dbyed thangasams rnamagasum dang // gzis pa'i shes pa nas // de 'og dbus tshig sa pa ni// bden pa pang dang gnas sa dang // phan la smon lamade shes bya// dus gsum bde gshegs snying ba ni// rdo zung du gno
246b1(rnying rgyud): blang bshad// thams cad phur par rtogs byu na// des nings par theg zin shes// gtsa ba las ni the tsom med// dan chos dbyangs mi 'brur byad// gzhon na gzugs phran ma gnyis sa// yum ni byengs las shes par bya// sras na pang zam las /
246b2(rnying rgyud): de// mchog ni rtogs pa med pa'o// rdo bo dbyings las ye shes ces// nyon mongs pa dag khro bar byed// de don gsum du shes par bya// rjem shes rab dbyings yin no// ma men gang dang 'brel ba te// mgo brtan dag tu shes par bya// dang por dpal
246b3(rnying rgyud): par bya// rtsis nas las rnams byed pa ni// don dang ldan pas dam cad ben// phung pa'i don ni nges par bshad// bsnyen pas lha nyid nye ba ste// bsrub pas don gyis dbras pa hral// bsad pas mAr gdon rje za// bsreg pas nyon 'ongs bsog pa men// maung rje/
246b4(rnying rgyud): dam can zod pa'o// mnan pas phung lnga mnan pas so// nyon mongs ma lus mnan pa'o// nyon mongs ye shes gnas pa'o// gnas pa med par bshad pa yin// 'dis ni ngas rnams 'chad pa'o// dkyil ni ye shes phrar bu la// 'khor ni yon tan kun yid do//
246b5(rnying rgyud): ba kun 'dus yin pas te// bdag ni thams cad dbang du 'gyur// phyogs ni rol pa'i cha la nges// khro bo 'dul bar byed pa'o// phur pa mtshon par byed pa ste// rdzas ni mtshan mar nges pa'o// dkyil ni rang rang gtso bo la// 'khor ni kun la shes par bya// dbang bcur
246b6(rnying rgyud): che bar byed pa'o// spyan dang don dang ldan pa ste// mdzad pa mnyes par shes par bya// de la sogs pa'i nges pa ni// nal 'byor yang dag ldan pas skyed// 'debs pa la sogs nges pa ni// rdo yin po'i nam ni langs la gdab// rdo rje bdud ni nam gang dag la
246b7(rnying rgyud): gdab// rdo rjem mo grod la shes par bya// rdorje srin po nyi ma grang la'o// de min yang nadus la bab// gang dag btab pas sngags pa cad// de bas dus tshad rab shes pas// gang byas 'bras bu nyid du byur// 'jig rten na phrin dran du 'khol// dngos du brda
247a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis 'phob 'tha// ga na mardzas pan/ tugs na sanamang gyu// bklas pal pas das tu/ sa gsu s+ho/ mya pags sa la gdal rgya byedab sadag nga
247a2(rnying rgyud): rnam par gzod pa ste'i bu brdung sa pa'o// de nas 'ayor byang chub sems dpa' mang po dang / dam can de gras can mang ngo'i tshags mang pos gtsob pa sogs pa la brtod pa/ chos nyid dang las spar ba zhings rngo chen no// brang bas thams cang pa
247a3(rnying rgyud): lus mkhyed par mdzad// tsham sa gang sgra nabs rdegs pa grol bar 'dzad// yab zlam gnyis med sbal phyag 'tshal bstod// rang byung phung thu ye shes lnga ldan dug lu 'joms// phrin las lnga'is dregs pa srol ma nga yang dag dgod// rtogs de la pa'i las 'dzang
247a4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa lnga// sras mchog lnga 'i yul gus pas phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shes rol pa'i stobs bcus mi dge 'joms// sugasung thugs kyis gdug pa me lus sgrol bar mdzad// yang dgadon gyis log pa rnam par dren 'dzud pa// khro 'ab bus phul phyag 'tshal
247a5(rnying rgyud): btsud/ byang chub sems dpa' sbal ba'i po nyamo// ye shes don las bla thabs gzugs 'dzin cing // rdzogs pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus 'dral ma dang // bla chen pa 'tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shes pas kyi do rnams sa lus rdzogs par 'dzad/
247a6(rnying rgyud): dbyings las nges pas the tshom gcod par rab mkhas pas// 'khor ba ma lus sems can lus ngag yid gsum tshe rma par byed// karma he rug la dang bas phyag 'tshal bstod// ces lan mang por bstod pa dang / mchod pa mang pos mnyes par byas so// de nas badz+ra kI la yas
247a7(rnying rgyud): gang kyi ma lugs sogs bstan pa/ rdo rje srin po'i gang dang dorje nam par gsor nas 'bor rnams la gdams pa rnam par bshad pa 'di ga sungs so// nyid cigags pa dag la sogs nyon// dong thang pa'i tshogs phrad la// byed la sogs pa'i bor rnams kyang// nen
247b1(rnying rgyud): tu dang ba nges par zhog/ phyi rab dug lnga smin pa yi// sems can rnams la snang bar gyis// mkhas shing dang tshul bzang ba dang // rigs ldan dam tshig ldan pa yis// gang bsrub las rnams 'grub nges pa// de la rab tu snang bar gyis// bstan pa'i snying po gang gnas
247b2(rnying rgyud): par// dam can yongs kyang gnas 'gyur te// der ni legro ba mang po 'byung // khyed kyis de yis grogs mchog kyis// gsang sngags shin tu rnal 'byor 'di// sangs rapas bdun gyis ma gsungs te// sems can dang bzang las med yin// phyis ni gnyis su mi 'byung
247b3(rnying rgyud): de yang gong bzhin shes par bya// 'dir ni las rnams tha dad pa// nyon mongs rags kyang las skal can// mi mjed 'di ru snang ba yin// de phyir de yis don de shes// gzhung dang mi ldan rnal 'byor pas// 'di bcangs de yis de srog gcod// 'di ni nyid kyis mi sdang byos
247b4(rnying rgyud): de bas nga yi lung chen la// tshig 'ga' zos na sangs rgyas nges// 'di ni ko sa la yi gling // der ni rigs can de la 'bab// srul pa 'jig rten mi gnas cho// khyed kyi sprul ba pad ma'i rgyal// de yi nus pas don byed 'gyur// des na 'di ni gsang ba'i tshe// rnal 'byor nges
247b5(rnying rgyud): par khyed kyis zung // kun 'byung gyur pa shes pa yis// des na 'di ni phur bar gzung // rlag par byed dang 'dul bar byed// gnyis su med pa'i rgyud du zung // the tshom ma lus gcod pas na// phyi ma zhes par rab tu zung // nyon mongs brgya stong phrag mang yang // kun
247b6(rnying rgyud): gyi rtsa ba ma yin pa// theg pa brgya stong phrag mang yang // nges par theg pa gcig tu bshad// yang na gnyis te de 'dir 'dus// srid pa brgya stong phrag mang yang // yang dag rtsa bar 'gro ba'i lam// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // de la de brten nges sangs kyis//
247b7(rnying rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa'i thig las med// ces gsungs so// 'khor rnams dam tshig can du gyur nas/ don khas blangs te mchod pa mang pos mchod nas/ phyir rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo // bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya la sogs pa rnams kyang / lu snang ba dang stong pa'i dbyings ye
248a1(rnying rgyud): shes laganyis sa med par gyur to// rdo'i phung ba gas pa'i ba rnal 'byar chen po yang dag pa'i klung las/ brjod pa dang \u0f88\u0f90nga gtang pa rtsel bu nyi shu na/ rngon phung pa gsang pa'i 'du rgyang du
248a2(rnying rgyud): yang dag pa'i rgyud/ rtogs pa'i rgyal pa'i rgyud kyi ma zhes bya 'ardzogs so/ rgyag kyi mkhan po pardzas maN+Dawa dang / bod kyi lo sgrub chen pa phrad ti ro la N+Di tas bkru ci zus te gtan la 'bang 'o// / cag ga / A
248a3(rnying rgyud): yatan+t+ra d+ham/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa chen po rdo rje phrer ba'i rjid/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo gzhon nu la phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu bzang po'i nga nyid las// bshad pa dri med 'od ldan krud// bde gshegs thams cad byin rdzas 'byung / sa sa nas dang chub sems
248a4(rnying rgyud): dang 'thams cad kyi brtan pa na / sem ga rten gi nas sat+pal pa'i sa/ na mangs rnams ci sa bang byed pa'i ba byu gshegs bathub pa 'i dbang portso zugs sa// de nas pa stan thams ca dang shing du pa las de 'don da // dra na ga
248a5(rnying rgyud): kyis mi khyab ba gcig gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba'i zhing khams na/ sangs rgyas dad pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba bzugs te/ des ni drang ba nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu sel bar mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi
248a6(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba na/ sangs rgyas ye shes gsalnga ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des ni btu gsal ba dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi zhing khams 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba na sangs rgyas sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa
248a7(rnying rgyud): sa su
248b1(rnying rgyud): bas cad kun thos thab ti / donathams cad mthar byin cing rtsub par mdzad// dbashin du 'du'atham bdag pa stod pa pang de bzhin du ltung bas gyur // rnam gsu sa na myanags pa banod ston payon na/ dra'ar bya nas na sa rgya bar tsu ba/
248b2(rnying rgyud): rab tu 'dul ba'i don mdzad par gyur to// de nas yang 'dul ba'i dbang du bstan pa yid 'ong kun gyi l+ya zhes bya gsungs te/ rigs gsum phyag na rdo rje dang rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dbyings chen po dang / dag pa kun gyi mchog tu gyur ba'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa nyid kyi skabs mchis
248b3(rnying rgyud): mi rtsub panyin du 'gyur ro// badren pa gsum dang khyad par gsum gyi don ston pa ste/ rnam pa gsum rigs sa ma nges par byung ba ste/ rnam pa rdzang bde gshegs nyid du shes pa ste/ srung ba yang rnam pa lnga khon ste de nyid don la nges par rtogs pa nyid du bya'o// cig char 'jug pa gang yin
248b4(rnying rgyud): pade nyid du 'jug pa'o// tshad du byinas kun 'bras bu ste/ sa rnams mtha' du stsol ba nyid do// lam rnams rim pas bgrod pa nyid do// theg pa thams cad phyogs 'dzin che// 'dzin pa nyid de rnam par bltas// de nyid bde 'dzin pa'i dbang // rin chen gser chis gzhis/
248b5(rnying rgyud): thams cid 'dregs pa'i spobs yod kyang // yang dgadon gyi theg pa min// snying po yang dag don las 'byung // rgyu dang 'bras bu mi phyed ste/ mu 'bras gnyis med nges pa'i don// bya las btsal ba'i 'bras bu gcig/ dus mtha' nyid du yongs mi rnyed// du nyid 'bras
248b6(rnying rgyud): bu'i mchog yin d+hing// chos nyid ye nas smros bral lA// 'dzin pa rdzogs can gang nas thub// gzung bas phyogs su 'dzin pa yin// stong pa'ing bo gang yin pa// snang ba nyid du 'gag pa med// snang ba dngos med spos dang bral// snang stong gnyis med 'dzin dang bral/
248b7(rnying rgyud): 'ab 'dzin nyid gyud/ des na pa zhig/ da drugs sa/ cad mam sa bzhi du// dpan do da zag// skyes dgas pa rdzogs na// mdun thags /
249a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ na // su sa/ na
249a2(rnying rgyud): gas// bags sa gas da// dang she shegs pa'i smrag+sa/ gang rdzog rdzo / 'on ni nam nu da/ dulas las rdzogs ga/ kyim pa das sa pang / sa //
249a3(rnying rgyud): medang dod dang thA lA// ye shes rjod ba'i chog las 'das// ye shes bsam pa'i dmigs dang bral// ye shes ba'i 'bras pa med// de nyid nga mig pa shes yin// 'ams gsam gnas pa'i sems can yang // da byung ye shes dang gnas par// rang du dag 'a dang
249a4(rnying rgyud): malus// de pyid tu 'bras dbye med// mu nyid 'bras bu'i mchog tu bstan// sangs rgyas stong pa la sangs rgyas// dus rnams kun las dpar byung // che ba 'angs las cher byung // ma btang gsal ba'i son med byung // kun ci nyid po 'bras bu'i gter// rang med pas
249a5(rnying rgyud): dogs mi 'cha'// dogs pa med pas nya mang med// kun kyang de bzhin ro dogs med// chos nyid dbyings kyi rang bzhin las// chos can tha dad snang ba ni// bar snang 'ja' tshon chu zla 'dra// 'dzin pa brtas pa gse ltar mkhregs// de dogs 'bras bu nyam pyod/
249a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis byung ba spyad pa tshom sa// nges par gtan la mkhegs byer// yang dag nyid du gang rtogs pa// de nyi gang tugs sangs rgyas na// de nyid kyi 'brus pa de ba'i don// snying po dam pa de la bya// de ni khor 'das gnyis cig gi// bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po mi
249a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun gyi 'byung gnas yin// don dam phur pa dbyings la sgrol// bdag 'dzin pa pe phur ba ni// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'dzin pa'i bya// don dam chos nyid phur pas 'joms// bde bar 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni// 'dzin pa'i don la khyad par med// spang
249b1(rnying rgyud): blang med pa'i snang ba yis// gang 'dzin 'dzin pa rnam par grol// 'dzin pa mang par don rtogs na// mtshag med sbyang kyang byang chub thob// ye nas gnas pa'i phur ba yin// dang por 'khor bar 'dzin pa ni// ma togs pa las ma rig byung // de yis bag
249b2(rnying rgyud): chags kun gzhir gyur// de las kun gzhi'i rnam shes byung // de las gzhi byung rnam pa gnyis// gcig las snang ba tha dad pas// 'khor 'das bsam med brjod las 'das// nyi ma'i zer ltar rnam par 'byung // theg le sdang zhing yod pa las// rang rgyad
249b3(rnying rgyud): dngos po gzhi la med// 'dra gzhi kun las rnam par 'khrul// med par 'khrul pa mi 'byung bas// mi srid rnam pa'i don rtags 'byung // yod pas 'khrul par gyur ba ni// gzhi la dang rgyud yod pas na// 'khor ba dang chung sangs mirtsa// gzhi las btags
249b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzhi nyid ni// bag chags sogs pa'i gzhir gnas kyang // btags pas gzhi nyid der mi gnas// me gnas bag chags gzhi dang bral// des na nyon mongs gos pa med// rdo rje phur pa kun gyi gzhi// 'khor ni rnam shes mang pos bskor// 'joms ni
249b5(rnying rgyud): dzin byed phyogs chung 'joms// thob ni lce med rang bzhin thob// de nyid ye nas phur pa yin// don du mchos nyid phrar ba ni// kun la gnas pas khyab pa'i dbyings// che bar gnas pa'i ye shes lnga// 'dzin pas ma bslad myang ngan 'das// ngang 'dzin brtas pas 'phor
249b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyu// gzhi ni ma bcos dbyings nyid las// 'khor ba'i sdang gzhi me long 'dra// mya ngan 'das pa rtogs pa'i dbyings// dag dang ma dag chos rnams kun// chos nyid phur pa rtogs pa'i dang // ye shes lnga yi phur pa la// nyon mongs lnga ni dbyings nas sgrol// /
249b7(rnying rgyud): sgra gsung thugs kyi phur pa yis// dug gsum su gsung thugs la sbyor// yang dag don nyid phur pa ni// ma spangs ma bsdu za btsal ba med// ma bslad ma bcos bsgyur du med// de nyid rtogs na phur pa'i don// nges pa'i don gyi phur pa yang // nges par gdeng sum
250a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ gyur bar// b+ha bcugs 'dzin bcud kyis// byud pa rnam gnyis dang ga srung// 'bras kyang nam stug pa sam // del bdag shegs ldan rlab sa gyis// thags ni'i thar bsag yang 'bral/
250a2(rnying rgyud): pa'is// maba'adabyings nyon mongs dbyings la srung // 'dus byas phrar pa rnam bzhi yis// zhing bcu gtan nas stongs par byed// rol pa sna tshogs cir yang sdang // chos nyid phung paba'i rol pa len// rdo rje phur pa'i ra bzhin na//
250a3(rnying rgyud): 'di// ci ste ye nas phur pa yin// ci ste 'khor ba ci ltar 'byung // ci ste mya ngan ci ltar 'das// ci ste 'khor 'das ci ltar mnyam// ci ste phur pa ci yi phyir// ci ste phur pa gang la gdab// ci ste rol pa ci ltar snang // ci ste sras su ci ltar brjed//
250a4(rnying rgyud): don nyid gang // ye nas phur pa'i rol pa las// ci ste lung dang 'gal mi 'gyur// rang la rang chas gnas pa yin// ma rig pa las kun gzhi 'byung // phra rags rtog pa so sar ljin// dag pa nyid du de rtogs pas// rang byung ye shes de las 'byung //
250a5(rnying rgyud): su med pas mnyam pa ste// mnyam pa'i dus na bzang ngan med// ma bcos don nyid phung ba'i chu// chos nyid phung khrugs rjes bsrel// rnam pa bzhi dranges par gdab// zhi dang khro yang de bzhin 'byung // dus gsum bde gshegs byin rlabs las// gzhi
250a6(rnying rgyud): yis don rnams ma lus 'grub// chos nyid ye nas phur dpal// gang ltar bstan pa de ltar te// 'khor 'das la shan dbye ba'i phyir// yi ge tog med spos dang bral// don nyid daphyar ba'i dbyings la spos// don yang de las g.yos pa med// yang dag nyid kyi phung pa
250a7(rnying rgyud): las// sangs rgyas sems can ga nyis med pas// de nyid ldang ba rna gnyis gni// b+ha bdon maphur ba las// rol pa cid yang 'gag pa med// de nyid ma spangs srung ba'i byis// phyogs med smos bral zung ba'i dbyings// ni nyid phyogs sug dzid/
250b1(rnying rgyud): thal da / sa sa pa'i zas dang/ sal bcad pa ldan pas grab/ byams thamamams la mnams cug// pa namams thal sa sa dang / bang bdag tang dag dgang / gtan las thang sarnags rangam/ 'ang
250b2(rnying rgyud): 'artan pacwa// btan pas can gas pa gtan// da pa med par rgyags 'byung // phan chas nyin pa la/ yang samamams can gnyis med de// gang du 'dzin pa ldan pa'i sa// zug cig 'bras tha zang nganaganyis/ rtogs pa ma pa de ste dang /
250b3(rnying rgyud): nga las// gsu mtshal ba'i byas ga yang // de bzhin nyid las nyams pa med// 'a' ba'i rnam mo stong na la yang // 'asgral pa'i gzhi la rung pa'o// 'phrul pa dgarlung ba dam pahU~M// dam pa'i shes pa dang 'dzin// tsha' bar ba
250b4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i ga// bstan pa de bang rgyal bas gsungs// rgyal bgrangs med brjod las 'das// zad pa med cing 'jal ba med// de pyir chos dbying sa gting dpag dka'/ 'khor ba 'byung ba 'bral ba ste// 'bral pa ma dag shes pa'o// 'arig pa nyed
250b5(rnying rgyud): shes // rnyeng ba rtogs pas man pa bzhin// dag pa rjid bzhin 'jur// de bzhin ma rig ma shes pas// togs na nga dang yeshes te// nyi ma thang pa ba 'ang// bsal ba med par dang dngas 'gyur// dag pa nyid labs la ba med// dgang mar
250b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis med pas// nyan mongs ldani ye shes te// nyon mangs rtogs na pa shes byas/ nyon mongs nyid kyang ngos bzung bral// bde ba sanyis kyang 'dzin pa rgyas/ byang chubs mas las thams cad dbyung // marig martogs 'khor ba 'byung // na nyid gas dab
250b7(rnying rgyud): gshegs// 'bor bgrangs pa'i rol na// sangs rgyas byab brtags pa yin// dbyi ba ma sa das// 'khong 'das cad rnams myed// gzhis / 'acwas thus pa rtsen// smi pas pang 'das sa sa// das ga rnam par smyan/
251a1(rnying rgyud): lar dga' ba longs slod 'byung // la lar nyon mongs rtsod pa 'byung // la bar dang 'dzin kun gyi gzhi// la la gti mug byol song gnas// la lang ser sna yi dwags te// la lar na sdang dmyal ba'i gnas// matogs
251a2(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs gzhi las byung // dug lnga rang gi 'khor bar smin// 'khor ba bsam med brjod las 'das// 'khor ba rtogs pa mya ngan 'das// la par mngon par 'gog par 'jug/ la lar stong nyid lugs 'byung bkag/ la lar rnal 'byor rnam gnyis sngo/
251a3(rnying rgyud): la lang dag pa phyogs dang bral// la lang bde gshegs rigs rdza rgyas// la lang rim pa khad kyis bsgom// la lar rdzogs pa'i ngang du gnas// sa la ma rim pa nyid du gnas// gcig la 'bras bu so sor sprin// bde ba 'dod pas chagal pa ste// lta ba
251a4(rnying rgyud): phyogs su blta ba dang // bsgom pa dmigs gtad bcas pa dang // khyod pa spyad du yod pa dang // sa lam bgrod du yod pa dang // 'bras bu re dogs yod pa yis// phyogs su bltas pas rim par 'byung // theg pa'i rim pa bsam yas kyang // nges par
251a5(rnying rgyud): theg pa gcig las med// 'bras bur dogs grangs med kyang // nges par 'bras bu gcig las med// lam gyi rim pa bsam yas kyang // nges pa'i lam mchog gcig las med// sa lam bgrod pa bsam yas kyang // nges pa'i sa thob gcig las med//
251a6(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa'i rim pa grangs med kyang // nges par bsgom pa gcig las med// ye shes khyad par bsam yas kyang // don dam ye shes gcig las med// bstan pa'i rim pa bsam yas kyang // nges pa'i bstan pa gcig las med// sangs rgyas grangs
251a7(rnying rgyud): meng brjod 'das kyang // nges pa'i sangs rgyas gcig las med// dpyir rtogs parabacu gces// rtogs pa'i don nyid mthunan// bskos pa rtogs pa'i drab rtse// rnga bar 'dzin pas don mi 'thab/ rnam pa da drug kyi ste// gas
251b1(rnying rgyud): pas snangs cas na// sangs cas dang la gnas pa la// pha la gzhan nas kyi btsal// btsal nas pathas dunab pa sad// nga ga 'bras tha' lags tA// gzhan nas 'byung bag la med// 'byung ba byung ba dang thang nas// bstan
251b2(rnying rgyud): me 'di'i// pha rol phyin pa don gyi mchog/ shes rab pha rol phyin gyur na// bsam gtan pa rol rang bzhin 'byung // brtson 'grus pha rol ma phyin na// shes rab pha rol togs mi sred// shes rabya pha rol gyin pa las// pharol gyi ni lnga 'ong la byung
251b3(rnying rgyud): dephyir shes rab rtogs pa gces// shes rab ye shes mi po ches// nyon mongs gtan nas skems par byed// 'dzin gzhi gtan nas stongs par byed// sa la ma bgrod pa'i tholas stongs// ro ngogs 'bras bum dogs pa med// re ba med phyir ngogs
251b4(rnying rgyud): yi'acha'// ye shes mtshon chen 'bar ba yis// sa lam bsgom pa'i go las gcod// 'dzin pa dang gyud rtsab 'byin// kun tu bzang po'i rol pa las// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'byung // sems can kun la sman slad du// gtan la dpang
251b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes la// phab pas nges par 'dzin pa med// ngos bzung bral ba'i ye shes la// phyogs su gzung dug la yod// bgrod du med pa'i sa lam la// rim pas bgrod drug la yod// de dogs med pa'i 'bras bu la// thob par sems pag la
251b6(rnying rgyud): yod// 'bras bu ro dogs gnyis dang bra la// chu 'bras gnyis med de ltar byung // rtswa nyid 'bras bu'i mchog nyid pas// chu las spangs pa'i 'bras bu med// rgyu de nyid du 'bras bur sdang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni// dri nyid chos nyid nges bzung
251b7(rnying rgyud): thal// dang nyid 'dzin pag la yod// 'dzin pas ma bzung nges bzung bral// 'khor 'das mnges zhen pa med// thams cad mkhyen pa de yi phyir// ston pas thams cad mkhyen pa gzigs// 'khor yang de las gzhan pa med// gtso 'khor gnyis med tham
252a1(rnying rgyud): nas // la sa sa hA// byu na nas// ga ga 'a 'di spyan pa can// dub ban byug// bya sa pa/ smad
252a2(rnying rgyud): bgrod pa yang // tsal pa'i ngom pan ma byung // thadang 'bras pa kyad par can// thob pan 'ad pa'i dgasan na// sma 'bras bu thug sang don// thams da ma thas gcig tung byed// 'dral 'arnam pa dam chog dang / dpa 'a gyur/
252a3(rnying rgyud): rma dang blang dang man gdang // bstan pa byas dang ni ba dang // 'dul ba'i lha dang can dang rngus// rdzas dang spyod pa mngon du bstan// bcad nga jugasum la ga sum dang // ma shi chung stenam par 'artags// gsal dag sa pa'i drim med//
252a4(rnying rgyud): ma 'a// da dgami zluman g.yon// gtan pa bas pa sa byed/ mings med tsam mi dang / 'dral ba ba du sru las sa/ gas ma bdag suMgs la ba ste// gas snam kyis kyi rkyen
252a5(rnying rgyud): chub sems pas thaMng / nyis mye da pa / ma sa/ gang rnams / dam sa na/ swA / rnam ma sa rgyags
252a6(rnying rgyud): thomagrol bdang / dadu tha pag dang pa / su'i thangs mnam par 'an/ nges pa yang dag pa nyung ba bcun// gang sa byim pas pa nga / zhem 'od thoms pa dgras pa// da dgas papa
252a7(rnying rgyud): dgas rlom pa'i tham nan/ sa ga ngag na yod// tsha nyid pa sa phyogs thal yang/ 'dzin pa'i rdzu phru gyu// 'anas das shems pa pa na// shes dag sa/
252b1(rnying rgyud): dbyang gis gnyis sa snang // nga na chen badz+ra dang // las dang dbazhin gshegs pa'i rigs// thugs ni gas la la rtag pa med// dper na mam nyid dang 'dra// yan t+tan ga ter nyid za pa med// zad pa med tha thams cad 'byung // dper na yid bzhen
252b2(rnying rgyud): rgyo bu'ang// gsung mchog cha pa'i sla dbyangs te// dper na brag cha'i rang bzhin 'dra// phrin las mthar phyin sna tshogs spod// dper nagar ma pan nyid dang 'dra// su mchog gsal la rtog pa med// dper na me long gzugs brnyan 'dra// rangadapung ye shes
252b3(rnying rgyud): stobs po che// ri rab rdul dang thig pa dang // stong gsumachod dugazhal ba dang // khams gsum dbang du bsdu ba dang // sangs rgyas grangs med 'byung ba dang // 'khor ba kru drug pa 'khor dang // ri rab chog por 'phen pa dang // rgya mtsho gting nas skems pa dang //
252b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad dang byang stobs las byung // dang byung yau shrIs ma rtogs pas// yin pa 'odan ting ngos shes/ lhan cig nyes pa'i ma rig pas// de nyid gzhi sa kun gzhi b+h+ring // dge dang ming go'i bag chags gyen// me long g.ya' bzhin rnam par sbyar/
252b5(rnying rgyud): rig pas bsam pas 'khor bar grub// bde ba'i 'bras bu'i thang tsam med// dper na shing rta'i 'phang lo 'dra// thar pa'i dus med lhag bsngal che// rang nyid rang gis sdug bsngal las// 'bras bu mi mthun so sor smin// rtogs pas dge ba bsod
252b6(rnying rgyud): nams las// bsgom dang bslab pa'i rim pa yis// mthar thug 'bras bu mi thob ste// gnas skabs bde ba'i sa lam 'byung // des na kun gzhi gnyis rdzi gzhi// gnyis 'dzin bsags pas sangs rgyas med// rang byung ye shes rang byung bas// ma ri
252b7(rnying rgyud): rang byung tha dad med// rang byung ye shes ma ri gdangs// de nyid pa byung ye shes yin// lhan cig mi ri gar 'byung ste// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi bsag gzhi med// dper nanam mkha' stong pa 'dra// kun brtags ma rig gzhi med pas// 'khor
253a1(rnying rgyud): pa rgya/ ma sa / mas su gan sa

253a7(rnying rgyud): na 'dub tshan mi bdu khru do dres dus 'a mibyas/ dri sa kyi sa sami gsus macad du// she gra dus su 'angs sa/ sa
253b1(rnying rgyud): ba'o// gdug pa chen po 'dul ba'i gnas// mtsham med lda ne bde ldan gnas// nyon mongs lnga ni ye shes lnga// rigs lnga bde gshegs phung po lnga// sems dpa' sems ma rnam shes rnams// byin ci log pa ni khro bo bzla// nyon mongs
253b2(rnying rgyud): drug ni thub pa drug/ thams cad lha yi rang bzhin la// gzhal yas b+hin+ta brjid chen las// bzhugs pa'i don gyis de ru bzhugs// lha rnams don gyis de na bzhugs// rang bzhin lha dang mchod pa dang // 'dzab bsnyen bstod pa tshogs pa dang //
253b3(rnying rgyud): kun kyang rgyas pa rab tu bya// rim pas 'jug cing 'bras bu sbyin// tshang du phyin pa yang dag nyid// rnam bzhi'i 'bras bu rim par 'jug/ yang nas yang du rnam par rtog/ phung po he ru rnam lnga ru// 'byung ba lnga dang ye shes lnga// rnam shes badz+ra ka~M tI
253b4(rnying rgyud): ma// yul brgyad phra min seng ha brgyad// log rtog sgom rta gdong ma// yid ni 'jug byed dbang phyug ma// rang bzhin lha dang rim pa dang // mchod pa dang ni bsnyen pastang mchod// las rnams ma lus kun kyang rdzogs// grangs dang tshad du phyin pa dang /
253b5(rnying rgyud): rim pa bzhi la skabs dang sbyor// grangs kyi rim pa yang dag nyid// de nyid grub pa sku gsung la// gang gis rtogs nas rim par 'jug/ de ma rtogs par sgrib pa gsum// bral ba nyid du yongs mi 'gyur// rtogs na longs sku'i byin rlabs yin// de thos
253b6(rnying rgyud): sgrib pa gsum dang bral// che chung gnyis med yang dag bral// sa rnams rab tu mnan pa'o// lam rnams mtha' ru stsol ba'o// rim pa gnas su 'byor pa'o// dgra rnams tshad gcad 'joms pa'o// stong pa chen po'i chos nyid las// snang stong
253b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med pa ste// snang ba thams cad rdzogs pa'o// rim par 'byung zhing rnam par gnas// phyi nang med par kun tu gsal// rim pa nyid kyis gdan steng du// dregs pa phyogs skyong chen po 'dul ba'i lha// yab yum sras dang bcas pa rnams/
254a1(rnying rgyud): gsal 'a tog med wa les// dregs pa 'dul ba'i markyen du/ nyid las mig zhan zugs las sprul// gtam chog rgyal po badrang dpung 'joms// bde ba gshegs pa'i byed dpas yin// thams cad 'das das
254a2(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur bas// sras kyi dam pa wA li sku// sdang la rang bzhin med pa'i dbyings// de yi 'khor tshogs 'dul ba'i ste// gdug pa'i kho ba khro ma'i tshogs// yang sprul bsam gyis mi khyab pa// gdug pa can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// rang bzhin
254a3(rnying rgyud): dag pa 'i dbyings na bzhugs// 'jig rten rdzogs pa gtul ba yi// khams gsum bdag por dbang bskur te// kun d+ha bzang po'i byin rna pa yin// dbyings nas bzhengs kyang g.yos pa myed// sngang srid dregs pa dbang du srung // gang 'dral sprul pa bas ma mi byed/
254a4(rnying rgyud): 'thob kun la cing yang ston// zhi dang khro ba de bzhin pabyung // rgyas pa chen po dbang yang 'byung // gang bgrub nyid tu rnam par 'byung // sman drangs rim pa ma lus kun// dang ba'i don du yang dag gsungs// byang chub sengs las cad par med// de bzhin
254a5(rnying rgyud): rim pa bas ma las 'das/ brjod kyis mi lang zla bskams kyang // thams cad rig pa byang chub sems// lal gyi khro bo 'dul ba'i rtsa// yang dag min phyer gdul byar grags// sems can kun la rnam par 'tsho// dngos po bzhi la 'grol tog spyod//
254a6(rnying rgyud): nges par gdeng du ma phyin par// 'jig rten 'dul ba'i gdug pa can// nga ro 'don cing che bas bsgyings// 'khor rnams bsdus shing dmag dpung 'joms// ye shes rang rgyang gzung las 'byung // rdo rje sems dpa'i don ma rtogs// kun bzang nam mkha'i lta ba med//
254a7(rnying rgyud): rang lang gi rnam smin ched// grang dang bkris pa de bzhin na// nam smin padaper mgyur bas// thugs chen po'i byin rlapa 'byung // byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// stonang nyid kyang rnam par 'dral// 'khor bya rdo rje sems dpa' yis// rdzas
254b1(rnying rgyud): rnams thams cad sdud pa po// 'brel pa yod pas sdud par 'byung // gzhi nyid dang las mi gzhan te// brjod kyis mi lang theg pa 'byung // skye med don la dgod pa'i phyir// theg pa yang dag de ru bstan// sa dang lam la gnas pa ni// mthar phyi nas thob
254b2(rnying rgyud): theg pa min// lam lnga mthar phyin yang dag min// skabs kyi sa la de bzhin gnas// nyon mongs spyong zhing rim par gnas// shes bya nyid du 'dzin pa gnas// sangs rgyas nyid du de shes par// sangs rgyas che ba'i rnam sems kyis// shes byas
254b3(rnying rgyud): grol ba de nyid min// stong pa nyid du gang 'dzin pa// phyogs su 'dzin pa bltas pa yis// phyogs med don nyid rtogs mi 'gyur// zhen pa med par grol mi 'gyur// spyong pa rig pa rang byung la// gnyis su 'dzin pa rang bltas pas// gzhi ma med pa'i
254b4(rnying rgyud): don mi 'byung // stong pa nyid du skye ba med// skye ba'i chos rnams snang gzhi med// ci yang med pa'i chos nyid las// cir yang snang ba'i sdang gzhi med// gsal la rtog med chos nyid la// rtog pa yang med snang gzhi med/ 3/ sdang la rang bzhin med pa la//
254b5(rnying rgyud): snang ba med pa'i snang gzhi med// dag pa chos nyid lta ba la// ma dag pa yi snang gzhi med// bden pa gsum gyi snang gzhi la// thams cad kun gyi snang gzhi med// yod med bden pa la dor la// rang bzhin snang ba'i sdang gzhi med// lta sgom phyogs su
254b6(rnying rgyud): bral ba la// gnyis su med pa'i snang gzhi med// ma rig pa yi rim par 'byung ba la// chos nyid ngos bzung snang gzhi med// rtag chad gnyis su blta ba la// chos nyid brjod pa la snang gzhi med// phyogs su bltas pa'i theg pa yin// rdo rje phur pa'i
254b7(rnying rgyud): chos nyid la// snang dang stong pa'i tha snyad med// med pa ma yin cir yang snang // chos nyed sdang gzhi yod pa las// rdo rje phur ba rnam pazhir grags// chos nyid phur pa srin gyi gzhi// thugs de'i phung pas gdug pa 'dul// gsang ba'i phur bas 'dod

255a2(rnying rgyud): smras/ smra na ma nga/

255a5(rnying rgyud): yin / / phyi
255b1(rnying rgyud): khams gsum thams cadathal ba na// phyugs ma nyung bdusargyuganas/ phung ba dgas sa ngas rgyas// 'byung bas nyid byings zhem// khams kyi skyes myed thams d+hasan// 'ad chen byung dus// rnams
255b2(rnying rgyud): cad skye med bde ldan gnas// e ma 'di ltar ngo mtshar che// bstan pa'i don rab 'di lta bya// kun gyi 'byung gnas ngo mtshar che// thams cad 'dul ba ya mtshon che'o// e mabyung chub sems nyid ni// kun la 'byung zhing de mig dang bral/
255b3(rnying rgyud): brjod du med cing kun la snang // snang ba nyid la nges gzung med// e ma rab tu gsang ba'i chos// rdorje phung pa'i rang bzhin las// ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin 'byung // byung yang ye shes dbyings su thim// e ma spangs rgyas thams cad ni/
255b4(rnying rgyud): rigs las 'byung zhing rigs la 'dra// rigs rnams 'byung ba yang dag dbyings// 'dus byas de bzhin dbyigs su thim// dbyings las dbyings byung nga ma // ji mtshar chen po thams cad 'byung // rig pa phyi nang med pa la// gnyis
255b5(rnying rgyud): su snang bar mtshur che// don dam gcig las med pa la// snang ba tha dang ngo mtshar che// chos nyid kun gyi rang bzhin las// dngos por lhab rnam par 'khrul// 'dzin pa med pa'i chos nyid la// 'dzin pa rang rmad rnam par 'phrul// er
255b6(rnying rgyud): sman tu bzang po hrI// thams ca kun gyi rang bzhin te// dper rna me long gzug brgyan 'dra// kun \u0f7f bzang po'i chos nyid ni// chos nyid phung pa kren gyig ni// rab thung ldang ba'i gzhi med kyang // snang zhing rang bzhin sbyin ces grub/
255b7(rnying rgyud): byin nub chen ni// thugs rje'i brang pa chen po yang // bdeg shegs thams cad byin rlab yin// gang lag 'dul gad pa// ma gnyis rje dang 'bras bur barbas/ ma chen longs rgyu // dbang bskur 'ams gsum gzu
256a1(rnying rgyud): pa 'dul// dmang bar bzlang mdunan// lus rnams ma lus dgas pa gyu// sbrul thanam gnyis thags sam na nyid las na gzhan nga bya rnams 'dul ba gdug bcan
256a2(rnying rgyud): yab sum thas dang bcas pa kun// gdul bya'i gnyen por 'byung bar zad// byang chub sems kyi phung du 'di// gsang ba chen po gas pa'i bdag/ gsung babs kyang ches gas ba// mkha' dbyings gnyis su med pa las// mkha' ni dag pa'i ye
256a3(rnying rgyud): dris wA// rdo rje phur pa drag pa'i dbyibs// rwa lnga ye shes lnga yi bdag/ yig 'bru lnga ru 'byung ba yin// rol pa 'byung phyir rnam par gnas// dbyings ni shes rab chos dbyings te// drag pos grol ba e yi dbyings// thams cad nga phyed
256a4(rnying rgyud): phyir ma yi mtshan// ma ni sangs rgyas thams cad babyed// yab kyi dang bzhin mnyes mdzad pa// 'byung ba lnga mi rang bzhin yin// papa sum gnyis su med pal// myong bas thams cad mnyes par mdzad// bde ba da gshegs pa mnyes mdzad
256a5(rnying rgyud): de// khyams gsum sems can nyon mongs spyod// bdud dang srin po log ste 'dul// thams cad byang chub sems kyi khrus/ byad sgrom yang dag de ru 'byu // 'dus byas rdzas kyi zung pa 'dri// rnam pa bzhin yang dga'abyung // gtso'
256a6(rnying rgyud): 'phrul pa s+hog pa/ bzhi mastan ted gis// gdul bu'i lastan mas yang dag mdzad// mno// drung chub sems cidang bzhin la// nam pa zhi rba rnam par skyam/ sems nyid nam mapa'i rang bzhin las// cho 'phrul
256a7(rnying rgyud): bzung babazhin// chos nyid thar pa'i nga bzhin sa// dal brtson pakyi su / 'dris pa'i sa pa sa sreg par byu na/ sa skyeg don pa med pa dang // rlung sde 'dzin par byeng pa dang // ba po sgo bar byed/
256b1(rnying rgyud): pa dang // mi 'gyur dbus su gnon kyang tshul// de yang byin rmab chen pa yin// 'dul ba 'ang ladi ltar snang // ldang ba'i gzhil rol pa 'byung // de yang bral ba chen pa'abyung // ma ma 'di ltar tham da na// gsang ba dang nags bdag/
256b2(rnying rgyud): dbab pa dang ni gcad pa dang // bsnyung bya'i rim pa bsam yas kun// lo dang zlab dus tshod dang // zhag rnams dang ni nyi mdag// bla chen dang ni 'byung 'jug dang // khams rnams dang ni gnan thabs dang // bsnyen bya dang ni bsrab bya dang // gcang
256b3(rnying rgyud): byadang nigs dpya dang // 'khor lo dang ni mtshon sna dang // gtor ma dang ni drag po dang // bskyed pa dang ni sman drangs dang // mchod pa dang ni bstod pa dang // las rnams ma lus rdzogs pa rnams// thugs rje chen po'i rol pa yin// chos rnams
256b4(rnying rgyud): phrad pa'i rol pa las// 'gro ba 'don la di ltar lding // rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kyi mchog/ yang dag don nyid gtan la 'bebs// chos nyid phur pa'i dang bzhin yin// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// lha yang med la 'dre yang med// sangs
256b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas med cing sems can med// 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med// zad pa med cing stong pa med// de bzhin rol pa phyogs med la// lhab tha dad sna tshogs blta// sgom pa las kyi rim pa bsgom// spyod pa mi mnyam tha dad pas// 'bras bu mi mthun tha
256b6(rnying rgyud): dang 'byung // de phyir chos nyid brtag dka' bas// snying po'i don la ma phebs na// tshig tsam bstan pas don mi 'grub// dper na yi ge mkhas pas kyang // nges par gdang du ma gyur par// bri bar nus pa yongs mi 'gyur// skyes bu rtsal dang mi ldan
256b7(rnying rgyud): pha rol thub par nus pa med// de bzhin byang chub sems nyid kyang // gzhi rtsa med par ma shes na// sems nyid gtan la phebs pa med// lha nyid bsgom dang sun drang yang // gzhin med par ma shes na// rta nyid brtags pas log rtog

258a3(rnying rgyud): ngo bol// nges pa gcig tu bstan par dka'// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi rang bzhin la// 'di zhes gcig tu bstan par dka'// e ma 'di ltar ro mtshar che// sems nyid kun tu bzang po la// thams cad 'byu zhing rnam par 'du// rdo rje phung pa ma

258a5(rnying rgyud): bsgyu rgyal ba'i ting 'dzin las// gsang dang gcad dang dbab pa dang // gso dang srung dang bgrub pa dang // 'khor ba nyid kyang bde bar gshegs// chos nyid phur pa'i don togs nA// snying po'i don las 'da' mi srid// 'khor ba kun kyang mya ngan 'das/
258a6(rnying rgyud): don gyi snying po khams gsum khrus// zhes nyid las mi gzhan pa nyid du gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ chos thams cad 'byung ba gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdag pa
258a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ma rtogs gol ba'i sems can la// dus gsum kyal pa'i byin brlabs kyis// thugs rje'i phur bas gdug pa 'dul// sras kyi dam par dbang bskur nas// srin po gdug pa ma lus 'dul//
258b1(rnying rgyud): lha dang gnyis su med pa la// gzung 'dzin can gyi lha mi bsgom// bsgom na 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur// lha dang gnyis su med pa'i phyir// che ba'i lha mchog gsal ba'i 'od// sku lnga dbang bskur thugs la dbang // gsung lnga nyid la rnam par gsal/
258b2(rnying rgyud): dam pa'i bu nyid kun kyang gsal// rim pa bsgom pas rnam par gsal// snang stong gnyis med rnam par dbye// bsgrubs pas sa la rnam par gnas// rnam par thos pas 'dzin pa grol// rdzogs pa'i sa la yang dag phyin// mthar thug 'bras pa

258b4(rnying rgyud): phu lce lu yi bdag/ gsung gi gsung ste gsung gi bdag/ thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi bdag/ yon tan phyin las thams cad kun// byin rlab cho 'phrul nam mkha' 'dra// cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang snang // snang ba nyid na dmigs dang bral/

260b1(rnying rgyud): brtson pa dang // mtshon kyis rtsol ba rnabs pa dang // gsum men kyis shi ba dang // cha ba dung mthang drag pa dang // 'jal dang rdibs dang 'gags pa dang // 'ag par ba dang thag pa dang // rtswa da gang chen bka'a' ba dang // 'am 'i shel nga na
260b2(rnying rgyud): pa dang // ri dang rlung dang sa gtsang dang // gab p+ta rim pa'i rdzas de dag/ bslab pa'i rdzas mchog yin par bshad// ri mra dang kyo ba'i nang rnams dang // 'bog pa drag pos nyes pa dang // mdzod zlab g.yem pa dang // 'bras dang zol mig tag tu gnas/
260b3(rnying rgyud): dmod pa'i kha zug nyes pa'i skyon// chu dang me yi skyon med dang // skyon du 'gyur ba'i rdzas de dag/ mi bcangs rab tu spang bar bya// sgo nag bam dral nyam pa can// rigs med spyod pa kun kyang byed// kha ngan zlos shing lag dran byed// 'thung bas bcing
260b4(rnying rgyud): la shod yangs med// phra ma dbyen rdzun 'gyur ba mkhan// gnyis kyi don la 'gyur ba che// grub pa med par kun la 'jug/ sla ngan sha sngo mig phor che// mjing bzung la sha rtsubs pa// mkhur sha che la gnyer ma mang // so dpra dkos kau yu bzung //
260b5(rnying rgyud): nu ma rnod lu rab tu che// rkeng pa sbom la cha ma byed// ma lha thung la bu lha ring // tshigs pa che la dreg pa chags// rked pa phral rus pa sbom// mthe bong ring zhing sen mo myong // mgo bo che la gsus pa 'bur// nabs mi zos log la dga'// mig
260b6(rnying rgyud): kyang mi bde ra ba rib can// lce yang mi bde dag por sba// gnya' ba dpung mtho mgo bo dma'// ting pa sgrom la sor mo kra// byin pa sbom la bad+ma sha chung // spad phra steng sgom shan ma byed// mchu 'brug na 'byung sna zhom dang // mchogs mjib dang breb
260b7(rnying rgyud): 'jod// mi bcad de 'dra spang ba'i rdzas// gang du gnas pa'i sad du// cho gsum dran byed ting 'dzin gyis// dngos grub chen po rtsol bas 'acol// dpa' rgyal ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// slongs shing dngos grol yod bsam nas// bton nas gang
261a1(rnying rgyud): yin mnan pa'i phyir// seng ldeng phur bu sor brgyad ni// stobs chen sngags kyis byin brlab la// khra bo bcu yi sngags kyis btab// sa ga dab stang+ga stabs drag po b+ha// stobs kyi ting 'dzin chen po yis// khur de
261a2(rnying rgyud): 'angos grub thob bsam nas// re dang dogs pa'i sems mi bca'// dur khrod gnas su sgrib pa dang // shar gyi phyogs su bzhag nas ni// ting 'dzin gzhal yas lha bskyed la// dag pa'i khrus kyis bkrus byas nas// sbyang stabs rim par sngag
261a3(rnying rgyud): kyis bya// wA la bstab cing gsol bar bsam// thig ni lnga pa lnga btab ste// snying nas yan lag bzhi rnams dang // mgo dang lnga ru rnam par btang // rdzas rnams legs par spos pa ste// snying la dum bu lnga ru bya// lci bo gsang ba mig dang s+thA/
261a4(rnying rgyud): dpral ba dpung pa lte bsting // dpyi dang rkang pa ri ma bzhin du// yan lag bzhi dang snying dang mgo// slob mchin pa mcher pa dang // mkhal ma rim pa bzhin du dgod// ngam rdzas kun la byas pa'am// sha swa kun la rdzas bgos la// mkha' 'gro bu
261a5(rnying rgyud): yang dag dgram// thod pa rangs bldang ga dang // tshe mthu lha yi grangs dang mnyam// ma 'dras ma so'i snod du gzhag/ spyan drangs sos la byon pa dang // skos gdab rim pa 'di lta ste// dran byed snying gi dam rdzas ni// sras mchog lnga yi rgos yin
261a6(rnying rgyud): pas// mchod ba dam pa bzhes su gsol// spyi lo'i shad nga gsang ba dang // snga mig dpral ba dpung pa dang // lte ba sted dbyi rkang pa dag/ khro bo la ba yum smras bcas rdzas// mchod padam pa bzhes su gsol// thob mche pa ni chen pa dang /
261a7(rnying rgyud): mkhal ma la sogs de ni snying ni// gdug byings sa chog drug ginas// mchod pa dam pa' nas su gsol// mi bar 'bras bu sha ga dang // srog cha khrag gi srubs dag dang // bde bachen po'i thad pa 'di// 'khor semakha' thog tu
261b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdzas// mchod pa dam pa bzhes su gsol// sa so'i rdzas rnams sa songar bskos// thod pa dbang dang drag po la// gdan dang snying po bcas pa kun// dri zhing rabag nas bya ba dang // phyin chad bsgrub pa'i rdzas bya'i phyir// shun dang cu zhags nyan snang
261b2(rnying rgyud): dag/ bsrub pa'i rdzas yin rab tu wa// de phyir grub pa'i rdzas la brten// de ni rdzas kyi dam pa'o// ngan pa'i rdzas la spyad pa dang // brten pa'i rdzas su med pa ni// dngos grub med par phur pa'i rdzas// dur khrod mi ro mang po dang // dmar dang gnag pa'i
261b3(rnying rgyud): dwagus dang // brag dang dmar nag spang brag dbyibs// shing rdzi dmar nag gyes pa'am// grugasum zla ga ma sgo yod pa// phrag kyang de 'drar gnas pa la// bar snang gru gsum zla ga ma dbyibs// saM yang de bzhin shes par bya// mdun du chu 'bab skyob
261b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i ri// dngos grub 'byung dang rin chen dbang // 'byung po ma mo srin po dang // rnam pa chen po'i rjes med par// gnyen rdo med cing tsha drag med// zur rdo ri'i brag med pa// zur ma zug cing yid du 'ong // nyams su bde zhing nyam med// de 'dra yid 'ong
261b5(rnying rgyud): gnas dag tu// sa rin bcal zhing las dag bya// stegs bu 'dam gang bci gnas su// dung khrod sna tshogs nus pa la// khrag sA lnga yis legs par byug/ dmangs lnga yis chag chag gang ba// bden pa sngags kyi nus pa dbyung // dur khrod chen pa'i
261b6(rnying rgyud): byas pa la// mtshan ldan yum gyis byin brlab la// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las// byang chub sems las ye shes kyis// byin drab chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// rnam pa gnyis su rab shes bya// lnga tshan lnga yi tshon rnams kun// thod
261b7(rnying rgyud): brtan pa'i rdzas su blag/ byin pa rlab bya zhing mchod pa 'bul// gu gsum zlag ma mu khyud dang // cibs bzhi rtsi bas brkyang rim pa la// gru gsum gdan dang bcas pa gtad// gru chang bar khams sgo bzhir bcas// rta babs themasas tshang bar bye/
262a1(rnying rgyud): nyi zla brnas ma brtsegs dang // byang ba zhing ldan rim par gtad// las D+ha wAyi ting 'dzin gyis// bar chad bsal ba' las rnams bya// rdzas mthong pa ngas pa'o// lhang bsrung sun dngas bsnyems pa dang // spa
262a2(rnying rgyud): dang bstod pa'i las rnams bya// hUM dbus nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas su// drug gsum bskal ba'i gdan stengs su// d+hA rnga bsnol ba'i gdan stongs su// dgyes shing brta dbang
262a3(rnying rgyud): lu gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// chos la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// oM badz+ra kI li kI la yas rba bi g+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ sa ma ya teSh+Tha wAn/ hU~M shar nas rang kyang grub pa'i d+ha// bcom
262a4(rnying rgyud): bud+d+ha kI la la// drar khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// dug gsum bskal ba'i gnas chen 'dir// brgya byin bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // kI la pa
262a5(rnying rgyud): dngos grub stsol// chos la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// A~M badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba pi stan paM hUM phaT/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha wAn/ hUM lho nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// bcom ldan radz+ra kI la ya// dur khrod chen po'i gnas che nang // dug gsum
262a6(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas su// gshin rje bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// chos la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// A~M badz+re kI li kI la ya
262a7(rnying rgyud): sarba bi g+h+nAn ba~M hU~M phaT/ sa ma ya tit+ta wAn/ sku nub nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// bcom ldan ka ma kI la la// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dug gsum bsngal ba'i gnas chen 'dir// klu bdud bskol ba'i gangadan stengs su// dkyus
262b1(rnying rgyud): shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // kI la ya li dngos grub stsol// chos la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn bi hU~M phaT/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM byang nas rang byang grub
262b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i lha// bcom ldan kar+m+ma kI la ya// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// dug gsum bsgral ba'i gnas chen du// gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// dgyes shing brten par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhus
262b3(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// chos la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nA na baM hUM phaT/ ma sa ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ d+haM srid pa phur bu sgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// phyogs bcud ngung khrod gzhal
262b4(rnying rgyud): yas nas// khro rgyal 'khor tshogs bzhugs pa ni// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas nas// dug gsum bsgral ba'i gnas chen 'dir// phyogs skyong bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par
262b5(rnying rgyud): bzhugs nas kyang // kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// chos la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM hA ra hUM/ gardza gardza phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ba~M dza ya hUM/ ha nA ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn
262b6(rnying rgyud): ta kar+b+baM/ ba tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra pro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya b+h+ri wa hU~M/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a pa ra dzi tA hU~M/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ tshi t+ta tshi d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+he traM/
262b7(rnying rgyud): lo kya bi dza pa hUM/ hrISh+Thab+hih+Na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ groT s+phoT hU~M phaT/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan// hU~M thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas srin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlabs
263a1(rnying rgyud): na na s+ho// naman smra/ na /
263a2(rnying rgyud): su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// chos la dbang ba'i dngos phra ba sngol// haM sa ran har hU~M phaT/ A be shA ya I b+he sha ya hUM phaT/ hrI dz+haiM An la hUM phaT/ dz+wal pa la dz+wal pa ya dz+ra maH/
263a3(rnying rgyud): thA la ta thA ya hUM phaT/ bi da ya bi da ya hUM phaT/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM thugs mchog gsol ba'i byin brlab las// zhe sdang gnas su 'joms pa dang // me long ye shes 'thob bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs su gsol// dkyil
263a4(rnying rgyud): dbus su bzhugs nas kyang // nyon mongs mun pa bsal du gsol// dz+nyA na d+hi paM sa ma ya tiSh+Tha wAn/ hUM mdzes kun gyi bcad ldan pa'i// thams cad srud pa rdzas kyi mchog/ mkha' 'gro ma chen rnam gsum yang // dur khrod chen po'i dkyil dzor
263a5(rnying rgyud): dang // dug gusum bskal ba'i gnas chen du// dmadzas spangs pa'i gang na sbyongs sa// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs sa gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // kIl la yi dngos gru thol// chos la dbang pa'i dngos pang rdzol//
263a6(rnying rgyud): oM dzata.a pi ra dzi ti dza ya ka tang ka pe sa ma ya ti t+ta lhan/ mtshan ldan dngos grub rdo dza ka pA la// gser dngul lcags su btang ba 'dra// lan gsum gnas gsum spang ba dang // shar phyogs dub dang lho yang rag// byang dang lho nub shar lho 'brang
263a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub byang shar steng 'og za// dngos grub ste dang dbang yang thob// drag po'i las nyid thob par 'gyur// tshe rang nad med longs spyod 'phel// dad pa med cing bsam pa 'grub// reg 'drenas la rnam par 'gro// yon ta ldan pa'i kA pa la/
263b1(rnying rgyud): nyes pa spang bar mgyur ma// bar chad 'byung zhing rtog pa skyes// gnyid bdud du babs pa dang // don med phyal bar 'gro ba yin// re ba skyongs shing mya ngan ga non// dngos grub ba'i yi ge las// dngos gru ba gnas pa rten bshad de// dgas par
263b2(rnying rgyud): las rnams de bzhin bya// dur khrod chen po'o ga yang gzhil// lha ye mtshan mas mtshan cing dgod// zhags pa chen po'iri mjug ni// gtso sngags gdab cing bskor bar bya// phur pa dang gyi cod pan can// rab gnas bya zhing dgod par bya// bar chad
263b3(rnying rgyud): bsal ba'i las bya zhing // nus pa can du bya ba'i phyir// sngon du 'gro ba'i dbang bskur bya// lha yi mtshan mas mtshan par bya// nus pa ldan zhing rab brtan nas// brda' yis mtshon te rnam par dbye// phyag ni tshul dang rab tu ldan// skabs dang mi mdun
263b4(rnying rgyud): gnyen po bsal// 'on kyang dngos grubar zo rmongs// bslab pa'i rdzas la rab brtan te// lha ro'i grangs kyi snang ba dgram// sha khrag sna tshogs rab basbyar la// bar ma chad par snying po 'don// thod pa blang dang snying po 'don// zhal lo zlog dang rdza
263b5(rnying rgyud): bstan// skal bstod cing srung ma bskul// dus drug mchod pa dbul bya zhing // 'jigs dang re ba'i sems me 'byung // phrar pa 'phar dang mtshan mar ston// sgra spyan dri dang bcas pa 'byung // nyams dga' phya ba'i sems mi 'byung // dus
263b6(rnying rgyud): dus lha rnams gnad la dbab// rtags rnams byung na las rnams bya// dngos grub rdzas rnams rab tu ster// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid po rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur bu'i lha// ye shes khro bo thub par mdzod// sangs
263b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyin gyi ye shes smra// nga byed rdo rje chos nyid las// 'bar ba'i khrob mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag skyed cig/ thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas drin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang pyid
264a1(rnying rgyud): nas na/ // tu na // rgyu tu // nas sa // sadu
264a2(rnying rgyud): sa lagag/ me b+hi mamyogadus la // na chang du ltang dam rdzas pazhin// mngon tha~Md min las myong nga mngon// kr-i kyi ma rnaMs b+h+rUM ste ga pa las// yid dag don cen hUM/ can pa byin pa na bayin//
264a3(rnying rgyud): nas
264a4(rnying rgyud): byed rlab chen po cha
264a5(rnying rgyud): bgyigs mchog dug / pa / sa mchog gadrug pa na/ sakyil
264a6(rnying rgyud): tsha sa / pa brdzu / ga na /
264a7(rnying rgyud): naH/ b+hi rlub chen po cher lhurang phog/ dri chub kyi thos chubadud 'dul/
264a8(rnying rgyud): zlab chen po char ltar thob// hUM lho yi khro bo gshin rje 'dul// oM badz+ra hoH/ sbyin rlab chen po rgyar ltar phob// hU~M ljon pa khro ga srin po 'dul
264a9(rnying rgyud): chu
264b1(rnying rgyud): na dun/ a 'dun/ sbyin na brtson ba tshangs pan/ rgyunags pas padag 'dug// ma na/ na na pa can na ltung pag/ gas sun rtag gdug pa 'dus/ mngan la la/ nan
264b2(rnying rgyud): cher ltar log/ d+hi shar gyi sras mchog gdug pa 'dul// oM badz+ra kA li kI la la// b+hin rlab chen po cher ltar lob// nr-ib+h+yo li sgras mchog gdug pa 'dul// oM badz+ra kI li kI la yaM/ byin rnab chen po char ltar khob// stenab kyi sras mchog
264b3(rnying rgyud): gdug pa 'dul// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ byin nub chen po char ltar phob// hUM byang gi sras mchog gdug pa 'dul// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ byin rla' chen po cher ltar pho'o// spyi 'og gi mas mchog gdug pa 'dul// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/
264b4(rnying rgyud): brtson pa rgya tung ngon/ slo po chen las kyi chogayin nu la tshul mo/ byin na ba chen chis na 'og// byirgyan mis gin ya bab pa dang / bgyid dang blan drung bstim pa dang // rdo'i byed pa'i 'as rnams/
264b5(rnying rgyud): pa sngags dang bstod pa dang // gru gsung thugs kyi dngos grub blang // rim pa bzhin du yang dag bstan// phrin las phur ba'i dngos grub dang // gang yin nyid la gdab pa dang // brten pa'i rdzas de kha phye la// hUM bcom ldan dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu dang
264b6(rnying rgyud): yum chen 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma// dngos grub stsol ba'i dus la bab// s+ya rengs dang po dngos grub dus la bab// kI la ya yi bro brdung bas// dngos grub rtsol ba'i dus la bab// dbang bsung dam pa srub pa'i mchog/ rim pa bzhin du de
264b7(rnying rgyud): shes bya// zhal zas dbang dang rjod pa dang // kun kyang rim pa gnyis su bstan// rdo rje tshe yi dbar de spang bas// rtogs pa ye shes me ru 'bar// hUM ye shes su mi yul pa ste// rdzu 'phrul ston cing bka' nyan pa'i// dpa' rgyal stags
265a1(rnying rgyud): mgacan la// mi mo stag gi mgo can non// bang ni rlung gis bskyod du med// // dza ni stong khams khyab par sgrogs// lag pa ga yas na tha thabasnams// gangs rgyaba'i mangs
265a2(rnying rgyud): ya// lag pa g.yon nA lcags sna bsnams// gang la bru ba'i sgying nas drongs// khams gsum dbang du bsgrub dang // srid gisum zil gyis gnon pa dang // grub la bar chad byed pa rnams// thal ba bzhin du la rdzog sa// hU~M yaM shes thags kyi
265a3(rnying rgyud): srul pa gcig/ stobs kyi rgyal po ming ga le// mi mo seng ge'i lago can zhon// ba ni rlung gis bstod du med// gad ni khams gsum khyab par thogs// lag pa g.yas na cing ba bsdams// gang la bya ba'i snying la la// lags g.yon na chags
265a4(rnying rgyud): bsnams// gang la bya ba'i snying nas drongs// khams gsum dbang du bsdu ba dang // srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa dang // srub la bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// tha la ba bzhin du rdul du rlogs// d+he ye shes thugs kyi sprul ba gcing/ dran byed
265a5(rnying rgyud): mkha'i rdzing po rog la// ma mo po rog mgo can zhon// bang ni rlung gis bskyod du med// gad ni stong khams khyab par spogs// lag pa g.yas na phur ba bsdams// gang la b+ha ba'i steng la la// lag pa g.yon na sngags kya bsdabs// gang lang ba
265a6(rnying rgyud): sgying nas rmongs// mas gsum dbang chu dang // ming gsung zil gyis gnon pa dang // grub la bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// thal ba bzhin du dril du rdzogs// rje ye shes thugs kyi sbal pa gcig/ ji gnod ga yeg gis gocan /
265a7(rnying rgyud): mo g.yag gi mgo can gon// bdini rlung gis bskyed du med// gang ni stong 'ams khyab par rdzogs// lag pa g.yas na phur chu bsdams// gang la gyi ba'i snying la la// lag pag yod na phyogs bya ba skams// gangal bya ba'i snyid nam sa/
265b1(rnying rgyud): khams gsum dbang du bsru ba dang // srid ga sram zil gyis gnon pa dang // skab la bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// thal ba bzhin du rdul du rtogs// hUM ye shes thabs kyi sprul pa gcig/ gsod byed chen mo drad mo la// mi mdzad ma'i mgocan
265b2(rnying rgyud): zhon// ba'i ni rlung gis bskyod du med// skad ni stong khams khyab par sgrogs// lag pa g.yas na phur bu bsdams// gang la bya ba'i snying la ya// lag pa g.yon na lcags kyu bsnams// gang la bye ba'i snying nas drongs// khams gsum dbang du
265b3(rnying rgyud): bsru ba dang // srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa dang // grub la bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// thal ba bzhin du rdul du rlogs// phruM ye shes thugs kyi sprul pa gcig/ grim byed chen mo gzig mo la// mi mo gzig gi mgo can zhon// bang ni rlung gi
265b4(rnying rgyud): bgyid du med// ska ni stong khams khyab par thogs// lag pa g.yas na phur bu bskums// gang la byi ba'i snying la la// lag pa g.yon na lcags kyu bsnams// gang la bya ba'i snying nas drongs// khams gsum dbang du bsdu ba dang /
265b5(rnying rgyud): srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa dang // grub la bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// thal ba bzhin du rdul du rnyogs// nyams drug rtags drug migasal ba'i// ting 'dzin drod nyal chen mo rnams// thams cad ma lus dbang du ldud// nyi ma'i zed la gno
265b6(rnying rgyud): byed pa// 'byung po the'u rang gnod byed lnga// dri dang dang du bcas pa ldang // rtse la bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// zlog byed stag mo'i ting 'dzin gyis// thal ba bzhin du rdul du rnyogs// nyi ma gung la gnod byed pa// sa bdag chen mo lag chen ya
265b7(rnying rgyud): su zhing nyam chung drod dang bral// gung la bar chad byed nga'i bgegs// klog byed stobs man ting 'dzin gyis// thal ba bzhin du dul du rdzogs// dgong gi dus na gnod byed pa'o// btson gyi lo nya rkang srin yin// phyad phyod ting 'dzin migs la
266a1(rnying rgyud): ga sa na// na su / sa / sa na du sa
266a2(rnying rgyud): byedang / lag gi ting 'dzin gyis// thal ba bzhin dul du tshogs// nam byed par chad byed pa'i bgegs// ma bdud rgyal mo kun d+haH// sdug pa len cing meru bad+ma// nam skyed par cing bye 'i glegs// thal ba bzhin du la gas/
266a3(rnying rgyud): rangs bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// tshangs pa chen po'i sprul pa ste// me dod kun gyi bdag po yis// zlog byed dred kyi ting 'dzin dang // sgrub pa rdzas kyi dam pa yis// tho rangs bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// thal ba bzhin du dral du dogs//
266a4(rnying rgyud): gdug byed gnod pa'i blang chad rnams// dus ma yin par 'byung bar byed// ting 'dzin migs la dran pa nyams// zlog byed gzig gi ting 'dzin gyis// thul ba bzhin du rdul du rdzogs// nyams pa'i 'od dang bdud kyi'o// bre'u dang 'od dang rtags
266a5(rnying rgyud): rtags kyi dri dang the' dang ji// bdud kyi nyams dang dngos grub nyams// wang sha dri dang rdzas tri dri// bar chung 'od dang ma ma'i rtags// btsan gyi sa dang rig 'dzin ga sdang // thams cad dus dang nyams dga' dang // rdo rje N+DI chung dang /
266a6(rnying rgyud): dkru yung ljon chags dang // / gzul dang ba btang bas 'azung // ra 'jig med par rab shes na// de nyid ye shes na yi rtags// gsal la rtog/ med nyam ming // rang di mi brtan 'gyur bcan// rtags min ngos thub par chad byed/
266a7(rnying rgyud): de nying bzlog par rab shes bya// yang na badzin chen po jug/ gtso 'i ting 'dzin chen po dang // mtshams dang sras mchog drug rnams kyi// sngags dang tshig dang brang ba yis// dus rnams kun tu 'azlog par bya// yang na rdzas mchog drug rnams
266b1(rnying rgyud): sa ga du/ / sa sa rnas sa sa na
266b2(rnying rgyud): ma tsha / dus na sa / / sa kyi /

266b7(rnying rgyud): sa
267a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtswa ni su mdag dkar// 'dul ba'i dbang drung rtags lugs bya brnams// 'grags pa dzin las mtha' du dbyung ba'i phyir// mthunams 'phrog pa ma cad cod la rtag tshal bstod/ nga da
267a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i lha ni su mdog so// 'dul ba'i dbang du rang rtags zhags pa bsnams// 'ching ba'i phrin las mtha' du dbyung ba'i phyir// 'ching byed lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM skyo byed chen po'i lha ni su mdog dmar// 'dul ba'i dbang du rang rtags
267a3(rnying rgyud): drug rnams bsdams// spro ba'i phrin las mtha' ru dbyung ba'i phyir// lho byed lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// b+h+rUM sgrol byed chen mo'i lha ni sku mdog nag po ste// 'dul ba'i dbang du rang rtags thob bsnams// grol ba'i phrin las mthang du byu
267a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyir// grol ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sde stobs pa'i sa ni su mdog ldang sngon te// 'dul ba'i dbang du dang rtags gzas pa bsdams// stobs pa'i phrin las mtha' du dbyung ba'i phyir// stobs pa'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal
267a5(rnying rgyud): bstod// b+h+rUM ye shes las la grub pa'i dbang phyug ma// sha khrag dmar la dad cing dam la rbab// gang du mngag pa'i las rnams sgrub par byed// las rnams kun gyi bdag mo'i dus la bab// 'jig rten khams kun ma lus khyab pa'i bya ma r+d+ha/
267a6(rnying rgyud): bdud dang srin po rab tu 'dang byed ma// gang ltar 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM brgya byin 'dul ba'i lha ni sku mdog dkar// 'dul ba'i dbang du yab yum sras dang bcas// dam pa chen po dri za 'dul ba'i lha// brgya byin 'dul ba'i lhal
267a7(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal bstod// hU~M drang srong 'dul ba'i lha ni su mdog // 'dul ba'i dbang du yab yum sras dang bcas// drang srong 'dral ba'i lhal phyag 'tshal bstod// d+h+r-i gshin rje 'dul ba'i mni su mngog po// 'dul ba'i dbang du yab masas
267b1(rnying rgyud): ma pag ga sa 'dzin// na ma la ba smra na/ sa ba na/ dag na// ga pa ga sa// ma
267b2(rnying rgyud): bde lha la phyag 'tshal bskyod// hUM gu bdud 'dul ba'i lha ni zhu mdog dmar// 'dul ba'i dbang du yab yum sras dang bcas// rngam pa chen po po bdud 'dul ba'i lha// gru bdung 'dul ba'i lhal phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM rlung lha 'dul ba'i lha ni phra mdog dmar
267b3(rnying rgyud): can// 'dul ba'i dbang du yab yum sras dang bcas// rngam pa chen po 'byung po 'dul ba'i lha// rlung lha 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// rje gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i lhani bu mdog ldang nag la// 'dul ba'i dbang du ya bA gra mams dang bcas
267b4(rnying rgyud): dam pa chen mo nor lung 'dul ba'i lha// gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i lhal phyag 'tshal bstod// rje dbang ldan 'dul ba'i sgra ni su mdog ldang ser la// 'dul ba'i dbang du lab yum sras dang bcas// dam pa chen po bgegs rnams 'ching ba'i rtsa// dbang zhan
267b5(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// b+h+yas bdag 'dul ba'i lhani lnga mdog phrad lal// 'dul ba'i dbang la zad pa de bzhin las byed ma// bstad brgyas par mdzad pa'i rgyal mo thugs dmangs pa bab// than dadrang po nya las rnams 'grub byed ma'i// bstan
267b6(rnying rgyud): pA srung ba'i las la brtson pa mo// 'jig rten dbang du srung pa'i mthu mo che// sa bdag 'khor tshogs thugs dam dus la bab// dri yang dag don las su ni cir yang sdang // bdud dang srin po'i dargyal ma yin te// 'dul ba'i dbang du rab rngam mche ba

269a1(rnying rgyud): bams ca dganas pasmra/ khyab ma byung yinas thag/ 'don pa med pa dang bzhin sgrol// dkyil lakhor kyad dru bam pa dang// chub bar ba ga pang thun gyis thag/ sangs dbyung chub sam sa nyid ru

269a3(rnying rgyud): bzhag nas kyang // dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs su gsol// hUM chos dbyings gsal la rtog pa med// nyes pas ma bsgribs gsal ba'i 'od// ting 'dzin chen po'i byin brlab las// rang bzhin ldan gyis grub pa'i dbyings// hU~M chos
269a4(rnying rgyud): dbyings nas mkha'i rang bzhin la// rol pas 'byung lngar lhun gyis grub// grub kyang rol pa 'dzin pa bral// rten du 'gyur bas rnam par gsal// b+hai drang khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang // rang byung ye shes bzhugs gnas su// ma bgribs
269a5(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i 'od po che// rig pa rang shangar gzhal yas su// thig la cing yang snang bshad// hUM rang byung ye shes gsal ba'i 'od// rol ba bsam med badzad las 'das// lha nyid gsal la gzhi na thal// bde ba chen po'i glong na bzhugs// hUM/
269a6(rnying rgyud): chos su nyag gcig gnyis su med// cir yang snang bas byas ma mi khyab// gang du gnas pa'i de bzhin nyid// rang byung chen po'i dbyings na ga yos// thugs la la rtog med ye shes te// ye shes chen po phyag tu che// rnam par grol cheng dmigs
269a7(rnying rgyud): dang bral// chos dbyings dag pa'i phyag rgya 'byung // thig le byang chub sems nyid las// thams cad dngos grub chen po yin// chos dbyings nod burin po che// zad pa med par thams cad 'byung // spa dang ye shes bas ma mi khyad//
269b1(rnying rgyud): mongs bzung ba sel bar mdzad// zad pa med pa'i dngos sub gter// rab song bas thams cad tsham// dga' bar 'gyur bas rtogs pa kye// rang byung lhal dngos grub spyod// sdebasam pas 'grub pa' rin pa che// zad pa mang pa'i gtar du gnas
269b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad de skong bsam pa 'grub// su gsums thob dngos grub gter// da lta nyid du sbrul du gsol// thugs dam chen po chud bskul na// gang 'thog med dngos grub stsol// hUM rang byung ye shes lha la dngos grub slong // 'dir gshegs kun 'dren
269b3(rnying rgyud): dbang dang dngos grub stsol// nam mkha' bzhin du de dogs mi mnga' yang // thugs rje'i shugs kyis byin rlab sprin dang 'dra// bdud rtsi char chen 'bebs pas re ba skong // chos nyid re dogs bral ba'i rang bzhin las// dngos grub stsal dang stsol bar mi dmig/
269b4(rnying rgyud): kyang // byin rlab dbang gis dngos grub stsal du gsol// ye shes lha la re dogs ma mchis kyang // dogs pa'i sems dang mi cha re bskong // bsam pa 'grub pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// hUM lha dang gnyis su med par gang gsal ba// re
269b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i dngos grub dang po de bas na// lha la lha yis byin brlab nus pa can// bstan pa rgyas pa'i phyir na slong lags kyis// thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// hUM dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi byin brlab las// zhal bu mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA lar//
269b6(rnying rgyud): 'chi med tshe yig yung drung ci bsam 'grub// 'dun pa rigs kyi dngos grub 'dzad med gter// bdud 'drul lha nye bgegs zhi rab tu bzang // nye ba nyid du bsam pad re ra na// yang dag ldan pa'i dngos grub dam pa 'di// ci bsam 'grub cing re ba skong ba dang /
269b7(rnying rgyud): rig 'dzin sa la nges pa'i phyin pa dang // thogs pa med par ci bas ma 'grub pa dang // dngos bub dam pa de nyid stsal du gsol// dri chos dbyings nam mkha' bsam med brjod las 'das// thams cad 'byur zhing de ba thams cad gong // slong ba nyid na thal ba'i
270a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas shen/ khas byung ba nas r+b+ba tu ladugs// na pa nam na gyu// 'du pa chen pa zhus gas satha// dngasu
270a2(rnying rgyud): bsam mi khyab// sras kyi dam pa'i dngos su baN+Dal du gsol// hUM thabs dang shes rab bde ba chen po'i dbyings// yab la tshogs shing gnyis su med pa'i yum// don dmangang la rigs kyi yum du bstan// zad pa med pa gnyid gyi dngas grub la du
270a3(rnying rgyud): gsol// hUM gadrug pa 'dul phyir yab kyi thugs las gyul// rdegs pa'i 'khod rnams ma lus 'dul mdzad pa// 'dul ba'i dbang gis sprul pa cing yang ston// gdug pa 'dul ba'i dngos grub kyi la du gsol// yab la dgyes shing gnyis sum

270a5(rnying rgyud): grub// thogs med sgrol ba'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// las kyi bya ba thams cad kun// de bzhin mnor rim pa bzhin// gnas skabs nyid du yang dag sbyar// kun kyang don la rgyas par bstan// nam gnyis don pa rnam par gtad// yang dag
270a6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bstan pa'i las nyid kun kyang 'grub// dpal gyi dngos grub chen po ni// 'ur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas su// maN+Dal mda' gang byas nas su// thig dang bri ba de bzhin bya// phyi nang gas gsum las kyi mchog
270a7(rnying rgyud): thang pa dmar nag dbang dag la// snying po gang na dang bcas parje// snying dang bcas pa'i rdzas dgal// bskyed deng sun dang bstim mchod ngasgron// dbus su dgod ci gsal bar bsam// ma me gsol byang rgyan rnams dgang// mchod pa'i rngan

271a1(rnying rgyud): dag par na rdzun/ sa sa rnams pa rdzun 'phyag rdzu da/ nanyis gnas/ rdzumachong sa mas ca ngas gcad dang// gagadus pasacas mas /

272b3(rnying rgyud): dardzes pa'i zhal la phyag 'tshal bstod// mche ba bzhi ru bstan pa ni// skye ba rnam bzhi rtsad nas gcod pa dang // gdug pa'i tshems 'dra rngam pa'i sha za'i phyir// skye shi rtsad gcod tshems la phyag 'tshal bstod// shangs ni gcig rngu bstan pa dang /

272b5(rnying rgyud): g.yon na D+han+da rak+ta bsnams pa ni// yum gyi chags pa sel ba dang // 'dod chags rtsad nas gcod pa'i phyir// chags pa sel ba'i phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod// dur khrod chas brgyad su la gsol ba ni// sdug bsngal brgyad po rtsad nas bcad nas kyang // rnam pa thams
272b6(rnying rgyud): cad chos nyid dbyings su srol// sdug bsngal 'joms pa'i rkyen la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhabs gnyis mngon par bstan pa ni// rkang gnyis kun la brtse bar dgongs pa dang // / bde ba gshegs pa'i thugs med gyes skong phyir// rkang gnyis brtsed go
272b7(rnying rgyud): lajug 'tshal brgyad// 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'angams mngadang // 'jos kyi 'debs kyil 'tshal brgyad/ ldang/ mag gshogs can// 'dul pa ba gis kyig 'ad

273b3(rnying rgyud): tshul bskyo// rto me na byed du khrod ma// zhwa la gcig phyag gnyis yab la la khyud pa'i zug// 'dug pa dbang gis gshin rngom mi gdanal bzugs// gshin rje 'dul ba'i yul la phyag 'tshal na ston// shi ba'i mgo can lab kyi sprul pa te// gshin/
273b4(rnying rgyud): ma mi tshar byeg drug pa ral// 'dum pa'i dab gis drug sapung ba ba rnams/ byas pa byed pa khyong drug la rton/ zug pa ma ga can sa kyi ste// gshin rngam ma bar dag ga 'jul// 'das pa'i dbang gis bya gnas
273b5(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa skyed byed khyod la rgya 'tshal btod// hU~M napa rlom mi g.yo mgon// badz+rag sum rgyag drug rdo 'i gshogs na// 'dus 'i dbang gis ma gyi nags dang sngams/ sbyin pa 'dril bal ma zin khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// rkyenapa
273b6(rnying rgyud): gtsug sa la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yab la 'byung ba byug/ 'dul ba'i dbyung gis zin mo'i gdan la brnags// mi mo du ba'i yul phyag tshal bstod// gzig gi mug can yab kyi 'onas// srin pa'i 'bor na gartag pa 'dul//
273b7(rnying rgyud): kyis sungs brdzas// dag ga nga mardzogs khyod laphyag 'argyal da/ ga pa da thaM ba dgadrug / 'dus pa 'dab gis cag nalugs bya mas//

274a3(rnying rgyud): mo ye 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyag na phur pa bsnams// gdug pas dz+nyA na nI la thogs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// pu shung mgo can yum gyi skul pa ste// klu bdud mo yi 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul 'i dbang gis
274a4(rnying rgyud): rgyab rnams// 'jigs byed glog gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// rtsi nub byang khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa// dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// 'dul ba'i dbang gis rdul g.yab ba dan bskams// rlung lha 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'a
274a5(rnying rgyud): bstod// nub byang za byed rdo rje mda' snyems ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yab la 'khyud pa'i phyag/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis rlung lha mo yi gdan la bzhugs// rlung lha 'dul ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// sbrang kI'i mgo can yab kyi pho nya ste// rlung lha pho yi
274a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na phur pa bsnams// gsod par byed pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// khwa yi mgo can yum gyi pho nya ste// rdung lha mo yi 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na lugs kyu bsdams//
274a7(rnying rgyud): gsod par byed pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hU~M byang gi khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// dbu gsum phug drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na rgya gram bsdams// gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// byang gi za byed yum chen
274b1(rnying rgyud): rlung dbyin ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yab la 'khyud// 'dul ba'i dbang gis gnod sbyin mo yi gdan la bzhugs// gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// seng ge'i mgo can yab kyi sprul pa ste// gnod sbyin po yi 'khor gyi gdug 'dul//
274b2(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na phur ba bsnams// stobs chen 'pho mgyogs khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// pha wang mgo can yum gyi sprul pa ste// gnod sbyin mo yi 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul po'i dbang gis phyag na lcags kyu bskams// 'phrul chen thangs
274b3(rnying rgyud): mkhas khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dI byung ga pa khams gsum nam par rgyal// dbug sum phyag dag do ji ga shog pa can// 'dul ba'i dbang gis cag na ma 'gazhu ba rnam/ da bang lan 'dul ba'i gyi chen nyid la phyag 'tshal ba nyid// byang
274b4(rnying rgyud): shar za byed rje rje gsod byed ma// zhal gci gzug gnyis yabal 'khyud pa'i phyag/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis dbang ldan mo yi gdan la bzhugs// dbang ldan 'dul ba'i yum li phyag 'tshal bstod// rjed kyi mgo can yab kyi sprul pa ste// dbang ldan
274b5(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na phung pa bsdams// 'jigs med shugs chen ni snang khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// rtse mo'i mgo can yum gyi sprul ba ste// dbang ldan mo yi 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dang
274b6(rnying rgyud): gis phyag na lcags kyu bsnams// bde mgyogs sha grims 'gugs byed khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hU~M 'og gi khro bo stobs po che// dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// 'dul ba'i dbang gis thob gtan shing bsnams// sa bad
274b7(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'og gi za byed rdo rje ba khyod ma ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yab la 'khyud// 'dul ba'i dang dashims bdag mo yi gdan la 'khrugs/ sa bdag 'dul ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal ba stod// dam
275a1(rnying rgyud): mgo can lab kyi sprul ba ste// sa bdag pa yi khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyug na phyung ba bsdams// dmigs dang khros pa brjed zad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bya ba mag can yum
275a2(rnying rgyud): kye sprul pa ste// sa bdag mo yi 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na lcags kyu bsnams// 'bigs byed sgrol bar byed pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ rdzas la brten te sgrub pa'i
275a3(rnying rgyud): leny+tsa ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dur khrod kyi bdag po bdud rtsi chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gnas ni dur khrod gzhal yas su// bar snang dmar dang gnag pa dang // re yang dmar nag rdo rje'i dbyings
275a4(rnying rgyud): me tog shing dang lo 'dab rgyas// sman rnams 'khrungs dang sa bzang dang // gong du bstan pa'i nges pa med// cha ba lo mar bcas pasam// yum yang yid du 'ong ba btsal// rigs btsun dang zang shongs yangs che// phung lo'i phral
275a5(rnying rgyud): paphra// smra ba snyan la rna ba gsang // sprin mtshams par ma chad pa dang // so zags dam la shangs kyang mdzes// stong sbrang snyoms la nu ma 'bur// nyes pa'i skyon rnams med par bya// nyid las mi gzhan mchod pa stobs// nyams

278a2(rnying rgyud): bskul// snying po 'di bzlas bdud rtsir 'gyur// s+tha badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba bib+hI baM hUM phaT/ oM mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM tha/ pad+ma rigs kyi yab yum yang // rgyan bstar g.yab cing lha la bstod// pad+ma rigs kyi srung ma bskul// snying po 'dir
278a3(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsir 'gyur// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba biSh+TAM baM hUM phaT/ a kr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M thi/ las kyi rigs kyi yab yum yang // rgyan bstar g.yab cing lha la bstod// las kyi rigs kyi srung ma bsgral// snying po 'di brjod bdud rtsir 'gyur//
