279a6(rnying rgyud): me dang du 'azangs pa dang / dri dngas po mngan du son// mang du 'jal brdzas kyi mchog/ bsngal dang chas pa'i ngas grib dang // wang ba sten rje rigs kyi bsrung// del ya mtshan yongs mi bya// rebs par tshad dgas pa 'byung // nyams su 'on
279a7(rnying rgyud): nyam nga med// nyam nga med na dngos grub myur// dngos grub chen por dogs bcas// bdud dang cha brtags rab tu gces// bdud kyi rtsod pa cing yang ston// yi dam nya dang mkha' 'gro dang // rig 'dzin nam mnga' lung nyon 'byung // nges pa med pa'i dod rton
279b1(rnying rgyud): na// dngos sub chen po 'byung ba yin// rdo dza gnon nu'i rig 'dren rnams// sring brjon grub mdzad cig/ srid pa rdo sur bya'i nA// ye shes khro ba grub par mdzad// thabs kyis spyod pas 'gro don na// byangs dang rjed rjes gang 'dul ba// @
279b2(rnying rgyud): rgya phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir rgol cig/ oM badz+ra kI li kI ya ya/ aM kra sha dza/ gre h+ya d+hi bya sa ma ya s+t+waM/ han tan hU~M phaT/ sa~Md+d+hi d+hI hU~M \u0f7fhrIt+ma/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes su// ngang nyid du chos dbyings las// 2
279b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i khro bo mi bzad pa// d+ha yi dbyig tu bdag skyed cig/ ra d+ha khA hi/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ i ku sha dza/ a d+hi Shiny+tsa tAM/ jo chen nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // sngags dang dbyangs las 'byung ba nye// rim pas blangs pa kuT la sbyar// lha dang rdzas kyi rim pa gnyis
279b4(rnying rgyud): rnams rim par bgrod pa'o// b+ha nga bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'dzang d+ha// par me rje brgyad dag la mdangs rtswa nas// rdo rnga thung ba dgra la dam bcas nas// rdo rje gzhan gyi grags kyi chen thabs las// ye gas ma yi 'od rje narab tu 'bar// rtag tu sdang ba jog 'byed ma /
279b5(rnying rgyud): bskams// ma sbyin+dan pa pas bring ngo // rin ba ba'i gnas nas dang ga mas mchog pa ni mi thugs kyi bas las// yinas ma ma chen tha' bar// rab tu thang 'jig 'byeng ma ma bsams// rgya ranam ba
279b6(rnying rgyud): gnas las par ban/ zla ba'i 'i drug 'a tshon 'as 'ang// mi zhing mi ming can btsugs la/ ten drang ba na 'byed bangs bams// mde rgyan pa bsa' 'ad/ mi dge rgyam gnas nas par 'a grad/
280a1(rnying rgyud): kyi byi rnangs las// ye shes mo yo'ong che rab tu gas la// rtag tu snang ba'oga'i bad mar mo bsnams// mdog mun pa bsngal ba dang // 'khor pa'ig yangs rnams nas byur bar shog/ zla bangang tu nga
280a2(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi byin rlabs las// ye shes me 'od rab tu gsal ba dang // rtag tu snang ba'i go 'byed mar me bltams// ma rig mun pa bsal ba dang // ngan song 'khor ba'i gnas nas 'dren par shog/ skyesras mchog drug gi thugs kyi byin thabs
280a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes me yi 'od chen rab tu gsal ba dang // rtag tu snang ba'i go 'byed mar me bltams// ma rig mun pa bsal ba dang // 'gro ba rigs drug gnas nas thar par shog/ hUM dam can rnam gsum thugs kyi byin rlabs las// ye shes me yi 'od chen rang
280a4(rnying rgyud): gsal ba dang // rtag tu snang ba'i go 'byed mar me bltams// ma rig mun pa bsal ba dang // ngan song rgyud gsum gnas nas thar bar shog/ hUM rig 'dzin rgyal po thugs kyi byin rlabs las// ye shes me yi 'od chen rab tu 'bang // rtag Na
280a5(rnying rgyud): gro 'byed mar me bltams// ma rig mun pa bsal ba dang // rig 'dzin rnam bzhi'i gnas nas 'dren par sho // hUM 'khor ba'i mun pa bsal ba dang // don dmi chos dbyings mthong ba dang // chu bo bzhi las brgal ba dang // bla med gnas mye badren pa'i
280a6(rnying rgyud): mar migs la ba'i 'od byung ngo // dz+ha ri rtsen gser gyis gzhi la// sa mi sbyor brten pa ni// bcom gser tshwa'i dag 'dra// bdud rtsi'i bum pa phyag na bsdams// brten bsrub rnam pazhi mthar byung du// 'dod nan gyi mar gyi
280a7(rnying rgyud): dri// dmardzas mang pa ni gtong po 'di// sa mi nya ma ma par dbyings // skyon 'dangs kyi gte mas pas// gseng kyis gan yon tan dang // sa mi ma ma bya chubs dang // grub mchag bdagag kyi thams kyis// da da
280b1(rnying rgyud): nga na/ na sus/ na na/ dung shA kyi gagon// da pa sa tsu / gas sa byad shA /
280b2(rnying rgyud): g.yon du bad bar thams cad mdzang // chos su 'gyur ba med pa med pa rgyag 'tshul brjod// gyad ni sum cus dang byung ban// bamam cad kun tu rtsub pa'i ldan la phyag 'tshal brjid// chu brdabargya caganyis mye da// rang sdig
280b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad grol bar byed// s+ye shi'i rgya ba gcod pa'i tshems la phyag tshal bstod// shings ni rnam pa brgyag sum byung ba ne// dri rnams mchod pas mnyes byed cing // bde bar gshegs pa'i shang sa la phyag 'tshal bskyed// ra bgyen du 'byi
280b4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa ni// 'khor ba gnas su 'dren byed cing // byams pa'i mgon mdzad khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yas g.yon dang po hUM mdzad yab yum bsnams pa ni// tshangs pa dbang phyung bdud rtsi'i char chen 'de byas// nyi ma zla ba 'dul ba khyod
280b5(rnying rgyud): bskyed// de so gnas rnam rgyal yab yus pa rnams// dri nga dang dra bdu ci'i char man 'debs// brgya sbyin 'dul ba'i sbyichen khyo la ma 'tshal brjin// de la gams byug don 'bu snyam pa rnams// drang drong dbang drud bdud ci'i chad
280b6(rnying rgyud): me 'dul ba'i rdul phrug tshal bstod// oM 'og mas gshin rjelab ma bsnams// ma myo bang spang bdud bye zad chen 'dengs// gshir kye 'dul badzim chen khyod la phyag 'dzal baspyod// de la log bas mo g.yo mgon po yab zum 'ardzangs// ba
280b7(rnying rgyud): dang bu bdu phyi mar chen 'brengs// srin po 'dul ba'i gachen myong 'phyag 'tshal brjod// del 'gams te mgrinal pa sum parnams/ bdud sa dpa byung du byo char chen du// srungabs 'dus pa'i ched tod+ha' phyag 'tshal brjod/
281a1(rnying rgyud): de yi 'og mas gzhan gyis mi thub yab yum ba rnams// nor srung dbang sdud bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs// rlung lha 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de yi 'og mas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yab yum bsdams
281a2(rnying rgyud): 'chi ba dag dbang sdud bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs// gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de yi 'og mas khams sum rnam rgyal yab yum bsdams// bgegs rigs dbang sdud bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs// dbang ldan 'das ba'i
281a3(rnying rgyud): chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de yi 'og mas sgron chen yab yul bsnams// klu rnams dbang sdud bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs// sa bdag 'dul ba'i lha chen/ khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yas g.yon thams sras mchog drug bsdams shing // 'gro zag dang
281a4(rnying rgyud): sdud bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs// 'jig rten 'dul ba'i lha chen dug la phyag 'tshal bstod// thod pa tshar gsum stug pum ldan grub rtags// zhag gi zo ris don dam bcud kyi rtags// ra k+ta'i thig le thugs rje chags pa'i rtags// thal chen cheg bu thams cad makye
281a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtags// grang chen ko shun thugs rje stobs kyi rtags// zhing chen g.yang bzhi 'dod chags rtsad nas gcod pa'i chags// stag gi sham bu dpa' rtul zir gyis gnon pa'i rtags// sbrul chen rigs bzhi chu yi rigs rnams dbang du sdud pa'i chags// rdo rje'i gan
281a6(rnying rgyud): pa 'jig rten zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags// zhabs brgyad phyogs mtshams dregs pa gnan pa'i rtags// 'jig rten dpa' spyong thams cad 'dul ba'i lha// rdo rje phur pa bdud rtsi 'bebs mdzad lha// bdud rje chen po'i lhal phyog 'tshal bstod// thams
281a7(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la bstod// bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdud rtsi chen po 'di dag kyang // skyon yon rab tu che bas na// bsung ba'i rim pa tshul bzhin bya// mtshan ma sha mdangs byed par gyis// chos nyid blta ba chen po
281b1(rnying rgyud): danas bams cad padang par 'gyur/ de cir rtogs parab tugarjes// matag su 'bral pabyags pa parnam// rang b+ha dpral pa'i tid na gyis// ba chad patan nas 'ams par byed// ngang zan pa'i lon la// nga ma
281b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i nga bzhin yin// de nyid yang dag dan shes na// 'bras bya bdud kyi 'phel bar byed// rinapas bcings pa'i sems nyid ni// tamangag 'a 'phrig ba che// rtags kyi kyi brag mabyed par/ dngos sub yal bdag tang ba dang / pa she
281b3(rnying rgyud): phrang par byed// rje med bdud kyi las su 'gyur// de bzhin cha tags rab tu bcas// sngon gyi bdud kyi rgyal po yang // gab zas shamadangs ma phyed par// khams gsum drug bsngal chan par byar// thar pa'i drung zang thugs rjes papa'o//
281b4(rnying rgyud): dang grol ba mchags te// rang dgar bzung ba'i tshur skal gyis// rnam pa gnyis su smin par 'gyur// rdo rje phra rab chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ ldan sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'i// / de nas bcom ldan 'das mas thams cad
281b5(rnying rgyud): pa ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dur khrod chen po bstan pa bzhin// maN+Da' bre ba de bzhin te// mang byung yangs su bshad pa tsam/ mtshan 'an lji ru brnams pa'i rdzas// brtan pa de bzhin mang cang zad/ byed da mur nga bsgom pa dang /
281b6(rnying rgyud): mchad dang bzod par bzhanaH// skye dbus kyi rten taskal med de// byang chub sems la thar gyur nus// rdza gA yan lag bcas pa rnams// badz+ra las ldan pa rabs nas// rang byung bdu rtsa wan d+ha ras// N+Dal 'brags dam pa
281b7(rnying rgyud): dngus su brtan par bzhugs nas kyang / rang byung brgya tu'i dngos gru rgyas// ang dzu la la las shA rdzas/ amra nya rgya / ma na kyi ta kyil thong du/ na zag la za gas//
282a1(rnying rgyud): bcas pa rnams/ khro bo rnam par rgyal bar byin parlabs nas/ rang byung bdud ci'i sman sbyar nas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dam pa gang // shar du brtan par bzhugs nas snang // rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngas grang
282a2(rnying rgyud): la// i badz+ra lo r+Nabi dzi matsun nan Ta/ a ma~M ta kuN+Da la hUM ba/ sa ma ya Sh+Ta wAn/ na ma na d+hasal mang du// me su mchog la sman sbyar nas/ tsa du yan lag bcas pa rnams// za ba bzhin de'i gshed parlabs nas
282a3(rnying rgyud): byung bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar nas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dam bkang // lho ru brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub stsol// oM badz+ra grA d+ha ya mAn+ta ka r+b+he/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ a ma~M ta kuN+Da li hUM \u0f7f/ sa ma ya tita sa na/ d+hi nub kyi can
282a4(rnying rgyud): blag ma du// de'i mchog la sman sbyar nas// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa rnams// khro bo ta mgrin dpal du byin brlabs nas// rang byung bdud rtsi'i sman sbar nas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dam bskang // rngub tu brtan par bzhugs nas
282a5(rnying rgyud): rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grur stsol// oM badz+ra kro d+ha tA ya hrI wa hU~M hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM u mr-i ta kuH li hU~M \u0f7f/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha han/ hUM byang gi d+han d+ha s+ya bram du/ dri rgya mchog la tha na gyu nas// rtswa ba yan lag bcas pa rnams// khro bo
282a6(rnying rgyud): rtsi 'khyil bar byid pardabs nas// rang byung bdud rtsi'i rdzun sbyar nas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dam bkang // byang du brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // Arang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub rtsol/ oM badz+ra bo d+ha a ma ta kuN+Dale dz+dza/
282a7(rnying rgyud): baT/ a mr-i ta kreN+Da li b+h+rUM ba/ sa ma ya tiSh+ThawAn/ d+hu rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag bdud rtsi lnga dang rtsa ba brgyad// yan lag slong dang rab ba rnams pa'i// me tog rin chen lnga rnams dang // 'jig rten 'di ru grags pa rnams// mitsha sa
282b1(rnying rgyud): u / na na/ rnal na thag sa 'ad/ nas na pa dun // drug
282b2(rnying rgyud): ta s+yar+b+ba li hU~M phaT/ sa ma ya tiSh+Thasan/ las rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rim pa gung du 'byung bstan// kha ba las kyi bdud rtsi rnams// mi bsre dang rang brten par bya/ sring ba chen po bshad pa'i byi pa/
282b3(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i la ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das sman rigs gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rloms par zhugs te/ mtsham ldan dur khrod gnas dag tu// srung ba'i las rnams kun bya smranas// mnyal dang 'gang bri bzhi
282b4(rnying rgyud): las kyi bya ba byas nas kyang // thig dang chom yang de bzhin bya// bri ba'i las nyid yang dag bshad// su gsum zla gam ska dag bcas// rnam po brtsig pa de bzhin du// shar du ga yang de bzhin no// rim pas bkang po'i ba/ gad
282b5(rnying rgyud): dang snying po de bzhin brtag/ sgrol yum gyi snying po bkod// phyi nang gsang ba'i lha gsum dang // rtsa ba brgyad kyang de bzhin du// thams cad bdud rtsi bslab pa'i phyir// mtshan ldan thod pa de yis brtag/ stan rnams nang du thag zas la
282b6(rnying rgyud): srung ba'i las nyid yang dag bshad// las kyi ting 'dzin chen po yis// stong pa d+mo dang rdorda dang // brgyad po nyid du yang dag 'gyur// bzhengs dang ldan drangs bstims pa dang // 'phro 'du bstod pa yang dag pa// bskur nas dbus su
282b7(rnying rgyud): gzhug byas te// mar mthod pa rgyan rnams dgram// phra ba rgyal po dbang bskur rtse// de bzhin dkyil po por dbus bu gzhug/ mchod pa'i ngas dang drad pa'i nas// gso ba'i rdzas kyang rim pa bzhin// ting 'dir chen po'i dam pa bzhin
283a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal por bsgom zhing 'phro 'du bya// 'gro 'du bdud rtsi chen por 'gyur// de bzhin las su rung bar bya// som nyi med pa'i rtags byung na// brdungs te las rnams de nyid yin// phab rnams bta la legs
283a2(rnying rgyud): par spel// sdod du stsal cing bsrung bar bya// dubs bdug cing rgyal pos bsrung // dkyil 'khor gang du bstan pa'o// bzhugs su gsol ba kun kyang bya// til chen me mar gsal ba btang // rgya re dang cha lugs rab tu
283a3(rnying rgyud): snying po grangs med brjod las 'das// lha la mchod cing srung ma bskul// mchod pa 'bul zhing sbyar bar bya// du brlangs pa me 'od dang // snyan pa'i sgra dang zhim pa'i dri// bar ma chad par byung gyur na// dngos grub las la shis pa
283a4(rnying rgyud): ngan na dus drug tu la le bzlog/ ta pa'i tshad dang ldan par bya// 'on tang dngos grub yin par nges// dngos grub rdzas rnams bstar byas la// bsrung zhing bskrad de las rnams bya// ye shes lha yi dngos grub dang // mtshan ma rdzas kyi dngos
283a5(rnying rgyud): dang // dbang bcur rim pa de bzhin bya// las kyi bya ba kun kyang rdzogs// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud 'as/ sman rigs gcig pa bslab pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi so sor sgrub pa'i
283a6(rnying rgyud): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rgyu gcig pa dang rkyen gnyis pa// byang chub sems dang sder chags sha/ lan tshwa nyid du rgyan du 'gyur// 'byung ba stong pa'i rang bzhin las// bdud rtsi'i lha nyid rnam par gsal// ye shes rdo chen po ya
283a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'dus pa'i rang bzhin te// 'bru gsum sngags dang lha rnams dang // bdud rtsi'i sngags kyis rnam par sbar// ma grub par du sngags rnams bzlas// thod pa 'gul dang du ba dang // me dang 'od rnams rnam par 'byung // me long ye shes
283b1(rnying rgyud): dngos grub zab// 'bras bu dza dogs su 'gyur// sbrul 'brang thod pa mtshan ldan la// rtswa gcig pa dang can gnyis pa// rgyu ni byang chub chen la// tshig rnam ga dang thag thun dang // rim pa bya ba de bzhin // dang ni thor ba nga
283b2(rnying rgyud): chos nyid ye shes chen po yis// thams cad 'dus pa dri ma med// sngags gsum de bzhin yang dag sbyar// grub pa chen po las kyi mchog/ zhim pa'i ngad dang sna tshogs dri// stong pa chen po'i dngos grub thong // 'bras bu de 'dzin gshegs par 'brung
283b3(rnying rgyud): sul mang thod pa mtshan ldan la// rgyu gcig pa dang rkyen gnyis pa// maM sa chen po yang dag 'byung // kha brag sha dang dbang po lag/ bsgom pa'i lha yang de bzhin te// gsal la rtog pa med pa dang // mnyam pa'i ye shes chen po yis
283b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'byung bas zag pa med// sngags la sbyor ba'i rim pa med// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu don gyi mchog/ 'od dang bar snang 'ja' rnams 'byung // mnyam pa'i ye shes dngos grub 'byung // zla ga mthong pa mtshan ldan la// chu gcig pa dang /
283b5(rnying rgyud): rkyen gnyis pa// ranya chen po dngos 'byung min// 'dab chags sha dang ram bu dang // bsgom pas gsal la rtog pa med// rang gsal ba nyid de bzhin no// rtog pa med pa'i ye shes kyis// gsal la dngas pa pad+ma'i rje// sngags la rim pa'i
283b6(rnying rgyud): grangs dang d+har// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu dogs pa med// yi dam lha dang mkha' 'gro'i gzugs// so sor rtog pa'i dngos su bathob// 'bras bu pad+ma'i rigs su 'gyur// rgya gra mthong pa mtshan ldan dra// rgya gcig pa dang rkyen gnyis pa/
283b7(rnying rgyud): dri chu byang chub sems dpa' dag// gang laban dang rtsong zhi dang // ba noms pas phrin las thams cad 'grub// grub pas don rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// thams cad 'arlab par 'byung ba yin// gdug pa 'dul bas drag por 'grub// sngags
284a1(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis dan dA gyur/ thams cad 'byung bas re zhing // ngan nams brtan dang yid du 'ong // me sbyar 'bar dang rgya ltar 'babs// zla bgrub pa'i ye shes thob// 'brang zulas kyi rigs su
284a2(rnying rgyud): ba dang khwa dang // la nyid brnam pa'i dam pa yis// gang yin la dang mi zlab byung // rim pa lnga yi 'das kyi ni// reg 'dings la yis meb// kun tubabang po'i byin rlabs yin// de la nyes pa ga pa 'dred//
284a3(rnying rgyud): mangs 'dren pa'i lam// rgyu do rgyan gnyis 'bras bur smin// ye shes lnga ltung ba las// 'bras bu rigs lngar yang dag 'byung // snang la rang bzhin med pa'i lha// des na 'bras bu gdon ni ng+ga// ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin las/
284a4(rnying rgyud): yi ngo bo 'byung // me long ye shes ngo bor gsal// rdo rje phu ra ba chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ bdud rtsi lnga bsgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa bzugs te/ sdang du
284a5(rnying rgyud): rab gsal ba// don dam gsal ba'i ye shes 'byung // brten pa gsal ba'i chos nyid 'byung // / khams gsum gsal ba'i sman mi 'byung // rang gsal nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'byung // thams cad ma ti bas gas pab 'byung // mid med pa
284a6(rnying rgyud): sa med par gsal// / khams gsum bong bas gsal ba 'byung // rang rig ston pa'i rten mo 'byung // ye shes nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbu tu gsal// snang ba'i 'od thams cad ston// ma brdibs gsal ba'i 'od de thams cad ston// tsam
284a7(rnying rgyud): gas mdon rnams thams cad ston// dbang ngo gsal ba'i 'dod don rnams ston// 'dagasal kun dang mthun pa yongs kyis men/ ro byung la nag cing ying gsal bani dong // khams gsum gsal ba'i than ma 'byung // tong pa gsal ba'i sngon
284b1(rnying rgyud): mi rab tugs pa// nyim ngo bzhin thams cad snyams par byung // 'a ni yang dag gsa' ba dzin mar gsal// 'a byung gsal ba'i dbying sa las mnyams par/ stong 'ams ngas la nyams pa'i thugs rje 'byung // sangs pa chen du'i don da
284b2(rnying rgyud): ma g.yos par// bde ba chen po'i don rnams ston pa'i mchog/ bstan pas gsal ba chen po'i nga // thig le chen po cing yang ldang ba las// dpa' phyogs med don dam bzud kyi dbyings// dus gsum kun tu 'byung ba med pa'i dang // de nyid pal
284b3(rnying rgyud): yang snang ba'i phyir// blon ma gsal ba'i dor rnams 'dir bstan pas// rtogs pas gsal ba'id rnams tshangs kyis gsal// bad pa'i don la cing yang gsal ba'i 'dra// rang byung dang shar ma bsgribs sa 'a gsal// tshul khrims sdom pa kun
284b4(rnying rgyud): rgyabaskyed // 'dzin pas mi 'tsheng ba de pa'i dang gi sags la// dpa mtshig sa byung kyin mazungs// ma mchags ra bzhin gas snang/ byung banyid lam gnas la pa ci yang nga / 'al bar rgyud mi cung ngan par btang // ma
284b5(rnying rgyud): bcan pa tsun pa 'dzin ma gsal// gsal la 'dzin pa med pa'i nga nyid las// rjes gsu ldan tu ba bgribs rab tugs pa// byung bachen pa'i myongs las bzhin pa// ma yeng sa dan la na yang sA la ma // ge pa bstan pa de las gnan las
284b6(rnying rgyud): bstan du / tIm+b+ha'i byung ba 'gyur bsnad pa ltad// da byang nga chu ba sems la 'gyu 'amad// 'a rdzu brtan pa'i dzin mi gsal// don du brtan kya ngas pa du las med// brtan pa zed la 'dithas bad dang la// thal zhing nga
284b7(rnying rgyud): nga da par rgyags// phyogs dang thal zhing phyogs pa napa ma/ bangam pachen pa la mams thagam pa pa / gang gdan dun mi bstan par 'byud// ded dpa 'i rgyang bya gang bar dgas gas la// yad ma nang bcing yang ldang ba 'i 'dra// legs pa'i
285a1(rnying rgyud): bu thob tu med pa'i dbyings// don gyi snying po bde ba 'di las med// bde ba nyid kyang gsal ba'i nyi ma 'dra// dper nam pa zla ba bzhin te rang bzhin gsal// gang gis bstan pa de rjes gro pa bas d+ha/ dem rtogs pa la
285a2(rnying rgyud): snying po ni// gsal ba mi 'dzin rang bzhin 'od kyis gsal// stong pa kun bzang dus gsum 'gyur ba med// rang+ga srin po bde ba'i myu gu brtags// rang rang bag chags brtas pas sdug bsngal 'byung // mi spar mi 'dor yang dag snying po bral//
285a3(rnying rgyud): la 'dre zhes bstan du med// snying po nyid kyang don gyis brjod dang bral// snying po 'di lam 'dus gang yang med// snying po 'di las rol bcir ngabasnang // snying po 'di las sems can sangs rgyas 'byung // snying po 'di las sku dang ye shes
285a4(rnying rgyud): snying po 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung // snying po 'di las gsal ba'i ye shes 'byung // snying po 'di las rigs kyi sangs rgyas 'byung // snying po 'di las yang dag 'bras bu 'byung // snying po 'di las bstan pa rgya mtsho 'byung // snying po
285a5(rnying rgyud): mi bde sna tshogs 'byung // snying po 'di las sa dang lam du 'byung // snying po 'di las sa rnams rim par 'azod// snying po ma spangs dang bzhin ldan gyis grub// snying po 'di las don rnams yang dag 'byung // ming po 'di las nges med nges par gzung du med//
285a6(rnying rgyud): snying po 'di las byin rlabs thams cad 'byung // snying po 'di las btsal ba med par gsal// snying po 'di las dbang rnams ma bskur 'thob// snying po 'di las phrin las lhun gyis grub// snying po 'di las zhi khro gnyis su snar // snying po 'di pa
285a7(rnying rgyud): par grub// snying po 'di las snang dang stod par sdang // snying po 'di las byin rlabs shugs kyis 'byung // snying po 'dims gang bstan thams cad 'grub// snying po 'di las gtso dang 'khor du snang // snying po 'di las btsal du med par 'grung // snying po 'a
285b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bams cad gyung / rnying ba 'dilas thams cad kun rgyags la// ba 'disas yongs sna bdul ba'i dang / bying ba 'di las cal dang thams ngar 'bral/ snang po 'di las thams cad bti dang gang /
285b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzhi dang bral// snying po 'di la brten pa'i sa dang bral// snying po 'di la brten pa'i don dang bral// snying po 'di la brjod pa'i tshig dang bral// snying po 'di la lta ba'i yul dang bral// snying po 'di sa bsgom pa'i dmigs pa//
285b3(rnying rgyud): spyod pa'i dmigs dang bral// snying po 'di la re ba'i 'bras bu bral// snying po 'di la nga dang bdag tu bral// snying po 'di la brten pa'i dmigs dang bral// thams cad gzung ba'i yul med de pa med// snying po nyid kyang bstan dmigs dang
285b4(rnying rgyud): mod de rang bzhin rang gi gsal// gsal ba nyid kyang dmigs pa kun dang bral// gsal ba nyid na 'di zhes bstan du med// med pa ma yin kun gyi snying por gsal// snying po nyid na 'dob chen por gnas// bdebs mi 'dzin rang bzhin cir yang snga
285b5(rnying rgyud): kun kyang dmigs pa'i brten pa med// yod dang med pa'i mthar ni cir yang sdang // thams cad nga yin de yang mgrub// grub pa med de de nyid rab tu bdang // nga lang zhes bstan pas rab tu 'grel// byang chub nyid la dgus dang mu 'khru' med// 'khrul pa nyi
285b6(rnying rgyud): byang chub chen po'i lam// lam rnams ma bgrod thams cad rgyun gyis thub// sa rlangs ma sbyangs rnams cad grub pa'as// sa mchog 'di ni ma btsal ldan gyis zung // sa pa brten sbyang ba'i dmigs jal// 9sa ldan
285b7(rnying rgyud): bde chen po rang bzhi rtogs pa'i sa// sa la rnam pa gsum du nges pa med// theg chenas ni sa gcig kun gyi dus// de nyid dang lasas rnams lun gyis grub// thams cad 'byung ba'i sa ste bde ba'i rang // lam mchog nyid kyang ma 'grod kum
286a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ lam gyi phreng ba de yis lam rnams thams cad 'grub// lam lnga bgrod pas lam mchog yongs mi thob// bgrod du med pa'i lamatshan nga yis bstan// sa dang mamal nges pa de nyid yin// bzhal bar 'dos pa dang
286a2(rnying rgyud): 'dres pa med// g.yeng ba mang ba 'don rnams yal bar dor// phyogs su 'dzin cing nga yi rang bzhin can// 'dzin pa nyid kyang sdig pa'i snong dang bral// nyi ma shang ba'i rang bzhin byas pa min// ma byas pa yang min te thams cad de lta ltar/
286a3(rnying rgyud): grags kyang nga cu bstan du med// brjod pa gsum dang bral gyi 'di bzhinan/ brjod pa nyid la brjod pa'i dmig sa bral// nga ma tha byung ba ma gang me 'gro// de bzhin dus gsum ga tu 'dil gnas// kuran tu zang po nying kyang de nyid do// rdzang ba tsam da
286a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin gsal ba la// stong pa nyid latha ngang bar 'gyur/ byer btsun pa bad pa'i rjed las/ nga brnang bar brtan pa'i 'i'adu 'bru ba'o// / denas bcom ldan 'das ras pachen pa byung ba 'dim ma rnams par thag
286a5(rnying rgyud): radubal// mam pa sa tur gyi gathams pa da 'dim bags/ pa'i mishes da ban pa nas kyi mag/ btam tha yanas // dkyang gnyis la zang pa med/ dzud
286a6(rnying rgyud): ba bad// tu byed pa' ya byas// byamadu bangs bas / babs cad dul bas bras sas bsus 'bab paragyims lnga'i nga nal// da ya na gas la
286a7(rnying rgyud): nus na lapa du mabyed pa ma tsam dud kyi ca/ gnyi rnal 'arje pa 'a/ can na dus laban pa thug nga bya thad papa dadapa/ gas 'a
286b1(rnying rgyud): dmal nas rdzogs pa yis// rol pa chen po'i rigs lngar 'byung // rdo rje rigs kyi sangs rgyas dang // grub pa'i 'bras bu gang bstan pa// sa dpa lam lnga rab bzod kyang // me long ye shes chen po yis// snang ba'i don la cing yang ston// de bzhin
286b2(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi sangs rgyas dang // grub pa'i 'bras bu khyad par can// sa dang lam la ring bas na// stong pa chen pa'i dbyings su thim// rin chen rigs kyi sangs rgyas ni// grub pa'i 'bras bu rin chan yang // bzhi la ngan gyis las mi 'grub//
286b3(rnying rgyud): kyi 'bras bu rang sar grol// mnyam pa'i ngang du yang dag ston// pad+ma rigs kyi sangs rgyas kyang // bde ba'i 'bras bu don gyis gsal// rim pa grangs la bstan na yang // bzhi dang lnga du bstan du med// so sor rtogs pas rtogs pa'i ngang // las
286b4(rnying rgyud): kyi rigs kyi sangs rgyas kyang // grub pa can du bstan pa ste// sa dang lam la bstan par zad// grub pa'i 'bras bu gzhi mi dgos// thams cad gcig pas mi 'byung ra// zla ba zab pa'i rang bzhin can// sku lnga ye shes rnam lnga yang // don dam
286b5(rnying rgyud): gcig las bstan pa la// de nyi nga bar 'byung bas na// rig pa can du gang la 'gyur// med par byung ba'i don du yang // brjod pa'i tshig tsam yang dag min// rang rig gsal ba'i nga ba las// stong pa'i rig par 'gyur ba med// reg pa thams cad
286b6(rnying rgyud): glan cig ni// rig pa rna tshogs byung bas na// dag pa'ing pong gzhin zal// med pa'i rang bzhin gzhin bral// gnyis su med par gnan thal// chos nyid phur pa gzhi rtsa thal// zugs rje bur par gags zal// byang sems spar par gnyen drung
286b7(rnying rgyud): 'dre sa tha~M ba gshe thal// depa na drug thal/ mi gnas las ca thal// nyid tham pa sa ma'o// rgya dang margya dang mabyung bang/ thams ca ban pa ma za'o// dgeng ba ya nga ya/
287a1(rnying rgyud): bral ba'i chos nyid ni// cir yang med la cir yang snang // snang ba nyid kyang gzhi rtsa bral// cir yang med pas ngos gzung med// lha dang wA ru bsgom pa yang // lha gnyis rang bzhin khyad par med// drang ba 'dan du cing
287a2(rnying rgyud): yang ston// drang ba nyid du bstan pa ni// nges par brtags pas de bzhin yin// nges pa nyid dang gnyis su med// des med rang bzhin thams cad ston// spangs pa'i chos nyid thig ltar phra// phra bas dmigs dang bral bar bshad// phra ba'i rang bzhin ba
287a3(rnying rgyud): dka' ba// phra ba'i don nyid cing yang ston// de yis don rnams ston par byed/ yang dag nyid du de bstan na// nges pa nyid du 'bras bur bcas// re ba med par don rtogs nas// yang dag bstan pa'i phur pa 'gyur// lha nyid gzhi rtsa ma thal na// yang
287a4(rnying rgyud): dag don gyi phur pa min// 'dzin pas bcings pa'i lha nyid ni// gzhi dang rtsa ba bcas pa ste// nges pa can du gyur pas na// bya rtsol med pa'i ye shes min// don gyi phur pa gzhi rtsa bral// nges par phur pa brjod pa bral// snang ba tsam du bstan pa ste//
287a5(rnying rgyud): rang rang rgyud du 'dzin pa med// 'dzin pa rang bzhin dngos po ste// de yis bstan pa'i 'bras bu ni// sa dang lam la rim par bstan// rtog pa med pa'i lha nyid ni// 'bras bu srid pa nyid du brtas// shes pa'i rtog pa rang sar grol// dang grol 'bras bu
287a6(rnying rgyud): btsal mi dgos// sangs rgyas sa la rnam pa lnga// rang rig ye shes rtogs pa'i sa// 'dzin pa phyogs su bral ba'i sa// ye shes rgyun mi 'chad pa'is// rgyu 'bras gnyis med rtog pa'i sa// tham cad lhun gyis grub pa'i sa// lnga yis rang zungs lnga rtog// 'byung ba
287a7(rnying rgyud): yi rang bzhin la// sangs rgyas zhing kham+ba thams cad rtogs// nam mkha' ston pas rab bstan pa// nges par bstan du med par rtogs// ston pas chu yi don bstan pa// 'khor ba'i bag chags skyong bar rtogs// ston pas sa yi don bstan pa// 'gro sa tsha
287b1(rnying rgyud): kyang gnas ma rtogs// spyod pas ma ma don bstan pa// 'thod pa'i rgyum rtog pasreg pa dang // ye shes mi chen 'bar pa'i sa/ skyon pa lnga las rab bstan pa// 'amar ba wa mya na 'das/ 'dogs myed pa yang na dug/ yangadag
287b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i snying po 'di// chos nyid phur pa'i ngo bo ste// sems can drag pos sgrol ba yang // drag po nyid kyang dmigs dang bral// ye shes me yi khro bo ni// sreg pa'i lha ste 'tshig par byed// khams gsum 'khu byed ye shes chu// 'khor ba 'khrud byed
287b3(rnying rgyud): 'joms// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ rol pa chen po'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu byams pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje phur ba'i chos nyid las// kunaH
287b4(rnying rgyud): po'i rol pa yis// dus gsum bder gshegs dgongs pa 'dus// shes pa'i khyad par bas ma 'das pa// rol pa'i theg pa bsam las 'das// yin dang ma yin brtag dka' bas// rtog pa'i lta ba bsam las 'das// ma rig ma shes drang ba las
287b5(rnying rgyud): zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la// rnam pa grangs su rab bstan te// don dam gnyis su bstan par snang // sil bu gong bu snyoms par 'jug/ lnga ru 'jug cings rnams bgrod// sa gnyis rab tu non pa yang // don dang mthun pa yang dag sa// byams pa chen po'i
287b6(rnying rgyud): rol pa las// chos nyid phur ba cing yang snang // rang rang rtogs pa'i khyad par las// spang ba dang ni bslab pa dang // spangs na stong pa nam mkha' 'dra// ma spangs sa la rnam pa gsum// nyon mongs las dang sdug bsngal gsum// rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par
287b7(rnying rgyud): las// byams pa chen po'i byin rlabs las// chos nyid phur pa cir yang snang // gyi nang rten cing 'brel par gnas// rnal 'byor rnam gnyis rang bzhin las// snang ba'i rtog pa bcad pa yis// med pa nyid du gyur pa yin// snang la rab bzhin med pas na//
288a1(rnying rgyud): lung po ma nga sa m+b+hanas // na pa dang las rna /
288a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'bras bu gter// byams pa chen po'i byid rlobs las// chos nyid phur ba cing yang dag/ dag pa chen po'i chos nyid las// rnam pa gsum byeng poH/ rim pa gnyis su brtan pa dang // dag pa can du gyur bas na/ sa rab tu
288a3(rnying rgyud): bya'o// byams pa chen po'i byin rabs las/ chos nyid pur btsor yang snar// rigs lnga snang ba rang bzhin med// dag pas gtsang ste dri ma med// rim par gyur rting mtshar che// sa pa rab tu gnas pa te/ khyims brgyad bas pas
288a4(rnying rgyud): chos nyid phur pa cir yang snang // snang la rang bzhin med pa'i lha// rim pa ma yin gnyis su snang // mnyam par mchod pa ngo mtshar to// yang dgas la gnas pa'o// byams pa chen po'i byin rlabs las// chos nyid dur bcing yang tha
288a5(rnying rgyud): lha dang lha mo'i rang bzhin la// spos dang bral ba'i chos nyid la// gnyis su med pa'i rtogs pa che// ting 'dzin sa yi rim pa yin// byams pa chen po'i byin rlabs las// chos nyid phur pa cing yang snang // kun bzang yab yum dol pa las//
288a6(rnying rgyud): pa chen por yang dag 'byung // gnas pa chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// sa rnams rab tu rdzogs pa'o// byams pa chen po'i byin rlabs las// chos nyid phur pa cing yang snang // rdo rje phur pa'ang khro ste// gdug pa 'dul ba byams par snga /
288a7(rnying rgyud): gsum rgyud myur byams par snang // log par grol ba byams par snang // yang dag bstan pa'i phung pa'ang// dus gsum kun tu 'gyur ba med// thig le phung pa'i rang bzhin las// 'dul ba'i dbang du ra yang sdad// shes pa'i khyad par rnam
288b1(rnying rgyud): yang // drang ba'i lung nyon mangs kyang // rang rig rang gsal blta ba'i dong // bzhi yis bstan te lnga yang rung // tshad byed snying rje'i theg pa dang // mnyam nyid rig pa'i theg pa dang // zhun grub thang med theg pa gang // rdo rje phur pa'i chos nyid sa
288b2(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po'i rang nyid las// yongs la dbang baphyur rin chen mdzod// rtog pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// skye ba med par thams cad kye// phrin dang na bun khu drangs dang // nyi ma zla ba skar ma dang // 'brug dang glog dang zug tshom dang // sreg par byed
288b3(rnying rgyud): 'phang bar byed// thams cad thams cad 'byung bar byed// res 'ga' sna tshogs nam mkha' la// res 'ga' nam mkha' stong par 'gyur// de 'dra nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ni// cir yang med la cir yang spang // de bas nam mkha' dmigs dang bral//
288b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin byang chub sems nyid ni// skyid par byed dang sdug par byed// sangs rgyas 'byung zhing sems can 'byung // lha yang 'byung la 'dre yang 'byung // mtho ris 'byung zhing ngan song 'byung // yod par 'byung zhing med par 'byung // res 'ga' sna tshogs kun tu 'byung //
288b5(rnying rgyud): res 'ga' sna tshogs dbyings su thi ma// yod dang med pa'i ngos gzung med// snyan pa'i 'khor du bcas pa yang // byang chub sems nyid rang bzhin 'byung // go dang gsal ba'i sems nyid la// rgyug dang 'thebs par byed pa 'byung // khro dang gtum pa'i
288b6(rnying rgyud): sems nyid la// zhi dang nges pa byed pa 'byung // 'dzin dang chags par byed pa 'byung // 'dzin meb stong pa'i sems nyid 'byu// bsad dang bcad pa'i sems nyid la// byams pa chen po'i sems nyid 'byung // nyon mongs sdug bsngal sems nyid la
288b7(rnying rgyud): bde myed yangs pa'i sems nyid 'byung // sems nyid yangs pa'i dbyings nyid du// 'khor 'das bsam gyis mi khyab shongs// de phyir sems nyid yangs pa nas// thams cad thams cad 'brang ba yin// rang nyung dngos por ma grub phyir// thams cad
289a1(rnying rgyud): kun la 'grub par bstan// sangs tsam dubyasan pa drang // nga na nanas napa byur// thams cad byung ba sams las byung// dpyir thams cad gra byugs// bstan par dag ba'
289a2(rnying rgyud): sa / ga / badzin papa/ / sa
289a3(rnying rgyud): pAs nges par bstan// byams pa chen po la ting nge 'dzin// rdo rje sur rab bshad pa'i rgyud las/ rnams pa chen po'i la brgya gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi ting nge 'dzin la togs par zhugs te/ yenas dag pa
289a4(rnying rgyud): nyid las// rtogs pa chen po dab ga mchog/ mchog sbyin na dang bang pom sa// tsam pan rna bzu bas can sas bzang bras pa'i dang na/ srid rje med de pa rnams dan/ chos nyid mang pa'i dpang rtogasan// thag
289a5(rnying rgyud): po'i dbyang rnams sor la 'byung // ye grong chen po'i dbang dmas rtogs gyur na// thams patshad med dbang dmas nod la 'byung // rig pa gsal ba'i dbang rnams rtogs gyur ro// mkhas pachen po'i dbang rnams 'a la 'byung // song pa gas
289a6(rnying rgyud): rnams rtogs gyur na// panang nus pa'i dbang rnams nong la chung // mngag mun pasel ba'i bu rtogs na// phra srang thugs kyi dbang rnams nong la 'byu / mas byang chubasems kyi dpang rtogs da// dur yod nas kyi dbar rnams
289a7(rnying rgyud): 'dod kyis nyid pa ba dag rtogs na// gtsug pa 'dul pa'i dpang rims pazang mi danas// thams cid spang ba na ma da te shes na// nga byu mapa 'das 'apas bzung ma dgas// da byed chen pa'i dbang dam sa chogs rnas
289b1(rnying rgyud): dad pa dbang gi stobs rnams bsrung mi dgos// stong pa chen po'i dbang rnams rabartogs na// sdang brdzas kyi dbang rnams bskur mi dgos// rig pa'i gzhi dang bral ba'i dbang rtogs na// bsod nams chen pa'i dbang rnams bsrur me dgos// bsam/
289b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzhi dang bral ba'i don togs na// dge bcu bsod nams dbang rnams bskur me dgos// bzang ngan brtag tu med par dbang thob na// nan gyis brtags pa'i dbang rnams bskur mi dgos// thig le rang bzhin gnas pa'i dbang thob na// ring
289b3(rnying rgyud): grangs kyis bsgyur ba'i dbang mi dgos// rang byung ye shes rang dbang yi rtogs na// mar me ye shes dbang rnams bskur mi dgos// rang byung rtsal med chen po'i dbang rtogs na// bsnyen bsgrub rim par phye ba'i dbang me dgos// chos nyid yed pa
289b4(rnying rgyud): chen po'i dbang rtogs na// ye shes rim par phye ba'i dbang mi dgos// yi 'byams byang chub sems pa'i dbang rtogs na// maN+Dal dkyil 'khor bya ba'i dbang mi dgos// sangs rgyas dang la yod pa'i dbang rtogs na// sangs rgyas byang chub pa yi dpa
289b5(rnying rgyud): dgos// thig le lu gsung thugs kyi dbang rtogs na// bsgom bya sku gsung thugs kyi dbang mi dgos// ma btsal ma bsgrubs ye shes dbang rtogs na// bstan pa rgya mtsho'i dbang rnams bsrung mi dgos// thugs rje phur pha rol pa don rtogs na// khro
289b6(rnying rgyud): drag po'i dbang rnams bsur mi dgos// thabs dang shes rab gsal ba'i don rtogs na// gsang pa byang chub sems dbang bkur mi dgos// mkhas pa rang gsal nges med don rtogs na// grangs dang rim pas bsrur ba'i dbang mi dgos// thams cad
289b7(rnying rgyud): las byung bdon rtogs na// gzhan nas 'atsal ba'i da'ang rnams bsrung mi gro / chos nyid gsal ba'i sngon ma'i don rtogs na// gsal byed bza pa'i dbang rnams bsrung mi dgos// skyon pa dang las byung ba'i dod rtogs na// ston pa rdo rje sems dang
290a1(rnying rgyud): ca mau rdzogs// 'khor rnams dang las byung ba'i don rtogs na// phyug na ngona'i dbang rnams bskur mi dgas// 'khor 'das gnyis su med pa ngan rdzogasan// gardzas rim par 'askur ba'i dbang mi dgos/ rdzas cad
290a2(rnying rgyud): phur pa rang byung don rtogs na// rang byung lha rnams bskur ba'i dbang mi dgos// dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu// dbang dang drag por ldan pa la// nam mkha'i khams kyang de bzhin te// sa dang ri la rab tu brtag/ nges pa med pa'i sa nyid
290a3(rnying rgyud): la// maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dur khrod sna tshogs phye ma gdab// dem rdzas lnga yis chag chag gdab// thig le rnam pa gnyis su bshad// sa thig gnam thig gnyis su bstan// lnga dang gsum gyi sbyor ba la// gdab pa'i rim pa
290a4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin bya// tshon sna lnga yi rim pa la// bstan pa'i don du de bzhin bya// gru gsum zla gam mu khyud dang // 'khor lo gru chad lha snams bcas// sgo dang rtab pas de bzhin te// mdzes pa'i rgyan dang mtshan pa brtag/ bsrung bya'i rim pa yang dag
290a5(rnying rgyud): dam sri mnan dang ma drang bsgyel// sgo la rim pa de bzhin sbyar// rdzas rnams dgod pa yang dag ste// sku yi dbang dang gsung gi dbang // thugs la sogs pa de bzhin no// rdzas kyi dbang dang phur pa'i dbang // phan pa'i dbang dang nus pa'i dbang /
290a6(rnying rgyud): dam can dbang dang las bzhi'i dbang // de la sogs pa'i dbang rnams ni// rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya// ting 'dzin chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// bsnyen pa nam mkhar 'grub pa yang // nus pa yod phyir rab tu bya// bum pa nam mkhar lding
290a7(rnying rgyud): bdang // phur pa 'phar zhing 'khrog pa dang // sku gzugs bzhad cing 'gul ba dang // dam can mngon du lung ston dang // shing bal bzhin du yang ba dang // ci la thogs pa med pa dang // nad rnams thams cad sel ba dang / sman pa'i mchog tu gyurang
290b1(rnying rgyud): dang / rig pa khong dngas gar pa dang / rting ldan pa 'byung ba dang / 'am 'drim pas 'dul ba dang / bar chad sol ba'i rtags bla nabargyan pa las su nanan d+halas sa rung bar gyur bdas
290b2(rnying rgyud): bskyab pa bya ba'i rim pa yang // yang dag nyid du brten par \u0f7f// chen po las kyi rim pa ni// phrag lus rdzas kyi 'bul ba zhes// tha ma mnyas par bya ba'i phyir/ mnyes pa'i yon tan rgyan pa ni/ bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/
290b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin sa la 'gro ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'i stsal gnas// 'gro ba'i don rnams ma lus nAs// bstan pa kun la thogs pa med// de phyir dbang bslar gsol ba gdab// byin thabs chen po che ltar 'byung // 'gro ba chos byed gsos
290b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin du// dbang gi byin rlabs de bzhin du// 'pho ba gnyis kyi don byed nus// dag pa khrus kyis bkru bya zhing // lhar 'byed spun drang bsnam pa dang // mchod pa ma lus rdzogs par bya// gtso bo'i dbang du ngur khrod dang // phan dang nus pa/
290b5(rnying rgyud): rabab kyin// phra gsung thugs la rdzogs pa'i dbang // de nyid la de bzhin bskur// dur khrod dbang yang de bzhin te// kun la rdzogs par rim par bskur// drag pos 'dul ba'i las bya zhing // drag po'i dbang yang rim par bsrur // drug
290b6(rnying rgyud): pa 'dul ba'i dpung thob nas/ rkyen chung 'gro ba'i don rnams nas/ aN pa nyid kyi dbang thabam/ gsas las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// hUM mad chen po dbang po na/ log dang se pa'i las rnams 'grub// rnam par rtul ba'i
290b7(rnying rgyud): dang la/ sbya bgagangan sas thul ba nga/ su su bya rnam sam ma thags na na na ma pa 'a pan/ ma ca pa dab ma sa/ nas ga na 'das
291a1(rnying rgyud): zhe sdang rang rgyud gnon par 'gyur// ta mgrin rgyal po'i dbang thob na/ khams gsum dbang du spyad par 'gyur// gzhan gyis mi thub dbang thob na// nyon mongs sha mdangs phyed par 'gyur// bdud rtsi 'khyab
291a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang thob na// khams gsum gdug pa gsod par 'gyur// khams gsum rnam rgyal dbang thob na// gang yin dngos por 'dzin par 'gyur// stobs po che yi dbang thob na// 'dul ba chen po'i dbang thob 'gyur// sras mchog drug gi dang
291a3(rnying rgyud): thob na// 'jig rten dregs pa 'dul bar 'gyur// dur khrod rdzas kyi dbang thob na// bdud kyi rgyal po 'dul bar 'gyur// sku gsung zhugs kyi dbang thob na// khams gsum sprul pas 'gengs par 'gyur// rdo rje phur pa'i dbang thong na// rdegs
291a4(rnying rgyud): pa can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur// bkra shis dam pa'i rdzas la brten// dam pa de nyid thob gyur na// legs pa'i yon tan brjod las 'das// rdo rje tshe yi dbang thob na// tshe yi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// longs myong gter gyi dbang rdzob na// zang med 'phel ba'i dbang
291a5(rnying rgyud): dang ldan// dbang la yon tan brjod las 'das// dbang rnams rdzogs par ma gyur na// rdza byas be'ur lus pa 'dra// dbang rnams thob par 'gyur na// nyi khri tshig stong sta rnga nus kyang // rgyal ba dmangs su bab pa'adra // shing la btsugs 'brubyas
291a6(rnying rgyud): pa 'dra// de phyir dbang la nan tan bya// rdo rje gyur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ dbang bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig la snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ston pa chen po
291a7(rnying rgyud): dam tshig la// rdo rje rab tus ma yi// mi 'da' badz+ra kI la ya// pi 'ang 'dam tshig rnam po wa// gnas pa'i dmatshig gsum rnams dang // med pa'i dmachog chen po dang // bsrung ba 'di mchog 'gyu rab med// ting 'dzin da mchog bsrung ba'i mchog
291b1(rnying rgyud): ga pas/ mang ldan // da pa da ma na ldan pa/ padu rnams// lalags sa na bdus dang bya/ na
291b2(rnying rgyud): slob dpon chen po dang // dam tshig dbang gi slob dpon dang // man ngag lung gi slob dpon dang // shes rgyung grol ba'i slob dpon dang // bskrad bzangs kyi shes par gyis// rtsa ba chad par ma gyu ra na/ tham rtag tu bas ba dang //
291b3(rnying rgyud): grags pa ma yin pa// de yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// pha ltar bkur te brtse ba dang / tshig tsam phyal pa ma yin pa// khong nas gdung ba bskyed pa ni// de yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// dbang po'i mag ldang brtse ba dang // dan
291b4(rnying rgyud): lus la mi phongs srog mi phongs// de yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// dbu yi gtsug gi rin chen lngar// skyo ba med par khur byed pa// de yang bsrung ba'i dam pa yin// snying dang 'dra zhing 'dral mi phod// ji ltar khro gtum gsod byed kyang // rim
291b5(rnying rgyud): sems mi dbyug/ de yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// dam tshig tu med shel sgong 'dra// dkyil 'khor ba chen po mi 'dral zhing // dam chos gnyen por byed pa dang // dam rdzas gnyen por gtsor len na// de yang bsrung ba'ongam pa yin/
291b6(rnying rgyud): grags dur kong du// rtags rnams mngon du 'don pa dag/ de yang bzung ba'i rim pa yin// lel gying rnams ma yin par// brtson 'grus dag pas grub byed pa// de yang bslang ba 'ongam pa yid// rdzas rnams mtsha mi 'don pa// ga
291b7(rnying rgyud): rnams 'don pa yang // de 'ang 'askur ba'i ngom pa yin// rtogs pa'i lta ba gdang ldar zhing // spong par can par byed pa ni// de yang bzung ba'i dam pa med// rnams dasum sams can thams cad la// cid zungasam par chang ba// de yang

293a1(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten dbang can bran bzhin nyan// 'jig rtenamakha' 'gro batho pa nyan// 'jig rten longs spyod 'phel bar byed// rgyal ba'i mdzod ldan nad mer 'gyur// rdong bung pa chen po pa shang pa'i rgyud las/ dam chog
293a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das thal ba chen po bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rgyal po chen po bsod nams mchog/ me rtag sems can rang bzhin yin// phung po sbyangs pa'i thal ba la//
293a3(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa'i rin chen la// brdar te zhun chen khu bar sbyar// gang yin de la bsre par bya// stong pa skye dang rdo rje yis// mdzad pa'i lha nyid de bzhin bsgom// dus gsum rgyal ba spyan drangs nas// bstims la rin chen mchod pabya// snying po ba
293a4(rnying rgyud): te bstod pa bya// sa la thim pas gnyis su med// bar snang 'ang 'tshon tshul du gyur// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra// zad pa med pa'i rang bzhin las// snod ni b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang // gdan khri bcas par yang dag gyur// gdug pa za
293a5(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab gnyis// brdabs pas byang sems mkha' la babs// de nyid gtso sngags brjod byas la// ye shes lnga yi ngo bor gyur// stong khams khyab pa'i sgra byung yang // sdang la rang bzhin med par gyur// dgongs pa dag pas byas gyur na// su
293a6(rnying rgyud): gsum rim gyis don byas nas// bskyed dang bstim dang spyan drang dang // bskyod pa bya dang mchod pa bya// rin chen sna lngas rab mtshon te// thams cad gtso bo'i sngags las byung // mchod pa'i sngags kyang de bzhin te// yang dang yang du byas pa ni//
293a7(rnying rgyud): rab gnas chen pa zhes kya // 'da' bye ba dam gsungs// thal bachen po bsgrub pa \u0f7f// ngal 'tshor chen po zil ba la// khyen gsang pa'i dpangs lnga// gnyis sre dngang byung ba // phud chen tha mer du btang // stong bzung nga //

294a1(rnying rgyud): bsag/ bya ba rim pa ma lus pa// pang dang nyid de dang brtan nas/ sngon du bzhin rdzogs byas la// lhanams rab tu gnas pa yin// rgyas/
294a2(rnying rgyud): na sa
294a3(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs par shar// srog gi go ru shar ba dang // snying gi dkyil du bzhom par bya// phung po rdo rjer gtams byas nas// rnam par shes pardo rjer bsgom// khro bo khro mo rngams pa'i tshogs// dgyed pa'i sdigs
294a4(rnying rgyud): bya// gdug pa 'dul ba'i sas rnams bskyed// sring pa'i phur bu bsrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// khro bo chen po gsheg nas kyang // rtagra dang mtshan ma brtanang dang // kI la pa yi dngos phreng rdol/
294a5(rnying rgyud): pa 'bul zhing dngos grub dang // las bzhis bsdam dang bcing ba dang // gcig gis gdab dang mtshon dang dug/ brdung dang bslab pa sngags kyis bya// bskul zhing lhal ba nyen mchod 'bul// lha rnams mchod phyir gdug pa bskal// de dang
294a6(rnying rgyud): par rab bstan nas// rtags dang skur ba de bzhin te// gsal rkyen 'khrul pa med par 'azlas// rig 'dzin sa la de bzhin 'gro// dbugs dang sbyang zhing 'phro 'dra bya// rang brang tshad dang ldan pa dang // brtan pa'i tshad dang ldan par bya//
294a7(rnying rgyud): nyams ni rnam pa gsum// grub pa'i tshad ni rnam pa lnga// de bzhin las su rung ba yis// 'gro ba'i don rnams nus par 'gyur// rnam pa gnyis kyi don byas nas// yang dag 'bras bu chud mi za// drag po grol ba'i dus nyid du// la
294b1(rnying rgyud): de bzhin yang dag bya// dam chog chen po'i bus labab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la 'bya// phyag brtan chen po'i dus la bab// than mu kha'i dus la bab// bdag nyid chen po'i dus la bab// sa bdag rgyal ba'i dus la bab// khyod kyad ma
294b2(rnying rgyud): dus la bab// sngon chad ji ltar dam bcas bzhin// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod/ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tsho ba pa'i// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la yang // gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra da
294b3(rnying rgyud): bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa yis// dngos grub 'phrog cing 'tsho ba rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug ste// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bskal pa dang // lus ngag rdul du bshigs nas kyang //
294b4(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// oM le hUM laM sAm b+ha ya nan mo ha ya g+hA ta ya/ b+ha ga bA na/ hrIHSh+T+r-iHba~M kr-i badz+ra d+h+r-i kAr hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya dzaHhUM baM hoH/ badz+ra kI li kI la ye hUM hU~M phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra hU~M kA ra hUM phaT/ badz+ra
294b5(rnying rgyud): oM a/ khams gsum 'khor ba bskal ba'i phyir// stong pa nyid du yang dag grol// don dam de las 'da' mi byed// stong pa chen po'i chos kyi mchog/ des ni yang dag don rnams rtogs// dngos grub par zad byed pa'i bgegs// gzug
294b6(rnying rgyud): sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhib rkyod cig rnam par chings// gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// rengs par khug pa sgrar chug cing // pho ba cig rnam par gzir bar gyis// nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang // bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan
294b7(rnying rgyud): per gyis// pran dang ro nya bka' nyan tshogs// khyed kyi mchog dus la bab// sngon chad ji ltar dam bcas bzhin// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// hUM pa ra bid+h+wanas hUM phaT/ hrI ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/ b+hit+ta b+hin+ta hU~M phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-i h+ya hU~M Shamra/
295a1(rnying rgyud): ma/ nArdzas/ swAHla/ ta ta yAwA rbAthAr+tha/ sa ma thu/ sman ma d+ha ba shA ga yon du/ badz+ha / nas/
295a2(rnying rgyud): badz+ra/ ma tha ma tha bang/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ban/ su ru su dra badz+ra/ su ru su dra badz+ra/ kaM taM kA ye/ dza ma bi dza ma/ a nyam par te/ maur sini pra mdan baT/ rdo rje gsang pa'i bka' las ni// sdig cin gang zhig 'ad 'byed pa// stobs ches meb can pa
295a3(rnying rgyud): rmang pa tshal ba brgya ru khos// nyon cig bgegs dang lag 'dren tshogs// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// d+h+waM ma ma pa shang ku rba/ ma te nyaM ka ra i dan/ d+hA ti ma ma kar ma/ shI p+l-i kA rA ya NAM phaT/ gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams/
295a4(rnying rgyud): lha'am 'on te bdud kyang rung // nga la bar chad byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par gyis// sarba A na ya hU~M phaT/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hUM phaT/ rdungs shog rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// bka' las 'da' byed jig can rnams// rdo rje me dpal te
295a5(rnying rgyud): bsregs nas// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rdzogs// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje thobs brdungs byas na// lha yang rung te rlag par 'gyur// kha dza ma kha tha ma kha 'am/ hUM hU~M trUM/ phaT paT phaT/ badz+ra ya na bo d+ha khA ti khA hi//
295a6(rnying rgyud): bskal ba yang dag don bstan pa// gtso bo lha sogs sngags rnams la// gnad sngags sgrol sngags gnyis su 'gyur// kun la de bzhin shes par bya// gdab pa'i las de za ba dang // 'khor gyi sngags rnams de bzhin te// thun dang bden pa'i
295a7(rnying rgyud): byin rlabs dang // mtshan dang dug dang de bzhin te// bdung dang sdug bsngal bskyed pa dang // bstab dang byang chub sems su bstad// chos nyid kyi bdan par// gsang sngags kyi byin gyis rlags so// sangs rgyas kyi mthu'o// a d+hi tsaH 'dus la bar
295b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i brnags pa de kho na la'o// ting 'dzin chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// gnas skabs bsgyur cing shes par bya'o// tshe 'phrul bstan pa kun kyang 'dul// sreg pa me yi las la sbyar// mnan pas yang de bzhin te// 'phang bzor du de bzhin ba
295b2(rnying rgyud): nyams pa ma lus gnan bya'i phyir// tshe ba stim rim pa'i las rnams bya// 'gro ba ma lus 'dul bar 'gyur// dper na chud kyi rang bzhin ni// phug don rke dang rma bya'i mdongs// mang ba ma tshang 'khrugs pa dang // rgyud rnams rang dang don dang bstun//
295b3(rnying rgyud): nges pa med pa'i rgyud bung yang // dper na dmus long mar bzhin 'gyur// mang bas skongs la 'khrugs pa sde bas// gab pa gsal ba brdar bstan dgrol// des na bred chags rgyud du 'byung // rgyud rnams don dang ma ldan na// sa dang chu 'dres chog
295b4(rnying rgyud): ma can// sman dang dug tu rnam par 'dres// sbyin dang mar dang chu 'dra ste// de yis bya ba'i don mi nus// de gnyis don nyams gang yang med// de bzhin rgyud kyi rang bzhin yang // gtan la mi phebs phyogs 'dzin can// de yis bstan pa'i
295b5(rnying rgyud): de ni// yang dag min te de phyir bsteso// dper na chu la mar 'dod bzhin// gtan la mi phebs rgyud nyid la// bya btsal med pa'i don mi 'byung // srin bu bal du gtums pa 'dra// grol ba'i don rnams yongs mi 'byung // rgyud kyi rang
295b6(rnying rgyud): mang ba ste// tshang bar byed de 'khrugs par 'byung // yod par 'byung ste rang chud med// med pa lta bu chad pa med// kun tu bzang po'i ngang nyid las// rgyud rnams thams cad ston par byed// grangs med brjod kyis mi lang ba'i// gsal la
295b7(rnying rgyud): toka med rgyud rnams 'byung // lha dang rgyud du chags pa la// bstan pa don med yal bar 'gyur// rgyud kyi shes pa 'dzin pa gral// lhas kyang de bzhin sa nyid bral// lha nyid ma nges ngos bzung bral// rang chud 'dzin pa'i lha rnams ni// dpe
296a1(rnying rgyud): na me long gzugs brnyan te// nges pa can du gyur pas na// gang gis blta ba de mi mthong // de bzhin lha yi rang bzhin yang // nges pa can du gyur pas na// gcig las gnyis su bsgom mi nus// bsgoms pas rang

296b1(rnying rgyud): su nam /

296b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i las rnams bya// rang bstang pa'i rang bzhin las// rje dang rdo thags kyis babyung // rno ni gsan rgyan drangs pastim par bya// mtshad pa bskyed pa ma lus kun// yang dag nyid rten pazhin tu // dbus su song rjong la na zhing// khyong du 'du
296b5(rnying rgyud): brnam ma pa'// ti la mags pa sur bajug/ dam dpas du dag pa na// tid du sasu lardzas rnams gyu / gang du rgyagasas thang gang gas/ nadags pa nga da mar gzhag/ nub cidag sa druganan

297a1(rnying rgyud): thal ba nams// bsgrub pa chen po bzhin bya// brten pa ye shes sa nyid la// gdug badrug gi grags bcas pa// bshad pa de bzhin ris pas 'byung / mags parjor ba banon / ba tams pan
297a2(rnying rgyud): pa gdab// de bzhin brten pa'i las rnams bya// sa ya drug 'bum mang du bsngal// mngon du 'od dang nyams su 'ong // mtshan ma tsam du 'byung ba dang // 'od dang me dang du ba dang // mi red nam mkha' gang ba dang // rta dang khyi dang sbrul dang
297a3(rnying rgyud): rtags la bab pa rab tu brtag/ nges par gdeng du gyur pa dang // bsrub pa'i las ni shes par bya// lha dang rdzas kyi bye brag dang // sngags dang bskul ba de bzhin te// gtso bo gsal ba'i byin rlabs kyis// 'khor rnams gsal bar gyur pa dang // bam
297a4(rnying rgyud): thugs par sa/ sngags rnapa'i 'bri par tu gcig/ sa rje thugs rnams so// dgas pa gags nyid btu / nga byang ma byathal pa dang // nag pa tags rnam 'thung bar 'ad// rkyen gyi phreng bcu
297a5(rnying rgyud): gcig/ gcig la rdzas drug rang rang brab// gcig la rdzas rnams dril ba ste// khrag dang snying du bcas pa la// so so rang rang dam rdzas brab// gang yin nyams pa bskal bar bya// thun cing khol dang lud pa dang / mang ba tsam du gyur pa na//
297a6(rnying rgyud): nyung dkar nyung nag rgyo tshe dang // d+ha du ra yi rtsa ba yis// hrIn dang mtshan du dus med par// yang nas yang dubab par bya// de yis thun kyang rab tu khol// nan du dkar po sngags la sbyar// nag po de bzhin rab tu mnan// rtags de brtan par byung ba
297a7(rnying rgyud): deng // drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya// bdud kyi nyi ma bab mi shis// ngan pa'i las rnams bya bar 'byung // hi nag mar gyi de dag gam// 'byung zhing 'jug pa'i nyi ma la// dung du 'jug dang chu ba dang // mngon du byung dang khugs pa dang // dza
297b1(rnying rgyud): sa sa / nan/ sa sa
297b2(rnying rgyud): maldan
297b3(rnying rgyud): sun dum
297b4(rnying rgyud): na/
297b5(rnying rgyud): um pa gam/ dung ba dang padul mtha la/ sa snru
297b6(rnying rgyud): sa ma sa/
298a1(rnying rgyud): mas / sa/ da ma du / snyas/ na
298a2(rnying rgyud): ba'o// mang po zas la yang dag gang // dngas su byu chen mnyams gtsug/ shA nga shi zhan gnas/ dbus su ming byeng rnas su bcug/ shar dung mi skye lagags// la nang sagagayas pa la// mau kyang zas la da
298a3(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ yang nar mgor ming byung bcug/ rgyang gis bcug la snga dmar bcings// dregs pa'i snying pa de bzhin gyi// rim pas bskrun pa de bzhin du// ting 'dzin rim pas lang dag 'byung // dur khror chen po'i gzhal sa
298a4(rnying rgyud): su bsnyen pa'i phrar ba dgod// shar skar sas mchog phur pa dgod// phyi rol dregs pa'i rdzas rnams dgod// bsgom pa'i rim pa de bzhin te// spyan drangs bsdam pa de bzhin te// bsnyen pa ye shes la la dbul// 'jig tan drags pa
298a5(rnying rgyud): 'byung / no cing bsgral te las rnams bcal// d+ham bang nag su gsum 'bar ba dkyil 'khor na// yab gcig rjegatsun can// dran ri na'i gzugs// rngam bachen pa'i thams pa shing // gdugs ca rnams dpas pas co/
298a6(rnying rgyud): b+hag gi zur bas ca mangs tha~Mng // zhabs pa'i cu 'phrul ba zhi dang ldan// rkyen mig gu gsum drug gsum 'dul// ya mtshan chen po 'phrul ts+tshaH// gdug pa 'dul ba'i nyal phyag 'tshal bstod// nyon rmongs 'joms pa'i sal phyag tshal btad/
298a7(rnying rgyud): ba dpung chen po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM thugs kyi sbrul latsor yang rton// yamatshan chen po nya yi d+ha// khams gsum gdug pa 'dul ba'i dpal// stong gsum rnams pa drag po'i sra// ye shes na yi sprul pa te// ma bcul dbyings nas bzhengs
298b1(rnying rgyud): 'dun// mthong ga 'di snga pa'i bum dag la// nyan mangs 'joms pa'i bur pa rnams// da rtags 'byol ba'i gag la dang // khams gsum ga ngagatsad ltur pa dzin/ mad napa gags pa cag drug pa// drang na bdugasum dpa pa
298b2(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten dregs pa 'dul ba'i lha// thugs dam chen po'i dbyings nas baphrul// 'jig rten dregs pa las la 'dzud// las rnams ma lus 'grub pa dang // lha yi las byas dregs pa 'dul// drags pa sngags kyi sbyor ba yis// ran dang mas
298b3(rnying rgyud): rab sbyar la// mchod pa'i dus su phur pa gdab// dum bur gtubacing mchad par dbul// bstod cing bskul ba yang nas yang // thun rnamasar thod nang du sbyar// snying dang khrag dang de bzhin sbyar// de nyid las su rung ba dang // gdab pa'i las cing
298b4(rnying rgyud): 'di lta ste// gu gul du bas bdug byas te// dpral ba'i sngags dang tshig tu bcas// yang nas yang du de bzhin bya// po nya las rnams de bzhin te// gdab pa'i sngags gnyis snying la gdab// thun dang de bzhin 'dzem par byas// mtshon dang drag dang
298b5(rnying rgyud): brdung ba dang // gdab dang byang sems sngags kyis bya// me la bsregs te phye ma dang // sol bas g.yogs pa'i med byad rnams// rngon dmar dag gos rab dkris la// nga yi thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ la btsas dag la rab tu sba// gtar ma
298b6(rnying rgyud): bstim pa kra shrIs dang // de bzhin las rdzogs rdzogs par bya/ rdorje phra pa chen po bshang pa'i rgyud las/ lha dang bral ba'i le'u ste bcwo brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das drag po 'gugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/
298b7(rnying rgyud): dru chud can po gangs dang shal ha// rgyal ba'i ma thang gnas dag dang // de badren gcod pa sa yod par// rna mi thugs kyang shar du bltas// da dang bya ma gzugs yod par/ maN+Dal mang gang byas nas sa// dkar pa gsum kyilas/
299a1(rnying rgyud): gis byugs// gru gsum thags m+b+ha khyud bri// mu khyud de bzhin bstan pa la// dkar po'i mya ngan yang gcig brtan// dbus su dpal ci zhing po ba// shar du 'gugs pa'i snying po// bster bu du
299a2(rnying rgyud): pa yang // sras mchog bya rgod gshog phur la// dar gyi cod pan de bzhin gdags// bar chad bsal ba'i las byas la// dbus su bskyen pa'i phur pa la// gtso bo'i phung pa dbus su dgod// shar gyi phur pa de bzhan bya// dbus su dpral
299a3(rnying rgyud): gtor ma ni// khyad par rmad du byung bar bya// gdug pa'i gtor ma snying sku gsum// bse phor bshams te shar du gzhag/ rten yang de bzhin shar du gzhag/ ming rus dbus dang shar du gzhag/ drag po'i cang gis bskor bar bya// ting 'a
299a4(rnying rgyud): rim pa brtan par bya// gzhal yas gdan dang bzlas pa ru// dbus su gtso bo rab bskyed la// shar du 'phags pa'i lha mchog babyed// spyan drang rim pa de bzhin te// bri nyi ma dang mchod pa ma lus kyi// ye shes lha la ba @//
299a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin shes par gyis// bskul zhing bstod pa 'di lta ste// hUM gdug pa 'dul bzag po'i sku// stod ni zhal gsum phyag zug la// smad ni zung gsum dpal dang ldan// dkar ba'i zhal la drag po'i dbyibs// gdug pa 'dul ba'i phung pa bsdams
299a6(rnying rgyud): thugs kyu'i stad+ma stabs phyag rgya can// khams gsum padang gcod phreng ba bsdams// gdug pa kru yi 'khor rnams 'dul// mang du sprul cing las la gus// gang yin 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ snying khrag rnam gsum sbeng byed cing //
299a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus su bku ga cing bstim// bsnyen pa'i rtags rnams 'di lta s+ho// 'od du 'khyil lam me ru 'bar// dngos su byung ngam nyams su byung // de ni bsnyen pa'i rtags su bstan// rangarba dang mdzes pa'i lha sngags la// drag po'i sngags kyi gnang du
299b1(rnying rgyud): dam dang bcan su// rnam ma gsu bca// thams nga na pas/ nga ma // gakA zlam gang sag tha/ par mjuganags pas pa/ byas pa dang /
299b2(rnying rgyud): dang bres pa de bzhinabya// brdol mtshams btan pa rab tug ces/ ldan thags zas shing de la zab/ thun de las spa rung ba dang // gdug pa dngos su ston pa dang / de nyid dngos smra bol bar 'gyur// yang nas yang ru bzhin bya// zag pa pa
299b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i ngo bo ni// lan gsum mnan te pho nyas dgug/ dbang po mngon gsum gsal bar 'gyur// gdab pa rnam pa gnyis su bstan// thun yang de bzhin yang dag gyur// mtshon la sogs pa de bzhin 'byung // tha ma bsreg ste gnan pabya// 'phang
299b4(rnying rgyud): dang bsregs pa'i lhag ma de// bsam pa nyid kyis gsos byas la// byang du kha ba ltas 'gram du mnan// de yis 'og ma de bzhin 'byung // rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ drug po 'gugs pa'i le'u ste brgya dgu pa'o// // de na
299b5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das drag po bcing ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dur khrod sngo la 'od chags su// pra yi pho brang yod pa ru// maN+Dal de bzhin yang dag sbyar// gser ram ser po'i phur ba la// dar gyi cod pan de bzhin bya// tsha ma ra m+b+ha drag
299b6(rnying rgyud): bos bgegs bskrad la// 'god pa de bzhin yang dag bstan// gtor ba dbus dang shar du dgod// shar du dgod pa'i gtor ma la// rje sman sna tshogs dgod par bya// rten yang rab tu de bzhin gzhag/ ming byang rtsang dang bcas pa yang // dpa
299b7(rnying rgyud): brten te rab tu dgod// ting 'jod rim pa de bzhin te// gcod nga 'khor yang de bzhin bskyed// spyan drang rim pa grangs dang sbyar// mchod pa bsnyen pa bstod pa dang // bsnyen pa ye shes nyal 'bul/ ran pa nyid du de bzhin sbyar// hUM gdug pa 'dul ba dag pa
300a1(rnying rgyud): na gsus kyagatug/ na na dgasub ba ba dang na// rdza 'azhal du 'gyur bad/ gtan phul ba spya sa bsams/ zhags pa nga rtags cas nams khams gsan
300a2(rnying rgyud): gad dag cad byur ba brnams// gdug bshar gyi 'khang la bcas// spel pa gang min nyams pa 'tshong // gsadzin bcang ba'i las mdzad cig/ dmangs nyid kyis de bzhin mthong// mtshang ba'i dus su rab tu 'chang bar brgan// 'dzin pa cheg
300a3(rnying rgyud): dang sel pa la grags pa// de sa byung ma rnams pa byung // na du d+ha ba 'di bzhin du// brtan pa rtags ni das pa zung // masngags brtan pas de nying tsam// dag pa'i sngags lan d+haH// rten dang man
300a4(rnying rgyud): bzod dang babral ba de bzhinan// dgang ba gsum tho thong badra/ lags kyis thaMd gyings rnams panin// de pa gsum kyi byeng yang gnag/ gzugs zis khrag tung bzhin bcas/ kyi snang ba dbanan gyi// mang drang ba dang thu yang
300a5(rnying rgyud): dang las nang ba dang // mtshad don ci kun gyi khol// gas mabyud pa badzin \u0f7f/ rdzog pas mazungs pa'i dam pa ni// yang dang yang du rab tu // yin lag dngos su bcings par 'gyur// gdabapa sun ya brnya pa na/
300a6(rnying rgyud): thugs pasu/ shA pa ba na rnan pa sangs pa ca la/ sa na pa
300a7(rnying rgyud): ngas / du sa bal na// ming ba ma kyirgyag la/ 'ang meg da'i pa sa 'das na shing dril rnam pa pasatas/ mal ma dadag sa // rnam pa sathas // thegasam pa na
300b1(rnying rgyud): seng po pu na yang gtsug brnyan// skyong ma za ba de bzhin bya// shang du skyo ba'i snying ba zo// brten bur rtsuba'i snying po yang // dar gyi cod pan de bzhin gdags// nyes pa mang phyir bsrung brgya/ bcol bar phyur ba byin parlabs la// rang rang gnas sung bdang /
300b2(rnying rgyud): dgod// dpal gyi gtor ma khyad par can// snying snga gsum la de bzhin bya// dkar po sna dmar thod par bya// rten yang de bzhin yang dag gzhag/ rtsang gis de bzhin rab tu bskor// ting 'dzin rim pa'i khyad par las// dur khrod gzhal yas bdan
300b3(rnying rgyud): yang bcas// dbus dang shar du lha nyid bskyed// rim pa bzhin du yang dag sbyar// bstim dang mchod pa ma lus bya// bsnyen pa rdzogs pa rab tu gces// rim pa bzhin du de ltar bya// bskul pa dang ni bstod pa bya// hUM gdug pa 'dul ba drag po'i sra//
300b4(rnying rgyud): stod ni zhal gsum phyag drug la// smad ni zur gsum dpal dang ldan// dmar ba'i zhal la dbang du sdud// gdug pa 'dul ba phur pa bsnams// drag po'i dug gtor rang rtags can// khams gsum gdar gcod phur pa bsnams// gdug pa yam shud
300b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor dang bcas// sprul pas nyams pa smyo bar mdzod// mchod pa 'bul ba'i las nyid bya// mchod pa'i dus su sbyo ru gzhug/ bsten pa'i rtags rnams rab tu 'byung // dkar ser 'od kyi rnam pa dang // btsun pa ban+de bong bu dang // de ltar rtags rnams
300b6(rnying rgyud): blud pa dang // brten sngags grub sngags sha thang dbye// zag pa nyid du de bzhin bya// mang po'i byin rlab shugs kyis 'byung // bstod cing bskul ba'i las nyid bya// bong bu dag gizod pa ru// sngags bris bran rnams rab tu thug/ ming dag phrag tu bcas
300b7(rnying rgyud): chu ba'i dus su yang dag bya// nan tan drag po'i bran la bya// las rnams 'grub par gdon mi za// gzugs ston rtags gnyis rab tu 'byung // skyo ba drag po'i las bya ste// mang du de bzhin nan tan bya// dbang po nyams pas skyo bar 'gyur/
301a1(rnying rgyud): gang rgyalas nimatha' drang ga/ 'bang dang / ga pa bzhinan// dug gis bdag cings de mnan// tshe bas zhes de shAnam// ngan bur brtan pa pasha pa 'i spyad las/ zag pa smra ba'i le'u te thu gcig bag
301a2(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs te/ dur khrod zag nag nub ma can/ maN+Dal mde 'gang smras nas su// nag pa gsum gyi khrag gis b+hag/ rim pa bzhin du zos pa dang // nag po'i mA ran yang gcig man /
301a3(rnying rgyud): gnas su snying pa zla// brten phur grol ba'i phur pa yang // cod pan rigs dang yang dag sbyar// bskyad ba'i las rnams de bzhin na// rnam pa gnyis su byin brlabs nas// gang yin gnas sri bzhin dgod// rnam gnyis gtor ma de bzhin du/
301a4(rnying rgyud): po'i thod par de bzhin bsham// bdud lug nag po rten du bcas// dmigs pa'i rten du de bzhin te// rim pas bskor te de nyid dngos// ting 'dzin gsal ba'i khyad par las// gru gsum e yi dkyil 'khor bsam// yab yum dbus dang gtun
301a5(rnying rgyud): sha// spyan drang rtson dang bstim pa dang // rtsal 'bul zhing shags kyis dbye// bskul bas las rnams byed par 'gyur// hU~M gdug pa 'dul ba zag po'i sra// stod ni zhal gsum phyag drug la// slad ni bur gsum dpal dang 'dra//
301a6(rnying rgyud): zhal la khro gtar can// gdug pa 'dul bskur ba pa rnams// thob phur pa rang rtags can/ khams gsum gdang gcad srung pa bsduma'o// gdug pa bdud kyi 'bor rnams 'dus// bdud kyi sprul ba bsam mthab// gang yon nol ba'i las rnams
301a7(rnying rgyud): dag so gdus kyi lpagags mchod// margyad pa 'a dus su babral bar \u0f7f// brten pa'i rtags rnams rab tu 'byu // mra dang nag pa 'ad dag dang // 'argyab nas 'brel ba'om sdug 'am// dngas dang thams sa 'byung ba'o// brtan par dgas dpas
301b1(rnying rgyud): gcas// sa dang drags pa thol ba'i thags// gang yin gathang dab par bya// drag pa nyid dung bzhin du/ b+h+yo ba med par las rnams bya// mchad cing drag pas rab tu bskul// bdud na drug pa 'bod paH// hwags dang blan 'ag pa dang ca ca/ ba
301b2(rnying rgyud): rgyu dus dag tu bzlas// drag po thugs nyid las kyi mchog/ mang du 'byung zhing dngos su ston// gang yin bskal ba las kyi mchog/ gdab dang las rnams rdzogs par bya// lam po che yi rgya zam mnan// bkra shis tshe yi las rnams bya// rdo rje 'ur
301b3(rnying rgyud): bshad pa'i rgyud las// drag po bskal pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das drag po bslab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzugs te/ dur khrod shing rtsi chu mi gcan// klu shing rdza dgu yod pa'i sar// sa yang ldang sngon da
301b4(rnying rgyud): 'byung // maN+Dal mda' gang gru bzhi la// nag po bzhin du ram pas bri// ljang gu'i mu ran yang gcig bsnan// snying po mnan pa de bzhin bri// rnam pa gnyis kyi phur ba yang // cod pan gdags pa de bzhin bya// srung ba'i mtshams kyis rab tu 'thung //
301b5(rnying rgyud): sa / na
301b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i grangs da ltar// mthing nag gru gsum dkyil 'khor ba sgom// lha gnyis rang rang gnas su bsgom// bzhengs dang phran dang bstim mchod dang // bskul ba nyid du sa nyid gsal// sku gdug pa 'dul ba drag po'i phra// tong ni zhal gsum rgyag dag la/
301b7(rnying rgyud): drang de rung gsum dpal dang ldan// thang ba'i zhal ladzin lam rdzogs// gdug pa 'dral basba rab brnams// da rtag pa gang yin par ba ba rnams// khams gsum gdang gcod pur ba ba rnams// gdug pa ban gyi 'khor rnams 'das/ bcan tsa bral pa
302a1(rnying rgyud): bsam mi khab// gang yin btab pa'i las rnams mdzod// gang yin nying khrag dag gi mchod// mchod pa'i dus su bstab pa bya// bsnyen pa'i rtags rnams 'byung ba yang // dmar pa'i 'od la 'chub ma mar// rba dang dadang
302a2(rnying rgyud): ba dang // klang bu la sogs dngos sam nyams// bsnyen pa'i rtags rnams rab tu gces// lha dang dregs pa stob pa'i sngags// de nyid brtan par go bar bya// drag po nyid du de bzhin bya// byin rlabs nus pa mang bas 'byung // bstod cing dbul ba'i las rnam
302a3(rnying rgyud): bya// btsan rta dmar po'i thod pa ru// sngags bris thun rnams rab tu bsham// snying dang khrag tu bcas pa blugs// gang yin rgyu ba'i dus su sbyar// drag po nan tan thun la bya// de yis las nyid 'grub par 'gyur// dngos sarba nyams sam mang ba dang // khol
302a4(rnying rgyud): ba dag kyang rab tu bzang // bsgrub pa drag po las bya'i phyir// yang nas yang du de bzhin bya// rang dbang med de stob par 'gyur// gdab pa'i las nyid 'di lta ste// snying dang yan lag de bzhin gdab// mtshon dang drag dang brdung ba dang // bstab pa byas te sreg dang
302a5(rnying rgyud): 'phang // tshe bstim bkra shis de ltar bya// ma lus rdzogs pa'i las kyi mchog/ bsnyen pa ye shes lha la 'bul// bsrub pa dregs pa drug la 'bul// mchod pa'i dus su las drug 'byung // bri ba de bzhin dbyibs su mthun// bsags pa'i rdzas drug rang
302a6(rnying rgyud): rang ste// phur pa drug yang de bzhin du// thod pa drug yang rab tu bstan// rtags drug mi mthun dang rang ste// bstod pa gcig la bsul pa drug/ lha sngags gcig la gcig par drug/ nya yi gcig la las sna drug/ thun yang de bzhin shes par bya/ rdo
302a7(rnying rgyud): rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ drag po bstab pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das drag sngags bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// bstan pa gnyen por 'tsho byed dang // rgol ba'i zhing du
302b1(rnying rgyud): tha pa// drag sa rdzogs / gas nga/ ma na rdzug sabs so ga maH// / pa 'a ga pal// dbang sa
302b2(rnying rgyud): bsde lnga yang // de bzhin snyid khrag gtor ma bya// yang na thod pa gcig turtsa// sring lnga khrag snga meng du brdar// mtshan ma ngan pa'i thod pa la// med du mi rung snying po bri// gnyis su bcad pa'i dam bral// sras kyi phyogs su bdud ba bri//
302b3(rnying rgyud): gdug pa 'khor lo ze// drug dang brkyang du rab bskor la// drag sngags drug la bri bar bya// brgyad la tshegs pa'i snying po ze// mu khrud mu bran las sngags bri// de bzhin phyi mar rtsa sngags bri// rtsibs mtshan rnams la ming byang dri// lus kyi phyogs
302b4(rnying rgyud): bdung po bla// kha gdangs mche ba gtsigs pa bri// bar du ming byang gzhug par bya// zad pa ngan pa'i mtshan ldan la// khrag snga mang du thugs byas la// thun du 'phang ba'i rdzas su bya// sra gsum khwa gang brkonos pa la// de rnams bcug ste ba bcang la// /
302b5(rnying rgyud): gam ldor ros kyis// g.yam pa dag la bri ba dang // me mngon legs par gcad par bya// nyung dkar nyung nag the tshe dang // dug dang rting sgra'i phye ma la// skyes pa dar ma'i mchog phur dang // saper dngos po'i phye ma rnams// thun gyi rdzas bu de bzhin
302b6(rnying rgyud): bsham/ rus pa brdung ba'i phye ma rnams// thun gyi rdzas su bzhag kyang rung // rus byang thod pa'i kha la gzhag/ ye shes lha yi skur bsgom la// gnas rnams bsrung zhing snying po bzlas// mdzes pa tsam du rab tu bzlas// rdegs pa can gyis las bya'i phyir/
302b7(rnying rgyud): tha tsha grags kyi bye brag las// na yang bsgyur bas gang bsrub 'grub// ma la po run las 'gyur// mo yi bdud mo po las 'byung // po yi bdud mod bzhin no// srog ra po ru bsgyur ba 'di/ phol btsa lnga tshwa sngags dang // thun rdzas rnams la mang du zas// mcho
303a1(rnying rgyud): gi phung bas yang dag gdab// bstan pa bsrung ba'i las kyang bcol// hUM gdug pa 'dul ba bregs pa'i lha// dregs pa rnam pa'i ral pa can// mche ba gtsigs shing tshems brdang ba// skul zhing lpags rmon pa gsol// ral pa
303a2(rnying rgyud): bcings pa'i zod tshugs can// g.yas pas dgra snying spar gyis 'debs// g.yon pa bdud kyi khram pa ma bsnams// rngam pa'i tshems brdar skya gri'i so// mche ba lcags kyi spu gri can// spu gri shad shad snying la shad// bstan pa gnyan por mi byed pa'i/
303a3(rnying rgyud): nyams pa gang yin snying la shad// hUM bdud kyi rgyal po ma rungs pa// mun pa nag po'i kha dog la// su la dar nag ber mthing gsol// ral pa nag po spyi bcings can// lag na gcod pa'i sgra re thogs// dgra sta sdang ba'i dgra la thob// mche ba dung gi spu wi
303a4(rnying rgyud): gtams// sru gri shad shad snying la shad// dam nyams gang yin snying la ya// hUM 'jigs par byed pa'i bdud po ni// mon pa nag po rna cha can// sku la stag lpags g.yang gzhi gsol// ral pa nag po mun ltar gti bas// lag na 'brog pa'i
303a5(rnying rgyud): zor ba bsnams// zor kha sdang ba'i dgra la ya// mche ba lcags kyi spu gri gtams// spu gri shad shad snying la shad// nyams pa gang yin snying la ya// hU~M grol byed bdud kyi bshan pa ni// mon pa nag po'i kha dog la// sru la zhing gi g.yang gzi la// ral
303a6(rnying rgyud): po nag po gyen la 'greng // lag na 'ching ba'i zhags pa thogs// dam nyams gang yin 'ching bar byed// mche bzangs kyi bu bri gtams// su pri shang shad snying la shang// nyams pa gang yin snying la ya// hUM sha za khrag 'thung bdud gyi bu// mon pa nag po ma
303a7(rnying rgyud): tri can// sba ladrod kyi pags pa pa// rab pa kham pa ya le ba can// lag na bsreg pa'i med pung thogs// nyams pa gang yin sreg par byed// mche bas yi su pra gtams// lu si shad shad d+hi la shad// nyams pa gang rin snyid la ya/ rdeg
303b1(rnying rgyud): bad kyi rgyal pob// 'a'od na bdu nag tang gis pabaskyod// 'ang zhugs dran par nyid thal rgyan// ngas bdu phyongs rnams pa/ mcho ga sngags kyi d+hU le gtam// b+hU wi ga gung ny-i lagang// bstan pa 'dreg pa'i rnags pang
303b2(rnying rgyud): srog kyi dmang po tshad la shog/ khong zhig 'dudra ba par gyis// chos shig dang gi dmag dbring rjes// byor cig dumatshon dag parjod// thob cig bdud mi kham la blog// 'thungs zhig snying khrag pon mo 'thung // lo zhig nyams pa'i shal po// 'gro
303b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i ming nas / byed da ma~M/ rgyad kyidamag sded dngas / dmanyam sa sa pa gang ban pa// ldum la grub cigs tshogs// ma bdud rdzogs kyi gtso // shel khyim bdakang ba/ thal
303b4(rnying rgyud): gsol// cag na shel gyi khyong la bar rdzogs// nyim zla ba ga dung brdzun/ gisar byas pa dar khrigs se ga/ mche ba gsod kyi thu me gtams// prA kri hru gi snying la thAn// dpa nyam su sman gyi snyid la shag/ ci bsas
303b5(rnying rgyud): rtsibs// thams srid par po dang sma byung // dang btsu bye ci bas+ho// dgang po 'bum la na gyud cing // 'od kru lam gyi bangag pa hU~M// nyams pa 'di'i tugs zhig thogs thong pa'i bral po'i// geb da dkang
303b6(rnying rgyud): skul 'brel ba skyen pas su/ gni pas sa byung myed brnapas/ 'du ga d+d+hag+sas tanasab shing nyid nyi lan gyi spyod dus med ste/ gas sri sprul ba te/
303b7(rnying rgyud): sulam// bral ma gsas// byed dazugs kyi srin ma na // mtshe thugs kyi ma tho gtams// klum grong shi myo 'i da// pa bgon kyi dus 'dab// tsug nga chu tshum ste// ngas kyid 'dres pa

304a2(rnying rgyud): smrab na sa sa sa

304a5(rnying rgyud): da tho ga phyogs da pa'i bu dzin pa// slod pa brtan sa rgyal sa// na pa gna'adag rnaMbs su rdzogs// skal bar chen slob pa gsol// mag na lags pa ldan pa thogs// gzhan rje 'angamag dpung 'bum kyis bzong / thugs

304a7(rnying rgyud): 'ad ni pa tha kyang ldan/ rlu rtsigs sngon gyi de ga zungs// tha da kyi thanas pacag/ rjebyang gas cad pa'i rjod// slong bar rgyam pa'i// nga sa tha dang thams thabs/ rang cang grang bar car gsapa /
304b1(rnying rgyud): phyag na zhags pa ljang gu thogs// gnod kyin dmag dpung 'bum gyis bskor// byang phyogs btsan gyi dmag lngadrongs// lkog rgal nad kyi thun thob cig/ 'byung ba'i bdud bcom batshan chen yang // srog rtsa gcod cing sha la ya// snying rtsa gcod cing ster khrag
304b2(rnying rgyud): daphrag dang mdangs la dbang bsgyur ba'i// nad kha dbab pa'i dus la bab// bstan pa bsrung ba'i dus la bab// hUM stong gsum rnam dag dmag gi snga 'dren pa// dge bsnye na srung ma btsun gyi tshogs// dus kyi 'khrug pa srong byed cing // mtshon gyi bas
304b3(rnying rgyud): 'bebs byed pa// srul za 'og ber chen gsol// phyag na shel gyi rdo rje bsnams// rol pas dbang bsrur rang la dbang // chi bas su seng ge dkar mo che bas// rol du stong gsum 'khor gyis bskor// rdo rje thag po dmag dpung 'joms// gang du zad par dmas
304b4(rnying rgyud): 'dren// bdud kyi dmag snga mun ltar 'dren// btsan gyi dpag snga ma ltang 'gro// rgyal ba'i dmag su nar ltar 'khrug/ bdan dumatshon me ltar 'bar// ma bad mang po san sa gtings// shub mang po wa ltar rdzing // khrag 'thung mar po tshe lta rgyob//
304b5(rnying rgyud): du rjed pa'i dmags bden// shir kyi phyogs su dmag 'dren na// bya ngan dkar pa jil byar// sgrol phyogs su dmag 'dren na// pa dan so po gnam sbyar // rngub kyi phyogs su dpag 'dren na// byang na dmang pos ltar 'bar// d+hang gi phyogs sung
304b6(rnying rgyud): na// 'dudi ldang ba rgya lta 'thab/ ra can byang cing dpag sa rmongs// gang du bsam pa skyabs brtsod la// brgyad kyi mu pa tshang spring // tsun gyi sha bdal khrab tu thugs// rgyal ba 'ad par mang lta par khrag/ de yang dag brtan ga
304b7(rnying rgyud): sa/ mi snying ba de dmag ngongs// chu k+ta 'thu che dpag nga sa// gang yin pas btsun pa rgyag/ kun kyilas nyid drag po kyar// rgyangs pa ni rnams zab// maung kyang gsal pa dbyung ba dang // ma dra ba ba
305a1(rnying rgyud): su byung // thod pa srad dang mar ba' du/ gam mam sbyang ba dang // gnam mngon du byung bdang // dgazugs dran pa than byas pa// thang ba blad bci mtshad kyis gartag/ tshad pa 'ang zhi gtor byag ca/

305a4(rnying rgyud): 'as// nang ma dang 'bring bug bu dang // na byed par dbyeb gyi// dzas kya bzhini dam par dbye// bran pa de bzhin brtan par bya/ rang dang thun la dang rang sngags// grang sa dang rtags dang dus dag dang // gang yen las su nga bar bya// bsrung zhing rnga/
305a5(rnying rgyud): padri bzhin to// dang dang rdzas la brtan par \u0f7f// phyogs su 'bang ba'i mas nyid \u0f7f// de yis las rnams 'grub pa byu// gal teganang dum gro na// nag po srid dkang thod pa rba// de nyid byed dang khrag du bcas// mon pa nag pa rtang yang rung /

305a7(rnying rgyud): thog med do yang 'gas par 'gyur// dkar po sum dmang pod padra// snying sA lal de bzhin rtsa// ming dang dus yang zing \u0f7f// thaM rjes tshogs sang du rgya// gas nga gangs pa yis/ rang bsrung bad la dbang nga /
305b1(rnying rgyud): bun rnams dus su zab par bya// rtags nyid myur du byung ba dang // gang yin de 'azod pa bdeb// de ni sa ru rtags byung na// bsam pa'i 'bras bu chud miza// gang byas las la the tshom med// mon pa nag po'i thod phaT// gang yin rting dang khrag thugs dang /
305b2(rnying rgyud): na rnams rab tu drab phyag te// de nyid khol dang me ru 'bar// 'od dang mngon du 'bar ba 'byung // de byung gang yin lu du brdeg/ de yi bstan pa bsrung bar 'gyur// sha ba dag gi thod pa ru// tha ba lug dang byarnams kyi// rting dang khrag tu bcas pa d+da/
305b3(rnying rgyud): dam rdzas kun kyang tshang gyur na// ya mtshan 'phrul gyi sngags 'phrul// rim pasngags kyi bya bar shes// de yis don 'di 'grub par 'gyur// wa'am sbyang ki'i thod pa ru// rim gyis shi ba'i khragazugs la// dug dang wang mas brlan par bya// zangs kyi du
305b4(rnying rgyud): rnams yang dag bstan// sbyor ba sngags kyi na ya la// gnad la dbab pa rab 'ardeg la// nam gyi 'jid la thun yang brdeg/ rtags rnams 'byung bar gdon mi za// khams gsum gdug pa grol ba'i las// gang du btab pa 'grub par byed// bdud dang
305b5(rnying rgyud): drin mo gnod sbyin yang // bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// yang dag min te gdug pa 'dul// de yis drag po'i 'bras bur 'gyur// las kyi srin po gdug pa'i mthus// dam pa min te byin drab 'byung // rtogs na yang dag nyid du 'byung // des ma
305b6(rnying rgyud): ba rab tu gtsoste// bden pa'i stobs la rab brten na// nges bzung thal bas gang yang rung // nges par 'dzin pas gang yang 'bring // 'ching med rab tu dkrol bar bya// de ni sangs rgyas lag bcangs yin// kun tu bzang po'i rol pa las// bdud dang srin po tham cad btul//
