310a3(rnying rgyud): durnam pa'is sa sa ma du sa la du yang/ ma
310a4(rnying rgyud): 'dri gas/ thab du gang drudangs mthos/ kun ma ga'angs sru ma bas cing // gdug byung chu zin dbang du drung// mdu byung baches gyis gnon// dbang du byud pa'i dus pabab// mig sbyin gi 'du 'o// zla bang dbang bud kyis pa byin
310a5(rnying rgyud): sa nga sa / smra /
310a6(rnying rgyud): ma pa'i ses da ni dag pas ba du la thong ba sa/ gas ga gas ma yang ba/ nag nga du dpa' dag/ lag sa cig pas la bar byed // ma napa du nga ba dang // da
310a7(rnying rgyud): pa ma na shes sa gyig sa / // du sa kyis 'dra du gso mangs / sa ma
310b1(rnying rgyud): grags kyi brtsams pan// rlung drug gnas su 'dzin pa dang // 'byung ngamang pa 'dzin par byad// 'an byed zinam 'das la bab// zhabs gnyis brkyang 'bum tshul du bzhugs nas kyang // dregs pa ca rnams thangs kyis 'dul pa dgas/ gan nga
310b2(rnying rgyud): gdug bzhabs kyis btsod bar 'gyur// gdug byung chen mo'i thugs dam dus la bab// zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs pa yang // gdug pa zhal du gsol ba dang // mche ba dmar pa grol pa dang // bajug pa chen po zhal gyi dus la bab// thugs dam
310b3(rnying rgyud): na mo'i dus la bab// hU~M dpal ldan nag mo rim zo// chibs su sha ba yu mo chibs// sha ba'i chibs kyi snga long la// mind lang dgu'i rgyal ba bkal// stong khams nad kyis khengs byed cing // nad bdang chen mo'i dus la beb// sha ba'i chibs kyi
310b4(rnying rgyud): long la// tshan gyi gu gu tho dbar bkam// tshon dang khrag du skrag byed cing // tshon bdag chen mo'i dus la bab// kha rlangs gnam du brtan pa yis// nam mkha' sprin du khengs byed cing // nad do cog gi sde 'dren cing // nad bdab chen mo'i dus la bar //
310b5(rnying rgyud): rmig bzhi sa la bdab pas kyang // zlab dung mang po dbang phyung // mu zan 'bum yang dmal thag gcod// gru bdud chen mo dus la bab// spyan mig bar snang gzigs pa las// bar snang lta bran dbang du rdung // gdug byed mang po ril gyis gdon/
310b6(rnying rgyud): gadrag zad srur gyi dris labab// rlabs lags ces shan ba gra 'bred// garub byed mang po dbang du byung// legs ces sta 'dzin srid gsum grol/ sbal byed chen mo'i dus la bab// bapra mA bris gtims pa yang // bdud dang srin po'i 'dod rnams
310b7(rnying rgyud): 'dul// nyi ma'i thar ba'in srid par gsal// gnod kyi mtshan gyi dus la bab// dpal ldan dag mor ma // yul zhing lpags rlon pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// gdug brgyad gcod phrin mo'i chas// gdug byed ches kyi dus la bab/

311a2(rnying rgyud): cig/ rnams pa rgol ba'i dus la bab// mtsho ba dmang pa gcags pa yis// rten mangs te nici ba gang// 'choms padir thegs pas/ cang sems kyi rung ba ba/ pang nas gang pa pa pajams//
311a3(rnying rgyud): badrag pas sems cad bskal ba dang // sra ba'i srang sa thug dam can// gdug pa 'dul ba'i dus la badra// b+hag ma g.yonanamam pa ma bcwabs// rdo gsumakhamapa 'dams pa'i rtags// gtag cing ca mam gyi bdag/ mas pa jam la

311b1(rnying rgyud): du na dus na/ ma du bya sa / ma
311b2(rnying rgyud): dngul du byung ba ni// khams gsum 'khrug byed drug bsngal sel// yang dag lam du bstan pa'i don// ngan mong 'joms par byed pa'i dus la po'o// du rgya lcags su snang bdi// gdug gi ca rnams 'joms byed rjeg ci'i'ang rdzogs med pa

311b4(rnying rgyud): las// gdug byeng gang yin tshams chems gsal// wa bdag chen mo dus la ba ba// sman mgapangs su byung ba ni// phreng po gsum med dbang du byud// rin zi brkyang bar byed// gang du bsdus pa ma cu 'bar // gdung bcan gyi dus lang//
311b5(rnying rgyud): ral pas thong khams bkang ba yis// dring gsum dbang du spang nas kyang // 'dag pazed pa drag par sten// dbang bung dbu cu'i dus la bab// skal me dbu 'i bar ba ma// stong khams thams cad zlog byed cing // snang khams 'di kyis gsal bar bya/
311b6(rnying rgyud): srul me 'bar dus la bab// phyag g.yas lcags kyi phung ba bsdams// sgrol byed chen mo'i dus la bab// dpe nyams dgra ba sgrol bar byed// srid pa'i gdar sha gcod pa'i chags// nyams pa sgrol byed dus la bab// g.yon pa 'dzin pa'i lcags kyu
311b7(rnying rgyud): bsdams// gang du 'bros pa dbang med par// gzu zhi rab tu 'gyur mdzad/ ra byed chen mo dus la bab// zhabs kyis gdug pa'i blarnams gnon// gnon pa'i skabs kyi gar byed cing / rang tu mtshang zhing 'jigs pa'i 'thos// bang
312a1(rnying rgyud): byed thabs kyi dus labab// nga mtshar nas kyis rab bcan nas// gang gsum stsal ba narnams 'gang nga // gcig ma pas stong khams dz+wal/ ra la dus la bas/
312a2(rnying rgyud): rab tu sbal cing bkye ba'i cha// gang du nad pa'i sa phyogs su// thogs pa med de me ltar 'bar// shar phyogs ji za'i mnga' bdag mo// nag mo chen mo ngal pa can// chibs su chung nag 'chu ba mchings// pang du po rgya par yi
312a3(rnying rgyud): ma zhing dag sa la lcags kyiso// marje ba lcags kyi phu pi gtams// swa pri shang zhad snying la shang // nyams pa gang yin nying la nang // g.yas na gri thags pashan mo// dum nyams bsha' ba'i dus la bab// gdan ma thag 'thor rnam pa ra// da
312a4(rnying rgyud): yin ro la rnams kyi brtson// rkang pa mchong stabs gdug pas brkyang // g.yas pa bsha' na s+tha re'i zhabs// dam nyams dgra po nos la shog/ g.yon na gcod byed khye bo'i zhabs// dA ma nyams gang yin snying rtsa grog// brgyal zhing zang deras rgya
312a5(rnying rgyud): dus/ btsal ba'i las rnams blang par mdzan/ phyogs grwa ng+ge'i bang bdag so// skye chen po ba can/ tshabs su gsod byeng byung gi che bas// gang du bsas par yad kyis cid// sa nag bral lcags rgya// mtsha
312a6(rnying rgyud): kyi gri the gtams// mu bri gang shang rnyed pa dang // nyazla pa gang yin rnying la ya// g.yas nage thogs pa shan pa ma// nyams pa bsha' ba'i dus la ba ba// g.yon na ma 'apung sreg pa mo// nyams pa gang len sreg par byed// gang pa mchod sta sna ma
312a7(rnying rgyud): pas kyang // g.yas pa dag sgra ba shan pa'i zhabs// nyams pa gang yin zhos la zhong // g.yon pa gcod byed 'dzang po'i rnabs// nyams pa gang yin snying rtsa chod// bskul zhing thad rab tu bskul// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// d+hin+ya
312b1(rnying rgyud): phyogs pa sem bar bdag so// dmang ba chen mo la bcan// chibs su sug so sus mthibs// gang dubs pa smra kyi // dam pa gaphrul ba byas// mche bangs kyis ga gdams sumi gang gang rtsol da
312b2(rnying rgyud): pa gang yin ting la bang // g.yas na gyi thogs bshan pa mo// ngam nyams bsha' ba'i dras pa bab// gdon na chu 'thor char 'bebs ma// chu dngas dpa' ba ngas byed pa// rkang pa mchod sbubs gadrug rkyang // g.yas pa gzhan pa
312b3(rnying rgyud): dam nyams dang po nas la shog/ g.yon pa gcod byed spu gri'i thabs// thams pa gang yin rnying rtsa gcod// bskul zhing zang de rab tu sbyar// btsal ba'i las rnams su'aper mdzon// byang phyogs gnod du ba shan mo// sngar nag chen mo das pa
312b4(rnying rgyud): rlabs su med rgyal tshabs// yang dra 'asas pa byung byes rkyen/ yang dag 'du gas// mthab dang gi theg tams// phra ze ga ga byung// rnams pa gang yin la pa// g.ya ni mi zag pa bgan //
312b5(rnying rgyud): sa sa su
312b6(rnying rgyud): nyamapa pa gang yin myong rtsa cing / bsngal cing zad rab tu gyur// btsal ba'i las rnams thub par mdzad// bzhan pa chen po pa rnams kyang / rang tu zad cing bstsal ba rgya/ gang du 'gro ba'i sa phyogs sa/ ba ni rung gis 'aslor dumado// gzug
312b7(rnying rgyud): mas pa pa dang pa 'dus sbyin// thogs bstan pas tu thul// nga thabs bza' ba'i dus la bas// byed ma theg pa'i'adus sa 'ab// dra su nan pa cang zug na// byed de/
313a1(rnying rgyud): thabadug nag pa tsha // 'a tan ga zhags pas gyur/ rdzogs parda na 'dung drug/ nyams pa al ba // rnad dang de da
313a2(rnying rgyud): drug pa thal cing dbang nga phyung // bdud 'dul sbal na gdus la bab// bdud ban ga spring ba bzhin// 'chi bdag bdud drubab pa'i \u0f7f// bdud rtsa nag po thob so'ang// bdud 'dul byan gdus la bab// mthong na gar gyi sbyin btang pas// sr-i nga
313a3(rnying rgyud): bgegs rigs stan du brjing // bdud 'dul snyan gyi dus la ba ba// bdud sranag po bskrad pa yang // bdud po nag po'i ya mgal dang // bdud mo nag mo'i ma mgal la// bdud 'dul rgan gdus la bang tra long nang kyi rgyal sa bkal bas kyang /
313a4(rnying rgyud): pa gsum gyi nad 'brengs shing // bskal pa stong du nad 'bebs shing // nad bdag chen mo'i dus la bab// phyi long tshon gyi gru gu bkal nas kyang // nyams pa tshon nang khrag du stug/ stong gsum tshan gyind gtong ba// tshon nad gtong ba'i dus la bab/
313a5(rnying rgyud): gser dang g.yu yi gor rmed kyi// rin chen char ltar 'bebs pa dang // tshon gyi rgyal po'i char phab nas// tshon bdag chen mo'i dus la bab// gser khrab sel gyis bkrab pas kyang // rin chen gaper 'bab rtsi ba dang // rin par gser du gcig pa dang //

313b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad dbang du ltar nas kyang // snang cing bltas kyang rangs kyi srab// dbang rgya chen po'i dus la bag// phyag byin sumabu mo pa // phu la ldang nag par chan gsal// rjod nag su yis 'ban na dang // grabargya chen pa dus ba/

314a1(rnying rgyud): gsan pa rgyags kyu bsdams pa yang / nyams pa gang yin 'grags par byed// lcags byas zung la phur pas thob// 'dzin byed can mo 'dres pa dang // lce'ajig rten dang da 'azhan nga// brla pa ma ga
314a2(rnying rgyud): mo la// lus la mthing nag ber chen gsol// mthing nag ral pa sha rar// ngal ba ro la phur po re// phrar pa'i lan phran khral la// kha rlangs nad gtong zla lu lu// bud med nag mos stong khams khengs// nying nge med par grol bar byed// g.yas
314a3(rnying rgyud): kyi zi thogs bshan pa mo// nyams pa bsha' ba'i dus la bab// g.yon na mi snying nang khro la thogs// mi snying mgo nas gcod cing za// mche ba lcags kyi lha gri gtams// spu gri shad shad snying la shad// dam nyams kun gyi snying 'ashad// bshan pa chen mo'i

314a5(rnying rgyud): med ser mos stod khams khengs// snying rje med par grol bar byed// g.yas na gri thogs bshan pa mo// nyams pa bsha' ba'i dus la bab// g.yon na mi snying nad khrol thogs// mi snying mgo nas gcod cing za// mche ba gser gyi spu gri gtams//

315b2(rnying rgyud): snyems pa'i rtags// rgyas pa bdud 'dul dus la bab// ba spu lcags kyu bcings pa yang // nyams pa gang yin 'dzin pa dang // rab tu gzung nas 'tshor mi srid// 'dzin byed bdud 'dul dus la ba ba// dar na gcod pan 'phur bas kyang /
315b3(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyal mtshan 'jug pa dang // ma bdud mang po'i dpung bskus nas// 'phung byed bdud 'dul dus labab// mthing na gangal pas brgyan pa yang // bdud dpung zil gyis gnon pa dang // 'jig rten khams kun spa bkod phyir// bdud 'dul spangs
315b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus la bab// phyag g.yas srung po bsdams pa yang // rdon phung pa'i spang ma mi// gang yin snyed 'phung pa 'dangs// phung sbyang bdang 'dul dridus la byab// g.yan ba lcags kyu bsdams pa yang // nyams pa gang yin 'grag
315b5(rnying rgyud): lcags kyus zung la phur bus thob// 'dzin byed chen mo'i dus la bab/ hUM gza' yul na 'od rlung steng nas// 'chi bdag gza' li bu mo ste// tshobs su gzeng rta 'ur pa chibs// gza' ta 'ur bzhags pas brgyan// phyogs bcur 'dren cing gza rta nag
315b6(rnying rgyud): nyams pa bcing ba'i dus la bab// sror khwa sbrul gyis rab tu brgyan// gdug pa dmangs rigs klu rnams 'dul// rgyas par sgrol cing dbang du spyad// gza' 'dul ser khwa'i dus la bab// gzang bya nag po lding ba yang // gza' bdud bdud dab pa'i
315b7(rnying rgyud): gza' bya khra bo gser ltar 'bar// gza' 'dul bya khwa'i dus la bab// ser nag dar gyi stan bsnyad nas// srid pa'i bgegs rigs stan du bting // ki kar dmar po snyan du bting // gza' 'dul lhan gyi dus la bab// gza' sra ser ba
316a1(rnying rgyud): bsnyad pas kyang // gza' bdud khra bo ya ma 'al la// gza' bdud mo lam mkhal tsuH// gza' bras rab pa'i nas la bya// 'a khyor nad kyi rgyal ba sar bak+ta bkal ba dang // sang pags pa gyi dang
316a2(rnying rgyud): bskal pa stong tu nad 'bebs pa'i// nang padag chen mo'i dus la bab// gyi bong tshon gyi gru gu bkal bas kyang // nyams patshon nad khrag tu phyug/ stong gsumatshon gyis nang gtong ma// tshon na dag tong ba'i dus la bab// grangs dang lcags kyi gang
316a3(rnying rgyud): na can nung sbyar 'bebs pa dang / rngon gyi rgyal ba'i nang bab nas// rtso na ba dag chen mo'i dus labab// gsung ba ldan po slebs pas cing // rin chen gsubs che ba'i stid // den pang ga drugacig pa dang // gsuzab bdag mo dus la ba'i/
316a4(rnying rgyud): byi na gza' yi bu mo yang // sku la ser nag por nag gsol// ser nag gza' yi 'ban na ste// gza' bdud chen mo'i dus la bab// su mdog ser mor bzhugs pa yang // phrin las rgyas pas thams cad 'dul// gdug pa 'dul bas rang tuche// gza'
316a5(rnying rgyud): chen mo'i dus la bab// sor nag ngal bas brgyan pa yang // 'jig rten gnas la 'bebs pa dang // gza' yi rigs rnams dbang bsdus nas// gza' bdud chen po'i dus la bab// gser gyi rna char byung ba yang // snyan pa gser bas lhag pa'i rtags//
316a6(rnying rgyud): byas pa'i sgrib bdag snyem pa'i rtags// rgyas pa gza' 'dul dus la bab// bsku lcags kyu 'dzer pa yang // nyams pa gang yin 'dzin par byed// rab tu bzung bas 'tshor mi zin// 'don byed gza' 'dul dus la bab// dang nag tsong ngan 'phung bas kyang /

316b3(rnying rgyud): nyams pa bcing pa'i dus la bab// dmar khra sbal gyis rab tu brgyan// gdug pa rde'u rigs klu rnams 'dul// dbang du skud cing sgrol bar byed// btsan 'dul dmar khwa'i dus la bab// btsun byad mang po ldang ma yang // bcan 'dud
316b4(rnying rgyud): ba pa'i bya// btsan bya du mar po khrag ltar lud// brtson 'dul byad mar dus la bab// dmar nag dar gyi stan bsnyad pas// srid pa'i bgegs rigs stang du bting // dge bsnyen dmar po stan du pating // btsan 'dul stan gyi dus la dpa// brtson nadam

317a1(rnying rgyud): bang chen gsol// dbang dag btsan sde 'gran naH// btsan 'dul can ma 'dras la bab// su 'dug dasar mar bzhugs pa dang // dmas cad dbang du bsdu ba dang // gzug pa 'dra ba rgya/

317b4(rnying rgyud): yin snyid ca tshod la shog/ bcol ba'i phrin las grub par mdzod// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i chud las/ gdug byed ma ma sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das mtshon byed yi ge'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

321b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes lha yi sngags nyid ni// thams cad kun gyi su ru bshad// rang rang rtsa ba'i snying po 'di// thams cad kun gyi thugs su bshad// rang rang snying po 'brur de// thams cad kun gyi gsung du bshad// rang rang gyi nor snying pon// thams cad
321b6(rnying rgyud): gyi yon tan bshad// dam can pas mo'i las sngags ni// thams cad phrin las sngags su bshad// de ni dril ba'i snying po yin// tha ma yi ni gsum pa la// brgyad pa yi nan yar sbyar// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa la// bzang ba yinan yar sbyang //

327b5(rnying rgyud): mdog 'dre bas// khams gsum dbang du sprad pa dang // 'dod chags rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags// stong gsum mnga' mdzad lha yi lha// gdug pa skol ba drag po'i zhal// dbang du spang pa dmar po'i sku// 'khor ba gdang gcod phur pa'i phyag
327b6(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed snga bkong dur khrod chas// zur gsum dpal ldan drag po'i zhabs// gru gsum e yi maN+Dal nas// gdug byed bskal ba'i gdan steng nas// rdo rje rab tu kI la ya// 'khor ba sgrol cig kwi pa ya// bdud dpung 'joms shig
327b7(rnying rgyud): la ya// 'khor rnams spus shig kI la ya// zhing bcu sgrol ceg kI la ya// 'khor bskol cig kI la ya// rol pa chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shas chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// gdug byed srin po'i sbrul phyag 'tshal
328a1(rnying rgyud): bstod// 'joms byed chen po'i su la phyag 'tshal bskyod// ma mo mngang mdzad lnga chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'angar nang na bzhugs// sdang nag mo yi zin mtha' phyi
328a2(rnying rgyud): don phur pa gcig btab pas// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyang // byin rlabs chen po cher ltar phoT// zhi bcu 'khor ba gtan nas ska // khros pa'i lha mchog dus la bang // snying srid kyi'i du nyung pa
328a3(rnying rgyud): la ya// rtsol ba'i las cing grub par mdang // rdon phu pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ grags pa tsa gyi yi ge brgya pa dang / drag po'i skal bskyed pa'i le'u nyi so gnyis pa la// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma
328a4(rnying rgyud): mtshang ba'i ting nga 'dzin la rnams par zhugs te/ mkha'i 'tsho rnam gsum mchad pa yu/ gleng gsum pa yi b+han d+ha dra/ ti dang dngas pa 'jas bu dang // mi dbang 'bras bu'i sha dag dang / gzhang mgo ldan ma skyes dadang // mu lug sag dag gar
328a5(rnying rgyud): rung // dmangs chad pa'i gtor me dang // sman dang nganya bcas pa la// dang po dngos med snang pa las// dpal gyi sku ba d+hid bsrung ba rgya// byed rlabs gzhung ngu de bzhin d+ha/ tid 'don chen pa'i byin nibs las// dpa'a' chen po'i phra brgyad
328a6(rnying rgyud): mang po brgya dang stong dgangan// maba' 'tho ma gsum grags kyis 'byed/ spyan dang ngang mi thugs rnams la// snga dngas pa nyid btags pa dang // 'dud byernamam par byed par gyur/ 'jimams dang 'irnamachod kyang ru 'am pa zlog
328a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med// rnam pa gsum gyis mthod byas te// gang yin rtsa pa'i sngags nyid la/ btags pa'i sngags kyis mchod pa dbul// rnam gsum rim pa gsum du dbral// mkha' 'tsha ma gsum phyag tu yang // gcang rngam zung
328b1(rnying rgyud): nas tu na sa// na // /
328b2(rnying rgyud): sa ba ba 'i gsas can no// phyim yang / mapa / ya nam pa pa /
328b3(rnying rgyud): da 'dabul// 'dan rgyas thang la / da pa' bstsal ba // 'din sa dpa' babang la bcu/ ngal mang dun du gas paH/ sa pa'i drasal bya / da ra
328b4(rnying rgyud): 'a pa ma/ sna mag ma 'anas/
328b5(rnying rgyud): sa sam # pa ju# sa
328b6(rnying rgyud): ngas par yang dag la yad// 'gro baban pa thal ba dang / na ngas pad du byung ba dang / nang pa'i na byung ba yad// rdul ba ba zhes na mi mang la zhed// theb da 'bar ba gang yang dag/ dbyi mam dab sa dan ma du/ mas cad
328b7(rnying rgyud): sems la// sbal 'bul zhing tshogs bsags pa/ zag par bcas pa'i mtsho pa bzhin// 'dzin med dbregs pa bdag med// led byed 'dzin pa mi dmigs shing // rnam pa gsum chad me dmigs na// 'bras bu yi she tshogs thogs 'byor//
329a1(rnying rgyud): na don bya mchen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ mtha' 'groma'i gzhon ma btang pa'i bu sa sa gsum pa'o// / nas bcom ldan 'das dbang rnams bskur ba'i byong de 'don la snyoms par zhugasan
329a2(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi bang mchag ste// dbang rnams pa' par mthas na// las rnams 'bras bu med par 'gyur// dpe nang tha na chen yang // byang nga mchod pa ma byas shing // rgyal maca cal ma 'tha // dzas rnams 'byung ba dag pa dar/
329a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin dbang rnams mardzogs par/ sna chags shes pa me kyang // 'tham bul shes gal thob// dbang mchagasab par ma byas shid// tham mnyes par ma thogs na// rnga byas pa'ur lus pa'ang// Sha 'dzin gyi byug pa bzhin// yang dag dang dag na
329a4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// 'khor ba byang chub thob bya'i phyir// 'dod pa'i stob su gyur pa yis// bde ba gsheg pa'i mtshon pa 'dis// 'khar ba'i dug 'jos dbang pob shog/ rtogs pa'i khad par mtshon byed pa'i// gab pas rmong pa sel byed pa'i// las shan 'byed pa'i phyag ni 'a
329a5(rnying rgyud): zhes shing zhes pa dab thab shog/ sgribabs dang shes rab ga nyis ma du'o// rin tu gagaser bas stug pas na// yab sum gnyis sa med pa y-i/ gnyis med kyang kyangs dpang thab shag/ d+hA sadam sa thugs sa chud pa dang /
329a6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' ste// 'gro ba kun la khyab par gnas// bde gshegs snying po'i dbang thob shog/ rgya chos su ldan grub thams cad thob// 'khor ba'i bag chags skyong mad dpa// bum pa rgyan ldan 'khor po sol// chos rnams ldan grub dbang pon zhag
329a7(rnying rgyud): rigs ldan na mangs drug lnga 'joms// ye shes lnga du mnyam sbyar nas// mtshan pas rang bzhin dbul bzhugs// ye shes lnga yi dbang thob shog/ blo tsang pan chos rnams mtshon pa te// srung sring chos kyi dang po ci// bdag zhags kun kyang sa ma kyang da/
329b1(rnying rgyud): cad pa dam pa'i dang zan gas/ rludags margyal bas dan mngad pang// rags sum can byed dam pa dang / gang 'dul bsan pa rgyas mdad pa'// dgras kyi mtshan ma 'dabar can tan/ rdum po 'thal lags pa/ na tu man
329b2(rnying rgyud): dbyangs pa sa y-i hA// 'bru lnga rnying pa dab panag/ hUM gdug pa 'ams zhing ye shes gsal// sum mtshan byed phyag mtshas la// rnal ba 'byung ba'i dadugs te// sdug mtshan ma me pa bag/ drug pa'i mtshan gyis rdzogs na
329b3(rnying rgyud): rjes rab tu mtshon// dpa' rdul stag gi rgyan cha can// 'joms byed go cha'i dbang thob zhog/ hU~M dus gsum 'phags pa mchod mdzad pa'o// don chen mdzes su sdug pa yis// dang ba'i stobs kyis ma chad pa yi// ma tog dam pa'i dbang thar
329b4(rnying rgyud): shog/ hU~M dus gsum rgyal ba'i sku yi rgyan// 'khor rnams rab tu mnyes mdzad pa// nyes pas ma gos dbul bskor// rgyal mtshan gdugs kyi dbang thob shog/ ramachog lnga ldan zhal zas la// dbul zhing longs pa sel ma dang pa// 'bru brgyad bya
329b5(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pa 'di// zhal zas mod la dbang thob shog/ hU~M kun tu bzang po'i rol pa las// thugs rjes khams gsum gdug pa 'dul/ gnyen po las su drang mdzad pa'i// 'jigs byed gnyen po'i dbang thob shog/ hUM gsung gi rang bzhin mtshon rtsod pa'i/
329b6(rnying rgyud): ba rgan 'bar ba'i kha dgral/ byung ba nus pa'i don dang ldan// nus brnyan gyi dbang thab shog/ drug tu stug po'i gagal yis na/ khams gsum dbang gi bdag po ste/ brkyang bsum rab tu gdeng sa ma yis// gdug pa 'joms pa'i dbang tho
329b7(rnying rgyud): shog/ dz+ha thugs ka rin chen zur ba gyid las// zin la ste sna tshogs spun gyis skrag// thams cad kun la dang bzhin gnas// ye shes sems dpa'i dbang thob shog/ hUM steng gi phyogs la mnga' mdzad pa'i// gdug pa tshangs pa ma lus 'dul// ye rjes/
330a1(rnying rgyud): chan pa'i sbyin rlabs pan// gdug pa 'dul ba'i dbang thobashog/ driting gi sum rtson byed pa/ tshangs pa po pa gdug pa drug// dbyung ba zhes ldan rab sa ru/ 'ang bgrang da dang ma
330a2(rnying rgyud): nga mongs pa'i 'khor 'jo mas pa// phag gi mgo can gdug bsgo'o// byad chen ma mdzub can// phag gimag can dpeng thob shog/ dri tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor 'angabasra pa// gtsun byed rjen mo rab tu 'jogs// gtun
330a3(rnying rgyud): byas sa thobam// gsheg brnyan gyi pa bshad/ nga byung rdzul pa na sna'o// 'dud ci rkyen dri dus/ gas na nga byung sangs byas s+ho// 'du gyi lha me dpang bzhisate med par dpar gyi
330a4(rnying rgyud): mo chu ba 'dra// sbrang sri ga tor ma'i rang bzhin te// khyad par gtor ma'i dbang thang zho// hUM rang byung rgyal po lha yi rgyan// mongs pas rab tu brgyan pa te// g+hal rab tu 'dzes pas brgyan// dbu rgya na cod pa nid dbang thob s+ho// / dran 'a dgra
330a5(rnying rgyud): na pa'o// thig pa su zhuganas na/ thang ba can na mang 'a sa dag nin pa sus sho/ rlabags pa dang nga ldan / 'i brig / 'god 'di // drag tu rnas pa dab na
330a6(rnying rgyud): byed 'du te/ gas marjog rab sti 'di bya'i ga so// 'byung ba'i drub bcwa disas hA// sgra'i yod pa pa de rung bzheno// ngag do ste/ 'grapa mi ring
330a7(rnying rgyud): na
330b1(rnying rgyud): zil rban tu ba bu' ba 'dogs pa'i dgas// thog pa thags chags pa gas// bcan pa da bragasupa byed pa yob / rjod pa na nas sa rtags// thod pasnyam sa 'angs snang ngogs pa'i smran// zad ba rgyal gas pa ga//
330b2(rnying rgyud): rdzun bya thong pa'i das ma s+ho// gas pa'i surnams pa lngas 'dus pa'i nyig so// gdug phrul ni gas panyis su brgyan// nidzang zin pa gdas steng dmas rung pa// gdug pa cas rjod dran mas thob par gag/ d+hu ye shes me pung 'ar ba zag pa ma
330b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes me'iri ljang ser dmar po'i 'od// mdor na ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin te// dug lnga sreg pa'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM kha ma nag ral pa kun gyi rgyan du bcings// srid pa'i rtse mo zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags// gti mug chen po gyad nas bcadarna
330b4(rnying rgyud): kyang // dbu skra ral ba'i dbang mchog thob par shog/ hUM tshon gang spu yi ba spu'i bu ga rnams// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs cir yang snang // rdo rje phur pa rab tu kI la ya// gdug pa 'joms pa'i lha rnams dbang po bshong // hUM ye shes rdo rje rab tu
330b5(rnying rgyud): sa
330b6(rnying rgyud): stag sham phrin las thams cad rgyas pa'i rtags// bdud chas dpa' bo'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hU~M rdo rje thod khrag rab tu gsol ba yis// khams gsum chags pa rab tu zhi bar mdzod// 'dod chags rtsad nas gcod byed thod pa'i khra // rak+ta rnon po'i dab
330b7(rnying rgyud): thob par shog/ hU~M cod pa nad mar sngo rab tu 'phur byed pa'i// thabs dang shes rab snga gnyis tshon du ldan// 'dong ba dbyings su 'dren pa'i mtshan ma ste// rab tu brgyan pa'i dbang mchog thob par shog// d+hu dus gsung rgya ba ma lus mnyes mdzo dang //
331a1(rnying rgyud): gsum 'a'od bu'i dag chag spong mang dang // zhes langadadu ldan pa 'on tsho dpa las/ chod tumang byed pa 'od ba sog na/ sa ma na mtshal ba 'a nas 'duda'o// bcas songang su mam
331a2(rnying rgyud): 'bul// thugs dam chen po bsnyen pa 'bul ba'i rten// bzlas brjod bsnyen pa'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM 'jig rten khams rnams dbang du sdud pa yi// lcags kyi spyang mo khams gsum dbang du sdud// mngags pas pho nya'i tshul te dam pa'i gdang pa//
331a3(rnying rgyud): skud da ma can dbang mchog thob par shog/ khyi mo ral pas khams gsum dngangs pa'i bdag/ khams gsum zas su za ba'i rgan sla can// srid gsum sgom du 'thung ba'i hub sgra can// dam can mkha' 'gro'i dbang mchog thob par sho// hUM 'phar ba rtse ba
331a4(rnying rgyud): pa bang su sa gsasas byigs ni 'di'i bu nga sa s+ho// ngang ci gcigs cus tu spo su/ mabada'i ba rnam 'das ma ba ma ma rna makyil bas med badrag par ma/ de brjongs
331a5(rnying rgyud): mo che// tsi t+ta don snying za ba'i rkan sgra can// dbang sdud mkha' 'gro'i dbang mchog thob par shog/ hUM khams gsum nad kyi bdag mo dbang phyur ma// 'jig rten khams kun khyab pa'i bya ma rta// mi phyugs kun la mnga' mdzad dbang po che// gdug pa mamo'i dbang
331a6(rnying rgyud): thob par shog/ hU~M dus gsum kun tu rgyal ba'i srung rnyes pa// bstan pa rgyas pa'i slad du phrin las mdzod// ser nag chen mo khams gsum kun gyi bdag/ mkha' 'gro dbang srud dbang rnams thob par shong // hUM las su sha khrag ro la rngam pa'i yum// khag
331a7(rnying rgyud): dmar nag srid gsum dbang du sdud// stong khams dge sdig byar byed pa'i yum// dang po stobs ldan mkha' 'gro'i dbang thob sho // hU~M phrin las sna tshogs mthar phyin grub pa mo// rgya mtsho'i gting gi klu rnams 'khrug byod me// ljang nag chen mo'i dzin las mtha
331b1(rnying rgyud): phyin ma// mkha' 'gro mthu yi dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM bdud kyi rigs rnams dbang du spyad mdzad ma// mthing nag bdud kyi chas su rab tu zhugs// khams gsum bdud dpung 'joms pa'i dbang po che// gdug pa bdud 'dul dbang rnams thob par spyon//
331b2(rnying rgyud): hUM 'jig rten gnod byed rab tu 'dul mdzad ma// ser bas rgyas pa'i rang bzhin mtshon mdzad ma// ki kAng las kyis bskal par 'dul mdzad ma// mkha' 'phro mthu byin dbang rnams thob par sho// hUM khams gsum gang 'dul dbang gi bdag mo ste// rak+ka srin
331b3(rnying rgyud): poza byed dbang du sbed// dpal gyi bka' nyan khrag gi dri sdom ma// dbang phyug chen mo'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM gdug pa klu rnams rab tu 'dul mdzad ma// na dang na yin las dbang gi bdag mo ste// rgya la ming 'amadzad nad kyi bdag mo yang // las rnam
331b4(rnying rgyud): mthar phyin dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM 'jig rten dregs pa 'dul ba'i las mdzad ma// grangs dang ldan pa ma nor rim par ldan// rnam bzhi rtogs pa'i khyad par skyon mdzad pa// yang dag don dang ldan pa'i dbang thob shog/ hU~M thugs mchog rang byung ye shes 'od dang
331b5(rnying rgyud): ldan// 'khor ba'i mun pa ma lus sel mdzad pa// rgyal ba'i thugs la nyon mongs nyes pa med// snang ba mar me'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM gdug pa chen po thabs kyis 'dul mdzad pa// mthing nag drag pos thams cad 'joms pa'i sku// zhal gsum
331b6(rnying rgyud): phyag drug zur gsum dpal dang ldan// sgrub pa drag po'i dbang rnams thob par shong // hUM nyung dkar rgyal pos thams cad sgrol ba'i dbang // khro bo'i rgyal po 'bum phrag bsam las 'das// stong gsum khro bos dus gcig khengs mdzad pa// nyung dkar rgyal po slong
331b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM bu bu la sbyar ba'i rdzas kyi dam pa ste// ye shes lnga brnyes nyes byed rten dang 'bral// rab tu bsgrubs pas 'od dang du bar ldan// drag po rdzas kyi dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas lhun gyis grub// rang bzhin la
332a1(rnying rgyud): smra du/ na na sa
332a2(rnying rgyud): theg pa byang du sa 'i / mongs chud thug pa dang rnams rna bar ni// pas nas ba sa khril pa'i smrasan pa nam ladu rjod pa da/ da pa nga / da 'du
332a3(rnying rgyud): drug dadang rnams thob par sho/ na srung rten pa rab tu gnon ma dang // don na bram zin las mthar byin pa// gad+hal bya ba'i las ting gdon rig// gnon byed kya tha ma dbang rnams thub par dag// blagazas pa babral bang da de 'byur ba la/
332a4(rnying rgyud): de mi 'i rangs byas dag rjes 'a bya pa'i da smran// rbang tu 'dug mas the byung 'o// dzacanapa na marnal pa 'ad ma da pa// ngargyal dang yang 'dzin pazla pa/ 'a dang byang dmang gan du sa/
332a5(rnying rgyud): pa ldan/ gni gyi pa sa/ sa sa/ ra pa/ da / sa
332a6(rnying rgyud): nyon mo 'a gcig yud la sgrol mdzad pa/ rdo phreng ba zhing brgya sgrol ba'i rtsa/ khams gsusu dbyings su grol ba'i dbang thob shog/ rdo phur ba rab tu snre la lo// zhing brgya sgrol mdzad brda ga la ya/ d+hA Tha gnas su rgol mngongad 'adz+ra kA li ya/
332a7(rnying rgyud): kyis 'ang nan tshul myo sa byang sa// ji kyi / shi tha du gyi mtsha sa nga ba sa
332b1(rnying rgyud): songon myorgyal po gtor mal// ngar 'dzin rab tu btas pas gcod pa byed// babs dang shes dab dran pa'i nga sa dang gas// gcod byed la pa'i dbang nar mthong par sho/ na mongs dug sa drug gis 'azhibs pa byed// rab ci thugs
332b2(rnying rgyud): pa gting nas skems// gnyen po'i dbang du thabs las de ltar snang // nyon mongs zhen pa grol ba'i dbang thob shog/ hUM khyad par chen po 'bar bas zhen pa gcod// snga lngas mtshan las nad las 'khor ba nyen// de nyid rgyal bas byin rlabs rab tu
332b3(rnying rgyud): zhen pa gcod pa'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUMgatun khung gu gsum yum gyi mkha' dbyings su// rig pa ye shes la po myi ngam 'di// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rtags// nom tho ba'i dang rnams thob par sho// rgyakhams gas ma
332b4(rnying rgyud): pa ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// 'bre ba'i lha mchog brda lI la la// gang yin stong byed mthu 'phrog badz+ra kI la ya// gdug byed stobs dang bral ba'i dbang rdzob shog/ hU~M la mas gsum nyon mongs gnas su drang ba'i phyir// rab tu 'bugs byeng brdo hrI
332b5(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs zhing bcu gnas su 'dren mdzad pa// nyon mongs gdug pa'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ nyon mongs dang gar mi gtang bcing ba'i phyir// rab tu 'ching byed badz+ra lI la ya// zhing bzu rdzir byed padz+re lci ba la// nyon mongs tshong ba'i dbang rnams ngangang /
332b6(rnying rgyud): sho/ hUM gdug pacan sa rab tu 'dul ba'i phyir/ byed rkyen po 'adz+ra kI la la// nyon mongs 'joms kyings skyil ya// byung chen po'i dbang rnams thob par rjod// bu gdug papangs kyis thob ba 'jigs pa'i bu// nyon mongs grol byedang
332b7(rnying rgyud): nyeb la/ don pa'i dang rorabatun gyi byed dring brtson po'i dang rnam mthob par nog/ glegados pa'i dngos pa'i rlag par bya byor// rtob byed chen po drathil la/ gdangs pa'i da' khyor ngongs stong bye 'o// byed
333a1(rnying rgyud): dbang rnams thob par shog/ dngos grub dam pa lha yi skya// dur khrong chen po'i gzhal yas dam pa 'dir// dur khrong rdzas la brten te bsrubs lags na// sngang srong byams pa'i dngos grub kya zhugs la// ye shes pa
333a2(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// dngos grub stsal dang rtsol bar mi dmigs kyang // gdug pa chen po thabs kyis 'dul ba'i phyir// drag pos 'dren pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// hUM chos nyid kun tu bzang mo'i byin rlabs las// rdzogs pa 'dul ba'i thug
333a3(rnying rgyud): ba ltar// nyon mongs dbyings su bsgral ba'i dngos grub rtsol// hUM 'khor gyis gdug pa ma lus bskal pa'i phyir// snying phyogs khro rgyal yab yum 'khor dang bcas// tshangs pa 'khor bcas rab tu btul ba ltar// 'jig rten dregs pa btul ba'i dngos
333a4(rnying rgyud): grub stsol// hU~M rol pa chen po steng gi sras mchog yang // zhing bcu stobs dang rab tu 'bral mdzad pa// bdud rgya la n+na tra thogs dang bral ba bzhin// zhing bcu stobs dang 'bral ba'i dngos grub rtsol// sbal pas stong khams rab tu bkang nas kyang // dbul ba'i dang
333a5(rnying rgyud): gis gdal ci 'dul ston// rgyal bas stong gsum skul bas bkang ba ltar// sprul pa khams gsum 'gengs pa'i dngos grub stsol// hU~M dpal gyi bka' nyan las la brtson pa mo// 'jig rten dregs pa ma lus 'dul mdzad pa// 'jig rten dbang du phung pa'i las byas
333a6(rnying rgyud): skar// dam las mi 'da' bka' nyan dngos gru stsol// hUM 'jig rten khams la dbang phyur mthu mo che// las ngan zhing bcu ma lus grol mdzad pa// bcol cing nad na las su pho nya mdzad pa ltar// gang du mngags pa'i las rnams 'grub pa'i dngos gru stsol/
333b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs parje bzhi rab tu 'dul mdzad pa// nad kyi bdag mo bka' nyan gsung spod ma// zan dang ponya las rnams 'grub byed ltar// gang la bya ba'i las rnams myur 'grub dngos gru brtsol// wA ral ba chen po'i byin rlabs cir yang lhung // 'dul zhabs ngag na
333b2(rnying rgyud): brjod kyi ces 'dra yang // snying rje byang chub sems las nyams pa med// ngag po byams pa'i dngos srub pal drags la// thugs rje byams pas 'gros snying gyi'i phyir// la la 'i dang la mami tho bar snang // 'dul thabs drag pas 'dra ba 'dril lags /
333b3(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs gnas su 'dren pa'i dngos grub rtsol// bdud dang srin po 'dul ba'i dngos grubastsol// don dam chos nyid rtogs pa'i dngos gru ba stsol// sangs rgyas sa la 'gro ba'i dngos grub stsol// 'khor ba den song skyong ba'i dngos grub stsol/ rdo rje phur rab chen po bshad
333b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i byud pas/ dbang dam pa bslang ba dang bkra shis dngos phub kyi le'u skyeso bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das drag po ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ kun bzang rol pa cir yang srung // la la bcom ldan bsten pa'i bdag
333b5(rnying rgyud): la lar 'jig byed ne ruka/ la lang stong byed khrus kyi chu// la lar gnon byed ri rab gzugs// la lar gsod byed shan pa 'dra// la lar dge sbyong dam pa'i mgon// la lar sha za srin po'i gzugs// la lar 'jigs pa bdud kyi chas// la la theg byed me
333b6(rnying rgyud): yi 'od// me lo rgyal po khro bos kyang // stong gsum nyon mongs sreg par byed// 'khor ba'i zhen pa gting nas skem// zhing bcu log lta sreg par byed// de phyir rab tu bsreg par bya// me lha chen po sreg pa'i sar// gru gsum sum rim grangs su bya// nag
333b7(rnying rgyud): dang ser la dmar ba'i 'od// rang rang yig 'bru bkod kyang rung // drag po'i shing la legs par bya// rab tu rdzas kyi dam pa ni// dam pa gsum gyi rdzas dag dang // chan dang me tog sngon po dang // na mo'i 'bru dang byung na ga dang // dag po'i ring dang ri
334a1(rnying rgyud): dang // rab tu de la bskor la bzhag/ drug dang ngag po'i rdzas rnams ni// ma lus de la bskur te gzhag/ drag po'i lha dang mnyam pa'i rtsang // dmar po byas te de la bdor// rim pos 'byung brje bzhin du/
334a2(rnying rgyud): zab nar du lha rnams bskyed// spyan drang rim pa yang dag bya// bzlas brjod me dang 'dra ba yis// nyon mongs rtsa mchog 'dra ba bsreg/ bstod pa bya zhing rab tu ma tshad// ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par la// rgod rnams 'byung bar gdon med// gang
334a3(rnying rgyud): me nyid rab tu phyir// me yi lha ting nge bden sbyar// dri me lce drang srong nyan mongs sreg/ 'bang ba ma lta kun 'dzinan// 'bar ba me'i dbyings na bzhugs// rang so zan po ma yilha// mchod 'bral mnyes pa 'di ba nas la// dador bar byugs
334a4(rnying rgyud): par mdzod// hUM grwa gsum me yi dkyil 'khor nas/ drang srong chen po me yi lha// chibs sur gyes khamathu tshabs// bra la me yi skrag pa gsol// kun d+he bgrang phreng phyag na bsdams// rdo rje phur ba'i zhabs dang ldan// dus gsum rgyal ba'i
334a5(rnying rgyud): pa// gdug byed drag po me yi lha// gdug pa'i tshogs kun sreg par byed// gang yin zhing bcu tshig par mdzod// rnam gsum mchod pa lha la 'bul// mnyes pas lha yi dngos grub ster// lha yang drag po me yi chas// rab tu 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs

334a7(rnying rgyud): ling la// ri rab rje nas me bus shig/ nyams pa gang yin sreg par mdzod// 'byung po gang yin tshig par mdzan// hUM phyogs skyong rgyal po me yi rtse// shar phyogs 'bar ba me yi lha// phyag g.yas 'khor lo dkar po bsdams// g.yen

335b1(rnying rgyud): shig/ dbang ldan 'khor tshogs me bus shig/ sa bdag 'khor tshogs me bus shig/ b+h+rUM/ mthing nag 'bar ba'i 'khor tshogs nas// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu yang // khrod ma rab tu gdug pa'i blo// thugs rje chen po brol gshegs// dragra ni tha
335b2(rnying rgyud): rlog pa'i mo// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rngam pa chen po zol gshegs// hU~M mjir rdeg gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// tshangs pa 'dul ba gdug pa'i lha// hUM mdzad pab yum tho la gshegs// jo bo mji ga srin ltar gtinying du/
335b3(rnying rgyud): chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// bdud dang srin po 'dul ba'i bro// dgra ni thal bar rlig pa'i sgo// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// ngan song 'khor ba 'joms pa'i sgo// bla med byang chub thob pa'i bro// phung po rdul du bshigs pa'i blo// rnam shes dbyings
335b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i bro// te gr-ita chen po thal gshegs// bye gdug pa phag dang sdig pu'i mgo// tshangs pa po mo 'khor bcas 'dul// la la lding zhing la la 'dral// gshog pa can gyis mtha' nas srung // mche ba can gyis gsod par byed// chom ngam drag pos

335b6(rnying rgyud): las rnarma byed// sras mchog mthing ga sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// bdud dang srin po 'dul ba'i bro// hU~M mkha' 'gro ma chen gdug pa'i zo// ma mo'i rta pro si li li// sngon dmar byang thag rgyangs se rgyang // sha khrag dmar po

336a1(rnying rgyud): nyams pa padu yin spyan gyis gzigs// so bdang mche gtsigs sa n+d+ha/ stong gsum don khrag 'thung yang // ma 'grangs ma ngams so bad theg/ mkha' 'thom gyi phrin ltar gtings/

336a3(rnying rgyud): bas// pra 'i snya ma mnyas pa za// pA 'i skyeng du tho bdud byas// dri 'i lha ma mnyes pa'i bri// lha yi stong du tho bdung bas// dalas momanyes byana'o// lus kyi steng du blo brdung pas// rag tu'i sman rnaMnyas pa'i hA/

339a5(rnying rgyud): mi sbyi ni spad 'i songs su rtags las drub/ thags rnamam 'i byin nangs las/ 'dram 'i dang ci bang cam/ bag pa 'dras nyis nas byung// thams cadam sras 'dul ba yang / rdzar 'dalas gas pas byu
339a6(rnying rgyud): 'ir byed las// gdug pa 'dul ba'i khab yang // durdu rbang cun rdzogs pa// yongs su dul ba brtan pa yang// kyang 'di yangs su rtags las byung / bde bar gshegs pa'i byo rlabs las// bdud dang yin pa 'ang ba rje
339a7(rnying rgyud): sa kun bgang nas// nyin mongs thog par byed pa'am// byed 'di yongs su rtags las byung / thabs dang shes rang 'jal ba yang // 'gro 'du 'i rang gyi byed// byang chub sems kyi ba pa'ang // bde gshegs 'a nabs
339b1(rnying rgyud): 'di yongs su rtags las byung // 'dod chags sbyong zhing byang chub theg// chags pa rang gyud sdug bsngal sel// zhen pa rang chud grol bar byed// 'dzin pa med kying nan pa gcad// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung // mkha' la bya ltar 'phur ba dang // kyang
339b2(rnying rgyud): mi 'bying mes mtshig/ thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang // mngon shes rab tu mi sku dang // bden pa don dang ldan pa 'di// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung // log pa'i chos can 'dul ba dang // dngos grub bar chad byed pa dang // bskal ba'i zhing bkur gyur
339b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang // ngan song sdug bsngal mkha' 'gror bcas// thugs ze'i byin chubs 'byung bar ni// chud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung // 'pho ba 'dul ba'i don srad du// zhi dang lho dang 'dul ba'i don// 'bral ba'i dbang du de las byung // drang ran ngas don
339b4(rnying rgyud): rnam pa gnyis// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i don du 'byung // rgyud 'di yongs su rtags las byung // rang rgyud dngos por 'joms pa dang // stong pa'i don la dgod pa dang // bden pa'i dbyings las 'dul ba dang // mi 'khor don la 'god pa dang // na
339b5(rnying rgyud): don rnams mthong ba dang // klud 'di yongs su rtogs las hU~Mr// nyi ma'i 'od bzhin gsal ba dang // gsal la 'gyur med brtan pa dang // nyes pa med par rtogs pa dang // bgrod du med par mthar phyin pa// hud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung //
339b6(rnying rgyud): dang ri mngar gyur pa la// sa dang lam la de bzhin te// rim par nus pa'i byin rlabs dang // 'bras bu'i rim pa de bzhin te// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung // bsam gtan nyid 'dzir rim pa ni// ting 'dzin tsal gyi rim pa yis// sa la rnam
339b7(rnying rgyud): 'dang 'das gnyis su de 'dzin 'byung / myangan 'das pa'i sa'am yang / thung 'di yongs surtags las byung / btsun pa byed pa dam pa yang// gang man rdzogs las dpa na byung// mangs 'angan 'ar bsha thal/ 'am
340a1(rnying rgyud): rta bral// rgyud 'ang yongs su rtogs las byung // bshud pa ni med 'od ldan 'di// bstun pa yongs kyi 'byung gnas yin// bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po yin// thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas rjen srin// man pa sa
340a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i sgron me yin// rtogs par byed pa'i shes rab yin// sgom par byed pa'i bsam gtan yin// shes par byed pa'i spyod pa yin// thob par byed pa'i 'bras bu yin// nges par 'grub pa'i dngos grub yin// zhi bar byed pa'i chos nyid yin// 'jom par byed
340a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i khro bo yin// sgrol bar byed pa'i phur ba yin// gtub par byed pa'i mtshon cha yin// gsal bar byed pa'i mar me yin// rdo rje phur ba chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ rgyud 'byung ba'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste so dgu pa'o// / de nas
340a4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das drag po nyid sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu// drag po gru gsum rim pa bzhin// dur khrod rus pa'i phye ma la// khrag gis spras te rab tu byug/ rim pa bzhin du byas kyang rung // rdzas rnams gor
340a5(rnying rgyud): du bstan pa bzhin// tshang par bsags shing las rnams bya// bar chad bsrung zhing byin brngub bya// phur pa sngags kyi byin brlab bya// brjod kyis rim pas gzhug par bya// rnam lnga las kyi li'u 'bul// gtso bo sngags kyis gzing la gzhag/ sngags
340a6(rnying rgyud): kyi las bye ting 'dzin bsgom// rnam gsum bskyed dang mchod pa 'bul// las bzhi brdung ba'i sbyor grol bya// bstab pa'i sngags kyis de bzhin 'bul// snying po dril zhing las rnams bya// tshogs mtsho dgeng du bstan pa bzhin// de yis rtags rnams byung ba
340a7(rnying rgyud): dang // rab tu dril zhing drag par bstan// gong du bstan pa de min dgos// drag po'i las su bstan pa yin// mtshan ma brtan po byung ba dang // pho ta dkris su bcas pa dang // rang nga drag po bskal ba'i sngags// mtha' yis brten cingadag dab par bya/
340b1(rnying rgyud): dngos por 'dzin pa sgrol ba yi// drag po khro ba'i byin rlabs yin// dngos po stong par sgrol pa dang // de yi don las mi 'da' dang // 'khor bar mi 'khor ror gcig bya// mthon dang dug dang brdung ba dang // bstab dang gnas pa'i rim pa yang // 'du
340b2(rnying rgyud): bachen po rang dang yin// gnas gsum las nyid gang byed kyang // rang rang sngags kyis de bzhin hUM// tshe dadabakra shes dngos grub kyang // thams cad 'dus pa'i sngags tshig gi nI// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ drag po bsgrub pa'i
340b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi bzla ba'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das sras mchog sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// dur zong chen po'i gnas drug \u0f7f// zla gsum mthing nag 'byung ba bri// dur khrod nus pa'i phye ma gdab// sngags kyis
340b4(rnying rgyud): bsrung zhing phur pa dgod// byin brlabs dgod pa gas nyid yin// de nyid bskyed dang ldan drang dang // mchod dang las bzhi'i brdung ba dang // gad bcing bsla la zhing snying po bzlas// bstod bzhin gong bzhin tshogs mchod byas// rtags rnams rab tu
340b5(rnying rgyud): ba dang // bslab pa drag po sngags la 'dug/ bsnyen bcug na ma dang sa byud par bya// brdung ba'i lus ni dus dus kyi// de las tugs nyid byung ba dang // po nyid tus dang yang dag sbyar// grol ba'i 'gas kyis brgal bar bya// phyi ma'i las nyi gong du
340b6(rnying rgyud): bstan// drag po sgrol ba'i khas nyid yin// rdorje phur ba chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ sras mchog nyid du sgrub pa'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das pas mkhan dgu bcu srub pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs
340b7(rnying rgyud): dur khud ma'i spangs pa'i sar// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba bri// sngon du bya ba'i rim pa'i sa// gsum dang bzhi bzhi gcig kyang rung // rim pas de bzhin gang yin sbyar// so so'i rdzas rnams so sor bsag/ thun yang de bzhin rim par bya// ting 'dzin
341a1(rnying rgyud): ram pa'i byin nu ba stsalas// nangs da sbyimed pa na na// mnga' gsol rnam pa bzla // mdun dulas mthun ny-id bskyed// spyan drang bskyem dang mchod pargya// nying po dag pa rigasas thol// rtag /
341a2(rnying rgyud): gang yin las sngags byed// bsnyen bsgrub mi dbye gcig tu dril// drag por sgrol cing daste sgred// dus dus rbad cing rab tu 'o// rtags rnams dbyung ba'i phur pa'i las// thun pong de bzhin 'bang bar bya// thun la metshu 'bar ba dang // 'di dang thad dang du ba dang /
341a3(rnying rgyud): rtags de mngon du 'ong bar bshad// bsnyen sngags gdab sngags thun sngags dang // mi dbye de nyid gcig pa yin// dril ba'i sngags kyis las rnams 'grub// ting 'dzin rim pa so so yin// rdzas kyang mi mthun so so yin// bye brag tu ni shes par
341a4(rnying rgyud): gtso bo gcig la las mkhan ni// rkyang ba bcu dgu'i rim pa ste// de rnams gang byed las mkhan yin// bcu dgu pho mo gnyis su 'dus// gang byed ye shes lha la gdags// dril bas sngags su gong bzhin 'gro// na ya bye bragarigs dang sbyar//
341a5(rnying rgyud): kyi pho mo rnam gnyis so// gleng yin rtags dang sbyar bar bya// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ las mkhan brgya dgu'i sgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
341a6(rnying rgyud): byin rlabs nam mkha'i ngo bo las// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs 'du// 'dul ba'i don du cing yang ston// thabs mkhas rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyis// 'dul ba rnams gnyis gang 'dral ba// yang dag don la khyad par med// bstan pa'i
341a7(rnying rgyud): snying po dam pa 'di// 'dul ba'i don du rtser yang ston// snying po dam pa lha'i sku// khams gsum sems can de bzhin 'byung // rtogs dang martogs khyad par med// rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu 'byung // gcig les gnyis su de bzhin sdang // snying
341b1(rnying rgyud): bo dod pa bab dang na med// med pa ma yin cing yang sdang // rgyal ba thams cad 'byung bar byed// khams gsum sems can 'byung bar byed// 'bras bu bzang ngan gnyis su sbyin// rgyal ba'i cin skabs rnam par 'byung // rgyal ba grangs na ba sa
341b2(rnying rgyud): byeng / don mi byang nyid pas kyang // rnams thams cad 'byung ba // deni ma kyang ba byang mipas rgya// sbyin pa byams cad byung ba pod // de nang na ni par bya ma ngas bya// 'bar na dpa bams cad byung ba dang //
341b3(rnying rgyud): po dbyings las byung // sdud pa thams cad 'byung ba yang // don dam snying po dbyings las byung // theg pa thams cad 'byung ba yang // don dam snying po dbyings las byung // bstan pa thams cad 'byung ba yang // don dam snying po dbyings las byung /
341b4(rnying rgyud): rnams byams cad byung ba 'gro// don dam steng po dbyings pas byeng // skye bsgom pa rtogs pa yang // don dam ny-ing ba byings pas byung // 'bras su mapa cu smin pa yang // don dam snying ba dbyings pas byung // 'gro ba dren pa spyod pa pang // dang
341b5(rnying rgyud): po byings sas byung // den rnams thams cad 'grub pa yang / den ma skyeng po dbyings pas byung // gtan lang dag par bye ba dang // gtan pa 'brebs par byed pa / don dam stong po dbyings pas byung // dond bting pa ci yang med/
341b6(rnying rgyud): nid la cir yang blang / ldang ba'i ngos po dmigs dang bral/ spang ba dngas med stong pa'i byings // snang ba dang bzhin mad pa'i da// sbyang ba dang bzhin ci yang med// stong pacir ya dang pa'i stong / rtsod pa bgrus chung byed kyang byung // stong pa'i rlos
341b7(rnying rgyud): sa byed pa ga sa de gzhigs byung/ tin stong pas med bajug bying brgyas sa pa na byung // tho sang pa dbyis madrim// mang pa chud pa'i zhes kyag/ sdang stong gnyis med deng ra chog/ gnyis pa 'o dag
342a1(rnying rgyud): dbyings// gnyis su med par bden pa'i dbyings// gnyis su med par bstan pa'i gzhi// gnyis su med pa snang ba dngas// gnyis su meng pa 'bras bu'i'amachog/ gnyis sa med pa don dam lam/ gnyis su med pa
342a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i mchog/ gnyis su med pa mnyam pa'i dbyings// mnyam nyid rig pa'i thod brdal bas// snang stong gnyis su med pa yang // thams cad dang rig byang chub sems// bde ba chen po dbyings la gsal// rig dang ma reg khad par las// 'kho nga mya ngan 'das
342a3(rnying rgyud): ba byung // 'khor ba bsam med brjod las 'das// rtag pa brtas la so sor srin// rang dang bcangs pa grol ba med// bcing bya 'ching byed gnyis su med// rtog pa bcas la de ltar snang // rtog pa brtas la me ltar cha// rtog pa'i dbang
342a4(rnying rgyud): nyid ltar// sdug bsngal dab song 'bras bu las// grangs dang brjod las 'das b.ru// sdug bsngal sna tshogs thar pa med// log par brtas pas de bzhin byung // 'gro ba'i dus med ngan song 'khyams// thugs de'i byin rlabs rab tu dkon// 'bras
342a5(rnying rgyud): rlag par gyur pa yin// rtog pa'i rim pa khyad par gyis// grangs dang brjod las 'das pa kyang // theg pa'i rim pa bsam 'das kyang // nges par bstan pa gcig las med// sangs rgyas grangs mang brjod 'das kyang // nges par bstan pa gcig las med/
342a6(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu grangs mang brjod 'das kyang // nges pa'i 'bras bu gcig las med// de bzhin thams cad 'byung ba yang // nges par ma rtogs rim par bgrod// gtan la phebs pa gcig las med// rtogs pa'i khyad par gnyis la 'byung // de yang sdang ba rnam
342a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis yin// lta ba thams cad de la 'dus// sgom pa thams cad de la 'dus// spyad pa thams cad de la 'dus// 'bras bu thams cad de la 'dus// dkyil 'khor thams cad de la 'dus// zhi dag zo yang de la 'dus// lam dang rim pa de la 'dus/
342b1(rnying rgyud): nga mas thams cad del 'das/ man pa thams cad da'a'adas// gar rnams thams ca dang la 'dus// bstan pa'i bying ba sa pa'o// mung rnams thams capa byung ba yang // del ba kyang stongs pazod// debyed nga 'a ga ba ga bla
342b2(rnying rgyud): chen dbang gi rgyal por bshad// bdud dang srin po 'dul ba yang // snying po don dam dbyings las byung // dper na chos nyid nam mkha' 'dra// cing yang med de kun gyi gzhi// thams cad thams cad 'byung bar byed// de yis rgyud kyi rang bzhin 'byung /
342b3(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i don du rgyud 'byung ba// rnam pa gnyis su nges par 'byung // byung yang don dam dbyings las byung // 'dus kyang don dam dbyings la 'du// de phyir kun gyi gzhi yin pas// gzhi la rgyud rnams so sor 'byung // gzi de nyid las ma g.yos
342b4(rnying rgyud): par// thams cid de bzhin 'byung ba yang // 'dus kyang gzhi de nyid du 'dus// bdud dang srin po 'dul ba yi// khro bas stong gsum kun bkang nas// khro bo byang chub sems las byung // byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// thams cad 'byung ba'i
342b5(rnying rgyud): rgyam rnams ni// rtags ma rtogs kyi khyang bar yin// bstan po'i rting pa la bya// rdonga'i snying po kun cig go// rdorje su pa chen pa bshad pa'i klud las/ rgyud gtan la dba' pa'i le'u gro ba zhi bajug gsum pa'o// denas bcom
342b6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das sbyang btad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnams par zhugs te/ dus gsum skye shi mi mnga' ba'o/ rig pa gsal ba 'dun pa'i dod// klung rnams thams cad sdud par byed// 'dza rigs la mnga' bcas pa'o// dam pa'i rigs can khyod kyis rung / las

343a2(rnying rgyud): ljin las phun sum tshogs pa'i drud ces bya ba/ dpa' te ga pa phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ga bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das cu gsung thugs kyi bdag po dges partsen zar rnying pod/ de bzhin gshegs par bya da kyi sbyong ba nas shA

343a7(rnying rgyud): kyi lha mo du mas bskor ba 'di lta ste/ sgeg mo dang / phreng ba ma dang / dbyangs len ma dang / gar sbyar ma dang / bdug spos ma dang / me tog ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri chab ma dang / lcags kyu ma dang / zhags pa ma dang / lcags sgrog ma dang /
343b1(rnying rgyud): ngas dang / gnyis sa pa dpa bachags pa/ de nam sonas nu 'dang dag da pa can po dga'apa 'chug mang byu rdzogs pa'i byu zugs nas/ 'akyi nunanas nga gsus su rgyan pa tho byas so// ngas stong ba 'am ngag dang /
343b2(rnying rgyud): nas thad kar bltas sam gsal bar byas nas/ mnyam bachen po las mi snang bar gyur to// en no// thugs kyis me bzung sems can gcig kyang med// de'i stobs kyis thams pa dos shes// phun la ce bas dga' mchog dra re//

343b7(rnying rgyud): gags// oMn hA tsun tshwan jam pa pa sa t+pan d+ha ti/ me nyid stong pa'i dang bzhin laso// dngos me byung ba'i chos rnams ni// bdag dang chos dang na marig dang // gzung 'dzin pabs pa'i stong po'o// stong pa nyid kyilo zhes ni// ye shes rnams kyi rmo
344a1(rnying rgyud): gas pas rlos 'bra'amad do// gas rjod du nan rgya// zhes gsungs na/ den pa na gshegs pa dag pacom pa pang dgu rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pacom lda 'dus de na
344a2(rnying rgyud): s+yArba so// ye nas chos nyid rang bzhin la// snying rjes thams cad khyab par bzlon// chos rnams cad gyi snying po 'di// don gyi gyi ba yin par gasbyangs// rnam gan mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang // san la khyab pa'i rdeni// srin yod da
344a3(rnying rgyud): bdun gyis skye rgyas kyi// thams dang ga 'ang tung skyobs sogs// rnam byod pa sa pasen pa gyi// gzhan gyi na sa dmigs pa dang // tshibarnams pa nad rtsigs pa / da cig la shes pade//

344a5(rnying rgyud): de nas ying na ba ze ni// sre ga zung drug sung tu ma myong ba'i// ting de dzin pa snyoms pa grags// bdag nyid dkyis rkye kyim mde// rang gis dang byed gyis byarlabs// byed kyi pa bum thag tung // zhal ba

344b1(rnying rgyud): gyi gtso bor gyur// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i lte ba dang // sgribs pa rtsibs mtshan bu chad dang // gru bzhi sgo bzhi rim par bsam// de pang rnam par spang mdzad dang // rdo rjesams dpa' drin chen dpal// 'od dpang med nga ngadon thub pa// shram da /
344b2(rnying rgyud): lha mo sgro ma rnams// dkar po mthing ga dmar dang ser// ljang gu'i mdog tu snang ba dang // rang rang lag cha 'khor lo dang // rdo rje rin chen pad+ma ral gri rnams// phyag mtshan g.yas kyi dang mor 'dzin// g.yon pas rang dang 'dra ba'i rig za rnam 'khyud pa/
344b3(rnying rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgyas dbang bsrung ba// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ so so'i mdog dang lug cha yis brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung rdugs 'dus pa rdo'i phrin las phun su tsho bra pa'i rgyud las gleng gzhing le'u ste dang
344b4(rnying rgyud): po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dga' ba'i snying po de/ dpa' bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor 'di lta bu gsungs so// ye nas dngos med dngos po 'tsha
344b5(rnying rgyud): dngos por byung bas dngos po'i gnas// ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la// dngos por btags kyang dngos med pa'o// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin la// rgya yi bor gsal ba las// gnas bsrung ba ni rnam par bsam// gnyis pa las ni rnam brgyan pas
344b6(rnying rgyud): bcu bzhi pa yi phrin stengs su// bco lnga'i gdan dang thig ler bcas// de las 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu pa// rim pa cung zad 'khor ba las// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mardor bsam/ de ster pad+ma lha chen dang // thabs kyi dbus sru bas ma bya ba// kho bo
344b7(rnying rgyud): spang gnas las phyes// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa'o// g.yas pa dkar la g.yon pa dmar// rtsa ba'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// phyag gnyis dru gi rgya bcings te// dang po rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// lhag ma zhi ba'i tshul dubya// sems dpa' gsum gyi thor

345a2(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa rdo thob ste// g.yon pa bcing ba'i zhags pa'o// oM sum b+ha ni swam+ba \u0f7f hUM/ g+hiH bir+Na tAM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa yar+tha/ An pa ho/ b+ha ga bAn ba d+hAnA nga dz+nyA phaT/ bgegs rnams srin ni 'a dbug ste// dpel 'ding rnangs kyi gdan
345a3(rnying rgyud): oM ko Ta ya mAn+ta zla/ tho ba lcags kyu bakhrigs pa yis// do thar ba latho ba ni// su stong bdud kyi la khyil ba n+ti/ ra gyi wenA byung bral// bskal pa'i ma bzhin rab tu 'bar// yin+da ni pa'i mdog 'dug// rdo lung ba rtsa ga na bsnams/
345a4(rnying rgyud): ni gsil shing lta brel// 'od zer rnam par 'gro bar bsam// rdo rje phur zhu nges bteb nas// bgegs lus shin tu mi g.yo'o// oM na maHsa maN+Da kA ya lAka tsit+ta badz+rA NA~M g+ha prA b+hA ta ya b+hU ta pa sarba duSh+pe hU~M phaT/ kI li kI la pa sarba pA pa~M phaT/ hUM rbu badz+ra kI la la/
345a5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra d+ha ro Adz+nyA ba ya ti/ sarba bi bA na thA ya wA kA badz+rA d+h+r-i kI la ya hUM phaT/ sems dpa' phra mo'i rang bzhin gyi// snying ga'i chu skye sa nyi gzugs gsal/ hUM yig rnam par phyung nas ni// khro bo bcu yi gzugs su gyur// bskyed dang bzlas pa las kyi thugs//
345a6(rnying rgyud): myo gcig tu bsgrags pa'o// oM badz+ra ba tAt+taM kA d+hi/ garje ga hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra bo d+ha bi lar+thaM/ ha na trAn hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra d+ha nI la d+hi b+h+rUM/ dAt+ya swA r+b+hu baT+Ta/ oM badz+ra pra ti la rmAT+Taka d+ha~M/ pa ts+tsha ba tsahU~M phaT/ oM bo pro \u0f7fs+'ur+tha yawa la dz+raM/ b+han+d+ha d+ha d+ha
345a7(rnying rgyud): e ban+dan d+ha ta la sle ba hUM/ hu surba sra dzubs/ oM brje kr-i ta a ba de hU~M/ tiH ti hU~MbaT/ ma ba kro d+ha ya mra ti su d+ha madz+ra/ rjo byub ba/ oM badz+rabi ti tril kyab 'bru/ brji hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ba ti mthab 'a ste/ lon rdzo byung rje/ gsol bar

346a1(rnying rgyud): mdog la bum pas brgyan// de yi steng na yi ge rtsi// rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan// de yi skyeng na yi ge suM/ kha dog dbyibs can gru bzhir gnas// da yo steng du yi ge yaM// rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan//
346a2(rnying rgyud): steng du yi ge laM// de las byung ba'i yon tan ni// rin chen gru bzhi phreng bas brgyan// gzhal gyis mi lang gzhal yas ni// yon tan kun gyis brgyan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs 'dus pa/ kak+Sha ku ru'i rgyud las gzhi'i dkyil
346a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dga' ba chen po de/ bya sbom chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ bya byed sdig pa'i 'khor lo 'dri bshad do// mo 'ongs pa'i rnal
346a4(rnying rgyud): ba rnams la ngas bshad par bya'o// yang dag par bsgrub par bya ste/ yang dag par sbyin pa'i sdug pa dang / yang dag par shes rab kyi sdig pa dang / yang dag par bsam gtan gyi sdig pa dang / yang dag par bzod pa'i sdig pa dang / yang dag par brtson 'grus kyi/
346a5(rnying rgyud): sdig pa dang / yang dag par snying rje'i sdig pa dang / yang dag par stobs kyi sdig pa dang / yang dag par spyod pa'i sdig pa dang / yang dag par blta ba'i sdig pa dang / yang dag par ting nge 'dzin gyi sdig pa dang / yang dag par rjod kyi sdig pa dang / yang dag
346a6(rnying rgyud): par bzang po'i sdig pa dang / yang dag par sman pa'i sdig pa dang / yang dag par tshul khrims kyi sdig pa dang / yang dag par sbyor ba'i sdig pa dang / yang dag par sgrol ba'i sdig pa dang / yang dag par thabs kyi sdig pa dang / yang dag par shes rab kyi sdig pa dang /
346a7(rnying rgyud): ga par mthong ba'i sdig pa dang / yang dag pa'i sdig pa ma yin pa'i sdig pa thams cad ni/ shes bzhin ma yin pa'i sdig pa ste yang dag par spang bar bya'o// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de/ thams cad mkhyen

351a2(rnying rgyud): pa bcug la/ mthe bong gis cung zad ba sgral zhing dril lo// oM badz+ra A be sha a a zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde ba gshegs pa yab yu ma sbas dang bcas pa thams cad/ zhe sdang rjes su dran pa'i bu yud 'bru tsam par mdzums med dang drad ba

351a5(rnying rgyud): ha na han dwe b+ha tsag hU~M phaT/ ces brjod nas zil te/ bdag nyid chen po thams cad gnyis su med par sbyor ba mdzad pa'i gzi byin thams cad phur pa'i sbal zhugs pas stong khams thams cad gang bar rtse stag 'phro zhing dmigs pa thams cad nges par 'grub pa'i byin rlab dang /
351a6(rnying rgyud): chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ mdun gyi nam mkha' e'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol nas/ yungs kar gyi rgyal pos brdeg cing / gu sul phyar mas bdug la/ phyi nang gi mchod paci 'byor ba thams cad dbul bar bya'o// de nas yid la brtag pa'i phrin las bcol
351a7(rnying rgyud): 'di ci byid+ha rlab phun sum tshogs pa'o// zhes yang dag par bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa/ karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis phur ba nyid la dbang bsrung ba dang byin gyis brlabs kyis 'gro ba'i don
351b1(rnying rgyud): thogs chags med par byed pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas yang ka rba he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das kI la ya'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sangs 'phral la rgyas pa ma yin te/ ye nyid nas ni rdzogs
351b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas// dmangs rigs bzlas brjod ji ltar lags// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// bzlas brjod phun sum tshogs pa ni// bdag nyid las kyi ltar bsgoms la// snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ hU~M mthing nas
351b3(rnying rgyud): gcig bzhag nas/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ che ge mo zhig mA da ya phaT/ ces brjod pas/ phur pa'i khro bo ci 'dra ba gcig byung bar gyur te/ phyogs bcu thams cad du sems can gyi don byas nas phur pa la bstim mo// 'di 'dra ba 'bum mamra/ badz+ra
351b4(rnying rgyud): 'bum bye ba'am/ sa ya yan chad bzlas pa bya ste/ bsnyen pa gtang bar 'dod na/ phur pa nyid snying ga'i hUM la bsdus te/ 'di ni bzlas brjod phun sum tshogs pa'o// zhes bshad do// de nas yang karma he ru kas kI la ba la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
351b5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das mgon po chen po khyod// phrin las gang lags bshad du gsol// bdag gzhan las gnyis bshad du gsol// sngon gyi las dang gzhung gi las// dgug dang bcing dang dkrol ba rnams// ji ltar lags pa bshad du gsol// bcom
351b6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// phrin las phun sum tshogs pa nI// thog ma nyid du brtag pa'i sa rnyed nas/ bgegs bskrad pa dang mtshams bcad pa la sogs pa bya ste/ skad cig ma'i ting 'dzin gyis khro bo'i sngang mig dang / mtshon cha'i char dang /
351b7(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin la sogs pas bgegs bskrad pa/ phur pa bcu khro bo bcur byin gyis brlabs te/ phyogs bzung btab nas ci tsam 'dod pa bsrung bar mtshams bcad do// dang po rigs lnga'i lha mnyes par byas te/ de nas las kyi lha mnyes par byas la/
352a1(rnying rgyud): de nas ting nge 'dzin gong nas 'byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rnams tshang nas/ gnas chen por dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa/ rtse mo lho phyogs su bstan te/ zhing chen gyi thal ba dang / ske tshe dang / lan tshwa dang / zhing
352a2(rnying rgyud): chen gyi rak+ta dang / sum ma'i lo ma dang / khre dang / rngu tshe'i phub ma dang / grog mkhar gyis dang / bong bu'i bdud rtsi las smras te/ zhing chen thal ba ma rnyed na/ til nag po la gzhi blangs te/ gzugs byas kyang rung / ri mo bris
352a3(rnying rgyud): sa na ga / sa/ / @
352a4(rnying rgyud): gamakhro bo sum b+ha ni'i sbyor ba yang rung / gsang ba'i thugs ka'am rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dza dzaH/ 'di 'dra ba dmar po gcig bzhag la dzaHhUM baM hoH/ badz+ra i ku sha dzaSh+Tha/ che ge mo zhig hU~M dza zhes brjod nas/ ma dag gzhug lha mo lcags bya
352a5(rnying rgyud): can grangs med pa brgyad mang byung nas/ bgegs kyi snying ga nas bzung ste der 'od pa dang / dzaHhUM baM hoH/ badz+ra che ge mo pra be sha hUM/ zhes ci ran brjod nas/ gzugs sam ri mo la phab ste dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes brjod nas lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang
352a6(rnying rgyud): lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas bcings pa dang / bsdams pa dang / de'i sems 'khrug par byas nas/ e'i nang du rtsi mo'i 'og tu song bar bsam la/ de nas phur pa blangs te/ las kyi lha'i snying po dang bcas pas drag tu cung zad cig bskul la/ thal mo
352a7(rnying rgyud): thabs kyis gsor te/ rdo rje sder mo'i sngags bzlas la/ ting 'dzin gsal bar ma gyur gyi bar du dril nas/ ting nge 'dzin khugs pa dang / gnod byed kyi steng du rtse mo nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par gzas la/ khro bo'i rked pa nas lag pa g.yon pas bzung
352b1(rnying rgyud): ma par blta stug pa bdas / ra ga na rnamapa su gcapa mnod dun da ga kyang sa na pa gcig spyo nga/ sa ba dang
352b2(rnying rgyud): lu sa nga/ pa ga rnags sa pa / pa sa
352b3(rnying rgyud): ya ti kA ya wAka tse d+ha badz+ra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ ces drag tu brjod // par pa de dag btab zin nas/ de'i steng du las kyi wa'i phyag kya da / sngags kyis mnan d+he/ lag pa gnyis sa mi badz+ral te/ mtho bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis ngos sbyar
352b4(rnying rgyud): la gzhan ma ni chub drang por bsrang / de'i sngags la/ oM karma badz+ra lo n+ya hU~M phaT swAH/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig ba zlas te g.yas phyogs nas bskor la/ kI la ya'i mgo la lan gsum du gtsug go// de nas yang phur pa srar mi dbyung zhing / lus
352b5(rnying rgyud): kyang ma phyin par slar mi dbyung dang / skrag par yang mi phyin par lhag par ya ba la phyin par bsam ma/ da nas dam chog sa phyag tu bstan par byas s+ho/ mAn+ta ma rnams rgyab tu bsnol ta bcangs la grang ma gnyis gzhu la/ mo brjed papa
352b6(rnying rgyud): rnan par byas te spang pa'i srad du mnan/ phur ba'i lha dang bgegs kyi ga kyang nga mchog las 'a'ang ba zhig par ba ga ding / sngags 'di la na bdun 'bras pa// oM brdas trAs ma ya tri baT/ ces brda da// 'don sems sa dang mig po'i
352b7(rnying rgyud): de nad rkyen/ bzhab mas cad tan pa sa/ den / mi bas gnyis ma spang pa rjod/ brgyad mo bad pa mang parnams par babyed de/ bu pa'i byeng mas dgapa 'di dang/
353a1(rnying rgyud): nag smra/ sa sa/ lags pa padag ngan/
353a2(rnying rgyud): ci brko ba thams cad bdag gi bran bzhin las byed par 'gyur ro// de nas yungs kar rgyal pos brdeg/ gu gul skyer ma bdug la bzhag/ de nas lag pa gnyis rgya bsgyur/ mthe'u chung gcig la gcig ma khyud/ mdzub mo gaN+DI s+ye kha 'ja
353a3(rnying rgyud): g.yas g.yon du bzung ste/ yid tsam dgu par byas/ lhag ma rnams nang du bcangs la/ mdzub mo gnyis mche bar bsams te/ rkang pa g.yon pas dgra bgegs kyi snying gar mnan la/ sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas so// oM badz+ra yak+Sha
353a4(rnying rgyud): gro d+ha la kha ta ha hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ ces brjod do// de nas rdo rdza ba rtson gyi sngags dang phyug \u0f7f s+ye/ lag pa sor mo lu gu rgyud du bsnol la/ mthobong g.yas pa gzhon gyi steng du bzhag la/ mdzub mo gnyis ngos sgyur te blang nas/ sdang mig pa
353a5(rnying rgyud): brdeg bsngags 'ad lan bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ pargya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa be d+hA na sa ma ya dza ti lam po dar u ts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ ces brjod do/ de nas yungs kar gyi rgyal pos brde gcing gu gul gyis
353a6(rnying rgyud): bdug la bzhag go// las 'di shin tu brtan cing grub par mdzod cig par bsam mo// cung zad byin chung bu 'dra na/ rdo rje brjid gnon gyi bsam gtan gyis mnan par bya ste/ khro bo rnams kyi spyi bor bsdus pa'i steng du hUM mthing nag la rdo rje ljang gu rgya gram
353a7(rnying rgyud): kye'i phreng bas bskor brgya tham gyi steng du yi ge su ser po gser btso ma'i kha dog 'dra ba cig bsam la/ oM badz+ra su me ru hUM hUM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod pas/ gser gyi ri rab dpag tshad bye ba bu bzhi pa zhig tu gyur pa'i steng du/ bcom ldan
353b1(rnying rgyud): 'dus don yong grub pa// sku mdog ljang ku bu gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas kyi dang don 'khor lo 'bar ba phyar te bsdams pa/ g.yon gyi dang po rdo rje rgya gra mthugs kar brten pa/ 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pas pho brang btabalas/ khro bo rnams kya
353b2(rnying rgyud): shin tu gzir zhing mi g.yo ba dang / las ma grub na bskal pa'i bar yang mnan par bas ma mo// phrin las kyang de bzhin du bcol te bzhag go// yo byad thams cad kyang nag por bsham/ gtor ma nag po cha gcig bsha ma/ dam tshig can 'khor dang bcas pa
353b3(rnying rgyud): dang / 'jig rten pa tham cad la bsngo zhing las la bcol/ drag po'i gtor ma cha gcig/ gdon de nyid bkug la zar gzhug go// phrin las 'di'i dus su phra me nu ma dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / srin mo rnams byung spyan drangs shing gtor ma dbul/
353b4(rnying rgyud): las bcol te/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjod par bya'o// dzad+had+b+ha ba hoH/ oM h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ b+hi d+hi la kr-i d+ha dza b+hai ru lu ru lu hUM/ zhes lan gsum brjod pas spyan drangs so// oM pra ti dza hU~M/ zhes brjod pas gtor ma 'bul lo// ma~M sa mo ya a mr-i ta a d+hi pra hrIHhU~M.A
353b5(rnying rgyud): zhes bzlas te/ a mr-i ta phul nas ci 'dod pa'i las bcol lo// 'di ni phrin las phun sum tshogs pa zhes bshad pa'i rgyal pos yang dag par bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa'i rgyud/ karma ku ru las rten dang brtenarten du gyur
353b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i phrin las 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu grol ba'i las kyi rgyal po'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal kI la ya'i rgyal po la/ karma he ru kas gsol ba/ e ma ho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// ma mthong rmongs la bstan
353b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang // las kyi sha ma pra hom khung rnams// dpa' bos yang dag bshad du gsol// zhis gsol to// dpa' bo nyid kyis bka' stsal ba// nyon cig rigs kyi he ru ka/ rje'u dmangs dang rgyang po'i

354a2(rnying rgyud): tshul// yang ni bdag gis bshad par bya// zhi ba'i gnas dang drag po'i gnas// snga ma nyid las brtag par bya// de lta bu yi gnas rnyed nas// sngon gyi las rnams rab brtags nas// maN+Dal 'dom gang mda' gang ngam/
354a3(rnying rgyud): che chung tshad ni mnges te// dpangs su khru gang brtsig par bya// cha mnyam chag chag go ma ye// bdud rtsi dag gis rab bya ste// bcu gnyis rtse lngartsa gnyis te// bu mos legs par bkal ba yi// theg srud ma nyams gsang ba yis// dkyil 'khor ma ni
354a4(rnying rgyud): par bya// zung bzhi tshangs thig btab nas ni// sdom bu brgyad du bgo bar bya// dbus su 'khor lo rtsabs bzhi pa// lte ba mu khyud dag gis bskor// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// srang ma rnams kyi khyams dag bya// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// skom bzhi ying
354a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin te// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// de bzhin lcags ri btang bar bya// lte bdag na nag po ste// de la gu gsum gru gsum bya// 'khor lo bzhi ni ser po ste// nga yi gong ras nag par bya// bar khyams dmaral sgo khyams ser// gru chad ljang gu lcags rinag
354a6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin tshon gyis bkye ba la// dbus su karma yab yum ste// shar nas brtsams te khro bo bzhi// rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya// de yi phyi rem snam bu la// srung ma rnams ni spel mar dgod// sgo la sgom bzhi rnams te// lcags ri la ni dbang phyug ma// don gyis sa
354a7(rnying rgyud): chas yin mod kyang // bran gyi tshul du mu ngan bzhugs// dbus kyi gtso bo'i mdun nyid du// sras mchog bdun po de bzhin gzhag/ de ltar don gyi lha bkod nas// mchod pa rnams kyang de bzhin gzhag/ de nas mchod ba'i las bya ba// rgyal po rgyal po de bzhin te/
354a8(rnying rgyud): kyal thabs karma ging gis bya// de nas las rnams mtha' ru bstsal// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gyi bca' gzhi dang lha bkod pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang karma he ru kas/
354b1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// drag po las kyi sham bu ste// me yi chog bshad du gsol// zhes gas to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dkyil 'khor dbus nas shar rjor mamam
354b2(rnying rgyud): me mi dkyil 'khor bu gang bya// de la/ kha khyer gsum dang ldan// thabs dang char yang mnyam pa la// ho ma khrang sor ni bzhi par bya// dang po la yang thod pa gsum// bar ma dag pa mtshar chal// rnga ma tsang dmar dag gi pa dar// ngan
354b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po dang // 'brel pa nyid du bya ba yi// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum rdzogs pa dang // gang la dmigs pa'i ling+ga la// dgug gzhug las rnams tshang bar bya// gcad dang gtu ba dang gdab pa rnams// rdo rje lde la sogs pas rba//
354b4(rnying rgyud): de nas me lha spyan yang drang // dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung ba che// me lha drang srong bram ze mchog/ sum cu rtsa lnga'i lnga tshigs ni// lnga pa me lha zhes kyang bya// rab tu spun la su mngag ser// mdzin
354b5(rnying rgyud): pa ring la gsung yang stan// thugs rje'i dbang gis spyan drangs te// 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs nas ni// sreg blug zhal zas bzhes su gsol// khyod la phrin las bcol ba ni// hom khud ma nyams dam pa 'dir// drongs shig dro dos shig me drongs shing

354b7(rnying rgyud): bzh-i pa Ni d+ha/ nag mo ag+na ye/ kI li kI la ya/ dan ta la saM/ ma hA A gats+tsha hUM/ b+han+d+ha swAhA/ de nas bzhugs su gsol/ dzaHd+hu ba~M hoH/ e h+ye ti ma hA shud+d+he de bdi Sha~M/ ha da sa den te ma hA hi da ta ut+ma tA ri sa maM/ san ti pi ti b+ha ba/
